
1a1(mdo 'grel): snyan dngags mkhan dge ba'i dbang pos mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs ba brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing bzhugs sho/ /
1b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi satwa a bA dA na kalpa la trA/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa  brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang thugs dri bral shel la chags
1b2(mdo 'grel): tshon 'dzin pa min pa nyid/ /yid ni snying rjes brlan la gang gis skyon rnams ma lus bskams/ /gang gis khro ba med la
1b3(mdo 'grel): rang gis 'khor ba'i dgra mngon bcom/ /kun mkhyen de yis khyed la dge legs g.yo ba med gyur cig /dam pa'i
2a1(mdo 'grel): grib bsil dang ldan brtan pa'i chos kyi rtsa bas bskor zhing bsod nams ra bar gnas/ /blo dang
2a2(mdo 'grel): rig pa snying rje la sogs chu yis rnam mdzes rnam par rgyas pa'i yal ga can/ /chog shes dri med yal 'dab grags snyan
2a3(mdo 'grel): dkar ba'i me tog rtag tu dam pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /bsam kun yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dpal ldan sangs rgyas ljon pa
2a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par rgyal gyur cig /'khor ba chu srin 'byung gnas las/ /'gro ba gdon pa'i blo gros ni/ /mthu chen rnams la
2b1(mdo 'grel): 'byung 'gyur te/ /de yang 'di skad rjes su thos/ /gser gyi ba gam gzhal yas khang/ /khang pas bskor ba'i grong khyer ni/ /'od ldan zhes bya bsod
2b2(mdo 'grel): nams las/ /'od ldan mtho ris lta bu yod/ /legs pa rnams kyis legs byas pa'i/ /rig 'dzin dang ldan grub pa dang/ /dri za'i tshogs kyis rab tu
2b3(mdo 'grel): bsten/ /brgya byin grong khyer sar gshegs 'dra/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang bzhin/ /bsod nams khang pa bsngags 'os shing/ /bden dang brtul zhugs
2b4(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa dang/ /brtse ba'i rang bzhin gyis rtag bsten/ /gzi brjid la brten lha rnams kyis/ /gang gi grags pa mdon mchod pa/ /rab gsal zhes bya'i sa
2b5(mdo 'grel): bdag de/ /der ni sa yi thig ler gyur/ /gang gi grags pa'i me tog gi /dog pa yon tan dri bzang tshogs/ /phyogs kun ri dwags mig can gyi/ /rna ba yi
3a1(mdo 'grel): ni rgyan du gyur/ /thabs shes ldan pa gang gi bka' / /sa skyong mgo yi tshogs rnams la/ /gser gyi me tog dri med kyi/ /phreng ba bzhin du rab tu bgyid/ /
3a2(mdo 'grel): nam zhig sa yi dbang phyug de/ /'dun sar bzhugs la glang po yi/ /nags kyi bdag po mngon phyogs te/ /pus mo sa la btsugs nas smras/ /lhan cig khyod grags thos
3a3(mdo 'grel): gyur nas/ /sa srungs sa la 'ongs pa lta'i/ /glang chen mchog tu mdzes pa ni/ /rmad du byung ba bdag gis bzung/ /skabs gsum par 'os so gnyis 'di/ /sgo na gnas so
3a4(mdo 'grel): rab tu gzigs/ /gang phyir jo bos gzigs gyur na/ /g.yog 'khor yongs ngal 'bras dang bcas/ /de dag thos nas mi bdag ni/ /blon la yang dag bgros nas song/ /sgor ni
3a5(mdo 'grel): so gnyis kai la sha /g.yo ba lta bur mthong gyur te/ /rab lhag dri bzang gis bos ba/ /bung ba 'gram pa'i rnga rnams kyis/ /sgeg pa'i rgyan ni yid 'ong ba/ /dpyid ka bzhin du
3b1(mdo 'grel): rab tu bsten/ /'bigs byed kyi ni chu shing dang/ /shal+la ki yi nags kyi dbal/ /dran las mig ni zum gyur cing/ /so yi bar du lag pa brkyang/ /'dab ma bdun pa'i dris rgyas shing/ /a ga ste
3b2(mdo 'grel): yis bstan pa las/ /'bigs byed mi g.yo sa la ni/ /glang po'i rgyal por gyur ltar mtho/ /so yi ka bas rab brgyan cing/ /dpal 'byor rnam par rtse ba'i gnas/ /de ni rnam gzigs sa yi
3b3(mdo 'grel): bdag ba ya mtshen gyur nas 'di ltar bsams/ /e ma gsar pa gsar par ni/ /rab gyur do mtshar sbrul byed pa/ /bsngags 'os las rnamS 'khor bar ni/ /spros pa'i rgyun thag chang ba med/ /bdud
3b4(mdo 'grel): tsa'i chu gter ma bsrubs shing/ /nor rgyas thang yang ma bcad la/ /ri be bsgril ba med par ni/ /glang po 'di ni su yis bskrun/ /de nas glang chen kha lo pa/ /kun tu bgrod ces bka' nyan la/ /glang
3b5(mdo 'grel): chen 'di ni thul cig ces/ /sa yi bdag pos kun tu bstan/ /de gdams sa skyong nang gi ni/ /grong gi khang par gshegs bar gyur/ /bslab pa kun gyi khur bzod pa'i/ /glang chen kun tu bgrod kyi
3b6(mdo 'grel): bzung/ /de yis slob ma dam pa bzhin/ /skye bu? sngar goms dbang gyur pa/ /shes rab ldan de 'bad med du/ /bslab pa kun gyi rnam dul thob/ /sbyin med gdung ba med pa dang/ /stobs dang spro ldan
4a1(mdo 'grel): bzod par ldan/ /dgra 'joms legs par 'gro ba de/ /rgyal po nyid dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /des na glang po'i dbang po de/ /gdul ba'i bya ba mthar phyin nas/ /bya ba byas pa'i kun
4a2(mdo 'grel): 'grod kyis/ /mi dbang la ni sbran par gyur/ /rnam 'gyur med pa'i stobs rgyas pa/ /lcags kyu'i dbang gyur de mthong nas/ /spro ba yi ni rtser bzhugs pa/ /rgyal po'i dpal du rgyal pos bsams/ /de nas
4a3(mdo 'grel): rab dga' yang dag skyes/ /mkhas bar bslabs pa blta phyir de/ /'od stong shar gyi ri la bzhin/ /de la spro ba chen pos zhon/ /de nas glang po'i dbang po de/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu yang dag rgyu/ /mkhas pa
4a4(mdo 'grel): blon bzhin dbang bsgyur ba/ /kun tu bgrod kyis yang dag bstan/ /rgyal po rang gi spro ba bzhin/ /glang po blta ba'i zhar la ni/ /rdon la rtse zhing dga' ldan pas/ /che ba'i nags su 'khyams par 'gyur/ /
4a5(mdo 'grel): rin chen dpung rgyan 'od zer ni/ /ring du 'phro ste shal+la ka'i/ /lo 'dab mchog gis phyogs kyi ni/ /glang rnams 'bod pa lta bur song/ /nags su de ni 'gro ba dag/ /rab
4a6(mdo 'grel): dga' ya mtshan kun rgyas shing/ /mig ni rna bar rdzogs byas pa/ /nags kyi lha yis mthong bar 'gyur/ /nor 'dzin gyi bdag dbang po de/ /sha ba ri yi skra tshogs kyi/ /
4b1(mdo 'grel): me tog dri bzang rdzogs pa'i rgyus/ /'bigs byed rlung gis bsten par gyur/ /de nas 'bigs byed nye ba ni/ /rab dbang bde ba'i 'dab ldan par/ /rtse dga' i bsams pa dran gyur te/ /glang po shin tu rgod par gyur/ /dga' bas bcings pa'i glang mo yis/
4b2(mdo 'grel): dri ma snom zhing gnyis 'thung de/ /mi bdag g.yer bas lu kas bzhin du/ /lcags kyu'i dbang du gyur ba btang/ /so ldan 'dod chags kyis bkug pa/ /rjes su chags bcas rgyug pa de/ /rmongs pa 'khor ba dag la bzhin/ /gang duAng dka' ngad? bral 
4b3(mdo 'grel): ma gyur/ /rlung bzhin mgyogs par bgrod pa yi/ /glang po mthong nas the tshom ni/ /skyes pa'i rgyal po glang po yi/ /kun tu bgrod la 'di smras so/ /kye ma mal glang po 'di/ /khyod kyis 'dul ba 'dzin du bcug /lcags kyu lci ba dag las kyang/ /gang zhig phyir
4b4(mdo 'grel): phyogs song ba mthong/ /'di yi rkang bkod khur gyis ni/ /phyogs kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba bzhin/ /rkang pas 'thung rnams rjes snyogs bzhin/ /sa rnams kun 'khrul myos pa bzhin/ /'dir ni khra rje dus min par/ /rab tu mi mthun gyur pa bzhin/ /skyes
4b5(mdo 'grel): bu'i bya ba thams cad la/ /'bad pas zhugs pa 'bras med gyur/ /de skad rje yi gsung thos nas/ /'jigs par gyur pa'i kun tu bgrod/ /bslab pa smad pas skyengs gyur cing/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas smras/ /lhan gcig bdag gi glang po 'di/ /bya ba
4b6(mdo 'grel): kun gyi dbang du bgyis/ /'on kyang di ring glang mo yi/ /dri ma mnams shing rnam 'gyur gyur/ /'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa yi/ /skye bo rnams ni man dag min/ /sdom pa ma yin yon min zhing/ /legs pa nyid min 'dod pa dran/ /yul las mngon par phyogs
4b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i blo/ /dga' ba'i ro la chags gyur pa/ /shang shod mang po ri yi chu/ /rnam par ltung bzhin su yi? bzlog /lus ni ngal ba'i bslab pa la/ /'dul bar byed pa kho bo mkhas/ /yid ni sdom pa'i bslab pa la/ /thub pa rnams kyang mkhas pa min/ /chag 
5a1(mdo 'grel): las ngal ba mi rtsi zhing/ /bsdams pa ma lus dral gyur te/ /ngan rmongs bzhin du lam min nas/ /gnyis 'thung 'di ni rab tu rgyug /skye bo ngan pa ya ngar ltung/ /nges par ltung ba bgyid pa nyid/ /sa bdag ljon pa'i lo ma rnams//
5a2(mdo 'grel): yang dag zung la 'di ni mthong/ /mi bdag gis ni kun tu 'gro'i/ /de dus su 'od tshig thos nas/ /de dang lhan cig shing chen gyi/ /lo ma dag las 'phyangs par gyur/ /mi bdag shing las babs gyur te/ /rta la zhon nas gshegs par gyur//
5a3(mdo 'grel): glang pos nags su 'khyams gyur pas/ /glang mol ni 'khyud pa thob/ /de 'og glang chen 'dod pa zhi/ /nyin zhag bdun gyis 'dogs pa'i sar/ /rang nyid mngon du 'ongs shing chags/ /bza' ba mngon par 'dod cing gnas/ /brlab pas gdamS
5a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i dbang gyur cing/ /rang nyid 'das pa de mthong nas/ /mkhas pas shin tu dga' ba yi/ /kun tu bgrod kyis rgyal la smras/ /chags pa'i zhags pas drangs gyur cing/ /'dod pas gzir nas rab song gang/ /bslab pa dag dang mi 'gal bar
5a5(mdo 'grel): glang po 'di de rang nyid 'ongs/ /brda' dang ldan pa'i dang 'gyur? gzigs/ /sa la kI sa'i ro shes pa/ /shin tu tsha ba'i lcags kyi zas/ /'dzin cing dul ba dag tu gnas/ /'di ni 'dod pa'i ro yi drangs/ /kun tu sdug bsnga la ro yis drangs//
5a6(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'i rims ni rab zhi nas/ /phyi nas rnal du gnas pa thob/ /lha cig seng ge stag dang ni/ /glang po la sogs gdul bar nus/ /chags pa'i chang gis myos pa'i yid/ /yul la mngon par phyogs pa yin/ /de dag thos nas sa skyong
5a7(mdo 'grel): gis/ /de de bzhin zhes bsams nas smras/ /kun tu bgrod khyod bden pa dang/ /rig pa dag tu brjod pa yin/ /rab zhi ba yi tshul khrims gang dag gis/ /sems kyi gnyis 'thung myos pa ni/ /sdom pa'i thag pas btags gyur pa/ /'jig
5b1(mdo 'grel): rten 'di na 'ga' yod dam/ /de skad smras tshe kun tu bgrod/ /lta ni zhugs pas de la smras/ /lha cig 'gro ba'i nyon mongs rnams/ /ma lus 'joms pa la brtson zhing/ /rnam par rig ldan 'jig rten na/ /'bad pas chags bral skyed pa
5b2(mdo 'grel): yod/ /zhi dang chog shes dri ma med/ /rab rtogs sangs rgyas kho na'o/ /de ltar sangs rgyas mtshan thos pas/ /skye ba sngar skyes goms pa las/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/ /rgyal po yi ni smon lam skyes/ /'khor ba chu srin 'byung
5b3(mdo 'grel): gnas su/ /rnam par byid pa'i 'gro ba 'di/ /dge ba'i lam nas rdzogs pa yis/ /byang chub grol bar yang dag bsgral/ /de nas de la nam mkha' las/ /gtsang ma ris kyi lha yi smras/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ /sa bdag mngon par
5b4(mdo 'grel): 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /de skad de yi tshig thos pas/ /rgyal po rdul bral rnams kyi mchog /skye ba dran zhing lha mig ldan/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid du gyur/ /de nas de ni snying stobs yang ldan mig ni de nyid dag la gtad/ /srid pa'i chu gter   bying ba'i 'byung po kun la rjes su brtse ldan zhing/ /yang dag rig pa spro ba dang ldan mngon par gsar pa bskyed pa las/ /sems can rnams ni yang dag bsgral phyir dge ba'i lam dag bgyis par gyur/ zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang
5b5(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las rab gsal gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dang po'o// //gang zhig bcad brdar bsregs bas kyang/ /gzhan gyi don la gdud med pa/ /'gro 'dir bsod nams
5b6(mdo 'grel): tsdan gyi/ /rkang 'thung de dag rgyal gyur cig /a riSh+Ta zhes bya ba'i grong/ /yon tan tshogs kyis bgrang bya ba/ /'gran zla brgya byin grong khyer ni/ /gang las brling ba med pa yod/ /der ni sa skyong byung gyur pa/ /dpal gyi sde zhes rnam par grags//
6a1(mdo 'grel): yon tan rin chen tshogs rnams kyi/ /'byung gnas rin chen 'byung gnas bzhin/ /gzhan la phan pa'i nus pa can/ /gang gi mthu? yis phyogs rnams kun/ /rjes su chags shing mdzes gyur pa/ /nyi ma yi ni 'od
6a2(mdo 'grel): gyis bzhin/ /stug por sbyin pa'i dri bzang can/ /'byor pa dkar ba'i grags pa dang/ /glang po gang gis 'gro ba dag /mdzes pa dpag bsam ljon pa bzhin/ /skye dgu'i bsod nams kyis bkrun gang/ /sgyu rtsal gnas kyang dang bar
6a3(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /drang por gyur kyang blo gros che/ /blo ldan gyur kyang slu byed min/ /ji srid chi? zer gyi gdung zhing/ /ji srid rlung ni skyo byed pa/ /de srid gang gi bkal dang ni/ /grags pa rab tu gzhom med gyur/ /mtshungs par ngal zhing mkhas pa dang//
6a4(mdo 'grel): yon tan drug shes mig dang ldan/ /blon po steng? phrag bcu gnyis kyis/ /gang zhig yongs su nye bar bsten/ /chos gtsor 'dzin pa'i rgyal po der/ /skye bo legs byas ldan par gyur/ /skye dgu rdze dang yon tan gyis/ /mchungs pa kho
6a5(mdo 'grel): na bud med bzhin/ /de yi bsod nams dbang gis ni/ /skre? bo mtho ris 'gro ba yis/ /gzhal med khang gis brgya byin grong/ /lam dang bral bar rab tu byed/ /lha yi 'jig rten dag tu mi'i/ /'jig rten yang dag zhugs mthong nas/ /sa
6a6(mdo 'grel): bdag la ni khro ba dag /skyes pa mchod sbyin brgya pas bsams/ /kye ma sa spyod dpal gyi sdes/ /shin tu sbyin par byed pa dang/ /dge ba'i khrims kyis skye dgu rnams/ /bdag dang mtshungs par rab tu bkod/ /bdag gis sgyu ma bsgrubs
6a7(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /sbyin pa'i snying stobs mthu ldan zhing/ /sems ni nyams pa med pa de'i/ /brtan pa rab tu brtag par bya/ /de ltar yun ring rnam bsams nas/ /gzugs ni gzhan du bsgyur byas te/ /rjes 'brang lha ni nyung du dang/ /mi yi 'jig
6b1(mdo 'grel): rten dag tu zhugs/ /skabs der blo bzang blon po ni/ /rgyal srid srung ba'i bla ma yis/ /skye dgu'i bya ba gtso bor ni/ /yongs rtogs mi yi bdag la smras/ /rgyal po rgyal srid mdzes ldan zhing/ /rdul bral zol med sbyin byed pa/ /khyod kyis  skabs gsum dbang phyug ni/ /pham par byas pas ngo mtshar gyur/ /gzhan gyi yon tan rdzogs pa dang/ /bdag nyid de las dman pa ni/ /mthong nas phrag dog rnam 'phrul dag /nges pa kho nar cis mi 'byung/ /chen po rnams kyi lags
6b2(mdo 'grel): byas la'ang/ /khyad 'phags gzhan la 'gran pa'i me/ /bstan pa'i skye bo phrag dog can/ /phal cher gdung bas nyen bar 'gyur/ /sbyin la gcags pa khyod kyi ni/ /nor kun sbyin pa lugs su 'gyur/ /bu dang chung ma bdag nyid kyang/ /sbyin
6b3(mdo 'grel): bsam thub tshod shin tu ches/ /gang gis 'gro ba'i gtsug gis ni/ /nor bu nyams byed rab brjod pa/ /shin tu drag cing 'jigs pa'i rgyu/ /mi bzad rmi lam de de mthong/ /rnam shes de nyid smra ba rnams/ /sa skyong sku lus sbyin pa ni/ /bgyid par
6b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhes brnag ka'i gtam/ /rab tu smra ba dag kyang thos/ /lus kyi sbyin pa slong ba'i tshogs/ /kun gyi 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu/ /dpag bsam sar skyes gnas pa ni/ /kun la rab tu byin 'gyur nyid/ /de phyir sa skyong khyod kyi lus/ /'gro ba bsrung ba'i rin
6b5(mdo 'grel): chen phyir/ /skye dgu'i dbang gyur gtong ba yi/ /thub chod 'di la dgyes bral mdzod/ /blon po'i mchog gis smras pa 'di/ /thos nas nor 'dzin bdag po ni/ /snying stobs dkar 'dzum gyis bkrus pa'i/ /mchu mdzes ldan pas de la smras/ /blon po chen po
6b6(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis ni/ /blon pos 'ongs shing phan pa brjod/ /'on kyang slong skye phyir phyogs pa'i/ /gdud ba dag gis yongs mi bzod/ /slang zhig ces ni brjod pa la/ /dgag pa'i yi ge rtsub mo'i tshig /gang gi kha nas rnam bar rgyu/ /de dag gson po srog song
7a1(mdo 'grel): yin/ /'di las 'di ni thob 'gyur zhes/ /snying la bzung nas slong ba bo/ /'ongs pa gang las phyir phyogs shing/ /'gro ba'i gson pa de yis ci/ /sdug bsngal skye bo gang dag gis/ /gdung ba thob pas yid bsil zhing/ /snying rje med
7a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i bdag nyid can/ /bsod nams zhan de'i skye ba smad/ /'ba' zhig du ni 'ga' zhig tshe/ /'ga' zhig 'ga' la phan par 'gyur/ /don de legs pa rnams kyi lus/ /'di ni gnod par bcas kyang dga' / /mi bdag snying stobs ldan pa'i tshig /de skad
7a3(mdo 'grel): thos nas blon po ni/ /g.yo ba med par 'gyur ro zhes/ /bsams nas ci yang mi smra'o/ /de rjes nam zhig sa yi rje/ /rol cing rnam par gnas pa de'i/ /btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od ces pa/ /dga' ma'i bdag po'i dga' ma bzhin/ /mdzes ma sems kyi
7a4(mdo 'grel): ri dags zhags/ /'chad la mkhas pa'i thub pa ni/ /ring nas rang dgar 'ongs gyur pa/ /mig ni 'dzum bral 'dzin pas mthong/ /skye ba snga ma gzhan dag tu/ /'brel cing mdza' bas 'dris pa bzhin/ /de mthong de yis 'dzin ba dang/ /brtan pa'i phung
7a5(mdo 'grel): po gtsor ma gyur/ /de yi yid ni chags bral yang/ /bag chags kun nas langs gyur cing/ /dngos las phyir phyogs btang gyur te/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i sa la song/ /gang phyir srog chags thams cad kyi/ /skye ba sngar goms bag chags
7a6(mdo 'grel): ni/ /rgyun tu dga' ba'i skud pa yis/ /rtag tu brtsems 'di med mi 'gyur/ /de ni gnas su 'ongs ba la/ /yon ni blang bar mdzod cig ces/ /klag ba'i brtul zhugs yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /slob ma bram ze'i khye'us smras/ /de la de smras mnyes
7a7(mdo 'grel): gshin dag /nags su bdag la nor mi dgos/ /'on kyang snying nas gus pa na/ /gang zhig mngon bar 'dong ba nyon/ /sa bdag dpal sde'i lha mo ni/ /rgyal ba'i 'od de gal te na/ /khyod kyis sbyin du 'thob pa na/ /'di ni bdag gi yon du 'gyur//
7b1(mdo 'grel): de skad bla mas brjod thos nas/ /slob ma'i yid ni rab tu 'dar/ /mi phod blangs na rnyed pa la/ /the tshom kun tu 'khrugs par gyur/ /de ni slong rnams rang 'dod bzhin/ /rtag tu gdangs pa'i sgor song nas/ /sa skyong rnams kyi gtso bo yi/ /khang par yid ches
7b2(mdo 'grel): zhan par zhugs/ /mi 'thob dogs slong zhum pa yi/ /bsams bas yid ni mi g.yo zhing/ /shin tu skyengs las gdong btud de/ /sa la rtog cing? lta ba bzhin/ /slong ba 'ongs pa de mthong nas/ /sa bdag rab tu dgyes par gyur/ /bdud rtsi rab sbyin
7b3(mdo 'grel): chas pa yi/ /chu gter yang dag rgyas 'gyur bzhin/ /khyod kyi 'dod pa ci zhig ces/ /brjod nas sa la spyod pas mchod/ /'os pa min brjod ngo tsha zhing/ /yi ge 'khrul par de yis smras/ /khyod ni slong ba'i dpag bsam shing/ /sngon chad gzhan
7b4(mdo 'grel): gyis ma bslangs shing/ /shin tu rnyed dka' i gnas de yang/ /bla ma'i don du bdag slong gyur/ /bdag gi rig pa'i brtul zhugs rdzogs/ /slob dpon mngon par 'dod pa'i yon/ /rgyal po lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od/ /gal te bod na slong bar mdzod/ /thub
7b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i slob mas de brjod pa'i/ /'phral nyid sa yi bdag po'i yid/ /mdza' dang sbyin pa'i ror bcags pas/ /rnam pa gnyis zhig byung bar gyur/ /so yi 'od zer mdun dkrigs pas/ /snying du sdug pa'i btsun mo dag /dkar ba'i gos kyis
7b6(mdo 'grel): g.yogs pa bzhin/ /de yis skye gnyis dag la smras/ /'bral bas 'jigs pa'i sems la yang/ /nga yis bden par mi brtsi zhing/ /rnam par mi dbyad khyod kyi ni/ /bla ma gang bzhed bdag gis sbyin/ /de skad brjod nas rgyal po yis//
7b7(mdo 'grel): btsun mo pad+ma'i sbyan ldan ma/ /rtag tu snying la yang dag bcags/ /'tsho srog gzhan pa lta bu bos/ /'bral bas gdung ba'i me dag ni/ /bla mar gyur pa'i bzlog gyur cing/ /mdza' ba shin tu 'phel ba yi/ /'dod pa'i gnyen gyis bkag gyur
8a1(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /thub pa'i slob la rab tu byin/ /'phral la ri dags mo bzhin du/ /'di ni ci zhes dal ba dang/ /skrag bcas mig ni rig rig gyur/ /sa spyod gtong ba'i dang can gyis/ /dga' ma btang par gyur ba la/ /gtong bas 'jigs pa bzhin dus//
8a2(mdo 'grel): chu gter ska rags g.yo ldan 'dar/ /gang phyir lus la gnas skabs ngan/ /dbang po zla sogs lha rnams kyis/ /bzod dka' yang ni bzod byed pa/ /dga' ma de la su mi dga' / /la la'i tshul khrims la la'i nor/ /la la'i dka' thub la la'i chos//
8a3(mdo 'grel): la la'i ngo tsha la la'i lus/ /bud med ched du btang bar gyur/ /skyes bu rnams kyis 'tsho ba'i srog /chags pa'i nor kun gang dag nyid/ /de nyid sems dpa' che rnams kyi/ /sbyin pa rtswa yi gzegs ma bzhin/ /de ni blangs nas song ba der/ /bral bas
8a4(mdo 'grel): yid 'khrugs mi yi bdag /dga' ma dang bral bde la sdang/ /yid 'byung bzhin du rab tu gyur/ /slob mas sa bdag chung ma ni/ /'tsho ba dang bral 'jig rten dag /pha rol sar 'grod bzhin blangs te/ /'ong ba thub pas mthong gyur nas/ /'gyod pa drag boS
8a5(mdo 'grel): yang dag gdungs/ /mchog tu ngo tshas shin tu zhum/ /las ni rnam par bslang pa las/ /bdag nyid rigs pa min par bsams/ /kye ma ma rabs byis pa bzhin/ /bdag gis g.yo ba 'ba' zhig las/ /grags pa min pa'i 'dam du ni/ /dogs med rang gis
8a6(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid bskyur/ /bdag ni chos min byed pa yis/ /rigs gnas bla ma'i btsun mo ni/ /chos kyis skye dgu'i mar gyur 'di/ /sdug bsngal me la rab tu gtad/ /bdag gi tshul khrims ma bsams shing/ /yang dag sdom pa ma dran la/ /chags dang bral nyid ma
8a7(mdo 'grel): brtsis shing/ /dben pa rnam bar ma bltas ci/ /kye ma rtog dpyod med rnams yid/ /yang dag sdom min chang gis myos/ /legs ba'i lam las phyir phyogs te/ /'dir ni g.yangs kho nar rgyug /de ltar bsams nas thub pa de/ /skyengs pas gzi byin nyamS
8b1(mdo 'grel): gyur te/ /bzhin ni dman pa mngon byogs te/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo la smas ba/ /dbugs byung mjod cig ma cig kya/ /mya ngan gyi bar mi 'os so/ /des par bdag ni tshul dan pas/ /khyod kyi sdug bsngal 'di nyid do/ /'jug degs shing 'di'i 'og tu ni/ /ngal ba'i gdung
8b2(mdo 'grel): ba btang byas nas/ /da dang lhan cig rang khyim du/ /da lta nyid du khyod 'gror 'gyur/ /thub pas 'di brjod lha mo ni/ /bdud rtsi'i char gyis bran pa bzhin/ /'jigs pa'i kun rmongs btang gyur cing/ /srog ni 'dzin pa ? par gyur/ /gtong ba'i spyod pa rmad byung
8b3(mdo 'grel): gis/ /mtho ris khyab pa de thos nas/ /rgyal po'i rtse ba'i snying stobs dag/ shes 'dod nor lha'i bu nyer 'ongs/ /mi med nags su stag gis ni/ /smad kyi lus phyed zos gyur cing/ /bu bzhi yis ni du bzhin du/ /bzung bar gyur ba bram ze'i gzugs/ /
8b4(mdo 'grel): khrag ni mang po rab zag cing/ /rgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor 'phyad dang ldan/ /sdig pa brtan par byas pa bzhin/ /sdug kyang srog dang ma bral te/ rab tu gsar ba sha yi dris/ /sha za'i chogs rnams rjes 'brang ba/ /bskam chags rgyal dang rkun bos bskyed/ /nor med rnamS
8b5(mdo 'grel): kyis nor ldan zhing/ /grong khyer dbus su zhugs pa las/ /de ni grong na gnas rnams kyi/ /snying rje zhum dang sdug bsngal gzir/ /'jigs dang ya mtshan rgyu ru gyur/ /de yis bzod dka' mya ngan dang/ /sgrag pa rnam pa dang bcas bzhin/ /'phral du grong gi pud
8b6(mdo 'grel): med rnams/ /'jigs pas sgyid ni lug par byas/ /de nas sa bdag slong ba rnams/ /blta phyir 'dun sar 'khad pa de'i/ /mdun du bu gzugs bzhi po des/ /de ni khri la bzhag ste bkod/ /mi bzod nyon mongs rnams la brugs shing/ /mi sdug cha lus de mthong naS/
8b7(mdo 'grel): skye bo bzhin gyi tshogs rnams ni/ /sgra med mig ni zum par gyur/ /'dar bas 'khrugs shing brkyang pa yi/ /dbung pa g.yas pa bslang byas nas/ /gdung bas yi ge bral ba'i tshig /de yis sa skyong dag la smras/ /sa bdag khyod ni dge bar gyur/ /bram ze dag 
9a1(mdo 'grel): gnas skabs 'di/ /bzod dka' sdig pa bzhin du thob/ /bdag la gzigs shig snying rje'i gter/ /'khor ba lta bur 'jigs pa'i nags/ /zab mo dag tu stag gis zos/ /sdug bsngal rab tu lci ba 'di/ /longs spyod phyir na bdag 'tsho'o//
9a2(mdo 'grel): phongs pa'i gdung ba 'di la yang/ /drag po'i nyon mongs bzod nus pa'i/ /srog 'dis bdag ni mi gtong ste/ /mdza' shes dam ba'i skye bos bzhin/ /su zhig bdag nyid lus phyed bcad/ /gal te khyod la ster ba na/ /nges khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes/ /nam
9a3(mdo 'grel): mkha' i lha yis bdag la smras/ /'gro ba 'di na skye bo rnams/ /gzhan gyi don las phyir phyogs te/ /phal cher rang gi bde ba tshol/ /su zhig srog ster snying rje'i gter/ /thams cad chen thams cad gtong/ /dman zhing bongs pa rnams kyi gnyen/ /lus sbyin
9a4(mdo 'grel): las kyang phyir ma phyogs/ /khyod la skyabs su bdag song ngo/ /zol med gus shing rgya che ba'i/ /sbyin par gang gi 'bras bu 'khrungs/ /khyod nyid gcig bu 'jig rten 'dir/ /legs byas rkang 'thung dag tu skyes/ /gtong phod ldan pa gang khyod kyi/ /legs
9a5(mdo 'grel): byas rnga ni 'jig rten na/ /sbyin ba nyid kyis rdung bar bgyid/ /yon tan bsgrags pa gzhan gyi ci/ /ltung zhing nyen rnams yongs su skyob/ /gced mar spyod pa'i brtul zhugs ldan/ /phongs pa'i dus su khyod lta bu/ /bsod nams tshong zong dag gis 'thog/
9a6(mdo 'grel): mi dman kun tu dga' ba'i gnyen/ /ha ri tsan dan bzhin du bsil/ /lho yi phyogs kyi rlung gis bzhin/ /dam ba rnams kyi gdung ba 'phrog /rdzogs pa'i zla ba khyod kyi zhal/ /mdzes pa 'di las 'khrungs pa yi/ / tshig gi bdud rtsi'i char rgyun ni/ /zla 'od
9a7(mdo 'grel): lta bus gso ba nyid/ /de yis de skad brjod ba'i 'bral/ /de yi sdug bsngal snying la 'phos/ /myur zhing rtabs par rgyal po yis/ /rmongs shing brgyal ba de la smras/ /srog 'bral las skyes 'jigs pa dag /khyod kyis thong la dbugs dbyung mdzod//
9b1(mdo 'grel): lus phyed rtog dpyod med nyid du/ /gnyis skyis? khyod la bdag gis sbyin/ /gang phyir skad cig 'dzad pa'i lus/ /'di ni bsrungs kyang mi mdzad min/ /dam pa rnams kyis lus 'di ni/ /gzhan la phan phyir 'dzad par 'gyur/ /sa skyod de dag brjod ldan la/ /snying ni yang dar 'dar
9b2(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /rdo rjes bcom bzhin blon po ni/ /chen bo blo gros chen pos smras/ /kye ma bab col goms pa las/ /jo bo gdung bas gzir min nam/ /skye dgu bsod nams yongs zang las/ /phan pa nyid la mi rtsi'o/ /skye dgu 'byor bar bgyid ba'i mthu/ /khyod mtshungs yon tan
9b3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa su/ /gang zhig g.yog 'khor gud bas brjod/ /nyan dang byed pos yi bdag /rje bo glang chen rol pa ltar/ /mig zum phan pa mi mdzad na/ /'khor bzang rnams kyi dbang thad dang/ /phun tshogs 'di snyed kho nar brtsi/ /'dul ba smra ba rnams kyi tshig /dge ba'i me
9b4(mdo 'grel): tog gis gtams pa/ /sbrang rtsi'i dog pa gang dag gis/ /rna bar bgyis te yun ring mdzes/ /'gro rnams bsrung ba'i rin chen gyis/ /sku lus su zhig slong gyur pa/ /'di ni srin po 'am sha za ste/ /slu byed bram ze'i rnam par byas/ /gal te 'di ni che ba'i sgyu/ /'di
9b5(mdo 'grel): yis des par ma bgyid na/ /lus 'di bcad pa skad cig kyang/ /'tsho ba de ltag la mchi/ /gdon dan dag gis legs byas ni/ /rtog dpyod med par gang byed pa/ /de dag bdag nyid gdung zhing gyur/ /'jig rten gzhan duAng bde ba med/ /rtag tu nus pa kho na sbyin//
9b6(mdo 'grel): mi nus ba ni ji ltar sbyin/ /bdog kun dang ni lus sbyin sogs/ /rab tu smra ba kho na mdzes/ /gang 'di rgya mtsho nor bu ster/ /ring nas rna ba'i bdud rtsi ste/ /slong ba yang dag 'ongs rnams kyi/ /der ni btung ba'ang gzhan las so/ /rgyal po skye dgu rnams kyi srog/ slong ba rnams
9b7(mdo 'grel): kyi yid bzhin nor// khyod ni 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /gzhan srog gis kyang bsrung bar 'os/ /lha cig bab col ma mdzad par/ /bdag la dang zhing brtse bar mdzod/ /mchid bu dum bu'i slad du ni/ /rin chen bcod bar ma mdzad cig /'di smras rje yi zhabs dag la//
10a1(mdo 'grel): blon po gang zag 'gyel gyur kyang/ /sa bdag lus 'di sbyin pa yi/ /rnam par brtag las g.yos ma gyur/ /dga' ba'i 'dzum gyis phye ba yi/ /so yi 'od kyis srog la ni/ /chags ba rmongs pa'i mun pa dag/ yongs su 'phrog bzhin de yis
10a2(mdo 'grel): smras/ /blon po chen po khyod kyis 'di/ /gus dang bcas pa 'ba' zhig tu/ /gsal bar brjod de bram ze'i srog /the tshom pa yis mi bzod do/ /do shal grang reg padmo dang/ /pad rtsa zla ba tsan dan gyis/ /nang gi gdung zlog slong ba ni/ /phyir phyogs sdug bsngal
10a3(mdo 'grel): las skyes min/ /sdug bsngal dag gis gzir ba kun/ /kun nas 'phrog sems spro ldan pa/ /bdag gi byang chub bar chad ni/ /blo bzang bgyi bar mi 'os so/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/ /sems kyis 'das gyur bdag gis dran/ /skye ba gzhan duAng
10a4(mdo 'grel): lus pa dag/ byin pas dag na ni med gyur/ /stag mo ltogs shing nyan med sngon/ /bu ni bza' bar brtson mthong nas/ /de bsrung slad du lus bo ni/ /rnam 'gyur med par bdag gis byin// shi bir skyes tshe long ba la/ /mig ni zung dag bdag gis byin/ /khra
10a5(mdo 'grel): las skyes pa'i 'jigs pa las/ /phug ron rang gi lus kyis bsrungs/ /zla ba'i 'ong du gyur tshe yang/ /drag po'i mig la mgo bo btang/ /skye ba gzhan du bdog kun dang/ /bu dang chung ma sogs kyang byin/ /sa spyod byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /de skad smras
10a6(mdo 'grel): pa blon po'i mchog /gson min shi ba ma yin bzhin/ /dbang po gdung bas nyen par gyur/ /de nas sog lo rnon po yis/ /sku lus bcad pa'i bya ba dag/ bgod par mi nus rgyal po'i bkas/ /bzo bo dag la bskos par gyur/ /mya ngan drag pos 'bangs de dag
10a7(mdo 'grel): brgya byin rgyu yis rnam rmongs te/ /ji zhig ltar stes sa bdag gis/ /lus ni gcod la yang dag zhugs/ /sogs le rno zhi ? brtsub pa yis/ /mi bdag rnam 'gyur mi mnga' ba'i/ /lus phyed rnam par bcad pa'i tshe/ /sa ni yang dag g.yos par gyur/ /skar
10b1(mdo 'grel): ? ltung? bya'? ? dmar can/ /rgyu skar 'khru shing sgra chen sgrogs/ /mchi ma'i thogs pa'i tshogs ltung zhing/ /mkha' ni sgra bcas du ma bzhin/ /mi rung gzigs pas drag po yi/ /sdug bsngal shin tu bzod dkar gyur/ /nyi ma rdul gyis gos dag gis/ /myur
10b2(mdo 'grel): du gdong ba bsgribs pa bzhin/ /skye dgu'i mgon gyi lus la der/ /sog las gshags bas skye dgu rnams/ /dus? shing phyogs kyis bu mo yis/ /sgra snyan rnams kyis cho nges bkang/ /mi bdag snying stobs ma bri ba/ /brgya byin gnyis skyes mdog dbyibs
10b3(mdo 'grel): can/ /ya mtshan 'gyod pas non pa yi/ /sems kyis mthong nas ring zhig bsams/ /'di las blo chen 'di yi yid/ /gzhan gyi don du gdung ba la/ /snying rje bas kyang mnyen pa dang/ /rdo rje bas kyang sra ba thob/ /kye ma bdag nyid che spyod tshul/ /rgya mtshabs? kyang shin tu zab
10b4(mdo 'grel): ri rab bas kyang yang dag mtho/ /mtho ris pas kyang ngo mtshar bcas/ /kye ma srog 'di 'gro na yang/ /snying stobs rgya mtsho snying stobs ldan/ /dam pa ya ngar? lhung na yang/ /chen po nyid ni mi nyams bzhin/ /mig stong ldan pas de bsams tshe/ /sa yi bdag po'i lta 'og
10b5(mdo 'grel): nas/ /lus phyed nges par bcad nas ni/ /sa la myur du ltur bar 'gyur/ /lus ni rnam gnyis gyur kyang de/ /dga' dang spro ba'i rang bzhin gyur/ /'byung po kun yongs bskyabs pa yi/ /snying stobs kyis ni srog nas bzung/ /de yi bka' yis lus byed ni/ /sbyar nas
10b6(mdo 'grel): nyams pa rnal du gnas/ /yongs rdzogs lus ni yang dag langs/ /bram ze yis ni de la smras/ /e ma rgyal po khyod kyi ni/ /zol med lus kyi sbyin pa yis/ /rdul bral mchod 'od khyad par du/ /dri mang grags pas rnam par mdzes/ /khyod yid nor bu dri med dang/ /
10b7(mdo 'grel): mtshungs bci yang ma byas pa/ /kye ma byed po rmongs pa dag /dpe yis kyang gi shin tu dbul/ /drang zhing rab zlum mdar?  bas khengs// mtho zhing bcas par gyur pa yi/ /bur shing sdong po lta bu yis/ /gzhan don bzod dka' gdung ba bzod/ /'di smras bram ze'i dbyibs
11a1(mdo 'grel): can gyi/ brgya byin dran pa las skyes pa/ /yang dag gso byed sman gyi tshogs/ /bdud rtsi zhu bas de rdzogs byas/ /de nas byad gzugs gsal bar byas/ /yongs su tshim nas brgya byin gyis/ /rang gis lus byed legs sbyar ba'i/ /sa yi bdag
11a2(mdo 'grel): po rab tu bsngags/ /de nas me tog dkar po'i tshogs/ /mkha' las rab tu ltung gyur pa/ de tshes gzhi dga' zhing 'god/ /gyen du bskyod pa lta bus mdzes/ /de ltar gyur pas mtshar skyes pa/ /thub pas skabs der de la ni/ /btsun mo dga' ma rgyal
11a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i 'od/ /khyer te mngon du phyogs nas phul/ /rnam dag rang gi grags pa bzhin/ /btsun mo de dang yang dag 'grogs/ /gnod la rnam 'gyur mi mnga' ba/ /brgya byin gyis dris de yis smras/ /de nas rab mchog seng ge'i khri/ /bi shwa karmas spul pa dang/ /rin
11a4(mdo 'grel): chen char gyis rab gang ba'i/ /'dzam bu'i gling dus bdag ni/ /lha yi dbang pos bsngags byas nas/ /btsun mor bcas pa mngon dbang bskur/ /sbyin pa'i bsod nams mthus bskrun pa'i/ /dge bas skye dgu tshim bar byed/ /'khor ba'i sems can mdza' 
11a5(mdo 'grel): dag ni// yang dag sgrol ba'i brtul zhugs byas/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ /mngon 'tshang rgya yid rab dag 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i thugs ni byams pa dang ldan snying rje ngar bab snying stobs grub/ /rnam par dag cing yongs pa'i gdung ba rab zhi'i 'bras
11a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas dag/ rab steng rab dga' i chu yis bkrus pa'i mig gis bltas nas skyengs gyur pa'i/ /brgya byin 'chi med grong khyer de yi grags pas khengs pa dag tu song/ /de ltar de ni lha yi cho gas dang grub pa gnod sbyin dang/ /lto 'phye'i dbang gis spu ldang mdzes
11a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i byug pas mchod ldan mthu/ /sa rnams dag ni mtho ris brtag byar byas shing bsrung nus la/ /srid bral 'byor pa dag gis mdzes pa thob ldan byang chub sems/ /sngon byung yang dag brjod pa yis/ /sbyin pa khyod 'phags gsal byed cing/ /dge slong rnams lag des?
11b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i slad/ /bcom ldan rgyal ba de skad gsungs/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dpal gyi sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste gnyis pa'o// //'gro 'dir spros pa
11b2(mdo 'grel): rmad byung rin chen tshogs/ /chu srin 'byung gnas dag las skye bar ldan/ /su zhig kyang ni rab tu gsal ba ru/ /bang bar 'gro ba skyes bu rin chen skyes/ /bag ma 'ong tshogs ga pur gyis/ /yongs su dkar ba'i grong khyer ni/ /shA ka ta zhes bya ba ste/ /skal bzang sa yi thog
11b3(mdo 'grel): la yong/ /'jug ngogs bzhin du bsten 'os gang/ /bsod nams byed gtsang gzi byin dang/ /snying stobs rang bzhin gi gA? ltar/ /dri med yid ldan dag tu gnas/ /nam zhig grags pa'i me tog ldan/ /bsod nams dri bzang rab tu rgyas/ /legs byas skyed tshal
11b4(mdo 'grel): dga' ster du/ /grong khyer pa rnams rab tu rtse na/ /der ni sa bdag chu gter che/ /rab mang yon tan rin chen dang/ /grags pa'i ri bong mtshan ma bskyed/ /gser gyi gtsug bud ces grags byung/ /rtag tu dam pas bsten 'os shing/ /rtsod dus rab tu 'grog byed pa/ /
11b5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs ldan lta bu gang gis ni/ /skye bo chos rnams 'dzin par byas/ /sa bdag bzod la kun chags shing/ /dpal gyis dkris gyur snying rje dga' / /rab grags la yang dbang thul gang/ /skye dgu rnams kyi dga' byed gyur/ /'tshe med mchod sbyin bslab lan pa/
11b6(mdo 'grel): gang gis bsod nams mi 'jigs yon/ /mi gsod sbra dbyangs yongs rdzogs pa/ /'byung po kun la byin par gyur/ /mthu dang ldan yang gang ma myos/ /rnam par 'byor yang snyan par smra/ /rje nyid yin yang bzod ldan tshul/ /lang tshe ldan yang dbang po thul/ /mthon
11b7(mdo 'grel): bor gyur pa'i zab mo dang/ /zla ba'i 'od zer dpa' bo dang/ /sa gzhi 'dzin pa dam pa'i phyogs/ /gang gis ya mtshan byas par gyur/ /rgyal po do zla med pa de'i/ /rgya ma ni gnyis shig byung gyur te/ /gtong ba rdzogs pa'i snying rje dang/ /legs byas dpal na dar bab
12a1(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas de yin ni/ /lha mo mdzes ldan dga' mar gyur/ /snga dro'i dpal bzhin rtag tu ni/ /skyon med dga' ba mngon par 'char/ /lus ni rje yi yon tan dang/ /dpal ni 'bang ba gtong ba dang/ /mdzes ba nyid ni khrims kyis
12a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /de ni rgyal po'i zla bas mdzes/ /rtag tu dag 'byed snyan pa dag/ /rab kram rnam par grags pa de/ /sa 'dzin mchog ni mdzes gyur pa/ /mtho ris dpal gyis lhun po bzhin/ /rje las dus su dge ba'i gnas/ /mngal ni de yis bzung gyur te/
12a3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pad+ma 'byor pa'i slad/ /a di ti yis nyin byed bzhin/ /bdud rtse'i zer gyis chu gter rlabs/ /tshangs ba'i pad+mas khyab 'jug lte/ /dag byed dag gis srung shing bzhin/ /de ni mngal gyis mdzes par gyur/ /de yi mngal gyi mthus sred pa'i/ /mngon
12a4(mdo 'grel): par 'dod bzhin mi bdag gis/ /mngon par 'dod pas mngon lhag nor/ /slong ba'i don mthun kun la byin/ /slar yang sa bdag gis sred dris/ /dge ba'i mngal dang ldan ma nges/ /dbyangs can ma bzhin rang bzhin nyid kyis/ /dam chos rnam par bshad pa byas//
12a5(mdo 'grel): yongs rdzogs bsod nams rin chen ni/ /chos gter bsgrub pa rab 'dzin bas/ /phongs pa'i sdug bsngal rgyas pa las/ /rtag tu bsrung shing rab tu bsrungs/ /'brog dgon bgrod dkar yongs srung 'jig rten ni/ /pha rol lam du gdung bas nyen rnams
12a6(mdo 'grel): la/ /yid 'ong rab rgyas 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i phyogs/ /grib shing chos dang mtshungs pa gzhan yod min/ /rab rib can la snang ba phongs pa'i dug la nor bu ltung ba lag ba'i 'chel sa ste/ /slong la dpag bsam ljon ba 'gro la rgyal ba'i shing rta
12a7(mdo 'grel): lam gzhan dag la lam gyi rgyags/ /sdug bsngal nad la sman chen dang ni srid ba'i 'jigs pa kun 'khrugs bsam pa dbugs 'byin ba/ /gdung ba bdag la tsan dan nags tshal brtan pa'i mdza' bshes chos ni dam pa rnams kyi gnyen/ /de
12b1(mdo 'grel): sogs mi bdag btsun mo'i tshig /dkar ba'i chos ni thos gyur nas/ /dpal ldan 'gro la 'jig rten du/ /dam chos gcig pu skyabs su gyur/ /de nas dus ni yongs rdzogs te// mkha' las bdud rtsi'i 'od zer bzhin/ /'gro ba'i rab rib 'joms pa'i bu/ /lha
12b2(mdo 'grel): mo las ni bcos par gyur/ /de yi gtsug rgyan nor bu ni/ /lhan skyes dag tu skyes gyur te/ /skye ba gzhan sngar 'grogs pa yi/ /dben pa bzhin du dri ma med/ /de yi gtsug na gang 'od mthus/ /mtshan mo nyin du bgyid pa yis/ /nor bu bsod nams las skyes
12b3(mdo 'grel): pa/ /rab sdug de yis mdzes par gyur/ /gtsug tor dang bcas nor bu de'i/ /bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i thigs pa yis/ /lcags rnams myur du zhi ba dang/ /gser du bsgrub pa nyid duAng bgyid/ /de nas skye dran byis pa de'i/ /tshig gis sa yi bdag po yis/ /nor bu'i
12b4(mdo 'grel): bcud 'khrungs gser rnams kun/ /slong ba rnams la rtag tu byin/ /de skyes tshe na lha rnams kyis/ /mkha' la grong khyer me tog dang/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan gdugs dang ni/ /bdan rlung g.yab gos kyis bkang// shin tu gsal bar bskyed ba yi/ /rig pa kun
12b5(mdo 'grel): gyi rnam mdzes bdag/ de ming mi bdag gis mdzad ba?/ /gtsug na nor bu zhes su grags/ /yongs 'du dag gis chu gter bzhin/ /bu skyes mngon par skyes pa nges/ /yab kyi bsam pa dga' ba yi/ /bdud rtsis rab tu rgyas par byas/ /rgyal bas pau lo ma
12b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin dang/ /gzhon nus dri yi sras mo bzhin/ /mchod par 'os par skyes ba yi/ /gzhon nu de yi yum yang mdzes/ /de nas dus kyis yi bdag /bsod nams them skas dag la ni/ /lha yi gnas su yang dag 'dzegs/ /gtsug na nor bu mi bdag gyur//
12b7(mdo 'grel): slong? ba rnams kyi yid bzhin nor/ /de yi sbyin pas yongs khebs pas/ /bsod nams bde snang 'jig rten na/ /phongs par gyur med slong ba'ang med/ /rgyal po de yi glang chen ni/ /bzang po'i ri zhes bya bar gyur/ /bdag po bzhin du rjes mdun par/ /sbyin
13a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i brlan ldan lag pa'i rdzing/ /nam zhig 'jig rten 'dren byed de/ /chen po'i gnas na 'khod gyur pa/ /b+hi gu'i rigs 'khrungs thub pa ni/ /srid 'byor yang dag 'ongs gyur te/ /mi dman mtshan mo'i bdag bo yis/ /'od kyi dbal 'byor gzuD
13a2(mdo 'grel): rgyan bzhin/ /'do? sgog rol ba'i bzhin ras can/ /mdzes ma mchog gcig bzung bar gyur/ /nam dag ni mi dben zhing/ /rkang ba'i chu skyes dmar ba dang/ /mig dag g.yo bas 'gro la de/ /shin tu ngo mtshar gyur pa bzhin/ /dka' thub dpal dang 'grogs
13a3(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin/ /mdzes ma rjes 'brang thub pa des/ /skye dgu'i mgon gyis mchod byas nas/ /sten ni yongs su gzung bar gyur/ /mdzes ma ngas kyang mi bdag ni/ /brtan ldan zab cing mjes? ba dag /gzhan gyi gdung la snying rje nas/ /gzhu bzhag 'dod ba'i dbang
13a4(mdo 'grel): phyug bzhin/ /gtsug gi rin chen 'od zer ni/ /mi rung 'jig pa byed pa yis/ /phyogs su bsrung ba'i yig phreng dag /gur gum gyis ni 'bri ba bzhin/ /rlung ni g.yangs shing 'phen byed pa'i/ /rnga yab dag gis rnam mdzes ba/ /'gro ba yang dag sgrol min bar//
13a5(mdo 'grel): snying stobs gyen du 'phyur bcas bzhin/ /rin chen yid 'ongs do shal dag/ snying kar gzung bar byas pa ni/ /sa 'og rgud pa zhi ba'i slad/ /lhag ma can gyis bsten pa bzhin/ /che ba'i dpung pas sa dang ni/ /sems kyis bzod pa thob pa dag/ mthong nas
13a6(mdo 'grel): mngon par 'dod pa dang/ /ya mtshan dpyad du rab tu gur/ /ri dags g.yo ba'i mig can ma/ /lus med kyi ni bsos gyur te/ /thub pas bang du bzung nas ni/ /'gro ba'i bdag la rab smras pa/ /'jig rten 'di nas 'gro ba'i mig/ 'dab brgya rnam par rgyas
13a7(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /lha ni khyod dang nyi ma dag/ 'char bas rab tu mdzes par gyur/ /'byor las snyed slar 'byung ba yi/ /kun rmongs grogs ldan rgyags ba dag /dge rnams yon tan la sdang bzhin/ /e ma ho khyod la med ba nyid/ /rgyal po byams ldan 'jig rten
13b1(mdo 'grel): mgon/ /'jig rten snying rje kun rdzogs thugs/ /khyod kyis grags pa sgron ma bzhin/ /mchog tu pha rol phyin par gyur/ /khyod ni mi skyo drang po dang/ /gtong phod zol med legs byas ldan/ /'di nyid phyir na khyad par du/ /blo ldan rnams kyis bsten bya
13b2(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /mdzes ma me tog mig can 'di/ /pad+ma'i khong nas yang dag byung/ /sbyin bsreg lhag ma'i 'o ma yis/ /bdag gis gnas su legs bar bsos// btsun mo chen mo sa gzhi yi/ /chun mar skyes mchog khyod kyis long/ /khyab 'jug la ni dpal
13b3(mdo 'grel): mo bzhin/ /'di ni khyod bdag nyid la 'os/ /dus kyis mchod sbyin bsod nams 'bras/ /rdzogs par bdag la sbyin par mdzod/ /'di brjod cho gas rgyal po la/ /mdzes ma byin nas thub pa gshegs/ /yid srubs dga' ma thob pa bzhin/ /rgyal pos
13b4(mdo 'grel): sdug ma pad+ma ldan/ /dge la bsod nams ldan pa bzhin/ /mdzes pas skyed mos tshal du brtses/ /de nas dus kyis de yi bu/ /'khri shing smyig ma'i mu tig bzhin/ /bdud rtsi padmo'i gtsug ces ba// yab kyi yon tan me long gyur// brgya byin 'jig rten skyong
13b5(mdo 'grel): sogs kyis/ /'gom par mi 'os che bar dang/ /rang nyid pad+mar skyes sogs kyis/ /kun nas bstong 'os spyod par ldan/ /grags pa'i dri bzang rab rgyas pas/ /phyogs kyi khongs ni yang dag rdzogs/ /slong ba'i tshogs kun dge ba ru/ /bgyid pa'i dpag bsam
13b6(mdo 'grel): rkang 'thung ni/ /sa bdag dag gis thub ba'i tshig/ dus su bya ba dran gyur nas/ /mi tshe nor ni yongs rdzogs shing/ /yon ni yangs pa'i mchod sprin byas/ /b+h+ri gu'i bu sogs thub pa dang/ /mi bdag rab tu bzod dka' sogs/ /'dod pa kun gyis ? bsdams ba'i//
13b7(mdo 'grel): mchod sbyin der ni yang dag 'ongs/ /grangs med nor gyi char 'bebs pa'i/ /sbyin bsreg mngon du gyur pa der/ /me yi dbus na lha yi dbang/ /srin bo'i gzugs su yang dag langs/ /ring cing rnam 'gyur lus can de/ /sa skyong la ni nyer btung de/ /bdag ni bkres so
14a1(mdo 'grel): skom mo zhes/ /bza' dang btung ba slong bar 'gyur/ /de nas sa yi bdag po'i bkas/ /rim gro ba yi 'khor rnams kyis/ /bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs ?/ /? bdag kyang nye bar bstabs/ /de bas srin pos sa bdag la/ /cung zad rgod bzhin rab
14a2(mdo 'grel): tu? smras/ /rgyal po 'di la bdag mi dga' / /gang phyir bdag ni sha yis 'tsho/ /'phral la bsad pa'i sha dang ni/ /shin tu mang ba'i brag? dag gis/ /bdag cag tshim pa rab tu skye/ /gang zhig 'dod pa gnod bar mdzod/ /'dod kun rab tu ser ro zhes/ khyod can bdag ni
14a3(mdo 'grel): yang dag 'ongs/ /sbyin no zhes ni rab bsgrags nas/ /dgag ba khyod kyi 'os ba min/ /de skad srin bo'i tshig thos nas/ /snying rjes gzer ba'i mi bdag no// 'tshe ba med par des pas na/ /slong ba phyir phyogs sdug bsngal gyur/ /bzod dga' i 'tshe ba mi bzod de/ /slong ba
14a4(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu med pa'ang min/ /kye ma chos la the tshom 'di/ /byed pos byas shes de yis bsams/ bsad pa med par lus yas ni/ /sha dag rnyed pa yod ma min/ /bdag gis grog sbung? dag gis yang/ /lus kyi nyon mongs phra mi bzod/ /bdag gis 'byung po thams
14a5(mdo 'grel): cad la/ /'jigs med bsod nams yon byin nas/ /srog chags bsad las byung ba'i sha/ 'di la bdag gis ji ltar sbyin/ /de ltar legs bsams mi bdag ni/ /snying rjes 'khrugs pas de la smras/ /rang lus yang dag bcad na sni// sha khrag khyod la sbyin
14a6(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /sa yi bdag pos de smras bas/ /'gro ba rnams ni 'khrugs par gyur/ /lus ni zad par spro ba yang/ /grogs mchog rnams kyi bzod ma gyur/ /sa skyong de bzhin thub rnams kyis/ /brtse bas rab tu bzlog gyur kyang/ /rang gi lus la bcad nas ni/ /sha
14a7(mdo 'grel): khrag zhag rnams de la byin/ /mgrin pa'i bar du khrag 'thungs pa'i/ /srin pos sa yi bdag po yi/ /sha rnams rab tu za ba'i tshe/ /skad cig sa ni rab tu 'dar/ /de nas lha mo pad+ma ldan/ /bdag po de ltar gyur? mthong nas/ /smre sngags 'don cing rab tu 'gyel//
14b1(mdo 'grel): rmongs shing brgyal bas dkris par gyur/ /mi yi dbang bo'i snying stobs ni/ /rab rgyas de mthong lha dbang gis/ /srin po'i gzugs ni yongs btang nas/ /thal mo sbyar nas de la smras/ /e ma ho rgyal po khyod kyis ni/ bya ba dga' ba'i las 'di yis/ /ba? spu
14b2(mdo 'grel): langs ba'i gtams ba'i gos/ /lus la ci phyir 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po rdul bral khyod kyi ni/ /e ma bsod nams thun mong min/ /e ma snying stobs bla na med/ /e ma bstan pa mdza' dang brel/ /pha rol sdug las sdug bsngal zhing/ /rnyed dka' la yang
14b3(mdo 'grel): chags dang bral/ /mi mthun phyogs la bzod ldan pa/ /dam ba rnams ni legs byas lam/ /gang gis 'jig rten gsum po la/ /rjes su brtser gyur bdag nyid che/ /snying rjes brlan ba'i snying stobs kyi/ /spro ba 'di ni yang dag gsal/ /'di
14b4(mdo 'grel): brjod lha yi sman rnams kyis/ /de lus rnal du gnas par byas/ /rab tu dang zhing ngo ches? dman/ /brgya byin rang gi gnas su sod/ /de nas mchad sbyin cho ga bzhin/ /rdzogs te skabs gsum pas mchod pa'i/ /sa yi bdag
14b5(mdo 'grel): pos rgyal po dang/ /thub mchog rnams kyang mchod pa byas/ /mchod sbyin 'jug tu mdzes ma dang/ /grong dang grong khyer rin chen char/ /skabs gsum por 'os rta dag ni/ /gser gyi phreng ldan bcas nges byin/ /dpag tshad brgyar
14b6(mdo 'grel): ni mgyogs pa ru/ /nyi ma gcig gis 'gro ba gang/ /rgyal po'i glang chen 'dun na 'don/ /tshangs pa'i shing rta zhes bya la/ /rgyal po'i glang chen bzang po'i ri/ /de la yang dag gtang mthong nas/ /rgyal po shin tu bzod dka' der/ /chags pas
14b7(mdo 'grel): drangs pa'i yid du gyur/ /de nas sa bdag mchod sbyin gyi/ /dpal gyis ya mtshan gshegs gyur cing/ /sa la sbyor? pas mchod sbyin 'bras/ /b+h+ri bu'i bu la gtang pa'i tshe/ /mi ri? rtsi slob thub pa ni/ /mchod dang stan thob bA hi ka /yang
15a1(mdo 'grel): dag 'ongs nas shis pa'i tshig /sngon du btang nas de la smras/ /rgyal po slob gnyer dag gi mthar/ /bdag gi bla ma bla ma'i yon/ /g.yog 'khor don du skye bo ni/ /thun mong ba la rnyed dka' zhes/ /sgrub byed khyod nyid
15a2(mdo 'grel): gcig po yis/ /rnyed dka' rab tu sbyin pa sprul/ /dpag bsam rkang 'thung 'jig rten na/ /nam yang mang po skye mi 'gyur/ /bdag gi bla ma dka' thub kyis/ /nyam chung rgas pa'i g.yog 'khor du/ /pad+ma ldan pa'i lha mo ni/ /bu dang bcas
15a3(mdo 'grel): ba gnang bar mdzod/ /thub pas de brjod rgyal bo ni/ /brtan pa sa 'dzin btsun mo dang/ /'bral las skyes pa'i mya ngan las/ /yid ni brtan pas de la smras/ /dga' ma srog las mngon par lhag/ rgyal tshab dag dang bcas pa ni/ /mngon par
15a4(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa bla ma'i yon/ /thub pa khyod la rab tu sbyin/ /de skad brjod nas mi bdag gis/ /pang ldan sras bcos de la sbyin/ /sems dpa' tshul ldan bdag nyid rnams/ /rang srog la yang chags med gtong/ /bral ba'i nyon mongs kyis skrag ba'i//
15a5(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i btsun mo sras dang bcas/ /blangs te gnas su song nas ni/ /thub pas bla ma la rab phul/ /skabs dar dregs bcas gu ru'i rgyal/ /shin tu bzod dkas sa dbang la/ /glang chen bzang po'i ri bo ni/ /'byor phyir pho nyas nye bar bslangs
15a6(mdo 'grel): mdun na 'don la byin zin pa'i/ /so gnyis rgyal pos ma byin gang/ /de tshe rang nyid mang po'i sdes/ /g.yul ni rab tu 'gyed du 'ongs/ /ku ru'i rgyal po'i dpung rnams kyis/ /grong khyer lam rnams bgags pa la/ /sa gzhi skyong ba'i dmag
15a7(mdo 'grel): gi tshogs/ /g.yul du 'jug pa rab spror gyur/ /dpa' bo glang chen seng ge de/ /dgra ni rnam 'joms nus gyur kyang/ /skye bo mdzad bas 'jigs shing 'khrugs/ /snying rje las ni yang dag bsams/ /rgyal po shin tu bzod dka' ni/ /bdag gi
15b1(mdo 'grel): rjes mthun grogs kyi mchog /glang po dag la chags rmongs pas/ /kye ma 'phral la dgra nyid gyur/ /dam pa'i mdza' ba mdza' ba'i mdza' / /bar ma rnams kyi mdza' med mdza' / /ngan pa rnams kyi srog 'phrog pas/ /shin tu 'jigs rung dgra mdza' yin//
15b2(mdo 'grel): kye ma 'byor pa la chags pas/ /bdag gi yang dag sbyor pa 'di/ /srog ni skad cig 'jig ldan zhing/ /gzhan gyi srog ni gcod pa la'o/ /'tshe bas ngal la rab chags shing/ /g.yul gyi khrag gis mngon bkrus pa'i/ /sems can yang dag sbyor ba 'di/ /zas
15b3(mdo 'grel): don rtsod ba'i las la'o/ /g.yog 'khor gtum drag phra ma can/ /srog ni 'tshong zhing kha zas dag/ don gnyer rnams gyi rtsod pa ni/ /khyi rnams kyi bzhin bzod par dka' / /kye ma rdzas la chags pa'i blo/ /pha rol gdung bas bsil gyur ba? /rang nyid
15b4(mdo 'grel): bde ba kho na'i phyir/ /ma rungs spyod la rab tu rgyug /gang zhig g.yul grub go bgos shing/ /khrag gis sbags pa'i dpal za ba/ /de snying rab tu drag po la/ /snying rje'i che ni ga la zhig/ rgyal po shin tu bzod dka' 'di/ /rnam par 'byor la chags
15b5(mdo 'grel): shing rmongs/ /bdag gi snying rje'i yul gyur bas/ /gnod byed gyur kyang bsad mi 'os/ /de ltar bsams shing snying rje las/ /nags ni tshol byed de yi slad/ /rang sangs rgyas ni rnam pa bzhi/ /rang nyid mkha' las yang dag 'ongs/ /kun mkhyen
15b6(mdo 'grel): mchod dang stan thob cing/ /dang bas rab zhi dang tshul can/ /rgyal bo'i yang dag bzhed pa de/ /thos nas de nyid rab tu gsungs/ /'khor ba kun rmongs rab rib kyis/ /'ong bar brtse ba dang ldan pas/ /sems dpa' snang ba'i rnam rig can/ /sa skyong
15b7(mdo 'grel): khyod ni mdzes par gyur/ /rgyal po dgyes par mdzod cig dang/ /byang chub tu ni blo gros tshugs/ /da ltar rab tu 'gog ba'i tshe/ /nags nyid du ni 'gro bar byos/ /chu rgyun rab gsal lhung lhung s+thogs?/ /yang dag sim byed thigs ba can/ /dben
16a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i nags kyis phyogs de/ /zhi ba rnams kyi dga' skyes nyid/ /rjes su bzung blos 'di gsungs nas/ /de la mkha' gshegs bsgrubs byas te/ /'od kyis phyogs rnams rab gsal zhing/ /de dang lhan cig de rnams gshegs/
16a2(mdo 'grel): de rnams rang rang gnas gshegs te/ /sa skyong gangs can ngos kyi nags/ /yang dag thob pas rab dang zhing/ /rab tu zhi ba dag tu gyur/ /snying stobs ldan rnams nang na ni/ /de blo dben zhing dri ma med/ /dga' ba'i tshar ni rdzogs pa'i sa/ /nags kyi
16a3(mdo 'grel): sa gzhi bzhin du gyur/ /sa bdag 'od ldan 'phral la ni/ /sa 'dzin bdag gis bsgribs pa der/ /gti mug rab rib thob pa yi/ /mya ngan 'gro tshogs skye dgu nyal/ /de nas thub pa ma ri rtse'i/ /gnas su de yi blon po yang/ /rgyal srid bsrung bar
16a4(mdo 'grel): nus gyur pa'i/ /rgyal po'i sras ni rab tu bslangs/ /thub pas rnam 'gyur med pa byin/ /blon po yis ni blangs byas te/ /rgyal sras rang gis grong khyer du/ /dmag tshogs yang dag ldan par byas/ /de nas dmag sde'i spro ba bzhin/ /shin tu dpa' 
16a5(mdo 'grel): bo? sngon 'gro ba/ /rgyal po mchog gi sras po yis/ /'khrug sar ku ru'i rgyal po sleb/ /de yi shing rta glang po che/ /bcom zhing rnam bshigs bcag pa de/ /'bros pas yongs su skyob byed cing/ /ha sti na yi grong du song/ /stobs? ldan rgyal
16a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i sras po des/ /shin tu bzod dka' i g.yul bcom la/ /blon pos de dpung sa bkod pas/ /lhag ma can bzhin dga' bar 'gyur/ /de nas dus kyis sdig bdag nyid/ /rgyal po shin tu bzod dka' yi/ /grong du cher med mu ge dang/ /yams
16a7(mdo 'grel): kyi nye bar 'tshe ba byung/ /mi bzad grong brdal rgud pa dag/ bsams pas rjes su gdung bas gzir/ /dge ba'i bya ba 'bras med nges/ /yongs su skyobs par rig ma gyur/ /rgud pa sel byed de yis dris/ /blon po rnams kyis de la smras/ /rgyal po
16b1(mdo 'grel): chen po bzod dka' 'di/ /skye bo gdung ba yang dag bskyed/ /sa bdag gtsug na rin chen gyi/ /jo bo gal te gtsug gi nor/ /bdud rtsi'i rlan ldan rnyed na ni/ /de yis rgyud pa 'di las thang/ /gangs can ngos na rgyal po de/ /dben zhing dri bral pas ma pa yis//
16b2(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba las ni phyir phyogs gnas/ /bdag gi bya ma rta las thos/ /kun gyi yid bzhin nor bu ni/ /bslangs na nor bu ste ba nyid/ /bu dang chung ma lus la sogs/ /de yis sbyin min ci yang mang/ /de skad blon po'i tshig thos nas/ /sems la de bzhin
16b3(mdo 'grel): bstan byas te/ /de yis slong phyir bram ze rnams/ /de yi drung du brdzangs par gyur/ /skabs 'dir rgyal po gtsug na ni/ /nor bu nags su rgyu ba yis/ /thub pa ma ri rtse gnas kyi/ /nye 'khor yangs par phyin par gyur/ /der ni lha mo pad+ma ldan/ /rtsa ba 'bras
16b4(mdo 'grel): za'i brtul zhugs bzung/ /mi med nags su thub pa yi/ /bstan pa las ni 'jigs shing song/ /sngon la 'gro ba'i sha ba ris/ /sdug bsngal gnas skabs bsten pa mthong/ /'dzin par 'dod pas 'dar gyur cing/ /snying rje rje skad cho nges btab/ /
16b5(mdo 'grel): kyi hung rgyal po gtsug na nor/ /zhes dang skyabs shas mi bzang par/ /bya ni ku ra rai sgrogs bzhin/ /snying rjer cho de gag pa thos/ /mi bdag rgyugs pa'i phral la ni/ /rang gi mdzes ma mthong gyur te/ /zla ba sgra gcan gyis skrag pa/ /'od ni rnam bar
16b6(mdo 'grel): nyams pa bzhin/ /chags bral lus kyi gos 'dzin cing/ /mig sman yongs su 'dzin dang bral/ /rdzogs pa'i longs spyod kun sbyor rnams/ /mi rtag nyid du smra ba bzhin/ /rgyal po dang ba bde bar gshegs/ /nu ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gnas/ /
16b7(mdo 'grel): 'dren byed 'chi ma'i dur smrig can/ /snying rje'i sa de rnam gzigs nas/ /'khor ba'i spyod pa ngo mtshar can/ /rnam par spyod la su gyur kyang/ /sa bdag yid ni brtse ba yi/ /chu gris nges par bcad pa bzhin/ /lha mo mgon med lta bu yis/ /nags su
17a1(mdo 'grel): mgon po gcig pu nyid/ /'jig rten mgon po de ltar song/ /gdugs dang rnga yab bral mthong nas/ /de bral dug gis non pa dang/ /de mthong nyams dga' rgyas pa dag/ mya ngan dga' ba yang dag rdzogs/ /myur du rnam par 'khrugs par gyur//
17a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal pos ni bgyis sha bar/ /dmod pas 'jigs nas rab tu bros/ /nyi ma mngon par 'char ba yis/ /mthu ldan mun pa dman gyur mthong/ /bar 'dir zhi la sdang ba'i bdud/ /'byung po kun gyi bsam par gnas/ /skyes bu'i gzugs kyis yang dag 'ongs//
17a3(mdo 'grel): mi bdag la ni smras par gyur/ /rgyal po chu skyes spyan ldan dag/ mi med nags su dga' ma ni/ /phreng ldan mig yangs mnyes gshin ma/ /'di ni btang bar mi 'os so/ /rgyal srid longs spyod kyis spangs nas/ /nges par bde med gyur pa 'di/ /khyod kyi
17a4(mdo 'grel): yid kyi spyod tshul bzhin/ /rgyal po'i rgyal po mi mdzes so/ /de dag thos shing dben pa yis/ /bar du gcod byed yid 'byung du/ /rnam par shes ta mi bdag gis/ /'dzum bcas de la lan smras pa/ /dul la zhi ba mi 'dod pa'i/ /'dod pa khyod ni bdag
17a5(mdo 'grel): gis shes/ /rab tu sim par 'dod pa rnams/ /su zhig khyod kyis rnam mi rmongs/ /sa skyong de skad brjod pa yis/ /'phral la 'dod pa mi snang gyur/ /'bral ba'i me yis gdungs pa yi/ /lha mo shin tu rnam par 'khrugs/ /yid 'byung las rgyal rgyal
17a6(mdo 'grel): po yis/ /btsun mo bdag po longs spyod bral/ /sdug bsngal mi 'os sdug bsngal ldan/ /de la dbugs ni 'byin ring smras/ /lha mo chos ni bya bar rigs/ /mya ngan bya bar mi 'os so/ /bde bas rnam par 'khrul pa yi/ /ro bral mjug ni sdug bsngal yin//
17a7(mdo 'grel): lus can tshe ni rgyug chu 'dra/ /g.yo ba rnams kyi snying sdug grogs/ /pad+ma g.yo ba'i 'dab rtse na/ /'greng ba'i chu thigs lta bu yin/ /dpal 'di yud cam gang mkhan dang/ /dus kyi sprin glog 'khyug pa dang/ /'khor ba'i sbrul gyis ro 'dzin ni/ /rnam par
17b1(mdo 'grel): rtse zhing rab tu g.yo/ /longs spyod skad cig kho nas 'bral ba'i nang/ /'byor pa rmi lam pag ma len dang mtshungs/ /bde ba'i dpal ni rlung bsnun mar me'i rtse/ /srid pa'i spyod tshul 'di dag smyon pa'i gang/ /snying rje kun gyis bsten bya dpal 'byor min//
17b2(mdo 'grel): dam chos rtag tu gsal bya mar me min/ /grags snyan rnams kyis dga' ldan na chung min/ /bsod nams dag ni brtan ldan 'tsho ba min/ /bden pa'i brtul zhugs kyis ni de la de skad gdams/ /drang srong chen po'i 'dul ba btsun mo rnams btang maS
17b3(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba las ni phyir phyogs rnams kyi dka' thub nags/ /yang dag sim byed bsod nams ldan par rgyu zhing song/ /rgyal po shin tu bzod dkas myur bar gnyis skyes lnga/ /rnam par btang zhing de bzhin song ba des/ /rnam dag snying stabs slong ba
17b4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi ni/ /dus med gnyen gcig po de nags mthar mthong/ /'jigs nas brtan pa rnam par btang ba bzhin/ /de dag gis ni sgra bskyungs shis brjod bsgrubs/ /shugs rings ring zhing dro bo'i rlung dag gis/ /mi bzang gdung ba gsal
17b5(mdo 'grel): byas de la smras/ /rgyal po shin tu bzod dka' i grong khyer du/ /rgyal po drag po nyer 'tshes dge tshogs bcom/ /skye po'i 'dod pa mdza' dag chad par byas/ /rab 'dod gzer? ba'i sgra tsam lhag mar gyur/ /skyon rnams ma lus zhi ba'i rgyu gcig pu//
17b6(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gsum bsrung grags pa'i mthu ldan pa/ /gtsug gi nor bu lha khyod snang ba na/ /de yi nye bar 'tshe rnams zhi bar bgyid/ /brtse bas brten pa tsan dan yal 'dab brlan pa dang/ /dri med bsam pa zla ba'i nor bu rab gsal ba/ /khyod nyid lta bu
17b7(mdo 'grel): yangs su gdung ba'i dus su ni/ /srid pa'i skye bo rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ba yin/ /de dag gis ni de skad bslangs la snying stobs dag/ rnam par ma bri snying rje'i ro yis yang dag khengs/ /thos pa'i lam nas skye bo'i nye bar gdung ba dag/ khong du yang dag
18a1(mdo 'grel): zhugs bzhin legs par bsams nas smras/ /kye ma ma la nye bar 'dzoms pa'i las kyis ni/ /nges par gzir ba'i skye dgu bral ba'i sdug bsngal las/ /rab skyes cho de'i sgra ni nang gi byed pa dag/ nges par 'joms pa rgyal po ngas ni ji ltar
18a2(mdo 'grel): bzod/ /bdag gi mgo yi rtsa ba las skyes nor bu 'di/ /myur du nges par chod la rab tu gzur bar gyis/ /gal te skye bo slong ba'i sdug bsngal mdzad pa yi/ /rgyu nyid du ni skad cig bdag 'gro bdag legs so/ /nor 'dzin bdag pos de skad smras tsam la/ /sa
18a3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin chu gter dang bcas 'dzin ma ni/ /de yi spyi bo 'gems pa'i sdug bsngal dag /drag pos 'jigs pa bzhin du ring zhig 'dar/ /de 'og mi bdag thugs spyod brtse ba yis/ /mnyen pa'i gsung gis rab rno mtshon pas kyang/ /rno ba'i sems ldan de
18a4(mdo 'grel): rnams mtshon rnon gyis/ /rang nyid spyi bo 'gems la rab tu zhugs/ /rigs 'dzin bsgrub bya grub bcas lha rnams ni/ /pad+ma'i stan sogs mkha' yi gzhal yas nas/ /mi dbang de yi dka' spyad mdzad pa la/ /snying stobs ma zhum blta phyir yang
18a5(mdo 'grel): dag 'ongs/ /'phral la spyi bo rnam par bkas pa yis/ /rin chen 'od du rnam par 'khrul 'dzin pa'i/ /khrag gi rgyun gyis mngon gtor lus can de/ /slong ba'i bde la rab zhugs gdung pa bzed/ /sdug bsngal drag po'i shugs kyis mig zum zhing//
18a6(mdo 'grel): brtan pa snying stobs kyis bcings de mthong ste/ /skad cig srin po nyid ni thob pa bzhin/ /gtum sbyong bram ze dga' dang bral ma gyur/ /rgyal pos rang lus sdug bsngal rnam dpyad pas/ /'khor ba pa rnams nyon mongs rang bzhin lus/ /rnam pa 'di
18a7(mdo 'grel): lta'i sdug bsngal stong 'bum gyis/ /zil gyis mnan zhes rab tu gdung bar gyur/ /nges bsams lus bcings rin chen sbyin pa las/ /bsod nams 'bras bu dag gis gang thob des/ /bsod nams min smin dmyal bar mi rnams kyis/ /drag po'i
18b1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal cha yang med par gyur/ /khrag dang zhag gos? nges bran nor bu de/ /g.yo med chogs? ma'i rtsa ba las bton pa'i/ /brgyal bas 'khrugs kyang slong ba'i re ba dag/ yongs su rdzogs pas de ni rab dgar gyur/ /gnyis skyes rnams la rang gis lag
18b2(mdo 'grel): skor? gyis/ /yal 'dab 'dir bzhin nor bu byin nas de/ /yang dag mun pas 'jig rten 'dzum byed cing/ /tsha zer can bzhin shin tu dmar bar lhung/ /lha rnams me tog chang dang lhan cig tu/ /snying stobs bri ba med pa sa der lhung/ /gnyis skyes de rnams
18b3(mdo 'grel): nor bu yang dag blangs/ /rgyal po shin tu bzod dka' i grong khyer song/ /de yis 'phral la nye par 'tshe rnams zhi/ /mtho ris 'os pa'i longs spyod tshogs rnams thog /sems can mdza' dag yang dag sgrol 'os pa/ /byang chub sems de'i snying stobs de yis
18b4(mdo 'grel): bsdags/ /skabs 'dir mi dbang 'du shes cung zad thob/ /b+h+ri gu'i bu dang gau tam la sogs/ /ma ri rtse sogs thub pa nags tshal las/ /rin chen sbyin pa thos nas yang dag 'ongs/ /lha mo sang? ldan ma ri rtse nyid kyis/ /rjes bzhin song bas yongs brlagS
18b5(mdo 'grel): de mthong nas/ /kun rmongs shugs kyis mngon bcom sa la ni/ /'khri shing gzhon nu bcad bzhin skad cig 'gyel/ /de nas mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams kyis/ /mi bdag legs brjod phyogs mthar rgyu ba'i tshe/ /rgyal po'i sras de blon dang lhan cig tu/ /skye
18b6(mdo 'grel): dgu skye dgu'i mgon can nye bar song/ /khrag gis lus bsgos snying stobs ma zad cing/ /sa yi dbang po sa la 'gyel mthong nas/ /nyon mongs gdung ba che ldan skye bo rnams/ /yang dag ming don rnam rtog brjod par 'gyur/ /rang don la chags mngon
18b7(mdo 'grel): sbyor bdag nyid ngan/ /shing bcod 'ga' yis snying rjes brlan ldan zhing/ /slong kun gyis bsten drang zhing legs spyod pa'i/ /kye ma nyams ngar grib bsil shing 'di bcod?/ /kye ma pha rol don du srog gtong 'di/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar gnas skabs dag tu
19a1(mdo 'grel): song/ /shin tu dri bzang rang gi lus gcod pa/ /yid 'ong shing ni sa ha kar nyid/ /brkam chags srog chags rang gi yin yang rang/ /ma yin 'dod 'dod pa nor por min/ /sems can kun la phan brtson bdag nyid can/ /brtse ldan de yi lus
19a2(mdo 'grel): kyang chags gnas min/ /gang don slong skye 'di ni slong ba'i dngos/ /kun don gnyer la zhugs par rab 'gro ba/ /zhum pa 'don pa'i brtul zhugs can gyi srog /de nyid yongs su skyob zong rtswa lta yin/ /de skad rab brjod rnam mang mthu yis ni/ /thub pa'i dkyil
19a3(mdo 'grel): 'khor rnam par 'phel ba'i tshe/ /ma ri rtse thub mchi mar bcas pa'i spyan/ /chags bas sa skyong la ni mngon phyogs smras/ /kye ma ma la? rgyal po skye dgu rnams/ /yongs skyobs gter gyis gzhis 'gro ba ye/ /rgyu med gnyen gyi dngos por bsten byas nas//
19a4(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis brtse bas lus 'di rtswa? bzhin byin/ /slong? ba'i gnyen khyod rang nyid srog la yang/ /ltos pa'i spyod tshul zad par nges rab zhugs/ /gang zhig dpal 'byor gnas kyi lus 'di ni/ /khyod kyis gnod pa'i gnas su yang dag sbyar/ /rgyal po legs byas
19a5(mdo 'grel): brtul zhugs bsod nams kyi/ /zong? 'di las kyang 'bras 'ga' bzhed lags grangs/ /slong pa'i rgyas kyang khyod kyi 'tshogs ma phye/ /skyo las thugs kyi rnam 'gyur ma bsten nas/ /thub dbang dbus su thub pas de skad du/ /rmad 'byung? mtshar ba'i yid kyis
19a6(mdo 'grel): dris pa des/ /'bad pas dol dub bzod byas khrag gis ni/ /mngon par sbags pa'i bzhin rab phyis nas smras/ /thub pa bdag la 'bras 'dod gzhan ma mchis/ /'on kyang mngon 'dod cig nyid rab tu mang/ /gang zhig srog chags 'jigs rung 'khor
19a7(mdo 'grel): bar byid/ /sgrol byed nyid du srid bar bdag gyur cig/ slong ba dga' bar lus ni rnam bcom 'dir/ /rnam 'gyur cha shas gang yang med pa nyid/ /gal te ngas brjod dam tshig 'di bden na/ /de yi lus 'di rnal du gnas gyur cig/ rgyal po bden nor ldan
19b1(mdo 'grel): 'di brjod tsam la/ /snying stobs la 'os lhan skyes mthu ldan pa/ /bden pa'i stobs kyis de lus rma sos shing/ /de tshe skyes pa'i rin chen ldan par gyur/ /de nas brgya byin tshangs sogs lha rnams dang/ /rab dga' skyes pa'i thub pa thams cad kyis//
19b2(mdo 'grel): sa skyong slad du mngon par gsol btab kyang/ /sa bdag longs spyod? mngon par bzhed ma gyur/ /dran rnyed pad+ma dang ldan thub pa yis /rab bskul rgyal po'i sras dang 'grogs nas ni/ /skye dgu seng ge'i khrir bzhugs bde ba la/ /'bral ba zhi slad bdag
19b3(mdo 'grel): la gsol ba btab/ /de nas rang rgyal de rnams mngon phyogs te/ /'gro la phan phyir brtse bas 'khrugs gyur cing/ /lus kyi 'od kyis phyogs cha khengs pa ni/ /dgyes pa gsal bar mdzad bzhin de la smras/ /bral ba'i mjug ni ring zhig lon nas thob
19b4(mdo 'grel): yang ni yongs gtong gnas skabs bzod dka' ba/ /gang phyir lan gcig min ltung sdug bsngal bcings/ /bzod pa rgyal po'i bus min lha mos min/ /rgud ldan sdug bsngal rab zhi'i rgyu gcig pu/ /rang lus slong la gang gis rab sbyin zhing/ /gang
19b5(mdo 'grel): gis chos 'di gang gzhan don nyid na res/ /rang gis mi la'ang btang snyoms ji ltar bya/ /de dag gis ni 'di brjod mi yi dbang/ /blo yis de bzhin zhes nges ji ltar yang/ /mkha' i lam nas rang gi grong khyer phyin/ /sras bcas rang gi rgyal srid gnas
19b6(mdo 'grel): rnams bsten/ /de ltar de ni snying stobs yangs shing bde ldan byang chub sems dpa' ste/ /shin tu yun ring rgyal srid bzung zhing bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas bsten nas/ /rgyal po'i grong khyer rin chen mchod rten gdugs dang rin chen spron pa ni/ /rab tu gsal?
19b7(mdo 'grel): ba rnam pad? dpal gyis mtshan pa'i byang chub goms? par gyur/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /dge slong rnams la sbyin pa'i gdams ngag tu/ /rang gi spyod tshul mdza' ni dper mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni de skad gsungs//
20a1(mdo 'grel): zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa'i brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gtsug na nor bu'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal ma dab ste gsum pha'o// //gang zhig mtho ris mdzes ma'i lag pas
20a2(mdo 'grel): mchog tu rab bskyod mdzes pa'i rnga? yab dge dang ni?/ /gdugs dkar 'dzum pa'i phun tshogs dag gis 'jig rten na ni legs ldan thugs ni rnam mdzes dang/ /gang yang grags snyan ga pur rgyun gyi dri med thos pa sim byed rab tu 'phro ba dag /sbyin pa'i cha shas
20a3(mdo 'grel): de 'bras shin tu chung du 'ong se ma sbyin pa dpal gyi dang po'i rgyu/ /'o ma'i tshogs las bdud rtsi bzhin/ /mkhas rnams mngon 'dod grags pa yis/ /gang zhig rnam gsal sa 'dzin ni/ /gso sbyong 'phags shes bya ba byung/ /nor 'dzin bsrung ba
20a4(mdo 'grel): nor dang ni /gzi brjid ldan pa gang mdun du/ /mi yi bdag po'i spyi bo dag /nges par phyag la sus ma btud/ /chos kyis dag pa'i blo gros bzhin/ /sbyin pas brtse ba ldan nyid bzhin/ /dul bas rnam par 'byor pa bzhin/ /gang gis sa ni brgyan par gyur//
20a5(mdo 'grel): yon tan kun ldan rigs su mtho/ /kun gyi gdung skyob zla ba'i 'od/ /gang gi gnas pa'i spyi bor gyur/ /sa yi bdag po kun gyi'o/ /gang gis grags pa 'jig rten rgyan/ /dkar zhing dbang phyug spyi bor gnas/ /dri med gang+gA'i chu bo ni/ /rab mang
20a6(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten rnams su rgyu/ /mchod sbyin stong gi byed pa po/ /mig stong pa las lhag pa'i dpal/ /gang gi btsun mo lha mdzes ni/ /stong phrag drug cu byung bar gyur/ /nam zhig drang srong bsrung ba'i phyir/ /srin bu gzhon par dam bcas nas/ /dka' thub
20a7(mdo 'grel): nags kyis sa la de/ /rta la zhon nas rnam par rgyus/ /rgyal bo'i drang srong 'ga' yis der/ /bu yi mchod sbyin bum pa bzhag/ lam ring gyis ngal dub pa das/ /chu yis gang ba 'thungs bar gyur/ /skye bo med par rnyed pa'i chu/ /snga nas kyi bum pa las
20b1(mdo 'grel): 'thungs nas/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'ongs pa na/ /sa yi bdag pos mngal thob gyur/ /rmi lam sgyu ma mi 'phrul sogs/ /gang gis ltad mo'i zer ma ni/ /rmad byung yang dag tshogs pa'i sa/ /brnag par bya de rgyal gyur cig/ mtshar pa'i las kyis rnam bskrun
20b2(mdo 'grel): pa/ /sgrub byed sna tshogs rnam par bkra/ ngo mtshar ri mo bkod pa la/ /gcod par byed pa'i dbang phyugs su/ /dus kyis de yi sgyi mo ni/ /rdol nas byis pa nyi ma bzhin/ /mdzes sdug 'od ldan skyes gyur te/ /'phral la rma ni rab tu sos/ /bsod nams
20b3(mdo 'grel): gzugs la brten ba bzhin/ /'gro ba'i yang dag rgyal bo'i mtshan/ /ldan pa de ni mnyes gshin las/ /? zigs? rgyal po'i btsun mos blangs/ /byis pa bsdags 'os 'di yi ni/ /ma yi gnas su bdag gyur ces/ /de rnams phan tshun tshig
20b4(mdo 'grel): gis ni/ /rgyal sras da la nu zhes gyur/ /dbang po drug ni rab 'das dus/ /bsod nams kyis btson mi zad tshe/ /de ni rab tu bskyed ldan zhing/ /byis pa'i rtse dags rnam par rol/ /lang tshogs par ba zhugs te/ /rig gnas kun gyi pha rol phyin/ /yang
20b5(mdo 'grel): ni mtho ris gshegs la des/ /rim pas 'ongs pa'i rgyal srid bzung/ /legs byas kyi ni 'bangs gyur pa'i/ /gnod sbyin mkha' yi khyim zhes bas/ /de yi dbang bskur yo byad rnams/ /mchog ni nye bar bsgrubs par gyur/ /gser
20b6(mdo 'grel): gyis bcings pa'i cod ban dang/ /gtsug tor zur phud byas pa des/ /ston ka'i sbrin gyi rna cha can/ /lhan po'i mdzes pa thob dang ldan/ /de nas de yi rin chen bdun/ /de tshe byung gyur 'khor lo rta/ /nor bu glang po bud med dang/ /khyim bdag dmag
20b7(mdo 'grel): dpon sngon 'gro ba'o/ /sa bdag 'di yi bu rnams ni/ /gzugs dang stobs dang gzi brjid mtshungs/ /dbung pa bzhin du dgra 'joms pa/ /stong phrag dag ni byung bar gyur/ /lhag ma ngal bas bder gnas pa/ /mdza' dag chu gter rlabs kyi 
21a1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /ske rags ldan pa'i nor 'dzin ma/ /ma lus dpung pas bzung bar gyur/ /sa ni bsrung bar chas gyur cing/ /rab tu gsal ba'i dpal la gnas /'khor los sgyur de legs byas kyis/ /khyab 'jug lag pa bzhin du mdzes/ /grags pa 'gro
21a2(mdo 'grel): gsum gang gA dang/ /mthu yis rnam par brgyan pa'i dpal/ /'di de bsod nams 'khri shing gi/ me tog rab 'thon dang po yin/ /de ni nam zhig dags? kyi mthar/ /blon po dag dang lhan cig tu/ /me tog rnam par rgyas pa'i dpal/ /mdzes pa lta zhing rgyu
21a3(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /der ni 'dab ma med pa'i bya/ /rkang bas 'gro rnams mthong gyur te/ /mkha' i lam bgrong dran pa yi/ /shin tu ring par gyur pa bzhin/ /'dab mas dman zhing bgrod byed min/ /'tsho ba zad cing lus g.yogs med/ /de rnams dbul po bzhin
21a4(mdo 'grel): mthong nas/ /mi bdag brtse bas rab smras pa/ /kye ma sdu sha pa'i bya 'di rnams/ /ngan pa'i bya ba ci zhig byas/ /gang las 'di dag sgro dang bral/ /dka' las rkang pas rgyu bar gyur/ /snying rjes 'khrugs pa'i bdag nyid can/ /sa bdag gis de brjod pa
21a5(mdo 'grel): la/ /blon po chen po bden pa'i sde/ /mdun du 'dug ste de la smras/ /lha cig 'dab chags rnams kyi 'dab/ /gang las byi bar gyur pa'i rgyu/ /nags na spyod rnams gleng gyur pa/ /de dag bdag gis rab tu thos/ /dka' thub kha ton nus ldan pa/ /thub
21a6(mdo 'grel): pa gzi brjid 'bar ba ni/ /lnga brgya bsod nams gnas gyur pa'i/ /dka' thub nags tshal 'di na yod/ /de dag gi klog bsam gtan dang/ /bzlas pa'i bgegs ni sgrub byed pa/ /shing gi nags la bya 'di rnams/ /rtag tu ca co sgrogs par gyur//
21a7(mdo 'grel): rna bar mchog tu gnod pa dag/ shin tu yang dag rgyas byed pa/ /bya yi 'dus pa de dag la/ /thub pa'i dkyil 'khor khros par gyur/ /des bskrun? chen po'i dmod pa ni/ /srog byed gdung ba thams cad du/ /gnod pa byas pa'i bya rnams kyi/ /'dab gshob
21b1(mdo 'grel): skad cig gis zags gyur/ /bya ni 'di rnams 'di dag ste/ /sdug bsngal gyis 'tsho 'dab gshog bral/ /khyod kyi mi mthun phyogs bzhin du/ /ngal zhing nags su rkang pas rgyu/ /blon po chen pos brjod de dag/ thos nas sa yi bdag po ni/ /bya rnams dmod pas ?
21b2(mdo 'grel): gdungs pa la/ /snying rjes rab tu non pas smras/ /kye ma thub pa gsol ba rnams/ /zhi bar gyur kyang nags su ni/ /yongs su gyur pa'i me dag gis/ /mi zlog sreg par byed pa nyid/ /rang nyid bde phyir gang gis yid/ /khro bas gdung la bzod pa yi/ /chu yi
21b3(mdo 'grel): yongs su bran ma byas/ /log pa'i dka' thub can des ci/ /rab dang blo dang byams pa'i yid/ /brtse ba'i sbyin pa dul zhing bzod/ /gang de dka' thub bsdags par 'os/ /lhag ma lus 'di skems pa 'di/ /'jig tshogs 'dzin pa'i dka' thub ci/ /rnam
21b4(mdo 'grel): par bslad la nags kyis ci/ /chags dang bcas la 'byor bas ci/ /spyod tshul ngan la thos pas ci/ /de ltar sdig pa'i sems ldan zhing/ /khro bo drag pos bskyod pa yi/ /bzod dka' thub pa de dag nyid/ /bdag gi yul nas 'gro gyur cig/ 'di brjod de la
21b5(mdo 'grel): mi bdag gis/ /ji srid bdag ni dbang ba'i sa/ /de srid gtad bar byos shig ces/ /skyes bus phrin ni bsrings bar gyur/ /bya yi 'dab gshog byi ba yis/ /khros pa sa yi bdag po de'i/ /phrin thos skyengs par gyur pa yi/ /thub pa rnams kyis yang dag
21b6(mdo 'grel): bsams/ /rgya mtsho bzhi yi 'obs kyi ni/ /ska rags ldan pa sa yi bdag/ yul gang mi bdag mi dbang pa/ /gang zhig bdag cag gang du 'gro/ de ltar bsams nas thub pa rnams/ /gser gyi sa 'dzin dag gi ngos/ /lta dang grub pas yongs gang ba/ /'dzam
21b7(mdo 'grel): bu'i phyags dang nye bar song/ /de nas sa yi bdag po de'i/ /mthu ni shin tu che ba yis/ /sa ni ma rmos smin byed cing/ /mkha' yang rin chen gos skyes gyur/ /smin pa gsod byed skyengs? par ni/ /bgyid bde yi brtan pa las/ /sprin tshogs 'bebs par bgyid
22a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis/ /zhag bdun gser gyi char pa phab/ /de yi mthu ni chen po yis/ /sde dang lhan cig mkha' la phyin/ /shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya'i gling/ /mchog gi skye bo dbang du byas/ /de yi dmag dpon mchog dag ni/ /rtul phod stobS
22a2(mdo 'grel): dang gzi rgyas ba/ /dpa' bo bye ba phrag bco brgyad/ /mkha' la sngon du 'gro bar gyur/ /de 'og ba lang spyod gling dang/ /de nas byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /lhun po yin ni ngos rnams kyang/ /nyams med bstan nas bsrungs par gyur/ /brgya byin mang po 'das gyur dus//
22a3(mdo 'grel): lhun po gser gyi stsog la ni/ /gling bzhi'i sa yi bdag po de/ /de bas rnam par rab tu rtse/ /nam zhig lha rnams lta bzhed pas/ /lta bzhin mkha' la gshegs shing de'i/ /sprin sngon gyis bzhin glang po yis/ /phyogs rnams rab tu khyab par gyur/ /de nas
22a4(mdo 'grel): thub pa bskrad de rnams/ /lhun po'i ngos la dka' thub kyis/ /gnas pa'i spyi bor mkha' las ni/ /de yi rta glang spangs rnams lhung/ /de las de rnams khro bas gdungs/ /mig gis mkha' la lta byed cing/ /ser skya'i 'od kyi 'khri shing gi/ tshogs kyis phyogS
22a5(mdo 'grel): rnams ser skyar byas/ /de rnams 'di ci zhes brjod khros/ /dmod pa'i me ni spro 'dod der/ /lha yi pho nya mngon phyogs de/ /rab dga' rnam par rgyas pas smras/ /'di ni sa skyong ma lus kyi/ /mgo la bka' ni ngal bso zhing/ /brgya byin dag dang mtshungs pa'i
22a6(mdo 'grel): dpal/ /sa yi bdag por las nu/ /mi yi lha ni nam mkha' la/ /sde dang bcas pa rab tu gshegs/ /gang gi drag po'i tshig 'di rnams/ /bsod nams mngon pa'i nga rgyal ldan/ /'jig rten kun gyi bde ba'i dpal/ /sbyin byed gang la 'byor ba yis/ /rab
22a7(mdo 'grel): bskyed rgyags pa ma mthong ste/ /yang dag rig la gti mug bzhin/ /nor 'dzin gsal bas ku be ra/ /stobs dang ldan pas gzhon nu ste/ /khyu mchog ldan pas dbang phyug dang/ /dag la dad 'grogs pas khyab 'jug dang/ /'od rab spro bas nyi ma dang/ /skye bo
22b1(mdo 'grel): dga' bas zla ba dang/ /mthong bas stobs gcod dbang po yis/ /gzugs mchog 'di yis rnam par 'dzin/ /stobs ldan sa 'og rab tu zhugs/ /da d+hI tsa yang rus lhag nyid/ /chu gter ding yang 'khrug mi 'dor/ /'di yi gtong bas yin nam snyam/ /de skad
22b2(mdo 'grel): lha yi pho nya'i tshig/ /thos nas thub pa'i dbus son? pa'i/ /bzhin ngan zhes bya thub pa yis/ /dmod pa'i chu ni mkha' la gtor/ /de nas sde dpon yongs 'dren gyis/ /rab tu bzhad cing de la smras/ /drang srong chen po khro ba thong/ /dka' thub zad par yongs ma
22b3(mdo 'grel): mdzad/ /sa bdag mdun du dmod pa 'di/ /'bras med ngo mtshar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyis gang gi 'dab gshog zad/ /bzod pa'i bya de bdag cag min/ /de skad sde dpon gyis smras tshe/ /dmod pas bzung ba'i dpung tshogs la/ /mdun du sa bdag
22b4(mdo 'grel): gis bltas nas/ /ya mtshan las 'di ci zhes gsungs/ /de nas sde dpon khro ldan pas/ /de la yang dag mngon phyogs smras/ /lha cig drang srong de dag gi/ da mod pas dbud 'di mi 'grod do/ /khyod kyi 'khor lo rin chen 'di'ang/ /mkha' la
22b5(mdo 'grel): dmod par rnam par 'khyams/ /sprin gyis yang dag bgags pa yi/ /cha zer can dang mtshungs par bzung/ /de dag thos shing mi bdag gis/ /mdun du de ltar mthong nas kyang/ /mig nyid kyis bsgrubs dmod pa dag /'bras med rab gtum bslad
22b6(mdo 'grel): par ro/ /snying rje'i tshogs kyis lus 'jig pas/ /yongs bsrungs de yi kyal ka'i bka' / /dman pas drang srong che rnams kyi/ /ral pas la ltung bar gyur/ /khro dang rmongs pa mi thul na/ /bdag cag don med khur gyur ces/ /de dag ral pa ngo tsha nas//
22b7(mdo 'grel): sa gzhi la ni 'byar ba bzhin/ /de nas mi bdag lhun po'i rtser/ /phyin nas lha rnams gnas sa ni/ /grong khyer blta na sdug ces pa/ /blta na mdzes pa mthong bar gyur/ /der ni rol mtsho las 'thon pa'i/ /klu rnams dag la rab brtsams nas//
23a1(mdo 'grel): gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs dang/ /phreng 'dzin zhes pa'i lha dang ni/ /de bzhin rtag myos zhes pa'i lnga/ /khro bas sdom byed sde rnams dang/ rgyal chen bzhi yi ris zhes pa/ /shin tu stobs ldan skabs gsum pa/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi
23a2(mdo 'grel): po rnams/ /go bgos mtshan thogs g.yul zhugs pa/ /rgyal po'i mthu yis pham gyur nas/ /rang sde rnams kyi sngon 'gro byas/ /de nas rgya che dpag bsam shing/ /yid 'phrog ko bi dA ra dang/ /yongs 'du zhes pa mthong bar gyur/ /lha rnams
23a3(mdo 'grel): kyi ni yang dag bsten/ /de nas lhun po'i rtser 'od zer/ /phreng ba bzhin du dri ma med/ /mkha' ni rang 'od kyis gsal ba/ /chos bzang zhes pa'i mdun sar phyin/ /gser dang byu ru bai DUrya'i/ /ka ba'i tshogs ni gsal zhing mdzes/ /khang bzab?
23a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par rgyal zhes pa/ /grags pas gang la rnam par mdzes/ /gang du chu skyes bzhin ras dang/ /bung ba lan bus mtshungs gyur pa/ /lha yi bu mos par ljon dang/ /pad+ma'i shing gis lha mo'o/ /nor bu'i zhal zhal ka bas/ /gang du lha yi gzugs
23a5(mdo 'grel): brnyan gyis/ /lha yi 'jig rten gcig nyid kyang/ /lha yi 'jig rten du ma 'dzin/ /rin chen rta babs pa gam? gyi/ /'od kyi tshogs kyis rnam bkra gang/ /phyogs rnams mdzes pas khyab gyur te/ /brgya phrag brgya byin mtshon gyis bzhin/ /
23a6(mdo 'grel): gang du rlung bzhon gyis bskyod pa'i/ /dpag bsam rkang 'thung 'khri shing gis/ /dga' ba skyed de dga' ba'i dbal/ /'gyur zhing rab bsgyur bzhin du mdzes /gang na shing rta sna tshogs zhes/ /lha yi skyed tshal yid dga' ba/ /rtag tu spro
23a7(mdo 'grel): bas dga' ma dag /'dod dang so ga'i bzhed pa bzhin/ /'dod pa kun dang bde ba kun/ /dus tshigs kun tu me tog 'bar/ /lha rnams gnas ni thams cad las/ /khyad 'phags rgyal pos mthong gyur nas/ /yud tsam la mtshan
23b1(mdo 'grel): g.yo med cing/ /'dzum pa'i spyan dang kun dgar bcas/ /legs byas rnams kyi bsod nams kyis/ /'bras bu de ni 'di zhes bsams/ /lha yi bdag po'i sa srungs ni/ /sred len bung ba'i tshogs rgyas pa/ /dga' tshal rnam pa dang bcas bzhin/ /der ni dri
23b2(mdo 'grel): bzang ldan pa mthong/ /de nas sa yi dbang po ni/ /'ongs par shes nas dbang po ni/ /lha yi tshogs dang bcas pa dag/ rab dga' ldan pas bsu ba byas/ /rin chen phreng bas rnam mdzes pa'i/ /mdun sa'i sa gzhi rgyal po yis/ /rgyal po lha yi rgyal po
23b3(mdo 'grel): yis/ /mchod pa rdul bral mchog gis brten/ /rin chen bstan gyi phreng ba la/ /skabs gsum pa rnams nyer bzhugs shig /mchod sbyin brgya pa'i stan phyed la/ /mi yi bdag po dpal ldan bzhugs/ /der ni lhan cig la 'dug pa'i/ /lha dbang mi
23b4(mdo 'grel): yi dbang po bdag/ yon tan tshogs ni rgya che ba'i/ /gzugs ni khyad par med par mthong/ /de nas lha kun gyis spros pa'i/ /rab gsal mig ni rkang drug pas/ /bzhin pad 'thung lan? mi bdag la/ /'phrog byed kyis ni yang dag smras/ /kye ma gzi
23b5(mdo 'grel): brjid gter gyi gzi/ /gang zhig bsngags 'os mngon bar 'char/ /khyod kyis sa ni brgyan gyur cing/ /'od ldan lha yis nam mkha' yang/ /mthu yis rab mtho grags snyan dag /gsal ba'i gos can sa gsum du/ /yang dag rgyal po rnam
23b6(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba/ /khyod kyi rgyal mtshan 'di mdzes so/ /khyod gtam bdud rtsi'i btung ba dang/ /khyod ni lta ba'i rol yang/ /rna ba mig kyang rab bskul cing/ /bde ba'i sgra la dbyangs can no/ /las rnams 'bras bu rtsod pa yi/ /the tshom
23b7(mdo 'grel): chad cing nges pa 'di/ /'byor pa legs byas kyis thob pa/ /khyod nyid kho nas brtan par byas/ /bsod nams 'os pa'i kun spyod ldan/ /khyod lta bsod nams kyis mthong gang/ /'di nyid phyir nas dbang po yi/ /tshogs las
24a1(mdo 'grel): mig nyid dga' ba'i gnas/ /lha yi dbang pos 'di brjod tshe/ /grags pa'i gter ni nga la nus/ /mthu 'di khyod kyis drin no zhes/ /smras nas gdong ni 'dud par gyur/ /de ltar de ni lha rnams kyis/ /rtag tu
24a2(mdo 'grel): gus pas mchod ldan de'i/ /lha yul bzhugs shing gnas pa la/ /dbang po drug gis dus 'dis gyur/ /lha min dkyil 'khor mdza' dag ni/ /de yi pha rol gnon pas nyams/ /lha yi rgyal po 'tshe med cing/ /dar ba dang ni rgyal
24a3(mdo 'grel): bar gyur/ /gzi ldan g.yul du gzhu 'dzin lha'i/ /dpung pa'i grib mas nyes 'tsho rnams/ /dpa' bo ljon pa chen po de'i/ /ngal bso dag ni bsten par byed/ /de yi bsod nams tshong zong gis/ /nyos pa mi zad bde spyod pa'i/ /dus
24a4(mdo 'grel): kyi rgyun ni che ba la/ /brgya byin drug ni 'das par gyur/ /dam pa'i las 'bras spyod pa yi/ /rtags ni dri ma med pa'i yid/ /de ni rnyog par gyur pa las/ /rab tu nye bar yongs zad gyur/ /de nas dus kyis bdag ni/ /nyes pa'i rnyog
24a5(mdo 'grel): pas rab bsgos shing/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal chags pa yis/ /zil gnan yid la 'dod par gyur/ /skabs gsum pa yi dpal 'byor ni/ /bdag gis dpung pa'i stobs kyis bskyangs/ /de slad re zhig stan phyed kyi/ /ngag
24a6(mdo 'grel): 'khums 'di ni yongs mi bzod/ /'gro ba kun gyis khur 'dzin pa/ /bdag gi dpung pa 'di yis bzod/ /bdag rang gcig pu lha dbang du/ /mthu yis 'gyur ba min pa ni/ /lha yi dbang po nyams byas nas/ /mtho ris rgyal srid phun sum
24a7(mdo 'grel): tshogs/ /gdugs gcig nyid kyi thig la ni/ /rang nyid 'dzin par 'os pa bsten/ /de ltar bsam zhing brgya byin la/ /'khu bar mngon par 'dod pa de'i/ /dkar ba'i 'od ldan mthu yi dpal/ /phreng ba bzhin du nyams par gyur/ /stug po rgyas
24b1(mdo 'grel): par bsams pa yis/ /skye bo legs pa'i dogs gcod pa'i/ /g.yo ldan dpal ni sred bcas kyi/ /yid gyi rdzing bu dri mar byed/ /bag med rgud pa'i po nya ni/ /che rnams kyis kyang bzod dka' ba/ /rigs ni nyams pa nyid kyi slad/ /sdig pa?
24b2(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs pa'i blo gros so/ /sdig pa rnam par brtags tsam gyis/ /sa bdag sa la skad cig gis/ /ltung ste 'bras bu rnams ltung zhing/ /rtsa ba bcad pa'i ljon pa bzhin/ /ma goms pa yis rig pa 'joms/ /rgyags pa rgyas pas dpal
24b3(mdo 'grel): 'byor 'joms/ /rnam spang? gis ni legs nyid 'joms/ /chags pas yang dag mtho ba 'jams/ /kye ma kwa ye dar rgyas tshe/ /che zhing mtho ba'i rtser 'dzegs pa/ /'byor pas rgyags pa skyes pa rnams/ /'bral nyid du ni 'og tu ltung/ /de yis skye ba
24b4(mdo 'grel): snga ma la/ /thams cad zil gnon zhes bya mchod/ /lha dbang rgyal srid bsten 'os ni/ /de yis 'bras bus thob gyur cing/ /gang yang lha dbang las lhag pa/ /mthu ni ya mtshan ldan pa dag/ de yis snod la sbyin pa'i chas/ /bskyed pa mi
24b5(mdo 'grel): nyur skal bar gyur/ /mnyen ldan zhes ni bya ba yis/ /grong khyer 'os shing gtsang ba ru/ /tshong dpon ud ka ri ka zhes/ /de yi sngon gyi skye bar gyur/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /nyid du gyur cing sems can kun/ /sgrol ba la brtson
24b6(mdo 'grel): rnam gzigs mtshan/ /bsod snyoms slad du de khyim zhugs/ /de yi snod du dang ba'i blos/ /sran ma chags gang de yis 'phangs/ /de la lhag ma bzhi dag ni/ /sa yi bzhi la ltung bar 'gyur/ /de yi sbyin pa'i mthu yis ni/ /sa yi bdag po
24b7(mdo 'grel): nga las nu/ /gling rnams kun gyi bdeg gyur nas/ /brgya byin stan phyed thob par gyur/ /de yi sems ni gzhan gang las/ /sran ma lhag mas la ltung/ /de tshe 'di ni 'bras bu'i mthar/ /skabs gsum pa las ltung bar gyur/ /gang 
25a1(mdo 'grel): zhig rmi lam sgyu ma'i gnas skabs su yang nam yang mi 'phro ba'i/ /rnam rtog phreng ba cung zad 'khrugs pas gang la nye bar rab sbyar ba/ /de ni sbyin pa'i dpag bsam shing gis mtshungs med 'bras bu rab rgyas tsho/ /'byor pa'i longs spyod spyod pa
25a2(mdo 'grel): nyid du skal pa bsten ba rnam dag gyur/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan dgyes pa yis/ /rang gi skye ba gzhan brjod cing/ /dge slong rnams la rjes bstan du/ /sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'i dpal 'di gsungs/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems
25a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las nga las nu'i rtogs pa brjod ba'i yal 'dab ste bzhi pa'o// //lha rnams kyis bslangs bsrubs pas shin tu 'khrugs shing 'o ma'i chu gter ring zhig 'dar/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis 'bras
