25a4(mdo 'grel): bu rab tu gtong tshe dpag bsam shing yang 'dar ro lo/ /gang zhig lus ni rab tu gtong yang spu long tshogs 'dzin 'dam ba mi mnga' ba/ /su zhig gcig pu de ni lus rgyas sbyin pa'i lus 'di goms par gyur pa yin/ /ke la shas mtshon byang phyogs nas/ /
25a5(mdo 'grel): bla na med pa'i grong khyer ni/ /bzang po'i brag ces bya ba ste/ /sa yi rgyan du gyur pa yod/ /gang du grags snyon me tog dkar/ /phun tshogs kun gyi 'bras bu bzang/ /sbyin pa'i skyed tshal 'khri shing ni/ /grong khyer pa rnams dga' slad gyur/ /grong khyer
25a6(mdo 'grel): sum rgyal mig gi mes/ /gang du sgrog? pas yid 'byung ni/ /stobs med g.yo zhing brtse ba yi/ /smin ma 'khyog po nyid kyis bsrungs/ /gang du gser gyi khang? pa'i phreng/ /mu tig tshogs rab 'bar bas mdzes/ /lhun pa'i rtsi yi phreng ba ni/ /rgyas
25a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i rgyu skar 'phro ba bzhin/ /der ni dpal ldan zla ba'i 'od/ /sa 'dzin rnams kyi mchog tu gyur/ /nyin ma'i zla 'od mdzas pa yis/ /gang zhig ge? la sha bzhin byas/ /gang gi lus 'od zla nya yi/ /'od ltar rdzogs pa'i 'phrog byed kyis/ /gsal
25b1(mdo 'grel): byed can min snang ba'i mtshan/ /byams pa'i yon tan brang? ma gyur/ /'di mthong nyid ni rgyu skad rnams/ /'dod pa'i rims ni bsten gyur zhes/ /mkha' la gdugs kyi zol dag gis/ /'di ni zla bas bsgribs pa bzhin/ /dam pa'i mjod? na
25b2(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i dpal/ /rtag tu 'di yis rab ster zhes/ /gang zhig mthong la padmo can/ /zum bar rab tu thob pa bzhin/ /sde yang rgyal rab btang nas/ /gtong ba dkar ba'i dpal gyi dpal/ /gdugs dang rtsod pa na rab gsal rtsams/ /
25b3(mdo 'grel): grong khyer ba rnams dag la btang/ /de yi 'byor pa dul ba yis/ /dpal gyis brgyan cing mtho ba mdzes/ /gzhu ltar gug pa'i yon tan rgyud/ /gzhan dag rtse ru 'dzegs pa nyid/ /stong phrag bzhi bcu dag dang ni/ /brgya phrag dag gi lo rnams
25b4(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /lus can rnams kyi tsher gyur pa/ /de dus rtsod la sdang ba byung/ 'jig rten skyong las lhag pa'i dpal/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i grong khyer ni/ /phun sum tshogs pas gdab dag/ stong phrag drug cu byung bar gyur/ /mchod sprin byed po de
25b5(mdo 'grel): yi dpal/ /grags pa'i thig le bsod nams brgyan/ /mchod sbyin du ba'i 'khri shing dag /'khyog phros g.yo ba'i lan bu mdzes/ /de yi blon po zla chen po/ /rab 'bar zla ba'i snang ba bzhin/ /phun tshogs ku mud ldan pa ni/ /rtag tu rnam par rgyas
25b6(mdo 'grel): bgyid gyur/ /g.yo med mtshan ma shes rab kyi/ /ba dan rgyal sred chu gter gyi/ /rna ba 'dzin pa gang gis ni/ /gtso bo'i grags ba pha ral bsgral/ /de yi blon po glang po ni/ /sa 'dzin zhes byas yi khur/ /bzod ba gzhan yang byung gyur te/
25b7(mdo 'grel): phyogs kyi glang po lnga ba bzhin/ /gang zhig phur bu'i lugs kyi ni/ /ma phye gros kyi gsang sngags kyis/ /mi mthun phyogs kyi dpa' bo dag/ sprul gyi dug bzhin btang bar gyur/ /blon po de yis mi bdag dang/ /rgyal po yis kyang da brgyan
26a1(mdo 'grel): pa/ /skyes bu dam pas yon tan dang/ /yon tan gyis kyang skyes bu bzhin/ /byas shes drang ba'i rje bo dang/ /dam pa'i g.yog ni rab gus pa/ /legs byas las skyes kho na yi/ /skal? pa ldan pas rnyed par 'gyur/ /rje yis skyes bu dam
26a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i nang/ /gang gi yon tan shes pas rig/ 'di nyid kho na phun tshogs kun/ /ring du 'khyam pa'i ngal bso yin/ /sbyin la zhen pas sa bdag ni/ /'jig 'gyur gang gi 'bras bu can/ /blon po gzhan dang de gnyis kyis/ /nam zhig rmi lam
26a3(mdo 'grel): mthong bar gyur/ /mtshan ma ngan pa rab byung ba/ /mthong bas dogs par gyur de dag/ rtag tu zhi dang shis pa yis/ /las rnams dag la chags par gyur/ /sna tshogs bshes gnyen la sogs pa/ /dka' thub nags gnas drang srong che/ /
26a4(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams kyang ni mtshan ma dag/ mthong bas yid dman de skad brjod/ /bar der skye ba snga ma ni/ /tshangs pa'i srin po tshangs pa'i gnyen/ /ma rungs bzod dka' skye bo ngan/ /phrag dog drag po'i mig ces phas/ /rgyal po'i yon tan kun
26a5(mdo 'grel): rab 'bar/ /sbyin pas rab bskyed grags snyan thos/ /yon tan med de yon tan la/ /sdang pa'i gdung bas yang dag bsams/ /kye ma kyi hud mi bdag 'di'i/ /grags pa mkha' la nyin mtshan du/ /grub pa dri za tshig mda' yi/ /bud
26a6(mdo 'grel): med tshogs kyis sgrogs par gyur/ /de yi yon tan bstod pa'i khab/ /rtag tu bdag gi rna bar zhugs/ /ci bya yon tan gyis mtho gzhan/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis yong mi bzod/ /des na sbyin pa'i dang can de'i/ /sbyin pas bsgrubs pa'i
26a7(mdo 'grel): grags pa dag/ phyin nas mgo slong dgag pa yis/ /nyams pa 'di ni bdag gis byas/ /gal te mgo bo me ster na/ /sbyan pas blang ba'i grags nyams 'gyur/ /ci ste ster na bdag gi ni/ /zhe sdang rab tu zhi par 'gyur/ /de ltar
26b1(mdo 'grel): yun rings bsams nas ni/ /dri ldang ? zhabs mthar gnas pa/ /g.yo ldan ma rungs drag po de/ /bzang po'i brag tu song bar gyur/ /mig 'phrul sbyor ba shes pa de/ /rab tu zhi zhing rigs pa'i chas/ /byas shing sdig pa'i kun rtog ldan/ /sa bdag grong
26b2(mdo 'grel): khyed? sleb par gyur/ /srid pa'i nags 'dir rtag tu ni/ /yon tan skyon gyis yang dag gang/ /dpag bsam shing rnams rab skyes te/ /dug gi shing rnams skyes par gyur/ /ma lus nyams pa mtshon byed cing/ /'jigs rung skrag bar byed pa dag/ ltas ngan
26b3(mdo 'grel): lta bu'i mi srun bas/ /su la nyon mongs skyed mi byed/ /yon tan ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /dgrar gyur rab gsal mi mthun phyogs/ /skyon la brten par mi srun? dpe/ /rab rib dag la dbye ba ci/ /legs pa rnams kyi yin bcugs 'joms/ /rnam par
26b4(mdo 'grel): sngar ba'i dug bzod dka' / /logs ring skye bo mi srung sbrul/ /'jigs su rung ba su yis sbrul/ /grong khyer der ni rab zhugs tshe/ /grong khyer lha ni gzugs can ma/ /skrag ba'i mig ni g.yo ba yis/ /sa skyong la ni mngon phyogs smras/ /tshangs ba'i
26b5(mdo 'grel): gnyen ni mgo slong ba/ /'di ni khyod can nye bar 'ongs/ /'gro bya'i 'tsho ba khyod kyi ni/ /'tsho ba gcod byed 'di gzhom 'os/ /bdag gis bsam pa dri ma can/ /de ni grong khyer sgo du bgags/ /de mthong ba ni bdag gi yid/ /skrag cing dga' ba mthob bo/ /
26b6(mdo 'grel): 'di smra grong khyer lha mo la/ /slong ba bgags pas ngo tsha dag/ rab skyes bzhin ras dman gyur pa/ /sa skyong gis ni rab tu smras/ /lha mo slong ba mngon 'ongs pa/ /'di ni ma zlog nang du thang/ /slong ba'i bsam pa 'bras med ba'i/ /shugs ring bdag gis
26b7(mdo 'grel): yongs mi bzod/ /slong ba don gnyer rnams don du/ /lus nyams bsod nams rab tu thob/ /gang phyir lus ni dus bzhi'i grangs/ /gnas kyang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /slong ba ra ba nyams pa dag/ 'di rnams mdun du mi bgrod gang/ /de nyid
27a1(mdo 'grel): skye bo legs rnams kyi/ /'tsho ba 'gro bar mchod par 'os/ /bdag gi rjes su mthun pa ni/ /dge bar 'os pa khyod kyi mdzod/ /de yi bsam pa rnam bcom pa'i?/ /gdung ba myur du bzlog par mdzod/ /de skad sa bdag tshig thos nas//
27a2(mdo 'grel): g.yo ba med par nges pa yi/ /bsam pas yid ni rab gdung ba/ /lha mo snang ba min par 'gyur/ /de nas gya gyu can de 'ongs/ /mi srun sog le'i spyod tshul can/ /mi bzad drag po'i shing dag ni/ /gcod la rang nyid sbyor ba bzhin/ /slong la sgo
27a3(mdo 'grel): ni rab phye ba/ /mi bdag khang pa de 'ongs la/ /sa bdag 'jig pas 'jigs pa'i sa/ /sa 'dzin dang bcas 'dar bar gyur/ /sgra gcan bzhin du gdod ngan de/ /mi dbang zla ba'i drung du 'ongs/ /mi shis don bzhin shis pa ni/ /brjod pa sngon du 'gro bar byas//
27a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal po dge gyur gnyis skyes bdag/ dben par grub pa sgrub pa po/ /slong ba kun gyi lha yi shing/ /khyod can 'dod pa thob phyir 'ongs/ /rtag tu gang gi gzigs pa bdud rtsi'i char chen yid ni skye bo dam pa'i grogs/ /bzod pa khong khro'i rdul rnams rab
27a5(mdo 'grel): sel chu bo blo gros sdug bsngal gyis gzir ma/ /dpal 'byor dri med sbyin pa'i chu ni mngon 'thor tshig ni bden zhing rigs par ldan/ /'gro ba rnams kyi gnyen du skyes pa de ni khyod nyid gcig po kho na yin/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i mgo yis ni/ /
27a6(mdo 'grel): bdag gis 'grub ces 'ga' yis smras/ /de ni byin mdzod khyod las gzhan/ /su yis mgo bo sbyin par nus/ /gsal ba'i don gter yid bzhin nor/ /dpag bsam ljon pa la sogs yod/ /rnyed dka' i don ni rab ster mchog /khyod lta bu ni shin
27a7(mdo 'grel): tu nyung/ /de yis der brjod mi bdag ni/ /mi g.yo yangs ba'i bsam pa can/ /slong ba gzigs pas kun dga' dag/ rdzogs pa yis ni de la smras/ /gang zhig bdag gi legs 'tsho dag/ slong ba rnams kyi don grub slad/ /rnam par mi
27b1(mdo 'grel): rtog yo byad du/ /zad 'gyur bram ze bdag legs so/ /bdag srog pha rol don du ni/ /nam zhig 'gyur zhes re ba yod/ /gal te khyod kyis de blangs pa/ /'di ni bsod nams rdzis? ma yin/ /'jig rten 'dir ni slong rnams la/ /gang gang
27b2(mdo 'grel): byin pa de de brtan/ /grub pa'i yo byad bdag gi mgo/ bsngags par 'os pa gzung bar mdzod/ /sa spyod snying stobs legs ldan pa/ /rab dga' ldan pas 'di brjod tshe/ /blon po chen po zla chen dang/ /sa 'dzin dag gis de la smras//
27b3(mdo 'grel): rje bo khyod kyi chos dang po/ /rang gi srog ni bsrung ba nyid/ /'gro ba khyod ni 'tsho ba na/ /srog chags thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir khyod lus kun gyi gzhi/ /mgo bo byin par mi 'os so/ /rin chen gser gyi rang bzhin mgo /bram
27b4(mdo 'grel): ze 'di la sbyin par mdzod/ /slong ba'i don mthun re ba dag/ gang gis don kun gyis rdzogs pa/ /de dag yang dag bsrungs pa yis/ /thams cad bsrungs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i sems ldan gnyis skyes 'di'i/ /rnam rtog 'di ni
27b5(mdo 'grel): 'jigs su rung/ /gang phyir slong ba'i dpag bsam shing/ /rtsa bcad nye bar 'tsho bya min/ /rin chen gser gyi mgo thob nas/ /'di ni 'gro 'gyur mgo yis ci/ /bkres pa rnams kyis yid bzhin nor/ /rnam par brtags nas bag ma
27b6(mdo 'grel): bya min/ /blon po'i gtso bos 'di smras tshe/ /rin chen gser gyi rang bzhin mgo/ de ni bdag gis grub pa la/ /nyer mkho med ces bram zes smras/ /de nas cod pan mi bdag gis/ /rab 'grol? mu tig 'di rnams ni/ /mgo dang bral ba'i
27b7(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal gyis/ /kun nas mchi ma'i rgyun bcas bzhin/ /skad cig de la grong khyer ba'i/ /cod pan rnams ni sa gzhi la/ /phyogs ni srog mtshungs mgal me dang/ /skad? med pa dag dang ? tshig lhung/ /rgyal pos mgo ni rab ste rab//
28a1(mdo 'grel): rnam pa kun tu yongs rtags te/ /mthong bar mi bzod blon po ni/ /de dag lus ni gtang? ba byas/ /de nas skyed tshal rin chen mang/ /zhugs te sa yi bdag po yi/ /rab rgyas tsam pa ka 'og tu/ /mgo bo gcod du yang dag gshegS
28a2(mdo 'grel): skyed mos tshal gyi lhas mthong nas/ /mgo bo gcod par brtson de la/ /rgyal po thub chod ma mdzad ces/ /mya ngan dag gis 'khrugs pas smras/ /'dar ldan 'khri shing bab? smra ba/ /bung ba myos tshogs sgra dang ni/ /yal 'dab rab tu g.yo ba yin/ /
28a3(mdo 'grel): lag pa dag gis zlog pa bzhin/ /rnam par brtag pa g.yo med de/ /skyen? tshil? lha yang dang byas nas/ /dri med byang chub la dmigs pa'i/ /smon lam dag dang ldan par gyur/ /grong dang rin chen rang bzhin tshal/ /'di ni bsod nams phung
28a4(mdo 'grel): pos mtho/ /sems can yang dag sgrol 'os pa/ /ston pa'i mchod rten 'byung gyur cig/ bdag gis brtag pa 'di yis ni/ /bsod nams cung zad gang bsgrubs pha/ /de yis 'khor bar lus can rnams/ /'khor ba med par 'gyur bar
28a5(mdo 'grel): shog/ de ltar dmigs nas mi bdag gis/ /tsam pa ka shing lo ma la/ /skra tshogs kyis btags bcad nas mgo/ gnyis skyes la ni rab tu byin/ /de nas mi yis bdag po'i snying stobs spro zhing gsal ba'i smon lam dang/ /gang
28a6(mdo 'grel): yang dri med bsod nams snang ba phyogs mthar rnam par 'phro ba yis/ /rmongs ba'i mun tshen rnam par sel zhing yongs su myang 'das la brten pa dang/ /srid par goms ba'i ngal ba rab sel 'gro la skad cig dag gis gyur/ /de ltar sngon
28a7(mdo 'grel): skyes spyod pa'i mdza' / /bshad nas bcom ldan rgyal ba yis/ /sbyin pa dag pa'i dam chos dag /dge slong rnams la bstan pa bsgrubs/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas ba'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam
28b1(mdo 'grel): gyi 'khri shing las zla ba'i 'od kyi rtogs pa brjod ba'i yal 'dab ste lnga pa'o// //sbyin pa la brtson brtson 'gus rgya che'i gnas/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid snying stobs rgya mtsho dang/ /spro ba che? ldan rnams ni gzhan don la/ /kye ma bsam gyis mi
28b2(mdo 'grel): khyab bzhed pa yin/ /gang zhig mkhar rnyog ri bo sul bcas dag la rtse dags ba gam la 'jog dang/ /gang dag chu tshogs 'khrugs cing gyen 'thor rgya mtsho dag la rol pas ba lang rjes/ /gang yang nags tshal stug po'i khrod la dga' bdor
28b3(mdo 'grel): khang pa'i thar bzhin 'god byed pa/ /de ni bdag nyid che rnams snying stobs kyis bsgrubs rgyas pa'i brtson 'grus rnam rtsen yin/ /sngon ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /man ngag rab tu gsal ba yis/ /mnyan yod grong khyer ba rnams kyi/ /
28b4(mdo 'grel): mi shes las skyes mun pa gsal/ /de ni nam zhig ma ga d+har/ /dge slong tshogs kyis yongs bskor zhing/ /tshong pa'i skye bo'i rjes 'brang bcas/ /rang nyid rgyu zhing gshegs par gyur/ /nor chen don mthun rjes 'brang zhing/ /nagS
28b5(mdo 'grel): kyi lam nas gshegs pa de/ /chom rkun tshogs kyis mthong gyur nas/ /sA la'i nags su rnam bsams pa/ /sems can phan dges bcom ldan 'das/ /'di ni sngon la gshegs su gzhug/ nor gyi phung pos gang ba yi/ /don
28b6(mdo 'grel): mthun phyi nas gzung bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen gyis/ /de rnams 'dod pa mkhyen gyur nas/ /rnam 'gyur mi mnga' bzhin 'dzum pas/ /'di dag ci zhes de la gsungs/ /de yis rab dang 'dzum pa yis/ /snang bas
28b7(mdo 'grel): rab rib bcom pa bzhin/ /de dag gdug pa yongs btang zhing/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis de la smras/ /bcom ldan bdag cag 'tsho ba 'di/ /smad bar 'os pa las kyis spul/ /gla rngan ma yin zhing las min/ /bdag cag gdug pa 
29a1(mdo 'grel): lhan cig skyes/ /rang bzhin gyis ni sdig bdag nyid/ /ngo bo nyid kyis las kyi ni/ /sbrul gyi mche rnon ji ltar sel/ /des na bdag cag 'tsho ba ni/ /nyams byir? mi 'os gshegs par mdzod/ /khyod ni gshegs na don
29a2(mdo 'grel): mthun gyi/ /nor rnams thams cad bdag cag 'phrog /de skad de dag tshig thos nas/ /snying rje yongs su rdzogs pa'i thugs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi blo gros ni/ /skad cig khyogs la 'phyang bar gyur/ /de nas don mthun nor rnams kun/ /
29a3(mdo 'grel): yongs bgrangs de dang mnyam pa ni/ /de tshe thob pa'i gter dag las/ /chom rkun tshogs la de yis byin/ /yang gshegs byon pas lam du ni/ /rim pa de lta bu nyid kyis/ /don mthun sgrol phyir de yis nor/ /lan drug de rnamS
29a4(mdo 'grel): la rab byin/ /yang ni lam de nas 'ongs te/ /rjes su 'brang dang bcas de la/ /de yi zas ni mgron gnyer ba'i/ /blo gros chom rkun rnams la byung/ /dam pa mthong bas dri bral te/ /yang dag bshad pas dge ba yang/ /'grogs pa goms
29a5(mdo 'grel): pas legs pa'i lam/ /zam stegs dag nas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mi dge thams cad yongs zad las/ /de rnams 'dod pa dag ba kun/ /der ni bcom ldan rgyal bdag/ drang por gzigs pas mkhyen par gyur/ /don spyod pa
29a6(mdo 'grel): dang don mthun dang/ /bdog pa gtong dang snyan bar smra/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po la/ /nges pa'i bdag nyid gang dag dang/ /gang zhig snying stobs ldan rnams kyi/ /tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi po/ /snying rje dga' ba btang snyomS
29a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /byams pa zhes bya yongs 'dzin dang/ /mchags yongs su sdang ba med/ /ma rmongs pa de dge ba'i rtsa/ /gsum ni thugs la zhen ba yi/ /bdag nyid chen po gang dag dang/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus//
29b1(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan shes rab rtag bsten zhing/ /thabs dang smon lam ye shes dang/ /stobs kyis rab tu bsten pa'i thugs/ /yongs skyob dpa' bo gcig pu dang/ /rtag tu gnyis med gsungs pa nyid dang/ /rig pa gsum gyi gsal ba
29b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /dri med bzhi dang legs par ldan/ /phung po lnga las rnam grol zhing/ /skye mched drug ni 'byed pa dang/ /byang chub yan lag bdun dab? ldan/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad nyer ston/ /kun sbyor dgus dman rgyal ba ni/ /
29b3(mdo 'grel): stobs bcu'i bdag nyid ldan dag gis/ /'jig rten skye bo'i spyod tshul la/ /mi mkhyen pa ni ci zhig yod/ /de nas shin tu snying rje yis/ /zhabs la mgos gtugs de dag la/ /de bzhin no zhes bcom ldan gyis/ /de yi
29b4(mdo 'grel): zas la zhal gyis bzhes/ /de mthong sdig pa zad gyur pa/ /de dag gis ni mnyam du phul/ /dge slong tshogs kyis bskor ba yis/ /zas kun cho ga bzhin du blangs/ /de 'og de yi smon lam ni/ /ye shes snang ba'i thur ma yis/ /
29b5(mdo 'grel): de dag mig ni yang dag phye/ /rab tu gsal ba'i gnas mthong gyur/ /de dag 'phral la drag por ni/ /chags bral yongs smin rab tu dang/ /rab tu byung dang ldan thob nas/ /'gro ba'i mchod bya nyid du gyur/ /de dag 'phral la dge
29b6(mdo 'grel): ba de/ /sngon du nye bar gnas mthong nas/ /dge slong rnams kyis 'di ci zhes/ /dris shing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /'di dag bdag dang 'brel ba 'di/ /don mthun bsrung zhing bslu ba yis/ /gling du 'gro ba'i skye ba ni/
29b7(mdo 'grel): gzhan dag la yang grub par gyur/ /rnam rgyas spro ba sgrub byed kyi/ /rab mchog mkhas pa dga' ba'i sa/ /ba ra NA si zhes pa'i grong/ /mtho ris snga yi mtshams gyur yod/ /gang na dri med chu rlabs ni/ /'dzin pa lha yi
30a1(mdo 'grel): rgyun 'dzin dag /rtag tu lus can rnams kyi snying/ /brtsi? bzhin du dang por? bgyid/ /bzod pa bzhin du 'byung po kun/ /bag phab bde bar gnas pa gang/ /'tshe ba med bzhin dam pas bsten/ /rig pa bzhin du mkhas
30a2(mdo 'grel): pas 'dod/ /de na? mi bdag tshangs par ni/ /brtag bya rnam rgyas pad+mar brten/ /tshangs sbyin zhes byas 'jig rten ni/ /'jig rten gsum pa bzhin du bsrungs/ /der ni ded dpon dga' ba'i sde/ /zhes pa rnam thos bu lta bu/ /chu rnams dag gis
30a3(mdo 'grel): chu gter bzhin/ /nor gyi don mthun gnas su gyur/ /de sras shin tu dga' zhes pa/ /skye bo legs pa'i gnas su gyur/ /gang la brten pa'i yon tan tshogs/ /don rgyas nyid du rab tu gyur/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang/ /brtson
30a4(mdo 'grel): 'grus bsam gtan shes rab ldan/ /byed bo rnam par chags slad gang/ /legs byas dpal du byas pa bzhin/ /de ni dri med rig kun dang/ /sgyu rtsal shin tu yangs par yang/ /ro ldan yid 'ong chu gter cher/ /chu bo bzhin du
30a5(mdo 'grel): zhugs par gyur/ /spyod pa yon tan gyis brgyan cing/ /lus ni mtshan gyis brgyan pa gang/ /skyes bu mchog la chags pa bzhin/ /bsngags par 'os pa'i dpal gyis bsten/ /bsod nams kyis nyos mtho ris su/ /yab
30a6(mdo 'grel): ni dus kyis gshegs pa'i tshe/ /de yis tha snyad khur dag ni/ /phrag pa'i ngos 'dag? nas par byas/ /des bsams bdag gi dpal 'byor 'di/ /rim pas 'ongs shing yangs pa ste/ /de ltar na yang slong kun gyi/ /re ba yongs su mi
30a7(mdo 'grel): rdzogs snyam/ /sngar 'ongs slong pas zos nyid tshe/ /gang zhig phyis slong 'bras bu med/ /skyes bu dam pa la gnas dpal/ /shin tu che ba des kyang ci/ /rta gtong slong ba gcig de yang/ /gang gis dbung yod ma rdzogs/ /rin chen
30b1(mdo 'grel): 'byung gnas byed pho? yis/ /yongs? par byas pa'ang 'bras bu med/ /'dzin brnag pa rgya che ba'i/ /spong? ba su yis yongs rdzogs te/ /a gastya yi khyor chu yi/ /hub tu rgya mtsho chen po song/ /dpal ni gcig la slong ba mang/ /slong ba kun khengs bzod
30b2(mdo 'grel): ba gang/ /nor de bdag gis yong mi 'thob/ /ci bya 'di ni shin tu gdung/ /dpal dang nor bu la sogs kyis/ /lnga drug nyid khengs gzhan min zhes/ /chu gter da dung rta gdong me/ /gdud ba nang du 'bar ba bzhin/ /slong ba phyir phyogs kha yi ni/ /sdug
30b3(mdo 'grel): bsngal shugs rings yongs mi bzod/ /de slad bdag gis 'bad pa yis/ /grangs med nor ni bsgrub par bya/ /de ltar yun ring bsams nas de/ /don mthun chen pos bskor nas ni/ /rin chen gling gi grong khyer du/ /phyin nas rin chen bsdu ba
30b4(mdo 'grel): byas/ /de 'og don byas slar log ste/ /'ong ba de ni chom rkun pa/ /bon? mthun nor? 'brog sbyor ba la/ /nags na rgyu bas lam du mthong/ /de dag don mthun nor blang phyir/ /bab col du sbyor des mthong nas/ /rang gi nor kun byin nas ni/ /
30b5(mdo 'grel): rjes su 'brang ba'i nor rnams bsrungs/ /phyi nas rim pa de bzhin nyid/ /rin chen gling gi 'gro 'ong gis/ /don mthun bskyab phyir chom rkun la/ /nor ni lan drug rab tu byin/ /phyis kyang lam ni de nyid nas/ /'ongs pas de bzhin chom
30b6(mdo 'grel): rkun pa/ /don mthun nor ni 'phrog pa la/ /lhag bar brkam? pa de dag mthong/ /des bsams kye ma bdag gi nor/ /chen po yis ni yongs su sim/ /'di dag pha rol nor 'phrog la/ /brtson pa las ni phyir ma log /nor gyis
30b7(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba khengs byas shing/ /bdag gis yang yang brjod gyur kyang/ /kye ma ma la chom rkun ni/ /sdug pa 'di dag yongs ma khengs/ /rigs pa'i spro ba zhan gyur cing/ /lan smra kun tu bcom pa dang/ /smad par 'os pa'i dam bca' 
31a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /ngan par skyes pa bdag skye smad/ /me yis rab tu gdungs pa de'i/ /skye ba med par mtshan mo ni/ /lo brgya lta bur rab tu gyur/ /mya ngan 'dam du bying pa yi/ /glang po'i dbang po bzhin ma g.yo/ /dbugs ring de la rmi lam
31a2(mdo 'grel): du/ /lha ni mthu chen ldan pas smras/ /blo bzang mya ngan ma byed cig/ don med lus ni rab skem yin/ /rnam brtag dam par mngon 'dzegs pa/ /khyod kyi 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /blo ldan brtson 'grus can rnams kyi/ /'bad pas 'grub
31a3(mdo 'grel): par mi 'gyur ba/ /rmi lam rnam rtog rnyed dka' dang/ /'jig rten 'di na de yod min/ /gang yang nus pa de dpe med/ /gang zhig gnyis skyes gcig gi yang/ /gsung gi kyal ka kho na yis/ /'bigs byed sa dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /
31a4(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid chen po'i bya ba'i dus/ /mi mnyam pa yang mnyam par gyur/ /ring ba rnams kyang nye bar 'ong/ /chu yang skams nyid du 'gyur/ /gzhan don khyod kyi brtson pa 'di/ /'bras bu nyid du the tshom med/ /snying stobs spyod pa bslu ba yi/ /the
31a5(mdo 'grel): tshom lta yang mi 'byung ngo/ /lha rnams kyis bsten pa da ra'i/ /gling na rin po che dag yod/ /gang zhig gcig gi mthu yis kyang/ /'jig rten gsum po khengs par bzod/ /gang phyir mi yi sa 'das nas/ /de ni shin tu che ba'i sa/ /bsod
31a6(mdo 'grel): nams rang bzhin gyis 'thob ste/ /snying stobs legs byas min pas min/ /bu dag yid ni gdung ba thong/ /brtan pa'i blo gros rnam par bsgrubs/ /ba da ra yi gling 'gro la/ /rab tu spro ba yongs su bzung/ /khyod ni snying stobs mthu rgyas
31a7(mdo 'grel): shing/ /'khor ba rab tu sgrol bar bzod/ /de thob bya phyir phyogs dang ni/ /lam gyi rim pa 'di dag nyon/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi cha na yod/ /shin tu che ba'i gling dag ni/ /bdun brgya rab tu 'das gyur cing/ /de bzhin du ni rin chen bdun/ /
31b1(mdo 'grel): chu klung bdun dang rjes 'gro dang/ /bzlog 'gro zhes pa'i chu yi gter/ /rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis der/ /pha rol 'thog po bsod nams can/ /de nas de mtshungs ming can dri/ /rlung gi rab rib rmongs par byed/ /sman chen don yod ces ba yis/ /
31b2(mdo 'grel): mig gnyis gang du rnal gnas ster/ /de nas kun 'khor zhes chu gter/ /gang du rlung ni be rA ma b+has/ /'bying zhing 'byung bas srog chags rnams/ /kun 'khor bdun las sgrol bar byed/ /de nas kun 'khor zhes pa'i ri/ /gang na mtshan rgyu
31b3(mdo 'grel): dung gi lte/ /'jigs su rung zhing srog 'phrog pa/ /skabs gsum pa yang skrag byed gnas/ /de na sman chen dud gi lte/ /sbrul ni nag pos dkris gyur pa/ /mig dang mgo la bzhag pa na/ /bsod nams ldan pa yongs su skyob/ /de nas chu
31b4(mdo 'grel): sngon zhes pa'i mtsho/ /gang na srin po mig dmar yod/ /ma kir zhes bya'i sman 'dzin dang/ /sangs rgyas rig byed rig pa'i dbang/ /de nas chu sngon zhes pa'i ri/ /gang na mgrin pa sngon po ni/ /mtshan rgyu mig ni rab 'bar ba/ /srin po lnga brgya
31b5(mdo 'grel): dag dang gnas/ /de na don yod ces pa'i sman/ /mthong dang dbugs dang reg pa dang/ /mche bas rab spros dug gi me/ /rtag tu sbrul gyi dug rnams bsrung/ /gso sbyong brtul zhugs ldan pa dang/ /byams dang snying rje'i bdag nyid
31b6(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /sprul ni nag po rab bskrad nas/ /sman chen de ni thob par 'gyur/ /de yi mig sman zur phung ni/ /byas na srin po'i shing rta ri/ /'bras med bug pa phra mo can/ /bsod nams ldan pas sgrol bar 'gyur/ /de nas be raM? b+ha
31b7(mdo 'grel): zhes ri/ /de brdzes gang gis pha rol gzhan/ /'jigs rung zangs kyi nags zhes pa/ /sA la chen po'i nags kyi nang/ /de na sbrul ni sbram chen dag/ zangs mig ces pa bzod dka' ba/ /drag po'i dri ldan gang gi rlung/ /nyid kyis
32a1(mdo 'grel): 'tsho bar mi byed gnas/ /zla ba drug du nyal gyur ba'i/ /kha chu yis ni dpag tshad khyab/ /ltogs pas gdungs nas zla drug ni/ /gnyid dang bral bas chung bar gyur/ /'od ma'i rtsa ba rngos bsdams phug /rab tu phye bas dri dang ldan/ /
32a2(mdo 'grel): nyin dang mtshan du rab 'bar ba/ /mig sman du 'os sman thob 'gyur/ /sdang med ces pa sangs rgyas kyi/ /rig pa bzlas pas sbram chen ni/ /'jigs rung de dang gzi brjid che/ /gzhan gyis kyang ni 'jigs mi 'gyur/ /de nas ri ni che ba bdun
32a3(mdo 'grel): 'ong ma'i tsher mas gtams gyur pa/ /zangs glegs gis mtshan rkang pa yis/ /brtson 'grus ldan pas thar bar 'gyur/ /de rjes shal ma li? nags dang/ /'gyur byed chu klung rnam bdun dag/ brgal nas rtse gsum zhes pa'i ri/ /rab tu
32a4(mdo 'grel): mtho ba dag tu sleb/ /de na rtse gsum zhes pa yis/ /tsher ma rdo rje 'bigs byed yod/ /zangs kyi glegs bu des sbyar ba'i/ /rkang pa dag la mi 'dzug go/ chu klung rtse gsum zhes pa dang/ /de na lcags kyi rtse yi ri/ /chu klung ngos dang lcags
32a5(mdo 'grel): phur gyi/ /ri bo de nas des lta'i klung/ /de nas bco brgyad 'khyogs ces ba'i/ /ri bo 'grod par dka' ba dang/ /de nas de dang mi mtshungs klung/ /de rjes phra mo zhes pa'i ri/ /de nas du ba'i mig ces ri/ /phyogs ngos du bas tshig gyur pa//
32a6(mdo 'grel): ma rungs sprul gdug dkyil 'khor gyi/ /mthong ba reg pa'i dug gis khyab/ /de yi rtse na? rdzing bu'i mdza' / /rdo bas bcings pa'i phug chen po/ /phug gang nor bu 'od khung? dang/ /sman chen 'tsho byed ces pa yod/ /de phyed yi mgo
32a7(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /rkang lag lto la mngon par byugs/ /gsang sngags stobs dang bcas bgrod na/ /ma rungs sbrul gyis gnod mi 'gyur/ /de nas sprul gdug ri bo bdun/ /sems can drag pos kun tu khengs/ /de lta'i chu klung dag
32b1(mdo 'grel): kyang ste/ /chu'i phun tshogs pha mdza' med/ /de dag ma lus rab brgal te/ /gzhan phan brtson pa bsod nams kyis/ /? mo mkha' la reg gyur pa/ /dkar ba'i ril ? par 'gyur/ /de nas de yi ngos gzhan lnga/ /? ti ki zhes
32b2(mdo 'grel): grong khyer/ /dpag bsam shing gis nye bar mdzes/ /mtho ris dang mtshungs mthong bar 'gyur/ /de na ded dpon snying stobs ni/ /chen pho? ma g+ha zhes pa yod/ /sems can kun la phan par dgyes/ /brgya byin bzhin du rnam par grags/ /
32b3(mdo 'grel): shes bzang blo gros skyon med des/ /ba ra da? yi gling dag tu/ /'gro bar brtson pa khyod kyi ni/ /lam gyi gdams dag kun byed 'gyur/ /'di brjod bdud rtsi'i rlan gyis bzhin/ /'os pa'i tshig gis shin tu dga' / /mang du spro ba bskyed byas nas/
32b4(mdo 'grel): lha mo 'phral la mi snang gyur/ /shin tu dga' ni rab sang nas/ /thams cad de de bzhin zhes bsams/ /rang gi spro ba sngon btang nas/ /snying stobs la ni zhon te chas/ /de yis bstan pa'i lam nas ni/ /ngal ba rnam bcom des bgrod
32b5(mdo 'grel): bas/ /lo ni bcu gnyis rdzogs pa na/ /ro ha ti ka'i grong khyer sleb/ /skabs 'dir der ni don mthun bdag/ ma g+ha las kyi sbyor ba las/ /gso ba dka' ba'i nad kyis ni/ /lus ni rnal du ma gnas gyur/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab lha'i
32b6(mdo 'grel): khyim/ /nang du 'jug pa ma thob nas/ /de yi sgo na shin tu dga' / /bya ba bsgrub slad 'dug par 'gyur/ /de nas sman ba'i zol gyis ni/ /de ni nang du 'jug pa thob/ /nye bar rigs pa'i gtam shes pa/ /su yi gus pa'i sa ma yin/ /
32b7(mdo 'grel): tshe yi rig byed sgrub shes shing/ /'chi ba'i mtshan nyid shes pa des/ /zla drug 'jug nyid do yi tshor/ /shes nas bsams pa 'khrugs par gyur/ /dga' zhing phan pa'i sman mang dang/ /de yis rim 'gro legs byas pas/ /dus ni 
33a1(mdo 'grel): shin tu thung ba yis/ /shin tu dga' dang mdza' bor gyur/ /de la mdza' bas sman spyad rnams/ /de yis 'dod pa bya bar gyur/ /mdza' bos cung zad byin pa gang/ /de dag kun la yid dga' o/ /de nas bde ba'i rim
33a2(mdo 'grel): 'gros de'i/ /nad ni chung pa nyid du gyur/ /dam pa'i grogs las sdug bsngal zhi/ /de las nang dang bral bar gyur/ /de nas ma g+ha mdza' ba las/ /yid phebs skyes la shin tu dga' / /slad nas rang gi gtam gyi tshe/ /spyod tshul
33a3(mdo 'grel): mdza' ni rig par byas/ /ba da ra yi gling bgrod la/ /bdag nyid cha de'i spro pa dag /gzhan don g.yo med shes gyur nas/ /ma g+has ya mtshan de la smras/ /kye ma snying po med pa yi/ /'khor ba 'di na snying po'i gzugs/ /gzhan gyi
33a4(mdo 'grel): bsam pa'i dpung gnyen ni/ /nor bu 'ga' zhig yod pa yin/ /na tshod gzhon zhing mdzes pa'i gzugs/ /gzhan gyi don la gcags pa'i yid/ /yon tan phun tshogs bsod nams ldan/ /gnas 'di khyod nyid kho na'i yin/ /'di snyed
33a5(mdo 'grel): sa 'di rab bzlas nas/ /khyod ni gzhan gyi don du 'ongs/ /khyod kyi stong grogs bgyid pa la/ /'on kyang bdag ni mchog tu gzir/ /mtshams ni nges pa lus can gyi/ /srog ni nges par 'gro ba nyid/ /khyod kyi 'dod pa'i rgyu nyid du/ /bdag
33a6(mdo 'grel): gi de mthar gyur kyang bla'i/ /da ltar nyid du zad pa gang/ /de ni zad par yongs su bgrang/ /gzhan gyi don du srog dag kyang/ /zad pa rnyed pa brgya dang mnyam/ /bdag gis ba da ra yi gling/ /ma mthong 'on kyang bdag gis thos/ /chu gter
33a7(mdo 'grel): chen po phyogs lung ston/ /de nas de yi mtshan ma shes/ /de skad brjod nas sa bdag gis/ /grogs bzang mnyen pa'i tshig kyang dor/ /de yis bkra shis gru gzings ni/ /shin tu dga' dang lhan cig bzung/ /de nas bsam pa yangs
33b1(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /de dag gzings la zhon gyur te/ /rjes su mthun pa'i rlung dag gis/ /dpag tshad brgyar yang 'gro bar byed/ /gnas dang gnas su chu gter che'i/ /chu ni kha dog sma tshogs mthong/ /'di dag ci zhes ltad mo'i? slad/ /shin tu dags dras ma
33b2(mdo 'grel): 'gal la'o/ /rgya mtsho 'di yi chu la ni/ /lcags kyi ri bo lnga dag yod/ /gzhan yang zangs dang dngul rang bzhin/ /de rnams grib ma'i bye brag gis/ /kha dog sna tshogs gnas dang gnas/ /khongs gnas rab 'bar sman dag gis /chu gter
33b3(mdo 'grel): 'di ni 'bar bar mthong/ /'di brjod ma g+ha dus kyi mtshams/ /thob cing nad kyis thobs par gyur/ /srog btang dam pa'i grags pa dag/ brtan pa'i 'tsho ba rnam par btsugs/ /ji ltar bdag nyid che snying stobs/ /rdo rje byugs pa bas kyang brtan//
33b4(mdo 'grel): de ltar gal te tshe gyur na/ /srid na bsgrub byar cis mi 'gyur/ /gzings ni dogs phyin shin tu dags/ /de dang bral ba las skyes pa'i/ /mya ngan bsal nas grogs po yi/ /lusn i legs par bya ba bsgrubs/ /rten ni rnam par chad
33b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe/ /gang zhig bya la brtan pa'i yid/ /'din yid bdag nyid che rnams kyi/ /snying stobs spro bas mtho ba'i rtags/ /yang ni gzings la zhon byas te/ /chu bo'i gter ni yang dag bsgral/ /rin chen ri po'i ngos nas ni/ /nags tshal
33b6(mdo 'grel): sdug po'i nang du zhugs/ /bdag nyid chen po'i glo gros ni/ /dman pa 'bral bas ma yin zhing/ /gdung dang dgra rnams mngon sbyor dang/ /nang dang nyon mongs spyod pas min/ /der ni nam mkhar son pa'i ri/ /phyogs ngos ma lus
33b7(mdo 'grel): bkag gyur pa/ /mdun du bgegs ni gzugs can bzhin/ /bgrod par dka' ba de yis mthong/ /rmongs pa bzhin du sbyor ba'i ri/ /de mthong thabs ni dman gyur cing/ /zhabs su yal 'dab mal stan la/ /nyal nas de
34a1(mdo 'grel): yi skad cig bsams/ /kye ma bdag ni zhugs gyur nas/ /ji snyed dus ni rab tu 'das/ /gang duAng ba da ra yi gling/ /ming yang nges par ma thos so/ /bsod nams zong gis bdag gi ni/ /brtson pa'i grogs mchog gyur
34a2(mdo 'grel): pa gang/ /de yang las kyi dpa' rlabs kyis/ /dus min gngos pa chag pa bzhin/ /thabs nyams thabs ni 'di la yang/ /shin tu che ba'i 'bad rtsol gyis/ /bdag ni nges par rnam mi bzlog /grub pa 'am yang na shi bar gyur/ /'gro ba
34a3(mdo 'grel): gsum po 'dir skyes pa/ /gzhan la phan phyir srog dag ni/ /zad par gyur pa de gcig pu/ /skye 'gro rnams su mchod par 'os/ /der ni de ltar bsam 'khrugs de/ /snying stobs rgya mtshor shes gyur nas/ /ril gnas pa'i mchod sbyin ni//
34a4(mdo 'grel): sngon po zhes pa 'ongs nas smras/ /shar du dpag tshad phyin gyur nas/ /sa 'dzin rtse mo gsum pa ni/ /sa las byas pa'i them skas la/ /'dzegs la de nas 'gro bar gyis/ /de skad gnod sbyin gdams ngag gis/ /rin chen de yis rnam
34a5(mdo 'grel): bzal? bas/ /rtse mo shin tu mtho ba yi/ /shel gyis 'dzin mdun du mthong/ /bya rnams kyis kyang bgrod dka' ba/ /'jam pa'i brag ni gcig pu der/ /de yi yid la re ba ni/ /yud tsam bya ba med par gyur/ /shin tu mtho zhing
34a6(mdo 'grel): rten dang bral/ /rang gi rtogs bzhin g.yo med par/ /de la rnam dpyad yun ring de/ /ri mo bkod pa bzhin du gyur/ /de nas zla 'od ces pa yi/ /gnod sbyin brag gi phug gnas pa/ /snying stobs phun tshogs de la ni/ /mngon phyogs ya mtshan
34a7(mdo 'grel): ldan pas smras/ /'di nas shir? du rgyad grags tsam/ /song bas tsan dan nags tshal ni/ /rlung zhon gyis bskyod 'khri shing ldan/ /sngon med rnam 'phrul mthong bar 'gyur/ /der ni rab gsal byed ces pa/ /phug na gtams pa'i sman chen? pho/ /lus can
34b1(mdo 'grel): bsrung phyir rin chen la/ /rab tu btus pas 'thob par 'gyur/ /de yi 'od kyis snang byas pa'i/ /skas kyis shel gyi ril ni/ /'phral nyid du ni yang dag 'dzegs/ /'dod pa thob phyir 'gro par byos/ /sman chen de ni don byas bzhin/ /skad cig
34b2(mdo 'grel): gis ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa thob pa glog ltar g.yo/ /de phyir mya ngan bya ba min/ /de ltar sgrub byed gnod sbyin gyis/ /bstan pas de yis sa 'dzin dag/ /yang dag 'dzegs pas mdun du ni/ /gser gyi khang ldan grong khyer mthong/ /lhun po
34b3(mdo 'grel): brtsegs pas rgyas pa bzhin/ /rab gsal rnams kyi sprul pa bzhin/ /ngo mtshar kun gyis byas pa bzhin/ /de mthong ya mtshan ldan par gyur/ /grong khyer lam ni mi med cing/ /gser gyi sgo glegs chen po yis/ /de yi sgo ni bcad mthong nas/ /de ni
34b4(mdo 'grel): nags kyi mdza' na gnas/ /skabs 'dir nyin mo'i mthar gyur te/ /mdza' med mkha' lam lam bgrod pas/ /tsha zer can ni yongs ngal bzhin/ /nub kyi ri dang nye bar sleb/ /'od stong nub par gyur pa'i tshe/ /mngon par 'gro ba mun can ma/ /rgyu skar bdag
34b5(mdo 'grel): po 'dod gyur nas/ /dal bus rab tu 'gro ba bzhin/ /de nas rab gsal 'byor pa yis/ /phyogs kun yongs rdzogs gyen du phyogs/ /dri med byang chub sems dpa' bzhin/ /bdud rtsi'i 'od de shar bar gyur/ /mun pa'i tshogs ni ma lus pa/ /rab tu zhi bar nus shing
34b6(mdo 'grel): rgyas/ /yid ni dangs byed zla ba'i 'ong/ /snying stobs spyod tshul bzhin du mdzes/ /nyin bral las skyes phyogs rnams kyi/ /mun pa'i rmongs pa zla bas phrogs/ /gang phyir ring na bzhugs pa yi/ /bdag nyid che rnams gzhan phan mchog/ zla ba'i zer gyis
34b7(mdo 'grel): shin tu dga' / /skad cig lus ni khengs gyur nas/ /bya ba'i rgya mtsho na rlabs dag/ 'khrug pa'i rgya ni gnyid thob gyur/ /mtshan mo zad par gyur pa'i tshe/ /yon tan yon gyis gus bcas pa/ /mthu chen lha yis rmi lam du/ /de la mngon par phyogs nas
35a1(mdo 'grel): smras/ /e ma kwa ye snying stobs can/ /de nyid dam pa'i mngon zhen pa/ /legs byas khyod kyis ngal du ba ni/ /gzhan gyi don du rgya chen byas/ /nyon mongs lhag ma chung ngu 'dir/ /yid ni 'byung bar mi 'os so/ /snying stobs dman pa
35a2(mdo 'grel): med rnams kyi/ /rang dbang nyid du thams cad 'grub/ /gser gyi grong khyer gang 'di dang/ /gsum ni pha rol gzhan dang gzhan/ /gong nas gong du rnam par bkra/ 'di na rin chen grong khyer yod/ /khyod kyis sgo ni brdungs pa na/ /de dag las ni mi 'am ci//
35a3(mdo 'grel): bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu drug dang/ /so gnyis rim pas phyir 'byung 'gyur/ /khyod kyis dbang po thul ba yis/ /de yi bag med rig par bya/ /ring po min par 'dod pa dag /'thob par 'gyur te gzhan pa ci/ /lha mos gus bcas 'di brjod la/ /de nas
35a4(mdo 'grel): rab sad shin tu dags/ /grong khyer sgo la mngon phyogs te/ /lag pa yis ni lan gsum brdungs/ /de nas mi 'am ci mo bzhi/ /g.yo ba'i rlung gis bskyod pa yis/ /ngo mtshar ljon pa'i snye ma bzhin/ /yid ni rangs par byed gyur cing/ /'dren byed ngag
35a5(mdo 'grel): gi bdud rtsi'i char/ /bzhin ras zla ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /nyin mo'ang zla 'od ldan par byas/ /dga' bas mthong des shin tu dga' / /'dod pa rgya cher yang dag mchod/ /de ni mngon par 'dod pa yis/ /mdza' bos mgron gces bzhin du byas/ /zla
35a6(mdo 'grel): ba chu shel stan 'khod pa /de la dran pa 'tsho ba'i sman/ /lus dang bcas par skyes pa bzhin/ /stan ni bzung byas de dag gis/ /rtse dga' dgod pa'i 'od zer dag /yang dag rgyas par gyur pa ni/ /mdza' ba'i phrad skyes ga bur dag/
35a7(mdo 'grel): sngon du ster ba bzhin du smras/ /yon tan dam pas brgyan pa'i dbyibs/ /khyed can 'ong bar 'os pa yang/ /gang gi khyim du rang nyid 'ongs/ /kye ma bdag cag bsod nams can/ /bdud rtsi la ni su zhig sdang/ /tsan dan la ni su mi sred/ /zla ba
35b1(mdo 'grel): la ni su gus dman/ /dam pa rnams la su mi 'dod/ /gang yang bud med rang nyid ni/ /gleng bskal bzang nyams pa'i rgyu/ /de lta na yang khyod mthong ba nyid kyis mu cor byas phyir smra/ /mi 'am ci yi grong khyer 'di/ /bdag cag dang bcas mdza' bas ster/ /legs
35b2(mdo 'grel): par brjod ldan rin chen yang/ /dge ba khyed kyi rang dbang nyid/ /de skad de dag rnams kyi tshig /mdza' bar 'os thos shin tu dags/ /so yi zla 'od snying stobs ltar/ /rab tu dkar ba spro zhing smras/ /phebs par smra ba'i bdud rtsi 'di/ /su yi gus mang gnas ma
35b3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /khyed rnams dag gis gus byas pa/ bdag gi yan ni gus pa'i gnas/ /'di mthong nyid ni bsngags par 'os/ /de la'ang rjes su 'dzin pa 'di/ /mu tig 'khri shing gdung sel la/ /tsan dan gyis kyang byugs sam ci/ /rnam pa 'di lta'i dri med dag/
35b4(mdo 'grel): zla pa'i 'od bzhin gyur pa dang/ /rnam pa 'jig rten spyod tshul ni/ /yang dag rigs shing mdzes pa yin/ /rigs shing mdzes pa'i sbyong ba dang/ /rab tu dang shin dri med yid/ /mnyes gshin pa dang 'jam pa'i tshig /su yi gus pa'i sa ma yin/ /mchod
35b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i yo byed 'os gyur pa'i/ /kun spyod 'di ni bdag gis blang/ /bud med gzhan dbang yin pa'i slad/ /khyad kyang bdag nyid sbyin mi 'so/ /gzhon nu ma dngos las 'das pa/ /khyod ni gzhan gyis yongs su bzung/ /byams shing gus pas ma dang ni/ /phebs pas
35b6(mdo 'grel): bdag gi sring mo yin/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi 'byor pa dug /gzhan gyi bud med ma dang ni/ /gzhan 'cha bdag nyid 'tshe ba nyid/ /de dag phyogs ni gnod pa med/ /phra ma rdzun dang tshig rtsub dang/ /bkyal pa smra pa spangs pa'i tshig /gang gi kha na rtag pa nyid/ /de
35b7(mdo 'grel): dag phyogs rnams kun tu shis/ /gang zhig brnab sems bral ba'i sems/ /gnod sems dag ni yongs su spangs/ /log par lta bas dman gyur pa/ /de dag legs pa'i lam la brten/ /mi dge bcu yi lam dag las/ /nges par log
36a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin can/ /de dag dge ba'i sde rnams kyis/ /bkag pa med pa'i mtho ris lam/ /nor gyis mtho ba rnams kyi nor ni blo gros nyid/ /dbang pos rnam rgyal rnams kyi mig ni rig pa nyid/ /skyes bu mchog gyur rnams kyi bsod nams
36a2(mdo 'grel): brtse ba nyid/ /yid ni gtsang ba rnams kyi 'jug dog bdag nyid do/ /skyes bu rnams kyi rnam pa de lta'i yon tan dag /legs gnas 'di ni khrims kyi dri ma med par 'gyur/ /rin chen mu tig dam pa'i tshogs las shin tu lhag/ tshul khrims
36a3(mdo 'grel): dag ni dam pa rnams kyi rgyan du brjod/ /sems can don gnyer dbang po thul ba de yis ni/ /yon tan rjes mthun de skad brjod pa thos gyur nas/ /tshim par gyur cing lteng mo'i don bzhin mkha' las ni/ /zla ba'i 'jig rten sa la spro zhing de yis smras
36a4(mdo 'grel): nor bu bzhin du yon tan rab 'bar rin thang med/ /dge ba khyod kyi mdzes pa'i 'od ni mthong gyur pa/ /gang zhig mgo dang rna ba snying ka nyid la yang/ /rtag par ngam pa rnams kyis rgyan du khyod nyid bgyis/ /bdag nyid dang mnyam grags pa'i mthu ldan
36a5(mdo 'grel): rin thang che/ /nor bu 'di ni khyod kyis rab tu bzung bar mdzod/ /gang zhig rgyal mtshan la bzhag dpag tshad stong phrag tu/ /slong ba rnams kyi 'dod pa char du 'bab par 'gyur/ /de skad brjod nas rin chen rab mchog gzhon nu mas/ /rab tu dang ba
36a6(mdo 'grel): gzugs can bzhin du de la byin/ /des kyang de ni mdza' ba'i nye bar spyod pas blangs/ /dngul las byas pa'i grong khyer dag ni gnyis par phyin/ /de ni gus pas de yi nyis 'gyur dag gi ni/ /mi 'am ci mo rnams kyis de la mchod pa byas/ /rim
36a7(mdo 'grel): pa de dag nyid kyi rnam dag blo gros kyis/ /de yi nyis 'gyur mthu ldan nor bu theb par 'gyur/ /de nas gsum pa'i grong khyer bai DUrya rang bzhin/ /mdzes pa'i mig can bcu drug de dag de yis mthong/ /de dag rnams la de bzhin nyid du nor bu ni//
36b1(mdo 'grel): de yi nyis 'gyur mthu ldan rim gro dam pas thob/ /de nas mdun du rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin gyi/ /grong khyer grong khyer kun las lhag pa'i dpal ldan pa/ /bzhi par phyin de mi 'am ci ni mdzes ma de'i/ /nyis 'gyur dag gis yon tan lhag pas de don
36b2(mdo 'grel): gnyer/ /legs bsdams de yis de bzhin nyid du dam chos kyi/ /gtam dag zhar la byung bas tshim gyur de dag ni/ /rab rgyas utpal sngon po'i phreng ba ltar ring ba'i/ /zur mig gis 'phangs 'od dang ldan pas de la smras/ /rin chen 'byung gnas
36b3(mdo 'grel): zla ba ba da ra zhes pa/ nged kyi ming po mi'am ci yi rgyal rigs yod/ /rdzu 'phrul yongs kyis rang gi ming gis mtshan gyur pa/ /rin thang che ba'i gling 'di de yi bzhugs gnas yin/ /'od zer tshogs ni gsal ldan rin chen 'di yang bsod nams
36b4(mdo 'grel): rten rnams kyis/ /gso sbyong zhes bya'i brtul zhugs nges pa'i cho ga rgyal mtshan la bkod na/ /'dzam bu'i gling du mdza' dag 'gro tshogs mngon 'dod don rnams char nyid 'bebs/ /gzhan don brtan par gyur pas khyab par bgyid slad de ni
36b5(mdo 'grel): gzung bar mdzod/ /de ltar mdzes ma rnams kyis 'chi med shing 'bras legs btus gus bcas shing/ /lhag par mdza' sdug ldan pas skal bzang nor bu byin pa blangs byas nas/ /mgyogs 'gro rab dga' sprin shugs zhes bya rlung las rgyal
36b6(mdo 'grel): ba la zhon te/ /de yi lam gyi gdams ngag thob pas de yang rang gi grong khyer song/ /dus tshod der ni dri med grags ldan sa yi bdag po tshangs pas byin/ /yangs pa'i dge bas mtho ris lam du rab gshegs ba ra NA si ru/ /dpal ldan 'jig
36b7(mdo 'grel): rten bskyab blo rnams bskrun slong ba kun gyi 'bras bu ster/ /shin tu dga' ni grong khyer gtso bos chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bskur/ /de nas mgo bkru cho ga'i rim pa yis/ /gso sbyong dag la nyer gnas bco lnga la/ /rin po che de rgyal 
37a1(mdo 'grel): mtshan rtser btags nas/ /sna tshogs 'dod pas yongs su gang bar byas/ /gzhan la phan pas 'bras bu ldan bar gshegs bgrod byas shing lo brgyar ni/ /rgyal srid chen po la gnas 'jig rten mdza' dag khengs byas mi bdag
37a2(mdo 'grel): gi/ gnas la sras bzhag nye bar shi ba thams cad thob cing de nyid shes/ /gang yang 'di ni tshangs pa'i dngos po dam pa dag tu gshegs par gyur/ /rin chen gling du mngon bgrod pa/ /shin tu dga' yi skye ba der/ /gang sngon bdag gis khengs byas pa/ /chos
37a3(mdo 'grel): rkun de kun 'di dag go/ /de skad ston pa gtso bo yis/ /rang gi spyod tshul mdza' yi gtam/ /sbyin dang brtson 'grus man ngag gis/ /dge slong rnams la rjes bstan bsgrubs/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag
37a4(mdo 'grel): bsam gyi 'khri shing las khang? ra'i gling du 'gro ba'i yal 'dab ste drug pa'o// //dge ba'i smon lam dag pa'i gzi brjid dang/ /dben pa dri med snang ba'i rtogs byed ldan/ /gang zhig yongs su bsgrags pa tsam nyid na/ /srid ba'i rmongs 'phrog de
37a5(mdo 'grel): nyid bsngags par 'os/ /grong khyer ser skya zhes par ni/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi nags tshal gnas/ /sngon tshe 'khor ni stong phrag la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan mdzad/ /mi dman kun dga' i tshogs kyi bcud/ /tsan dan ltar bsil de yi ni//
37a6(mdo 'grel): gsung gi bdud rtsi gsan pa yi/ /snyims pas bsod nams ldan pas 'thungs/ /chos ni nyan pa'i tshogs pa der/ /rgyal po zas ni gtsang ma yis/ /bsod nams nye bar bstan pa'i chus/ /dri ma dang bral dga' ba thob/ /de nas
37a7(mdo 'grel): rgyal rigs las skyes pa/ /shAkya ming chen dag gis der/ /chos kyi gdams dag thos gyur nas/ /rang gi khyim du phyin te smras/ /kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di/ /bdag cag gis ni don chen la/ /bcom ldan sangs rgyas chos dang
37b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /dge 'dun grub dang myang 'di'i slad/ /de yi tshig de thos gyur nas/ /khyim thab zla 'od gdams dag gi/ khyad par thob pas dga' ba dang/ /don du gnyer las de la smras/ /skyes bu bsod nams skal ldan rnams/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes
37b2(mdo 'grel): bzung 'os/ /bdag cag bud med smad 'os rnams/ /de yi man ngag 'os ma yin/ /de skad khyim thab tshig thos nas/ /des smras bzang mo bcom ldan 'das/ /'gro ba'i? bla ma'i snying rje yi/ /gzigs pa dag la dbye ba med/ /kun la nyi ma'i 'od
37b3(mdo 'grel): zer snyoms/ /chu 'dzin dag gis char pa snyoms/ /sems can kun la thugs brtse ba/ /bcom ldan 'das gyis gzigs pa snyoms/ /skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo yi/ /tshig gi phyi dro khyod kyi skabs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du ni/ /rgyal po
37b4(mdo 'grel): zas gtsang byed pa nyid/ /de skad bdag po'i tshig gi snyan gyis/ /shAkya'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod nams nags/ /gtsang ma der ni de song gyur/ /der ni snying stobs dpag bsam shing/ /snying stobs me tog 'bras
37b5(mdo 'grel): bu che/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bdud rtsi yis/ /yang dag bran pa de yis mthong/ /rlung gis dud pa'i 'khri shing bzhin/ /de yis ring nas der phyag 'tshal/ /rna rgyan g.yo ba'i zol gyis ni/ /rmongs pa yongs su gtong ba bzhin/ /gser 'od rin chen rgyan
37b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis/ /brgyan pa dag ni mthong gyur nas/ /dge slong kun dga' po zhes pas/ /shin tu phan brtson de la smras/ /ma mkhyod gyi cha lugs 'di/ /dregs pas rgyags zhing rab zhis stong/ /thub pa'i dka' thub nags su ni/ /mi rigs 'di na tshigs
37b7(mdo 'grel): bral gnas/ /yon tan gyis bsdams chags pa yi/ /mu cor rgyan rnams kye ma 'dir/ /bdag cag gzung bar mi 'os shes/ /khyod la nye bar 'doms pa bzhin/ /de yis 'di brjod gzugs bzang de/ /skyengs pa'i gdong ni dman pa yis/ /rgyan
38a1(mdo 'grel): rnams thams cad bkrol nas ni/ /rang gi khyim du bskur bar gyur/ /de nas thams cad 'khod pa la/ /dge ba ston mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /dngos po mi rtag pa nyid du/ /nye bar ston pa'i rtsom pa mdzad/ /gang gis rtag tu mi rtag nyid/ /rtag pa
38a2(mdo 'grel): nyid bzhin 'gro bar ni/ /srog chags rmongs pas 'dzin byed pa/ /'di ni rmongs pa'i mthu chen no/ /bden par yid ches rmongs pa yis/ /'jig rten mi bden pa la dga' / /dngos po kun gyi dngos med ni/ /nyams myong gnas pa rig pa med/ /skye ba'i
38a3(mdo 'grel): thos pa'i lam du yang dag chags ldan kha cig sgra yi bstan bcos dag dang ni/ /gzhan ni rig byed lam dang rtog ge rtsod pas gzhan te kha cig rgyud ni yongs 'dzin dang/ /gzhan dag rnam mang sgyu rtsal mkhas dang lhan cig nyid du 'jig par 'gyur ba'i
38a4(mdo 'grel): skad cig gnas/ /de la yang ni mi 'jigs pa bzhin rol rtsed dag gi rmongs rnams dga' ba rab tu 'dzin/ /mi bzad yul gyi gnod pa'i lus ni nyon mongs phung po dag gi gnas/ /rab rmongs las byung srid pa rab rtsub mya ngam thar gi rnam par gsal//
38a5(mdo 'grel): mdza' dang bral ba'i srid pa'i nad 'di ji ltar rnam par ldog 'gyur ba/ /de ltar bya dang bya min phan pa'i sa la rnam dpyod ldan pas dpyad/ /bcom ldan rang nyid 'di la sogs/ /'du byed mi rtag yang dag ldan/ /chos kyi gdams ngag dge ba ni//
38a6(mdo 'grel): rigs bar gsung bar brtson pa'i tshe/ /de ni shAkya'i bu mo gcig/ bu mo gzhon nu ma yi mtshams/ /bzod dka' i lang tshol gnas pa/ /gzugs dang skal bzang nyid kyis bregs/ /nu ma'i ngos su mu tig gi/ do shal dga' ba'i bdag po
38a7(mdo 'grel): yi/ /grags pa'i snying po gsal 'dra la/ /zur mig g.yo bas yang dag bltas/ /ming chen chung ma zla 'od kyis/ /rtse gcig min pa'i sems ldan de/ /do shal rnam par blta ba dag/ mthong nas chags bral bzhin du bsams/ /chos ni nye
38b1(mdo 'grel): bar ston tshe yang/ /g.yo ba'i do shal 'di la lta/ /dngos po rnams kyi skad cig ma/ /'di dag rmongs pas mi nyan nyid/ /rang gi do shal bstan nas 'di/ /do shal spro ba bdag gis dbrog/ lhag pa mthong ba kho na yis/ /lus can dregs pa zhi bar gyur//
38b2(mdo 'grel): 'di bsams de yis 'bangs mo ni/ /ro hi ta zhes bya ba la smras/ /ro hi ta song bdag gi ni/ /do shal khyim nas mgyogs su long/ /de yis de skad brjod pas de/ /der ni chos mnyan la zhugs pa/ /dus min 'gro bas yid byung nas/ /shugs dang bcas
38b3(mdo 'grel): pas skad cig bsams/ /kye ma bdag gi dge ba 'dir/ /bar chod 'di ni yang dag skyes/ /gang phyir gzhan dbang 'tsho gyur pa/ /bdag gis chos nyan mi 'thob po/ /bsod nams dri bzang rgyas gyur cing/ /snying rje'i ge sar 'khrigs gyur pa/ /bcom
38b4(mdo 'grel): ldan zhal gyi padmo las/ /gsung gi sbrang rtsi mchog gis 'thob/ /kye ma rang dbang rnam par gcod/ /lus 'jig bde ba nyams byed pa/ /sdug bsngal 'gro bar srog chags rnams/ /g.yog ni sdug bsngal brgyud ma yin/ /g.yog gis ngal dub
38b5(mdo 'grel): kyis thob pa/ /gla rngan? bya dga' i chu yi thigs/ /shugs ring shin tu tsha bas bskol/ /kye ma dka' slad dag gis 'thung/ /dpon po mthong na khengs nyams shing/ /yon tan nyams dang gzi brjid mchod/ /zhi zhing ngal ba 'di dag ni/ /g.yog byed
38b6(mdo 'grel): dag gi dang po'i 'bras/ /g.yog ni rkang pa 'ching ba'i lcags kyi lcags sgrog zhum zhing nga rgyal 'chags pa'i sa/ /rtag tu nges par rang gi bya ba 'gog cing gnyid dang bde ba 'joms par byed/ /re ba'i chags zhen tshogs kyi lam dang legs 'grogs
38b7(mdo 'grel): longs spyod kyi ni rdo rje dang/ /rmongs pa rnams kyi ri dags skom skyed mya ngan sa? gzhi lus ni zad byed yin/ /de ltar yun ring bsams nas ni/ /de yi bka' yis de song ste/ /lus ni g.yog tu btsongs rnams la/ /rang dgar gnas pa ga la yod//
39a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyis bskul bas dman gyur cing/ /'gro ba de ni bcom ldan 'das/ /snying rje rgyas pa'i lha yi ni?/ /spyan gyis gzigs nas skad cig bsams/ /skye ba 'di la 'di yi ni/ /'tsho ba'i mtshams lhag yongs su rdzogs//
39a2(mdo 'grel): sdug ma 'di ni 'khor ba las/ /bdag rang nyid kyis gdon par bya/ /de nas las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /lam du 'phral la bgreng de la/ /be'u la chags rmongs bcas pa'i/ /ba yi ru yis brdung par gyur/ /skye ba gzhan gyi lhag gnas kyis//
39a3(mdo 'grel): yid ni sangs rgyas la dmigs shing/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin las/ /de yi rang bzhin dran des? bsams /'khor ba chu srin 'byung gnas kyi/ /skye ba'i 'khor mor srog chags rnams/ /las kyi rba rlabs kyis dkrugs pas//
39a4(mdo 'grel): kye ma 'byid zhing 'byung ba'i rim/ /skyes bu rnams kyi dpral ba yangs pa'i jo yi glegs bu la/ /bde med las kyi sprul pa gsal ba'i rtags can gzod dag gis/ /skye dang 'chi ba rab spros yi ge dag tu bkod gyur pa/ /'di dag rnams
39a5(mdo 'grel): ni lag pas yongs su phyis pas bskyed pa min/ /gang gis mngal nas brtsams te rim gyis lhung rang rga dang 'jig pa'i dus rnams dag/ gang ? ni lus kyi rtsis/ /ris gzhan pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin pa/ /las kyi dbang gis mi
39a6(mdo 'grel): rnams dag gi rab mang srang bas rnam par bkra ba dag/ bkod pa 'di ni rma bya'i sgro yi tshogs dang mtshungs par yongs su smin par 'gyur/ /da ltar bsams te sngon du nye bar gnas skabs bzang po dang po'i rnam gzhag rab gnas pa//
39a7(mdo 'grel): mi bzad 'bangs mo'i dngos po brnag pas skyengs bar gyur ba bzhin du g.yo ba med nyid gyur/ /smon lam khang pa dkar po dam pa'i chos kyis dag pa'i blo ni yongs su gzung byas nas/ /'khor ba dag tu smongs? par byed pas dri ma can
39b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin de yi srog ni btang bar gyur/ /de nas mtho ris phun tshogs te/ /sing? gal yi gling du de/ /'o ma'i rgya mtshor zla ba yi/ /ri mo bzhin du rab gsal skyes/ /de ni mngal zhugs skyes ba'i dus/ /mkha' las mu tig char pa g.yos/ /sing ga la
39b2(mdo 'grel): bdag bu? ma de/ /mu tig 'gri? shing zhes par gyur/ /de ni che bar skyes pa yis/ /bsod nams bzhin du 'jo sgeg 'dzin/ /yan lag rnams kyi rnam 'byed kyi /cho ga shes bzhin du lang tsho thob /de nas nam zhig mnyan yod kyi/ /grong khyer ba yi tshed
39b3(mdo 'grel): ba rnams/ /chu srin 'byung gnas rab bsgral nas/ /sing gal yi gling du song/ /de ni de dag mtshan mo'i mthar/ /rab sad ngal bsos dga' ba yis/ /chos don tshig bcad kyis bcings pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs glu ru blangs/ /pho brang ba gam
39b4(mdo 'grel): la gnas pa/ /mi bdag bu mos rna ba yis/ /bdud rtsi de thos de dag rnams/ /bkug ste 'di dag ci zhes dris/ /rab dga' ldan ma de la nges/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can kun la thugs brtse bas/ /rang bzhin du 'os
39b5(mdo 'grel): gsungs zhes smras/ /sangs rgyas mngon brjod thos nyid kyis/ /de ni spu? long gis rgyan lus/ /yang dag rig pa legs ldan mthu/ /rab tu bskyed pa'i sa gzhir gyur/ /sgra ni sprin gyi lta bu yis/ /rma bya bzhin du de rangs nas/ /sangs rgyas
39b6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan zhes pa 'di/ /su zhes yang ni de la smras?/ /de nas de la dang po zhag?/ bskyed par gus ba de dag gis/ /bsod nams rang bzhin bcom ldan gyi/ /spyod pa'i lugs ni ma lus smras/ /de nas de yi gtam gyis de/ /sngar skyes dge ba
39b7(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa thob/ /bcom ldan slad? du gsol ba yi/ /sbring yig de dag rnams la? bskur/ /dus kyis chu gter yang dag bsgral/ /rang gi grong khyer thob nas des/ /bdag nyid tshal phyag 'tshal te/ /de yi gtam bshad spring yig phul/ /thams cad mkhyen
40a1(mdo 'grel): pa bcom ldan gyis/ /de ni sngon nyid mkhyen gyur kyang/ /mu tig 'khri shing la brtse bas/ /rang nyid kyis ni spring yig bklags/ /kye ma bsod nams chod zod dag gis rnyed bar gyur pa khyod ni dran pa nyid/ /rgud dang gdung ba dang ni sbed pa
40a2(mdo 'grel): 'joms pa'i srid pa'i sgran ngar? ci yang yin/ /bcom ldan las byung gtam gyi rim pas nyer bskrun yang dag rig pa myong ba'i pa/ /bcom ldan 'di de bdag gi bdud rtsi yang dag bgo skal chen por gyur pa yin/ /de ltar mdor bsdus spring yig don//
40a3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan rang gis rtogs gyur nas/ /cung zad 'dzum ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs kyis sems can rab gsal mdzad/ /de nas 'od tshogs rjes rgyas shing/ /ri mo mkhan gyis mi nus pa'i/ /rang gi sku gzugs ras la bkod/ /bcom ldan gyis
40a4(mdo 'grel): ni de la springs/ /de yi bka' yis phyi nas yang/ /tshong pa de dag gzings la zho na/ /sing gal yi gling phyin nas/ /de la thang sku rab tu bstan/ /gser gyi seng ge'i khri bkod pa'i/ /ras la de bzhin gshegs mthong nas/ /de las byung ba'i
40a5(mdo 'grel): bsam gtam gyis/ /skye bo dgongs pa gcig bzhin gyur/ /de yi 'og na bris ba ni/ /bsod nams kyis thob mthong gyur pa/ /skyabs su 'gro ba gsum dag dang?/ /bslab pa'i gnas ni lnga yang ngo/ /lugs las 'byung dang bzlog bcas
40a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung dang bcas/ /de bzhin 'phags 'am yan lag brgyad/ /mchog gi bdud rtsis rdzogs gyur ba'o/ /de yi steng du legs bshad ni/ /gser gyi yi ge nas mdzes par/ /dgongs pa mnyam gzhag bcom ldan
40a7(mdo 'grel): 'das ka rang gi bkod bas mdzes gyur ba/ /skye dang 'chi ba'i nyon mongs kyis btab gdung ba drag po rab rgyas dag/ mi ? yul ni g.yo ba'i sprul gyi phreng bas dkris shing dkrugs gyur ba/ /rang rib? rab rgyas rab rmongs phug gi khang? pa? 'di
40b1(mdo 'grel): las phyir thon la/ /sangs rgyas chos la skyabs su song zhig der ni srid la 'jigs pa med/ /dag byed rgyal ba'i sku gzugs la/ /sa yi bdag po'i bu mos bltas/ /thog med dus nas bsags pa yi/ /mi shes bag chags btang bar gyur/ /rab mtho
40b2(mdo 'grel): gser zhun lta bu mdzes pa'i sku/ /phrag mdzes dpung pa pus mo'i bar mngon dga' / /bsam gtan la chags phyed ni zum pa'i spyan/ /mdzes sdug rgyun bzhin rab tu mtho ba'i shangs/ /ngo bo nyid kyis mdzes par rtogs bya ba/ /rgyan med snyan gyi
40b3(mdo 'grel): zhags pa ring du 'phyang/ /thun mtshams sprin chags lha yi ri bo bzhin/ /lo 'dab gsar pa ltar dmar na bzas mtshan/ /'od kyis phyogs la tshul khrims ston pa bzhin/ /zhal gyi zla bas kun dga' sbyin par brtson/ /bzod pa'i yon tan sa
40b4(mdo 'grel): la slob pa bzhin/ /bsod nams las skyes skal bzang lan gsum du/ /bskor nas btud pas rna ba'i utpal dag /'phyang ba mkhur chos la reg des mthong nas/ /snying po med pa'i lus la lta ba spangs/ /bden pa'i mthu ni dam pa skyes par gyur//
40b5(mdo 'grel): rgyun tu yang dag zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dag /rab tu gsal byas de tshe byang chub thob/ /de yis bde gshegs mthur ni rnam bsam shing/ /ya mtshan dga' ba'i sa yis mngon par smras/ /kye ma rmongs pa'i mun chen 'phrog byed pa'i/ /de bzhin
40b6(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa 'od dang ldan pa'i sku/ /ring da gnas kyang rnam par rgyas pa yis/ /dpal 'di dge ba'i chu skyes dag la ster/ /skad cig gis ni srid bsgral dam pa yis/ /smon lam thob cing nang gi byed rab dang/ /kye ma sred pa'i yongs gdung zhi
40b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i slad/ /zhi ba'i bdud rtsi'i chu bo rab 'phyung bzhin/ /'di brjod de yis bcom ldan la/ /mu tig rin chen rnams kyi skyes/ /dge 'dun mchod slad tshong pa yi/ /skye bo la bskur btang bar gyur/ /de dag chu gter che sgrol nas/ /bcom ldan 
41a1(mdo 'grel): 'das kyi drung du phyin/ /de yi mu tig rin chen tshogs/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni de la phul/ /der ni tshong pas de yi gtam/ /bshad pa thos nas dge slong ni/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya bas dris/ /de nas bcom ldan rgyal bas gsungs//
41a2(mdo 'grel): gang 'di shAkya'i khyim du sngon/ /ro hi ta zhes 'bangs mor gyur/ /de nyid mu tig 'khri shing du/ /smon lam dam pa'i las kyis skyes/ /nor chen zhes pa'i tshod pa ni/ /ba ra NA sir sngon byung gyur/ /de yis khyim thab bsod nams can/ /rin chen ldan zhes
41a3(mdo 'grel): bya bar gyur/ /dbang po lnga pa nyid gyur tsho/ /bud med de yis mchod rten rtser/ /do shal chen po gus ldan pas/ /mchod pa byas nas phul bar gyur/ /bsod nams rnam smin des de nyid/ /sing ga la yi bdag po yin /bu mo mu tig 'khri shing gyur/ /
41a4(mdo 'grel): yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'ang thob/ /de nyid skye ba gzhan la ni/ /phyug pas rgyags shing rmongs gyur nas/ /mchod la smod cing sgrin gyur pa/ /de yis yun rings 'bangs mor gyur/ /dge dang mi dge'i las gang gang/ skye ba'i zhing la skye bos btab
41a5(mdo 'grel): de dang de yi rang bzhin de/ /yongs su smin pa'i 'bras bu spyod/ /dge ba mdza' dag rtsa bgrags pa'i me tog dpal rab 'bar/ /legs spyad 'bras bu'i tshogs bskyad chos kyi 'khri shing mi rnams kyi/ /sdig dang nyon mongs rtsa ba 'khrul zhing ltung
41a6(mdo 'grel): dad rmongs pha dang/ /mdza' yas yongs su gdung gyur dug gi 'khri shing dag kyang yin/ /rab rtsub mya ngan du gsal 'khor ba'i lam ni shin tu gdung ba 'dir/ /drag por rjes su gdung ldan sdig pa sdig pa bor cig skye bo dag/ rtag tu bsod nams
41a7(mdo 'grel): bsod nams mdzod cig bsod nams bsten pa rnams dag gi/ bsod nams bdud rtsis bran ba'i bsod nams grib bsil shing gi sa gzhi bsil/ /de ltar smon lam dam pa'i 'bras/ /bshad pa yis ni gdams ngag 'di/ /dge slong rnams ni gus
41b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i slad/ /bcom ldan rang gi mdzad pa yin/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas ba'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtoD pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las mu tig 'khri shing gi rtogs pa brjod ba'i yal 'dab ste bdun ba'o// //bsam pa rigs pa rnams
41b2(mdo 'grel): kyi thugs dag ni/ /gnod pa byed pa la'ang snying rje rgyas/ /drag por gyur pa la yang 'dab ltar mnyen/ /zhe sdang tsha gdung la yang shin tu bsil/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces pa/ /lha yi grong ltar rgya cher sngon/ /khyim bdag dpal sbas zhes bya ba/ /nor
41b3(mdo 'grel): byin lta bur byung bar gyur/ /skye bo legs la sdang zhing dregs/ /yon tan rnams la gus pa btang/ /rtag tu nor gyis rgyags myos te/ /dam pa rnams kyi blo la rgod/ /sra zhing shin tu 'khyogs pa dang/ /stong zhing mu cor sgrog pa yi/ /dung nyid la
41b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin mi srun la/ /dpal 'byor yon du sten bar byed/ /de la nam zhig zad byed ba/ /bla ma mi srun mnyen gyi bus/ /dben par dman pa'i gtam la chags/ /bsod nams dag la sdad las smras/ /gang 'di bya rgod spungs zhes pa'i/ /ril dge slong lnga
41b5(mdo 'grel): brgyas bskor/ /bde gshegs kun mkhyen zhes grags shing/ /'gro gsum mchod bya nyid gyur pa/ /'di yi rdzu 'phrul mchog dag ni/ /ci yang bdag gis ma dmigs te/ /'on kyang blun pos bcom ldan 'das/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes mtho ba thob/ /
41b6(mdo 'grel): rtag tu rnam par ma dpyad nyid/ /pha rol brjod pa'i rjes su brjod/ /skye bo phal cher grag pa yi/ /lam du song ba'i rjes su 'gro/ de yi brtul zhugs la sogs kyis/ /nges ba tshul 'chos nyid du rtogs/ /chu skyar mi smra rkang gcig gi/ brtul
41b7(mdo 'grel): zhugs bzung nas nya rnams za/ /des na nye bar bgam pa'i slad/ /de la bslu ba 'ga' zhig bgyi/ /g.yo sgyu can rnams sgyu ma yis/ /rmongs nas gzhan yang yongs sim 'gyur/ /de yis de skad brjod thos nas/ /las kyi rmongs pa'i dpal sbras
42a1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /sdig pa'i g.yang la mchod pa'i slad/ /de yis bstan pa'i rigs pa yis/ /khyim du gsang dong seng ldeng gi/ sol ba rab 'bar gyis khengs dang/ /dug ldan zas kyang byas nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis drung du song/ /rdzun gyis bskrun
42a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i gus pa yis/ /de yis zas la mgron du song/ /thams cad rnam rig kun mkhyen gyis/ /de bzhin no zhes 'dzum bcas gsungs/ /dug dang me sbyor la 'khros pa'i/ /khyim thab chos ni smra ba mo/ /gros ni zags su dogs pa yis/ /dpal spas
42a3(mdo 'grel): kyis ni khyim du bcings/ /de nas spyod tshul mkhyen gyur kyang/ /'gro pas phyag 'os gdong bzhi sogs/ /lha rnams kyis ni phyag 'tshal zhing/ /bcom ldan rang nyid gshegs par gyur/ /dpal sbas kyis ni brtsams pa ste/ /grong khyer dag tu skye
42a4(mdo 'grel): bos rig/ sdig can rnams kyi sdig pa ni/ /shin tu sbas kyang phyogs rnams rgyug/ de nas dge bsnyen dag gcig ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs te/ /me dang dug la sems byed cing/ /zhabs la rab tu gtugs nas smras/ /rdzun gyis phyag
42a5(mdo 'grel): 'tshal snyan par smra/ /gsang nas me dang dug zas ster/ /bcom ldan rab tu 'bad pa yis/ /skye bo ngan 'di yongs btang 'os/ /dogs pas snyan smra la brten nas/ /'phags pa min rnams dbugs 'byin byed/ /gang phyir sbrang rtsis kha byugs pa'i/ /spu gri
42a6(mdo 'grel): mid na rgyu ma gcod/ /yon tan la sdang mi srun bas/ /yon tan can gzhan bstod mi bzod/ /gang gis dam pa dgyes 'gyur nyid/ /de yis skye bo ngan pa khro/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mi bdag gis/ /'dab brgya rnam par rgyas byed khyod/ /sgra gcan
42a7(mdo 'grel): 'di yi gnas thob na/ /'gro ba long ba min pa ci/ /de nas bcom ldan cung zad ni/ /'dzum ba'i zer dkar dag gis de'i/ /gnod pa mi bzad rab rib dag/ ring nas yongs su sel bzhin gsungs/ /bd+dag gi lus la mes reg dang/ /dug gis
42b1(mdo 'grel): kyang ni tshugs pa min/ /gzhan la sdang bas dbul rnams la/ /skyon gyis kyang ni nyer 'tshe med/ /gang gis sems ni mi khro bsil/ /zhi ba'i bdud rtsis bran gyur pa/ /de la me yis ci bya ste/ /yul gyi dgra la dug gis kyang/ /zhe sdang skyon gyis gzir
42b2(mdo 'grel): ba la/ /bdud rtsi dug nyid bzhin du spyod/ /me tog rdo rje bzhin du spyod/ /tsan dan sreg byed bzhin du spyod/ /byang chub sems dpa' i go 'phang gnas/ /snying rje byams ba dag dang ldan/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas song gyur kyang/ /lus ni me yis mi 'tshig go/ ka
42b3(mdo 'grel): ling ka yi mi bdag sngon/ /ri dwags tshogs rnams 'joms pa la/ /yang dag brtson pas dum bu'i gling/ /zhes pa'i nags tshal sregs par gyur/ /nags tshal rab tu 'bar ba der/ /bye'u ti ti ri gcig pu/ /byams pas byang chub la dmigs pas/ /sreg byed
42b4(mdo 'grel): rab tu zhi bar bsgrubs/ /de slad 'khu med yid ldan rnams/ /gang du yang ni 'jigs pa med/ /snying stobs phun sum tshogs pa yis/ /dge mtshan 'di dang gzhan yang nyon/ /char med mi bzad dus su ni/ /thub pa 'ga' yi bsti gnas na/ /mi dang
42b5(mdo 'grel): 'dra bar brjod pa yi/ /ri bong zhig ni yun ring gnas/ /'bras bu rtsa ba yongs zad pas/ /ltogs ring thub pa mthong gyur nas/ /bsam pa de yi gdung bas gzir/ /g.yo med kun tu brtags pas smras/ /bcom ldan bdag gi sha dag gis//
42b6(mdo 'grel): nga ni srog gi rten po dag/ mdzod cig chos ni bsgrub bgyid pa/ /khyod kyis lus ni bsrung bar 'os/ /'di brjod nags sreg mjug gi mer/ /thub pa byams pas yang yang du/ /'bad pa yis ni bzlog gyur kyang/ /ri bong gi ni lus po 'phangs/ /de yi
42b7(mdo 'grel): snying stobs mthu yis ni/ /'bar ba'i tshogs kyis dkrigs ba'i me/ /'jam pa'i sgra sgrogs bung ba can/ /padmo'i rdzing bur rab tu gyur/ /de yang lha yi lus kyis der/ /pad+ma chen po dag la gnas/ /thub pa phyag 'tshal ldan pa la/ /chos
43a1(mdo 'grel): rnams rab tu bstan pa byas/ /de ltar byang chub zhugs pa rnams/ /'jigs pa med min dug gis min/ /de skad gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das/ /dpal sbas kyi ni khang par gshegs/ /des ni de ru zhugs nyid na/ /zhabs ni g.yas pa
43a2(mdo 'grel): bzhag pa yis/ /me yi dong ni mtsho skyes can/ /bung ba 'jam sgrogs ldan bar gyur/ /mtsho skyes khril bzhugs pa de/ /dpal sbas kyis ni mthong gyur nas/ /de mthong sdig pa nyams pa yis/ /zhabs la btud de rab tu smras/ /bcom ldan bdag
43a3(mdo 'grel): ni sdig can gyis/ /rim las 'das 'di bzod par bgyi/ /gti mug gis long ltung chags la/ /dam pa rnams ni thugs rje lhag/ bdag ni mi dge'i bshes gnyen dag/ rab tu rmongs pas sdig pa yis/ /lam la nye bar gdams pa byas/ /de la
43a4(mdo 'grel): khyod nyid dran bskyabs/ /khyod kyi zas dang btung ba kun/ /bdag gi dug gis bsgos pa byas/ /phyi nas gdung ba'i rang bzhin dug/ kye ma bdag nyid rang la 'pho/ /'di brjod dpal sbas mche ma dang/ /bcas pa'i mig la snying rje'i gter/ /
43a5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas gsungs/ /dge slong dge 'dun nyan par byed/ /legs pa yi mug ma byed cig/ bdag cag khyod la phyir ma phyogs/ /'jigs rung khon gyis dug spangs pas/ /ded la dug gis gnod pa med/ /khyod ni
43a6(mdo 'grel): bar NA sir sngon/ /dpal ldan mi bdag tshangs byin gyur/ /de yi srog dang mnyam pa yi/ /dga' ma dpe med ma zhes ba'o/ /de nas de yi grong khyer mdza' i/ /nags gnas rma bya'i rgyal mo ni/ /gser du snang ba zhes pa'i sgra/ /de yis nam
43a7(mdo 'grel): zhig thos par gyur/ /gling bu pi wang gdangs lta bu/ /de yi sgra ni thos gyur nas/ /dge mtshan ldan bas 'di ci zhes/ /mi yi mgon la de yis dris/ /rgyal pos smras pa nags mdza' 'dir/ /rin chen sgro ldan rma bya yod/ /gang gi mgrin
43b1(mdo 'grel): nas bskrags pa 'dis/ /'jig rten rnams ni snyan pas khyab/ /de skad smres pa'i mi bdag gis/ /shin tu mdza' sdug rab 'bar pas/ /de mthong don du gnyer ba la/ /rab tu rgod cing yang smras pa/ /de lta'i ngo mtshar gzugs can rnams/ /mdzes ma mthong
43b2(mdo 'grel): brnyed pa dka' / /de lta na yang 'bang ba na/ /de la yongs su ngal ba bya/ /de skad brjod nas mi bdag gis/ /rgya yis 'tsho ba de gzung phyir/ /mthob na ni gsod pa dag/ yang dag rig par byas nas btang/ /yongs su dpyod pa'i mig rmongs pas/ /dbang
43b3(mdo 'grel): du byas pa mi shes nyid/ /bud med rjes chags kyis bcom pas/ /bya ba min pa rnams kyang byed/ /mdza' las ma rungs khyim thab kyi/ /rkang pa'i stegs su gyur rnams kyi/ /blo dang dga' dran grags pa rnams/ /phrag dog gis bzhin rnam par nyams/ /de 'og bya
43b4(mdo 'grel): pas gnas gnas su/ /zhags ba'i bcing bkod pa rnams/ /rma bya'i rgyal po'i mthu yis ni/ /kun tu rnam par chad par gyur/ /'bad 'bras ming las sdug bsngal zhing/ /mi bdag bka' yis 'jigs gyur te/ /mthong nas rma bya'i rgyal mo ni/ /snying rje
43b5(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs pa nyid du gyur/ /de yi bsam pa kho mo dag/ 'chings par ma gyur sa bdag gi/ bka' ni drag pos 'jigs gyur ba/ /kye ma sdug pa rgya yi 'tsho/ /de ltar bsams nas snying rje yis/ /gsal bar smras te de btang nas/ /mi bdag bkug ste de khyim
43b6(mdo 'grel): du/ /de nyid dang ni lhan gcig song/ /pho brang nang der rtag tu de/ /sa bdag btsun mo bcas pa yis/ /mchod cing yongs su dris pa las/ /gus pas rnam par spro zhing gnas/ /mthon mthing nor bu'i khang pa ni/ /'jam ldan chu 'dzin 'od la des/ /'dab
43b7(mdo 'grel): ma mdzes bkra dbang po'i gzhu/ /chags pa lta bur 'khrul pa byas/ /de nas de yi rim gro la/ /gus dang bcas pas lha mo bskos/ /phyogs las rgyal ba'i bgrod pa la/ /nam zhig sa yi bdag po song/ /de nas lha mo dpe med ma/ /bdag
44a1(mdo 'grel): po sod bas bag med cing/ /gzugs dang lang tsho'i dreg bas long/ /rigs kyi lugs ni mthong ma gyur/ /gzhon nu 'bangs la chags ldan ma/ /'dod pas rnam par bslad ma de'i/ /ngo tsha shin tu ring song ste/ /yang yang dmigs pas 'jig
44a2(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin/ /dri ma ldan zhing gya gyu rno/ /rna ba dag la reg par bzod/ g.yo ba g.yo ba'i mig can dang/ /mig ni legs pa rim pa mtshungs/ /'khor ba chu srin 'byung gnas su/ /rnam pa mang pos myos byed cing/ /srog 'phrog nag po brtsegs pa yi//
44a3(mdo 'grel): rim bud mong rnam par rgyu/ /me tog pas kyang shin tu 'jam/ /sog le bas kyang rab tu rtsub/ /bud med sems ni bkra ba dag/ su yi yongs su gcod pa shes/ /ma chags dga' mas mgul byas nas/ /gang zhig dga' bar bgrong byed
44a4(mdo 'grel): de/ /bsil zhing dri med 'jam pa yi/ /ral gri'i rno rgyun 'thung bar byed/ /des bsams bdag gi pho brang na/ /rma bya'i rgyal mo tshul khrims shes/ skyes bu'i lugs bzhin kun brjod pa/ /zug rdu 'di ni gnas par gyur/ /bdag gi spyod
44a5(mdo 'grel): 'dis bdag la/ /gdon mi za bar 'chad par 'gyur/ /las ni smad 'os re zhig byas/ /da ni bdag gis ci zhig bya/ /'di ni gnad shes mchog gi blo/ /pha rol zur gyi 'dzin lta zhog/ bdag gis byas ba'i sdig pa yi/ /dogs pa sems
44a6(mdo 'grel): med rnams la'ang skye/ /de ltar bsams nas de yis ni/ /de la dug ldan bza' ba byin/ /chags smyos mi srun dbang gyur ba'i/ /bud med ci dang ci mi byed/ /de yis nye bar sbyar ba yis/ /bza' dang btung ba dug ldan gyis/ /rma bya'i
44a7(mdo 'grel): rgyal mo rnam rgyas shing/ /mdangs bzang yid 'ong mdzes par gyur/ /lha mos rnal gnas de mthong nas/ /gsang ba rab mched dogs pa yis/ /dal bu dal bus mya ngan gyi/ /nad kyis bzung nas srog btang gyur/ /de ltar de
44b1(mdo 'grel): yi dug gis kyang/ nang dang ldan pa nyid ma gyur/ /chen po rnams kyis sems yangs pa/ dug ni dug med nyid du bgyid/ /'dong chags dug yin gti mug dug/ zhe sdang dag kyang mi bzang dug/ sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du/ /dge 'dun bden pa bdud rtsi'i
44b2(mdo 'grel): mchog/ gti mug chu tshogs chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i dug rnams spro/ /chags pa'i ltos 'gro chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i dug rnams spro/ /sdang ba'i nags kyi phreng ba 'jigs su rung ba'i dug rnams spro/ /mi bzang dug rnams skye ba'i rim pa gzhan ni yod pa
44b3(mdo 'grel): min /'di bzhin skye ba gzhan la yang/ /dpal sbas kyis ni me yi dang/ /chos ni 'di dam de la byas/ /de yang 'phral la bad ldan gyur/ /de skad brjod nas bcom ldan 'das/ /yang dag snying rjes gzigs pa'i chus/ bstan pa dag la mngon phyogs pa'i/
44b4(mdo 'grel): dpal sbas rdul dang bral ba byas/ /de nas dpal sbas dge ba shes bas rab tu gsal ba'i gnas thob phyir/ /dri med dran pas skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nyid dran gyi gzhan ma yin/ rgyal dang yongs su 'dris pas bsod nams thob ste gang phyir dam pa
44b5(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /mthong bar gyur pa dge ba che dang rab tu dga' dang bde ba'i slad/ /mi shes rmongs pa sel ba'i bcom ldan 'das ni snying rjes bsod nams la brtson pas/ /gnod byed sdig pa bsten ba'i dpal sbas kyang ni 'bad pas rjes su gzung byas nas//
44b6(mdo 'grel): 'ching ba'i khang par yang srid mdud pa 'di dag rnams su gang gis mi 'gyur ba/ /srid pa yang dag gzhil slad dge slong rnams la khon dang bral ba'i bstan pa bsgrubs/ /zhes pa'i dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa
44b7(mdo 'grel): brjed pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dpal sbras kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad pa'o/ //skal ldan rnams la mi shes pa ni legs pa'i rang bzhin las byung dge nyid gyur/ /rmongs ba rnams la dge ba mi phan
45a1(mdo 'grel): nyid 'gyur 'di ni rim pa 'di yis mtshon/ /mtshan phyed smag rum mun pa sman gyi nags la mchog tu mdzes pa rab tu ster/ /gang yang nyi ma'i gzi byin 'ug pa'i rigs kyi mig ni kun tu nyams par byed/ /sa bdag gzugs can snying po yi
45a2(mdo 'grel): grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces par/ /rab bzang zhes pa'i grong khyer ba/ /yongs rdzogs khyim na gnas pa byung/ /lta ba kun la rnam sdang zhing/ /gti mug rab tu rgyas ba des/ /rmongs las zang byed pa nyid la/ /mngon par bus pa lhag bar gyur/ /de yi chung
45a3(mdo 'grel): mtsho rigs can/ /bde ldan ma zhes bya ba yis/ /mngal bzung zla ba nya ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor shar gyi phyogs kyis bzhin/ /ka lan dka' i gnas shes pa/ /'od ma'i tshal du yang dag gnas/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsod snyoms la/ /nam
45a4(mdo 'grel): zhig de yi khang par gshegs/ /de ni chung mar bcas pa yi/ /de la mchod byas gus bcas pas/ /bu ni mngal na gnas gang de/ /ci yi gzugs 'gyur de la dris/ /de yis bka' stsal khyod kyi bu/ /lha mi'i phun sum tshogs spyad nas/ /da
45a5(mdo 'grel): yi bstan la rab byung nas/ /yang dag ldan pas grol bar 'gyur/ /de skad gsal bar bska'? stsal nas/ /bcom ldan rang gi gnas su gshegs/ /khyim bdag khang pang zad byed pa/ /b+hu ri ka ni mngon par 'ongs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
45a6(mdo 'grel): gsungs ba de/ /rab bzang gis ni smras par gyur/ /zang byed bas thos myur bar ni/ /khong khro'i dug gis 'khrugs par gyur/ /shin tu yun ring des rtsis nas/ /dal bas bza' ni shes byas te/ /dris lan bcom ldan gyis gsungs gang/ /de
45a7(mdo 'grel): lta'i rnam pa kho nar mthong/ /des bsams kyi mthe tshom dag /med par de yis bden par brjod/ /'on kyang de yis smras ba'i dngos/ /gzhil slad bdag ni mi bden brjod/ /bdag gi tshig gis rab bzang gis/ /gal te kun mkhyen de
45b1(mdo 'grel): rig na/ /de las dge sbyong la gus 'dis/ /zad byed la dad gtong bar 'gyur/ /de ltar bsams nas khro ldan pa/ /de yis rang bzang dag la smras/ /kun mkhyen nga rgyal can de yis/ /'di dag mi bden pa nyid brjod/ /lha yi phun tshogs lha la 'os/ /mi
45b2(mdo 'grel): yis ji ltar 'thab par 'gyur/ /'on te rab byung bden nyid na/ /de yis 'di ni bsam par bya/ /dbul dang ltogs pas gdungs pa 'am/ /gang la 'tsho thabs gzhan med pa/ /skya rgyal 'os pa de de yis/ /skyabs ni dge spyod brtul zhugs yin/ /khyim bdag
45b3(mdo 'grel): bdag gis mthong ba ni/ /gal te bdag gis tshig tshad na/ /bzlog pa byis pa 'di skyes pas/ /rigs ni yongs su gdud bar 'gyur/ /'di brjod zad byed pa song tshe/ /khyim bdag gi ni yun ring du/ /rnam par dpyad nas mngal ltung spang?/ /sbyor ba de dang de
45b4(mdo 'grel): dag bsgrubs/ /gang tshe rdzas kyi sbyor ba yis/ /mngal ni yongs su ma g.yos nyid/ /de tshe 'di yis dben par ni/ /chung ma drag pos mnyed de bsad/ /de nas sdig can de yis de/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du/ /rab tu bskyal cho zad byed pa//
45b5(mdo 'grel): de yis gtam thos dga' nas smros/ /a ho kye ma kun mkhyen 'dis/ /byis pa la brjod de bden ldan/ /bu ni ma skyes ma dag ni/ /lnga ba nyid 'gyur 'di de yin/ /de yis brjod pa'i byis pa yi/ /lha mi'i dpal mchog de ni 'di/ /'di yi
45b6(mdo 'grel): rab byung de yang 'di/ /gang zhig dkur ni shi gyur pa'o/ /de skad de dag rab smra zhing/ /nye bar dgod bas thams cad nas/ /dur khrod lta ba kho na'i phyir/ /skye bo yang dag 'dus par gyur/ /skabs der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /'byung po
45b7(mdo 'grel): dgongs pas lha yi ni/ /sbyan gyis de dag kun mkhyen nas/ /'dzum pa dang ldan skad cig bsams/ /kye ma gti mug gis bcings pas/ /rmongs pa ring du gnas pas kyang/ /lus can rnams la snang ba sgrib/ /sprin gyi rnam par 'gyur pa bzhin/ /
46a1(mdo 'grel): kye ma dge ba zad byed pa'i/ /zad byed pa des sdig pa'i las/ /khyim bdag dman pa'i blo can de/ /bya ba min pa'ang byed du bcug/ 'di bsams snying rje rab rgyas pa'i/ /bcom ldan rang nyid dge slong gi/ tshogs kyis bskor nas myur bar ni/ /bsil ba'i
46a2(mdo 'grel): tshal gyi dur khrod gshegs/ /bcom ldan rang nyid dur khrod na/ /rgyu ba shes nas rgyal po ni/ /gzugs can snying po blon dang bcas/ /sa de nyid du 'ongs par gyur/ /de 'og rab bzang chung ma ni/ /sreg pa'i me la bcug pa dang/ /chu skyes la gnas byis pa
46a3(mdo 'grel): dag/ dku brtol nyi ma bzhin du 'thon/ /me 'bar dbus na gnas pa de/ /gang tshe sus kyang ma blangs pa/ /de tshe skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /hA hA zhes pa chen por gyur/ /de nas bde bar gshegs pa'i bkas/ /'tsho byed ces pa'i gzhon nus gsos//
46a4(mdo 'grel): rmongs pa lta bur rang 'gro yis/ /gzhon nu 'od ldan de blangs gyur/ /rgyal bas gzigs pa nyid kyis ni/ /byis pa rab tu len pa'i tshe/ /ro bsreg me dag de la ni/ /ha ri tsan dan ltar bsil gyur/ /byis pa 'tsho zhing me las grol/ /rab tu mdzes pa
46a5(mdo 'grel): mthong gyur nas/ /skyengs bas zad byed ba rnams ni/ /skad cig shi ba bzhin du gnas/ /de nas rab bzang ya mtshan gyis/ /rnam par 'khrul la bcom ldan 'das/ /'byung po kun la phan dgyes pas/ /bu 'di blang bar gyis zhes gsungs/ /de
46a6(mdo 'grel): yang the tshom dag las blo/ /ci bya snyam pa'i khyogs las 'phyang/ /zad byed rnams kyi bzhin nyid la/ /bslab pa'i slad du skad cig bltas/ /de la des smras dur khrod kyi/ /me skyes byis pa 'di mi blang/ /gsal bar gang du 'di gnas pa/ /de
46a7(mdo 'grel): khyim brlag pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de skad de dag tshig gis de/ /rmongs pas gang tshe de ma blangs/ /de tshe rgyal ba'i bka' yis ni/ /sa yi bdag pos byis pa blangs/ /me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /de yi ming ni me skyes zhes/ /bcom ldan nyid
46b1(mdo 'grel): kyis mdzad par gyur/ /sa skyong khang bar byis pa ni/ /rab tu bskyed par gyur ba de'i/ /zhang po yul gzhan song ba dag/ dus kyi mang dag 'ongs bar gyur/ /de yi srid mo shi ba dang/ /bu skyes spyod tshul rig gyur nas/ /khro bas 'dar zhing mngon phyogs te/ /rab bzang
46b2(mdo 'grel): la ni yang dag smras/ /rmongs pa zad byed la gus shing/ /de yi tshig gis chung ma bsad/ /khyod kyi rang gi bu dor nas/ /legs byas ming ni ci zhig byas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni sems med cing/ /gzhan gyi sngags kyis kun tu bslad/ /skye bo ngan pa rgod na yang/ /rnam par
46b3(mdo 'grel): 'jom byed ro langs bzhin/ /gal te rgyal po'i kha ba nas bu/ /da lta nyid du mi len na/ /bud med bsad pa bsgrags nas de/ khyod nor chad pas gcod du 'jug/ de yi de skad brjod pas des/ /'jigs nas sa bdag khab nas bu/ /len du bcug pas sa
46b4(mdo 'grel): bdag ni/ /'dod dang ldan par ring na gtad/ /de nas rab bzang dus kyis ni/ /dus kyi dbang du song bar gyur/ /me skyes rnam par 'byor ba'i gter/ /bod kyi nyi ma bzhin du gyur/ /slong ba rnams ni dpag bsam shing/ /lha mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob/ /sangs
46b5(mdo 'grel): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gyi/ /skyabs la de yis blo gros byas/ /de la gus pas nyer bskrun pa/ /rmad byung lha yi rin chen tshogs/ /bsod nams rin chen sgrub brtson des/ /dge slong dge 'dun rnams la phul/ /chu gter cher ni chu bo bzhin/ /de lta'i khyim du
46b6(mdo 'grel): lta'i ris las/ /rnam mang phun tshogs ngo mtshar can/ /rang nyid kho na 'ongs par gyur/ /de yi khyim du bcom ldan 'das/ /rtsa dang rin chen mtshungs blos kyang/ /de yi dor ni rin po che'i/ /smod ni yongs su gzung ba mdzad/ /des na lha yi gos zung dag/ rang
46b7(mdo 'grel): gi khrims bzhin dri ma med/ /grags pa rnams kyi dper bzod pa/ /bsod nams zod gis nyos nas thob/ /de nas nam zhig de yi gos/ /bkrus nas brlan pa nyid 'od bkod/ /yang dag g.yo bas rab bskyod nas/ /sa yi bdag po'i spyi bor lhung/ /me
47a1(mdo 'grel): skyes de yis gos dag ni/ /sngon med rab mdzes mthong gyur nas /lha yi dpal la ya mtshan pa'i/ /rgyal po rang dpal rtsa bzhin ni sems/ /zas la mgron gnyer mi yi bdag/ me skyes khyim na gnas bas de'i/ /rin chen rang bzhin khang pa dag?/ mthong nas
47a2(mdo 'grel): mtho ris yin par sems/ /de nas dus kyis sa skyong ni/ /chos kyi dang tshul mi skyes dang/ /bu ni rgyal srid la chags pa'i/ /g.yo yis nges par 'grongs par gyur/ /rgyal po yon tan dam pa can/ /rdzogs ldan lta bu de 'das tsho/ /rgyal po mchog gi bu de yis/ /chos
47a3(mdo 'grel): min bzhin du rgyal srid thob/ /me skyos ngag gi khyim gyi dpal/ /sa bdag la dkon des mthong nas/ /yang dag mngon par song ste smras/ /khyod ni pha mas rnam par gsos/ /khyod dang nga? spun chos dag gis/ /'byor pa phyed ni bdag la stsol/ /gal te min nan? ra?
47a4(mdo 'grel): skal la/ /'khu las rtsod pa nyid rab skye/ /gya gyus sdang bar byed pa de/ /de skad brjod pas me skyes ni/ /khang pa rin chen gyis gang ba/ /de la byin nas khyim gzhan song/ /lha yi rin chen yid 'phrog rgyas/ /'jig rten ngan byed dpal 'byor de/ /me skyes kho
47a5(mdo 'grel): na'i rjes su 'brang/ /nyin mor byed la 'od zer bzhin/ /yang yang me skyes kyis spangs kyang/ /phun tshogs de ni lan bdun du/ /me skyes can sang mi bdag gis/ ma reg chung ma khyo can bzhin/ /chom rkun la sogs rigs pa yis/ /rnam pa kun tu 'phrog
47a6(mdo 'grel): brtson zhing/ /khros par shes nas me skyes ni/ /yid byung gyur bas yang dag bsams/ /skye dgu'i bsod nams ma yin pa/ /yongs su smin pas pha lta bu/ /rgyal po mnyes bshin yangs pa ni/ /dran pa'i lhag ma nyid du gyur/ /'di na zol med drang po la//
47a7(mdo 'grel): skye dgu dbugs phyung pha ma bzhin/ /mtshan mo bde bar nyal byed pa/ /de dang mtshungs pa gzhan bsdu?/ /nor ldan rtswa bzhin bsgrub bar bya/ /blo gros rin chen bzhin du thob/ /skye po dam pa drang po ni/ /bdud rtsibs kyang rnyed pa dka' / /zol min mkhas pa
47b1(mdo 'grel): bsden? pa dang/ /rmongs min drang bo'i bdag nyid dang/ /ma brtsigs mthon po nyid dag kyang/ /de ltar skyes ba shin tu nyung/ /da ni mi bdag zhe sdang gis/ /tshul ngan gnod byed la rab zhugs/ /'jig rten rnams kyi sdig smin nas/ /dus min dag tu rtsod ldan 'ongs/ /
47b2(mdo 'grel): 'gro bas bdag 'od ldan pa/ /bshes gnyen de ni nub pa'i tshe/ /de sras skyon skyes mtshan mo 'di/ /mun pa'i slad du rab tu rgyas/ /mi srun dam pa 'das rnams kyi/ /rgyu med snying sdug yin nam snyam/ /gang zhing sbyong tshul gzhan cha las/ /grags pa da dag?
47b3(mdo 'grel): rab gsal byed/ /de slad mi bdag ngan ba yis/ /byin brlabs sa ni? yongs btang 'os/ /rtsod ldan dus kyis dbang? la/ /skye bo rnams ni ga la 'tsho/ /mchog tu yongs 'dris yid 'ong chung ma dam pa rnams kyi rab sbyangs yon tan dang/ /'tshol ba min
47b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i rigs dang legs ldan sa bdag ri bong can mtshungs grags pa dang/ /lugs la yang dag 'os pa'i spyod tshul dag dang phongs med nor rnams te/ /mi bdag yon tan ldan na skyes bu rnams kyi thams cad rnam slad min par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rtsa ba
47b5(mdo 'grel): nor gyi ljon pas yang dag bskyab? gyur ba/ /skyon med 'dong pa rnams kyis me tog rgyas shing rab 'bar ba/ /bsod nams 'bras bu bde ba nges par 'jig rten longs spyod de/ /rnam par ltung byang rgyal ngan rlung gis gal te ma bcom na'o/ /rtsod ldan dus
47b6(mdo 'grel): dang bdag po byis/ /de yi? rab? gdung sreg pa'i me/ /dus min rnam bslad rab tu drag /mi srun ro langs tshogs kyis gang/ /dga' ba yid byung blo gros bskyod/ /bde ba'i dpal gyi lang tsho song/ /da ni 'byor pa longs spyod rnams/ /spyod dang ldan
47b7(mdo 'grel): la bdag mi sred/ /nor dang khyim dang chung ma dang/ /bu dang g.yog bo yo byad rnams/ /mdza' med nad dang gdung ba ste/ /kye ma skyes bu'i yongs 'dzin to/ /so ga'i tsha ba mi bzad dpal/ /ji lta ji ltar rnam 'phel ba/ /de lta de ltar lus can
