48a1(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /srod pa'i yongs su gdung ba 'phel/ /skye ba kun tu nyer bsgrubs pas/ /nor gyi tshogs pa rab rgyas kyang/ /lan tshwa'i mtsho yi chu yis bzhin/ /mi rnams sred bral nyid ma yin/ /gang zhig nor ldan chog mi shes/ /med do med do zhes
48a2(mdo 'grel): zlos pa/ /gal te de yis rab zhi na/ /yang srid dag tu su zhig 'gyur/ /rtsod dang 'thab mo rmongs dang chags pa chen po rjes su 'brang ba'i ltas ngan nor gyi ci/ /chud pa brgyar ltung yang dag chags pas nad bskyed 'bral bar 'gyur ba'i longs spyod dag
48a3(mdo 'grel): gis ci/ /yid nyams g.yog la mi bdag gang zhig khang pa thob ba'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal dag gis ci/ /'dir ni chags bral kho na 'jig dus 'jigs par nad med longs spyod dag tu 'os pa yin/ /rang gis skye bo snying sdug dri med snang ba'i dus ni 'das
48a4(mdo 'grel): gyur cing/ /lhag par mi srun sdig pas rgyas pa'i rmongs ba yang dag 'ongs pa ni/ /ngal dub yongs btang skye bo med pa'i nags kyi gnas la yongs 'dris pa/ /yid ni rab zhi'i chus bkrus skyes bu rnams kyi bde ba'i dbugs 'byin yin/ /de ltar yun
48a5(mdo 'grel): ring des bsams nas/ /mchog tu 'dod chags bral bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal rmongs pa'i gti mug dang/ /blo ldan rnams kyi rnam 'byed slad/ /slong rnams la des kun byin nas/ /bde gshegs gnas su rab tu song/ /gang phyir bden ba'i bder mngon phyogs//
48a6(mdo 'grel): dpal gyi lcags sgrog gis mi khugs/ /gang tshe dang pa'i rgyal po ni/ /rdzing bu gtsang ma dran pa na/ /de tshe nor gyi blo gros ma/ /ro ldan la yang de mi sred/ /longs spyod dag la rjes chags me ni bzod dka' rmongs pa'i du ba 'khyims gyur ba/ /chog shes bdud
48a7(mdo 'grel): rtsi'i rgyun gyis yin la bsil ba nyid ni dal bus thob gyur nas/ /btung ba myos shing rab rgyug rnam par g.yo rgyun na chung g.yo ba'i smin 'khyogs can/ /skad cig 'grogs pa'i dpal mo 'di dag zhi ldan rnams kyi bgegs ni byed pa yin/ /srid pa'i lam gyi
48b1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal rnams nyams thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' / /dri med nyid kyi gnas su rab tu byung bas rab tu zhugs/ /zhi ba nyid ni thams cad thob nas mnyam med rab bsil zhing/ /mtshon bral thar bar 'gro ba'i slad du thub par de gyur to/ /me skyes byang chub grub
48b2(mdo 'grel): pa de/ /mthong nas ya mtshan ldan pa yi/ /dge slong gis dri bcom ldan gyis/ /sngon gyi sgyod pa'i mdza' rnams gsungs/ /skye ba'i zhing brgya la btab pa'i/ /sa bon lta bu'i las rnams kyi/ /'bras bu phun tshogs skye bo rnams/ /'tshol pa med par sbyod par
48b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rgyal po gnyen dang ldan pa yi/ /grong khyer gnyen ldan dag tu sngon/ /khyim bdag bsam pa chen po ni/ /dpal ldan ma bsdams zhes bya byung/ /de nas ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rnam gzigs zhes pa grong khyer der/ /de dag rnams kyi legs byas
48b4(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /nam zhig ljongs ni rgyu zhing gshegs/ /de ni dge slong stong phrag dag/ drug bcu nyid kyi yongs bskor bar/ /ma bsdams pa yis dad nas phyin/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni mgron du gnyer/ /de yi yo byad thams cad kyis/ /zla gsum rim gro bgyid ba nyid//
48b5(mdo 'grel): ji lta de ltar rgyal pos kyang/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni mgron du gnyer/ /grod pa la 'os ma bsdams pas/ /sa skyong la 'os sa bdag .gis/ /de dag 'gran pas rjes bsgrubs pa'i/ /longs spyod kyis de lhag gnas byas/ /glang po rgyal mtshan nor bu gdugs//
48b6(mdo 'grel): rnga yab rgya che'i dpal 'byor gyis/ /rgyal pos mchod pa de mthong nas/ /ma bsdams bsam pa 'khrugs par gyur/ /snying stobs dkar bar gyur ba de'i/ /rgyal ba mchod pa stong grogs ni/ /phyogs bdag mchod sbyin brgya ba yis/ /lha yi dpal 'byor rnams
48b7(mdo 'grel): kyis byas/ /de yis lha yi 'byor pa des/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mchod gyru nas/ /gang mdun 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal/ /ngo tsha yi ni snod nyid gyur/ /nyi zla'i 'od zer nyams byed rin chen rnams dang sa srungs 'od ldan glang po dang/ /dri med gos dan 
49a1(mdo 'grel): sbos phreng khrus dang dpag bsam shing gi 'bras bu rnam dag gi/ bde sogs gus btud rol bas g.yo zhing dal bus rda yab dag ni rab bskyod par/ /de yis bde gshegs mngon mchod mthong nas mi yi bdag po de tshas dman par gyur/ /
49a2(mdo 'grel): de ltar sten pa la gus dag ba yongs smin 'bras bu rab mad dag/ gang zhig bsod nams rgya che ma bsdams pas mngon yang? dag thob gyur cing/ /? med yid ldan de yi skad cig smon lam nyid las de nyid ni/ /mchog gi nyi ma bzhin du dpal 'byor gyi gnas
49a3(mdo 'grel): me skyes 'dir gyur to/ /'gro gsum dri med ye shes kyis/ /rab tu gsal mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /rgyal bas dge slong rnams la ni/ /smon lam gdams ngag de skad gsungs/ /zhes ba dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa
49a4(mdo 'grel): brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las mo skyes kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu pa'o// //'jig rten mdza' dag nye bar bzung smad rab zhugs ston pa dag ni sngon/ /grong khyer tsam pa dang nye dri med pad+ma'i ? dogs 'bram na bzhugs/ /kun
49a5(mdo 'grel): dga' bo zhes bya ba reg na bde ba'i 'od ldan dge slong gis/ /dris nas mngal tsam la sogs skye bo'i tshogs kyi skye bo'i spyod tshul gsungs/ /'jig rten du? ni dkar nag 'dren ma'i 'od can las sgrad kyis bkra pa'i/ /lus can rnams kyi skye bo'i gos ni
49a6(mdo 'grel): rab mang gnas skabs mthong gyur te/ shin tu 'bad bas gang zhig yan ring yongs sgyur h+rul bor gyur mod kyang/ /gdung pa'i dri ma snam chags tshon ni med pa nyid du 'gyur ma yin/ /skyes pa bud med dag kyang 'dzen pa rnams nyams reg par zhugs
49a7(mdo 'grel): byas shing sbyor ba bsten pa'i khu ba zla mtshan? yang dag 'grogs la ltung gyur pa/ /gcig tu gyur cing nges pa 'gal las? po? dag gi dngos por 'gyur/ /su zhig khong der 'bral la 'jug ste dper na bsrubs pa'i me bzhin no/ /shel
49b1(mdo 'grel): du ma dag la tshon gyi rab dbye sbrin? la chu la gter gyi chu/ /til la me tog dring zang gcer la me yis gdungs bzhin ngal? bu yis/ /dri rnams kyi bzhin rnam pa mang po'i las kyis bsgos par gyur pa'i rlung/ spyod tshul byed pi yes kyang deg mi mtshon 'di ge? nang du 'jug/
49b2(mdo 'grel): de ni pra ba'i rim pas yongs su 'gyur zhing rang bzhin gyi bcor 'di/ /ji srid dus su rnam par 'gyur ba med pa bzhin du rnam 'gyur 'dzin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rab mang bkod pa bkru ba'i gzugs ni ma mtshon te/ /rma bya'i sgo nga chu yis rang bzhin ma bya'i rnam pa mi
49b3(mdo 'grel): gsal bzhin/ /der ni mer med ? nur? nan nad gor gor la sogs gnas skabs bzung/ /de dang de dag lto yis bskyod ba'i drod kyis smin shing 'phal byas nas/ /zla ba rdzogs pa'am yang na dgu yis 'khyil ba'i las kyi rim pa 'di/ /sdug bsngal 'du shes
49b4(mdo 'grel): rab ldan ci yang rung ba'i mi bzang nyon mongs spyod/ /dus su yu bdag las 'bras bu dang nyid lta zhing mngal smin pas/ /de dus langs pa'i ma yi rlung ni mi dman mo grogs pas rab bskul nas/ /mtshon bya goms pa'i gnas kyi grogs pa las kyi 'ching bas
49b5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs gyur pa/ /gzhu yi 'khrul 'khor ba/ /de nas btang ba'i mnga' bzhin nang nas phyir 'thon 'gyur/ /gan rkyal kha gdangs ro 'dzin drang pos nu rtog rtsal 'dzin byed cing/ /ma yi nu zho 'thung gang 'di yi rnabs min zhing mig gis min/ /skye bar
49b6(mdo 'grel): goms pa'i gdung bas bskyed pa'i nyon mongs gnas pa'i rol pa des/ /de yi bdun du spros pa mdza' dag ston byed bag chags kho na'o/ /rnam mang? yul gyi nyams myong bskyed pa'i dbye bas grub pa'i nang khyab pa/ /gsal bar skud ba rab tu rgyas par legs
49b7(mdo 'grel): sbyar bar rtsa'i cha shas bzhin/ /de nas rang bzhin dbang po'i grags kyi 'du shes byin ba'i rmongs ba de/ /nu ma'i don du brjod cing yongs su mnye ba'i rag pas ma ma rig/ mal stan gos rnams lag pas bskyod pa'i 'dar byed dag gis mnan pa dad/ /
50a1(mdo 'grel): gnas dang gnas su ya yor 'gyur lus srog chags rnams kyi zos gyur pas/ /rtag tu du zhing tshogs dang byas bas las kyi nyon mongs rgyud ma ni/ /su lta? smra ste mi bzad rgud pa nyid kyi gnas su rab tu gyur/ /gdung bas skyugs shing rab 'thob 'og
50a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshogs kyis bzhin ni sbags gyur cing/ /gan rkyal brang gi dbus su ltung bas bran pas mtshon bar gyur pa 'di/ /sgyu ma'i bud med pa 'gro bas mchog tu rtse dga' i rol pa dran pa las/ /dgong pa'i 'od zer shin tu gsal bas lus la rab tu khyab pa
50a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /de nas de ni rtse bas yig phreng yongs 'dris dag la lam btang thob/ /'bor ba 'di ni g.yo med 'ching ba'i rtsis kyis ri mo'i las dag la/ /rang gi skye ba'i khor mo ring du 'bri bzhin oM yig la sogs pa/ /sde dang sdel blo gros rab gsal longs
50a4(mdo 'grel): spyod spos pa nges par 'jug /ji zhig ltar yang byis pa'i dngos po'i rab rmongs bral nas shes rab thong/ /slad nas kyang ni lang tsho dar la 'dod pas rab bslang 'du shes nyams/ /sdug bsngal mdzes pa'i sprin bzlog bud med rnams kyi rtsi dga' rol
50a5(mdo 'grel): pa dag/ snying po med la rab tu brtan pa'i blo yis mngon par 'dod pa bcings/ /bud med rnams kyi tshig la rna ba lus ni g.yo med 'khyung ba la/ ? yi chang gi dri la sna dang de yi rol myong byed dang/ /bzhin la mig kyang snod du bgyis nas bya ba
50a6(mdo 'grel): thams cad bsnyal ba 'di/ /lus ni yongs su 'gyur ba'i dbang po thams cad tshod dag 'dzin pa bzhin/ /sdang la mdza' zhing yongs su 'dris la yongs sdang? dang tshul 'dod ldan de/ /gsar pa gsar pa la chags 'bang bcas gzhan gyi 'dod ma
50a7(mdo 'grel): gzhan dag 'dod/ /de ltar phan tshun rig min spyod pa mtshon nas skyengs par mthong gyur ba/ /'di yi 'dod pa rang bzhin ro bral bkra ba'i rgyud 'di gzhan slang nyid/ /nyin zhag dag ni nyung? zhig gnas pa'i lang tshos long bar byas 'gyur zhing/ /'dam la
50b1(mdo 'grel): glang po bzhin du yul gyi chu gter dag ni mdza' med la/ /bying zhing mdza' la rab lcung? 'gro ba dag ni rab tu nyams pa 'dri/ /ci zhig bya zhes des ? shes pa dang bral rmongs pa brgyal bar 'gyur/ /ji srid 'di ni rtse zhing 'byam dang g.yo rang dga' dang glal ba
50b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /'dod pas 'khyud pa'i lus ni 'khyog pas 'jum zhing 'dzum zhing smra byed pa/ de srid de yi steng du dus kyis rab? 'phangs bsod rtags me tog phreng/ ? ba'i phreng ba ltar dkar zol gyis yongs su 'bab pa nyid/ /gti mug gnyid la chags pas dus dang dus la skad
50b3(mdo 'grel): cig ltar shes shing/ /lus 'dir legs byas ma thob byin pa nyid min spyad pa min pa yi/ /rgyu 'dis de ni rkun pos brkus bzhin sdug bsngal dag las sems pa nyid/ /kun tu rmongs pa nyid kyi nyam nyes bag med 'gyod pa'i 'bras bu can/ /las ngan gyi
50b4(mdo 'grel): thob nor dang mtshungs pas lang tsho rmi lam du brtag pa/ /bud med 'jo sgeg so ga'i me tog 'khri shing song bde yi tshe/ /yan lag ma lus skyong zhing chags dang bral bas rang bzhin mdza' dag nyams/ /rgyal srid las nyams mi bdag bzhin de de nas bde
50b5(mdo 'grel): ba 'das pas gdung/ /bdag gi tshe btang slong ba rnams la yang dag 'os pa'i sbyin ma btang/ /phyogs phyogs dag tu grags pa'ang mi bskrun legs pa'i lam ni ma rtogs shing/ /slong ba'i dug 'thungs tsha dang grang ba yongs su rgyas pa lhag par thob/ /sdig
50b6(mdo 'grel): las ci yang 'jigs par ma gyur gang zhig de nyid kho na gyis/ /gser gyis ljon pa'i 'od ba phrog yid 'phrog lang tsho'i dpal 'di gang na ste/ /smin zhing mdzes bral srin bus bcas pa'i shing mtshungs lus 'di gal zhig/ na chung 'di dag mig gis reng
50b7(mdo 'grel): nas yongs spong zur na zhen gyur pa/ /bdag la nags kyi spre'u skams shing 'khyags pas 'khrugs pa bzhin zhes smra/ /lus 'di rnam par 'jig pa bsten te sgyu ma'i tshogs ni ma yin nyid/ /so yo nor bu kun dang skra de lhung ste skyon ni ma yin nyid/ /lus kyi
51a1(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus rlung ni rab tu stong te gti mug myu gu min/ /ma bstan la brkyang zad par gyur kyang bdag gi sred pa zad ma yin/ /de ltar bsams nas mi bzang dbugs mi rtsegs hig sogs rab tu rgyas gyur pas/ /'di ni yun ring 'dris pa'i 'jig
51a2(mdo 'grel): rten spyod tshul 'phrul la gtor rtsom ste/ /lkugs gyur dang gi skye bo dang bral sems shing nus pa chad pa las/ /bstan? pa nyams gyur dus la bab pa dbul la bu lon chen po bzhin/ /de zhig sa dang khang pa nor dang g.yog 'khor bu dang chud ma dang/ /srog ni
51a3(mdo 'grel): mthar thug dus su blo? yis de snyad gzhan yang bsam ba byas pa/ /ji srid skye ba la yang 'di ni slad nas chags rmongs 'ching ba dag/ de des nang du yongs su 'dris byas de yi rang bzhin ngo bor 'gro/ zangs chen stong phrag nang du sdig las kyis bskyed bzod par
51a4(mdo 'grel): dka' ba'i sdug bsngal dag/ spyad nas du 'bod thig nag dmyal pa rnams kyi skye gnas dag tu 'khor gyur cing/ gang yang bsod nams chas bsgrubs bde ba'i gnas de yang dag zad nas sdug bsngal de na/ /de slad phyir mi 'ong bcas 'bras phob slad du dri
51a5(mdo 'grel): med blo yis ting 'dzin mdzod/ /sems can rnams kyi dge thob slad/ /de skad srid pa'i chu gter ni/ /'jib la rung las sgrol brtul zhugs mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag gsungs/ /zhes pa dge pa'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems
51a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' i rtogs pa brjod par bag bsam gyi 'khri shing las mngal nas 'byung bstan pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu pa'o/ /gang zhig mnyes gshin byams pa'i blo yis dge ba'i slad du ni/ /srid pa'i 'jig rten skyes bu rnams kyi mchog tu rjes 'dzin dag/
51a7(mdo 'grel): 'bang bas? mdzad pa de dag sems can rnams pha snying rje dang/ /rjes su brtse? ba nye bar gnas pa'i legs ldan su zhig lags/ /ser skya'i gzhi la n+ya gro d+ha'i/ /kun dga' rar bzhugs bcom ldan 'das/ /blta phyir shAkya'i rgyal ba'i bu/ /dga' bo song
51b1(mdo 'grel): bar gyur to sngon/ /des 'byung gtam dang? gros dag gi/ gtsam mthar mdun na gnas pa la/ /rab tu byung ba mdzod cig ces/ /bcom ldan dgyes pas bka' stsal to/ /de yi drin la mngon dga' nos/ /dga' pos de la lan gsol ba/ /bcom ldan bsod nams
51b2(mdo 'grel): 'thob mos kyang/ /rab byung bdag ni mgon mi 'dod/ /khyod kyi nyes gnas su gyur nas/ /yo byad ji ltar bzhed kun gyis/ /re zhig dge slong dge 'dun la/ /gus pas bdag gi rim gro bgyi'o/ /'di brjod rin chen cod pan gyis/ /de yi zhabs pad la reg
51b3(mdo 'grel): nas/ /rgyal ba'i bu ni btsun mo la/ /chags bas rang gi khyim du song/ /de ni mdzes ma yid 'ong ma/ /dga' zhing mdzes dang yang dag phrad/ /yud tsam 'bral bar mi bzod pas/ /skyed tshal mchog tu rnam par rol/ /de nas nam zhig rang bzhin gyis//
51b4(mdo 'grel): yon tan ldan dge bcom ldan 'das/ /dge spong tshogs dang bcas pa dag /dga' bo'i khyim du rang nyid gshegs/ /kun dga' i bzhin ldan dga' bo yis/ /de yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing/ /cher 'os stan pa bzhugs de la/ /mchod pa byas nas rim gro
51b5(mdo 'grel): bskyed/ /gang zhig bcom ldan rang nyid kyi/ gzigs bas rjes su bzung byas pa/ /'di 'dra bsod nams myu gu rnams/ /gang zhig yongs su smin pa'i 'bras/ /bdag nyid chen po rnams dran nam/ /thos pa dang ni mthong gyur pa/ /'di de dge ba'i 'khri
51b6(mdo 'grel): shing gi/ 'bras bu chen po dag gi rgyan/ /khyod kyi snang ba byams pa ni/ /chen por gyur ba 'di mthong bas/ /snying gi chu skyes rgyas pa'i dpal/ /su zhig gi ni mi skyes 'gyur/ /bdag nyid che rnams mthong ba ni/ /sbyin ba bas kyang shin tu dga' / /
51b7(mdo 'grel): bsod nams pas kyang 'bras bu che/ /spyad bzang bas kyang bsngags par 'os/ /de skad brjod de'i gus pa dang/ mdza' o zhing byams pa nyid dag dang/ /sngon du mchod la mngon dgyes nas/ /bcom ldan 'das ni gshegs par brtson/ /dga' bo
52a1(mdo 'grel): de yi rjes 'brang ba/ /rang gi gser gyi snod du ni/ /mchog gi nyar spyad mngar po dag/ rang gi bsams pa bzhin du blangs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin du/ /gus pas bdag po bgrod mthong nas/ /'bral ba mi bzod mdzes ma yis/ /zur mig
52a2(mdo 'grel): gis ni nges par bltas/ /bla ma rnams mdun mig gi 'gros ni drang zhing rab tu g.yo ba dag/ yangs pa nyid kyi zur mig rab mdzes cung zad bye bas mdzes pa'i mchog /blta bya bltas nas gang zhig skad cig dud gyur de phyir lhag par ni/ /'gro bar mi bya mgon
52a3(mdo 'grel): po zhes ni thub pa tshig med gsungs pa bzhin/ /mdza' mo shugs ming ldan pa la/ /dga' po bzhin ni phyir phyogs nas/ /bdag ni ring po mi thogs par/ /'ong ba 'di nyid ces rab smras/ /de nas bcom ldan rang nyid kyi/ /gnas su byon la thal sbyar nas/ /re zhig rang
52a4(mdo 'grel): khyim mchi'o zhes/ /'bral ba bzod pa med pas smras/ /de nas khrir ma zhugs bcom ldan gyis/ /mdun du rab tu btud de la/ /'dzum dang bcas gsungs blta nyid/ /myur bar 'gro ba 'di ci zhig/ yul gyi rol bcags pa yi/ /kun rmongs kyis gzir sems can
52a5(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /kye ma khyim gyi de nyid la/ /yin 'byung las ni phyir phyogs blo/ /tshe yi rgyan ni yon tan te/ /yon tan rgyan ni dben pa'i/ /'di yi rgyan ni ? zhi ste/ /zhi ba'i rgyan ni tshogs bral lo/ /snying sdug sems la bkod pa'i blon po de dag bzod dka' i zug rdu'i
52a6(mdo 'grel): bum bu de/ /blo ldan rnams kyis de ni rnam par dpyad tshe tsho ni 'bras bral nyid du brtsis/ /gang yid phyags bzhin chags khral dben pa yis stong mtshan nyid med pa rnams dag gi/ skad cig 'di dag 'ong dang 'gro ba yang ni 'khor lo'i mu gyur g.yo ba bzhin/ /snying stobs
52a7(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i bsod nams blo ldan gyis thos rig byed ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang/ /skal ldan dag gi thams cad zhi ldan rnams kyi bdob? gor yang rnyed dka' min/ /mdza' dag dngos po'i rten gyur tsha ni shin tu chung ba'i cha ni yang dag rnyed dka' ste/ /'bres med nyid kyis
52b1(mdo 'grel): gang gis zad 'gyur mya ngan 'os pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yul gyi chu gter g.yon ma'i glong 'khyil 'jo sgeg chu yis gang gyur pa/ /dregs pa mi bzang chu srin rab la'as? mtshan mas 'khrugs par rab bskyed cing/ /lhag par 'bral ba'i rta gdong me ni rab
52b2(mdo 'grel): 'bar rtag tu gnas pa la/ /skyes bu rnams ni sgrol lam chags bral drag po kho na bsdams pa'i stegs/ /de slad rab byung gzung bar mdzod/ /rgyal po'i sras ni dbang po thul/ /bud med bde dang dpal 'byor 'di/ /myur du yang dag 'grogs pa bzhin/
52b3(mdo 'grel): dge ba nyid slad changs pa yi/ /spyod pa yongs su gzung bar mdzod/ /'khor ba snying po med pa'i khyim/ /gdon ngan 'di ni gtang bar mdzod/ /bcom ldan gsungs ni snying rje yis/ /brgyan pa de dag thos gyur nas/ /don gnyer mchod 'os gyis bsdams pa'i/
52b4(mdo 'grel): dga' bos de la lan gsol pa/ /rtag tu khyod nyid bsnyen pa nyid/ /bcom ldan bdag gi rab byung yin/ /dge slong dge 'dun rim gror ni/ /'os pa'i khyim la mchog tu gus/ /de skad smras nas bcom ldan gsung/ /bsgom bya'i dbang phyug min pa dang//
52b5(mdo 'grel): dga' ma la dags drangs pas 'di'i/ /bsam pa khyogs la phyang mo yug/ yang dang yang du bcom ldan gyis/ /'di la brtul zhugs nyer bstan mdzad/ /phan par brtson pa'i dam pa rnams/ /mi 'os pa nyid mi bsam mo/ /dbang po ma thul dga' ba ni//
52b6(mdo 'grel): gang tshe rab byung mi 'dod la/ /de tshe de yi lus la de/ /bcom ldan gsungs gis rang nyid lhung/ /de tshe de yi ngur smrig gos/ /mgo zlum lag na lhung bzed can/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams kyis/ /gser gyi 'od zer lta bur mdzes/ /dgon pa pa dang bsod snyoms
52b7(mdo 'grel): par/ /rgyal ba'i bka' yis der gyur to/ /khyim las khyim ni med nyid dang/ /phyag dar khrod pa nyid tu gyur/ /de ni rab tu byung gyur kyang/ /snying la yang dag bcags pa yis/ /sngo bsangs dga' ma rtag tu 'dzin/ /zla ba'i mtshan ma mdzes pa bzhin/ /gang
53a1(mdo 'grel): yang sems kyi chags pa dag /bkrus kyang bdag pa rin pa gang/ /lam ni gang nas nang du zhugs/ /shel gyi bzhin du mi shes so/ /bral bas skya bor gyur pa'i 'od/ /chos gos dmar po yang dag chags/ /de ni thun mtshams sprin dum gyis/ /mtshon
53a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i zla ba'i dpal 'phrog gyur/ /nags na rgyu zhing rol byed la/ /ring cing 'dzin pa brjed pa de/ /lus med skye ba'i rig byed kyi/ /mdzes ma dag ni brjed ma gyur/ /rdo ba'i gzhil bsdad nas ni/ /yongs rdzogs zla ba'i bzhin ras kyis/ /bzhin la bsam gtan g.yo
53a3(mdo 'grel): med kyi/ /yun ring dag tu de de bsams/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ /'bad pas rjes bzung 'di dag kyang/ /chags pas byin brlabs bdag gi sems/ /dri ma dang bral nyid mi 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i spyod tshul thos gyur cing/ /grogs med brtul zhugs
53a4(mdo 'grel): bsten mod kyang/ /ri dags gzhon nu'i mig can ma/ /bdag gi yid la brjed pa med/ /mdzes ma'i gur gum gyis reg chags pa'i skal bzang lus la snam sbyar legs par bgos/ /de yi? nu rgyas dkyil 'khor rab tu nyed pa'i lag bas lhung
53a5(mdo 'grel): bzed legs par bzung/ /gang zhig byang chub bgegs su 'gyur ba de la dmigs pa'i nyin mtshan bsam gtan can/ /bdag gi chags bdag ni gal te 'phel na mchog tu rigs pa nyid du 'phel/ /mdzes ma skad cig gis ni bdag 'ong zhes/ /sngon
53a6(mdo 'grel): ni de la de ltar 'ong bar brjod/ /kye ma phrad ba'i bgegs gyur brtul zhugs 'di/ /byas pa mi bzo bdag gis phyin nas blangs/ /rab tu 'dar zhing g.yo pa'i tshig gis 'gro par mi bya zhes smras shing/ /bla ma'i skye bo gnas tshe gang zhig rlung yab dor nas thub
53a7(mdo 'grel): ba yang ma bzung/ /gang zhig rkang pas sa la 'bri zhing mthong min na yang bdag la zur mig mtshon/ /dgag pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i rim pa de yi bdag gis yid ni de yis bsdams/ /bdag bral ri dwags mig can de/ /'jug dogs dur ba mo bzhin du//
53b1(mdo 'grel): ba gam can na mya ngan dang /sgrog cir mi nyal yod dam snyam/ /kye hud dga' ma g.yon can ni/ /'da' zhig pa bzhin bden pa btang/ /khyod kyi sems kyis chom rkun ras/ /rdzun gyis brtul zhugs 'di la brten/ /re zhig brtul zhugs 'di btang nas/ /mdzes ma'i gam du
53b2(mdo 'grel): 'gro bar bya/ /gang phyir chags pa'i mes gdungs pas/ /dka' thub gdung ba bzod pa ba? dka' / /sdig can yun ring nas 'ongs pa/ /bdag mthong rgyal po'i bu mo de/ /gsar du skyes pa'i khro ba yis/ /ci byed par 'gyur yod mi shes/ /mdzad la chags pa'i rdul gyi cha/
53b3(mdo 'grel): gnod cing dga' med bzod dka' ba/ /nges par bzlog pa dka' ba nyid/ /kun tu rnam 'gyur nyid kyi slad/ /gang gi dus na bcom ldan gyis/ /nags 'di btang bar mthong gyur ba/ /de tshe kho na bdag khyim du/ /'gro bar bya zhes 'di nges so/ /da ni dga' ba'i dmigs rten du//
53b4(mdo 'grel): rdo yi glegs bu 'di nyid la/ /ro yin khams ni yid 'ong gis/ /zla bzhin ma de bdag gis khri/ /yang na gang gis mdzes sdug thigs/ /bdud rtsi utpal zla ba 'dra/ /mdzes ma de ni ri mo yi/ /yul du ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog ri dags mig ni bung ba
53b5(mdo 'grel): g.yo bas khyab pa'i utpal 'khyil ba bzhin/ /'od sgeg chu gter 'gram du byu du'i nags lngar? mchu ni phim pa'i 'od rab gsal/ /gang yang kha yi 'od de skyon med bdud rtsi'i zer gyi dan mthun dag gis lam/ /mdzes ma'i lus ni ngo mtshar snying po ri mo'i lam
53b6(mdo 'grel): du ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'di bsams de yi rdo gzhi la/ /mchims bkrus shing 'dar ba yis/ /'khrugs pa'i sor mos ji ltar yang/ /mdzes ma dge ni dal bus bris/ /de yi rtogs pas gsal byas pa'i/ /gzugs brnyan lta bu la brten bas//
53b7(mdo 'grel): sngon du byas nas mdzes ma la/ /mchims 'dzer 'dzer? skad du smras/ /mig gnyis ma lus bde ba'i char rgyun ston ba'i zla ba'i bzhin ras can/ /mdzes ma bdag gis bris te mig chus rgyas pas skad cig kyang ma mthong/ /gzugs can ma dang bral la
54a1(mdo 'grel): bltos med brtul zhugs ldan pa bdag la ni/ /sdig las ci yang gdung pa rab bskyed dmod pa zug pa ma yin nam/ /rgyas pa'i chu skyes nags kyi 'od 'dra dga' ba'i mig gis rjes su chags pa'i lus/ /de yi dus na nye bar gyur pa'i bar chad gyis//
54a2(mdo 'grel): bskrun khro ba yang dag thong/ /kwa ye mdzes ma bdag la chig lan byin ci mi smra bar ni ci la 'dug/ bden par bdag kyang khyor la chags pa'i chos gos 'di bsam brtul zhugs so/ /de skad smra zhing bud med dag /bris pa ring nas mthong gyur nas/ /khro ldan dge slong
54a3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs smras/ /bcom ldan khyed kyis mdul la/ /mnyes gshin 'ba' zhig pa nyid las/ /rab tu byung ba 'di byin te/ /khyi la me tog phreng ba bzhin/ /mdzes ma bris nas dga' bo 'di/ /rdo ba'i gzhi la ngas bu
54a4(mdo 'grel): yis/ /de brjod bzlas pa la chags shing/ /bsam gtan la ni dmigs par 'gyur/ /de dag thos nas bcom ldan gyis/ /dga' ma bral bas rmongs gyur pa'i/ /dga' bo nags nas bos nas ni/ /'di dag ci zhes rab tu dris/ /des smras bcom ldan bden
54a5(mdo 'grel): par ni/ /mchog tu mdzes ma la chags pa dag/ dge slong rnams ni 'dod gyur kyang/ /nags tshal 'da? la blo mi dga' / /de skad dga' bo'i tshig thos nas/ /zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /'dod chags chu skyes 'dzum pa bzhin/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas
54a6(mdo 'grel): de la gsungs/ /kun tu chags las mi rigs blo/ /dam ba khyod kyi rigs ma yin/ /dge la mngon par gnas rnams kyis/ /sems ni bgegs rnams kyi mi khugs/ /longs spyod rtswa yis zegs ma dang mtshungs btang la mngon sbyor rigs pa 'di ni gang//
54a7(mdo 'grel): skad cig bde ba'i ro myang tshogs dang 'gogs pa smad 'os 'di ni gang/ /chags pas 'ongs pa rnams ni gang du 'phral la lung byed bzod dkar gyur pa yi/ /bsgral dka' bdud kyi lam 'di rigs nyid kyis ni dge ba 'phrog par byed pa yin/ /de skad de la
54b1(mdo 'grel): chags bral dag/ yun ring bstan mdzad des na 'dir/ /'dug bya zhes brjod bcom ldan dang/ /rang gi bya ba'i slad du gshegs/ /mdzes ma lta la chags gyur pa'i/ /dga' ldan dga' bos gnas skabs der/ /'gro bar 'os pas bsams nas ni/ /rang gi khyim
54b2(mdo 'grel): du chas par gyur/ /gtsug lag khang ni mang po yis/ /sgo rnams bcad pas yun ring na/ /grong khyer mngon phyogs lam dag ni/ /ji zhig ltar stes? thob nas bgrod/ /de nas chags las 'gro brtson de/ /thams cad mkhyen pa bcom ldan gyis/ /mkhyen nas
54b3(mdo 'grel): mngon phyogs bka' stsal pa/ /dga' bo mgyogs par gang du 'gro/ des smras bcom ldan re zhig ni/ /nags na bdag la dga' ba med/ /sems ni dal bsos min rnams kyis/ /bya ba gang yang dag pa min/ /dpal ni rnga yab bzhad ldan de dang nor bu'i rang bzhin dga' 
54b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i ba gam phreng ldan de/ /a mra'i 'khri shing rlung bzhon gyis bskyod skyed tshal gsar pa'i sa gzhi mdzes pa de dang ni/ /me tog mda' can gzhu yi 'khri shing gzugs bzang lto ba phra ba'i mdzes ma de dag la/ /skye ba gzhan gyi bag chags bzhin du bdag gi yid ni chags
54b5(mdo 'grel): las rnam par mi grol lo/ /yid ni chags bcas kho na yis/ /tshangs par spyod pa bdag gis spyad/ /brtul zhugs 'chid pa'i gzeb dag gis/ /mkha' la 'gro ba bsdams pa bzhin/ /gos ni mtshon gyis dmar pa yis/ /'dod chags bral ba nyid mi 'gyur//
54b6(mdo 'grel): rab byung btang nas bdag 'gro'o/ /bdag gi dmyal ba zad gyur cig/ de skad lan cig min smra zhing/ /rang gnas 'gro bar brtson de la/ /zlog cing rjes bzung blo gros kyis/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ /shes ldan skye bo nyer bsten la/ /so so'i skye bor mi
54b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bzhin/ /dga' bo thos pas rnam par grags/ /smad cing bslad pa ma byed cig/ rnam par rig pas skyon bshig cing/ /tshul khrims ldan pa mkhas rnams blo/ /snying po med pa'i bde ba la/ /chags pas bya min la mi 'jug/ mchog tu smad pa'i khang par ni/ /
55a1(mdo 'grel): dan pa'i las la kun tu chags/ /rgya chen 'dod chags 'dzin pa khyod/ /ngo tsha skye ba min pa ci/ /skye gnas la skyes skye gnas chags/ /nu ma 'thungs pa nu ma nyed/ /kye mdo tsha mi byed pa/ /skye ba nyid la brlag par gyur/ /rtag tu dam pa'i skye bo spangs/ /ma
55a2(mdo 'grel): yi sgrom la chags gyur pa/ /sems ni kun rmongs kyis bcom pa'i/ /phyugs rnams nyid la mthong ba yin/ /bud med skyes pa'i nga rgyal 'di/ /khyod kyis dga' dang bral nas thong/ /srid pa'i khur bur lag 'gro rnams/ /longs spyod dang bcas 'jig pa thong/ /sgrom
55a3(mdo 'grel): las skyes pa'i dga' bdag/ su yi yid 'byung skyed mi byed/ /gang gi mjug tu khyi rnams kyang/ /nges par kha ni phyir phyogs 'gyur/ /khyim gyi rgya las rnam grol khyod/ /de nyid du mngon rgyug pa ci/ /gang phyir ri dags thar gyur pa/ /slar yang rgyar ni 'jug pa min/ /de
55a4(mdo 'grel): skad bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa'i/ /bka' yis nges par bsdams pa yi/ /dga' bo mdzes ma sems byed cing/ /slar yang gnas su rab tu zhugs/ /de nas nam zhig dga' bo la/ /gnas khang phyag dar bskos nas ni/ /phongs pa rjes 'dzin la brtson pa'i/ /bcom ldan
55a5(mdo 'grel): ? yang rab tu bshegs/ /de yis bka' yis gnas gang dag/ spyod la rab zhugs dga' ba yi/ /bsam pa las ni 'dod chags bzhin/ /sa las rdul rnams yod ma song/ /yongs su spyod ba'i chu dag ni/ /len du song bar gyur pa de'i/ /yang yang bkang zhing rab blangs
55a6(mdo 'grel): tshe/ /bum pa stong ba nyid du gyur/ /bgegs ni de yis yid dag ni/ /shin tu skyo nas 'gro ba'i slad/ /mdzes ma lta bar 'dod pa yi/ /dga' bo btang nas rab tu song/ /de nas re ba brtan pa yis/ /'gro ba de ni kun mkhyen gyi/ /lha yi spyan gyis mkhyen gyur
55a7(mdo 'grel): nas 'phral la mngon phyogs bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma mdza' pa'i snum gyi dri/ /snod du sbyar bas ? byed cing/ /khyod kyis chags pa mtshan mo'i 'od/ /mar me bzhin du zhi mi 'gyur ro/ /g.yon ma mchog tu mngon 'dod pas/ /ci yang khyod snying la chags 'di/ /de rung
55b1(mdo 'grel): yang 'di mi 'bral te/ /gang zhig rams kyi tshon bzhin no/ /chags pa rab tu brtsams pa'i tshe/ /de dus 'jigs shing long bar byed/ /yan lag gtsor bgrod rab zhugs tshe/ /smad ba nyid kyis kun tu 'khyud/ /yul gyi nyams myong dang 'grogs pa/ /sdig pa'i grogs lta'i
55b2(mdo 'grel): dbang po yis/ /sdug bsngal bzod dka' 'khyil pa yis/ /dmyal bar mi rnams 'phen par byed/ /grogs ngan rag pa'i cha yis kyang/ /lhag bar rab tu sgo bar byed/ /nya dang ro ni rul pa yi/ /dring rab tu ldang ba bzhin/ /dge ba'i grogs kyis reg gyur ba/ /rnam pa kun tu
55b3(mdo 'grel): dge ba 'dzin/ /dge ba'i dri bzang gis khyab bzhin/ /gang zhin rin ni chen por byed/ /'di brjod de la bcom ldan gyis/ /dam pa dam pa min pa'i lam/ /mngon du reg pas dri bstan nas/ /grogs ni de dag bstan pa mdzad/ /de nas dga' bo bcom ldan gyis/ /khyer nas
55b4(mdo 'grel): ri yi dbang po ni/ /spos dad ldan pa'i dags kyis/ /rnga ma'i rlung yab g.yob bar gshegs/ /der ni nags mes tshig gyur cing/ /mi sdug shin tu ring pa'i lus/ /spra mo zhar ma de la ni/ /bstan nas rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ /dga' po 'di ni mthong dam ci//
55b5(mdo 'grel): sman pas shin tu smad pa'i dbyibs/ /'di la'ang su zhig 'os pa yis/ /dga' mar mthong nas sred pa yin/ /legs dang mi legs yod nyid min/ /dga' ba nyid du chags pas lta/ /'jig rten na ni skye bo gang/ /gang gi dga' de de yis dga' / /'di dang mdzes
55b6(mdo 'grel): med yi ni/ /mdzes pa'i bar ni ci zhig yod/ /dga' po khyod kyi phyogs ltung dag/ rab tu thong la bden par smos/ /bdag gis don du ma gnyer slad/ /mdzes pa'i khyad nyid rig pa med/ /don du gnyer na dga' bar 'gyur/ /dga' ba nyid na mdzes pa nyid/ /'di dang de
55b7(mdo 'grel): la khyad par dag/ ngas ni cung zad ma mthong ste/ /sha lpags rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor la/ /dga' ba dam tshig byas tsam nyid/ /de skad bcom ldan gyis dri ba/ /shin tu rigs min dris gyur cing/ /gang yang bla mas bsdams gyur pa'i/ /dga' bos de la lan
56a1(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ /bcom ldan de skad ci la gsungs/ /gang 'di mya ngan la tse 'dri/ /kun gyi bla ma gtso bor ni/ /gyur pa su yis rnam par bul/ /mdzes ma yi ni dga' bde/ /mchog gi cha las mdzes pa ste/ /'gro las rgyal ba'i dran pa yang/ /gang mthong
56a2(mdo 'grel): dga' ma mi dren no/ /de yi mdzes pas ku mud tshal/ /dga' bzhin zla ba'i 'od kyi min/ /grags pa'i lam 'gro blun po yis/ /yon tan khyad par yod mi shes/ /de yi me tog tshogs rnams bzhin gyi dri bzang nor la ni/ /bskus par mthong nas rab tu rgyas pa'i skra
56a3(mdo 'grel): tshogs dag la bcings/ /'jo sgeg 'gros dang mig gis mdzes pa dag la bskus gyur pa'i/ /dang pa ri dwags 'jigs bzhin nags nyid du ni bros sam snyam/ /ri dags mig can dpe med mde? yongs 'dris brtag pa mi nyung zhing/ /rnam mang rnam par rtog pas kyang
56a4(mdo 'grel): ni bri bar nus pa nyid ma yin/ /gang gi bzhin mdzes dag dang srang la gzhal cho yang ba nyid kyis na/ /rgyu skar bdag po de ni mkha' la lhag par mdzas pa ma yin nam/ /bsod nams kyis 'thob yid 'ong smin ma'i 'khri shing g.yo ldan sgeg cing rol/ /de yi bzhin
56a5(mdo 'grel): ni yid 'phrog dga' dang ldan te mi 'thob na/ /rab byung 'dis bdag legs byas lhag par ci zhig bgyid 'gyur 'di yi slad/ /brtul zhugs yo byad khur du gyur pa 'di dag ci slad bdag khur ?/ /de skad dga' po'i tshig thos nas/ /chags pa rab tu
56a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa de/ /bcom ldan rang gi mthus blangs nas/ /lha yi gnas su phyin par gyur/ /brgya byin dga' tshal de ru ni/ /bdud rtsi bsrubs las rab 'khrungs pa'i/ /lha yi bu mo mdzes pa dag/ de la rab tu bstan par gyur/ /rkang pa pad tshal las 'khrungs pa//
56a7(mdo 'grel): mdzes pa'i rgyud ni dmar po yis/ /chu gter dogs kyi byu ru yi/ /nags kyi rjes su 'khrid pa bzhin/ /yongs 'du lhan cig skyes pa yi/ /yal 'dab chags pa ltar gyur pa/ /rol cing sgeg pa'i grogs po yi/ /lag pas chu skyes dag las rgyal mdzeS
56b1(mdo 'grel): shing yid 'ong rol ba dang/ /'dod pa kun tu dga' ba'i grogs/ /chu skyes pad blag nyid du ni/ /'dzum byed zla ba'i 'gran zla dang/ /kriSh+Na sA ra'i mig dag dang/ /kun rmongs gso bas nag mo ni/ /brtsegs pa'i ri mos reg pa yi/ /bdud rtsi tshogs kyi bskor ba bzhin/ /mdzes sdug
56b2(mdo 'grel): lang tsho rdzogs gyur pa/ /de dag mthong nas 'phral nyid du/ /kun dga' i bzhin ldan dga' ba ni/ /rdul gyis bkrus pa bzhin du gyur/ /padmo'i bzhin ras dang ni utpal rgyas pa'i mig /kun da'i 'dzum dang me tog tshom bu'i nu rgyas can/ /de dag rnams la dga' bo'i
56b3(mdo 'grel): snying ni cig car du/ /phyags lhung bung ba rol cing g.yo ba dang mtshungs thob/ /de la yid song dga' bo la/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /dga' bo 'di dag mthong ba dang/ /chags pas khyod blo dga' 'am ci/ /'di rnams dag dang mdzes ma de'i/ /mdzes sdug
56b4(mdo 'grel): khyad par ji snyed cig/ gzhan gyi cha las rab gyur pa/ /gsal ba kho nar rtogs par bya/ /gal te lha mo rnams kyi gzugs/ /mdzes ma'i gzugs bas lhag pa na/ /de phyir de dag kho na nyid/ /dus kyis khyod la brten par byas/ /re zhig rab tu dang ba'i blo/ /yid ni chags bral
56b5(mdo 'grel): kho na yis/ /tshangs spyod spyod cig de nas ngas/ /lha mo'i tshogs ni khyod la sbyin/ /de ltar bcom ldan gsung gis ni/ /nges pa skyes pa'i dga' bo yis/ /de bzhin zhes brjod brtul zhugs sems/ /mtho ris bu mo'i bsam pas byas/ /de dag 'grogs 'dod gyur pas
56b6(mdo 'grel): ? /rang gi chung ma la gus dman/ /yon tan zong mtshungs dga' ba yis/ /mdza' ba bden pa nyid ma yin/ /skyes bu'i goms skyes mdza' ba ni/ /gzhan du yongs su dman pa yis/ /kye ma gnas ni brjed gyur nas/ /'phral la gzhan du rgyug pa nyid/ /skad cig lang tsho
56b7(mdo 'grel): dga' ba yi/ /mdza' ba gcugs ba nyams pa yis/ /bden pa ma yin rtag min te/ /lus can rnams kyi bde ba bzhin/ /de nas dga' bo bcom ldan gyis/ /skad cig gis ni rang gnas khyer/ /nges pa de yis tshangs spyod ni/ /dul pa nyid kyi brtul zhugs spyad/ /mdzes
57a1(mdo 'grel): ma'i mdzes stug? phun tshogs pa/ /gzhan gyi blo des brjes par 'gyur/ /skad cig rab nyams dga' ba ni/ /yon tan la'ang dman par 'gyur/ /de nas nam zhig dga' bo ni/ /rgyu bas rab 'jigs dmyal ba'i tshogs/ 'jigs rung zangs chen
57a2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa yang/ /'ga' zhig dag tu mthong bar gyur/ /de mthong nyid na sdug bsngal zhing/ /'dar bar gyur pas 'di ci zhes/ /de yis de ni tshogs pa yi/ /'jigs rung dmyal srung rnams la dris/ /de la des smras tsha ba yis/ /zangs chen brgya ni rdzogs pa 'di//
57a3(mdo 'grel): shin tu chags ldan rgyal po'i bu/ /dga' bo la ni byas pa yin/ /chags bral nyid ni dud? yang/ /brtul zhugs log pa de mi bsten/ /mtho ris rung? med 'grogs bsams pas/ /tshangs par sbyad ba sbyod pa nyid/ /bskam chags log pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /chags
57a4(mdo 'grel): sdang snyigs ma can rnams kyi/ /rtag tu tsha ba'i zangs chen ni/ /'di dag 'jig pa med pa'i gnas/ /de ltar dga' bos yang dag thos/ /spu lo dgos ltar rgyas gyur cing/ /der ni rjes su gdud ba yis/ /lus po dum bur gyur bzhin sems/ /gnas su mngon mong
57a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod chags kyi/ /bag chags zhen pa btang byas nas/ /bla med tshangs gang spyod pha ni/ /yongs su rdzogs shing dul bar gyur/ /nang du tha tshom rnam grol zhing/ /sdug po'i rmongs ba zad las de'i?/ /yid ni rab dang thob gyur te/ /ston ka'i klung gi chu bzhin no/ /'dod
57a6(mdo 'grel): ba med cing rab zhi thob/ /mchog tu nges bar der zhugs pa/ /dam ba'i blo yis bcom ldan la/ /yang dag mngon du phyogs te smras/ /bcom ldan bdag la bya ba ni/ /lha mos yod min mongs mas min/ /gnang ba dang bcas yul gyi dbal/ /'di dag mjug
57a7(mdo 'grel): ni mdzas dang bral/ /ji lta ji ltar dngos rnams kyi/ /ngo bo nyid med 'di bsgoms ba/ /de lta de ltar sgrib ba dang/ /bral ba'i sbyong tshul rab gsal 'gyur/ /de skad smra ba'i dga' bo dag /rim gyis dgra bcom gnas thob pa/ /yod pa mu myang 'das dag pa
57b1(mdo 'grel): dag/ 'grub par bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis/ /'bras bu dga' bos thob gyur ces/ /dge slong rnams kyis mngon phyogs dris/ /rgyal bas de la bka' stsal ba/ skye ba gzhan bsgrubs bsod nams kyis/ /legs byas goms par byas gyur
57b2(mdo 'grel): bas/ /dga' bos dge ba'i rtsa ba yis/ /'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa thob/ /dri med yangs pa'i rigs su skyes shing dran pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bu'i lus/ /dpal 'byor skye bo bde ba'i grogs mo spyod tshul dam brtag tu dga' / /sems ni rab tu zhi ba'i chus bkrus rang bzhin
57b3(mdo 'grel): lugs kyi 'gros ldan 'di/ /skyes bu rnams kyi dge ba'i me tog dag gis 'bras bu cher 'khrungs yin/ /a ru NA ldan grong khyer du/ /sngon tshes bdag a ru NAs/ /dgra bcom yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ni/ /nor bu'i rang bzhin byed pa
57b4(mdo 'grel): la/ /byams ldan zhes pa bram za'i bu/ /bsod nams chen po'i bgo skal gyi/ /skal ldan byed bo nyid du gyur/ /de nyid kyis ni dge slong gi/ dge 'dun bsro khang sbyin khrus byas/ /de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis/ /khyim bdag gi ni rigs su skyes/ /bsod nams dang
57b5(mdo 'grel): tshul de ni sngon/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas gyur/ /mdzes ldan phreng bas mngon brgyan pa'i/ /rab 'bar mchod rten dag kyang byas/ /de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis/ /de ni legs skyes zhes bya ba/ /ka sha'i bdag po kri ki'i bu/ /gsal ba'i mtshan gyis
57b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan par gyur/ /dag bcom yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od srungs mya ngan 'das ba'i mthar/ /mchod rten rin chen bdun rang bzhin/ /ka shi'i sa yi bdag pos byas/ /de yi bu ni legs skyes kyis/ /'od gsal gser gyi gdugs dag btsugs//
57b7(mdo 'grel): dga' bo de yi smon lam gyis/ /da lta shA kya'i rigs su skyes/ /de ltar sngon skye'i rim pas thob ba legs byas kyis bslang ba'i/ /gang yang yangs pa'i bsod nams kho nas dri med rigs dang ni/ /yid 'od gzugs dang longs spyod mchog dang zhi ba yongs 'dris mthar
58a1(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i gnas su legs par 'gro ba dag kyang dga' bos thob/ /dga' bo dge bar mdzad pa la/ /de skad gsungs nas bcom ldan gyis/ /dge slong gi ni dge 'dun la/ /legs byas de de bstan pa mdzod?/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub
58a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las mdzes dga' ba'i rtogs pa brjod ba'i yal 'dab ste bcu gcig pa'o// //gong na med pa'i gnas su dri med blo/ /dri? ma dang dral dge ba'i skas la 'jog/ blo gros dri ma can ni dmyal ba'i khung? du
58a3(mdo 'grel): 'jigs rung mun pa 'thibs pa dag tu ltung/ /shAkya rnams kyi grong khyer sngon/ /ser skya'i gzhi ni rab rgyas par/ /shAkya'i gtso bo chen po yi/ /'bangs kyi ku mo bzhin bzang ma/ /bstan bcos dag la ngal ba byas/ /sgyu rtsal kun la mkhas dang ldan/ /yon
58a4(mdo 'grel): tan rigs ldan phreng can ma/ /zhes pa 'dod pa'i phreng ba bzhin/ /skyed tshal mchog na rje bo yi/ /tshig gis me tog 'thu brtson pa/ /de yi mdun du bde gshegs ni/ /'chag cing yang dag 'ong ba mthong/ /de mthong nyid na da yi yid/ /rab tu dang bdag tu gyur/ /
58a5(mdo 'grel): ston ka'i dus ni dri med kyis/ /yid ni rab tu dang ba bzhin/ /de mthong bas bsgrubs dga' bdag/ gnas par byas pa des bsams pa/ /bdag gi bsod snyoms legs byas kyis/ /bcom ldan len par gyur na zhes/ /snying rje rgyas ba'i kun mkhyen gyis/ /de
58a6(mdo 'grel): yi brnag pa kun mkhyen nas/ /ltung bzed bstan bcos bcom ldan gyis/ /bzang po byin zhes de la gsungs/ /re ba yongs su rdzegs pa des/ /de la phyag byas phul nas ni/ /? mo'i sdug bsngal bzlog pa'i slad/ /smon lam dag ni byas par gyur/ /de nas
58a7(mdo 'grel): de yi pha yi grogs/ /gnyis skyes nam zhig 'ongs pa yis/ /mtshan ma ldan pa'i phyogs mthong nas/ /ya mtshan gyur pas de la smras/ /kye ma dpal ldan khyim bdag de'i/ /bu mo gnyer dang ? gyur cing/ /nor dang longs spyod spangs nas ni/ /bu mo khyod ni
58b1(mdo 'grel): 'bangs mor gyur/ /kye ma gti mug sbrin dag gis/ /brtsams pas skad cig gsal ba'i glog/ 'khor ba sbrul gyis lce dag gi /rol pa bzhin du dpal 'byor g.yo/ /dge ma rdzogs pa ma byed cig/ ngas shes lag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /ring po min pa nyid na khyod/ /sa
58b2(mdo 'grel): yi bdag po'i dga' mar gyur/ /khyod kyi lag pa dbal mo yi/ /pad ltar mnyen la phreng ba dang/ /'khor lo lcags kyu'i dbyibs 'di mthong/ /de skad brjod nas gnyis skyes song/ /de nas yid spubs? longs spyod grogs/ /sbrang rtsi 'thung ba rnams kyi gnyen/ /
58b3(mdo 'grel): skal bzang 'khri shing 'khyud byed ba/ /legs ldan dbyid ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /mdzes ma'i nga rgyal gnyis 'thung dgra /dbyid ni ral pa ldan pa dag/ glal bar byed pa'i lce bzhin du/ /mya ngan med ba'i dog pa mdzes/ /gzhon nu'i 'gram pa mdzes pa yi/ /rkun bo tsam pa
58b4(mdo 'grel): ka yi tshogs/ /mi ge bzangs ma yi skra zhags la/ /bcing bar 'os pa nyid du gyur/ /dpyid kyis a mra'i me tog gis/ /khyo dang bral rnams pha rol bsgral/ /mthu ldan rnam bar ma thul ba/ /gzhan dag 'joms la bltos pa med/ /sbrang rtsi 'thungs bas
58b5(mdo 'grel): a mra yis/ /'khri shing mchog tu dpyad byar gyur/ /yid 'ong longs spyod mkhas rnams kyis/ /'phral nyid dbyad bar bya ba bzhin/ /a mra'i 'khri shing gzhul mda'/ /bkod pa a mra'i mtshon dang ldan/ /rgyal gyur cig ces bdag dregs la/ /slongs mo ba
58b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin khu byug sgrogs/ /skabs 'dir ko sa la yi dbang/ /dbal dang ldan pa gsal rgyal ni/ /ri dwags 'dod du song ba dag/ rta yis khyer nas yul der 'ongs/ /gzhu ldan yid 'ong rnam pa can/ /rta las babs par gyur pa nges/ /mdzes ma dga' ma gzhan pa
58b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /mdzes sdug gzhan yod min par mthong/ /mig gi lam nas ya mtshan las/ /yid byung rab tu zhugs gyur te/ /bdag nyid chen po de yi yid/ /de la lta 'dod rnam par rgyas/ /'phral la 'jigs par rab gyur cing/ /de ches gdod btung de mthong
59a1(mdo 'grel): nas/ /mdzes pa'i rlabs kyis phroD pa yis/ /mi yi bdag pos bsam par gyur/ /gang gi mdzes pas nyin mtshan du/ /mig gi 'dab brgya rnam rgyas byed/ /gzhon nu zla bzhin sngo bsangs ma/ /mig 'bras g.yo ldan ma 'di su/ /pA Da la mchu b+ha ku la'i//
59a2(mdo 'grel): dri bzang la ni bung pa bzhin/ /'di yi bzhin la me tog mtshon/ /dpyid dang mdzes pa mthong bar gyur/ /kye ma mdzes sdug mi dman zhing/ /lang tsho rnam par rgyas pa'i lus/ /brtan ldan bdag gi 'ang brtan pa ni/ /gang gis brkus ba bzhin du dogs/ /kye ma sbrang
59a3(mdo 'grel): rtsi'i dogs pa dag/ rmad byung yon tan rtsom pas kyang/ /rkang drug pas kyang rkang las rkang/ /gang gis 'gro bar ma nus so/ /de ltar bsams nas sa spyod kyis/ /de mthong nags kyi lha ru shes/ /de yis rim gyis bshad pa yis/ /de yi sbyod tshul rnam
59a4(mdo 'grel): par rig/ de rjes der ni gus byas te/ /de yis yal 'dab rlung yab dang/ /gcod zhing bsil ba'i chu yis kyang/ /yi bdag bde ba thob bar gyur/ /de yi zhabs kyi pad ma dag/ de yis mnyes shing lag pa yi/ /chu skyes reg pas ngal ba de/ /'phral lag nyid
59a5(mdo 'grel): dag thob par gyur/ /de nas skad cig gis rab sad/ /ri dwags bdas pa'i dal ba bsos/ /de ni lha yis reg pa yis/ /dga' ma gzugs can gyur pa shes/ /de nas shAkya chen pos kyang/ /ko sa la dbang 'ongs pa dag/ thos nas de la mngon phyogs te/ /
59a6(mdo 'grel): mchod par 'os pa de la mchod/ /gus bcas blangs ba'i phreng can ma/ /'dod ba'i bkra shis me tog phreng/ /de yis rang gi bu mo bzhin/ /rin chen mdzes ba de la byin/ /'dzam dkar yid las skyes pa yi/ /bdan da ni blangs byas nas/ /sa yi bdag
59a7(mdo 'grel): po glang po la/ /zhon nas rang gi grong khyer song/ /glang po ri bo'i steng don/ /lan bu g.yo ba'i bung ba can/ /rgyal po dbyid dang 'grogs pa yis/ /gsar ba phreng can ? de mdzes/ /mdzes ma de dang lhan cig tu/ /rgyal po'i phro brang phyin nas de/ /rin chen ?
59b1(mdo 'grel): gam 'od zer can/ /yid 'ong khang par rnam par rol/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo sdon ma ni/ /lha mo dbyar gyi rnam par mi/ /spyod tshul tha dad nyid min sems/ /rgyal po'i dpal mos gzhi bzhin/ /de ni de yi reg pas dang/ /de yang de yi gzugs bzang gis/ /phan tshun yon tan phul
59b2(mdo 'grel): byung bas/ /mchog tu ya mtshan ldan par gyur/ /sngon ma lha yi gzugs ldan dang/ /phyin ma lha yi reg ldan des/ /ngo mtshar ldan pa de dag gtam/ /'jig rten dag tu rab tu grags/ /bar der de dag lha yi ni/ /gzugs dang yang dag reg pa'i rgyu/ /gnas su dge slong rnams
59b3(mdo 'grel): kyis dris/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas rab tu gsungs/ sngon tshe thos mchog ces bya ba la/ /gnyis kyis khyim par gyur ba yi/ /chung ma mdza' mo mdzes ma dang/ /shi ri sha ka zhes par gyur/ /de nas nam zhig mdzes ma yi/ /ming po rab byung khad kyis ni/ /nyi tshe'i sangs rgyas
59b4(mdo 'grel): nyid gyur pa/ /srid ma'i khang par 'ongs par gyur/ /bdag po'i bka' yis de yis de/ /zla ba gsum gyi rim gro yis/ /gus pas mgron du gnyer te gnas/ /de yi chun ma yis kyang mchod/ /mdzes 'jam longs spyod dag gis de/ /de dag gis mchod skye ba ni//
59b5(mdo 'grel): da lta lha yi gzugs mdzes dang/ /reg pa yang dag ldan par skyes/ /dang por 'dul ba dag dang rab ldan phun sum tshogs pa'i go bzung rmos byas shing/ /dka' thub dag gis rab gdungs lus kyi zhing bzang shin tu gshin par gyur pa la/ /gang gis
59b6(mdo 'grel): dus su dag pa'i sa bon rigs btab de ni smin cing rab 'bar ba'i/ /'bras bu phun tshogs mchog tu dam pa'i las la chags pa'i blo bzang rnams kyis spyod/ /de skad thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung/ /bden pa dge slong rnams kyis thos/ /de de bzhin zhes
59b7(mdo 'grel): nges byas nas/ /zhi ba la ni bsten par gyur/ /de nas dus kyis sa bdag gis/ /sras ni phreng can ma la gyur/ /'phags skyes bo zhes bya ba ste/ /rig dang sgyu rtsal rab sbyangs ba'o/ /de yi mdun na 'don gyi bu/ /ma yi sdug bsngal gyis bcas pas/ /ma
60a1(mdo 'grel): la gnod ces rnam grags pa/ /na tshes mtshungs pa'i mdza' bor gyur/ /nam zhig de dang lhan cig tu/ /'phags skyes po ni rta la zhon/ /rtse zhing sngon la song ba dang/ shAkya'i grong gi skyes tshal phyin/ /'di ni des kyi 'bangs mo li/ /bu zhes dregs pa rab smra
60a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i/ /shAkya rnams kyis mtshon bzung nas/ /der ni de la mtho 'tsham byas/ /rang gi grong khyer song nad des/ /de yi khon lan bsam bar gyur/ /rims kyi drigs bas smad pa ni/ /lus can zug rdu lcags kyu yin/ /de la lan bya'i bsam pa yis/ /yid ni des
60a3(mdo 'grel): par bsregs pa de/ /yab ni mtsho yang rgyal srid la/ /mchog tu 'dod pa skyes bar gyur/ /de yi ring spyod la sogs ba'i/ /blon po brgya phrag lnga dag ni/ /pa las bcad nas dbye ba yis/ /rigs pa rnams kyis rang dbang byas/ /de nas nam zhig sa yi bdag /gsal
60a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal rnam rig yang dag skyes/ /chos kyi gdams dag mnyan pa la/ /gus ba mchog 'phel legs bsdams pa/ /ring spyod kyis ni rta bzung ba'i/ /shing rta dag la zhon nas ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das/ /blta ba'i slad du song bar gyur/ /bcom
60a5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyi gnas phyin ste/ /zhabs la mngon par phyag 'tshal nas/ /de yi drin gyis dang ba'i blos/ /chos kyi rjes 'gro de yis thos/ /mgyogs ba nyid du ring sbyod kyang/ /shing rtas grong khyer myur song nas/ /skabs der rgyal bo'i bu dag ni/ /mngon par
60a6(mdo 'grel): dbang ni bskur bar byas/ /de nas bcom ldan la zhus nas/ /mi yi bdag po 'gro brtson nas/ /mdun du rjes 'brang mthong ma yin/ /shing rta ma yin blon po 'ang min/ /rkang pa nyid kyis sa bdag de/ /dal bus rab tu 'gro ba yis/ /dbyar gyi rnam pa phreng can
60a7(mdo 'grel): mang/ /bcas pa ring nas 'ong ba mthong/ /'bags skyes bo ni dbang bskur ba/ /de dris de yi tshig gis shes/ /bu yi dpal 'byor yongs spyad slad ? phyed can ma ni de yis btang/ /de yis dbyar gyi rnam pa bzung/ /grogs po sa yi bdag po dag//
60b1(mdo 'grel): ma skyes dgra yis da khyed ni/ /rgyal po'i khab ces brjod par phyin/ /gdugs dang bral bas de gdung zhing/ /bkres sgom ngal ba dang ldan pa/ /rnga yab rlung dag ring bo yis /shugs ni stong ba bzhin du gyur/ /'jigs med bde ba su yis thob/ /tshe ni su yi dbang du
60b2(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /su yi phun sum tshogs pa ni/ /myur ba rjes su nyams ma mthong/ /de yis las kyi rtsa ba bzhin /ring ba'i la phug rnying pa zos/ /chu yang 'gyur byed 'thung ba yis/ /gnod pa kun gyi tshogs gyur pa/ /lus kyi thabs la srid ba yis/ /mi rtag pa nyid
60b3(mdo 'grel): mi shes par/ /rmongs pa'i slad du skye bo 'bad/ /ma zhu'i nad kyis thebs nas 'gyel/ /ma skyes dgra yis ko sa la'i/ /dbang po 'ongs pa thos gyur nas/ /song bas rdul gyis kha gang bzhin/ /srog dang bral ba de mthong gyur/ /btsun mo rjes su zhugs
60b4(mdo 'grel): ba de'i/ /lus ni legs bar bya ba byas/ /sdug bsngal zhi ba'i slad du de/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs lta ru song/ /de yis de la btung nas smras/ /bcom ldan ko sa la yi dbang /grogs bo bdag gi grong khyer du/ /'ongs nas nor med gum par gyur/ /
60b5(mdo 'grel): gang gis grogs la phan pa dag/ byas ba min ba'i dpal 'byor 'di/ /bdag dang phun tshogs smad cing sdig/ rmongs las grags pa min ba'i gnas/ /rgud tshe snying la re ba dag/ rnam par bkod nas grogs thob pa'i/ /grogs po 'bras med nyid gyur
60b6(mdo 'grel): te/ /gang zhig 'tsho ba de yis ci/ /grogs la phan pa'i dpal dang ni/ /phongs la phan pa'i nor dag dang/ /'jigs la phan pa'i srog gang yin/ /de dag 'tsho ba legs pa yin/ /bcom ldan skye ba snga ma la/ /de yis las ngan ci zhig bgyis/ /gang zhig smin nas
60b7(mdo 'grel): mjug tu ni/ /des kyang gnas skabs don pa thog/ sa bdag mig ni mchim dang/ /bcas pas 'di dris bcom ldan gyis/ /gdung bzhi byed tshems kyi ni/ /zla 'od sbro zhing der bka' stsal/ /sa skyong mya ngan ma byed 'di/ /srid bar gnas ba'i rang bzhin no/ /rnam pa
61a1(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar dngos po ni/ /bden pa min? rnams me rtag nyid/ /'khor ba'i nags nang rnam par yangs pa 'dir/ /rang bzhin gyis g.yo dus kyi bung ba dag/ rang dgar 'bab pas 'gro srog me tog gi /ge sar tshogs la kham zus byed ba nyid/ /longs spyod dpal
61a2(mdo 'grel): rlabs dag dang mtshungs shing ri dags 'jigs pa'i mig ltar g.yo/ /dpal 'byor skad cig mtshon bya skye bo'i chu gter rnam par gsal ba'i glog/ lus kyi pad+ma lang tsho gsar pa'i nyi 'od gzhon nu dmar ba g.yo/ /srog gi thigs pa srid pa'i mya ngan thar la myur du
61a3(mdo 'grel): 'jig par 'gyur/ /yid ni byams pa'i snod gyur gzhan la phan bas dgyes shing chos kyi nor/ /rgyags pa'i tshogs rnams rab gcod bzod zhi rnam par spyod la yongs su 'dris/ /'di ni yul gyi bde las phyir phyogs bde ldan de nyid tshol rnams kyi/ /snying
61a4(mdo 'grel): po med pa'i 'khor bar rnam 'gyur dag dang bral ba'i yo byad yin/ /rdo yis myur du bcom pa bzhin/ /skye bo sdug la mya ngan byed/ /phongs pa drag po de zlog ba'i/ /bya ba slar yang mi byed do/ /srid pa'i dal dub mthong gyur kyang/ /rnam kun dben pa med pa yi/ /
61a5(mdo 'grel): skye bo 'di dag rmongs pa las/ /mi dge 'dod par byed pa ci/ /bram ze rab bde zhes pas sngon/ /'ga' zhig las rnyed la phug dag/ ma yi lag tu bzhag nas ni/ /khrus la rlung gi dogs su song/ /skabs der yang dag 'ongs ba yi/ /phyag na lhung bzed dang
61a6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas/ /de nyid mngon par bzhed gyur pa/ /des kyang rab tu btung nas byin/ /de nas de yi bu bkres nas/ /rings par khrus byas yang dag 'ongs/ /zas ni rtsom par byed pa'i tshe/ /ma la rang gis la phug blangs/ /bdag gis mgron la de byin bu/ /dge
61a7(mdo 'grel): la rjes su yi rang byos/ /de skad ma yi tshig thos nas/ /de ni mda' yis phug bzhin gyur/ /mgron khyod 'phral la ma zhu bas/ /gzir cing sku ni phug gyur pas/ /mi chung bdag gi la phug dag/ srog dang lhan cig phyir 'byung shog/ de skad sdig pa?
61b1(mdo 'grel): thob pa de'i/ /shin tu rtsub pa'i tshig de yis/ /mjug tu ma zhu'i nad nyid ni/ /skye ba gzhan pa rnams su gyur/ /de nyid da lta gsal rgyal te/ /snga ma'i bsod nams gzhan smin pas/ /rgyal srid yangs pa thob gyur nas/ /mjug tu de nyid kyis zhig gyur/ /'khor ba'i las
61b2(mdo 'grel): gyi mgron po la/ /dge dang mi dge'i las kho na/ /longs spyod slad du nyer bsgrubs pa'i/ /lam rgyags bzhin du lag na gnas/ /de skad bcom ldan de yi gsungs/ /thams cad bde ba thos nas ni/ /de de bzhin zhes sems byed cing/ /der phyag 'tshal nas mi bdag sog
61b3(mdo 'grel): skabs 'dir rgyal srid thob pa yi/ /'phags skyes bo ni shAkya'i 'khon/ /mdun na 'don gyi bu song nas/ /smras pas de dge brlag brtson ba/ /glang po shing rta rta dul gyis/ /rmongs bas blo bzhin phyogs rnams ni/ /rnam dbye med pa nyid byed cing/ /shAkya'i grong du rab tu song
61b4(mdo 'grel): de yi spyod tshul ma rungs te/ /bcom ldan kun mkhyen gyis mkhyen nas/ /shAkya'i grong dang nye bar ni/ /gshegs nas shing skam 'og tu bzhugs/ /ring nas de na bzhugs pa de/ /'phags skyes bo ni 'ongs bas mthong/ /shing rtal babs mdun du ni/ /mngon phyogs
61b5(mdo 'grel): rab tu btung nas smras/ /'dab ma snum pa'i yal ga can/ /grib ma stug rnams yod pa la/ /der ni bcom ldan mi bzhugs par/ /shing skam? thog tu ci zhig mdzad/ /sa skyong gis ni 'di brjod che/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas der bka' stsal/ mi bdag gnyen gyi grib ma ni//
61b6(mdo 'grel): tsan dan bas kyang shin tu bsil/ /gnyen dang mtshungs pa'i nor rdzas med/ /gnyen dang mtshungs ba'i dga' ba med/ /gnyen dang mtshungs ba'i mdzes pa med/ /gnyen dang mtshungs pa'i mdza' bo med/ /sa bdag shAkya 'di dag gnyen/ /de la dga' bas de dag gis//
61b7(mdo 'grel): grong 'gram 'dab ma bskam pa yis/ /rkang 'thang 'di la dga' ba skyes/ /de dag thos nas bcom ldan 'das/ /shAkya'i phyogs su ltung bar ni/ /rig nas khro dang bral ba yis/ /'phags skyes po ni 'og bar gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/ /shAkyar 'jigs
62a1(mdo 'grel): pa 'byung mkhyen nas/ /sems dpa' dge ba rnams dag la/ /dge legs sla dang chos bstan mdzad/ /kha tshig gis ni rgyun zhugs 'bras/ /gzhan gyi lan cig phyir 'od dang/ /phyir mi 'od 'bras bzhin gyis ni/ /de yi bka' yis ? thog /ltags blo gros
62a2(mdo 'grel): ? po yis/ /shAkyas gnas de mthob ste/ /gang zhig nyin bar rab tib dag/ 'byung ba'i bya ni 'ga' zhig yod/ /de nas mi bdag log pa yis/ /khon gyi sprul dag nyal ba dag mdun na 'don gyi ba yis ni/ /rab tu sad pa rnam par bsgrubs/ /de yis bskul bas shAkya'i rigs
62a3(mdo 'grel): ? ba'i blo gros de yis byas/ /khon gyi me ni rab 'bar bar/ /phra ma yin rung gis byed/ /'jigs rung skye bo ngan pa yis/ /sdags kyis 'phral bslang mi bsrun pa'i/ /ro langs dang ni sa skyong dag zu yi srog ni 'phrog byed min/ /de nas de yi dmag dpung ni/ /glang po 'di
62a4(mdo 'grel): rta'i mchog rab dkrigs/ /lam bkag shAkya rnams kyis ni/ /grong khyer yang dag 'brugs par gyur/ /der ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/ /shAkya bsrung slad phyogs lhung zhing/ /yang dag brtson pa maung gal/ /chen po dag la bka' stsal pa/ /shAkya rnams kyi las kyi skyon//
62a5(mdo 'grel): rnam kun nas 'di nye bar gnas/ /de la bsrung ba sgrub byed ba/ /nam mkha' la ni bgrong ste brtsigs/ /skyes bu rnams kyi bsam yas 'byor ba dge dang mi dge dag/ 'od dang rab tu 'gro yang yud tsam rang dbang med pa ni/ /las kyi yi ge rang gi skye ba'i gnas la rang lag gis
62a6(mdo 'grel): bkod pa dag ni des par don med can du gyur ba min/ /de skad bcom ldan gsung gis ni/ /de la phyag 'tshal dang phyin te/ /'phags skyes po ni ? lhags pas/ /shAkya rnams kyi 'gro ba byas/ /srog dang ldan tsam su la yang/ /'u? cag da tshe ba mi bya'o/ /dgra yis rab du
62a7(mdo 'grel): 'phangs ba'i mda'/ /'u cag lus la 'jugs su bas/ /de dag de ltar gros bzung ste/ ? lag na mdang dang ni/ /gzhu? ni rab tu brdungs byas nas/ /pha rol 'jug la brtan pas gnas/ /skabs der don gyi sbyor ba las/ /rang gi yul na mi gnas pa/ /shAkya shaM
62b1(mdo 'grel): pA ka yis gros/ /mi shes par ni yang dag 'ongs/ /de yis bdag gro bgos pas/ /grong khyed bsdams pa mthong nas ni/ /khros te gcig bus g.yul du phyin/ /de yi dpal rnams brlag par byas/ /g.yul du skyes bu seng ge yis/ /dpa' bo glang po de dag bsad/ /mu tig
62b2(mdo 'grel): gis bzhin grags pa yis/ /dga' bar bya ba nyid du gyur/ /gzhan la khros par gyur pa de'i/ /ral gri de ni ci yang 'bar/ /gang gi rab tu gdungs pas de/ /dgra yi chu ba yangs bar song/ /'phags skyes po ni sgro ba nyams/ /pham nas rang gi grong khyer song/ /dgra ni bsang pas
62b3(mdo 'grel): shi pA ka/ shAkyas nang du 'dug na ster/ /sdig las kyis de de dag gis/ /nang mi yin yang yongs su btang/ /dam pa chos kyi gnyen ldan rnams/ /rang gi 'di ma rungs la phyir phyogs/ /dam pa chos nyid jug? pa rnams/ /nor rjes pas kyang gtong phod dang/ /nang mi bas kyang legs
62b4(mdo 'grel): byas dang/ /tshe srog pas kyang grags pa dga' / /de dag gis ni bskrad pa de/ /mthar gyis bcom ldan drung du phyin/ /de la dge legs slad nyid du/ /rang gi mtshan ma cung zad blangs/ /bco ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /rang gi dbu skra son cha byin/ /de yis blangs nas
62b5(mdo 'grel): ba hUD?/ /zhes ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu song/ /der ni shes rab mthu dag dang/ /rtul phod spro ba yon tan gyis/ /de yi rgyal srid thob ste dang la/ /blo ldan rnams la kun tu mod/ /dpal 'byor drung po'i mtshan nyid de/ /grags pa mkhas pa'i lhan skyes yin/ /grub pa thams
62b6(mdo 'grel): cad chung ma ni/ /rtag 'grus ldan pa rnams kyi yin/ /de nas der ni der gnas te/ /bcom ldan dbu sgra sen cha la/ /rin chen mchog gis rab mdzes pa'i/ /mchod rten rab tu gnas par byas/ /'phags skyes po'ang khon gyis ni/ /pha rol bsgral 'dod slad nas yang//
62b7(mdo 'grel): sgo dbye'i rigs bas 'phral nyid la/ /shAkya rnams ? grong du zhugs/ /der ni shAkya stong phrag dag /bdun cu rtsa bdun rab tu bsad/ /de nas bu mo gzhon nu rnams/ /stong phrag de yis bcings nas khyer/ /shAkya brgya phrag lnga rnams ni/ /lcags dang glang po'i 'jogs?
63a1(mdo 'grel): bong kyis/ /rab tu bcom nas grong khyer na/ /mthar byed grong khyer bzhin du byas/ /bcom ldan gyis kyang shAkya rnams/ /dag rnams kyis ni bdag byas pa/ /las kyi rjes su ba'i sa mkhyen nas/ /skad cig thugs ni byung bar mdzad/ /snying rje rgyas pa'i dge slong nam
63a2(mdo 'grel): dal mngon du phyogs ta dres/ /shAkya rnams kyis las cig bsgrubs/ /'jigs rang gang gis 'bras 'di 'dra/ /de skad des dris bcom ldan rnams/ /thams cad mkhyen pas der bka' stsal/ /?  las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /shAkya rnams ni ? par de/ /nya ba
63a3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi chu nang nas/ /sngon tshe nya chen gnyis shig drangs/ /nya ni rtag tu rab bcad ba'i/ /gdud ba chen po dag gis bsad/ dus kyi skya ba gzhan la ni/ /de rnams chom ? nyid gyur ba/ /nang ni 'phog pas de dag nyid/ /cham rkun du gyur bsregs nas bsad/ /nya de dag
63a4(mdo 'grel): dang khyim bdag de/ /'phags skyes po dang mdun na mngon/ /nyam dang ni tshom rkun ba'i/ /shAkya rnams kyis bsad bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di thos nas/ /dge slong rnams kyis las rnams kyi/ /'bras bu'i rgyu ni bslu ba dag/ med pa nyid du nges par gyur/
63a5(mdo 'grel): de nas rgyal bas dan rgyags pa'i/ /'phags skyes po na? grang song/ /bu na rgyal byed ces bya ba/ /byas pa rtsa bas mja' la smras/ /lhan cig shAkya ci la gsod/ /des ni yul la gnang ma bgyes/ /de skad ? pa'i rang gi bu/ /'phags skyes po yis bsad
63a6(mdo 'grel): par gyur/ /myos thob gnod pa goms pa las/ /glang po bzhan du skye bo ngan/ /nges par sdong dang nyes pa da/ /'joms pa nyid du ces mi byed/ /rang zhing phung pa lha byed nyid/ /'dun sar 'di? gnas das smras pa/ /kye ma bdag gi gzi brjid ?/ /dag rnams
63a7(mdo 'grel): phye ma lab ltar spyad/ /bdag ga dpung sbam 'di gnyis ni/ /mthar byed rta babs ka ba snga?/ shAkya rnams nis sus ba/ /gsang pa gdams byed ba mang gyur/ /de ya ra la la bsdags par/ /shAkya'i bu mo gzung ba des/ /thos nas yi dbyung dag pa yis
63b1(mdo 'grel): gdod pa btung nas rab smas ba/ /las kyi zhags pas bcings ba yis/ /lus can rnams la bya bzhin du/ /'chi ba bsgom pa'i nus pa dag/ /gshog pa ldan yang yod ma yin/ /gang gis ? ni bar byed ba'i rgyu de dag ni rtag dang gis za'o/ /'bad rtsol chung dus za ba'i
63b2(mdo 'grel): mun bas dus su tsha zer ldan ba 'dzin bar byed/ /yongs su blta ba'i lam gyi yul man ngo mtshar dang bcas spyad ba dag gi gnas/ /las dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyis bsdams pa 'di kun su yis su yi bya bar bzad/ /de dag thos nas mi yi bdag/ rkang bas bcam pa'i ltas
63b3(mdo 'grel): 'gro bzhin/ /'jigs rung khro ba'i dug rgyas nas/ /'di yi lag pa chod ces bskas/ /gang gi 'gram du de yin/ /lang pa gcod pa'i sdig las byas/ /rdzing bu lag pa'i snying po zhes/ /da lta yang ni sa la grags/ /? shing la yang lci snying ma/ /?  ldan la'ang sa ga
63b4(mdo 'grel): la'i so/ /phrang ba la yang rdo rje'i char/ /brtse med 'babs su 'jug pa nyid/ /lag pa' padmo bcad de rnams/ /der ni gdung ba drag pos gzir/ /bcom ldan skyabs ?sa ble yis ni/ /bsgoms nas skyabs su song bar 'gyur/ /de dag gnang bsnan gsum ni/ /drag po gu na
63b5(mdo 'grel): mkhyen gyis mkhyen nas/ /de dag yang dag dbugs 'byin par/ /'os pa bde sogs lha mer bsams/ /de yis rag pas lag bar skyes/ /de yi lha yi gos kyis g.yogs/ /de dag sems na ? dang bas/ /lus btang mtho ris song bar gyur/ /lha bad ahpa la
63b6(mdo 'grel): gyis mtshan lus/ /lha yi bu mo nyid thob nas/ /ston bas chos ni bstan ba yis/ /de dag yangs pa'i gnas su song/ /dge slong gis dris bcom ldan gyis/ /da dag las 'bras mngon bar gsungs/ /'di dag lag pa g.yo bzhin du/ /dge slong dag la mthob chab
63b7(mdo 'grel): byas/ /de yi las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /mi 'dod par na rab tu ltung/ /? sems ni dad pa yis/ /'od dag dag pa'i 'gro ba thob/ /las 'bras smin pa rnam bkra nyid/ /de skad brjod nas bcom ldan gyis/ /de yi zhar la dge slong dag/ /rnams la chos ni bstan pa
64a1(mdo 'grel): mdzad/ /skabs 'dir rgyal pos btang ba yis/ /gsang nas spyod pa'i tan rna yis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod shes nas/ /'phags skyes po dang nye bar song/ /des smras lha cig dge slong rnams/ /mdun du de yis 'di skad gsungs/ /sa bdag de yi rang la
64a2(mdo 'grel): kyi ? 'bras bu nya bar bdag gis mthong/ /blon po 'dun na 'don bcas te/ /dge bdun na ni med tshig nas/ /dmyal ba mnad med ces byar/ /bzod dka' dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /de skad de yis tshig thos nas/ /mi bdag mdun na 'don dang bcas/ /chu yis khrus 'khod khang?
64a3(mdo 'grel): nad du/ /zhag bdun 'bad pas gnas par byas/ /zhag bdun mjug na skad cig la/ /pho brang 'khor du song ba des/ /me shel nyi ma'i 'od dag gi/ sbyor bas me ni rab tu 'bar/ /'jig pa'i rlung gis gtsubs pa lta bur rab tu 'bar ba rtse mo can/ /rdegs ces sgrogs
64a4(mdo 'grel): pas de ni myur bar des bsregs dmyal ba'i me tog thob/ /'jig can rnams la 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan du 'de phyogs kun 'bar bas khengs/ /bsod nams rten la thams cad kho nar bstan zhing gdung ba'i sa gzhi bsil/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i
64a5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /'phags skyes po'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //dam pa bdud rtsi rlan pa'i zhal dang ri bong can zer dag/ sdug bsngal zhi byed bdag phun sum
64a6(mdo 'grel): tshogs pa sbyin par byed/ /skye bo rnams ni yang dag 'cho byed rab rib 'phrog par byed/ /dam pa'i yid kyi mtsho ni rnam par rgyas shing dgod par byed/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces pa/ /sa yi snying po gzugs can snying/ /mdza' dge sa bdag snying po ni/ /sa
64a7(mdo 'grel): yi brgya byin byad par gyur/ /gang gi dpung bsi yi rten/ /sems ni bzod pa'i rten dag la/ /khung? ni bkod pa'i skye bo rnams/ /bsam pa mdza' dag phyi rol gyur/ /gang gi gtong dang rtul phod kyis/ /de phyogs yongs su rdzogs byed cing/ /lag pa rin ?
64b1(mdo 'grel): tshogs la yangs/ /ral gri 'dzin la dam par gyur/ /nam zhig de yis grong khyer du/ /nye bar 'tsheb lci ba byung/ /mi bsrun gsar du mngon dang bas/ /kun tu dregs skyes bzhin du 'khrugs/ /skye bo'i bsam pa'i skabs phyi ste/ /'dun sar yang dag zhugs pa ni/ /skye
64b2(mdo 'grel): dga' i pa ltar gyur de la/ /grong khyer ba yi skye ba'i zhus/ /lha cig lha yi mthu ldan pa/ /khyod kyi bka' yis dul ba yi/ /skye bo rtag tu rgya ldan 'di/ /lugs las rab tu mi 'da' o/ /dam pa'i lam nas rang bzhin gyis/ /rab zhugs skye bo 'di dag la/ /nye bar 'tshe
64b3(mdo 'grel): bar rab rgyas 'di/ /glo bur dag tu gang nas 'das/ /rang gi chos la zhugs dga' ba'i/ /las dang rgyal po bzang pos kyang/ /sbas par gyur ba'i mi rnams ni/ /rgud pa dag tu lhung ba min/ /bdag cag rnams kyi khyim khyim du/ /sbru mi? bcas ba'i bu tsha rnams/ /bya
64b4(mdo 'grel): pa legs pa'i 'bras bu dag/ ma bsdams pa las bzhin du 'phrog /de ci mi shes 'byung po 'am/ /yang na shin tu che ba'i rgyu/ /gang gi mthu yis rigs dag ni/ /'u rgyud bral ba nyid du byed/ /de dag tshig des sa bdag la/ /de yi gdung ba 'phongs bar gyur/ /dam
64b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i nang du pha rol gyi/ /sdug bsngal zhing la chu bzhin 'jug/ yan lag kun la khyab byed ba/ /skye bo sdug bsngal chen po des/ /dug gis bzhin du bsgrubs pas de/ /skad cig snying ni rab la byam gyur/ /des smras dpung pa'i dbang dang ni/ /skyes phu min pa 'dir ni
64b6(mdo 'grel): bya mi mtshon pa de phyir btses pa/ /ji ltar kho na brtsam par bya/ /khyod rnams di ring nyi ma gcig/ rang rang gnas su 'gro bar byos/ /khyod kyi bu tsha 'jigs bsrung ba/ /brtul zhugs bcas bas nges par bsam/ /de skad rgyal po'i gsungs thos nas/ /grang pa chen po
64b7(mdo 'grel): mgu rnams kyis/ /mchod pa gsal byed thal mo dag/ yang dag sbyar nas de la smras/ /lha cig khyod kyis des 'dzin dang/ /byams pa rjes su thob pas kyang/ /khyod la bsam pa rnam bkod pas/ /bdag cag don dag ba med/ /khyod kyi bka' drin mi rtsub cing/
65a1(mdo 'grel): yid du 'od pas rab gzigs pa/ /'di nyid skye bo 'di dag gi/ 'tsho ba nyid kyi char 'bab bzhin/ /ci yang khyod kyi gsung 'di dag/ bdud rtsid gnang mtshungs shing dga' / /gdung ba 'phrog byed 'jam zhing mnyen/ /nges kyi cing ba ci mi bsgrub/ /mkhas shing
65a2(mdo 'grel): byas zhes snying rje'i gter/ /mthong ba rnyed sla drang por gyur/ /skye po legs pa'i jo bo ni/ /skal pa spyod pa dag gis thob/ /dam pa'i sems la gnas pa'i dam pa rnams ni yongs 'dris bdud rtsi dag bas kyang/ /shin tu mnyes gshin tshig ni lnga pa bas kyang
65a3(mdo 'grel): mnyan pos ston zla'i 'od tshogs pas/ /spyod pa'i kun dga' tshogs? gter gzhan pa ci zhig yid ni ma tog bas kyang 'jam/ /skye bo legs pa ha ri tsan dan bas kyang yongs gdung mchog tu bzlog par byed/ /ces brjod drin dang ldan de la/ /phyag 'tshal de yi
65a4(mdo 'grel): yon tan ni/ /yid 'ongs me tog phreng ba dag/ phyogs su 'grems shing grong pa song/ /rgyal po yis kyang grong khyer du/ /'byung bo mchod ba'i cho ga'i rim/ /byas nas zhi dang shis pa yis/ /tshogs kyi nges pa'i brtul zhugs byas/ /'phrog ma zhes pa'i gnod sbyin
65a5(mdo 'grel): mo/ /grong khyer gnas pa'i byis pa rnams/ /'phrog ces gror khyer lha dag gis/ /brjod pa de yis thos par gyur/ /de nas sa bdag blon dang bcas/ /grong khyer skye bos lhan cig tu/ /ka lan ta ka'i gnas zhes pa/ /'od ma'i tshal gyi gnas bzhugs pa /sdug
65a6(mdo 'grel): bsngal rim gyis gdung ba dag/ bsten pa kun gyi mi tsha'i? sman/ /bde bar gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das/ /skyon rnams zhe slad lta ru song/ /mthong ba dga' de mi bdag gis/ /ring nas mthong nas phyag 'tshal te/ /mdun du 'khod nas de la ni/ /grong khyer ba yi
65a7(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal smras/ /grong khyer ba yi brgyud dag ni/ /nyams ba mkhyen nas snying rje'i gtar/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang myur ba ni/ /thugs ni g.yo ba med nyid 'dzin/ /'gro ba'i dkyil 'khor mi bdag dang/ /bcas pas bskul nas 'gro ba'i gnyen// //
65b1(mdo 'grel): de ni lhung bzed chos gos bzung/ /gnod sbyin mo yi khang par gshegs/ /de yis dben pa de yi ni/ /khyim du bcom ldan rgyal bas byon/ /dga' byed ces pa de yi bu/ /gcig ni snang ba min par mdzad/ /bcom ldan gshegs nas gnod sbyin mo/ /myur
65b2(mdo 'grel): bar rang khyim 'ongs pa yis/ /rab mang bu las dga' ba'i bu/ /dga' byed dag ni mthong ma gyur/ /de ni tshol zhing rmongs bcas pas/ /drus ma re'u stor ba bzhin/ 'jig rten dang ni nags rnams kyang/ /rings? par rab 'khrul de yis bskor/ /kyi hud
65b3(mdo 'grel): dga' byed kyi hud bu/ /khyod kyi bzhin ni gang mthong na/ /zhes ba che bar rab sgrogs shing/ /de ni ma lus phyogs su /zhes ba che bar rab sgrogs shing/ /de ni ma lus phyogs su pa yis/ /mya ngan byed cing ri dang gling/ /rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor dag tu song
65b4(mdo 'grel): mi yis las 'das nas ni/ /'jigs su rung ba'i grong khyer dang/ /mtho ris phyogs ni ma lus pa/ /gzhal yas khang dang bskyed tshal dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i grong khyer du/ /ngal zhing gang duAng ngal mi so/ /phyag ni 'tshal zhing rab song ste/ /btsal?
65b5(mdo 'grel): yang bu ni rnyed ma gyur/ /de nas lus ngan tshig gis ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas song ste/ /bcom ldan skyabs su 'os pa la/ /'bral bas gzir ba skyabs su song/ /deng ni de yis rab spyod mdza' / /nges par bshad pas de gsan nas/ /cung zad 'dzum?
65b6(mdo 'grel): gyis dkar ba'i mchus/ /mya ngan can ma der bka' stsal/ /'phrog ma khyod la bu rnams ni/ /kye ma brgya phrag lnga rnams yod/ /gcig nyid kho na stong ba la/ /'di snyed 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni/ /zhes des bka' stsal sdug bsngal gyis/ /nyams ba gnod sbyin
65b7(mdo 'grel): mos thos smras/ /bu 'bum yod kyang bcom ldan 'das/ /bu gcig brlag par yod mi bzod/ /bu las mchog dga' ? gzhan na med/ /bu chags dug gis gdung ba ni/ /de brlag las bzhan sdug bsngal ci/ /bu dang ldan pa kho nas shes/ /rgya med nges par bsdams
66a1(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /bu yi dge ba lhan skyes nyid/ /ma tshang ring dang dri ma can/ /su yi bu ni zla mi mtshungs/ /de skad gnod sbyin chung ma'i tshig/ mnyes gshin gyis 'khrugs nas gyur nas/ /bcom ldan 'byung po la brtse bas/ /'dzum bcas de la bka' stsal
66a2(mdo 'grel): pa/ /khyod kyi bu ni mang po las/ /gal te gcig bral mya ngan 'di/ /bu gcig rnams kyi bu khyod kyis/ /phrogs pa'i gdung ba ci zhig 'dra/ /rtag tu khyim du ma mthong bar/ /khyod zhugs bud med rnams kyi bu/ /bu yi mas kyang stag mo yis/ /ri dwags rnams kyi bu
66a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin zos/ /rang gi lus la gang gang gis/ /sdug bsngal nyer spyod nyid 'gyur ba/ /mya ngan nyams myong mtshungs bas na/ /de ni gzhan la bya ba min/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gyis/ /bslab pa'i gzhi gsum gal te khyod/ /'dzin cing 'tshe las phyir ldog
66a4(mdo 'grel): na/ /dga' ba'i bu de khyod kyis 'thob/ /de skad bcom ldan gyis bka' stsal/ /de yis bslab gzhi bzung de nas/ /'tshe ba spangs las dga' byed bu/ /de yis byin nas thob par gyur/ /de yi skye ba snga ma yi/ /spyod mdza' las kyi rjes 'gro de/ /dge slong gis
66a5(mdo 'grel): dris bcom ldan gyis/ /spyod pa'i mdza' de bka' stsal pa/ /sngon tshe grong khyer 'di nyid du/ /grong pa kha cig longs spyod can/ /ri dang skyed mos tshal 'gro zhing/ /gang dang rol mos rnam par rtse/ /de nas lam de rab rdzi? yi/ /mdzes ma su zhig nu rgyas shing//
66a6(mdo 'grel): ri dwags mig ldan dang bdag /khyer nas 'tshong du yang dag 'ongs/ /rang bzhin gyis ni glang po'i 'gros/ /ma bal khur le lor bgrod ldan pa/ /de yi dal bus nyer bgrong cing/ /chags bcas de dag rnams la bltas/ /nags kyi ri drags ltar mdzes ma//
66a7(mdo 'grel): yid 'ong ma de'i lta tshul ni/ /mngon 'dod ma bsgribs brlan pa des/ /de dag rnams kyang sred ldan gyur/ /'dod bas myos pa nyid gyur cing/ /dang tshul 'phral? la nyams pa dag /ma rig bag med ma de ni/ /de dag rnams kyis der don gnyer/ /de nas
66b1(mdo 'grel): de dag rab song tshe/ /chags pas ngal nas de yi mngal/ /khros pas dmar por gyur pa bzhin/ /brtan pa dang ni lhan cig lhung/ /skabs der de yi bsod nams kyis/ /lam de nas ni rang sangs rgyas/ /lus dang sems ni rab dang ba/ /legs par 'ong ba de yi
66b2(mdo 'grel): mthong/ /dar ba'i rin gyis thob pa yi/ /a mra lnga brgya de yis ni/ /ring nas phyag 'tshal rnams btud nas/ /yid nyid kyis ni de la phul/ /bsod nams de las gnod sbyin rigs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan 'dir da lta skyes/ /a mra phul bas 'di la bu/ /lnga brgya dag
66b3(mdo 'grel): ni skyes bar gyur/ /dang tshul brjed nas bdag po dag/ btang bas 'tshe ba ldan gyur sngon/ /rang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal bas/ /de yis bslang gzhi de ring thog/ de skad der ni gnod sbyin mo las rgyud ci yang/ /rnam mang rnam smin bkra ba dag ni bka' stsal
66b4(mdo 'grel): nas/ /'jig rten kun gyi legs byas bsam byas ston pa de yis ni/ /skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i mtsho la dge ba'i zam stegs mdzad/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las 'phrog
66b5(mdo 'grel): ma'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu gsum pa'o// 1 //gang zhig rtag pa'i lam duAng rgyu ba nyid min smad byung rab tu 'phel dang ldan/ /rmi lam gyis kyang gang dang 'grogs min gang la yongs 'dris sngon chad med pa'i rim/ /gang la mi rnams
66b6(mdo 'grel): chig ni mi smra nyid dang gang zhig rna ba mig gi mgron/ /rgyu med skye bo'i mthu ni 'byor ba ched kyis gzhal bya min pa de la bstod/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khib ces bar/ /sa bdag gzugs can snying po yis/ /'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa yis/ /rgyal ba mchod
66b7(mdo 'grel): pa mthong gyur nas/ /rmongs pa kun mkhyen nga rgyal can/ /phrag dog drug gis rab brdungs pas/ /de yi khyad 'phags ma bzod de/ /kre? shi kas snang ba bzhin/ /nub mor gyur pa'i rab rib tshogs/ /dri ma can ni shar cha nas/ /'char bas rtag tu nyin par la//
67a1(mdo 'grel): rang nyams bya slang 'gran bar byed/ /gnag lhas bu dang yang dag rgyal/ /mi pham nog can de bzhin du/ /rdzogs byed gnyen gyi bu la sogs/ /rmongs pa zad byed gzhan dag kyang/ /bdud kyi sgyu mas rmongs byas shing ba 'gran 'dod zhe sdang skyon gyis
67a2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /du bas bzhin du mun gtibs pas/ /mi bdag la mngon phyogs nas smras/ /nags na 'dug pa'i dge sbyong gang/ /'di ni kun mkhyen nga rgyal can no/ /khyod kyis de dang de rnams kyi/ /rdzu 'phrul mthun blta bar byos/ /rdzu 'phrul mthu las gang cung zad//
67a3(mdo 'grel): skye bo mgu bar ba spel ba/ /ngo mtshar che ba mthong gyur ba/ /de dag cho 'phrul zhes su brjod/ /rgyal po bdag cag gam ni de/ /mdun sar cho 'phrul ston pa yi/ /nus pa gang la yong gyur de/ /'gro ba gsum du mchod 'os 'gyur/ /zhes pa de dag tshig thos nas/ /mi bdag
67a4(mdo 'grel): de dregs las phyir phyogs/ /smras pa khyed bsam 'di ci zhig/ 'phye bo ril 'dzegs bar 'dod/ /'di ni rigs min phye ma leb/ /rnams kyis me la 'gran nam ci/ /'di ni smra bar mi bya yang/ /smran bdag gi grong las 'byin/ /rgyal po yon tan shes pa yis/ /de
67a5(mdo 'grel): skad spro zhing bshad pas na/ /mi srun de dag mkha' la bzhin/ /rten med par yang song bar gyur/ /mi bdag gzugs can snying po 'di/ /rmongs las phyogs su lhung gyur pas/ /sa skyong gzhan can 'gro bya zhes/ /de dag rnams kyis bsams par gyur/ /skabs
67a6(mdo 'grel): der bcom ldan mnyan yod kyi/ /grong khyer dang nye rgyal byed tshal/ /kun dga' ra bar byon par gyur/ /phyogs de nyid du de dag song/ /de dag der phyin ko sa la'i/ /ste? ye bdag po gsal rgyal la/ /tsho 'phrul rmad byung 'grun? ba ni/ /de nyid kho na de la brjod/ /yon tan
67a7(mdo 'grel): khyed shes mi bdag ni/ /de dag dregs pa gzhom 'dod pas/ /rdzu 'phrul lta bar spro ba'i slad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis drung du song/ /mngon du byin te dul ba yis/ /phyag 'tshal nas na rab gsol pa/ /bcom ldan mu stegs rnams kyi ni ? pa zhi bar mdzad
67b1(mdo 'grel): par 'os/ /rdzu 'phrul 'gran pa'i nyer sbyor gyis/ /khyed kyi mthu ni lta bar 'dod/ /de dag rang gi yon tan bsdags ?  bdag can rna ba bon par byed/ /gtso bo dam pa mgu ba yi/ /rang gi gzi brjid? rab gsal mdzod/ /mu stegs zhes pa ma lus pa'i/ /mun pa brlag par
67b2(mdo 'grel): rab tu mthong/ /de skad rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/ /bsam pa chen po rnam 'gyur med/ /'gran bzheng khro ba dang bral ba/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis der bka' stsal/ /rgyal po gzhan dag ?  gzhim dang/ /rtson dang rgyags pa'i phyir yang min/ /rnam dben rgyan du 'os pa yis//
67b3(mdo 'grel): yon tan 'di ni gzung bar bya/ /'gran pa'i rgyu yis rab bsgrubs gang/ /pha rol bsdags 'phrog yon tan nis? phrag dog dag gi dri ma can/ /rnam dpyad yon tan bral des ci/ /gang zhig rang gi yon tan gyis/ /gzhan gyi yon tan sgrib byed pa/ /bsdags par 'os pa min
67b4(mdo 'grel): ba des/ /rang nyid kho nas chos chud gson/ /yon tan dam pa yongs brtag nyid/ /mchog tu skyengs par byed pa yin/ /gang phyir dag pa srang la ni/ /gzhal ba'i mtho 'tsham? rigs pa min/ /gang zhig yon tan ldan na yang/ /gzhan la rab dang nyid mi 'gyur/ /lag
67b5(mdo 'grel): na mar me thogs de de'i/ /snod kyi grib mas mun par byed/ /de nyid 'jig rten na kun mkhyen/ /bdag gi lhag ma ci zhig rig/ pha rol mngon khengs zil gnon par/ /rtul ba brtan pas dang zil gnon/ /de skad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /rab zhi mngon par bzhed
67b6(mdo 'grel): thos nas/ /rgyal pos ngo mtshar bstan pa la/ /mtshog tu mngon par zhu ba byas/ /da nas chos kyi bcom ldan gyis/ /zhal bzhes mdzad pas mi yi bdag/ mgu bas zhag bdun dus btab ste/ /rgyal po'i pho brang song bar gyur/ /skabs der sa yi bdag po yi/ /ma gcig min
67b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i spun zla zhig/ pho brang 'khor dang nye ba yis/ /khang bzang gzhi yi lam nas rgyus/ /las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo'i lag nas 'phos/ /rtse dga' dang bcas 'gro ba de'i/ /phrag par me tog phreng ba lhung/ /skyon ni rig par gyur ba de'i/ /skyon
68a1(mdo 'grel): rnams dbang pos gsal byas nas/ /phra ma mkhan gyis gtam de dag/ rgyal po yis ni rtogs par byas/ /rje bo'i bsam pa stong par ni/ /chung yang bu ga rnyed gyur nas/ /gnod pa kun byed lce gnyis ?/ /phra ma rab tu 'jug pa nyid/ /rgyal po phra mas
68a2(mdo 'grel): bskul ba yis/ /phrag dog dug rgyas brgyal gyur pas/ /spun zla'i lag pa rkang pa dag/ myur du chod ces yang dag bsgos/ /lag pa rkang pa rnam bcad pa'i/ /gzhon nu las kyis rnam bslad pas/ /gsod pa'i nor 'dzin la nyal te/ /mi bzang rgud par zhugs par
68a3(mdo 'grel): gyur/ rnam dang gnyen ni mya ngan can/ /gdung ba drag pos yongs bskor de/ /skad cig mig ni mi g.yo ba'i/ /zad byed rnams kyis mthong bar gyur/ /de ni yongs skyobs la chags shing/ /kun la phyag 'tshal mya ngan gyis/ /gzir ba'i rgyal bu gnyen de rnams/ /de dag
68a4(mdo 'grel): la mngon phyogs nas smras/ /ka la zhes pa mi bdag bu/ /skyon med 'di ni chad pas bcad/ /khyed rnams kun mkhyen ? po/ /'di la bka' drin bsgrub par mdzad/ /de skad mchi ma rab zags shing/ /rab smra de yis gsol btab pas/ /mthu med de dag mi smra zhing//
68a5(mdo 'grel): skyengs nas gzhan du song bar gyur/ /de nas dge slong kun dga' bo/ /bde gshegs bka' yis lam de nas/ /'ongs te bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /de yi lus ni rnam par bsgrubs/ /rkang lag yang dag skyes pa yi/ /rgyal po'i bu yang dang ba'i blos/ /rgyal
68a6(mdo 'grel): la skyabs su mngon song ste/ /de yi nye gnas dag tu gyur/ /de nas zhag bdun 'das pa'i tshe/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi/ /cho 'phrul blta 'dod sa bdag gis/ /khang pa chen po byed du bcug /deng ni zad byed pa sogs dang/ /lhan cig mi bdag
68a7(mdo 'grel): bzhugs pa la/ /bde gshegs bzhed pas sa gzhi dag/ dpag bsam shing gis brgyan par gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mthu/ /lta bu lha rnams? 'ongs pa'i tshe/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ga'i khri/ /rin chen rab 'bang che ba bsten/ /me yi khams la rab
68b1(mdo 'grel): bzhugs pa/ /de yi 'gram pa las 'khrungs pa'i/ /me yi tshogs kyi srid pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni khyab par gyur/ /srid par gnas pa mdza' dgra 'jigs pa'i 'jigs gang la bur shis?/ /pad+ma shi tshal dang mtshungs pa'i me ni zhi bar gyur pa la/ /de rjes bcom ldan sku ni
68b2(mdo 'grel): snying rje'i chu yi phung po las/ /bdud rtsi gang ba'i dpa' rlabs dri med 'od zer rab tu 'phros/ /stong phrag zla ba'i mdzes pa las rgyal mdzes pas khengs gyur cing/ /gzi brjod rab tu rgyas pas nyi ma'i 'khor lo 'bras med mdzad/ /'dren pa de ni skye bo chogs? kyi rnam par lta
68b3(mdo 'grel): byed kyis/ /legs byas kyis 'thong sdod? med mgu zhing dga' bas 'thungs bar gyur/ /chu ba bai DUrkya? ldan rin chen dmar po'i 'dab ma yangs/ /mdzes shing rab tu 'bar ba'i gser gyi gser ze 'bru can/ /rkang drug pa rnams dra bzang tshogs kyis 'bod ba'i pad+ma ni/ /de
68b4(mdo 'grel): nas de yi drung dus gzhi dag las mngon 'khrungs gyur/ /de dag rnams la nye bar bzhugs pa'i bde gshegs 'khor lo ni/ /gser 'od mdzes shing 'jam pa'i spyan ldan de nas nye bar mthong/ /bdud rtsi mnyes gshin ri bong can 'od bsil bar gyur pa dag/ gang zhig shar bas
68b5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten dag gis 'phral la ber thog gyur /de dag dbus na bcom ldan 'das ni mthu yi 'byor ba dag/ ri rnams dag las gser gyi ri bo bzhin du lhag par 'dzin/ /phrag pa legs mtho stug cing mdzes par yang dag gnas pa ni/ /lha yi sar skyes rnams las
68b6(mdo 'grel): yongs 'du bzhin du rab tu mtho/ /mtho ris bu mo'i lag pas me tog rnams ni gtor gyur ba'i/ /mi dman phreng pa'i tshogs kyis yan lag mchog rnams rgyas gyur cing/ /de zhal chu skyes rnam par lta la mig ni 'dzum bral bas/ /mi rnams dag kyang skad cig mi yi
68b7(mdo 'grel): dngos min thob par 'gyur/ /de nas lha yi rnga chen dung dang rnga sgras khyab gyur cing/ /me tog char pa gang rgyangs tsher bzhad nam mkha' i dor ni/ /dri za mi 'mo? ci dang thub pa'i dbang phyug spyod rnams kyis/ /bcom ldan bstod pa'i tshig gi sgra ni bsgrags par gyur/ /der 
69a1(mdo 'grel): ni bcom ldan zhal? gyi pad+ma mchu yi 'dab dmar zhing/ /'od zer dkar bas kun dkrigs so yi ge ser rdzogs pa las/ /bsod nams kyis gtsang shin tu mngar ba'i gsung gi sbrang rtsi ni/ /rang nyams dang mthun dman pa'i dri bzang skal dang ldan pas 'thungs/ /sdig
69a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i tha ba thol la bsod nams dag gi sa bon thob/ /khon ni yongs su dor la zhi ba'i bde ba bsten par byos/ /'chi ba'i dug ni nyams byed ye shes bdud rtsi 'thungs shig dang/ /dag ba'i grogs por gyur pa'i lus 'di ring por mi gnas so/ /dpal 'byor g.yo
69a3(mdo 'grel): zhing lang tsho nyid kyang rga bar rjes su 'gro/ lus kyang gnod pa'i tshogs rnams dag gi gnas nyid gyur pa yin/ /srog ni ngan pa'i lus kyi khyim gyi yud tsam mgron yin pas/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu skyed la rab tu 'bad par mdzod/ /de la sogs pas bcom ldan
69a4(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis nyer bstan ye shes kyi/ /snang ba dri ma med pa dben zhing dge pa'i mthu stobs kyis/ /skye bo'i ngar 'dzin 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo'i rtse mo ni/ /nyi shu rdo rjes bzhin du myur bcom zhi bar gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul 'od ldan bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu rtogs mu stegs
69a5(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /sngags kyis bcom pa'i dug 'dzin bzhin du degs pa nyams gyur cing/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyi mthu yis mar me bzhin du zil gyis mnan/ /yun ring g.yo ba med pa ri mo bkod pa bzhin du gyur/ /skabs der gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje zad byed pa rnams ni/ /bdag
