69a6(mdo 'grel): nyid kun gyis rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mthun phyogs/ /yin par shes pas drag po'i rlung gis dkris pa'i chad dag spros/ /rnam par rmongs nas sa yi khung bur skyabs pa dag tu byas/ /de nas de dag la mtshon bcom ldan skyabs 'os snying rje yis//
69a7(mdo 'grel): brlan par gyur pas nye bar bstan pa kun gyi yul bka' stsal/ /ri dang nags dang sa dang klung dang khung la sogs/ /'di kun nges par sngar ma rnams kyi 'jigs la skyabs mi 'gyur/ /rab tu sad pa'i rang bzhin gnas la blo gros bskyed byas nas/ /sangs
69b1(mdo 'grel): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun bcas la gang zhig skyabs song ba/ /de dag 'gro ba 'jigs pa 'jigs pa la yang 'jigs pa med/ /dman pa yongs 'dzin skyabs ni gzhan na yod pa nyid ma yin/ /'jig rten pha rol mi bzang mun pa bzlog dkar chos ni rab rgyas tsha zer can//
69b2(mdo 'grel): bzod dka' sdig pa'i gdung ba phongs pas mngon par bskyed par sbyin pa chu gter yin/ /mi bzang gti mug g.yangs chen po'i spyod la shes rab lag pas mchel ba ste/ /kun tu mi rnams kyi ni bsod nams kho na dman dang cho de bral ba'i skyabs/ /de ltar rab rib
69b3(mdo 'grel): kyis bsgribs mig can rnams kyi mig ni dbyer 'os shing/ /tshems kyi nor bu'i 'od zer dag ni rab gsal ldan pas gsal byas nas/ /mdun sar bde gshegs zla bas dag pa'i chos ni nye bar bstan pa dag/ brtan par gyur pa'i gnas bzhin mdzad nas
69b4(mdo 'grel): rang gi gnas su gshegs par gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las cho 'phrul gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //rjes dang mdun dang mngon du
69b5(mdo 'grel): gyur par yang/ /skye bo'i dge ba'i las kyi lam dag ni/ /gsal bar byed pa bdag nyid chen po'i mthu/ /rin chen sgron ma lta bu rgyal gyur cig /sngon tshe lha yi grong khyer du/ /yongs 'du ko bi da ra'i drung/ /la ba dkar po zhes bya ba/ /'od bzang rdo leb steng du ni//
69b6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs gsum pa'i/ /tshogs la chos ni bstan mdzad nas/ /mi rnams rjes su gzung ba'i slad/ /dzam+bu'i gling du babs par gyur/ /sa la babs par gyur pa de'i/ /rjes su 'chi med rnam 'brengs pas/ /gzhal yas khang gi tshogs kyis ni//
69b7(mdo 'grel): sa gzhi mnyam pa khengs par gyur/ /zla ba'i 'od ldan rnga yab ni/ /de yi tshems kyi 'ong rgyun gyis/ /rgyas pa'i nye bar bstan pa bzhin/ /gdong bzhi pa yis blangs par gyur/ /thur ma brgya yis mtshan pa'i gdugs/ /mtshan med ri dwags mtshan ltar dkar//
70a1(mdo 'grel): de yi bka' drin ? bcas bzhin/ /brgya byin gyis ni blangs par gyur/ /grong khyer shang ka sh+ya yi 'gram/ /u duM wa ra'i nags drung du/ /babs pa de la legs byas ldan/ /kun dgar bcas pas phyag 'tshal gyur/ /skye bo'i tshogs dang dge slong ma//
70a2(mdo 'grel): utpal mdog ma zhes pa yis/ /blta ba'i gnas skabs ma thob nas/ /mi bdag gzugs ni nye bar blangs/ /rin chen cod pan rab gsal zhing/ /rna rgyan 'gram par rab mdzes pa/ /de yi gzugs gsar mthong gyur nas/ /gtsug gor yal 'dab dgod pa bzhin ?
70a3(mdo 'grel): de yis gsum? pa shin tu yang/ /skye bo'i mdun 'dir bar mtshams med/ /bdag gis rgyal po'i gzugs mthong nas/ /gus bcas skabs 'di steng bar 'gyur/ /'di las bzhan yang bcom ldan 'das/ /phyag 'tshal dag gis rnyed par dka' / /dbang
70a4(mdo 'grel): phyug la dga' skye bo yis/ /yon tan zhes pa'i gnas ma yin/ /kye ma rtswa mtshungs g.yo ba'i nor/ /ro phral snying po med pa yis/ /bag chags goms par gyur pa las/ /ma dpyad nyid kyis skye ba 'phrog/ 'phral la skye bos mi bdag la/ /zhes sar
70a5(mdo 'grel): byas nas skabs sbyan des/ /do shal? g.yo bas bcom ldan la/ /mdun du phyag kyang byas par gyur/ /gnas skabs der ni mdun sa ru/ /'char ka zhes pa'i dge slong gis/ /de lta'i gzugs de mthong gyur nas/ /bzhin ni 'dzum pa dang bcas smras//
70a6(mdo 'grel): mi bdag gzugs can dge slong ma/ /utpal mdog ma skye bo yis/ /phyag byas ma 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /bcom ldan zhabs la phyag 'tshal byed/ /utpal dri dang mdog dag gis/ /bdag gis 'di na ni mdun du shes/ /de skad brjod nas 'dug pa'i
70a7(mdo 'grel): che/ /bcom ldan 'das gyis kyang bka' stsal pa/ /dregs las rdzu 'phrul rab ston pa/ /dge slong ma yi rigs min nyid/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal rims gsar gyis/ /rab tu zhi ba nad bar byed/ /de skad brjod nas bcom ldan gyis/ /dge ba de de bstan mdzad
70b1(mdo 'grel): nas/ /lha rnams bzlog ste dge slong dang/ /lhan cig rang gi gnas su gshegs/ /der ni nyer zhugs de dag gis/ /rab btung dris shing kun mkhyen gyis/ /sdang skye'i las kyis yang dag bsnams/ /dge ma de yi gtam gsungs pa/ /ba ra NA? ser sngon byung ba/ /ded dpon nor
70b2(mdo 'grel): ni chen po yi/ /chu? lon? ldan ma zhes pa/ /de yi srog dang mtshungs par gyur/ /gzugs bzang lag pa'i yal 'dab can/ /lang tsho skyed tshal snye ma dang/ /'bras bu me tog ldan dus su/ /de yis de las mngal bzung gyur/ /skabs der chu gter gling la ni/ /rjes su 'gro
70b3(mdo 'grel): bar brtson pa yi/ /khyod la rab tu nye ba dag/ 'bral bas gzir pa de yis smras/ /ji snyed nor ni phun tshogs shing/ /da lta yang ni 'phel ba thob/ /gang gi chad du 'jigs rung ba'i/ /chu sprin 'byung gnas zab mo brgal/ /nor ni 'dzin pa gnod pa mang/ /yon tan bsgrub pa gnod
70b4(mdo 'grel): pa med/ /nor ni don gnyer rang yul nas/ /'jig rten pha rol dag tu 'gro/ kha cig ring du song nas kyang/ /sdug bsngal las ni 'bras med ldog /gzhan ni g.yo med nor dang ldan/ /'di yi nges pa las rnams so/ /de skad dga' ma'i tshig thos nas/ /don mthun bdag po de
70b5(mdo 'grel): la smras/ /mdzes ma nor bdag bsgrubs pa ni/ /bsngags pa'i snod nyid kho na yin/ /bder gnas nor bsgrubs kyis dman rnams/ /rtsa ba zos pa'i 'phye po bzhin/ /da ring sang la longs spyod dang/ /lhan cig yongs su zad par 'gyur/ /rang khyim du yang dbul rnams
70b6(mdo 'grel): la/ /skye bo sogs le bzhin du rtsub/ /'jig rten bzhan duAng nor ldan ni/ /skye bo rnams kyi mdza' sdug sa/ /'phel bar rtsom slad zla chos ni/ /phra mo la yang skye bo 'dud/ /mthar ni yongs mdzad rang nye bas/ /yongs su rdzogs pa la yang min/ /skye bo mngon par dar la
70b7(mdo 'grel): nye/ /rmongs pa'ang mkhas pas phyag byar 'os/ /rgan yang mo yi yid du 'ong/ /ma cing yin yang dpa' i bsten 'os/ /mkhas kyang bkres dang skom pa la/ /dgra yi bstan bcos zos pa 'am/ /snyan dag bdud rtsi 'thungs pas ni/ /skad cig su yis rnam par rgyal/ /gang
71a1(mdo 'grel): la nor yod de ni yon tan gyi thos bstod byas yon tan dag kyang cis mi 'dzin/ /dbul las nyams pa'i skyon gyis gzi phyin? sun phyung yon tan me tog sn ying mtshungs nor gyi ni/ /yon tan nyid de yon tan la ni nor ldan bsngags 'os yon tan
71a2(mdo 'grel): ldan pa min/ /slong ba'i dan byas tshogs rnams zhi bdag las nor ni yon tan rnams kyi tshe srog yin/ /de skad srog las nor lhag pa/ /de yis bdag po'i tshig thos nas/ /'khri shing rkang drug pas rgyas bzhin/ /mig sman dang bcas mchi thigs rgyas/ /de nas
71a3(mdo 'grel): da dang lhan cig tu/ /don mthun mgon gyis gru gzings bsten/ /sred ba drag po 'dzin rnams kyi/ /chu gtar chen po lag pa'i snod/ lus kyi rlung gis rjes zhugs pa/ /chung ma'i grogs ldan de yi gzings/ /yid la re ba srog dang bcas/ /chu gter du mi zhig par
71a4(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /de nas las kyi longs spyod kyi/ /lhag mas shing dum bzung gyur pas/ /ka se ru yi gling phyin nas/ /de yis chung ma shi ma gyur/ /der ni bsam pa nyams gyur cing/ mgon med mya ngan phyed de dang/ /'dab bzang rigs las skyes pa'i bya/ /skyes bu'i
71a5(mdo 'grel): dbyibs can phrad par gyur/ /mdzes pas phrogs pa bzhin bzang ming/ /de yis mdzes mo de la smras/ /mig ni g.yo ma yid brtan mdzod/ /gnas 'di khyod la 'jigs pa med/ /'di ni skal bzang mchog gis/ /bdag ni khyod kyi 'dod pa tshol/ /chu srin
71a6(mdo 'grel): 'byung gnas 'di 'jigs rung/ /dge ma khyod ni yang skyes so/ /de yis 'di brjod dal bu yis/ /rin chen rang bzhin khang par phyin/ /mngal ni yongs su rdzogs de la/ /gzugs mdzes bu dag bcas par gyur/ /byis pa de ni cher skyes tshe/ /rim gyis snyan
71a7(mdo 'grel): par smra byed pa/ /mkhas pa de yis mdzes ma de/ /longs spyod dag la mngon phyogs byas/ /drang nyid phyir dang 'jam nyid phyir/ /mdza' gcugs nye ba'i skye bo la/ /bud med rang nyid 'khyud 'gyur te/ /rkang 'thung dag la 'khri shing bzhin/ /de yis mchog gis
71b1(mdo 'grel): skyed tshal du/ /nu rgyas de la rol pa las/ /gzhon nu mdzes pa'i rnam pa can/ /pha dang mtshungs pa btsas? par gyur/ /pad+ma'i bzhin zhes bya ba de/ /lang tsho'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis/ /dus su 'dab chags rgyal po ni/ /bzhin bzang 'jig rten gzhan du sos?/ /de rjes dpal
71b2(mdo 'grel): ldan pad+ma'i bzhin/ /pha yi gnas ni thob 'gyur te/ /yon tan can la rtsod med du/ /rigs kyi phun sum rang dbang gyur/ /kun tu de yi mthu dag ni/ /gtso bo'i nus ldan nyid shes nas/ /dbang phyug thob pa'i bu de la/ /skye bo med sar ma yis smras/ /bu gcig rang rigs la
71b3(mdo 'grel): 'os pa'i/ /dpal 'byor 'di ni khyod kyis thob/ /ded dpon las skyes bdag gi bu/ /'di la skal ba yod ma yin/ /bar NA ser rang stobs kyis/ /khyod kyis 'di ni rgyal por gyis/ /rang yul nyid du phun tshogs pa/ /dga' ba nyams myong ro dang bcas/ /de skad
71b4(mdo 'grel): ma yi tshig gis bya/ /gshog rlabs shin tu che ba yis/ /spun zla phrag pa la khyer nas/ /mkha' las ba ra NA ser song/ /de nas sa bdag tshangs pas byin/ /seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa dag/ drag rno rdo rje'i sder mo rnams/ /de yis lan cig bsnan nas bsang/ /rgyal
71b5(mdo 'grel): po'i stan ni de nyid la/ /phu po rdzogs par dbang bskur nas/ /blon po 'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams la/ /rtsal mchog ldan pa des smras pa/ /bdag gis rgyal por dbang bskur 'di/ /gang gis rab tu skyong byed na/ /de ni rje la gus pa yis/ /ma rtogs de rjes 'gro bar
71b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rab mchog blon la dal bu yis/ /'di smras bya yi gang zag ni/ /spun la phyis kyang phrad pa yis/ /'gro ba zhugs nas song par gyur/ /tshangs byin de nyid 'di'i zhes/ /blon po rnams kyis bgros pa las/ /dang gi skye bo gzhan la yang/ /mi bdag de ni
71b7(mdo 'grel): grags pa thob/ /skabs dang nags nas blangs pa yi/ /mngal dang bcas pa'i glang mo zhig/ /mngal ni nang nas bkag pa bzhin/ /phyed ni phyir byung grol ma gyur/ /bud med dag pa'i lag rtse yis/ /reg? pas mngal 'di grol bar gyur/ /cas pas rtsis pas bstan pa
72a1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /blon po rnams kyis rgyal la smras/ /de nas sa yi bdag po'i bkas/ /pho brang 'khor gyi bud med kyi/ /lag pas glang po la reg nas/ /der ni bden pa'i byin brlabs byas/ /gang tshe de dag bden tshig gis/ /glang mo'i ming la ni mgrol ba/ /de tshe
72a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i pho brang gis/ /skye bo thams cad skyengs par gyur/ /de nas pa yang rdzi mo zhig/ mngon phyogs dang tshul bden pa'i tshig/ smras nas glang mo la reg pa/ /gang gis mngal 'di grol bar gyur/ /rgyal po 'ang rang gi btsun mo rnams/ /tshul khrims
72a3(mdo 'grel): kyis dbul nyid shes nas/ /ba lang rdzi mo de nyid ni/ /'gro ba gsum na dag par sems/ /dag pa'i rigs la chags pa des/ /de yi bu mo so sum bA/ /zhes pa mdun du yongs blangs ba/ /lha mo'i sgra yi smod nyid gyur/ /bud med g.yo ba nyid dag dang//
72a4(mdo 'grel): de yis mjes pa bsam pa las/ /dogs pa'i kun tu 'gro ba yis/ /gnyid kyang de yis btang bar gyur/ /bar skabs de ni spun zla la/ /mdza' las shin tu gcags pa yis/ /bya yi bdag po pad+ma'i bzhin/ /de la lta ru 'ongs par gyur/ /sa bdag
72a5(mdo 'grel): gis kyang de la 'khyud/ /dga' ba yis ni bkur sti bsgrubs/ /skye bo med sar de la ni/ /rang gtam bshad nas yang smras pa/ /dang tshul bden pa'i srad gzhal bas/ /bud med rnams kyi skyon mthong nas/ /bdag ni btsun mo'i tshogs las phyir/ /phyogs te bag ma gzhan
72a6(mdo 'grel): sar blangs/ /gzugs dang lang tsho 'gro ldan ma/ /de la'ang bdag ni mi ston te/ /gcig la skyon ni mthong ba rnams/ /kun la yid ni dogs pa skye/ /de slad spun zla khyod kyis ni/ /grong khyer mi med dag tu bzung/ /dang tshul la ni dogs btang nas/ /bdag ni rims dang bral bar
72a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /de las de na mi? tshan re zhing/ /khyod kyi bka' las 'dab chags kyis/ /dal bus khyar nas bdag khyim du/ /'ong bar 'gyur ba 'di dag 'dod/ /de skad phu bo'i tshig thos nas/ /mkha' la 'gro bas de la smras/ /dogs pa'i dri mas phrag dog ni/ /rgyal po brdzun pa
72b1(mdo 'grel): nyid ma byed/ /phrag dog dug gis rtag gzir ba/ /dga' bar bya ba nges mi dga' / /bza' ba rnams kyi ri mo rigs/ /lta ba ma yin gnyid ma yin/ /ma ning 'dod ldan bde ldan mkhas/ /nor ldan dud pa rje bzod ldan/ /slong ba khengs pa mi srun des/ /bud med dag ces gtam nyid ci//
72b2(mdo 'grel): drang po la yang gya gyu can/ /gnas pa na yang shin tu g.yo/ /rigs ldan yin yang logs gnas pa'i/ /gud med 'khri shing 'khyud par byed/ /mig g.yo mchu ni chags dang bcas/ /smin ma 'khyog cing nu ma sra/ /bud med rnams kyi cha shas la'ang/ /skyon med mthong ba nyid yod
72b3(mdo 'grel): min/ /mkhas pas g.yo ldan bud ba yi/ /rnam par rol pas bud med spyad/ /mtsho skyes rtsa ba btsal ba na /'dam gyis nye br gos pa nyid/ /'dzum bcas ya mtshan dag gis ni/ /gtsang spra dang tshul dag dang bral/ /bud med rnams ni nges bsdams pa'i/ /dga' bcig la
72b4(mdo 'grel): blo ma yin/ /de lta na yang gal te 'bad/ /gang zhig mngon par zhen par mdzod/ /nyin re bdag grong skyed mos tshal/ /skye pho med par de bzhag byos/ /spun zla 'dab chags kyis de smras/ /ka se ru ka'i gling du ni/ /de dang mdzes ma mi bdag gis/ /gus bcas bsnyen bkur byas te btang/
72b5(mdo 'grel): de yang gling du skyes pa yi/ /dri mchog rang bzhin phreng ba rnams/ /bya la zhon nas mtshan re zhing/ /nam mkha' las ni 'ong bar gyur/ /yongs 'du'i rjes 'gro ljon pa yi/ /me tog de dag de yis thob/ /bung ba g.yo ba'i mun pa ?? pas/ /grags pa yi ni rab rib bzhin//
72b6(mdo 'grel): de nas nam zhig mA na ba/ /zhes pa gnyis skyes gzhon nu ni/ /ba ra NA sir gnas pa zhig/ nags nas yam shing len du song/ /der ni mi 'am ci ma yis/ /yid bsrubs gsal ba de mthong gyur/ /gang zhig mthong ba nyid kyis do/ /dran pa rnam par brjed par gyur/ /gsar du
72b7(mdo 'grel): mngon par 'dod pa yis/ /phas bzhin de la de gtad nas/ /mdzes ldan zhes pa'i mdzes ma dang/ /phug gi khang par rnam par rol/ /rin chen rgyan gyi 'od zer gyis/ /rab rib tshogs ni nges bsal te/ /de dang yun ring rtses pa las/ /dus su bu ni de yis thob/ /bu de byis pa 
73a1(mdo 'grel): nyid la yang/ /gang tshe stobs ldan rlung ltar mgyogs/ /de tshe ma yis de yi ming/ /myur 'gro zhes par bsgrubs par gyur/ /dgegs med longs spyod bde ba yis/ /ngoms med de yang phug gzhin du/ /mdza' bo zhags nas rdob yis/ /phug ni bsgribs shing
73a2(mdo 'grel): rdzas? tu 'gro/ /de nas nam zhig pha yis ni/ /rang gi spyod pa'i mdza' rnams bshad/ /myur 'gro yis thos bsam pa ni/ /ya mtshan dag gis rgyas par smras/ /khyim gzhan sgo ni rdo ba? yis/ /long ba bzhin du bsdams pa 'dir/ /kye ma yab khyod mdzes pas kyang//
73a3(mdo 'grel): bcings pa 'di nyid dge tu gyur/ /tshur zhog khyod kyi rang gi gnas/ /bar NA si nyid du 'dod/ /tshe yang 'bad pa med par ni/ /rdob bdag gis bsal bar bya/ /rang yul bral ba'i nyon mongs ni/ /bzod par dka' ba ji ltar bzod/ /rang gi lus bzhin yul dag ni/ /sus
73a4(mdo 'grel): kyang btang bar mi nus so/ /rang yul bral ba'i skye bo rnams/ /nor gyi tshogs ni khur bo dang/ /longs spyod nye bar longs spyod min/ /yon tan theg pa'i mdud par rig ces smras phug gi khang pa nas/ /rdo ba chen bo de bsal nas/ /khas blangs pa yis? dang ni/ /lhan
73a5(mdo 'grel): chag mgyogs par song bar gyur/ /de dag myur du song de nas/ /mi 'am ci mo mngon par 'ongs/ /phug khyim stong pa mthong gyur nas /snying mi dga' ste 'di ltar bsams/ /kye ma bdag la gcugs pa brjed/ /skye bo ngan bde gang song/ /lce gnyis pa dang lag 'gro
73a6(mdo 'grel): so?/ /gya gyu nyid la'ang rmad byung ci/ /bde la chags ldan mjug tu ni/ /dga' ban mi byed 'gros par byed/ /ring du gnas kyang mdza' gcugs med/ /skye gnyis ldan ba ? bzhin/ /de ltar bsams nas di yis ni/ /gnod las khyod le dga' ba btang/ /me tog
73a7(mdo 'grel): lta bu'i mdza' ba yis/ /gcod pa bzod pa ma yin no/ /bdag gi bu 'di rig byed dang/ /yon tan gang gis sa la 'tsho/ /zhes bsam grogs mo'i lag tu ni/ /de la de yis rgyud mar springs/ /longs spyod bde ba'i ? dag gis/ /bud med rnams ma 'byor
73b1(mdo 'grel): la dga' / /mnyes gzhi na yongs su ma nyams pa/ /bul dga' ba /yo ba min/ /de dag tshul ngan do cha nas/ /mgyogs pas myur du 'gro ba la/ /de yi grogs mo mgyogs 'gro mas/ /myur 'gro la ni rgyur mang byin/ /'di yi rgyud ni dang po 'dir/ /reg bar mi skya bga'?
73b2(mdo 'grel): byed yin/ /de skad smras nas des byin pas/ /rgyud mang blangs nas de song gyur/ /de nas rang yul rang khyim du/ /de yi pha ni bzhag byas nas/ /rgyud mang sprod ba mkhas pa yis/ /kun tu rnyed dang mchod ba thob/ /de nas nam zhig tshong pa dag/ chu gcar gling du 'gro ba rnams//
73b3(mdo 'grel): lha yi rgyud mang la chags bas/ /de ni gzings la bskyon par gyur/ /de yi rgyud mang yid 'drog ba/ /rna ba'i bdud rtsi rgyun dag gis/ /skad cig skad cig rgya mtsho yang/ /rabs ni med pa bzhin du gyur/ /de nas dang po'i rgyud dag la/ /reg pas nyer 'tsho rab bskyed de/ /gzings
73b4(mdo 'grel): ni rab tu 'phar zhing chags/ /tshong ba thams cad rlag par gyur/ /de nas las kyi lhag ma yis// myur 'gro yis ni shing du ma thob/ /rlung gis bskyod nas skad cig gis/ /ka se ru yi gling du phyin/ /der ni chu gter ngogs 'gram gyi/ /skyed tshal mchog tu rab zhugs nges//
73b5(mdo 'grel): nu na ma tog chun po dag/ rab rgyas bud med so sum bA/ /me tog dri sar zhes bya ba'i/ /phreng ba rab 'bar rgyud byed cing/ /sems med rnams kyang lus kyi ni/ /yon tan gyis nges 'ching byed mthong/ /nges kyang mdzes pa'i rnam pa can/ /brtan pa byis pa lang tsho yi//
73b6(mdo 'grel): mtshams kyi dbus nas nyid gyur pa/ /de mthong ya mtshan dag tu gyur/ /'dod pa'i rlung gis rab bskyod pas/ /lag ba'i yal 'dab g.yo ldan zhing/ /dang tshul me tog lhung ba nges/ /'khri shing bzhin du der rab tu btung/ /'phral la yun ring 'grogs pa bzhan//
73b7(mdo 'grel): de dag mchog tu mdza' bar gyur/ /skye ba snga ma'i mdza' bcugs pa/ /yid kyis yid ni mi mthong ngo/ /nyin par de dang dga' byed cing/ /mtshan mo yang ni sa bdag dang/ /sbal pa'i 'dod ldan mdza' bor ni/ /g.yon ma'i spyod? pa nyid las bsams//
74a1(mdo 'grel): spyod tshul shes pas des de la/ /ba ra tA sir 'jo?/ bon gnyer/ /de yi tshig gis mig btsums nas/ /bya la zhon nas de yis phyin/ /de yis bzlog par gyur mod kyang/ /mkha' la mig ni phye ba yis/ /chu gter g.yo ba'i bsgribs pa'i
74a2(mdo 'grel): mig/ de ni 'phral nyid long bar gyur/ /pho brang 'khor gyi skyed tshal du/ /de yis de bzhag 'jigs pa yis/ /skrag cing mya ngan gyis gdungs pas/ /sa bdag gzims pa'i khang bar zhugs/ /yid ni shin tu gdung ba yis/ /mtshan mo de ni bzlas byas nas/ /tho rangs
74a3(mdo 'grel): bsams pas zil gnon nges/ /'gro dang? sdong bar nus ma gyur/ /skabs der tsu ta dri bzang gi/ tshogs ni yang dag rgyas gyur cing/ /me tog gzhu can rtse dga' yis/ /lang tsho dpyid kyi zla ba ni/ /khu byug bung bas gnag gyur cing/ /dus kyis bral ba rnams
74a4(mdo 'grel): kyis dus/ /bzod dka' mya ngan 'grems byed ba'i/ /mya ngan med gsar rab tu mthong/ /'dod pas rmongs pa'i rgyal pos kyang/ /sred dang ma bral skyed mos tshal/ /lta bar brtson pas nyi ma gcig /so sum bA ti gtang ma gyur/ /de ni de dang lhan cig tu/ /chags
74a5(mdo 'grel): dang rgyags dang 'dod pa yi/ /'khor ba bzhin du ngal bso'i gnas/ /me tog gi ni nags su song/ /der ni rlung bzhon gyis bskor ba'i/ /'khri shing skyengs par byed pa yi/ /btsun mo mthong nas sa yi bdag /rab tu dga' ba nyid du gyur/ /gzhan chags dug
74a6(mdo 'grel): gis zil gnang pas/ /de yang dran pa zum bar gyur/ /bsam pa'i zug rdzus dkrug pa'i yid/ /bde la'ang bde ba min par rig/ lag 'gro nang du song ba yi/ /bud med kyi ni phreng bas bzhin/ /mgrin par byas pas rmongs byas pa'i/ /shin tu chags ldan bro?
74a7(mdo 'grel): gar byed/ /der ni dben par 'khri shing gi/ tshogs kyi sgribs bar gnas byas pa/ /long bas so sum bA yi ni/ /dri sar phreng ba'i dri bzang tshor/ /'phral la nyid du chags pa yi/ /rnam 'gyur las ni sbas pa brjod/ /glu blangs 'dod bas myos ba rnams/ /'jigs
74b1(mdo 'grel): pa dag ni ga la rtsi/ /dman pa'i rlung gi ro las bskyod par gyur ba dga' ma yi/ /bzhin ni myos ldan pad+ma'i dri bzang tshogs pa'i snying po can/ /dri sar me tog dri de ring nas 'ong bar gyur la 'di/ /bung ba'i lam ni rgyud mang su 'khrul sgra yis dga' par 'ongs/ /sa bdag
74b2(mdo 'grel): gis ni de yi glu/ snying la 'bab pa de thos nas/ /skyed mos tshal dag btsal byas las/ /'khri shing nang du de mthong gyur/ /chags pa drag pos myos de la/ /dogs par gyur pa de yis dris/ /so sum bA 'am de yi ni/ /las kyi mtshan nyid khyod shes sam/ /de smras so sum bA
74b3(mdo 'grel): dag ni/ /ci phyir mi shes gang gis mchu/ /bim pa dkar dmar chags pa yis/ /rgyal srid la ni yid 'byung bzhugs/ /'dod bas bkod bzhin de yi brla/ /ri mo rang bzhin bkra shis mdzes pa yod/ /'khyil pa sdug gu mdzes pa'i 'khor mo 'dra/ /de yi nu ma'i
74b4(mdo 'grel): dkyil 'khor dag la'ang yod/ /de dag thos nas mi bdag ni/ /yongs su gdung ba drag pos nyen/ /yid kyi chags pa me tog ni/ /rling pa bzhin du dor bar gyur/ /de yis smras pa mi mo rnams/ /bsrung ba rgyas kyang tshul khrims mis/ /nam mkha' i me tog phreng ba bzhin
74b5(mdo 'grel): dag pa rnam kun nyid du med/ /rgyal pos 'di brjod long ba dang/ /lhan cig dur khrod nags la de/ /myur du bong bu la bskyon nas/ /grong khyer las ni phyir bton gyur/ /ngo tsha med pa de dang de/ /lhan cig 'gro ba nyid 'das tshe/ /nags su chom rkun bdag po yis/ /phun
74b6(mdo 'grel): tshogs dag dang bcas nyid thob/ /'phral la chom rkun dkyil 'khor dag/ mngon bros de tshe skye bo yis/ /long ba nyes ba med pa nyid/ /chom rkun dag tu 'khrul nas bsad/ /so sum bA de rkun pos kyang/ /skad cig 'grogs pas mtshan spyod nas/ /de yi rgyan rnams
74b7(mdo 'grel): blangs nas ni/ /chu bo rab tu brgal nas song/ /chu klung ka ran da ba de'i/ /'gram du gos dang bral ba des/ /mig sman dang bcas mchi ma'i chus/ /nu ma non cing mya ngan byas/ /de yi dus na wa skyes zhig /kha yi sha ni rab btang nas/ /chul 'phar ba'i nyal song
75a1(mdo 'grel): de nam mkha' la 'gro bas khyer/ /nya ni 'phral la gting du song/ /sha ni bya yis phrog pa'i tsha/ /gnyi ga nyams pas de yi ni/ /bsam pa mig ni g.yo med gyur/ /de mthong de yi bzhin la ni/ /sdug kyang 'dzum pa mthong bar gyur/ /gzhan dag gis ni 'khrul
75a2(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /'chir nye rnams kyang dgong pa yin/ /skyengs pas khros pa de yi ni/ /mi 'os 'dzum pa de la smras/ /kye ma 'jig rten gad mo yis/ /gnas gyur khyod? ni de dag la dgod/ /mi bdag btang nas long bar phyin/ /long ba btang nas chom rkun bsten/ /gsum char/
75a3(mdo 'grel): nyams pa khyod kyi ni/ /'dzum pa'i gnas ni gnyis nyam nga/ /yongs su brgod pa 'di ni mchog /bdag ni rigs pas khyod pan bsgrubs/ /mi bzad gnas la gang zhig ni/ /co 'dra'i mkhas pa de mi srun/ /'di brjod grong khyer song nas ni/ /klung gi dogs na so sum bA//
75a4(mdo 'grel): dka' thub rigs pa gnas so zhes/ /blo gros bzang mos rgyal la smras/ /de nas gos dang rgyan bskur nas/ /de ni rgyal pos blangs bar gyur/ /lus can rnams kyi chags pa yi/ /lhag mas skyon ni sgrib pa nyid/ /da lta'i utpal mdog 'di de/ /sngon skye gzhan
75a5(mdo 'grel): gyi bsod nams kyis/ /dge slong brtul zhugs nye bar thob/ /'di yi yid ni gang zhig chags pas sbyor la nyams kyis rab rlan dang/ /rgyags pa dang ni 'dod pa'i dbang gyur chags dang ldan pa nyid du gyur/ /des na de tshe yud tsam zhi ba rnam par dpyod pa dang bral
75a6(mdo 'grel): nas/ /mi yi bdag po'i gzugs byas kun dga' ldan pas bdag la phyag 'tshal gyur/ /ces pa dag ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las lha las babs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yul 'dab ste
75a7(mdo 'grel): bco lnga pa'o// //mthu ldan rnams kyi mtshungs med brtan pa dang/ /brtson 'grus stobs ni ngo mtshar bcas ba yin/ /chen po nyid la rten pa'i sbyor ba laS/ /? phyir thams cad chen bo nyid du gyur/ /sngon ni stobs ldan gyang kyi gnas/ /ku shin grong khyer
75b1(mdo 'grel): dga' ba ru/ /rang dgar rol pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /bde gshegs rang nyid gshegs par gyur/ /legs par byon pa de thos nas/ /rim gro dag la rab brtson pa/ /dge ba tshol ba de dag gis/ /lam ni legs par spyad pa'i?/ /rtsa dang tsher ma rdob dang/ /sreg ma rdul?
75b2(mdo 'grel): dang bsal byas nas/ /tsan dan chu yis legs bran te/ /yul ni mdzes pa de dag gi/ dbus su 'bigs byed rgyur gyur pa'i/ /chud ma gting du zhum pa bzhin/ /gting du bying? ba'i rdo chen ni/ /sa las yang dag byung? bar gyur/ /'byor dang dbub pa thag pa yis/ /de ni
75b3(mdo 'grel): sol la de dag rnams/ /zla ba song yang de yin ni/ /stong phrag cha yang zad ma gyur/ /de nas 'khor ba'i yongs gdung dag/ rab tu zhi byed bdud rtsi'i zer/ kun gyi yid ni dga' ba'i gnyen/ /bcom ldan 'das ni byon par gyur/ /lhug po'i mun pa dag dang bral/ /gsal
75b4(mdo 'grel): zhing mthong ba 'bras dang bcas/ /rab dang phyogs ni rnam par phyed/ /rab tu gsal ba ston nyi bzhin/ /'bras med nyon mongs kyis gdungs pa/ /yongs ngal de dag des gzigs shing/ /der ba? gdungs gyur thos nas kyang/ /phyag 'tshal bzhin ldan der bka' 
75b5(mdo 'grel): stsal/ /ngal dub 'bad rtsol ldan pa khyed/ /'khor ba yi ni las la bzhin/ /bya ba 'di la rab brtson pa/ /kye ma nyon mongs 'bras bu rtsom/ /brtsams nas mi bzang nyon mongs dang/ /byed pa na yang the tsham bcas/ /grub kyang nyer ma ? med pa'i las/ /shes rab ldan
75b6(mdo 'grel): rnams yongs mi byed/ /de skad gsungs nas che ba'i rdo/ /zhabs mdzub kyis phyud g.yon pa yi/ /phyag gis g.yas pa'i phyag tu ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod mdzad nas/ /mdza' med pha rol gnon pa yis/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar btang ste/ /'gro ba gsuM
75b7(mdo 'grel): du ngo mtshar gyi/ /spyod pa pho nya bzhin du mdzad/ /shin tu rmad byung mdzad pa des/ /de ni 'phangs pa'i 'phral nyid la/ /rlung ni rab tu langs pa bzhin/ /skye bo khyab pa'i sgra rab byung/ /'du byed thams cad mi rtag nyid/ /'di ni 'khrul pa med par byed//
76a1(mdo 'grel): chos rnams thams cad bdag med dang/ /zhi ba myang 'das kho na yod/ /de skad gsal ba'i sgra brjod de/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo ba ni/ /ri dbang rtse mo'i rnam pa can/ /slad nas kyang ni gnas par mthong/ /skad cig gis de bcom ldan gyi//
76a2(mdo 'grel): zhal gyi rlung gis gzhig byas te/ /mchog gi ngo mtshar brgyud ma ni/ /phyogs rnam dag tu bkram pa byas/ /slad nas phra rab rdul rnams kyis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gcig nyid byas/ /gzhan du To? dang 'gro gsum du/ /ya mtshan dag kyang bzhag par mdzad
76a3(mdo 'grel): de nas bcom ldan brtson 'grus dang/ /stobs ni rdzogs pa gyid rnams dag/ ngo mtshar mig ni mi g.yo bas/ /mthong nas phyag 'tshal der gsol pa/ /kye ma khyod? kyi mthu chen po/ /stobs dang brtson 'grus rgyas pa 'di/ /gang zhig nges par rtog pa yi//
76a4(mdo 'grel): nus pa lha rnams la yang med/ /khyod kyi stobs dag bla ma ni/ /rjes su 'dzin la rab zhugs pas/ /rdob bying zhing gting dag tu/ /song 'di skye ba bzhin du bton/ /ngo mtshar mchog mdzad khyod kyi ni/ /brtson 'grus shes rab stobs sogs kyi/ /tshad kyi
76a5(mdo 'grel): mtshams ni nges pa dag/ /su zhig gis kyang cang shes sam/ /de skad smra zhing ngo mtshar ni/ /g.yo med de rnams la gzigs nas/ /rdob med la rab zhugs te/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ /srid gsum 'byung po rnams kyi stobs/ gcig nyid
76a6(mdo 'grel): du ni gyur pa gang/ /bde gshegs gcig gi stobs de dang/ /'jig rten na ni mnyam pa min/ /chu gter chu ni bum pa dang/ /'gro rnams phra rab rdul dag gis/ /'grang ba ru ni shin tu nus/ /bde gshegs mthu na mi yin no/ /gang gis srad gri tshad kyi ni//
76a7(mdo 'grel): lhun po'i de? nyid grangs rig pa/ /des kyang bde gshegs yon tan ni/ /dam pa'i lci ba nyid mi rtogs/ /de skad gsungs nas bcom ldan gyis/ /brgya byin pad+ma'i gnas dang bcas/ /lha yi dkyil 'khor 'ongs pa la/ /dge ba dag mi bstan pa ?/ /de
76b1(mdo 'grel): yis de de nyer bstan pas/ /gyad rnams byang chub la brten nas/ /nyan thos zhes bya nyi tsher bcas/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas nyid gyur/ /'ga' yis rgyun zhugs 'bras bu thob/ /gzhan gyis lan cig phyir 'ong yang/ /phyir mi 'ong 'bras gzhan gyis te/ /gzhan
76b2(mdo 'grel): gyis dgra bcom gnas thob gyur/ /de ltar bsam pa phra rgyas khams dang 'gro ba gzigs gyur cing/ /mkhyen nas rang bzhin de ltar mtshungs pa med pa'i gdams dag ni/ /'phags ba'i bden pa bzhi po yang dag rab bsal? dri med pa/ /de dag rnams kyi dge ba ?
76b3(mdo 'grel): slad bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las brag des par 'phangs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu drug pa'o// //chags pa med rnams des
76b4(mdo 'grel): par rnam par dag pa'i gnas/ /dge ba mngon 'dod 'khor ba'i g.yon dang legs byas la/ /mngon par dga' zhing yid kyi dri ma rnam dag gi/ /bon gyi rdul dang bral ba dge legs bskyed pa yin/ /sngon tshe klu rnams gdengs ka yi/ /zam pas gla legs/ /par bsgral//
76b5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan bde gshegs pha rol tu/ /byon nas dge slong rnams la gsungs/ /'dir sngon rin chen rang bzhin gyis/ /mchod sdong rmad byung mdzes pa byung/ /gal te dge mtshan khyed lta na/ /'di nyid du de bdag gis bstan/ /zhes gsungs sa la bcom ldan gyi//
76b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan mchog ldan pa'i phyag dag gis/ /reg pas klu yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /rin chen mchod sdong slad nas bstan/ /dge slong thams cad de mthong nas/ /yun rings mig ni mi 'dzum zhing/ /lus ni g.yo ba med pa dag/ ri mo bris pa bzhin du gyur/ /de dag gis
76b7(mdo 'grel): dris bcom ldan gyis/ /de gtam slar yang rab gsungs te/ /'das dang ma 'ongs mkhyen pa ni/ /tshems kyi snang bas 'grems pa bzhin/ /sngon tshe lha yi bu 'ga' zhig /dus kyi mtho ris las yongs 'phos/ /brgya byin bka' las mi yi bdag/ mang pos bkur ba'o 
77a1(mdo 'grel): zhes par gyur/ /sa yi gzhi la chos kyi ni/ /spyod pa rjes 'jug dran ba'i slad/ /de yis mchod sbyin brgya ba la/ /rigs ba'i mtshan nyid cung zed blangs/ /de nas lha yi bdag po'i lags/ /bi shwa karmas de gnas su/ /'od ldan rin chen
77a2(mdo 'grel): mchod sdod ni/ /bsod nams bzhin du mthob bsgrubs/ /de nas de ni lha la chags/ /skye bo dge mtshan g.yo ba med/ /rmos sogs las rnams rgyun chad pas/ /rgyal po'i bang mdzod zad par gyur/ /de nas sa bdag de yis de/ /gang ga yid ni chu la 'phangs
77a3(mdo 'grel): da lta yang nis 'og na/ /rin chen gyis rgyan nyi mas bzhin/ /dus kyis de ni yongs chags nas/ /yongs su 'jig par 'gyur ma yin/ /yongs su gyur bas mi 'jig gang/ /'gron nges par de yod min/ /ma 'ongs dus na skye dgu'i lo/ /stong phrag brgyad cu
77a4(mdo 'grel): ba yi tshe/ /rgyal ba grags pa dud ltar dkar/ /dung zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi bdag dbag bsam shing rta des/ /mchod sdong bsod nams kyis 'thob 'di/ /mdun na 'don gyi bur gyur ba/ /byams pa la ni rab sbyin 'gyur/ /slong ba yid bzhin nor gyur ba//
77a5(mdo 'grel): byams pa yis kyang 'di blangs nas/ /'phral la dam bur byas nas ni/ /'jig rten dbul po med byed 'gyur/ /byams bas mchod sdong byin de nas/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas nyid 'thob/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes gter/ lha rnams kyis ni mchod par
77a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /btsun mo glan po'i tshogs dang bcas/ /stong phrag brgyad cu dag gis ni/ /yongs su bskor nas dung zhes ba'i/ /rgyal po'ang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /skye ba snga ma'i smon lam gyis/ /dung gi dge ba rgyas pa dag/ byas pa nges par longs spyod smad/
77a7(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu yongs su smin par 'gyur/ /yul dbus su sngon rgyal po ni/ /nor lha'i bu lha? nor lha'i bu/ /byang phyogs su yang mi bdag na/ /nor gyis bkur ba zhes pa ?/ /'byor ba'i dran pa las 'khrungs pa/ /kho na gyis sems gdungs de dag gis/ /yid?
77b1(mdo 'grel): ni g.yul dag rtsom pa/ /lhag par rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /de nas nor gyis bkur ba 'ongs/ /grong khyer du yang rab tu zhugs/ /blang bo shing rta'i tshogs rnams gyis/ /gang gA'i 'grim ni bar med byas/ /der ni rin chen gtsug ces pa/ /yang dag rdzogs ?
77b2(mdo 'grel): nyid thob/ /brgya byin tshangs sogs lha rnams kyis/ /zhabs la mchod ldan de yis mthong/ /de bsams rgyal po nor lha'i bu/ /kye ma bsod nams chen pos ldan/ /gang la skabs gsum pas phyag byas/ /'di ni yul gyi khongs na gnas/ /de nas de yi mthu yis
77b3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /der ni sa skyong de dag gis/ /khon gyi rdul ni zhib yis/ /log par rmongs pa yongs zad gyur/ /de nas sa bdag nor lha'i bus/ /pha rol dang ni sdums byas zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs te/ /longs spyod kun gyis mchod pa byas/ /mchod pa'i mjug
77b4(mdo 'grel): tu bdag phyag 'tshal/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis/ /bdag ni chen por gyur cig ces/ /smon lam dag kyang byas par gyur/ /skabs 'dir shin tu che ba'i sgra/ /dung las yang dag 'khrungs ba'i tshe/ /phyag 'tshal mdun na gnas de la/ /rin chen gtsug gis bka' stsal
77b5(mdo 'grel): pa/ /dung zhes bya ba'i sa sgyong ni/ /'khor los sgyur bar khyod 'gyur te/ /'jug tu byang chub ldan pas kyang/ /dge ba yang dag thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar dam pa'i smon lam bsod nams rgyas pa las ni sa bdag nor lha'i bu/ /mi yi bdag po dung zhes bya bas blo
77b6(mdo 'grel): gres 'thob 'gyur rin chen gtsug gis bstan/ /de bzhin byang chud tu ni rnam dag blo gros byams pas byams las mdzad par gyur/ /gang phyir dam pa'i grogs ni dge la mngon 'jug bsod nams las kyi dang po yin/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos
77b7(mdo 'grel): byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las byams pa lung bstan pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu bdun pa'o// //sems ni rab tu dang ba'i dri med mnyes gshin rab 'bar ba/ /shin tu chung ba'i sbyin pa'i me tog
78a1(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu'i cha shas ni/ /ri dbang gser ri ro ha na dang bdud rtsi'i gter byin pa'i/ /'bras bu phun tshogs dag dang mtshungs pa nyid du ? /mi 'gro/ sngon ni kun mkhyen dgongs pa tshe/ /yid 'ong mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal/ /mgon med zas sbyin dag gi ni//
78a2(mdo 'grel): kun dga' ra bar bzhugs par gyur/ /de yi slob ma snying rje'i gter/ /'phags pa 'ong srungs che zhes bya/ /grong khyer ? ba'i nags/ kyi mthar/ /ljongs na rgyu zhing gshegs par gyur/ /der ni grong khyer mthar brten pa/ /shin tu ngan 'gro'i bud med dag/ mdze yi nad
78a3(mdo 'grel): kyis gzir ba yis/ /'od srungs de ni ci 'dod mthong/ /de yis de mthong rab dang zhing/ /dang pa dag gis yang dag bsams/ /'di 'dod pa sod snyoms su 'os pa/ /bsod nams las ni ci ma skyes/ /de yi 'dod pa ngo mtshar can/ /dad pa dang ldan rnam mkhyen nas//
78a4(mdo 'grel): snying rje rgyas par lhung bzed dag/ rab tu bskyang nas bsod snyoms blangs/ /sems ni dang ba drag po yis/ /'bras chan rab mang phul ba'i tshe/ mdzo mo de yi lag pa yi/ /sor mo brul nas snod du lhung/ /de 'og de yis sdig pa bzhin/ /mi rtag lus dag dor nas
78a5(mdo 'grel): ni/ /dga' ldan zhes bya lha rnams kyi/ /nang du yang dag skyes par gyur/ /rmad byung de shes brgya byin ni/ /sbyin pa'i dge la gus rgyas pas/ 'bad bas 'od srungs dam pa'i snod/ /bdud rtsi dag gis yongs su bkang/ /dge slong rab zhi'i bdud rtsi yis/ /khengs
78a6(mdo 'grel): des bdud rtsi byin la yang/ /dga' med rtswa yi rtse mo yis/ /lhung bzed thur du kha bstan gyur/ /dam pa snying rje rgyas pa rnams/ /dman la mdza' gtsugs dga' ba bsten /phun sum tshogs pa 'bar ba yi/ /bzhin la gus pa dman par gyur/ /de ni dga' ldan
78a7(mdo 'grel): lha chogs na/ /gnas pa thos nas mi yi bdag/ gsal rgyal gyi ni bcom ldan gyi/ /mchod ston lhag par gnas par byas/ /rgyal po ?/ /bang pa na/ /dpal 'byor ngo mtshar byed mthong nas/ /'phags pa dga' bos bsod nams de/ /dres shing bcom
78b1(mdo 'grel): ldan gyis bka' stsal/ /sngon ni khyom bdag zhig gi bu/ /dbul ba las ni 'bangs nyid gyur/ /zhing las dag la yang dag chags/ /ltogs shing ring ba dal bar gyur/ /yun ring zhag na ma yis ni/ /snum dang tsha med zan chang gcig /khyer nas 'ongs pa des
78b2(mdo 'grel): thob nas/ /gus dang bcas pas zur song/ /lag pa bkrus pa de yi tshe/ /ci dgar yang dag 'ongs pa yis/ /rang sangs rgyas la de nyid ni/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis byin/ /de nyid dus kyis skyong ni/ /gsal rgyal 'di ru skyes par gyur/ /'byor ba 'di ni sbyin
78b3(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /thigs pa de yi dang po'i 'bras/ /de skad bcom ldan gsung thos nas/ /dge slong dag ni ya mtshan gyur/ /rgyal po yid kyang yangs pa yi/ /mchod pa bcom ldan mdun du byas/ /rgyal pos longs spyod ma lus pas/ /gus pas zhal zas phul byas nas
78b4(mdo 'grel): 'bru mar bum pa bye ba yis/ /mar me yi ni phreng ba byas/ /der ni dbul mos mar mo ni/ /shin tu chung ba dag cig phul/ /thams cad snum ni rab zad nas/ /rab tu 'dis tshe gang ma song/ /de yi sems ni dri med kyi/ /smon lam de yis rnam bsams pa/ /shAkya
78b5(mdo 'grel): thub pa nyid du ni/ /'gyur bar kun mkhyen gyis bka' stsal/ /bcom ldan mdun du rgyal po yis/ /rin chen sgron ma'i phreng phul nas/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni mdun bsdad te/ /gus pa yis ni der gsol pa/ /bsod nams de de'i mthu dag las/ /bcom ldan
78b6(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis smon lam gyis/ /bla med yang dag rdzogs byang chub/ /khyod kyi su la ster mi bgyid/ /khyod kyi bka' drin brtse ba las/ /de ni thob par bdag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par mi rtag 'bras thob slad/ /dpag bsam rkag 'thung bsten pa lags/ /de skad rgyal
78b7(mdo 'grel): po'i tshig thos nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub sa bdag rnyed par dka' / /pad+ma'i skud pa bas kyang phra/ /ri bo bas kyang shin tu brling/ /rgya mtsho bas kyang zab pa de/ /bde blag tu ni 'thob ma yin//
79a1(mdo 'grel): bdag gis skye ba gzhan rnams su/ /sbyin pa mang bos thob ma gyur/ /sems ni rab dang dri med kyi/ /ye shes de yi rgya bu gsungs/ /nga las nu ya skye ba la/ /bdag gi gling bzhi'i bdag po yis/ /yun ring sbyin pa'i 'bras bu spyad/ /byang chub de
79a2(mdo 'grel): ni thob ma gyur/ /blta sdug skye bar sbyin pa yis/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal de ni/ /shin tu che ba bdag gis spyad/ /byang chub de ni thob ma gyur/ /gnyis skyes skyob? ba lA mag /glang po brgyad ni sngon byin pas/ /bsod nams chen po bdag gis thob/ /byang chub de ni thob ma
79a3(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /gang zhig rang gi chung ma 'di/ /sha za zhes brjod rnam par spangs/ /dge ba'i bdag nyid rgyal po'i bu/ /gzugs ngan du ni sngon bdag gyur/ /? la dpal dang dbung bar sa/ /stong la dga' brtag gnas gang/ /de ni gzugs dman sdug bsngal ldan/ /su zhig
79a4(mdo 'grel): yon tan thams cad rgyas/ /gzugs bral lus ni gtong ba la/ /zhugs de bde sogs bdag po yis/ /lha yi gtsug gi nor byin nas/ /mda' lnga pa dang mtshungs par byas/ /mchod sbyin byed de'i mchod sbyin la/ /grong khyer stong phrag drug cu ni/ /gser gyi mchod sdong ltar
79a5(mdo 'grel): mngon gzugs/ /ri bo lhun po'i dang la thob gyur/ /dge ba'i skye ba de la ni/ /bdag gi mchog tu sbyin sogs byas/ /bsod nams de dag rnams kyang thob/ /byang chub de ni thob ma gyur/ /rtse gsum rgyal po'i skye ba la/ /bdag gis bden pa'i mthu yis ni/ /char med mu ge
79a6(mdo 'grel): dang bcas bcom/ /byang chub de ni thob ma gyur/ /mi thi lar ni mchod sbyin byed/ /lha chen rgyal po'i skye ba la/ /bsod nams phun tshogs bdag gis thob/ /byang chub de ni thob ma gyur/ /sa skyong ni mi'i skye ba la/ /mthi lir? sngon dka' thub sbyin/ /mchod sbyin gyis ni bsod
79a7(mdo 'grel): nams thob/ /byang chub de ni thob ma gyur/ /sngon ni mi bdag dga' bo la/ /bra ba ldan ba'i bu bzhi dang/ /lnga pa dag kyang me long bzhin/ /yon tan lcag? ba byung bar gyur/ /dus kyi mthar na nye ba'i tshe/ /sa yi bdag po de yis bsams/ /bdag gi mthar ni rgyal srid
79b1(mdo 'grel): la/ /rtsub mo 'di bzhi 'os pa min/ /bdag gi bu ni me long bzhin/ /legs spyod shes rab dri med dang/ /lan pas rgyal srid dag gi dpal/ /gzugs brnyan mdzes pa 'thob pa yin/ /'di bsams de yis blon la smras/ /skye gnas kyis bslang btsun mo yi/ /tshogs
79b2(mdo 'grel): kyis mchod par gyur pa dang/ /gang gi dbu rgyan mi g.yol/ /nor bu'i rkang rjes dag la'ang mnyam/ /sge? yi ljon ba'i bang so la/ /gter drug mthong bar gyur pa ni/ /khyed kyis mi yi dbang por bya/ /zhes brjod mi bdag mtho ris su/ /gshegs tshe blon pos me
79b3(mdo 'grel): long bzhin/ /de yi brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi/ /rim pa rnams kyi dbang por byas/ /chos ni nges bar bya ba la/ /rgol dang phyir rgol rnams kyis gang/ /mthong ba nyid kyis rang nyid ni/ /rgyal pa ma rigs pa dag la gnas/ /sngon gyi rgyu mtshan med bar ni/ /mi 'dod
79b4(mdo 'grel): sdig pa thob gyur ba/ /bram ze dbyug can zhes pa la/ /brtse ba ldan pa'i mdun du ni/ /ba lang zung don khyim bdag gi /rgod ma bsad las shing rta bas/ /ste'u ltung las 'jog por ni/ /gnas pa'i chud mas rnam par rtsod/ /bu ni bsad las chad 'tshong mas//
79b5(mdo 'grel): rtsed la mtshungs ba'i chad pa ni/ /de yi mi mthun phyogs 'jig slad/ /brjod nas de gtang rnam par bkrol/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par ? /sems can mi ma yin rnams kyi/ /sems kyi rjes sbyangs the tshom ni/ /de dang de dag nges par byas/ /gang gis
79b6(mdo 'grel): char med kyis dag pa'i/ /mu ge lo ni bcu gnyis la/ /zas kyis sems can kun gyi srog/ rab tu 'tsho ba nyid du bsgrubs/ /de ltar me long bzhin skyes tshe/ /bdag gis bsod nams thob bar gyur/ /tshe rgyas yang dag rdzogs byang chub/ /de ni nam yang ma rtogs
79b7(mdo 'grel): so/ /'bad rtsol shin tu che bar ni/ /skye ba mang po brgyar goms pa'i/ /dri med shes pas kun rdzob ni/ /bcom pas de lta bdag gis thob/ /gang yang shin tu mchog gyur bla med bden pa rigs ba'i yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di/ /mi bdag ye shes
80a1(mdo 'grel): shes rab dag gis rtogs byas nges par sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyis mi 'thob/ /rmongs pa'i mtshan mo dang bral sprin song nam mkha' rab gsal dri ma med pa dag gis bsten/ /zol med kun dga' i sa gzhi de ni srid pa'i mun pa gcod byed nyin
80a2(mdo 'grel): mo'i dpal 'byor yin/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las me long gi bzhin gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bco brgyad pa'o// //gang yang ye shes slob dpon dge
80a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i rgyu/ /'khor ba'i chu gter zam pas gang bsgrubs pa/ /'di ni gnyen dang mdza' bshes spun zla dang/ /ma dang pa dag gis kyang byed pa min/ /rgyal bo'i khab kyi grong khyer gyis/ /ka lan ta ka'i gnas zhes pa/ /'od ma'i tshal gnas dga' bar sngon/ /sangs
80a4(mdo 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /par nas skyes dang nye rgyal te/ /kun tu rgyu ni gnyis po sngon/ /dge slong dngos por rab rdzogs pas/ /zhi ba dag tu zhugs par byas/ /de nas yang dag bstan mdzad pas/ /dge slong shA ri'i bu dag ni/ /gang gis dgra bcom
80a5(mdo 'grel): mngon byas te/ /de ni thar par 'gro bzod gyur/ /de yi rmad byung bsngags 'os te/ /dge slong kun gyis mthong gyur nas/ /de la sngon gyi spyod mdza' dris/ /des kyang de dag rnams la gsungs/ /bram ze mo yi grogs po yi/ /chung ma yon tan mchog gyur pa//
80a6(mdo 'grel): pha yis rtse mor ming dag kyang/ /sur pi ka zhes btags par gyur/ /de yi ming po sur pA pa/ /zhes pa rang sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur/ /dang po'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba/ /nam zhig khyim du 'ongs par gyur/ /de yis khyo yis bstan pa las/ /khyim pa'i
80a7(mdo 'grel): gus pas de mgron gnyer/ /rab btung gus ba'i spyod pa dang/ /rim 'gro dag gis tshim par byas/ /nam zhig chos gos 'grub pa yis/ /bya ba dag ni byed pa de'i/ /khab kyi las dbang mthong gyur nas/ /smon lam dag ni gus bcas pas/ /ji ltar chan
80b1(mdo 'grel): pa rno 'di dang/ /ji ltar zab mor 'gro ba'i khab/ /de ltar bdag gis shes rab ni/ /mchog tu gyur ces yang dag btab/ /rang sangs rgyas la gus pa dang/ /smon lam dag ni de yis kyang/ /shes rab ldan pa shA ri'i bur/ /skye ba 'di la der gyur to/ /dge slong sha ri'i bu 'di de/ /da lta rab
80b2(mdo 'grel): rno blo mchog ldan/ /dge ba'i snong gyur gang gi phyir/ /dam ba'i blo ni dpag bsam shing/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung thos nas/ /dge slong rnams kyis yang zhus pa/ /mi las smad pa zlos gar mkhan/ /rigs su shA ri'i bu cis 'khrungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
80b3(mdo 'grel): der/ /bka' stsal skye ba sngon nyid la/ /blo gros chen bo zhes bya ba'i/ /rgyal bu dam pas 'dod par gyur/ /dpal dang ldan yang de yi blo/ /rab tu byung la phyogs par gyur/ /rab tu dang ba yongs smin la/ /phun sum tshogs pas sgrib mi byed/ /rgyal sras gzhon nu rnam dag ni/ /rab
80b4(mdo 'grel): byung rigs la 'os min nyid/ /ces brjod pha yis byams pa yis/ /'bad pas de ni bzlog par gyur/ /nam zhig glang chen la zhon nas/ /skye bo lam du 'gro ba des/ /rgan po dbul po mthong gyur nas/ /snying rje bas ni 'di dag smras/ /skal med nor ldan 'jig rten na/ /gnyen
80b5(mdo 'grel): gyi 'chid bas bsdams rnams kyis/ /rab byung 'thob pa min pa nyid/ /khyod kyang su yis rnam par bzlog/ /des smras dbul po bdag la ni/ /lhung bzed med cing chos gos med/ /zhi ba'i yo byad dag la yang/ /nor ni nye bar mkho ba nyid/ /rgyal bo'i sras kyis de thos nas//
80b6(mdo 'grel): thub pa'i dka' thub chags song ste/ /de ni rab tu 'byung bcug nas/ /lhung bzed chos gos rab tu byin/ /yun ring min pa'i dus kyis de/ /rang sangs rgyas ni nyid gyur nas/ /rgyal bo'i sras la mngon phyogs te/ /rdzu 'phrul mchog rnams bstan bar gyur/ /de yi mthu rnams
80b7(mdo 'grel): mthong gyur nas/ /mi yis bdag po'i sras des bsams/ /kye ma dang ba che nyid phyir/ /bdag la rab byung dkon par gyur/ /dbul zhing rnam 'byed med las ni/ /dman rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' / /des na dar na rigs rnams 'byor dang/ /ldan par bdag ni skye bar shog 
81a1(mdo 'grel): de yi smon lam dag las cig de nyid shA ri'i bu 'dir skyes/ /skye ba gzhan du bcom ldan 'das/ /'od srungs kyis ni rab tu byung/ /bden pa'i gter de nges par dgyes pas 'dul ldan 'di ni dge ba dag gi slang/ /yang dag rab tu dang ba rgyas pas dus su shes
81a2(mdo 'grel): rab? ldan pha rnams kyi mchog/ shAkya thub pa'i slob mar 'os pa dag las mchog tu bzhed par 'gyur bar bstan/ /mang+gal 'di yang 'di ru gsungs zhes yang dag rig pa'i rang bzhin ldan rnams/ /skye ba gzhan du dbul po las byed las/ /drong srong chen po 'ga' zhig
81a3(mdo 'grel): brtse ba yis/ /lhung bzed chos gos dag ni byin byung nas/ /mtshungs med rdzu 'phrul mthu yang rab tu bstan/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las shA ri'i bu rab tu byung ba'i rtogs pa brjod
81a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i? yal 'dab ste bcu dgu pa'o// //gang yang mchog tu mi zad mthu ldan gang/ /de ni bsod nams phul phyad dar pa'i mchog /mngon sum gyis mtshon dge ba'i phyogs kyi dbang/ /skye gzhan mtshan nyid nyid du nye bar gyur/ /sngon tshe mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal//
81a5(mdo 'grel): dga' ba mgon med zas sbyin gyi/ /kun dga' dbang bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par gyur/ /khyim bdag stobs kyi sde zhes pa/ /grong ni nor las byung bar gyur/ /'bras bu'i tshogs kyis slong ba yi/ /phyogs tshongs grib bsil ljon pa bzhin//
81a6(mdo 'grel): de yi btsun mo rgyal sde la/ /dus su pad+ma'i mig nan gyi/ /bu zhig bsod nams dag gis bcas/ /dga' ba dag ni gzugs can bzhin/ /lhan skyes rin chen skyon ma'i 'od/ /de yi rna ba'i rna rgyan gyur/ /gser ni bye ba brgya yis kyang/ /gang gi rin la mtshungs ma gyur/ /'di
81a7(mdo 'grel): ni rgyu skar gro bzhin skyes/ /sna rgyan ? tshin bye bar/ /go bzhin bya ba rnams te/ /gzhon nu yin tan ldan par gyur/ /de ni dri med gsal zhing mdzes/ /cha rnams kyis ni yongs su rdzogs/ mi dman kun dga' rgyas gyur pa/ /su yi zla ba bzhin 'gyur/ /mig ni mchim ldan pa'i
81b1(mdo 'grel): mo?/ /mchog tu rtsub pa'i tshig dag gis/ /snyan smra yin yang smad byas te/ /zla bas dug gi char phab bzhin/ /nor sbyin lta bur phun tshogs pa'i/ /pha yis bzlog kyang gzhon nu de/ /rin chen don gnyer don mthun ni/ /chen pos gling gzhan ring bar song/ /chu srin 'byung gnaS
81b2(mdo 'grel): rab bsgral nas/ /skye bo med pa'i lam bgrod de?/ /las kyi rlabs kyis rnams bslang pas/ /rang gi don mthun 'bral bar gyur/ /don mthun gyis kyang de ma rnyed/ /mya ngan gyis log nga bu yis/ /nyon mongs bsgrubs nas rang yul du/ /'ching dang bral bar rab tu
81b3(mdo 'grel): zhugs/ /de yang ngal zhing ngal bso dang/ /rab tu phral bas chu tshogs brgal/ /gdung ba'i mya ngan phreng pa yis/ /mtshan pa'i lho yi phyogs su sod/ /des bsams nor ni chen po dag/ yong la nor bsgrubs la brtson pa/ /nyon mongs 'bras bu dar ba ni/ /bdag gi tshul
81b4(mdo 'grel): min nyid kyi bskyed/ /mi rnams tshogs shes bral ba las kye ma nor sgrub la 'jug pa/ /gnod pa thams cad 'byung ba yis/ /smad 'os rgud pa dag gis gnas/ /'khor ba nor gyi bsgrub pa la/ /bag chags goms las lus can rnams/ /rmongs pa 'di ni
81b5(mdo 'grel): gser gyi ri/ /thob kyang yongs su tshim pa med/ /ngal dub ras rgyas ro dang bral/ /'og gi mya ngan sa gzhi 'di/ /'bar ba'i dpal bzhin ring bar ni/ /bdag gi sreng pa rab rgyas bye/ /kye ma gnas dang gnas rnams su/ /ri dags skem pas long ba bzhin//
81b6(mdo 'grel): mya ngan gyi ni smig rgyu yis/ /bdag la rmongs 'das bskyed pa nyid/ /skom pa 'di dang ngal ba 'di me?/ /chu ni med pa'i sa gzhi 'di/ /phyogs ni 'bar bar bdag gis mthong/ /ci zhig bya zhing gang du 'gro/ de ltar bsam shing ngal bus de/ /chu yi bsam pas song ba na//
81b7(mdo 'grel): ngal dub? rnam pa dad bcas bzhin/ /lcags kyi grong khyer mthong bar gyur/ /shin tu skrag pa'i skun bla? bzhin/ /'jigs su rung ba'i skyes bu ni/ /dug ltar drag cing mig dmar ba/ /sgo der gnas pa mthong bar gyur/ /de yis de la btung ba dris/ /gang tshe ci yang
82a1(mdo 'grel): mai smra ba/ /de tshe rang nyid nang zhugs bas/ /yi dags 'jig rten rnam par mthong/ /rus pa chu rgyus lhag lus skams?/ /gos med rdul gyi greng? bas gos/ /shing bsregs lta bu'i yi dwags rnams/ /mthong bas de ni gdung bar gyur/ /chu dang bral
82a2(mdo 'grel): bas gzir de la/ /de dag gi ni chu bslangs pas/ /rang gi gdung ba yongs btang ste/ /de yi sdug bsngal gyis gzir gyur/ /gdung ba rab smra sgom pa ni/ /drag bos gzir de la des smras/ /brtse med bdag la mya ngan gyi/ /dgon pa 'dir mi chu gang las/ /khyed ? las ni ci zhig
82a3(mdo 'grel): gis/ /sdug bsngal bzod dka' 'di la bkod/ /khyed rnams phyir bcos 'bras med pa/ /'di las bdag ni mya ngan byed/ /gzir ba ma mthong ba thod yang gang/ /de dag nyon mongs 'joms bzod pa/ /zug rdu med par brtag pa de'i/ /gnyid ni bde bas bran pa bzhin/ /de
82a4(mdo 'grel): la nges smras bdag cag ni/ /thar med mi yin 'gal ba'i las/ /rmongs pa las ni rab bsags pas/ /gdung ba mi bzang gnas su 'phangs/ /lhag par smod cing smod bas gzhan gyi bstan pa nyams bas rgyags pas rgyags pa las/ /'phags pa min zhing phra
82a5(mdo 'grel): dog dag gis gdung ba rnam par brtson pa ma bzlog pa/ /bdag can rnams ni brtse ba med pas skye bo legs pa'i snying la rtag tu ni/ /tshig gi lcags mda' dug gis yongs su bsgos bas zug rdu rab tu zug par byas/ /sbyin pa ma byin no da ni phrogs pa nyid/ /'tsho
82a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i slad du sems ni byas pa nyid/ /bdag cag lus kyis gzhan gyi chud mdag/ 'phrog pa'i rnam 'gyur rab tu byed pa bsgrubs/ /de dag dman pa la chags shing/ /ngan pa'i las la? mkhas gyur pas/ /yi dwags grong khyer 'jigs rung 'dir/ /bdag cag nyon mongs
82a7(mdo 'grel): smod nyid gyur/ /de dag tshig de des thos shing/ /gzhan du 'das rnam pa de lta yin/ /yi dwags mngon par mi 'dod pa/ /mthon nas snying rje rgyas par gyur/ /ngan 'gro'i grong khyer de las ni/ /bsod nams stobs kyis thon nas de/ /dri med grib mA ? ba yi/ /nags
82b1(mdo 'grel): kyi nang du phyin par gyur/ /de nas lam ring gyis dub cing/ /yongs dal dal bu dal bu yis/ /sgom pas yongs gdungs long ba bzhin/ 'od byed ri las lhung bar gyur/ /ma lus phyogs rnams gsal byed pa'i/ /bsod nams bzhin du nyin zad tshe/ /rkun rmongs nag
82b2(mdo 'grel): po'i mun pa dag/ 'jig rten du ni sdig bzhin byung/ /bya dang bud ba chags gyur pa/ /padmo can gyi phun tshogs brgya/ /rnam rgyas rab tu 'grogs pa yi/ /gnyid bzhin yang dag byung bar gyur/ /snying rje las bzhin bsil zer gyi/ /zla 'od bdud rtsi'i thur ma yis/ /rab
82b3(mdo 'grel): gsal skar ma 'gro ba'i mig /da nas rab rib bral bar byas/ /'khor ba nyin ba nyin mo nub mo yi/ /'char nub gzhan du gyur ba dag/ rnam 'phrul du ma mthong ba la/ bdud rtsi'i 'od ni dgod pa bzhin/ /mig ni kun dga' i bdud rtsi'i char/ /reg bde mtshan byed phyogs kyi ni/ /bu
82b4(mdo 'grel): mo'i bzhin phyi me long dag/ dga' ba gzugs can bzhin shar tsho/ /ltad mo la ni gzhan gzugs kyis/ /mtho ris sa la 'ongs pa yi/ /mdzes pa'i gdong bzhin gzhal yas khang/ /gro zhin bye bas mdun du mthong/ /der ni lha yi bo mo dag/ rgyags pa dang bcas
82b5(mdo 'grel): bzhi mthong ste/ /zla ba shar ba'i kun dga' dang/ /rnam bar rtse phyir 'grogs bzhin/ /de dbus mchog gi rnam pa can/ /dga' ba dang ldan mthong gyur te/ /gzhon nu'i dga' ba tshogs rnams dag/ rnam bcas nyid du myur pa bzhin/ /rin chen rna rgyan dbung rgyan dang/
82b6(mdo 'grel): zur gud 'ong zer ring po yi?/ /mtshams las 'das pa'i ngo mtshar dag/ /phyogs kyi gdong la 'dri ba bzhin/ /der ni legs byas las byung ba'i/ /ljon shing rgyas pa'i 'bras bu'i dpal/ longs spyong bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /rmad byung de dag mthong bar gyur/
82b7(mdo 'grel): de nas gro bzhin bye ba na/ /de dag dga' bas mgron gnyer de/ /zhing ba'i bza' btang dag la ni/ /mtshan mo bde ba dpos bar gyur/ /de nas rgyu skar me tog gi/ rlung chen tho rangs 'od dag gis/ /mi rtag pas bzhin zla ba yi/ /dpal 'byor yongs su thams
83a1(mdo 'grel): par byas/ /mtshan mo dag ni bar gyur cing/ /srid pa'i mig ni nyi ma dag/ 'byung po kun gyi bde sdug gi/ dbang po gcig pu shar ba'i tshe/ /bzhal yas khang dang lha mo rnams/ /skad cig gis di mi snang gyur/ /skyes bu yang ni mdzes pa bzhin/ /rnam
83a2(mdo 'grel): par nyams nas sa la lhung/ /de nas de yi rgyab tu ni/ /shin tu 'jigs rung khyi tshogs byung/ /'gro gsum smod sdig gis bslar? pa'i?/ /nyon mongs phung po ma lus bzhin/ /kha dang mgrin pa nas ba rnams sha/ za zhing drag gcod khrag gis myos/ /de dag rnams kyi
83a3(mdo 'grel): cho de ldan/ /de ni zos shing zad bar gyur/ /nyin mo'i mthar ni slar nas yang/ /gzhal yas khang de byung ba mthong/ /lha mo bzhi po de dag dang/ /mdzes ldan skyes bu de yang ngo/ /de nas gro bzhin byed? rna/ /shin tu pa mtshan nas de la/ /grogs pa ngo mtshar 'di dag ni//
83a4(mdo 'grel): mthong ba ci yin smos zhes dris so/ /de dris de yis rab smras pa/ /grogs po 'di ni mnyam par gyis/ /khyod ni gro bzhin bya ba na/ /nges shes legs byas ldan ba yin/ /nor bas byung ba'i grong du bdag/ sdig can phyugs dag skyed bar gyur/ /rtag tu bdag gi phyugs rnamS
83a5(mdo 'grel): kyi/ /shal rab tu bcang nas bcod/ /kA tyA ya na zhes 'phags pa/ /snying rje'i gter ni bsod snyoms la/ /byon pas bdag la rab gsungs pa/ /las ngan 'di las rnam par log /bab col tshol ba'i nyon mongs ni/ /'tsho ba'i rang bzhin bzong dka' ba 'di/ /rtsa
83a6(mdo 'grel): ba bcad ba'i ljon pa bzhin/ /rang gi lus la ltung ba nyid/ /de ltar bdag nyid bzlog gyur kyang/ /gang tshe sdig las ma log pa/ /de tshe 'phags min la brtse ba/ /de yis bdag la slar gsungs pa/ /gal te rnam kun brtse med khyod/ /nyin pa rang gi ni 'tsho ba
83a7(mdo 'grel): byos/ /mtshan mo bdag gi dam tshig las/ /tshul khrims sdom pa yang dag la'o/ /sems can kun la phan bzhed ba/ /de yis 'bar bas 'di brjod nas/ /tshul khrims blangs pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /bsod nams blo gros bdag lag dang/ /dus kyis dus
83b1(mdo 'grel): kyi dbang song ste/ /bdag gis gnas skabs 'di dag thob/ /sol tshan bdud rtsi char dag gis/ /nyin dang mtshan ni gtams?  pa bzhin/ /mtshan mo tshul khrims blangs 'bras dang/ /nyin bar dag ni 'tshe ba'i 'dras/ /bdag spyod bsod nams sdig pa yis/ /bde dang
83b2(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal dag? tu 'der/ /bdag ni sdig pa byed de la/ /grogs bo yis ni snying rje mthong/ /rang yul song nas bdag tshig gis/ /bden par bdag gi bu la smros/ /bdag gi khang pa'i zur mdza' na/ /gser gyi snod ni sbas nas yod/ /de ni phyung la sdig pa dag/ yongs
83b3(mdo 'grel): su gtong ba'i bya ba bsgrubs/ /'phags pa kA tyA yan ni/ /rtag tu bsod snyoms dag gis mchod/ /de yis dul bas de brjod tshe/ /de yis de bzhin zhes smras song/ /de ni song bas bdun dag tu/ /lha yi gzhal yas khang pa gzhan/ /rin chen pad+ma la bri shing mdzas
83b4(mdo 'grel): dga' tshal gnyis pa lta bu mthong/ /der ni nyin mo rtsom pa na/ /lus med dang 'grogs lus bcas bzhin/ /lha mo dag dang skyes bu ni/ yin pa che yi brgyan ba mthong/ /de yi bde ba'i yo byad kyis/ /de bzhin nyid du der gus byas /lam? ring nyon mongs
83b5(mdo 'grel): dbus su ni/ /bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin nyin mo bzlas/ /de nas nam mkha' i gzhal yas khang/ /rtse nas pad ldan bdag ltung tshe/ /sdug bsngal gyis bzhin 'jigs rung gi/ mun pa'i khur gyis 'gro ba byas/ /de nas mtshan bdag zla ba'i 'od/ /skyug cir nyams
83b6(mdo 'grel): ldan nyid kyis bsal/ /'od zer dkar ldan rim gyis ni/ /skye po'i nad pa bzhin du mthong/ /nyin mo'i snang ba bzhin du gzhan/ /mtshan mo'i srin po bur med kyis/ /zos pa'i thod ba'i dam bu bzhin/ /ri bong bzhin du snang bar gyur/ /'jig rten dus kyi tsan dan
83b7(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /byug pa zla 'ong dag gis khyab/ /gzhal yas khang dang mtho ris kyi/ /ri dwags mig ni ga shed song/ /gzhal yas khang nas skyes bu de/ /lhung bar gyur cing sbrul gzugs kyis/ /brtse brgya bas ni rim pa yis/ /lan bdun 'bris shing rnam par bcings
84a1(mdo 'grel): de yi spyi bor bug pa dag/ de yis byas nas slad pa khrag/ za bar byed cing rim pa yis/ /mgo bo dag ni legs? mar byas/ /de nas skya reng zer gyis bkag /nyin mo yis ni bzhin gsos shing/ /'jigs phung? mthong ba'i nyon mongs las/ /skar mi
84a2(mdo 'grel): rnams ni mig zu mtsho/ /yang ni lha yi gzhal yas khang/ /lha mo de dang gzhon nu de'ang/ /ma zad lus can lta yin ni/ /rgyan gyis brgyan par rab tu byung/ /shin tu mtshar la de dris shing/ /rang gi spyod mdza' de yis bshad/ /gnyis skyes bdag ni yid ces
84a3(mdo 'grel): bya/ /khyim tshes dag gi chud ma ni/ /gzhon nu can dan dog pa ma/ /g.yem ma lag 'gro bdag gi ni/ /shin tu yid du 'od bar gyur/ /grong du gzhan gyi chung mar dga' / /lug blo 'khrugs pa bdag gi blo/ /mdza' dag yul gyi grong du ni/ /nges par byed zhing brlag
84a4(mdo 'grel): par gyur/ /'phags pa kAtyA? ya nas bdag/ 'dod pa'i tshom rkun sdig shes nas/ /brtse ba'i dbang gis snying rje las/ /skye bos dben bar dal bus gsungs/ /blun po gzugs dga' gzhan gyi ni/ /bud med lus 'grogs dga' ba yis/ /lus med mi la
84a5(mdo 'grel): phye ma leg /'bab bzhin brlog par ma 'gro zhig/ kye ma 'dod chags la chags dang/ /bag med rab tu ltung ba dag/ 'dod ldan 'tshe ba bo dag las/ /gzhan 'joms chung mar gus pa mchog/ sdang dang ngal dub che bar 'dar bas rnam par 'khrugs gyur cing/ /bya
84a6(mdo 'grel): nod bud med kyi ni sos smugs sen mos nyams par byed/ /gzhan gyi chung mar dga' sgrub? rnams kyi spu zing byed pa yi/ /kun tu rmongs pa dang ni dmyal ba'ang 'dod pa mchog/ de slad mnyes gshin ngan pa yis/ /las 'di las ni khyod phyir log /mi gtsang
84a7(mdo 'grel): sdig pa'i reg pa la khyi rnams kho na dga' bar 'gyur/ /de skad de yis brtse bas bdag/ bkag kyang rnam par ma dag blo/ /ma 'gags pa yi chags pa yis/ /bsdabs pas de nyid gtam ma byas/ /de nas bdag gis ma btang ba/ /mkhyen nas kA tyA ya na ni//
84b1(mdo 'grel): nyin mo'i spyod la phan brtson pas/ /bdag la tshul khrims blang ba gnang/ /tshul khrims yang dag blangs nas nyin/ /gzhan gyi bud med bgrod las mtshan/ /bsod nams sdig pas bskyed las 'di/ /bde sdug rang bzhin dag tu gnas/ /nor las byung ba'i grong du
84b2(mdo 'grel): khyod/ /song nas bdag gis bul smos/ /me yig nas na bdag gis ni/ /gser dag sbas te bzhag nas yod/ /de phyung 'tsho ba'i bya ba dang/ /kA tyA yan de lang mchod/ /de yis gus pas de skad brjod/ /de nas gro bzhin bye ba song/ /de yis mdun du nor bu yi/ gzhal
84b3(mdo 'grel): yas khang gnas lha mo mthong/ /mdzes sdug 'o ma'i rgya mtsho las/ /ngal dub med bskrun dpal mo bzhin/ de yis gzhal yas khang pa yi/ /rkang pa bzhin la yi dwags bzhi/ /btags nas blta na mi sdug cing/ /chu rgyus ldan pa de yis mthong/ /des kyang de
84b4(mdo 'grel): ni rab shes nas/ /mdza' ba'i tshig gis yang dag bshad/ /lha la 'os pa'i btung ba dang/ /ro ldan bza' ba de la byin/ /za tshe yi dwags rnams kyi brdas/ /snying rje rje bzhin ring nas bslangs/ /de yis brtse pas de rnams las/ /bya rog la bzhin zan chags
84b5(mdo 'grel): byin/ /gcig gi zan chag gra phug gyur/ /gzhan gyi lcags kyi thu lum dang/ /gsum pa yis ni rang sha nyid/ /bzhi pa'i khrag dang rnag nyid gyur/ /de mthong de dag sdug bsngal gyi/ /spyod pas snying rje ldan gyur des/ /bzhin gyis pad+ma mdzes pa dag mdzeS
84b6(mdo 'grel): bral byas pa de la dris/ /de yis rmad byung de dris pa/ /ri dwags mig can de yi smras/ /gro bzhin bye rna 'di dag la/ /byin pa tshim pa'i don mi 'gyur/ /nor las byung pa'i grong gnas pa/ /bram ze dga' ba zhes pa ni/ /dang po'i rkang pa la bstan 'di'i/ /chung ma
84b7(mdo 'grel): rab dga' zhes ba dag/ gnyis pa'i rkang pa la btags dang/ /bu ni gos med ces pa yin/ /rkang pa gzhan la brtags 'ad? dag/ bdag gi 'phangs mo mna' ma yin/ /rgyu skar sbyor ba'i mchod pa la/ /zas kyi nyer sbyor bdag gis mngon/ /legs par byas
85a1(mdo 'grel): tshe bdag khyim du/ /'phags pa kA tyAsa na byon/ /bdag sems rab tu dang ldan nas/ /bsod snyoms kyis ni de la mtsho/ /ma nges pas phyogs rnams dri med kyi/ /rjes su bzung ba mdzad bzhin gshegs/ /de nas bdag gi bdag po 'di//
85a2(mdo 'grel): khrus byes mgyegs? bar yang dag 'ongs/ /rang? tu dga' slad bdag gis spras bsod snyoms phul ba de thos nas/ //bro las bdag smras mtshod 'os rnams/ /mchod ba med par dge sbyod ni/ /sgra med g.yo ldan gra dug 'os/ /khyod kyis ci yi phyir
85a3(mdo 'grel): du mchod/ /rmongs las 'di yi rjes brjod che/ /de bzhin bus kyang bdag la smras/ /tshos ba thog mar za 'os te/ /lcags kyi thu lum cis mi za/ /bdag gi mna' ma 'di rtag tu/ /sngon la zas la longs spyod cing/ /bdag gis brjod la mna' byed pa//
85a4(mdo 'grel): rang sha za zhes smra ba mo/ /'bangs mo 'di yang zas dag la/ /rku zhing nyams pa dag tu byed/ /smad tsho bden bar byed ba ni/ /rnag khrag za zhes smra byed yin/ /rde dag yi drags 'di dag gyur/ /rang gi dag dang mtshungs par za/ /bdag ni 'phags pa'i
85a5(mdo 'grel): bka' drin gyis/ /lha yi longs spyod nye bar spyod/ /khyod kyis rang yul phyin nas ni/ /bdag gi bu mo dag pa smros/ /byang kyi pa yis khang pa ni/ /gsar gyi gter ni rnam bzhi yod/ /de dag thon la ci rigs bar/ /rang gi skye ba gnas par byos/ /pha
85a6(mdo 'grel): dang ming ba'i mi dang?/ /gis/ /kA tyA ya na rtag tu mchod/ /gro bzhin bye ba'i rnal khyod/ /rang yul du song ngal ba thong/ /khyod ni rang khyim nas 'thon nas/ /lo ni bcu gnyis yongs su rdzogs/ /de skad brjod nas de yis ni/ /yi dags bzhi po la
85a7(mdo 'grel): bskos te/ /nyal ba nyid na yud tsam gyis/ /de ni rang yul phyin par byas/ /de yang 'phral la rang yul gyi/ /skyed mos tshal kyi nags nas langs/ /pha ma bral ba'i mya ngan gyis/ /long? la nye bar gyur ba thos/ /dge slong gnyes skyes mgron po'i
85b1(mdo 'grel): tshogs/ /lha yi gnas rnams mchod byed pa/ /rang gi pha yi khyim mthong nas/ /mchog tu ya mtshan dag tu gyur/ /skad cig nyid phyir dngos po kun/ /mi rtag nyid du des byas nas/ /mnga' dang chags bkun btang ste/ /de rin gnas bas yang dag bsams/ /kye ma nyin
85b2(mdo 'grel): mtshan mdza' med bar/ /kun tu rmongs pa'i gnyid 'di ni/ /rmi lam sgyu ma'i rol rtsed kyis/ /rmad du byung ba'i rnam 'phrul byed/ /skye ba'i lam rab ster ba'i ma/ /sa bon 'debs nus 'di yi pha/ /bgron po'i mchod dang stan lta'i lus/ /'di la nges pa'i tshogs 'di
85b3(mdo 'grel): gang/ /dpal 'byed 'khor ba'i sprin rum 'khyam par yongs 'dris gser gyi sred ba'i 'dro/ /re ba phyogs rnams rdzogs par 'ching ba'i glog bzhin reg ba med cang rab tu g.yo/ /lus ni gnod pa kun dang 'jigs dang 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang rga dang na ba dang//
85b4(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal dag gis yongs su 'gro ste be lta na yang lus 'dzin yid mi 'byung/ /dpal 'byor mdza' dag ? gyur cig/ thal mo 'di sbyar nad pil?/ /bud med rnams la yon bzong mdzod/ /bdag ni rab byung kho na dga' / 'di bsams de yis pha bdag//
85b5(mdo 'grel): yang dag dbugs phyung mig dag thob/ /chos lam dag cing zhi ba yi/ /gnas la blo ni bkod par gyur/ /don mthun nyams gyur yun ring na/ /'ongs shing ring kyang snying stobs 'byor/ /ma zhus bas na rang mi yang/ /brtse ba'i gnas nyid du ma gyur/ /'khor ba'i
85b6(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs kyis rnams 'khrugs/ /de dag bal te brtse ba na/ /dam ba su la rjes mi brtse/ /de dag phun tshogs thob mi 'dod/ /phyugs skyong bram ze bud med la/ /gser bro ba mngon sum ma tsan? nyid tsan/ /phrin sogs ji ltar brjod pa bzhin/ /de dag rnams la
85b7(mdo 'grel): bzlas byas te kA tyA ya na da? phrab nas/ /zhi ba da yis rab byung blangs/ /blun po rnams kyi spyod lug rgyu/ /da nas de yis rgyun zhugs kyi/ /'bras bu dri ma med thob cing/ /len cig byed 'ong phyin mi 'ong/ /'bras dang de bzhin dgra bcom 'bras/ /khamS
86a1(mdo 'grel): gsum dag las 'dod chags bral/ /gser dang bong ba rdo bar mtshungs/ /nam mkha' lag mthil mtshungs pa dang/ /ral gri tsan dan mtshungs par gyur/ /de nas mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal?/ /smyig ma'i nags na bzhugs pa yi/ /bcoM ldan
86a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba lta ru de/ /kA tyA ya na'i bka' yis song/ /phyag ni byas shing bcom ldan 'das/ /rang nyid dgyes pas dri ba byas/ /de nas gro bzhin bye ba rna/ /dga' ba rgyas pas de la smras/ /bcom ldan chos kyi sku yis ni/ /thos pa'i lam nas mthong bar gyur/ /da?
86a3(mdo 'grel): lta gzugs kyi sku yis ni/ /bsod nams kyis ni bdag gis mthong/ /mi chung bsod nams kyis 'thob bya/ /khyod ni mthong ba'i bdud rtsi 'di/ /'thungs nas doms par ma gyur pa/ /de dag mchog tu bslus pa nyid/ /chags pa med kyang khyod kyi gzugs/ /su zhig
86a4(mdo 'grel): chags par mi bgyid lags/ /byugs pa med kyang khyod kyi spyan/ /kye ma dga' bas byugs pa lags/ /khyod kyi gtam dang khyod rjes dran/ /khyod dang phrad dang khyod bsten pa/ /'di dag dge ba'i rtsa ba yi/ /'bras bu phun ? tshogs rgyas pa yin/ /zhes pa
86a5(mdo 'grel): thos nas bcom ldan gyis/ /rab tu dang bas dga' bar byas/ /des bstan kun dga' rab dang/ /mnyam pa'i gnas ni de yis thob/ /de yi gnas su bcom ldan yang/ /byams pa yis ni yang dag gshegs/ /de yi chos kyi kha don dag /snyan pa thos nas des
86a6(mdo 'grel): rab bsngags/ /gro bzhin bye ba'i rna ba yis/ /rab ni phun tshogs de mthong nas/ /sngon gyi spyad tshul dge slong gis/ /dris shing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /ba ra NA sa'i rdzogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'od srungs zhes pa sngon/ /mdzad pa rdzogs nas myang 'das
86a7(mdo 'grel): kyi/ /dbyings su yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /mi bdag kri ki zhes pas de'i/ /mchod rten rin chen rnams kyis byas/ /de yi bsod nams tshogs rnams ni/ /rang nyid mtho ris brjod bzhin 'phags/ /der ni nor dag brda byas nas/ /zhig ral gso ba la bzhag
86b1(mdo 'grel): pa ? /de nas de sras rgyal srid thob/ /chags dang rmongs pas byin ma gyur/ /de nas byang phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i/ /deng dpon nor sbyin zhes pa yis/ /de yi ched du rna ba'i rgyan/ /sa yi rin du rab tu phul/ /dus gzhan nye bar 'ongs nas kyang/ /nod chen gzhan yang phul byas
86b2(mdo 'grel): nas/ /yang dag bsod nams ldan pa bdag/ gyur ces de yis smon lam btab/ /de ni gro bzhin bye rna 'di/ /bsod nams dag gis gnas chen thob/ /de lta kho na'i rna ba'i rgyan/ /mtshan nyid dag dang ldan par gyur/ /gang phyir 'gro ba'i dus su 'dis/ /ma yis tshig
86b3(mdo 'grel): ni rtsub mo dag/ thos par byas nas de yi 'di/ /ngal dub chen po dag tu gyur/ /dag pa'i yon tan dam pa yi/ /las kyi ras chen dbus su ni/ /nag po'i las kyi cha chung yang/ /gsal ba nyid du des par zin/ /legs byas grogs ldan snying stobs spro ba dag dang khyim
86b4(mdo 'grel): spangs grogs kyis dga' ba dang/ /mi bzang sgrol ba'i brtson 'grus zab stegs dag dang phongs pa skyob pa'i brtse ba dang/ /mjug tu yang ni zhi ba yongs su 'dris par gyur cing rabs dang rab bzhin blo/ /bsod nams 'thob pa'i yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni 'bras bu
86b5(mdo 'grel): rgyas par gnas pa yin/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gro bzhin bye ba rna'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu pa'o// //lce gnyis 'grogs la 'tsho ba ji ltar
86b6(mdo 'grel): yod/ /gtso bo mang la bde ba ji ltar yod/ /las kyis bcings la rang stobs ji ltar yod/ /shes rab mchog la gnod pa ji ltar yod/ /lus 'phags kyi ni mi thi lar/ /mi bdag chu yi sems dpa' i ming/ /gang gi dpung pa lag 'gro yi/ /sa yi khur gyi
86b7(mdo 'grel): ngal sor gyur/ /nyes med phun sum tshogs pa de'i/ /blon chen dum bu zhes pa ni/ /yon tan drug po ma lus pa/ /yongs shes phur bu lta bu byung/ /lugs shes gus las de yi bor/ /mi yi bdag pos bltas gyur cing/ /bya ba'i dbang las skye bo kun//
87a1(mdo 'grel): rtag tu bzhin la rab ltar gyur/ /chu dang skye bo bzlog mod kyang/ /song ba'i rjes su 'gro ba yis/ /srol du rab tu 'bab pa yi/ /srid pa dag ni rnam par 'phel/ /de yi rang bzhin skye bo kun/ /mthong nas phrag dog gis brgyal ba'i/ /blon po'i tshogs
87a2(mdo 'grel): kyi de yi ni/ /rnam par ltung ba rab tu bsams/ /'byed mkhas de dag rgyal po yi/ /gnas su rab zhugs de yis ni/ /rje bo stobs de yang yang du/ /dogs pa'i gnas su byas nas bshad/ /de dag tshig gi dogs pa yi/ /rgyal po de las phyir phyogs gyur/ /bud med
87a3(mdo 'grel): byis pa sa skyong ni/ /mchog tu bsngags pa la yid ches/ /dogs par mi 'os la yang dogs/ /dogs 'os skyon la'ang dogs pa med/ /bye brag mi shes g.yo ba yis/ /sa skyong bya rog dogs pa can/ /jo bo chags bral rtags rnams ni/ /rnam gzigs blon
87a4(mdo 'grel): po'i gang zag gis/ /rang sras sa 'tsho seng ge zhes/ /bya la dogs bcas dal bus smras/ /g.yo can phra mas mi yi bdag/ bdag la yid brtan bral bar byas/ /snying ni rnam par phye bstan yang/ /gcugs pa nyid du 'gro ma yin/ /chags dang bral ba'i jo
87a5(mdo 'grel): bo ni/ /kun brjod mthong thos bor ba de/ /bdag la lhod pa nyid 'gyur te/ /rgan po yi ni lus po bzhin/ /phra mas tha dad rab bskyed pa'i/ /mdza' phal phum bar mi 'gyur te/ /rdo? yi dum bur byas pha yi/ /nor bu slar yang 'byar ba min/ lce gnyis gya gyur non
87a6(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /jo bo tsandan rkang 'thung ni/ /don bye byed cing yon tan dang/ /ldan yang bsten bya nyid mi 'gyur/ /mi bdag gter ni don gnyer ba/ /'jigs rung sdang ba'i dug 'bebs pa'i/ /lce gnyis pas bcom rnam 'khrugs pa'i/ /mi ni ji ltar dge ba bsten//
87a7(mdo 'grel): de slad yang dag btang nas 'gro/ bdag sdang ba'i skyon gyis ni/ /gang na dogs pa zug rdu yi/ /rang bzhin gyis 'tsho yul des ci/ /mkhas shing rtul phong bsrung bar bzod/ /nor mang legs phar yang dag 'grogs/ /dam pa gnas pa'i yangs pa can/ /
87b1(mdo 'grel): gnas de bdag ni 'dod par gyur/ /de skad smras che bu dag kyang/ /de bzhin zhes smra rjes 'bras bcas/ /skyed mos tshol du 'gro zol gyis/ /'khor bcas de ni rab tu song/ /'gro bar shes nas mi yi bdag /bzlog la yang dag rab brtson pa'i/ /'bang pa yid kyang ma
87b2(mdo 'grel): thob ste/ /rab tu spangs pas slar 'thob min/ /rmongs pa dam pa'i legs byas smod/ /skad cig de rnams blun par byas/ /de ni kun tu su zhig gis/ /don gnyer don byas min par 'gyur/ /yon tan gyis bkug blo ldan blon/ /'ongs pa yangs pa can pa yis/ /gus pa'i
87b3(mdo 'grel): spyod pas mchod de nas/ /tshogs kyi gtso bo'i gnas su bzhag/ de nas de yi 'byor pas dpal/ /des thob de yi gtso bos kyang/ /tshogs pa nam yang tshul min las/ /gzhan gyi gnod pa'i gnod ma gyur/ /de nas dus kyi blon bo'i bu/ /gzhon par gyur pa seng ge yi/ /bu mo
87b4(mdo 'grel): yon tan ldan pa ni/ /mdzes ma tsal zhes pa btsas/ /de yi bu mo gnyis pa yang/ /nye ba'i tshol zhes pa skyes/ /mdzes ma'o de dag skyes nyid la/ /mtshan mkhan mkhan pas rab smras pa/ /tse la'i bu ni pha bsad nas/ /sa yi bdag po dag tu 'gyur/ /nye ba'i tse la'i yon
87b5(mdo 'grel): tan can/ /rdzogs pa'i mtshan ldan 'gyur zhes so/ /blon sras thu bos sa 'tsho ni/ /dpa' bas che rkyags ma bsdams pas/ /skyed tshal dkrugs pa'i gnod pa yis/ /tshogs rnams sdad 'os nyid du gyur/ /de dag de yi pa dag la/ /gus pas khro bral de dang ni/ /nu
87b6(mdo 'grel): bor bcas la skyed tshal gnyis/ /sla la tam che rgyas byin/ /legs byas rigs pa gcig gis der/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas/ /'byor ba rgya che'i gtsug lag khang/ /sa yi rgyan ni gzhan gyis so/ /de nas bas mdza' i dkyil 'khor du/ /pha
87b7(mdo 'grel): yis stobs rgyas sa srungs bu/ /tshogs pa'i khro bas 'jigs pa las/ /las mdza' nye bar bsgrubs slad bzhag/ blon po'i mchog de dus gyis ni/ /mtho ris bzhud tshe tshogs rnams kyis/ /legs pa nyid phyir gzhon pa'i bu/ /song ge de yi gnas su bzhag
88a1(mdo 'grel): tshogs pa gud bral sa 'tsho yis/ /pa yi gnas ni ma thob nas/ /yul dang gnas ni de dag la/ /chags bral yongs su gtang bar sems/ /tsher mas gtams shing stag gis snom/ /nags tshal mchog tu gnas par bya/ /rje bo mang
88a2(mdo 'grel): pos rab phye ba/ /ma sdams skye bo'i nang du min/ /tha dad dam pa'i bya ba smra/ /gang zhig gcig gis 'dod gyur pa/ /de la gzhan dag yong mi sred/ /tshogs pa ji ltar bsten par bya/ /zhes bsams nga rgyal can de yis/ /grong khyer rgyas po'i khab du phyin/ /mi bdag
88a3(mdo 'grel): gzungs can snying po yi/ /yon tan gyi ni dpal 'byor bsten/ /de yis dgyes pas de mchod nas/ /de yi yid bstan gnas su gyur/ /de dus yon tan gyis 'grogs pa/ /yun ring 'dris pa bzhin du mdzes/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs snying gi/ btsun mo lnga
88a4(mdo 'grel): pa nyid gyur de'i/ /'bral ba'i me yis gdungs de dang/ /nye ba'i rtse la nu bo yi/ /bu mo btsun po blang 'os pa/ /blo ldan de yis rnams bsams nas/ /gsang nas rgyu zhing de yi bkas/ /yangs pa can gyi grong khyer song/ /tshogs kyi nye bar spyad bya nyid/ /mdzes ma
88a5(mdo 'grel): su la'ang sbyin mi bya/ /zhes pa yangs pa can las sngon/ /rang gi yul du nges pa byas/ /de yi grong khyer sgo bsrung phyir/ /gnod sbyin gnas na 'phyang ba yis/ /dril bu shin tu gsang ba ni/ /pha rol zhugs tshe sgra sgrogs byed/ /nu bo'i skyed tshal phreng bar ni/ /groS
88a6(mdo 'grel): kyi gsang ste des rab zhugs/ /nye ba'i ce? la len pa la/ /byin pas tse la thob par gyur/ /de ni shing rta kha bskyon song/ /dril sgra las ni mngon 'dod pa'i/ /skyes bu dpa' rnams des bcom nas/ /mi yi bdag pa'i grong khyer phyir/ /de la des smras
88a7(mdo 'grel): mdzes pa 'di?/ /bdag gis bsams pa min pa thob/ /'di yi bu yis pha gsod ces/ /gang phyir mtshan mkhan? rnams kyis smras/ /de slad mi yi bdag po 'di/ /khyod kyi btsun mor 'os ba min/ /khyod ni 'tsho na skyed bu yi/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
88b1(mdo 'grel): 'tsho/ /de yis 'di brjod tshe na des/ /de mthong gtang bar yod ma nus/ /de gdong la bris ri mo yis/ /las kyi slad nyid bcings pa bzhin/ /de yis smras pa bu yis pha/ /gsod pa gang du gang tshe mthong/ /gal te bu ni byung gyur na/ /rang nyid bdag gi dbang bskur bya//
88b2(mdo 'grel): de skad brjod nas mi yi bdag /mdzes ma len la dga' bar gyur/ /las kyis rlabs kyis sprul pa yis/ /phrogs pa'i blo la mthu yod min/ /dus kyis longs spyod ldan pa de'i/ /bu ni de la skyes gyur te/ /gang gi spyod tshul brtsis pa yis/ /pha ni gsod
88b3(mdo 'grel): par brjod gyur pa'o/ /dka' thub nags kyi ri dwags rnams/ /gsad phyir nags su sngon la zhen/ /de la thub ba'i dmod pa ni/ /bu yi dbyibs can 'di ltar gyur/ /skabs der chen po zhes bya ba/ /yangs pa can gyis tshogs kyi gtsos/ /a mra'i nags las chu shing
88b4(mdo 'grel): gis/ /sdong po las 'khrungs mdzes ma thob/ /de yi khyim du mdzes ma de/ /dal bu dal bus bskyed bsrings te/ /dga' ba che dang sbyin pa yi/ /sam pa yis kyang sems la gzung/ /gnyen gyi mdza' 
88b5(mdo 'grel): las de yi ming/ /a mra skyong ma zhes su btags/ /bu mo dman pa bzhin btang nas/ /lang tsho dag ni bzung bar gyur/ /de nas de gtong brtson pa'i pha/ /mdzes ma tshogs kyis nyer spyad bya/ /zhes pa'i dam tshig 'das gyur pa/ /tshogs bdag gis bzod ma gyur/ /de nas sdug bsngal gyis gdung ba'i/ /phal btud nas
88b6(mdo 'grel): des smras pa/ /bdag ni tshogs kyi spyad bya nyid/ /gal te 'on kyang dam tshig 'di/ /gcig gis steng du gzhan dag ni/ /mi 'jug rang gi gnas su sdod/ /nyi ma re la bdag gis zong/ /gar sha pa na brgya phrag lnga/ /zhag bdun nyid na khyim bdag ni/ /rnam par blta bya gzhan
88b7(mdo 'grel): du min/ /zhes pa'i dam tshig 'di 'das na/ /kun gyi spyad bya nyid gyur pa'o/ /zhes pa de yi dam tshig dag/ shes nas de yi pas smras pas/ /tshoD kyi rung zhes smras nas ni/ /gus pas nges pa brtan po byas/ /des na rin chen khang pa de/ /mchog gi rgyan gyis rab brgyan cing//
89a1(mdo 'grel): gser gyi bag ma khri stan la/ /'dzegs nas nyin par zla 'od byas/ /de nas 'dod ldan gang gang gis/ /zod byin de can nye bar song/ /de dang de yi gzi brid ni/ /de yi mthu yis rab tu nyams/ /blta ba nyid duAng mi nus na/ /reg bas 'khrug
89a2(mdo 'grel): pa slar yang ci/ /de ni tsan dan 'khri shing dag/ lag 'gros longs spyod bgags ba bzhin/ /de nas mdzes ma de yi ni/ /nu ma rgyas pa'i khung dag gis/ /rked 'khyog 'jigs pa rab ster ba/ /lang tshe yi yab lang tsho bsten/ /de yi gzugs ni rmad byung de//
89a3(mdo 'grel): 'dod chags rdzogs shing longs spyod bral/ /g.yang sa'i gser gyi 'khri shing gis/ /me tog bzhin du 'bras med gyur/ /ltad mo'i bsam pas rtsed mo'i slad/ /tha dad yul gzhan nas 'das ba'i/ /ri mo mkhan gyis skyong gi/ gzugs ni de yi khang
89a4(mdo 'grel): bar dris/ /mi dbang rnams ni ri mo la/ /bris shing bltas pas rim gyis des/ /gzugs can snying po'i gzugs dag ni/ /dga' ma'i bdag po bzhin du mthong/ /de mthong nyid na 'bral la ni/ /'dod chags yang dag langs par gyur/ /gang gis de ni thos
89a5(mdo 'grel): de la/ /der ni dge mtshan dag la dris/ /gang giS mdzes sdug bdud rtsi yis/ /yongs rgyas mig gi dga' bskyed pa/ /dga' mdag gi 'khri shing dpyid/ /grogs pos bdag 'di ni su/ /gang gi dpal mo lha mo'i yang/ /skal bzang las skyes drags
89a6(mdo 'grel): 'joms pa/ /sa bdag 'di yi mdza' gtsugs kyi/ /skal ldan bsod nams ldan pa su/ /de yis dris lan dal bu ni/ /ri mo mkhas pas de la smras/ /legs byas phun tshogs snying po 'di/ /sa bdag gzugs can snying po yin/ /rtul bod gzugs
89a7(mdo 'grel): ni srang gzhal ba/ /mtho ris 'dren pa'i lha su yis/ /'di la yid srubs dag kyang ni/ /re ba med pa nyid du dogs/ /de yis de skad brjod tshe de/ /mngon par 'dod pa gsar ba yis/ /'phral nyid mngon du phyogs byas te/ /sa sbyong la ni mig gtad do//
89b1(mdo 'grel): skabs der gzugs can snying po yis/ /mi med khang par dal bus ni/ /gtam gyi mjug tu sla? 'tshol/ /cung zad 'dzum dkar mchu yis smras/ /grogs po cung zad bdag gi ni/ /yid la gang zhig rgyu ba nyon/ /ma bsdams grogs po rang dbang du/ /smra ba ci yang bdud rtsi'i
89b2(mdo 'grel): ro/ /yangs pa can pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /thun mong du byas bud med mchog /mdzes ma byin pa chu shing 'dra/ /chu shing nad nas byung bar thos/ /gzi ldan snying sdug du bas te/ /de mthus de nyams de dag gi/ /de lta yang ni sun ma phyin/ /pad+ma ldan pa glang pos bzhin/ /bud
89b3(mdo 'grel): med rin chen skyes gnas las/ /ma skyes pa de thos nyid las/ /yid ni kun dgar bcas pa yis/ /dge mtshan mi zhan su mi byed/ /bdag gi mig dang lhan cig tu/ /yid ni des mngon par chags/ /de yi yon tan thos pa yi/ /skal ldan rna bar bdag dga' o/ /sa yi bdag
89b4(mdo 'grel): pos 'dir brjod tshe/ /sa 'tshos de la lan smras pa/ /rgyal po 'dod chags gter de ni/ /lag 'gro'i tshogs kyis yang dag bkag/ /shin tu chung ba'i 'khrugs gyur na/ /bzod dka' i g.yan sa don par 'gro/ /mi bzad lam 'di khyed la ni/ /mi bzad mngal can bdag gis
89b5(mdo 'grel): bstan/ /de ni blang du 'thob pa min/ /khyod kyang 'gro bar 'os pa min/ /gnyis ka the tshom thabs dang bral/ /'di la bdag ni ci zhig smra la/ /de yis de brjod mi bdag gis/ /'dod pa'i don ni ma btang ste/ /'dod pas ga rin rigs pa'i lugs/ /mkhas pa rnams
89b6(mdo 'grel): kyang mi dran no/ /de nas sa 'tshos lha cig de/ /grong khyer yangs pa can song nas/ /ri dwags mig can khang par ni/ /chas gzhan dag gis rab tu zhuss/ /ri mo mthor ba nyid kyis ni/ /mig dag yongs 'dris mi yi mgon/ /de yis mthong nas skad cig ni/ /skyengs pa dag
89b7(mdo 'grel): bcas sa la bltas/ /ngo tshas lan dang bral ba de/ /'dar bas rab tu bskyod pa yi/ /dril chung sgra ldan mi bdag la/ /legs par 'ongs sam 'dri ba bzhin/ /de ma ni rang lus ri mo la/ /skal bzang sngon nas khengs ldan pa'i/ /rgyal pos de yis mdzes sdug gi/ chu yi
90a1(mdo 'grel): rgyun byed snyim pas 'thungs/ /ngo tsha 'bebs bas mdzes ma dang/ /mngon par mtho bas sa yi bdag/ /smra ba bcad la sa 'tsho yis/ /'dzum bcas myur bar de la spas/ /lha 'di'i rnam pa ri mor bris/ /bsam gtan nges par brjod
90a2(mdo 'grel): pa las/ /khyod kyi gus pa'i khyad par gyis/ /mngon sum nyid du gsal bar gyur/ /khyod kyis 'di ni ri mo la/ /bris shing 'dis  kyang sems la khyod/ /khyed gnyis mdza' bo'i pho nyar ni/ /su zhig rab song ngas mi shes/ /zhes sogs gtam gyi sbyor ba
90a3(mdo 'grel): yis/ /rab dga' yongs rdzogs de dag gis/ /gang gang 'dod chags kyis bsten pa/ /de de nyams su myong bar gyur/ /dril sgras 'jig rten dogs pa skyes/ /rgyal po 'od ldan rab bsgribs pa/ /blta bar mi 'os de yis khyim/ /dben bar zhag
90a4(mdo 'grel): bdun gnas par gyur/ /'khri shing me tog ldan pa bzhin/ /dus su de las mngal thob des/ /ngo tshes dman zhing dal bu yis/ /dal spyod mdza' rig pa byas/ /khyim ni spyod la nye ba na/ /byung na bu ni yongs shes pa'i/ /yid ches slad du sor gdub
90a5(mdo 'grel): dag/ de la byin nas mi bdag song/ /mi bdag 'od ldan lus can mi rnams dag gis bkur pa gshegs gyur tshe/ /'bral la rab skyes 'bral ba'i rab rib kyis gtibs bzhin gyi pad+ma zum/ srod la chad dang 'jam pa'i rlung gis phril gyis mngon? pa'i
90a6(mdo 'grel): pad ldan bzhin/ /mchim dang bcas shugs ring rab ldan de ni dga' ba dman par gyur/ /lag pa'i stan gyis 'gram ba dang/ /brtag pa yid ni sa bdag dang/ /lus kyis gsar du nyams chung nyid/ /'dzin cing de ni res? zar dman/ /de nas dus kyis dag
90a7(mdo 'grel): ldan ma/ /de la bu ni bcas gyur te/ /pha yi gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs/ /legs pa'i blo bzhin rnam dul ba'o/ /de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /rim gyi bskyed par gyur ba'i tshe/ /'di ni gzugs can snying po yi/ /bu zhes 'jig rten rnams su
90b1(mdo 'grel): grags/ /gang tshe rigs la mi 'os pa'i/ /ngan smras mda' ni de des de/ /rtses grogs byis pa khro ba dang/ /ldan pa rnams kyi smras pa'i tshe/ /de nas rig pa bsgrub 'os bu/ /sor gdub dang bcas la yin ni/ /gnas su tshong pa'i tshogs chen la/ /de yi rab tu springs
90b2(mdo 'grel): par gyur/ /gzugs can snying po bdag gis kyang/ /dbyibs mtshungs bu ni yang dag thob/ /yongs 'khyud dga' ba'i mchi ma yis/ /de ni 'jigs med rnam par bsgrubs/ /a mra skyed ma'i spyod mdza' de/ /thos nas dge mtshan ldan pa yi/ /dge slong gis dris bcom
