90b3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das/ /rgyal bas de yi gtam rgyud gsungs/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu ni/ /rgyal bo'i btsun mo'i skyed tshal gyi/ /nags su skyed che la srung ba bsngon/ /phreng ba can zhes bya bar gyur/ /dang bas brlan pa'i rang sangs rgyas/ /nam zhig 'dod dgar mdun du
90b4(mdo 'grel): 'od/ /rgyal po la 'os tsu ta yi/ /me tog rnams kyis de la mchod/ /der ni skye gnas las ma skyes/ /mi bdag btsun mor bdag gyur nas/ /sems ni rab tu dang ldan des/ /de yi mdun du smon lam btab/ /bsod nams me tog 'bras bu'i longs spyod ldan//
90b5(mdo 'grel): de nyid mchog gis lus ldan a ma skyod/ /de skad rgya che'i spyod tshul thos gyur nas/ /dge slong de dag 'dun sar ya mtshan gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las//
90b6(mdo 'grel): a mra skyong ma'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// //mi rnams nor ni dngul chu'i thigs pa khu tshur dag gis nges par bsdams ba'i rnam par mthong/ /dbul dang mgon med rnams la ster zhing nye bar mkho bar gyur ba rab
90b7(mdo 'grel): tu rgyas pa'i dpal/ /bsod nams dga' tshel gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten bcom ldan sku gzugs rab gnas la sogs kyi/ /nor ldan 'di ni grags khas lhan cig mi bzad gnas su gang zhig gang gi rnam par mdzes/ /dpal ldan mnyan du yod par
91a1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /khyim bdag sbyin pa zhes pa byung/ /de yi bu ni rab byin dag /bsod nams phun tshogs 'byung gnas gyur/ /de ni byis pa nyid na rgyan/ /slong ba rnams la rtag tu ster/ /skye ba sngar goms bag chags ni/ /su yi gang gis zlog pa 'gyur/ /rtag
91a2(mdo 'grel): tu rgyan rnams ster ba las/ /pha yis mchog tu bzlog pa na/ /klung las gter ni yang dag blangs/ /de la rab tu bstan par gyur/ /pha ni mtho ris song ba'i tshe/ /kun tu gter ni mthong bdas/ /dbu la dang mgon med la byin pas/ /mgon med thas sbyin zhes par
91a3(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /dus kyi sbyin pa byas pa des/ /bu ldan bu ma mnyen gshin pas/ /bu yi khyim thab don gnyer zhing/ /mdzes pa 'bad pa chol par gyur/ /de nas bram ze sbrang rtsi mi/ /phung po zhes pa mkhas pa las/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab du ni/ /mdzes ma dga' zhig
91a4(mdo 'grel): slong du btang/ /de yis ma ga d+har phyin nas/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong so ste/ /khyim bdag nor ni chen po la/ /mdzes ma mchog ni bram ze bslangs/ /mgon med zas sbyin ces bya ba/ /mnyan yod na yod grags ldan de'i/ /bu ni legs par skyes pa la/ /mdzes
91a5(mdo 'grel): ma byin zhes de yis smras/ /de smras yul dang 'brel bdag/ /mchog tu nges kyi rigs la 'os/ /ded kyi rgyud kyi bu mo rnams/ /rin ni shin tu che bas ster/ /shing rta mchog ni brgya phrag dang/ /glang po rta dang 'bangs mo dang/ /gser spang rnams ni bzhi phrag brgya//
91a6(mdo 'grel): gal te nus na sbyin par gyis/ /de yis de skad brjod de la/ /bram ze 'dzum zhing lan smras pa/ /de dag mgon med zas sbyin gyi/ /khyim gyi 'babs? kyi yin yang chung/ /bram ze bu mo'i rin rnams ni/ /ma lus kha yis 'bangs pa'i tshe/ /khyim bdag gi ni gus
91a7(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /de ni zas gyi mgron du gnyer/ /der na de yis ma bsdams par/ /bza' ba bca' ba rnam thar thob/ /mtshan mo mthu'i nang kyis btag/ gdung ba chen po'i tshed bton/ /gang zhig srid pas 'du min thos/ /mtshan mo gnyid kyis de mi 'dzin//
91b1(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gzhan du bde sbad de/ /skye ba'i las ni ji ltar byed/ /mi gtsang bas 'jigs ? khang ba las/ /de ni phyi ?  'da' gyis dor/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis ma rabs rnams/ /g.yo ldan bltos pa med pa'i gnas/ /de yi ge tha'i las dag gis/ /snying rje gnyen pha sha'
91b2(mdo 'grel): ri'i bu/ /maung+gal bu dang 'phrogs nas ni/ /lam de nyid nas yang dag 'ongs/ /de dag gis ni dal dus de/ /smyig mo'i rtse mo grol ba yis/ /phyis shing lan brgyar sa yis kyang/ /brkus te de la chos bstan song/ /de dag mdun du de yang sems/ /rab tu nang bas
91b3(mdo 'grel): lus btang nas/ /rgyal chen bzhi yi ris kyi ni/ /lha yi nang du skyes par gyur/ /der ni rnam thos gras kyi bkos/ /mi yi 'jig rten khang pa dang/ /lha khang sgor ni mchod pa la/ /de yis lhag par nyer gnas byas/ /de nas 'brel ba nges pa ni/ /sbring yig gis shes
91b4(mdo 'grel): brjod pa bzhin/ /mgon med zas sbyin rang nyid ni/ /rin rnams khyer nas 'ongs par gyur/ /'brel ba'i khyim du phyin pa ma rgyal por 'os zas kyi tshogs/ /phun tshogs ri yi rnam pa can/ /ngo mtshar bskyed pa da yis mthong/ /khyim bdag la ni ya mtshan las/ /dri med
91b5(mdo 'grel): yid ldan de yis dris/ /bza' ba rab mang bshams pa 'di/ /rgyal po mgron du gnyer ram ci/ /de yis der smras sangs rgyas ni/ bcom ldan dge bdun dang bcas pa/ /bdag gis bdag gi dga' chan ni/ /rang gis bsod nams las mgron gnyer/ /zhes
91b6(mdo 'grel): pas sangs rgyas mtshan brjod pas/ /spu long gis ni rab brgyas te/ /'gral nyid zla ba'i khu ba yis/ /de ni yongs rtse? bkang bzhin gyur/ /don dam rnams rig min su zhig gi ming tsam la/ /gang yang skye bas bcings pa'i lhan skyes dngos po rab tu rgyas/ /rab
91b7(mdo 'grel): gsar sprin gyi sgra la dga' zhing mngon 'od dogs la ba yis/ /rma bya rol sgeg gar dang 'phyar ba'i spyod la reg par byed/ /'od zer rab gsar bzhin ras kyi/ /padmo las skyes des smras pa/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa su/ /dge 'dun zhes ni sa la brjod/ /de
92a1(mdo 'grel): yis 'di dris khyim bdag gis/ /'dzum dang bcas pas rab smras pa/ kye ma sa gsum dag gi ni/ /ston pa khyod kyis mi shes sam/ /'khor ba'i zhabs pas 'jigs nas skye bas/ /tshos pa'i skyabs gyur rgyu la bde/ /'jig rten ni su zhig
92a2(mdo 'grel): gis/ /mi shes pa de mchog tu bslus/ /skyabs kyi thabs ni mi shes par/ /gang gis na tshod zad par byas/ /gti mug gis deg skye ba ni/ /'bras med byas pa de yi ci/ /gtam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /shAkya'i rgyal ba'i rigs pas 'krungs/ /khyim
92a3(mdo 'grel): spangs bla med byang chub tu/ /yang dag rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ /de yis mchog tu rjes bzung bas/ /phyin nas rab tu byung gyur? ba/ /'dod chags bral ba'i dge slong gi/ /rdzogs la dge 'dun zhes su brjod/ /sangs rgyas gtsor byas dge 'dun 'di/ /bsod nams
92a4(mdo 'grel): zod gis rnyed gyur nas/ /rang gi dge ba tshol byed pa/ /bdag gis gus pas mgron du gnyer/ /de skad de yi tshig thos nas/ /mgon med zas sbyin de dran zhing/ /sangs rgyas la dmigs bsgom pa yis/ /mtshan mo gnyid du yang dag song/ /mtshan mo'i lhag
92a5(mdo 'grel): ma'i thun yin/ /'dod pas yang dag drangs pa bzhin/ /thor nges zhes shes grong khyer gyi/ /sgo nas de ni phyi rol song/ /sgo yi lha khang du phyin pas/ /de ni lha dang yang dag phrad/ /sbrang tsi phung po bstan pa yis/ /mchog gi lam ni thob par gyur/ /de nas de yis
92a6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan thob/ /sgom pas gdungs pas bdud rtsi bzhin/ /rab dga' dri bzang bde ba yis/ /nyams su myong ba dpe med gyur/ /lam mgron skom pas gus bcas par/ /ring nas grib bsil ljon pa bzhin/ /zhi zhing ngal bsos bsil ba de/ /thob cing yongs
92a7(mdo 'grel): su gdud pa bral/ /de yi yid ni dri ma dang/ /bral ba de mthong nyid kyis thob/ /nam mkha' stan dang phrad pa yis/ /sprin gyi tshogs dang bral ba bzhin/ /gang yang bsod nams dang tshul dang/ /bka' drin ldan pa'i mthud ni/ /rang gi drin gyis sems kyi ni/ /spyod tshul
92b1(mdo 'grel): 'gegs med 'gyur ba yin/ /des bsams kye ma bdag gi ni/ /gang yang rmongs pa 'di dang bya la/ /rnam 'gyur 'di ni rjes su bcad/ /rab tu zhi ba phun tshogs skyes/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag gis sngon/ /gang zhig mthong bar ma gyur bslus/ /sku ni skal ldan
92b2(mdo 'grel): min pa yis/ /mig gi spyod yul mi 'gyur ro/ /gzigs pa'i bcud kyi bdud rtsi yid 'ong rgyu che ri bong can ltar nyams su bad/ /spyad tshul snying rje dang mkhas? pa'i dbang gyur rab tu dang ba'i rang bzhin blo/ /'khor ba dag ni med par dgyes kyis yongs su 'dzin cing rab
92b3(mdo 'grel): tu de bar gnas/ /phul du byung ba 'di ni rdul bral rnams kyi chags pa nyid dang bral bar bgyid/ /ces bsams kun dga' ldan pas de/ /nye bar btung nas de bzhi ni/ /zhabs kyi pad+mar phyag 'tshal ba/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis bsgrubs/ /de ni 'ongs la bcom
92b4(mdo 'grel): ldan yang/ /rab dang dgyes pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /snying rje rdzogs pa'i pho nya yis/ /bzhin ras mdzes pas bka' stsal pa/ /de yi dbugs 'byin bskyed pa'i spyan/ /skye rdul dge slad bdud rtsi yi/ /chu bor rab 'bar ci yang ni/ /nges par de la rnam par spros//
92b5(mdo 'grel): da nas de la bcom ldan gyis/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams/ rab tu rtogs pa sgrub byed ba/ /legs ldan bde bstan pa mdzad/ /ston pa'i bka' las nyon mongs kyi/ /rgyud ni mdza' dag zhig pa des/ /rang gi skye ba brjod byas nas/ /de la phyag
92b6(mdo 'grel): 'tshal der gsol pa/ /bcom ldan bdag ni shin tu 'das/ /bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song/ /goms pa'i bag chags rnam par zhig/ 'khor ba mchog tu bdag mi dga' / /chen po rnams kyi gzigs pa ni/ mi dge bdag ring du byed/ /dge ba myur bar
92b7(mdo 'grel): rab tu ster/ /rigs pa'i spyod pa gsal bar byed/ /khyed ni bzhugs slad gus ba las/ /gtsug lag khang mchog bde 'os pa/ /yid 'ong rin chen snying po'i gnas/ /rang gi grong? du bdag bgyid do/ /der ni skal ldan bdag cag gi/ /mchod par rim gros brten 
93a1(mdo 'grel): pa nus bcom ldan rtag tu bzhugs pa yis/ /rjes su bzung ba dag tu mdzod/ /ces pa'i don gnyer de bzhin zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la gnang/ /gang phyir dge ba gus pa yis/ /don gnyer 'joms la bstan pa min/ /de nas
93a2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan la zhus nas/ /de yi bka' yis dge slong ni/ /shA ri'i bu dang lhan cig tu/ /de ni mnyan yod grong khyer song/ /der ni rgyal byed gzhon nu yis/ /gser gyi rin ni chen po la/ /nags tshal byin pa blangs nas des/ /gtsug lag khang gi thig rnams btab//
93a3(mdo 'grel): de nas mgon med zas spyin tshe/ /lha rnams dag gis grogs byas pas/ /mtho ris rnam pa'i gtsug lag khang/ /gus shing spro nas rab tu brtsigs/ /der ni rgyal byed gzhon nu yar/ /mchog tu bcom ldan la gus pa/ /grangs dang bsod nams bsgrub pa'i slad/ /sgro
93a4(mdo 'grel): yi khang ba byas par gyur/ /de nas rmad byung gtsug lag khang/ /de brtsams zhe sdang gis 'khrugs pa'i/ /mu stegs kyis mthod smod bcas shing/ /'gal bar brjod pas rtsod pa byas/ /de dag gis gtso mig dmar ni/ /sprul nags phyogs dang bcas pa bzhig
93a5(mdo 'grel): ngan mkhas dag gi phrag dog las/ /mdun sa dag ni 'jig par byas/ /de yis rtsod pa rgyal ba'i dang/ /gtsug lag khang gi tshogs bkag tshe/ /mgon med zas sbyin chig dag gis/ /shA ri'i bu ni yang dag 'ongs/ /de nas mig dmar dag gis mthu//
93a6(mdo 'grel): khyad 'phags bstan phyir de bos nas/ /mi 'khrul stobs kyis rab rgyas ba/ /sa ha ka ra'i ljon pa bstan/ /shA ri'i bu yi mthus bslas pa'i/ /rlung rtag chen po che ba yi/ /mu stegs byed kyi smro ba bzhin/ /rtsa na 'thon zhing du ma bur gyur/ /de nas mig
93a7(mdo 'grel): dmar gyis sprul pa'i/ /me tog rgyas pa'i padmo can/ /shA ri'i bu yis rnam sprul pa'i/ /glang pos 'dam rdzab lhag mar byas/ /mig dmar stobs kyis bzhag pa yi/ /ltos 'gros chen po mgo bdun pa/ /shA ri'i bu yi bya byung gi/ /gshog pa'i rtse mo'i
93b1(mdo 'grel): rlung gis 'phangs de nas des pa zhug ro langs pa/ /shA ri'i bu yis gur bus btab/ /sdags kyis brtson 'grus gyis bskul nas/ /mig dmar gsod du rab tu song/ /ro langs kyis bcom skrag pa la/ /nga rgyal rgyags pa'i rims zhi nas/ /de ni zhabs la gtugs
93b2(mdo 'grel): byas ? ni/ /shA ri'i bu la skyabs su song/ /bcom pa de yis mig dmar de/ /skyabs 'os dag la skyabs song nas/ /rab tu byung la 'dod chags bral/ /dag pa'i byang chub thob par gyur/ /mu stegs gzhan rnams yongs sdang dang/ /khro ba'i pha rol bsgal 'dod pas//
93b3(mdo 'grel): dge slong dag la gnod brtson zhing/ /de na las byed zol gyi gnas/ /de nas de dag shA ri'i bus/ /da yi spyan zur tsam nyid kyis/ /yid ni byams dang ldan par gyur/ /khams dang bsam pa bag la nyal/ /rang bzhin dag kyang dpyad nas des/ /chos ni stan pas de
93b4(mdo 'grel): dag rnams/ /bla med gnas skabs dag la bkod/ /de nas gtsug lag  khang de'i las/ /brtsams pa bgegs dang bral ba'i tshe/ /'dzum pa'i bzhin ldan shA ri'i bus/ /mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/ /gtsug lag khang gi thig btab pa'i/ /dus mtshungs nyid
93b5(mdo 'grel): du dga' ldan gyi/ /lta yi gnas su gser gyi ni/ /btsug lag khang chan yang dag grub/ /de dus gus pa nyid 'gyur gyi/ /rab tu dad pa yang dag skyes/ /rin chen gser mchog khang pa yis/ /gtsug lag khang ni de yis byas/ /de nas bcom ldan rgyal ba la//
93b6(mdo 'grel): gsol te lta dang lhan cig ni/ /lam du de yis nyer bsgrugs pa'i/ /rgyal po la 'os 'byor pas byon/ /de ni byon pa la dga' nas/ /srid gsum rab tu dang ba'i che/ /de la mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ /chu yi rgyun ni rab tu sbrangs/ /gang gi che na phyogs de ru/ /chu yi
93b7(mdo 'grel): rgyun ni ma bab pa/ /de tshe gzhan du bcom ldan gyi/ /gsung las rgyun dang ldan par bab/ /de mthong mkhar? nas dge slong gis/ /zhus shing bcom ldan 'das kyis slar/ /bka' stsal chu 'di rengs pa yis/ /rgyu ni rab tu mnyan par gyes/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas
94a1(mdo 'grel): rnams la 'dis/ /gnas 'di yi ni 'di nyid du/ /rab tu byin par gyur to zhes/ /chu rgyun 'di ni gzhan du ltung/ /sngon gyi yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rnam par gzigs la 'di nyid kyis/ /mchog gi kun dga' rab yi/ /sa phyogs 'di nyid
94a2(mdo 'grel): rab tu byin/ /rgyal gyi skye ba dag la yang/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phul/ /de nas ra g+hu'i skye ba la/ /rgyal ba thams cad skyob la phul/ /srid pas byin zhes gyur pa na/ /'khor ba 'jig la rab tu phul/ /chen po'i bdag tu gyur pa'i tshe/ /skyob pa
94a3(mdo 'grel): gser zhes bya la phul/ /A bA Da yi skye ba la/ /slar yang 'od srungs la 'di phul/ /da ltang la 'di nyid kyis/ /yul 'di dag ni rab tu byin/ /dus kyis nor bzang zhes pa 'di/ /byams pa la ni 'bul bar gyur/ /snying stobs bzod pa tshul khrims dang//
94a4(mdo 'grel): ldan phyir 'di yis gter rnams mthong/ /sngon yang khyim gyi bdag po 'di/ /gser sbyin zhes par gyur pa na/ /rang sangs rgyas ni mya ngan las/ /'das pa'i legs par bya ba byas/ /rin chen bum par de yi gdung/ /bcug nas smon lam btab pa las/ /da lta rin
94a5(mdo 'grel): chen mdzod 'os pa'i/ /gser gyi snod du 'di gyur to/ /dge slong de dag rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i snying po bzhin/ /ston pa'i gsung ni mngon par brjod pa 'di thos nas/ /byed pa rab gnas kyis bsgrubs bsod nams rgyas pa yi/ /me tog lhag par gnas pas
94a6(mdo 'grel): mchog tu dga' bar gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas ba'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod yang dag bsam gyi khri shing las rgyas byed kyi tshal yongs su gru zung bzhi yal 'dab ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //kye ma legs ldan rin thang
94a7(mdo 'grel): che ba'i chen po nyid/ /nor bu bzhin du yon tan bla ma nyid kyis 'thob/ /yon tan med par gang zhig lus kyis bla ma nyid/ /no las nags pa bzhin du de ni 'bras bu med/ /shA kya'i grong gi mi yin dbang po sngon/ /dpal ldan zas gcing dag pa'i bdud rtsi'i gter
94b1(mdo 'grel): chags bral ldan las bde gshegs nyid thob pa'i/ /sras ni dran nas 'dod dang bcas par gyur/ /de bsams bsod nams yon tan lha gnas shing/ /dbyangs can gnas dang 'tsho las skyes pa'i dpal/ /yid ni rab tu dang ba'i rtse dga' i gnas/ /bu yi bzhin
94b2(mdo 'grel): ras gang tshe bdag gis mthong/ /de ni lta bar sred pas 'dir byon zhes/ /bdag gis gang gang rgyal byed tshal du btang/ /de de mig mi 'dzums pas de lta zhing/ /de nyid du ni dud rtsa 'thung zhing 'dug/ /gang yang mdza' las bdag mtshungs 'char ka ni/ /de dgug
94b3(mdo 'grel): slad du bdag gis yang dag btang/ /sbring yig lag de lha rnams mngon dga' ba/ /de nyid du ni lta nyid bzhin du gyur/ /de yi khal bdag gis phrin gis tshig/ /springs pa gang de brjod pa ma yin nam/ /gang phyir thams cad des bar rang phan 'dod/ /gzhan gyis don
94b4(mdo 'grel): la bsil ba nyid 'dzin lo/ /chags med 'di ni yud tsam ngal bso mdzod/ /rtag tu bdud rtsis khengs pa'i rnam gzigs kyis/ /myur du bdag gis lus la chags gyur pa/ /brtse ba'i dbang gis gnyen gyi don 'di mdzod/ /ces pa 'di thos bdag dang phrad
94b5(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /skad cig kyang de byi ba shol ji ltar mdzad/ /de yi thugs ni yal 'dab mnyen pa la/ /rang bzhin mdza' gtsugs rna rgyan med dam ci/ /yid la re ba 'di yis sa yi bdag/ de blta'i slad bzhin mdun du song ba'i tshe/ /de yi drin gyis rab byung gsal
94b6(mdo 'grel): byas pa'i/ /dga' ba'i ro ldan 'char ka yang dag 'ongs/ /rab tu byung bas de dang mtshungs pa'i mthu/ /kun dags rnam par 'khyam pa de mthong nas/ /bstan pa'i spyod tshul nyams shing 'dod ldan pas/ /mi bdag kun tu rmongs sh+ng brgyal bar gyur/ /bsil ba'i
94b7(mdo 'grel): chus bran 'du shes? rnyed pa des/ /de la ci slang byin pa min zhes dris/ /lha cig khyod can nyon zhag tshogs kyis de/ /gus bcas byon par 'gyur zhes des kyang smras/ /de nas nyin zhag rnams ni rab 'das tshe/ /gzhon nu don kun grub pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /dge slong
95a1(mdo 'grel): tshogs kyi rjes 'breng lha rnams kyi/ /tshogs dang bcas pas mkha' la dal phus byon/ /mtho ris mdzes pa'i lag pad kyis gtor ba/ /mandar ba'i phreng rgyas mdzes pa de/ /mtho ris gam gA'i dbu ba rab gsal brtsegs/ /mdzes
95a2(mdo 'grel): shing rgod ba'i lha yi ri bo gzhin/ /sbyin gyi grogs rnams dkrigs pas 'byed cing 'khrul/ /dzam+bu na de'i dril chung sgra ldan ba'i/ /gzhal yas khang gis phyogs kyis gdong mdzes pa/ /gus pas ston pa'i bstod pa bsgrubs pa bzhin/ /bar med nyi ma'i 'od
95a3(mdo 'grel): gzer sgrib byed pa/ /rigs bzhin grub pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i lha/ /yongs rdzogs gdugs dkar gang dag chags pa yis/ /khyab pas nam mkha' yang dag rdzogs bar gyur/ /de nas 'jig rten kun la phan rdzogs pa/ /kun dbyibs kun gyi rang bzhin rnam
95a4(mdo 'grel): par snang/ /legs par byon pa de ni skad cig gis/ /mkha' dang phyogs dang sa las kun kyis mthong/ /skye bo'i mig gi rab dga' spungs pa dang/ /dge la dga' ba'i bsod nams tshad gyur pa/ /snang ba'i gter de mthong na 'jig rten rnams/ /shin tu rangs
95a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i dpa' rlobs glang byung byung/ /ngo mtshar mdzod gyur mdzes pa'i mthu ldan pa/ /'char kas legs par bshad pas rab shes nas/ /gzhon nu 'gro ba'i bla ma de la ni/ /sa bdag ring nas thal mo sbyang bas btub/ /de nus phabs te 'phags skye'i rjes 'breng
95a6(mdo 'grel): bcas brgyal po gus pas yang dag mchog gyur ba/ /phyogs cha gzi byin rgyas par mdzes pa yi/ /n+ya gror? yi rin chen sa gzhir byon/ /'jig rten gsum po bka' la legs gnas te/ /der ni rkang stegs ldan pa'i gser gyi bri/ /rin chen myu gu bkra ba'i
95a7(mdo 'grel): 'dab ldan la/ /lhun po la ni 'od ldan sus bzhin 'dzegs/ /yid kyi zla ba mis gi bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /yid la re bas don gnyer longs pa de/ /dga' bas mig mi 'dzum par bltas pa las/ /skad cig sa yi dbang pos lha nyid thog/ dga' ba'i ro las nang
95b1(mdo 'grel): du zhung pa bzhin/ /de ? rin chen mchog la gzugs brnyan chags/ /gzhon nu khad 'phags dgyes pa rgyas de la/ /mgrin ni mchi ma 'gags pa de yis smras/ /yongs tshim g.yo med bsal ba'i rang bzhin las/ /thams cad dge ba'i thad la dga' bar
95b2(mdo 'grel): byed/ /yongs su gdung byed 'phral ba'i nyer bstan 'di/ bdag cag rnams la khyod kyis ci phyir mdzad/ /mdza' dang rab dga' yon tan la gus pas/ /'khyud pa dang ni brtan par 'grogs pa dang/ /zhabs la phyag bgyi'i slad du mnyam nyid du/ /bdag gi blo 'di
95b3(mdo 'grel): 'phral la khyod can rgyug/ cung zad gang de bdag gis brjod pa 'di/ /bdag la byams dor khyod kyis gsan par bya/ /yon tan spangs pa 'am chags bral rim pa ni/ /mdza' bas rmongs pas brjod bya min pa nyid/ /nyi ma'i gzugs can ldan ba'i rin chen gyis//
95b4(mdo 'grel): legs spras lag ba'i 'od zer rab rgyas pa/ /gser gyi khang bzang 'di dag ci yi slad/ /btang nas khyod ni nags nang stong par 'khyam/ /na chung lag pas gser gyi bla ma btud cing/ /dri bzang chu yis mchog tu mngon bkrus pa/ /mya ngan thang las yongs su tsha
95b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i chu/ /rdul gyi rgyas pas gcig pu ji ltar 'khru/ /rin chen mdzes ba'i rna cha 'gram par 'phyang/ /rgyun rnams 'dor ba nges par ci zhig rigs/ /ci slad bag med khyod ni blo bur du/ /tsan dan zla ltar dkar bas dga' ma yin/ /mi bdag la 'os khri stan bla re che//
95b6(mdo 'grel): lha ltar khyad par dgar la cis mi gzims/ /dpal mos gsar 'khyud longs spyod 'os gyur pa/ /khyod kyi lus kyis stan ngan ji ltar bzod/ /mdzes 'dzum rlabs kyis gzugs brnyan gos 'os pa/ /lus 'di la ni chos gos ji ltar 'os/ /khyod kyi phyag ni
95b7(mdo 'grel): padmo'i rol gnas 'dir/ /da ltar ltung ? dga' ba ji ltar skye/ /khyod kyi mgron pa rgyab kyi gnas 'di dag/ /sred ldan mdzes ma'i lag pas bsdams 'os pa/ /longs spyod dpal mo'i rab? dga' nyams gyur cing/ /glo bur nyid du mdza' gtsugs nyams
96a1(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /me tog gzhu ldan nyams par byed pa'i gzugs/ /glang chen myos bum ltar mtho'i nu rgyas 'byor/ /lang tsho dga' ba'i rtses nye ba'i nags/ /ci slad khyod kyis mi bzad chags bral byas/ /zhes gsan tshul khrims gter gyis bka' 
96a2(mdo 'grel): stsal te/ /zla ba'i cha bzhin rol ba'i 'dzum dag gis/ /mi bdag sna tshogs rin chen 'od 'phros pa'i/ /rgyal po'i dpal ni mi snang mdzad pa bzhin/ /rgyal ba chu rgyun ltar g.yo 'tsho ba'i srog/ /gal te rga dang na bas mi 'joms na/ /sha dga' bdud rtsi'i chad lta'i
96a3(mdo 'grel): yul rnams la/ /rtag tu su zhig mngon bar 'dod mi bgyid/ /zhi ba'i bdud rtsi nyams myong brtan rnams kyi/ /nags nang stong pa'i sa gzhi gnod med yin/ /'byor pas rgyags shing rtse dga' 'khrugs rnams kyi/ /ba gam ldan pa mthar ni rnam pa ltung/ /gang
96a4(mdo 'grel): zhig gur gum dang bcas chus bkrus ba'i/ /mi bdag rtag tu chags dang bcas par 'gyur/ /yid ni rab tu dang ba'i chus bkrus pa'i/ /chog shes dang tshul dri ma bral bar gyur/ /snying rje rgyas pa rnams kyi lus mdzes pa/ /gzhan phan gyis yin can dan byug bsam min/ /rna ba thos pas yin gyi rna chus min/ /lag pa sbyin pas yin gyi gdu gus min/ /sa bdag gis sbyor lhag mar gyur pa'i rgyan/ /mu tig 'od chags dkar ba'i 'dzum dang bcas/ /rmongs pa dga' ba ma bcom 'di dag ni/ /dam pa rnams kyi spyad par
96a5(mdo 'grel): 'os pa min/ /chags pas gzir dang dag yis gdung gyur ba/ /nor gyi bsam gtan ldan pa'i rgyal po la/ /reg na bde ba'i sa'i mal na gnyid yod min/ /zhi ba rnams ni kun tu bde bar gzims/ /lag 'gro'i spyod tshul sprul shun mdzes pa yi/ /gos
96a6(mdo 'grel): bzang gis yin chos gos dag gis min/ /lhung bzed kyis ni zas dag gcang ba dang/ /yongs rdzogs bdud rtsi'i grogs po nyid du bskyed/ /gdugs kyi bzhin ni mchog tu mi gsal zhing/ /rlung gis yid ni rnam par g.yo/ /ha ri tsan dan gyis
96b1(mdo 'grel): rlan do shal gyis/ /mi bdag snying la bsil ba reg par byed/ /'byor ba 'bral ba'i nad kyi rjes su 'gro/ /rtse dga' ro thal mdzes ma skad cig mdza' / /gang gi lus la gnod pa rtag gnas de/ /su yi longs spyod skal bzang nye bar rigs/ /'phral du zil gnon longs
96b2(mdo 'grel): spyad nyer spyod ni/ /rgyun du glal bcas blun pa nyid bskyed cing/ /sren 'khrul rmongs dang brgyal ba rgyas pa dang/ /mi bzad chags dang bcas pa nyid du byed/ /gang tshe bde dpal zla tshes ri mo dang/ /lang tsho yang ni sngo dro'i me tog ste/ /lus ni las kyi rlabs kyi phreng ba
96b3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin/ /de tshe bdag ni rjes su chags dang bral/ /rda lab dang bcas dar dang rgyal mtshan tshogs/ /rta dang bcas pa'i glang zhon ran ba'i stabs/ /rang bzhin gyis g.yo rgyal po'i dpal 'byor gyis/ /longs spyod thams cad skad cig 'jig pa'i grogs/ /rgyal po'i thugs ni
96b4(mdo 'grel): rab dang mchog sgrub cing/ /dge ba'i slad du de de bka' stsal nas/ /zhi ba'i rlabs ldan bdud rtsi'i rgyun rgyas shing/ /de yi spyan gyis 'khor la rnam bar gzigs/ /shAkya'i rigs su 'khrungs pa'i mkhas pa ni/ /khri phrag bdun gyis chos ni rtogs byas shin/ /de la
96b5(mdo 'grel): stong phrag yang yongs rdzogs kyi/ /khyad par yang dag 'thob pa'i snod nyid mdzes/ /de nas de dag grangs mtshungs stong phrag tshogs/ /zas dkar la sogs rnams kyis dge ba thob/ /phre bo thas dang bdud rtsi zas sogs kyi/ /shin tu che ba'i sems ni dang ba thob//
96b6(mdo 'grel): gcig nyan thos byang chub ldan par gyur/ /nye tshe'i byang chub rdeg dang la la dag/ de bzhin yan dag bla med byang chub zhus/ /gzhan ni mkha' bzhin rab tu dang bar gyur/ /de nas gzhan gyis rgyun zhus 'bras bu thob/ /de bzhin gzhan gyis lan cig phyir 'od dang/ /phyir
96b7(mdo 'grel): mi 'od 'bras de yang gzhan gis te/ /nyon mongs rnam grol gzhan gyis dgra bcom thog 'du nas der ni lhas byin gcig bu zhig/ /mun pa'i tshogs kyis gtibs shing rab rmongs pa/ /sdig dmod mthul skye bo rnams kyi lugs/ /bden pa la bkod 'di ni sgyu 
97a1(mdo 'grel): zhes smras/ /mi yi bdag kyang mnyes gshin gyis chags zhing/ /sras ni dang las bzlog par dregs skyes pa/ /rgyal ba'i bka' las dge slong maung+gal bus/ /rdzu 'phrul chen pos rgyags dang bral ba byas/ /bcom ldan mthu ni rgyal pos
97a2(mdo 'grel): mthong gyur kyang/ /shin tu rmad byung skyes bu nyid mi sems/ /phul byung mdzad pa goms pas reg pa ni/ /nges par skye ba'i la mtshan rgyu ma yin/ /de nas nyi ma gzhan la lha dbang gis/ /rab bsgrubs gser gyi gzhal yas khang chen du/ /lhun po'i lcog
97a3(mdo 'grel): ltar gsal zhing mdzes pa yis/ /rin chen seng ge'i khril bcom ldan 'das/ /de nas der ni tshangs dang dbang po sogs/ /'od zer che ba'i lha rnams nyer gnas tshe/ /de yi gtsug tor rtse las 'phros pas phyogs/ /zla 'od phreng ba'i ral ba bzhin du mdzes//
97a4(mdo 'grel): lha rnams stug por babs shing zhugs pa yis/ /bar 'tshams med ba'i sa der rgyal pos ni/ /sgo bzhi rnams su lam nyid thob ma gyur/ /ku ber sogs smin ma g.yo ldan pas/ /der ni mngon par 'jug 'dod bzlog gyur ba/ /bzhin ni mdzes bral brjod pa
97a5(mdo 'grel): 'khrul gyur ba'i/ /sa bdag mchog tu gzi byin med bar gyur/ /rgyal ba'i bka' yis de dag rnams kyi btang/ /ci zhig ltar ste de mdun sa gzhi thob/ /zas gtsang? spyi bos de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /de yi mdun na rab dang sems kyis gnas/ /de nas
97a6(mdo 'grel): sten pas de la chos gyi gtam/ /'phags pa'i bden bzhi rab tu rtogs byed bstan/ /gang zhig shes pas de yi 'jig tshogs la/ /lta ba'i ri rtse nyi shu dag kyang bcom/ /de nas skye ba'i bya ba byas ba de/ /song nas zas dkar la smras rgyal srid bzung/ /des
97a7(mdo 'grel): smras bdag ni bcom ldan gyis gnang ba/ /bstan pa la dga' rgyal srid la min no/ /bre bo zas kyang rgyal srid la phyir phyogs/ /bdud rtsi zas kyang chags bral ldan gyur tshe/ /de nas zas gtsang gis gnang rgyal po yi/ /dpal 'byor de ni bzang ldan zhes pas
97b1(mdo 'grel): bzung/ /de nas rgyal pos longs spyod gtsang ma rnams/ /rab phul 'gro ba'i dbang gis rgyal ba mchod/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi gnas ni der rab phul/ /zas gtsang yid la re ba dag par gyur/ /de nas bra bzas kyi bu gzhon gnyis/ /ma yis bskul bas de las gcig rab byung/ /rgyal po'i
97b2(mdo 'grel): bka' yis bkag pas gzhan ma ni/ /chen po zhes pa khyim na gnas par gyur/ /de nas chags bral rgyal po bzang ldan gyi/ /yid ni nags tshal mngon par 'dod par gyur/ /rnam rig ldan par bzhir zhugs pa'i yid/ /gsar pa'i dpal 'byor gyis kyang khags pa
97b3(mdo 'grel): min/ /de nas de yis rgyal srid dbang bskur ni/ /'thob 'dod sems ldan lhas byin yang dag 'os/ /smras pa bdag ni rab tu 'byung ba'i dus/ /rim pas 'ongs la khyod ni ci zhig brjod/ /dpen pa'i tshul 'chos 'dzin pa'i lhas byin gyis/ /mdun sar legs bsdams
97b4(mdo 'grel): de la slar smras pa/ /rgyal po bdag la rgyal srid 'dod pa med/ /rab tu byung bas khyod dang bdag mtshungs gyur/ /zhes pas gya gyu dul rdzun ldan pa de'i/ /'khyog tshig brjod pa rgyal pos thos gyur nas// shAkya'i tshogs 'di khyod kyi brtag pa yi/ /dbang du gyur ces 'dzum
97b5(mdo 'grel): zhing rab tu smras/ /de nas lhas byin 'gyod pas nye bar gdungs/ /longs spyod rjes su chags las 'di ltar bsams/ /ci slad bdag gis phyin ci log 'di brjod/ /yang na rab byung yang na rgyal srid bsten/ /bzang ldan sogs bcas shAkya gzhon nu rnams/ /rang gi rgyal
97b6(mdo 'grel): srid btang nas bgrod pa yis/ /'phags pa'i spyod tshul la dgyes zas gtsang gi/ mdun bdar glang bo shing rta nges par byung/ /de nas thams cad 'gro tshe lhas byin gyi/ /cod pan la chags pad+ma rA ga che/ /mkha' mchog 'od kyi 'dab sar ldan byed pa/ /khrag gis
97b7(mdo 'grel): byugs bzhin 'dod ldan khra? yis khyer/ /de nas mtshan mkhan gyis de'i khrag gi rtags/ /sems na skyon bcas mtshan ma ngan gyur pa/ /drag po'i dmyal bar 'gro ba de mthong nas/ /mtshan ma gzhan dag slar yang brjod pa nyid/ /ko ka bur bu nyam thag ma he dang/ /'tshe
98a1(mdo 'grel): sogs ming dang chang gis rab myos pa/ /ded ni rnam pa de lta'i bgegs gyur pa/ /dan pa'i mtshan nyid rnams ni yang dag bshad/ /de nas rab dags sa bdag bzang ldan yang/ /lhas byin la sogs de rnams bcas pa nyid/ /rab byung chos gos
98a2(mdo 'grel): lhung bzed ldan gyur pas/ /sa gzhi chags bral rang bzhin byas pa bzhin/ /rgyal po dang ni de bzhin rgyal sras dag/ do shal dpung rgyan rna rgyan rab spangs pa/ /de dag rnams kyi skra lhung nye bar 'khor/ /'dreg mkhan chags bral mig chu ldan par gyur/ /de ni rmongS
98a3(mdo 'grel): shing dman yang rgyal ba'i bkas/ /rab tu byung nas mchod 'os mchog tu gyur/ /sems ni mchog tu rab tu dad ba'i rgyu/ /mkhas pa nyid min rigs ldan min nam snyam/ /de nas phyag la mi bdag bzang ldan gyis/ /'dreg mkhan de yang 'khor der 'khod shes nas//
98a4(mdo 'grel): sa bdag gyur nas dman pa 'di yi ni/ /rkang la ji ltar 'dud ces g.yo med gyur/ /rnam par rtog ldan khengs dad ma bral ba/ /de la bcom ldan 'jum zhing bka' stsal pa/ /rmongs pas cher bsdams rigs las byung ba yi/ /mngon par khengs pa rab tu byung nas
98a5(mdo 'grel): thong/ /zhes thos rgyal po'i sras bcas rgyal po yis/ /phyag 'tshal tshe nas gzhi rab tu g.yos/ /bcom ldan gsung gis de yi rkang pa la/ /lhas byin tshig rtsub brjod cing phyag mi byed/ /de nas sa g.yos ya mtshan yid can gyi/ /dge slong tshogs kyis dris
98a6(mdo 'grel): shing ston pa yis/ /bka' stsal rgyal pos skye ba gzhan la yang/ /'dreg mkhan 'di la nges par phyag 'tshal byas/ /ka shi'i grong du dbul po gzhon nu yis/ /smad 'tshong bzang mo zhes ba mngon mthong gyur/ /mdzes pas de tshe de yi g.yog rnams byas//
98a7(mdo 'grel): gang phyir chags bas rgud kun nye bar ston/ /de yis btang nas me tog btu ba'i slad/ /yang yang lhag par don gnyer bung ba bzhin/ /de dang 'grogs ba'i lus med re ba las/ /nags nang rnams su de yis dal zhing 'khyams/ /skabs der sdan la chags
98b1(mdo 'grel): pas rab ngal zhing/ /nags nang byin par gyur pas yi dbang/ /lus ni 'khri shing gis bsgribs tshangs sbyin gyis/ /de ni rab mthong de yi glu dag thos/ /me tog gsar ba gsar ba 'dod pas sbrang rtsi byed/ /ci ste de ltar gdud bas khyod 'joms myur du song/ /bzhin ras me tog
98b2(mdo 'grel): rnam rgyas chu skyes ldan pa ro?/ /gang phyir nyin mo'i mjug tu zlum par 'gyur ba yin/ /mi bdag gis ni de yi glu skad thos/ /'dzum zer do shal mdzes pa la reg cing/ /des smras nyi 'od drag pos gdungs pa la/ /grogs po glu yi nyams dgar? sbyor ba ci/ /des kyang smras pa
98b3(mdo 'grel): sa bdag nges par ni/ /nyi ma mi gdung 'dod ba mchog tu gdung/ /'jig rten na ni rang las sdug bsngal 'dzin/ /so ka'i mya dam thad ni sreg byed min/ /don ldan tshig 'di'i yon tan phul ba yis/ /de ni sa yi bdag po'i mdza' bor gyur/ /legs bshad yang dag brjod pas
98b4(mdo 'grel): reg pa ni/ /su zhig dag gi bsnyen bkur gnas mi 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal bu mi med ngal gyur ba/ /de yi bsil ba'i rim gros gdung ba bral/ /de nas byas shes de yis dga' bas de/ /blangs nas lhan cig rgyal po'i pho brang song/ /de la 'di yis srog rab byed ces nas/ /lhag
98b5(mdo 'grel): par tshim pas sems kyi spyod tshul rdzogs/ /rgyal srid phyed sbyin mngon phyogs de gnas te/ /sems rjes zhugs la sbyin min ci zhig yod de/ /de ni rgyal srid byed sbyin brtson ba'i tshe/ /mdzes pas mtshan mo bsam pa bdag la ni/ /bzang po med na rgyal srid bde bas ci/ /der
98b6(mdo 'grel): mdza' i bdud rtsis dbang bskur skal ldan yin/ /rgyal srid las kyang phyed la bdag mi sred/ /dpal ni chud yang nyams pa med na mdzes/ /don cig ldan las rtog tu 'gal bar brjod/ /gnyi ga longs spyod rtsod pa gzugs can nyid/ /bde slad mi bdag gsang nas bkun
98b7(mdo 'grel): pa na/ /rgyal srid mdza' dag gis ni bdag rdzogs 'gyur/ /zhes pa skad cig rnam bsams 'gyod pas gdungs/ /drag po'i shugs gtad de yis slar bsam pa/ /bdag gis ci bsams mchog tu smad 'os 'di/ /des par rno ba'i rab byed 'di lta ci/ /las don brtag
99a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i drims rab bsgos pa/ /kye ma rang sems la yang ngo re tshe/ /rgyal srid shis gyur bde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun rmongs ma cig dpal 'byor bzod par mdzod/ /gang dag nyams su ma myong bsam nyid na/ /dang po blo yi rang bzhin 'di ltar gyur/ /kye
99a2(mdo 'grel): ma dpal dang dug shing bsnams tsam gyis/ /skyes bu rnams ni rnam par nyams par byed/ /'khrul pa skyed byed brgyal ba nyid du byed/ /rnam par ltung byed mun pa rgyas par byed/ /yun ring 'di bsams rang nyid byang chub la/ /chags bral de yi sems skyes snga dro ni//
99a3(mdo 'grel): mi yi bdag pos mngon par gsol btab kyang/ /sred ba dang bral rgyal srid bzung ma gyur/ /dus kyis rang sangs rgyas nyid thob pa ?/ /rdzu 'phrul che ldan ma bdag gis mthong nas/ /mgo phreng de yi zhabs bad la 'phos pas/ /sems ni dang bar 'os pa 'di dag
99a4(mdo 'grel): smras/ /gang yang dam pa'i las kyi rnam smin skyes/ /rab zhis dbang bskur dben de phyag byar 'os/ /gang gi mthu las chags ba bral rnams kyis/ /chu gter ska rags ldan pa gtang bar 'os/ /zhes pa de don gyis bskyed rgyal pos brjod/ /thos nas de don don du gnyer
99a5(mdo 'grel): nas bzung/ /'dreg mkhan de ni zhi ba'i gnas thob nas/ /de nyid sman pa gang gi skyong ba lo/ /mchog gi las kyi sbyor bas rab byung las/ /dam pa'i dngos po mchod 'os thob la'ang/ /rgyal pos rab btud phyag 'tshal de yi tsho/ /rnam 'gyur drug ldan sa yang g.yos
99a6(mdo 'grel): par gyur/ /rgyal po rnam 'dud sgrub pa de ni bzang byin dag dang tshangs pas byin/ /gang yang nye ba 'khor de dge ldan 'dreg mkhan gam gA skyod ba la/ /zhes ba'i ngo mtshar bcom ldan gyis gsungs dge slong de dag rnams kyis thos/ /sams ni rab dang kho na legS
99a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i lam la rgyu nyid yin par sems/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /yab dang sras mjal ba'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu gsum ba'o// //gang zhig sems can don
99b1(mdo 'grel): rnams dag gi bu dang chung ma la sogs mchog tu ni/ /phangs pa'ang btang nas dman pa'i pho nyas bzhin ni log bar gyur ba med pa nyid/ /yid bzhin rin chen las lhag mdzes shing 'jig rten kun gyis smad par mi 'os pa/ /skyes bu'i rin chen gzhan pa sngon med mthu
99b2(mdo 'grel): ldan su zhig de rnams phyag bgyir 'os/ /shAkya'i grong khyer dag tu sngon/ /lhas byin gtam gyi mjug thogs su/ /dge slong gis dris bcom ldan 'das/ /rgyal bas sngon gyi spyod mdza' gsungs/ /dpal 'byor yid gcugs gnas gyur ba/ /sna tshogs zhes pa'i grong
99b3(mdo 'grel): khyer byung/ /kun la phan pa'i nus pa can/ /legs byas skye ba'i sa gzhi bzhin/ /der ni ma? bdag spyod tshul bkra/ gogs man mun ba'itshe zer na/ /mig gi kun dga' bdud rtsi'i gzugs/ /kun tu rgyal ba zhes ba byung/ /de yi bu ni gtong phod can/ /thams cad sgrol zhes
99b4(mdo 'grel): bya bar gyur/ /gang gi sngon med btong ba yis/ /dpag bsam shing gi grags pa phrogs/ /phrag dog spongs nas dus mnyam du/ /mkhas pa yis ni rab brgyan ba/ /bden pa gang gis tshig dang ni/ /sbyin pas dpal dang thos bas blo/ /gang gi grags pa ke ta ka'i/ /nang gi
99b5(mdo 'grel): 'dab ltar dri med pa/ /phyogs kyi na chung rna rgyan du/ /gyur ba de lta'ang rnam par mdzas?/ /nam zhig de yis slong ba la/ /shing rta rgyal srid rnam par rgyal/ /'od kyis yid la re ba 'phrog/ rin chen mchog gis brgyan ba byin/ /shing rta mchog de byin pa la/ /skye bo mdza' dag
99b6(mdo 'grel): ya mtshan gyis/ /snying ni kun tu non gyur cing/ /bsam pas kyang ngo mi yi dbang/ /de nas sa bdag dga' bzhin/ /yid la re ba bsam pas non/ /mi dga' ba ni nyer bsags pas/ /blon po che rnams bos te smras/ /shing rta chen po'i sde dang ni/ /gang gi mthu yis rab bsgrubS
99b7(mdo 'grel): ba/ /dgra 'joms rgyal bar byed pa yi/ /shing rta de ni gzhon nus byin/ /gnyis la bdag gi dpal 'byor ni/ /g.yo med gyur cing bde bar gnas/ /shing rta rtul phang lam de dang/ /glang ba rgyal po'i gter la'o/ /de skad rgyal bo'i tshig thos nas/ /blon po rnams
100a1(mdo 'grel): kyis der smras pa/ /mnyes gshin las ni bag med pa/ /'di ni rgyal po khyod kyi skyon/ chos ni su yid dga' ba min/ /sbyin pa su'i bkur bya min/ /'on kyang rtsa ba nyams pa yi/ /shing las 'bras bu don gnyer ldog/ /gnyis skyes de yis shing rta yang
100a2(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyi yul du brtsongs bar gyur/ /zhes smras sgon? po thams cad ni/ /zug rdus thug pa bzhin du gyur/ /de nas dge ba'i rnam smin bzhin/ /snying la kun dga' ster byed ba/ /dus kyi myos byed dga' ba yi/ /dbyid ni yang dag byung gyur cing/ /dpyid ni don gnyer bung ba
100a3(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /rang nyid kyis bzung bsten 'os ba'i/ /me tog tshal gyis 'jig rten ni/ /grags pas bzhin du dkar ba dang/ /'gro ba sjon? pa mya ngan med/ /'jig rten grib bsil pan bar brtson/ /me tog gzhon nus rab brgyas pa/ /dbyid kyis bsgrubs par brtsams
100a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe/ /rgyal sras slong ba'i dpag bsam shing/ /rgyal srid 'phel byed glang po la/ /zhon nas me tog rgyas pa yis/ /ljon pa gzigs su nags su gshegs/ /rgyal phran gzhan gyis btang ba yi/ /bramzes lam du bgrod de la/ /mngon phyogs shis pa brjod
100a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe/ /mngon du btang nas rab smras pa/ /legs pa khyod ni 'jig rten na/ g.yo ba'i yid bzhin nor bus sgrogs/ gang dang phrad bas slong ba rnams/ /dpal gyis mchog tu 'byung bar gyur/ /phul bzhin khyad par grags ba'i/ /gnyis nyid bzang po'i skye ba la//
100a6(mdo 'grel): sbyin pas lag bdun 'jig rten na/ /khyod rang mtho bstan glang 'di'o/ /legs byas rgya che'i glang po 'di/ /bdag cag? la ni gnang bar mdzod/ /khyod las gzhan gyi gtong yod kyis/ /'di ni sbyin par mi nus so/ /de yis de bslangs spro ldan des/ /srog ldan
100a7(mdo 'grel): yang dag rgyal srid bzhin/ /dud par rgyal srid rnga yab bcas/ /gnyis 'thung de dag rnams la byin/ /byang chub bco bo'i smon lam gyis/ /rin chen mang ldan glang po'i dbang/ /byin nas dag pa'i blo ldan de/ /kun tu dga' ba rgyas par gyur/ /rgyal pa'i glang
100b1(mdo 'grel): po byin pa yi/ /grags pa mi bdag gis thos nas/ /rgyal po'i dpal 'byor bsrung ba yi/ /thabs dang bral ba nyid du bsams/ /de nas sa bdag rgyal srid ni/ /nyams pas 'jigs shing khros pa yis/ /res par bskrad nas gzhon nu de/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni chas gyur te//
100b2(mdo 'grel): btsun mo ma dris lhan cig des/ /gzhon nu dri ldan zhes pa dang/ /de bzhin kriSh+Na zhes pa yi/ /bu mo khyer nas nags su song/ /slong ba rnams la nags su yang/ /bzhon pa la sogs lhag ma byin/ /gang phyir chen po'i snying stobs ci/ /phun sum tshogs sam chung kyang snyoms//
100b3(mdo 'grel): nam zhig ma dri me tog dang/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i slad/ /song tsho bram zas su zhig gis/ /rgyal po'i sras la mngon phyogs smras/ /g.yog 'khor med pa bdag la ni/ /bu sring spyad po 'di dag blang/ /gang phyir snying stobs chen po khyod/ /thams cad sbyin bar rab tu grags//
100b4(mdo 'grel): 'di thos 'phral lo ma dpyad par/ /mchog tu sdug pa'i bu srid dag/ de yis de la byin nas ni/ /de bral mya ngan bzod par byas/ /nor dang bu dang chud ma sogs/ /'jig rten pa yi mchog tu phangs/ /brtse ldan gtong pod can rnams la/ /sbyin pa las gzhan phangs pa med//
100b5(mdo 'grel): de nas bu la mnyes gshin ba'i/ /ma dri 'ongs bas bu srid dag/ ma mthong shin tu brgyal nas ni/ /khyo yi mdun du 'gyel bar gyur/ /mya ngan me ni 'bar ba yis/ khyab cing tshe de 'don pa de/ /'du shes rnyed pas bu srid dag/ byin par gyur ba'i mdza' thos nas/ /khyod la mdza' 
100b6(mdo 'grel): bas rjes zhugs te/ khul byams pa'i sdug bsngal mi/ /bzod dka' de yi sems la ni/ /khong du rab tu 'bar bar gyur/ /skabs der lha yi dbang po ni/ /bram ze'i gzugs su mngon par 'ongs/ /rgyal po'i sras la btsun mo ni/ /sdug ma 'bangs ma'i don du bslangs/ /de yis
100b7(mdo 'grel): bslangs pa'i 'phral ? de/ /btsun mo dang bral mya ngan dag blo yis bzod byas snying stobs kyi/ /chu gter de yis de la byin/ /'bral la byin pas rab 'phrugs shing/ /ri dags po bzhin rnams skrag pa'i 'bu tshan mo la des byang chub kyi/ /bag chags nang du 'jog cing 
101a1(mdo 'grel): smras pa dge ma gang dag yin sten cig /mya ngan bya bar mi 'os so/ /mdza' ba 'di ni rmi lam 'dra/ /snying sdug 'grogs ba bden pa med/ /gnyis skyes 'di la gus pa yis/ /khyod blo chos la dga' bar gyis/ /g.yo ba'i 'jig rten bgrod pa la/ /dam
101a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos ni brtan pa'i grogs/ /rang gi skye bos legs pa kun mthong ba nyen rnams nyams su myong bar gyur/ /skad cig yongs su gyur bas dri ma can 'gyur grogs kyi phreng ba mgrin par bkod/ /lang tsho dang ni srog dag chung ma bu yis rtag tu zad ba nyid gyur cing/ /chos las
101a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan pa'i thob pa gang yang yongs su brtan ba 'dris ma thog/ ces smras btsun mo la chags ba/ /yongs btang de yi bzhin bad kyis/ /mdzes dang sems kyi brtan pa yi/ /sbyod tshul dag ni de yis bzung/ /bral ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs ba'i/ /ma dri mthong nas
101a4(mdo 'grel): snying rjes 'khrugs/ /bde sogs bdag pos rang gi gzugs/ /yang dag bzung nas de la smras/ /bu mo mi dga' ma byed cig/ da ni skabs gsum dbang po'i lta/ /'di yis slong ba rnams la khyod/ /ster 'gyur de slad bdag gis bslangs/ /dbang ? khyod 'di nyid la
101a5(mdo 'grel): khyod /bdag gis gtams bar byas te btang/ /gzhan la 'di yis khyod mi ster/ /ji ltar gzhan gyi nor ster 'gyur/ /khyod ni bu srid gnyis po dang/ /nges par phreng ba bdag gis bya/ /zhes smras mig stong ldan ba ni/ /'phral la nyid du mi snang gyur/ /de nas
101a6(mdo 'grel): bram zhes bu che dag/ khyer nas nor ni 'dod pa yis/ /thams cad bshes kyi grong song nas/ /chags pa las ni 'tshod? bar brtson/ /rgyal po'i sras kyi bu sring dag/ thams cad bshes kyi yongs shes nas/ /mig ni mchims 'gags pa yis/ /nor ni chen po
101a7(mdo 'grel): dag gis bslus/ /dus kyis sa bdag thams cad bshes/ /mtho ris gshegs tshe grong khyer ba/ /blon po'i tshogs kyis gsol btab nas/ /thams cad sgrol ? rgyal srid bston/ /mchog tu sbyin pa la zhen ba/ /rdu ba bral de yi rgyal srid ni/ /phun tshogs snying
101b1(mdo 'grel): stobs kyis rgyas bas/ /rtsa yang slong ba bor ma gyur/ /nor des 'byor tshogs sdig bcan/ /bram ze dzdza? ? de? med/ /bdag gi rang mthus phun tshogs zhes/ /skye bo dag la mngon par smra/ /thams cad sgrol de da nyid de/ /gnyis skyes de yang lhas byin no/ /dge slong rnams la
101b2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan gyis/ /'di gsungs sbyin pa bstan ba mjid?/ /sbyin pa 'jig rten pha rol mi rnams gnyen/ /g.yangs rgyar ni kun tu ltung ba'i rten/ /'jigs rung mun par yun ring rab tu gsal/ /bzod dka' i sdug bsngal dus su dbugs 'byin no/ /zhes ba dge ba'i dbang pos
101b3(mdo 'grel): byas ba'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs ba brjod ba dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las thams cad sgrol gyi rtogs pa brjod ba'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu bzhi ba'o// //mdza' dag 'jig rten snang ba spro slad nyi ma 'od gzer 'gyed/ /bdud rtsi'i chang mchog dbab slad
101b4(mdo 'grel): zla bzlogs pa nyid du 'phro/ /sems can bsgral ba'i slad du dge ba'i zab stegs chen po ni/ /kha cig 'di snyed 'bro bar bsngags par 'os ba'i skye ba 'dzin /shAkya'i grong khyed dag tu sngon/ /rgyal po dag la ldan zas gtsang byung/ /grags pa ri bong can bskyed bo/ /bdud rtsi'i
101b5(mdo 'grel): chu gter gzhan pa bzhin/ /ngo bos mi srun la chags ba/ /ngo mtshar byor pa su zhig gis/ /yon tan ldan ba'i tshogs la gtang/ /dam pa'i phyogs la ltung bar byas/ /da lta'ang ma lus phyogs dang dogs/ /gnas su chags shing dben ldan pa/ /gang gi grags pa rnam dag pas /thub
101b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i brtul zhugs blangs pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas ma du bdag gyur cig ces ba'i smon lam sngon btab pa/ /dri med mdzes par mi yul 'ongs/ /bi shwa karma'i bu mo la?/ /skyes bu dam ba'i grags pa bzhin/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul che zhes pa/ /de yi yid 'od mchog tu gyur zla ba'i
101b7(mdo 'grel): ku mud ldan pa bzhin/ /de yis rmi lam dgu nang na/ /glang po dkar dang mkha' la 'gro/ /'i? bo 'jog dang skye bo ni/ /chen pos rab tu 'dud pa mthong/ /skabs der byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rang nyid 'jig rten la brtse bas/ /dgal ldan lha yi gnas dag las/ /de yi lhums su
102a1(mdo 'grel): yang dag byon/ /'jig rten dga' byed byang chub sems/ /de yis lhams su bzung ba ni/ /'o mtsho'i rlabs kyis zla ba bzhin/ /dkar ba'i 'od dang ldan par gyur/ /bu ram shing skyes rgyal bo'i rgyud/ /de ni lhums na gnas pa de/ /gter dang ldan pa'i sa bzhi
102a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /dge ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshon gyur/ /de yi sred pa byung gyur ba/ /sbyin ba'i bsod nams rang bzhin skyes/ /sa ha ka ra'i dri bzang ni/ /sol ba la yang bslu ba min/ /de nas dus kyis yang dag rdzogs/ /lum bi ni yi nags gnas ba'i/ /lha mo de la sras bltams
102a3(mdo 'grel): te/ /di ti las ni nyin byed bzhin/ /ma yi mngal gyi dri ma yis/ /ma reg de yis dku brtol byon/ /de nas de yang rang bzhin gyis/ /rdul bral lus ni rnal gnas gyur/ /phyir byung nyid na brgya byin gyis/ /stobs shes 'dod nas skad cig ni/ /rdo rje snying bo'i sku de bzung/ /de
102a4(mdo 'grel): ni nus med nyid du gyur/ /bltams pa tsam gyis khye'u de/ /rang gis gom pa bdun phyin nas/ /yi ge rab gsal tshig gis ni/ /phyogs su rnam par gzigs shing smras/ /'di ni bdag gi myang 'das shar/ 'jig rten blo gros rjes mthun lho/ /'di yang skye ba'i mdza' dang
102a5(mdo 'grel): nub/ /'di ni 'khor ba dag las byang/ /de skad de yis brjod pa na/ /sa ni kun tu 'dar gyur te/ /'gro ba'i bla ma mi bzod stobs/ /de gzung bar ni mi nus bzhin/ /mkha' yi chu rgyun gyis bkrus pa/ /de yi grags pa dka' ba'i gdugs/ /snying stobs 'dzum ba'i rnga yab
102a6(mdo 'grel): bcas/ /der ni lha rnams dag gis bzung/ /skabs der nag po zhes pa yi/ /thub pa kiSh+Ti de yi rir/ /gnas la tsha bo mi sbyin gyis/ /'od zer mthong nas rab tu dris/ /phug dang khang bar bcas pa'i ri/ /gang gis mun pas dbul byed ba/ /nyi ma brgya yi snang ba bzhin/
102a7(mdo 'grel): snang ba mthong ba gang las lags/ /ya mtshan las des de skad brjod/ /lha yi sbyar ldan des smras pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' i skye ba la/ /bsod nams snang ba 'di dag skyes/ /mnyes gshin mi ring nyid na de/ /dge ba'i slad du'u cag blta/ /zhes brjod thub pa kun dga' 
102b1(mdo 'grel): zhing/ ngal bsos bde ba nyid du 'gyur/ /sras bltams don kun mchog tu ni/ /grub ba zas gtsang gis mthong nas/ /'di ni don kun grub pa zhes/ /de yi mtshan yang btags bar gyur/ /gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel zhes pa/ shAkya'i grong khyer dag na gnas/ /gang la btud pas shAkya yi/
102b2(mdo 'grel): byis? pa nyer 'tshe med par 'gyur/ /lugs des yab kyi phyag 'tshal ba'i/ /slad du btang tshe gsang ba pa/ /de yis byang chub sems dpa' de/ /mthong nas de yi zhabs la btugs/ /de nas sa bdag dgyes pa yis/ /de ni ? du blangs byas nas/ /de yi lus la mtshan rnams ni/ /mtshan
102b3(mdo 'grel): ma ban dag gis rab tu bltas/ /de nas mtshan shes ya mtshan ldan/ /kun gyis mi bdag la smras ba/ /lha cig gzhon nu mchog 'di ni/ /mtshan rnams dag gis nye bar mtshon/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag rnams kyis ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba brgya byin bdag/ thams cad dal bso'i skal
102b4(mdo 'grel): ldan nam/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs par gyur/ /'di yi rab gnyis rab tu mdzes/ /dmar zhing pad+ma lta bur mnyen/ /sor mo'i 'dab ring 'khor lo yis/ /mtshan cing legs par rab tu gnas/ /mthong zhing ngang ba'i rgyal po bzhin/ /sor mo'i yal 'dab dra bar ldan/ /dpal
102b5(mdo 'grel): ldan e de'i byin bzung/ /pus mo'i bar bu phyag gis brgyan/ /gsang ba sbubs bcas glang po bzhin/ /n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab/ /g.yas su 'khyil pa'i spu yis mtshan/ /rgya khyon dag dang mtshungs bar mthong/ /rdul dang dri ma'i chas ma reg/ 'dzam bu chu bo btso ma'i 'od/ /
102b6(mdo 'grel): phyag zhabs phrag so mgrin ba'i mchog/ rab gsal 'dab ma bdun ba'i dbyibs/ /sku mdog dag kyang seng ge 'dra/ /lus kyi yan lag che zhing gsal/ /tshems ni bzhi bcu mnyam zhing dkar/ /bar mtshams med cing shangs dag mdzes/ /ljags kyang ring zhing srab pa sde/ /'brug dang
102b7(mdo 'grel): rnga yi sgra lta bu/ /spyan mthing rdzi ma pa yi 'dra/ /gtsug tor lhan cig skyes pa'i dbu/ /dbu ni gdugs dbyibs byis ba 'di/ /mdzod spu dkar mdzes smin char mtshan/ /thugs kar bkra shis rab tu 'bar/ /ri mo dud dang chu skyes phyag/ rgyal po khyod kyi sras po 'di/ /'khor loS/
103a1(mdo 'grel): sgyur ba'am kun mkhyen ni/ /yang dag rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i bla mar 'gyur/ /zhes brjod de dag song ba'i tshe/ /sa yi bdag pos dga' ba thob/ /nyin zhag bdun na ston pa yi/ /yum ni mtho ris dag tu song/ /ger tshe de ltas shAkya
103a2(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /thub pa bzhin du zhi ba nyid/ /mthong ba de tshe gzhon nu de/ /shAkya thub pa zhes bar gyur/ /'di ni lha rnams dag gi yang/ /lha zhes gzi brjid dag gis des/ /sa yi bdag pos de yi mtshan/ /lha yi lha zhes btags par gyur/ /de nas mi sbyin dang 'grogs te/ /thub
103a3(mdo 'grel): pa nag po de nyid mthong/ /gus pas dka' thub nags tshal nas/ /de ni ltar yang dag 'ongs/ /byang chub sems dpa' skal ba ni/ /gsal byed nyi ma 'char ka bzhin/ /mthong nas bzhin gyi dpal rgyas pa/ /padmo nyid dang mtshungs pa thob/ /phyag dang mgron tsha byas ba yis
103a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal la thub pas de smras pa/ /rgyal po yon tan tshogs kyis bzhin/ /sras kyis khyod ni dgyes bar 'os/ /'di yi mtshan rtags 'di dag ni/ /thar ba'i dpal 'byor phun tshogs sam/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal du brjod/ /'bras bu 'di dag bslu ba med/ /'di yi byang
103a5(mdo 'grel): chub snga dro yis/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas ba'i chu skyes zhil/ /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas dag gis bzhin/ /skal ldan mig gi snod du 'gyur/ /byang chub 'o ma'i rgya mtsho che/ /snying stobs dag pa 'di yi ni/ /gsung gi bdud rtsi mkhas pa dag /skal ldan rnams kyi nyer 'tshor 'gyur
103a6(mdo 'grel): gang gi dus ni yongs rdzogs pas/ /'di ni mthong brnyed dka' ba/ /bar gnyid gcig bu 'gro ba ni/ /bsod nams ldan ba 'din? bslus/ /zhes smras mi bdag la spran nas/ /mkha' las dka' thub nags song ste/ /yid ni rab tu ? byas nas/ /lus ni gtang bar rab tu
103a7(mdo 'grel): bsams/ /yongs su rdzogs ba'i man ngag ni/ /mi sbyin dag gis mngon bar zhus/ /de yis de la smras pa bu/ /bdud rtsi gzhon nu ston bar 'gyur/ /rgyal sras de la bdud rtsi ni/ /rtogs nas nad dang bral ba khyod/ /'khor ba'i chu gter las sgrol 'gyur/ /zhes
103b1(mdo 'grel): pa smras nas lus btang gyur/ /mi sbyin gyis ni 'phral la de'i/ /lus kyi legs par bya ba byas/ /gA tyA ya na zhes thob nas/ /grub slad ba ra Na sir song/ /de nas gzhon nu bskyed bsrings shing/ /rig kun legs bar pha rol phyin/ /yi ge mkhas pas tshangs ba yi/ /yi
103b2(mdo 'grel): ge mngon par rnam par sprul/ /glang chen khri yi stobs mtshungs par/ /de ni 'gro bar grags pa'i che/ /yangs pa can pas dga' ba'i slad /re la glang chen myos pa bsrings/ /'byung 'gyur 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyir/ /de la skyes su 'ongs ba yi/ /glang po che de lhas byin
103b3(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /yongs su sdang ba dag gis bsang/ /so gnyis rab tu lhung ba de/ /dga' bos gom pa bdun du khyer/ /gzhon nu yis kyang de blangs nas/ /rab dag las phyi rol 'phangs/ /ta la bdun dang sa yi gzhi/ /mda' gcig gis ni nges par phug /gcod 'bigs mtshon dang
103b4(mdo 'grel): bstan bcos la/ /de nyid phul du phyin bar gyur/ /de nas btsun mo yon tan mtshungs/ /grags 'dzin ma ni rgyal sras kyis/ /dag pa'i khrims bzhin 'jig rten na/ /grags pa ma thob blangs par gyur/ /skabs 'dir rlung ni chen po yis/ /shin tu che ba'i ljon pa ni/ /dpag
103b5(mdo 'grel): tshang bdun pa rnam par bsgyel/ /chu bo'i srol ni 'gags par byas/ /thur bgrod ro ti ka zhes pa/ /de ni shing chen gyis bkag pas/ /dang tshul nyams ba'i bud med bzhin/ /rgyun las rab tu bzlog ste song/ /rgyal po'i sras kyis ljon pa de/ /blangs shing bcag ste 'phangs
103b6(mdo 'grel): nas kyang/ /skyes dgu zhi slad chu la ni/ /dpa' klong 'khrugs pa rnam par bzlog/ de nas nam zhig skyed tshal du/ /dad pa sgro ldan rnon po yis/ /lhas byin gyis ni gsong bar gyur/ /gzhon nu yis ni yang dag gsos/ /de yi rtsod pas lhas byin ni/ /lhag par shin tu gdud
103b7(mdo 'grel): bar gyur/ /gang phyir rigs mtshungs yon tan gyis/ /mtho ba gya rgyus mi bzod do/ /nam zhig gzhon nu 'dod pa yi/ /gzugs mtshungs rgyal po'i bu mo ni/ /sa 'tsho zhes pas mthong gyur nas/ /'dod pa ci yang skyes par gyur/ /zas gtsang gis ni btsun mo ni/ /sras kyi
104a1(mdo 'grel): thugs la 'os shes nas/ /khab tu blangs te yid srubs kyi/ /yid la re ba rdzogs par byas/ /de nas mtshan mkhan des bcas rnams/ /mngon phyags mi bdag la smras ba/ /khyod sras nyi ma bdun pa la/ /'khor los sgyur ? mthub par 'gyur/ /de
104a2(mdo 'grel): thos mi bdag sras kyis ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i gnas thob nas/ /rab tu 'byung la 'jigs pa yis/ /nyin grangs rang bzhin bsams par gyur/ /dpal ni thams cad g.yo ba dang/ /zhi ba brtan ba'i bde ba'ang rigs/ /'on kyang longs spyor la chags rnams/ /phun sum
104a3(mdo 'grel): tshogs la mchog tu gus/ /de nas nam zhig skyed tshal du/ /rnam par rtse slad rgyal po'i sras/ /mgyogs shing mtho ba'i rta ldan pa'i/ /shing rta dgal zhan te gshegs/ /de yi lam du skyes bu? ni/ /? bas 'khogs shing mdog mi sdug /mgo skyes zegs shing brul?
104a4(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /skyes? zhing rtsub pa'i rnam pa mthong/ /de yis de mthong par lus la/ /gzigs nas yun ring rnam bsams pa/ /kye ma lus 'di slen? pa yi/ /mthug? ni smad par 'os pa yin/ /'di ni ni tshod mdza' thob kyang/ /mdza' ni rten par mi khyed cing/ /rga ba 'dir na
104a5(mdo 'grel): rgan po las/ /skra dkar zol gyis rgod pa bzhin/ /kye mang ni rgan po dag/ rus gzeb lus po chu? rgyud kyi/ /rgyun gyi zhags pas? spras pa ru/ /rmangs pa'i mkha' 'gro gso 'am snyam/ /'di ni khyim du ci zhig byed/ /dka' thub nags su cis mi 'gro/ /rgan po'i
104a6(mdo 'grel): lus dang lhan cig tu/ /blo yang rab tu 'khums pa 'am/ /rgan po 'khar ba la brtan gyi/ /blo ni chos lam yin no/ /rgabs lus ni 'khogs pa la/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dben pa med/ /so phreng lhung bas/ bcu dag/ zigs pa'i cha yis 'khrugs pa'i tshig/ yi
104a7(mdo 'grel): ge rab tu 'khrul gyur pas/ /rgan pa 'di ni smod par byed/ /lta byed nyams shing lus po ring/ /stobs ni zhum shing thos pa nyams/ /'on kyang rmongs las rgan po yi/ /gzhon nu ma yis mdzes par mthong/ /dkar po nyid ? smred? pa nyid/ /yin yang rgan po ci ste
104b1(mdo 'grel): 'dzin/ /mchog tu g.yo zhing chags bral yang/ /yang 'di lus la shin tu phangs/ /de ltar bsams shing lus dag ni/ /rgud pa rnams kyi tshogs gyur cing/ /gnod pa dang bcas dgongs gyur ba/ /de yi thugs yid byung bar gyur/ /slar yang dus gzhan dag na des/ /rnam
104b2(mdo 'grel): par gyur pa'i ro 'dra ba/ /rnag dang bcas pa skye bo bzhin/ /nad kyis thebs pa'i mi zhig mthong/ /bde yis de mthong rang nyid kyi/ /lus la dmigs te rab bsams /kye ma lus 'dir nad kyi tshogs/ /lhan skyes kho nar rab tu 'byung/ /sha yi bar bzhin lus po 'di//
104b3(mdo 'grel): dman pa yin yang skad cig gang/ /nur zhing 'khrugs par mi 'gyur ba/ /'di nyid ya mtshan shin tu che/ /'di bsams thugs ni byung ba ste/ /lus la the tshom zhugs pa yis/ /rgyal srid longs spyod tshags pa la/ /gus pa dag dang bral bar gyur/ /de nas dus der
104b4(mdo 'grel): phreng ba dang/ /gas kyis g.yogs par gyur ba'i lus/ /lus kyi bya bas gnyen 'dun gyi/ /skye bo 'khrugs pa'i ro zhig mthong/ /de mthad 'phral la chags bral zhing/ /brtse ba sdug bsngal snod pas 'khrags/ /'khor ba snying po med pa ni/ /yongs su btang
104b5(mdo 'grel): par yun ring bsams/ /las kyi rang bzhin lta bu yis/ /phreng bsnying la reg par bzung/ /ring du 'gro bar chas gyur ba/ /'di ni yi dwags gnas su 'gro /kye ma yul la goms bar ni/ /rtse dga' dag la brtson ba yi/ /mi rnams dus mthar 'o rgyal bas/ shing
104b6(mdo 'grel): dang rdob mtshungs pa nyid/ /skyes bu rnams lus sring mtsho'i sdug bsngal chu yi chu bur dang/ /dus rlung gis bskyed las kyi 'khri shing rtse yi me tog dang/ /sgyu ma'i bud med mig ni rnam par g.yo ba dag gi chu?/ /'di la brtan pa nyid du mngon par khongs ba 'di ni
104b7(mdo 'grel): ci/ /gzhan la pan par ldan pa cung zad ma brjod rigs ba'i chos mthos/ /dge ba'i me tog bsnams pa nyid min bden pa yi ni tshul ma mthong/ /zhi ba'i gnas la reg ba min zhes gsal bar bsam pa la chags shing/ /ngal sos srog song 'di 
105a1(mdo 'grel): ni 'phral la g.yo ba med nyid 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de ltar rgyal po'i bu yis ni/ /lus ni mi brtan pa nyid bsams/ /ma lus yul la chags pa yi/ /mdza' ba mchog tu med par gyur/ /de nas mdun du gtsang ma yi/ /ris kyi lha rnams
105a2(mdo 'grel): kyis sprul pa/ /lhung bzed dur smrig 'dzin pa yi/ /rab tu byung ba mthong bar gyur/ /de mthong nyid na de yi blo/ /rab tu byung la mngon mchog gyur/ /gang phyir 'dod pa mthong ba ni/ /dga' bas rang bzhin rgyas par 'gyur/ /gnas dang gnas der rgyal po'i sras
105a3(mdo 'grel): 'dod chags bral 'gyur rgyu rnams ni/ /mthong ba thams cad kha lo pas/ /sa yi bdag po dag la bshad/ /de nas yab kyi tshig gis ni/ /gzhon nu grong gzigs dge mtshan la/ /'gro bas lam du gter rnams ni/ /sna tshogs bzhag pa mthong bar gyur//
105a4(mdo 'grel): skyes bu sngon bkod bud med kyi/ /lag bas bton nas nye bar gnas/ /gang tshe de yis ma blangs pa/ /de tshe chu yi gter du zhugs/ /mgo skyes rdul gyis gos shing skya/ /lag pa rkang pa rnam par gas/ /bkres dang skom ba dal bas gzir/ /thod ba mi bzang
105a5(mdo 'grel): 'jor dag gis/ /rko 'brung phyogs ni rma yis nyen/ /nyon mongs dbang gyur mthong gyur nas/ /snying rje rab tu rgyas par gyur/ /brtse bas de dag nor rnams kyis/ /dbul po nyid ni min par bsgrubs/ /bsod nams dgyes des glang bu rnams/ /nyon songs ngag
105a6(mdo 'grel): las grol bar byas/ /de nas rgyal sras rjes 'brang bcas/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer rab rgyas pa/ /nyin gung tshad pa chen po'i tshe/ /de las phyir ni log par gyur/ /shing rta'i sgra yis gtsug phud can/ /gyen phyogs phyogs na sngon por byas/ /rdul? gyi chu yi thigs
105a7(mdo 'grel): rgyas pas/ /nags tshal gzhi ni bsil bar sleb /der ni shing rta las babs nas/ /snyan par grags shing rna rgyan ni/ /rnam par 'pyad des ngal bso'i slad/ /dzam+b+hu'i grib ma bsten par gyur/ /de yis rdul gyi chu thigs rgyun/ /gsal ba snying gar de
105b1(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa dag /do shal dag gis 'brel pa ni/ /chags ldan sbyar bas mdzes pa bzhin/ /rim gyis shing rnams thams cad kyi/ /grib ma yongs su gyur pa'i tshe/ /de yis sku las dzam+bA yi/ /grib mchung du g.yos ma gyur/ /de yi grib ma bsil ba des/ /gdung bas
105b2(mdo 'grel): nyen pa rab tu bzlog /chags bral drag po'i bag chags kyis/ /'khor ba dga' bral dag gi bzhin/ /de nas sa bdag phyogs de ru/ /sras ni gzigs par bzhed ldan pas/ /glang po che la bung ba ni/ /rab 'dus rnga yab 'khrug cing 'ongs/ gzhon nu'i mthu las
105b3(mdo 'grel): grib ma ni/ /g.yo ba med pa de mthong nas/ /gus pa rmad byung yang dag thob/ /rab tu btud nas der phyag 'tshal/ /de nas yab dang lhan cig de/ /grong khyer 'gro bar brtson pa yis/ /grong khyer mdza' yi dur khrod ni/ /ro yis yongs su gdab mthong/ /zhi ba'i nags
105b4(mdo 'grel): ni mi shis pa/ /ro yis khengs mthong chags bral can/ /de yis skad cig shing rta ni/ /bzung nas kha lo sgyur la smras/ /kha lo pa ltos srog chags kyi/ /gnod pa'i rang bzhin lus kyi skabs/ /rmongs pas bag med rnams kyi yi/ /'di ltar mthong yang chags
105b5(mdo 'grel): pas brlan/ /gzhan gyi bud med bltas ma doms/ /mig ni gus dang bcas par myangs/ /'di yi bde ldan min pa'i lci/ /bya rog gis ni gcong la ltos/ /'di yi nu ma'i stod du na/ sems dmugs rgong cing bde bar gnas/ /'dod pas rgyas ba'i bya rgod kyis//
105b6(mdo 'grel): mchu gcod 'dod ldan dag gis bzhin/ /rkang 'thung 'di dag g.yo ba'i bya rog chags pa'i gci bas skyug cing brgyal ba dang/ /rnam par gyur cing rnags pa'i ro yi dri nges par sgra ngan sgrogs pa bzhin/ /lan cig ma yin bya rgod kyis 'joms brlan ldan
105b7(mdo 'grel): rgyu ma bzangs pa'i ro mthong nas/ /rlung gis rnam par bskyod pa'i yal 'dab lag pas bzhin ras sgrib par byed pa bzhin/ /lang tsho ldan pa g.yo med? myos ba'i snying dag myur du phrogs shing mgrin pa dag la chags/ /ci yang khrag la 'dod pa mngon bar gsal
106a1(mdo 'grel): zhing sen mo kha yi ri mos kun tu mtshan/ /rma yi mtshan ma so yis gtong ba'i mchu yi 'dab la skad cig myangs shing myangs byas nas/ /ce spyang 'di ni gcer bu'i bya ba dag la shin tu chags pas dga' bar byed pa bzhin/ /zhes brjod srid pa
106a2(mdo 'grel): 'jigs rung zhing/ /smad pas dga' dang bral ba skyes/ /nyon mongs bzlog pa'i thabs sems shing/ /grong khyer nang du zhugs par gyur/ /ri dags skyes zhes ri dwags mig /ri dwags las skyes dri bzangs can/ /gzhon nu ma yi chas rab 'bar/ /yang thog
106a3(mdo 'grel): thon pas der de mthong/ /de mthong tshe na de yi mig /mchog tu thos par yang dag rgyu/ /'phral nyid dben pa dag dang ldan/ /chags dang bcas shing g.yo bar gyur/ /ngo tsha bzod bar mi nus pa/ /'dod bas bzhin du de mthong ba/ /nyid kyis gzhon nu ma de drangs//
106a4(mdo 'grel): grogs mo'i mdun du 'dug nas smras/ /chags pas gdung ba gang gis lus/ /'di yi reg pa zla 'od kyis/ /mya ngan 'da' 'gyur bud med ni/ /'jig rten ngag na skal ldan bu/ /rgyal ba'i bu yis 'dod pa'i sgra/ /mya ngan 'da' ba thos nyid nas/ /spyan gyi bad tshal
106a5(mdo 'grel): ston pa bzhin/ /gyen du phyogs te da la bltas/ /de yi tshig dang lus des kyang/ /rab tu dang bar gyur pa des/ /legs spyod yon tan 'bar ba yi/ /do shal sems kyang de la 'phangs/ /lta ba'i rjes su mthun pa yis/ /rgyal bu'i dgongs pas bdag gis//
106a6(mdo 'grel): shes nas btsun mo'i chogs gnas su/ /de ni blangs nas bkong par gyur/ /de nas btsun mo stong phrag ni/ /drug gis gang ba'i pho brang du/ /rgyal po'i sras kyis zhi ba ni/ /dgyes par rnam par bsams shing zhugs/ /skabs der mi yi bdag po la/ /mtshan
106a7(mdo 'grel): mkhan rnams kyis gsal bar smras/ /khyod kyi sras ni thub pa 'am/ 'khor los sgyur bar nad mo 'gyur/ /de nas mi bdag rang 'byung la/ mchog tu 'jigs bas bsams nas ni/ /grong khyer sngo bsrungs 'gro ba dang/ /'ong ba rnams ni dgag par byas//
106b1(mdo 'grel): bre bo zas sogs spun zla rnams/ /de yis sgo rnams dag tu bkod/ /rang nyid grong khyer dbus su ni/ /dmag dang blon por bcas te gnas/ /de nas lha mo grags 'dzin nams/ /rgyal po'i bu las mang pa thob nas/ /zla ba rab tu nya ba yi/ /ston ka'i mkha' bzhin
106b2(mdo 'grel): dkar nyid mdzes/ /de nas grong khyer sgo bsrung pa/ zhag gcig lhag mar gyur pa'i tshe/ /nyi ma zhi bar rab zhugs shing/ /nyin par rab 'byung mngon phyogs 'gyur/ /nyi ma zhi bar song ba'i tshe/ /thun mtshams kyang ni 'khor pa la/ /yun ring dpyad nas dur smrig gi /gos
106b3(mdo 'grel): la brten te mi snang gyur/ /ma lus phyogs kyi mun pa yis/ /rmongs pa 'joms brten zla ba ni/ /ngal bus shar bas nam mkha' dag /snang bas khengs shing gzigs par byas/ /chags dang gdung ba ldan pa'i sems/ /nyi ma sod tshe nam mkha' ni/ /zla ba dag pa'i snying ldan
106b4(mdo 'grel): pa/ /ci yang ma bslad rab dang gyur/ /de nas skabs der btsun mo'i tshogs/ /gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi khongs/ /rin chen khad par zla ba'i 'od/ /rab zhugs the tshom dgong byed pa/ /ro bral snying po med gyur pa/ /kun la gzigs shing rgyal po'i bu/ /mkha' 
106b5(mdo 'grel): ltar dri med rab dbang du/ /dran pa rab tu rgyas pas smras/ /bud med rnams kyi tshogs pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i me yi skar mda'i g.yog 'khor dang/ /drag po'i sdug bsngal brgya phrag dag gis gdung ba'i grogs yin yongs su btab par 'os/ /de ni khyim bdag yongs
106b6(mdo 'grel): su btang nas ljon pa'i 'og gi 'khri shing bsil ba yi/ /gzhi la rab tu zhig bde ba'i snying? por bdag ni yongs su 'gyur bar 'os/ /zla ba'i 'od kyis rgyags pa'i rang bzhin mtshan mo lang tshe rgyas pa 'di la ni/ /'di dag mig rnams gnyis kyi rgya yi nges byas gos
106b7(mdo 'grel): rnams mal stan dag la lhung/ /rmi lam gyis bskyed rigs pa min pa'i tshig smra skra yi phrag pa kun tu g.yogs/ /myos pa'i dbugs kyi rlung gis bskyod pa'i mar me dag ni ngo tshar gyur pa bzhin/ /lus ni brkyang zhing rang dbang min/ /ngo tsha med ci dgos
107a1(mdo 'grel): dang bral/ /lus can gnyid kyis log pa dang/ /shi la nges par bye brag ci/ /zhes pa brjod cing gshegs par/ /de ni brtson par gyur pa'i tshe/ /grong khyer sgo ni bsrung ba rnams/ /phan tshun gtam dag byung gyur ba/ /kye kye su su 'di me la tshe/
107a2(mdo 'grel): me la tshe ldan la nyes ba med/ /rje yi thugs ngor 'khrugs pa yis/ /mdza' dag nyid ni mal tshe byed/ /'khor ba'i khang bar mkhas pa me la tshe byed/ /rmongs ba'i mun bar bag med gnyid bar byed/ /me la tsha rab ldan 'jig rten dag na 'tsho/ /shi dang gnyid kyis
107a3(mdo 'grel): log la bye brag ci/ /mtshan mo rgyal sras khang bzad na/ /gnas pas gtam de thos gyur nas/ /rang gi 'dod pa legs pa yi/ /lam nas song ba bzhin du sems /de yi myang 'das mtshan nyid kyi/ /rmi lam skad cig gnyid kyis mthong/ /bla na med ba'i ye shes
107a4(mdo 'grel): kyi/ /gteng? la rab tu nye bar bsams/ /de nas lha mo grags 'dzin ma/ /'phral la rab sad skrag pa yi/ /de dus mthong ba'i rmi lam ni/ /bdag po nying la rab tu bshad/ /jo bo bdag gi khri rgyun lus/ /chag dang dpal ni 'gro ba dang/ /nyi zla dag kyang bsgribs
107a5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /rmi lam du ni bdag gis mthong/ /de thos de yis der smras pa/ /mdzes ma bden spangs 'khor ba 'di/ /rmi lam nyid na rmi lam gyi'ang/ /rmi lam de ni ci zhig 'dra/ /de ring rmi lam lte ba nas/ /'khri shing skyes bas nam mkha' khyab/ /lhun po
107a6(mdo 'grel): mgo yi sngas su byas/ /shar dang nub kyi chu gter gnyis/ /lag ba gnyis dang rkang bas kyang/ /lho yi rgya mtshe? nga yis bzung/ /bzang mo bdag rmi 'di ni dge /bud med bdag po dge bas dge/ /byang chub sems dpas de brjod tshe/ /ci yang mi smra grags
107a7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin ma/ /slar yang gnyid la mdon phyogs te/ /mig ni zum pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas brgya byin tshangs la sogs/ /bdud rtsi spyod rnams yang dag 'ongs/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spro ba ni/ /shin tu chung ba rab rdzogs byas/ /de dag rnams ni lha yi bu/
107b1(mdo 'grel): sa'i chu gter 'dzin bzod pa/ /shin tu mgyogs par gyur pa bzhi/ /de yi 'gro ba'i grogs la bskos/ /brgya byin gyis bskos gnod sbyin ni/ /lngas rtsen zhes pas rnam sprul pa/ khang bzang la reg thems skas la/ /babs nas de ni phyi rol byung/ /'dun pa zhes pa'i
107b2(mdo 'grel): kha lo pa/ /gnyid ni sad par byas te bos/ /sngags ldan zhes pa'i rta yi mchog /de yi spro ba bzhin du bzung/ /dpal mo'i zur mig ltar g.yo ba'i/ /rno mdzes 'phrog byed de la ni/ /de yi phyag gis srab skyogs nas/ /bzung zhing spyi bor reg par byas/ /gang
107b3(mdo 'grel): gis mthu yis phyugs rnams kyang/ /g.yo ba dag ni rnam par gtod/ /zhi brtson legs pa'i yid kyis de/ /nad dang phyi rol gang duAng mnyam/ /de nas stobs ni shes 'dod nas/ /de yis zhabs ni sa la bkod/ /yang mtshan ldan pa'i lha yi bu/ /de dag rnams kyis
107b4(mdo 'grel): g.yo ma nus/ /'drog pa med pa'i rta la de/ /'dun pa dang ni lhan cig zhon/ /rang gi bsam pa bzhin du ni/ /dri med che ba'i mkha' la gshegs/ /dpal gyi mya ngan shugs rings bzhin/ /g.yo ba'i rlung ni rab langs pas/ /gtsug tor thong kyi yal 'dab ni/ /g.yo
107b5(mdo 'grel): zhing bsgyur zhing rab tu gshegs/ /de rgyan rin chen 'od zer? gyis/ /ri mos nam mkha' rnam par bkra/ /skud pa pa tra'i phreng ba yis/ /rnam bkra snam sbyar blangs pa bzhin/ /bltar 'os pho brang 'khor gyi lha/ /'dren byed g.yo ba'i utpal/ /mchi ma'i thigs rdzogs
107b6(mdo 'grel): gang gyur pa/ /rab tu gshegs pa de mthong gyur/ /'khor ba bzhin du rnam rgyas pa'i/ /mi bdag gnyen bcas grong khyer la/ /ring nas g.yas bskor mdzad nas ni/ /bzod pa mdzed ces de yi smras/ /mtshan ma skar cig lhag ma la/ /skye bo gnyis kyis
107b7(mdo 'grel): rgyas btab tshe/ /ming chen zhes pa'i rgyal po'i gnyen/ /rab tu sangs nga nge? mthong gyur/ /mkha' la 'gro ba de mthong ste/ /ri bo can du dogs pas phrogs/ /yun ring spyad nas mi bdag ni/ /mchim rgyas pas skad cher smras/ /gzhan nu mdzes
108a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i rnam pa can/ /ban d+hu dzI ba lta bu khyod/ /rigs pa byed pa'i chags bral nyid/ /ngo mtshar 'di ni rigs ma yin rig mchog khyad par don gnyer ba/ /re ba khyod la gtang pa'i yab/ /re ba kun skod khyod kyis ni/ /ci slad re thag chang bar mdzad/ /ces
108a2(mdo 'grel): pa shAkya chen po'i tshig /mi bdag sras kyis thas gyur nas/ /der smras gnyen dang mdza' ba yi/ /'brel pa 'ching ba'i lcags kyi sgrog /log pa'i khyim gyi bde ba la/ /dga' ba'i lus 'di 'jig par 'gyur/ /yul gyi dug gis gzir rnams la/ /nags ni bdud
108a3(mdo 'grel): rtsi'i khang pa yin/ /yul gyi tshogs kyi 'khor ba 'di na bag med rab tu dka' ldan zhing/ /gdengs can gdengs ka gsum pa lag pas drangs nas mgo la 'ching ba bkod/ /drag po'i dug gi 'khri shing yal 'dab g.yo ba'i phreng bas mgrin pa bstams/ /sol ba
108a4(mdo 'grel): 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi gang ba'i ngan 'gro'i lam du 'jug par byed/ /mkha' la gshegs shing 'di smras nas/ /skad cig gis ni grong khyer rgal/ /phyi rol sa gzhir mngon gshegs te/ /de ni mgyogs pa'i rta la zhon/ /de nas shAkya'i gtso chen gyis/ /sa yi bdag
108a5(mdo 'grel): po de la sbran/ /pho brang 'khor du btsun mo rnams/ /snying rje'i tshe de byung bar gyur/ /de nas tshangs dbang nor sbyin la/ /sogs pa'i lha rnams dag gis bskor/ /dpag tshad bcu gnyis phyin nas ni/ /rgyal po'i bu yin nags? tshal sleb/ /de nas rta la babs nas nges/ /rgyan
108a6(mdo 'grel): rnams ngag ni rnam par bkrol/ /bzhin gyi 'od kyis kun dga' ni/ /gsal pa 'dun pa la smras ba/ /khyod ni rta dang rgyan rnams dag /zung la khad pa ngag tu song/ sgyu ma'i 'ching ba 'di dag gis/ /nga ni bdag la dgos pa med/ /nags 'dir bdag rang gcig pu
108a7(mdo 'grel): nyid/ /zhi ba chog shes gnyen dang ldan/ /skye ba gcig pur yang dag skye/ /gcig pu nyid du rnam par ltung/ /mi bzad yul dang sbyong ba'i longs spyod dag gis nad gtang zhing/ /ro ldan dga' ba'i khyad par nyon mongs skems bar rab zhugs pa/ /yongs su zil non srid
108b1(mdo 'grel): pa 'di na 'di nyid bdag gi gnas/ /'dod pa'i mdzes pa zhi pa bdag ni zhi ba kho na bsten/ /zhes smras de yis 'bar ba yis/ /rgyan rnams de li lag tu btang/ /mu tig mchi ma'i thigs tshogs kyis/ /de dag mya ngan gtong ba bzhin/ /ral gris gtsug ?  bcang
108b2(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /nam mkha' i gzhi la de yis 'phangs/ /rgya byin gyis kyang de blangs nas/ /gus pas lha yi gnas su khyer/ /gang du bdag nyid chen po des/ /nyon mongs bzhin du skra bcad pa/ /der ni dam pa rnams ngag gis/ /dbu skra blangs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs/ /'dun
108b3(mdo 'grel): pa yis kyang rta blangs nas/ /rab tu song te nyin 'dun gyis/ /grong khyer nye bar ngal bus phyin/ /mya ngan ngag gis gzir bar bsams/ /mi bdag sras ni yongs su dor/ /rta ni stong pa nyid du khrid/ /sras kyi cho de ldan pa yi/ /mi bdag lta bar ji ltar nus/ /de ltar
108b4(mdo 'grel): bsams nas rta gtang ste/ /de yis gnas de nyid du bsdud/ /stan stong rta ni grong? khyer du/ /mya ngan gzugs can bzhin du zhugs/ /de mthong pho brang skye bo ni/ /sa bdag blon por bcas pa dang/ /ma lus phyogs kyi so sor ni/ /cho de'i gu co mu cor byas/ /mgrin pa gdung ba'i
108b5(mdo 'grel): sgra rab bskyod/ /mya ngan ldan pa kun gyis 'jus/ /chags bral ldan pa'i rta de ni/ /mchi ma nyil zhing srog btang gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' i reg pa yis/ /bsod nams thob cing gtsang ba des/ /'khor ba las ni grol ba'i slas/ /bram ze'i rigs su skye ba blangs/ /gang
108b6(mdo 'grel): du gzhon nus ngur smrig ni/ /brgya byin dag gis byin pa blangs/ /der ni ngur smrig blangs pa yis/ /mchod rten skye bo chen pos byas/ /de ltar 'byor pa sred med 'jug slad skye ba skye ba rab grol slang/ /skye bos dben pa'ang skye bo rnams kyi mongs pa'i 'khor lo bzlog pa'i slang
108b7(mdo 'grel): yon tan gyis ni skye bo chags mdzad chags pa ngag dang bral gyur pa/ /dge ba 'dod cing 'dod pa btang nas nges par 'os pa nyid bsten to/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi khri shing las mngon 
109a1(mdo 'grel): par 'byung pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// //mdzes pa'i mig gi 'khor lo sgyur pa'i bdud/ /gang gis bka' yi yul du bsgyur byas pa/ /srid pa'i mthu yis zil mnan mngon par grol/ /skye bas 'jigS
109a2(mdo 'grel): las rab grol de dag rgyal/ /de nas dka' thub nags tshal der/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dka' thub bsten/ /de tshe de yi nye gnas lnga/ /pa ro? Na sir rab tu song/ /de nas thub dbang 'dod 'os pa'i/ /shAkya thub pa dal bu yis/ /sde 'dod dag gis grong du
109a3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /rang nyid ljongs ni rgyu zhing gshegs/ /der ni khyim bdag bde zhes par/ /mngon par brjod pa'i bu mo ni/ /gzhon nu mdag dga' ma dang/ /dga' stobs zhes pa byung bar gyur/ /de yis sa bdag zas gtsang gis/ /sras kyi grags mthos? gyur nas//
109a4(mdo 'grel): khyim thab dag tu bsgrubs slad du/ /brtul zhugs lo ni bcu gnyis byas/ /phreng ba lta bu'i gzhon nu ma/ /dri bzang dga' ldan snying la ni/ /mngon par 'dod pa rang bzhin skyes/ /skud pa bzhin du rtag tu gnas/ /yang yang 'o ma 'thungs pa yi/ /ba rnams 'o ma de
109a5(mdo 'grel): gnyis kyis/ /blangs nas shel gyi snod du ni/ /dge ba'i 'o thug brtul zhugs mthar/ /'o thug cho ga bzhin grub tshe/ /bram ze'i gzugs su lha dbang dang/ /pad+ma'i ston ldan lha dag kyang/ /yul der yang dag mngon par 'ongs/ /mdzes ma de dag dga' 
109a6(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /mgron gyi cha ni rab blangs che/ /brgya byin g yis smras yon tan kun/ /rgyas pa la ni thog mar phul/ /bdag las re zhig tshangs pa 'ang/ /lhag pas dang po nyid du 'os/ /lha'i rgyal pos de brjod tshe/ /gdong bzhi pa yis rab smras pa/ /gtsang
109a7(mdo 'grel): ma ris kyi lha de dag bdag las kyang ni lhag pa yin/ /tshangs pas de skad smras pa'i tshe/ /de dag gis kyang mkhar gnas smras/ /ni rany+dza na zhes pa yis/ /klung du zhugs shing chur gnas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' dka' thub kyis/ /ring 'di kun
109b1(mdo 'grel): las khyad par 'phags/ /de dag thos nas gzhon nu mas/ /bos ste rin chen snod du ni/ /phog nas blugs te gus pa yis/ /sbrang rtsi'i 'o thug de la phul/ /byang chub sems dpas de blangs nas/ /rin chen snod ni de la btang/ /byin pa 'di ni slar mi blang/ /zhes brjod de
109b2(mdo 'grel): dag gis ma blangs/ /'od ldan de ni chu klung du/ /de 'phangs klu rnams dag gis thob/ /rdo rje can gyis de dag las/ /mkha' lding gzugs kyi bskyong thob blangs/ /rab dang byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /de nas mdzes ma zung la smras/ /sbyin pa'i smon lam dag gis ni//
109b3(mdo 'grel): khyed gnyis ci zhig mngon par 'dod/ /de la des smras zas gtsang sras/ /mkhas pa kun tu dga' ba'i gter/ /gzhon nu don kun grub pa de/ /bdag cag bdag por mngon par 'dod/ /de dag tshig ni chags ldan zhing/ /'dod pa'i dbang rlabs lhag pa nges/ /de yi thugs la
109b4(mdo 'grel): mgos te/ /chu yi pad+ma'i 'dab la bzhin/ /de yis smras pa gzhon nu de/ /rab tu byung ba ma thos sam/ /de la bud med dpal mo bzhin/ /mi g.yo dga' ma med dam ci/ /zhes pa 'dod pa min thos nas/ /shugs rings phyung ste gzhon nu mas/ /smras pa'i sbyin pa'i chos 'di ni//
109b5(mdo 'grel): de yi grub slad nyid gyur cig /ma mthong byams pa yang dag sbyar/ /nang zhugs phyi rol phyogs tshe'ang/ /yun rings goms pas nges par ni/ /phyogs su ltung ba mi zlogs so/ /de dag tshig de thos nas blo/ /rab dang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /nags kyi nang du ngal
109b6(mdo 'grel): bso'i slad/ /de dag la ni gleng nas gshegs/ /'o thug bdud rtsi'i cha dag gis/ /stobs ni mchog tu rgyas pa thob/ /bsil grib mchog ldan shing dag gis/ /rab mdzes sa 'dzin dag la 'dzegs/ /der ni skyil krung bcing ba mdzad/ /de yis bde bar bzhugs
109b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe/ /nga rgyal bzhin du rtse mo ni/ /rab tu mtho ba'i ri de zhig /sa 'dzin rnam par zhig pa der/ /thugs ni byung bzhin de yis bsams/ /kye ma dri med ma yin pa'i/ /las ni bdag gis ci zhig byas/ /de ltar brgya bsams dbugs ring ba/ /de la nam mkha' lha yiS
110a1(mdo 'grel): smras/ /dam pa khyod kyis mi 'os pa'i/ /las ni ci yang bsgrubs pa med/ /rgyun chad med par dge bsgrubs pa/ /sa yis 'dzin par bzod ma gyur/ /sems can dge pas rab bsgrubs pa/ /rab mtho ri bo brgya bas lci/ /chu bo ni rany+dzan ni/ /yang
110a2(mdo 'grel): dag sgrol la g.yo med yul/ /byang chub sems la grub ster ba/ /rdo rje gdan zhes brjod par song/ /lha yis bstan pa'i lam nas de/ /rab gshegs lam gyis sa gzhi la/ /zhabs ni bkod pas gser dag gi/ pad+ma brgyud pa byung bar gyur/ /de ni gshegs pa'i
110a3(mdo 'grel): sa gzhi la/ /chu rnams rab tu rdol pas dkrigs/ /'khor? ba'i snod bzhin sgra ldan zhing/ /rab tu par ces nam zhes kyang/ /gang gis bla med ye shes gter/ /'grub par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu can/ /mtshan ma de dang de dag ni/ /byung bar gyur pa de yis mthong/ /ne? rany+dza na'i
110a4(mdo 'grel): sa gzhi la/ /nag po zhes bya long ba'i klu/ /sangs rgyas byung bas mig thob cing/ /sa yi sgra thos nges par 'thon/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rab rdzogs shing/ /dzam+bU? chu bo'i 'od zer 'bar/ /byang chub sems dpa' des mthong nas/ /thal mo sbyar byas rab smras pa//
110a5(mdo 'grel): pad+ma'i spyan ldan mdzes pa khyod ni yang tsho? dang la nags tshal 'dir/ /phun tshogs rnams la 'bral ba'i gdung ba rab tu byin nas rnam par gnas/ /mtshungs med zhi ba'i khyad bar rab tu 'byed cing chog shes skye ba'i rgyu/ /khyod ni srid pa'i mtsho la lus can rnamS
110a6(mdo 'grel): kyis bden pa'i zam stegs 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'di na ri dags 'di dag 'jigs pa'i g.yo ba nyid ni btang byas shing/ /ji ltar mkhar bgrong? tshogs rnams rtse dga' i 'khor los nye ba nyid du rnam par gnas/ /gang yang sems can rnams kyi snying gi yid brtan mtshungs
110a7(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyi gnas gyur pa/ /de ltar 'di ni ngal dub med par bde pa sbyin pa'i sangs rgyas sku yin snyam/ /lag ldan phrug gu padmor ba la lag pa dag la lag pa 'jog par byed/ /gtsug pud? ldan pI mjug rtsa'i rlung gis snyan pa'i sgra yang bde bar byed/ /mig zur g.yo ba'i ri dwags
110b1(mdo 'grel): mo rnams mdun du gus pas gyen du phyogs par gyur/ /bsod nams rab dang rang bzhin 'di ni rab tu zhi par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi lugs/ /di ring kho na dag pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ /'jig rten gsum po ma lus khyod kyis rtogs par bgyid/ /bdud rtsi zer gyis 'phral la
110b2(mdo 'grel): ku mud ldan pa ni/ /rab dang rab tu dga' ba'i dkar ba rdzogs pa bzhin/ /nyin mo'i mgon bzhin gzi brjid rab 'bar khyod kyis snang bas 'phral la phan tshun du/ /rab rgyas pad+ma lta bus mchog gi snang ba la reg 'jig rten rnam dag gis/ /sbrang rtsi 'thung ba'i phreng bzhin ba/ rung? zhing
110b3(mdo 'grel): skrag par nges bcing snying la phyir byung ba/ /gti mug mun pa'i phreng ba slar yang nang du gnas ni byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /dul bas de skad smra ba yi/ /klu yis rgyal la rab dang blo/ /byang chub sems dpas phebs par smras/ /chu bo yang dag brgal nas gshegs/ /rdo rje gdan
110b4(mdo 'grel): gnas byang chub kyis/ /rtsa bar nges phyir ma 'khrugs par/ /brgya byin gyis byin ku sha rnams/ /rtse mo g.yas bsten mal stan byas/ /der ni skyil krung bcas mdzad nas/ /g.yo pa med par nges pas bzhugs/ /bdud rtsi'i chu gter bsrubs pa yis/ /'jug tu ngal bso
110b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin du mdzes/ /brtan zhing drang po'i dbyibs ldan de/ /thun mong min par bzod pa'i rten/ /mi g.yo gser gyi 'od ldan pa/ /lhun po gzhan pa bzhin du mdzes/ /zag pa zad pa'i mthar thug pa/ /skyil rkung 'di la bdag gnas so/ /zhes pa'i brtag pa byas nas des/ /dran pa'i
110b6(mdo 'grel): sgo ni rab tu bcings/ /de nas skabs der bdud dag ni/ /zhi pa phrag dog springs yig thogs/ /myur ba nyid du mngon par 'ongs/ /byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ /'jig rten gnyen la g.yon nyid dang/ /'dod min 'dod pa 'di ni ci/ /dus min me tog gzhon nu'i dbyibs/ /khyod
110b7(mdo 'grel): kyi blo yang su zhig 'dod/ /dogs pa bcom pa'i lhas byin gyis/ /khyod kyi grong khyer rab tu blangs/ /btsun mo'i tshogs kyis phreng ba dkag/ mi yi bdag po zas gtsang bcing/ /zhes pa'i tshig 'di thos nyid na/ /mya ngan khro ba'i dus spangs pa/ /de yi rnam 'gyur ma bslabs
111a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /sems kyi rnam par bsam par gyur/ /kye ma bdag la bdud dag ni/ /bar chad bya bar rab tu brtson/ /po tsha med 'di gtsug pung ldan/ /rtse bzhin 'gro la gar stabs bsgyur/ /mdza' ni 'chi bar mi nus bdud/ /khyod kyis gnod par
111a2(mdo 'grel): ? nus ma yin/ /'tshe ba'i mchog sbyin gcig gis ni/ /'dod pa nyid 'di khyod kyis thob/ /mchod sbyin sbyin pa dka' thub bsngags/ /bdag nyid la ni byed mi spro/ /rang gi yon tan bsgrags pa yis/ /bsod nams me tog rnyings shing 'brul/ /de yis de skad sun
111a3(mdo 'grel): phyung bas/ /lus can sems ni 'phrog pa'i bdud/ /khro pa dang bcas rab song ste/ /rmong? byung sbyor ba yang dag brtsams/ /de nas tsu te'i 'khri shing bzhin/ /yid 'ong rab tu mdzes pa'i mig/ g.yo ba'i bung ba g.yo ldan ma/ /yid 'ong mdzas ma mthong bar 'gyur/ /spyod
111a4(mdo 'grel): tshul mdzes pas ngoms gyur pa/ /'dod pa'i bu mo gsum po de'i/ /rkang pa padmo can bkod nas/ /dka' thub nags ni chags ldan byas/ /der ni mig gis ri? drags mo/ /'gying ba'i grogs kyis glang mo dang/ /de dag bzhin gyi chu skyes kyis/ /pad+ma can ni dman par
111a5(mdo 'grel): byas/ /de yi lus ni lang tsho yis/ /brgyan cing rjes su chags pas byugs/ /mdzes sdug gos dang ldan pa yis/ /sems med rnams kyang chags par gyur/ /rdo rje'i gdan la bsam gtan la/ /mnyam bzhag g.yo med spyan ldan pa/ /de mthong nas ni de
111a6(mdo 'grel): dag rnams/ /ya mtshan bsam gtan 'dzin par gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag pa las/ /rgyags dang chags pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /na tshod 'phral nyid yongs btang nges/ /dam pa'i ngo tsha'i dga' ba bsten/ /de nas de dag phyir log ste/ /song pas yul
111a7(mdo 'grel): la re ba chags/ /yid srubs grags pa rtsom pa yis/ /dmag gi tshogs pa bsdus par gyur/ /tha dad bzhin ldan srog chags dang/ /mtshon cha kun gyi 'jigs pas khyab/ /bye ba phrag ni sum cu drug /de yis dpung chen yang dag rdzogs/ /rang nyid
111b1(mdo 'grel): khro zhing drag po yis/ /rna ba'i bar du mda' stan drangs so/ /bdud kyi rnam 'gyur drag po yis su/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu gces/ /de yis rab 'phangs rdul dang ni/ /dug dang rdo ldan mtshon gyi char/ /manda ra dang padmo yi/ /tshogs su byang chub sems la gyur/ /slar yang bdud
111b2(mdo 'grel): dpung gis 'phangs pa/ /mtshon gyi char ni 'dzin bzod pa/ /de la rdo rjer ba'i gnas/ /lha rnams dag gis rab tu byas/ /brtag pa nyams pa'i dran pas kyang/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rna ba'i tshor/ /shel gyi ljon pa 'dab ma ni/ /dril bu gsal ba'i sgra ldan sprul/ /mu cor sgrogs
111b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i shing do dang/ /bdud dpung mtshon dang bcas pa dag/ nam mkha' i lha yis blangs nas ni/ /lcags ri'i phyi rol rab tu 'phangs/ /de nas bcom ldan ye shes ni/ /dri med rab dang yang dag thob/ /kun rig kun rtogs skye ba ni/ /thams cad dran pa mchog tu gyur/ /der ni
