111b4(mdo 'grel): bla med ye shes kyis/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes pa des/ /las kyi dpa' rlabs kyis sprul pa/ /'byung po kun gyi 'gro ba mthong/ /de nas shAkya'i grong khyer du/ /byang chub sems dpa' dka' thub kyi/ /nyon mongs dbang gis 'das gyur ces/ /mkha' las bdud
111b5(mdo 'grel): kyis rab tu bsgrags/ /der ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma/ /de dus rdo rje bcom pa bzhin/ /bu la byams pa'i dag gis gzir/ /sa la rab tu 'gyel bar gyur/ /mi bdag btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas/ /srog ni btang bar byas pa'i tshe/ /legs spyod phyogs su lhung pa yis//
111b6(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' i lha yis der smras pa/ /bdud rtsi gsol nas khyod kyi sras/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas nyid gyur/ /de yis gzigs pa rnams la yang/ /'chi mas byas pa'i 'jigs pa med/ /mi bdag blon po btsun mo dang/ /bcas pa'i tshig de thos gyur nas/ /bdud rtsis
111b7(mdo 'grel): bran bzhin skad cig la/ /srog ni slar yang byung bar gyur/ /kun dga' i dga' ston chen po der/ /zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin tshe/ /byang chub sems dpa' i btsun mo ni/ /grags 'dzin ma la sras mdzes bcas so/ /sgra gcan zhes pa'i byis pa de'ang/ /mi bdag des bskyed dogs
112a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe/ /ma yis dag slad rdo dang bcas/ /'phangs? tshe chu la 'phyo bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang nyi ma nag bdun/ /sku ni g.yo ba med par gnas/ /rdo rje skyil krung bcings pa yis/ /lha rnams ya mtshan ldan par byas/ /tshangs pa'i
112a2(mdo 'grel): rigs zhes bya ba yis/ /lha gnyis kyis ni bskul ba na/ /mchog tu kun dga' bdud rtsi yis/ /tshogs ltar mdzes pas bka' stsal pa/ /lha dang lha min dbang phyug bde/ /gang gis sdug bsngal du brtsib/ /bde bar gnas pa 'di ni sngon?/ /kye ma bangs gis
112a3(mdo 'grel): shes ma gyur/ /mdzes sdug chus rgyas lang tsho ldan ba'i lus/ /bdud rtsis brlan pa mtho ris longs spyod tshogs/ /ma lus btang gyur rtsol med bde 'di yis/ /'gran zla snying po med pa'i rdul nyid do/ /mi bzang yul gyi nyon mongs 'khor pa'i lam 'gron
112a4(mdo 'grel): kun tu gdungs gyur cing/ /nyon mongs can bdag zhi bas dga' par nye gyur tsan dan grib mas bzhin/ /dbang po mdza' dag tshim pa'i bde ba 'di yis bdag ni dga' ba skyes/ /zhib gangs ldan nags su ngal bsos rnams kyi bde ba'i dben ci/ /gnas skabS
112a5(mdo 'grel): der ni bsod nams dag/ yongs su smin pas nags tshal der/ /tshong pa g.yon bzang po dag/ don mthun? chen pos 'ongs par gyur/ /lha yis bskul bde dag gis/ /gus pas bcom ldan la phyogs te/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni bsod snyoms 'di/ /blang bar mdzod
112a6(mdo 'grel): ces rab tu smras/ /brtse ba'i dbang gyur kun mkhyen gyis/ /de ni bsan nas rnam bsams pa/ /snga? rabs rnams kyis snod du 'di/ /blangs kyi snod spangs lag par min/ /de ltar bsams pa de la ni/ /rgyal chen bzhi zhes bya ba'i lhas/ /shel las byas pa'i
112a7(mdo 'grel): lhung bzed bzhi/ /phul nas lha yi gnas su song/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/ /bsod snyoms rab tu bzhes mdzad nas/ /skabs gsum dag gis bka' yis ni/ /de dg rjes su bzung bar mdzad/ legs byas rnam par rgyas pa'i dbang po
112b1(mdo 'grel): bsod nams gter la mkhas/ /rgud pa ma lus zad byed do mdug nyer pa'i dpag bsam shing/ /reg pa yongs gyur bslab pa'i rjes mthun dam pa dag gis grogs/ /skal ldan 'ga' zhi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa bas 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang gi byas
112b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las /bdud bcom pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu drug pa'o// //mdzes pa'i spyod tshul dang ldan yon tan sdud par 'os gyur cing/ /rin chen? 'od zer rnam dag?
112b3(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i snang pa rgyas par byed/ /nad med mu tig rang bzhin 'gro ba'i rgyan ni skyed byed pa/ /bang zhig dge bas rjes 'brel ming chen rigs de 'ga' zhig yin/ /ser skya'i gzhir ni n+ya gro? ba'i?/ /kun dga' dbar bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs la
112b4(mdo 'grel): sngon/ /shAkya rnams kyis rang rig zhus/ /nges dris nges kyang maung+gal? bu/ /de la dri med ye shes kyi/ /gzigs pa bskyed nas mdun du ni/ /rang gi rigs 'khrungs gsung bar bskos/ /de yis ye shes spyan gyis ni/ /'das pa de nyid ji bzhin gzigs/ /yang dag dran paS
112b5(mdo 'grel): de rnams la/ /smras ba shAkya 'byung ba nyon?/ /ma lus 'jig rten 'di ni sngon/ /chu yi rang bzhin gcig nyid du/ /gnas tshe rlung gis bsrubs pa las chu ni 'o ma bzhin du 'gyur/ /chu der stug po nyid kyis ni/ /dal bus sra bar gyur pa'i tshe/ kha dog ro dang reg dang sgra?
112b6(mdo 'grel): dri yi rang bzhin sa gzhir? gyur/ /der ni las dag yongs zad pas/ /'ong bsal lha las ltung gur pa/ /de mtshungS yang dag yang dag rgyas/ /sems can snying stobs stobs lhag pa/ /rol chags pas rab rmongs pas/ /mdzub mo ro ni myangs byas nas/ /kha zas skyon
112b7(mdo 'grel): gyis lce ba dang/ /rtsub cing kha dog ban par gyur/ /der ba rnams kyis las ni/ /rim gyis sa lu 'khrungs par gyur /mun pas rnam par bcom rnams kyis/ /zhing dang khang pa yongs su bzung/ /de dag nyams srungs skyong la/ /rgyal rigs tshul dang ldan pa ni// 
113a1(mdo 'grel): skye bo mang bos bkur gyur pa/ /kun gyis bkur pa zhes pa byung/ /de yi rigs brgyud chen po la/ /dpal ldan mi bdag gso sbyong 'phags/ /grags pa'i me tog nyams med byung/ /chu gter las ni yongs 'du bzhin/ /de yi sras gyur 'khor los
113a2(mdo 'grel): sgyur/ /skye gnas skyes mi nang las nu/ /gang gi rigs gyur 'gro ba na/ /gdugs cig nyid ldan chen po byung/ /de yi rigs ni stong phrag gi/ rigs la mi bdag kri ba byung/ /de las yang ni 'phags skyes po/ /de yis bu ni nu bo la/ /dga' bas pho po gnas nas bskrad/ /de
113a3(mdo 'grel): nas gzhon nu thams cad ni/ /gcig tu 'dus nas rang yul la/ /chags dang bral bas thub pa che/ /ser skya zhes ba'i gnas su song/ /byis pa sgra tshan sgrogs pa yis/ /bsam gtan dus kyi bgegs byed pa/ /de dag grong khyer gzhan du ni/ /ser skya'i gzhi zhes de yis
113a4(mdo 'grel): sprul/ /dus kyis sa bdag bu la ni/ /mnyes gshin rjes su gdung ba yis/ /blon po rnams la gzhon nu ni/ /de dag khyer la shog ces smras/ /blon pos der smras rgyal po lags/ /de dag kun gyis grong mchog thob/ /bu tsha skyes shing dpal 'byor che/ /slar yang
113a5(mdo 'grel): dgugs par mi nus so/ /de dag rnams kyi pha yis der/ /nus sam mi nus rnam bsams tshe/ /de dag shAkya'i ming can gyur/ /de rnams rigs la mi yi grong/ /de yi rigs las spyod ni/ /stong phrag lnga pa lnga 'das tshe/ /dpal ldan sa yi bdag po ni/ /shing rta bcu
113a6(mdo 'grel): pa byung bar gyur/ /de yi rgyud la seng ge'i 'gram/ /sa yi bdag po byung gyur te/ /gang zhig seng ge bzhin du ni/ /rgyal po glang pos g.yul mi bzod/ /de sras thu bo zas gtsang ste/ /gzhan ni zas dkar de yi ni/ /rjes su skyes ba bre bo zas/ /bdud rtsi zas ni gzhon
113a7(mdo 'grel): nu'o/ /bu mo bzhi ste gcing? zhes dang/ /dkar bre bdud rtsi de bzhin no/ /zas gtsang sras ni bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gzhan ni dga' bo'o/ /de nas zas dkar sras gnyis ni/ /skar rgyal zhes dang bzang ldan no/ /bre bo zas kyi sras gnyis ni/ /ma 'gags de bzhin
113b1(mdo 'grel): chen po'o/ /kun dga' bo dang lhas byin zhes/ /bya ba bdud rtsi zas las 'khrungs/ /legs par rab rtags gtsang ma'i bu/ /dkar mo'i bu ni phreng ba can/ /bzang po bre bo ma yi bu/ /yangs pa can yang bdud rtsi'i bu/ /gang la rigs ni rab gnas pa/ /sgra gcan 'dzin ni bcom
113b2(mdo 'grel): ldan sras/ /zhes pa rab gsal ye shes rang bzhin zhes/ /rigs ni ji lta bzhin bshad thos gyur nas/ /mchog gyur? khyad par dag ba shAkya rnams/ /bcom ldan mthu yis rab tu 'khrungs par gyur/ /ces ba dge ba'i dbang bos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod
113b3(mdo 'grel): pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las shAkya byung ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu bdun ba'o// //gos dag gla rtsi'i dri dang ldan pa bzhin/ /skyes bu snying stobs dben pa'i gnyen ldan pa/ /bsod nams nye bar rdzogs pa'i mthu chen gang/ /ci yang de ni lus brgyar
113b4(mdo 'grel): med mi 'gyur/ /grong khyer rgyal bo'i khab kyi ni/ /'od ma'i tshal gyi nags nang na/ /srog chags 'gro kun yongs gdung la/ /rgyal ba thugs rje'i mtsho bzhugs tshe/ /gang gi nor gyis nor sbyin ni/ /nor gyi dregs pas long ba 'phrog/ dpal ldan gru 'dzin zhes bya ba/ /sa
113b5(mdo 'grel): bdag tsam par byung bar gyur/ /de yi bu ni btsas bar gyur/ /yid la re ba brgya ldan ba'o/ /nor rnams 'dod pas thob pa yis/ /rnam par 'byor pa bde ba'i grogs/ /gro bzhin dag la skyes gyur cing/ /bu de skyes pa'i tshe na des/ /dga' ba bye ba nyi shu ni/ /dbul po la byin gang gi
113b6(mdo 'grel): tshe/ /gro bzhin bya ba nyi shu zhes/ /de tshe byis pa de grogs gyur/ /gang gis rigs ni rnam brgyan pa/ /legs byas kyis ni 'byor pa bzhin/ /nor rnams kun dang lhan cig tu/ /rig pa thob cing 'phel bar gyur/ /pha yi lugs rnams bzung ba yis/ /bde ba nyid du ngal bso byas//
113b7(mdo 'grel): nam zhig nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las/ /'od zer tshogs bzhin mdun du ni/ /maung+gal gyi bu babs nas/ /'ongs pa la ni de yis smras/ /phyogs mtshams rab tu gsal byed pa/ /nyi me 'dra ba khyod ni su/ /skabs gsum dbang dam ri bong can/ /lha 'am nor gyi dbang po 'am//
114a1(mdo 'grel): de las nges smras bdag ni lha/ /ma yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /yon tan dpal ldan lha dbang gis/ /phyag byas dag gi slob ma yin/ /thub chen de la khyod kyi ni/ /dri med bsod snyoms rab tu stsol/ /snying stobs dag cing rgyas
114a2(mdo 'grel): pa las/ /thob pa'i longs spyod bcom ldan mnyes/ /zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan/ /gro bzhin rna bar song ba yis/ /nyi ma la gus rigs yin kyang/ /spu long rab tu rgyas par gyur/ /sngon skye'i bag chags kyis sbyar ba'i/ /rang bzhin gang la gang gnaS
114a3(mdo 'grel): pa/ /de la de ni brjod pas kyang/ /gsal ba nyid du rtogs par gyur/ /de yis de la chos pa'i snod/ /mtho ris skye bo la 'os pa/ /nyi shu gus bas chags pa dang/ /dad ldan sems kyis rab tu bskur/ /de nas gus pas phun tshogs nges/ /springs pa de dag
114a4(mdo 'grel): mdza' dag ni/ /lhag par rjes su 'dzin brtson pa'i/ /bcom ldan rang gis bzhes par gyur/ /gnas skabs der ni gus pa yis/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di/ /mi bdag la 'os chos ba'i snod/ /rang gis bzung nas byung bar 'gyur/ /zor? bzhin ?
114a5(mdo 'grel): springs longs spyod kyis/ /dri bzang de ni sa bdag gis/ /tshor nas brgya byin gyis springs pa/ /thams cad mchog ldan yin par bsams/ /lhung bzed lhag ma bcom ldan gyis/ /byin nas sa yi bdag pos myangs/ /zas de gro bzhin gyis springs bar/ /thos nas
114a6(mdo 'grel): ya mtshan 'dzin par gyur/ /de nas mi dbang bcom ldan la/ /phyag 'tshal rgyal bo'i pho brang du/ /rab tu song ste gro bzhin gyis/ /phun tshogs mchog tu rgyas par bsam/ /rang nyid der ni lha ru 'gro /grags chen 'di ni blta bar 'os/ /blon bcas de ltar
114a7(mdo 'grel): des byas nas/ /de yis bgrong pa brtsom par bstan/ /sa bdag rab nyid 'ong bar ni/ /brtson pa lugs shos gru 'dzin gyis/ /shes nas dben bdag tu bu/ /bro? bzhin bye ba la smras pa/ /ma bdag rigs kyis brten? sa'i bla/ /bu khyod lta ru'o? bzhes pa/
114b1(mdo 'grel): 'di ni mchog dang khyad par du/ /skyon dang bcas par bdag gis rtogs/ /sa dbang mtshon bya nyid gyur nas/ /gshog pa sbyor bar brtson pa yang/ /thogs pa med par 'joms 'gyur te/ /rgyud las 'phos pa'i mnga' bzhin no/ /shin tu khengs ba g.yog? rnams
114b2(mdo 'grel): kyi'ang/ /dgra yi 'os su gyur yin na/ /mngon par khengs pa gcig pu yi/ /sa yi bdag po slar yang ci/ /gzugs dang mtshong skal bzang dang/ /mthu dang 'byor ba thob pa lam 'gran las rang gi bu dag kyang/ khyad 'phags skye bos mi bzod do/ /sdang ba'i rang
114b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin skye bo la /'gran las rang gis bu dag kyang/ /khyad 'phags skye bos mi bzod do/ /yon tan bsgribs pas 'tsho bya gu /yon tan bsgribs pa'i pad+ma ni/ /tsha zer can gyi yod du 'ong/ /'phyar ba su yi sdang bya min/ /rab btud su yi snying? sdug min/ /ljon
114b4(mdo 'grel): pa rengs pa rlung gis bsgyel/ /rab tu dud pa srung bar byed/ /mngon par 'gro 'os sa skyong de/ /gal te khyod can rang nyid 'ongs/ /de la khyod grags rmongs pa 'di/ /dge legs slad du mi 'gyur ro/ /de slab 'di nas rang song ste/ /rgyu ? phung po dang mtshungs ba'i//
114b5(mdo 'grel): do shal skyes bu byin nas ni/ /phyag 'os gtso la phyag 'tshal byos/ /zhes pa pha yi tshig thos nas/ /gro bzhin bye ba rin chen gyis/ /rnam par brgyan ba'i gru zhon te/ /sa yi bdag po lta ru song/ /rgyal po'i pho brang song nas des/ /phreng cing mthong nas rgyal po la//
114b6(mdo 'grel): phyag 'tshal ngo shal de la phul/ /dpal ni dga' nas dgod pa bzhin/ /mi bdag mnga' ba'i spyan gyis ni/ /rkang pa gser gyi ba sdus mtshan/ /rang nyid 'ongs pa de mthong nas/ /ya mtshan las ni 'di skad snas/ /kye ma bsod nams mthu chen ldan/ gang dang grang ba tsam?
114b7(mdo 'grel): nyid na/ /sems kyi spyod tshul rab dad ba/ /sems can gnyen khyod ci zhig go /yon tan las ni dbang phyug mchog /nad med las ni legs pa'i grogs/ /dge ba khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das/ /'ong ma'i tshal nas cang mthong dam/ /da yi zhabs pad zung dag la/ /blta
115a1(mdo 'grel): bar 'os pa bdog 'dod do/ /skye bo legs las phyogs lhung ba/ /sa yi mgon pos 'di brjod tshe/ /gro bzhin bye ba nyi shus kyang/ /gus pa de la slar smas pa/ /lha cig khyod kyi bka' drin ni/ /mtshungs med dga' ba 'di nyid las/ /de
115a2(mdo 'grel): lta bdag gis bcom ldan ni/ /blta bar rigs pa nyid du gyur/ /ces brjod de dang lhan cig tu/ /lugs la mkhas pa sa yi bdag /gus bas de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ /lta ru rkang ba nyid kyis song/ /gro bzhin skyes pa'i nyin par nas/ /sa la ma reg rkang
115a3(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /'gro che g.yog pos chen po la/ /'os pa'i gos kyis sa gzhi g.yogs/ /bcom ldan la gus dul ba dang/ /sa? bdag la yang rjes las/ /ngo tsha bzhin du g.yog rnams kyis/ /sa la gos ni 'gebs pa bzlog /de nas gos ni bzlog pa'i tshe/ /lha yi
115a4(mdo 'grel): gos kyis sa gzhi g.yogs/ /bsod nams ldan ba'i nyer mkho rnams/ /'bad pa med par phun sum tshogs/ /lta yi gos rnams bzlog nas ni/ /de yis sa la rkang bzhag tshe/ /ri dags rgya mtsho dang bcas pa/ /g.yo med sa gzhi rnam bar g.yos/ /de nas sa
115a5(mdo 'grel): bdag dang 'grogs te/ /rgyal ba'i gnas su phyin nas des/ /bcom ldan 'das la rab bltas shing/ /de yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal byas/ /dga' dang zhi zhing dben ldan pa/ /mdun na gnas pa nga la ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs pa yi/ /bdud rtsis mngon
115a6(mdo 'grel): par dbang bskur mdzar/ /khams dang bsams pa bgal nyal/ /rang bzhin dag kyang sbyad nas des/ /bdan pa yang dag rtogs bya'i slad/ /de la chos ni bstan par mdzad/ /de yi 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri/ /rtse mo nyi shu ldan pa ni/ /ye shes rdo rje de yis bcom
115a7(mdo 'grel): rgyun tu zhugs ba'i gnas la rog? /de nas de yi lus la ni/ /rang byung skyes tshe mi yi bdag /ya mtshan gyur pas bcom ldan la/ /phyag 'tshal 'phral la rang nyid song/ /gro bzhin brtul zhugs drag ldan yang/ /bag chags lhag ma'i 'du byed las/ /nam
115b1(mdo 'grel): zhig gnyen dang lang ba spyod kyi/ /bde ba dran pa skyes par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'dzum dang bcas pa des/ /skyengs ba de pos bka' stsal pa/ /sems ni kun tu yongs zhugs pa/ /khyod kyi yongs su rtog 'di ni/ /dral pa 'am shin tu drangs pa yis/ /rgyud mangs dbyangs dang
115b2(mdo 'grel): bral ba yin/ /mnyam pa las ni sgra snyan 'gyur/ /de slad mnyam pa bsten par bya/ /zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas/ /phyi nas gdung ba rnam par spangs/ /thams cad zhi ba nye bar gyur/ /de yi dri med ye shes thob/ de yi mang byung grub pa de/ /mthong nas ya mtshan cha ba
115b3(mdo 'grel): yi/ /dge slong kun gyis bcom ldan la/ /dris shing des kyang bka' stsal pa/ /gro bzhin gyis ni dge ba'i las/ /skye ba gzhan la bsgrubs pa nyon/ /gang phyir bsod nams min pa yi/ /mthu ldan rmad byung phun tshogs min/ /sngon tshe yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bcom
115b4(mdo 'grel): ldan bde gshegs rnam par gzigs/ /gnyen ldan shes pa'i grong khyer du/ /ljongs ni rgyu zhing gshegs par gyur/ /der ni legs byas gus pa yis/ /zan la nye bar mgron du gnyen/ /nyin re res kyis de dag gis/ /khyim du rjes 'brang bcas pa gshegs/ /de
115b5(mdo 'grel): nas dbang po'i zla zhes pa/ /bram ze'i bu ni dbul po yi/ /res la bab tshe 'bad pa yis/ /de la 'os pa'? bza' ba sbyar/ /de yi 'bad ba chen po yis/ /gus bas gcang mar sbyar ba'i zas/ /gos kyis nor 'dzin g.yogs byas nas/ /rab tu btung de de la phul/ /longS
115b6(mdo 'grel): spyod de yi smon lam gyis/ /gro bzhin bya ba lha lta bu/ /gser gyi bu yi rkang pa can /nor 'dzin 'dir ni de gyur to/ /gos dang bral ba'i sa gzhi la/ /'di yis nam yang reg pa med/ 'di nyid phyir na de yin ni/ /rkang pas rag la sa g.yos gyur/ /ces pa bde
115b7(mdo 'grel): gshegs gsung ni bdud rtsi ltar dkar ba/ /chams kyi 'od bzhin rab tu gsal ba'i rang bzhin dag/ dge? slong tshogs kyi thugs ni rnam bar mi g.yeng pas/ /mchog tu 'thungs nas dgab? bstan pa'i slang du gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i
116a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi ? shing las grong shin bye ba'i shu? pa'i? rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //mi sdun? skye bo ngan pa'i gnod ba bzod dka' chen po yis/ /bsam pa che rnams
116a2(mdo 'grel): bsam ba rnam par 'byung ba nyid ma yin/ /sprul gyis rab bskor sa 'dzin dag gis dkrugs? par gyur mod kyang/ /rgya mtsho snying las bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin rang? tu gtang ba min/ /sngon tshe grong khyor rgyal po'i khag /ka lan dka' i gnas zhes pa/ /'ong ma'i tshil ni yi ge 'phrol?
116a3(mdo 'grel): na/ /bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par bzhugs/ /der ni rgyal po dgra mang rnams/ /rnam par skrag byed ral gri'i gnyen/ /gzugs can snying po zhes bya'i bu/ /ma skyes dag? zhes bya bar gyur/ /lhas byin zhes pa shAkya'i rigs/ /de yi snying po grogs por gyur/ /gang gi ngan
116a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i sngags kyis do/ /ro langs bzhin du brag por gyur/ /de yis nam zhig sa yi bdag /mdun sar bde shar 'khor la sgros/ /rgyal po bdag gis khyed bsten pa'i/ /'bras 'dir dung grub ba med/ /bde bar yid gcugs grogs ngag ni/ /phan tshun yid la re bskor
116a5(mdo 'grel): rdzun gyi rim gro bral ba la/ /grogs kyi sgra ni rab tu 'jug /gang 'di 'od ma'i nags tshal na/ /shAkya'i dge spyod bdor gnas pa/ /de bsad lha yis phyag byas pa/ /de yi gnas ni thob par 'dod/ /gang gis dgra pa mi tshogs dang/ /gang gis dgra bo choms pa dang
116a6(mdo 'grel): gang gis grags pa mi 'thob dang/ /gang gis khengs pa mi 'phel ba/ grogs kyi phun tshogs de yis ci/ /nor chen zhes ba'i grong khyer pas/ /de ni zas las mgron du gnyir/ /tshul 'chos can de dge slong dang/ /lhan cig nad par grong khyer 'od/ /rgyal po'i lam
116a7(mdo 'grel): du rab zhugs pa/ /de la glang chen nor skyong ni/ /khro bas 'ong zhing btum po? de/ /mngon du rab tu gtang bar byos/ /lhas byin gyis ni de smras tshe/ /mi bdag grogs la mi rtas? gshin bas/ sangs rgyas mthu ni bsams byas nas/ /gdong smad ci yang mi smrar gyur//
116b1(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i grogs kyis ngan rgyugs pa'i/ /ltas byin dag kyang phyir byung nas/ /glang po'i blon po chen po la/ /do shal rngan par byin nas smras/ /dge slong dge sbyong ba rgyas bsko'nas/ /nad bar grong khyer 'ong bar 'gyur/ /ngal khyod kyis glang be che/ /btang bar byos
116b2(mdo 'grel): shes sa bdag gsung/ /lhas byin tshig thos gnyis 'thung gi/ bdag pos de bzhin zhes pa smras/ /gang phyir lug dang rmongs pa'i phreng/ /gcig song rjes su ltur ba nyid/ /thams cad mkhyen pas sdig can gyi/ /sems kyi bsam pa mkhyen mong kyang/ /dge
116b3(mdo 'grel): spong lnga brgya dag dang ni/ /thabs cig yang dag byon bar gyur/ /de nas glang chen bdag po yis/ /gnang du bsnan bkye glang po che/ /drag po khang bzang rkang 'thung 'joms/ /khro bas long bas de mdun brgyugs/ /yongs su 'dril las lcags kyu ni/ /lci ba yi
116b4(mdo 'grel): yang dbang mi 'gyur/ /mi srun rig byed ldan pa bzhin/ /sngar dang rgyags bas dri mar byas/ /lan gcig lon? par rna bsgyod pas/ /bsten pa'i gdud ba la chags pa/ /bung ba rnams kyis srog 'joms byed/ /bdag po ngan bas g.yog gi bzhin/ /khang ba'i
116b5(mdo 'grel): nyer tshes shing rnams ni/ /'joms pa de yis mngon par brgyugs/ /'jig rten 'bral la bros pa'i che/ /hA hA zhes pa chen po byung/ /de yi rna ba rab bskyod stabs kyis blangs ba'i rlung gis rab zags li khri'i rgyun gyi tshogs/ /bud med 'jigs pa'i gos
116b6(mdo 'grel): dmar lhung ba lta bur spyod pas rgyal po'i lam ni khengs gyur cing/ /rab gtum dbyug pa bslad 'dra'i sna ni g.yab mo'i tshogs 'gyed phyogs kyi bud med 'jigs pa yis/ /gdungs par gyur ba'i lan bu'i 'od ltar bud ba'i tshogs gtibs rnam par
116b7(mdo 'grel): 'phrul bas kun rmongs gyur/ /grong khyer bcom pas rab gdungs te/ /skye bo ku rus 'khrugs pa'i tshe/ /rab myos blo ldan lhas byin ni/ kha gam che ldan steng du 'dzegs/ /de ni bcom ldan 'dzin ba la/ /mchog tu lta ba 'dod par gyur/ /yon tan can rnams rab
117a1(mdo 'grel): bcom pas/ /gtum po dag ni yongs su tshim/ /der ni glang pos rab sgrag nas/ /dge slong thams cad bros pa'i tshe/ /dge slong kun dga' gcig pu nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag las der/ /gdong
117a2(mdo 'grel): lnga ldan pa lnga 'thon te/ /'jigs su rung ba'i ral pa can/ /de yi sen mo 'od tshogs bzhin/ /dreg pa'i rjed byed zlog byed pa/ /de yi dri tshogs gnyis 'thung ni/ /chu dang lci ba zag byed cing/ /'phral la nyid du phyir phyogs gyur/ /so ldan dregs pas dbul ba
117a3(mdo 'grel): nyid/ /mthong zhing mgyogs par bros pas der/ /phyogs bcu rnams ni sreg byed kyis/ /rab tu 'bar bar mthong bar gyur/ /de yis 'gro ba me 'bar zhing/ /'bar ba'i dra bas dkrigs mthong nas/ /ston pa'i zhabs kyi pad+ma'i drung/ /bsil bdag tu nye bar
117a4(mdo 'grel): song/ /sred pa mngon zhum yid ni bsam ldan bzhin gyi mdzes pa rab tu nyams gyur cing/ /nyon mongs dro ba'i dbugs rgod de yi lag pa chags pas long ba dag gi ni/ /mang du mdzad pa rtsom bzhin bkren pa nyer gnas sbyin pas dman pa'i sbrang rtsi
117a5(mdo 'grel): 'thung/ /ca co sgrogs par rtsom zhing yongs gdung dman par song ste khung ltar spyod par gyur/ /ston pa thugs rje'i rgya mtsho yis/ /zhabs kyi drung du 'ongs gyur cing/ /'jigs pa de la 'khor lo dang/ /bkra shis kyis mtshan phyag gis reg?/ bum pa
117a6(mdo 'grel): phyag bkod de la ni/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ /gnas skabs dman pa 'di ni bu/ /rang las nyid kyis thob pa yin/ /khyod lus sha yi ri bo 'di/ /dben pa'i snang ba dag gis sprin/ /rmongs pa'i tshogs kyis khur gyur ba/ /sdig pa mchog
117a7(mdo 'grel): tu bskrun pa yin/ /bcom ldan snying rjes brlan pas 'di/ /brjod tshe 'jigs pa'i glang po de/ /yid brtan thob nas gdags thag gis/ btags bzhin g.yo med nyid du gyur/ /lhas byin gyi ni brtag pa dang/ /glang po drag po chen po yang/ /nyams
117b1(mdo 'grel): cho bgegs med dga' ba yi/ /skye bo ya mtshan skyes bar gyur/ /de nas khyim bdag khyim du ni/ /zas ni rab tu blang mdzad nas/ /dge slong dag dang stabs gcig tu/ /bcom ldan nags su gshegs brtson gyur/ /glang po dbang yang mngon btung de/ /rgyal ba'i
117b2(mdo 'grel): zhabs kyi pad+ma la/ /lag pas reg par byas nas ni/ /glang pos lus ni btang bar gyur/ /rgyal chen bzhi ba'i lha dag tu/ /nye bar 'khrungs shing mdzes pa ni/ /dri ma med de 'phral nyid la/ /bde bar gshegs pa lta ru 'ongs/ /rang gi bsti gnas phyin gyur
117b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs te/ /nor bu'i rna cha rab 'bar pa/ /nyi ma 'dra ba des phyag 'tshal/ /de yi dbud rgyan cod ban gyis/ /'od kyi yal 'dab rgyas gyur pa/ /sprin gyi phreng ba brgya byin gyi/ /gzhu yis khyab pa bzhin du mdzes/ /sdig pa bral
117b4(mdo 'grel): des ston pa yis/ /mdun du dul bas 'khod nas ni/ /lha yi me tog snying stobs bzhin/ /dkar bas btor nas de smras pa/ /yongs su sam pa'i gnas gyur la/ /bcom ldan khyod kyi zhabs dag gis/ /padmo la ni reg bas bdag/ skabs dan sdug bsngal
117b5(mdo 'grel): gdung ba zhi/ /kye ma bcom ldan gzigs pa gdung ba'i dug skyon tsha ba zhi bar byed/ /ci yang bdud rtsi'i char ba zhi zhing bsngags 'os 'jam zhing yid du 'ong/ /gang gis gsal bar reg pas mchog tu rtsub pa'i rnam 'gyur gnod pa dag/ rnam par btang nas
117b6(mdo 'grel): rmongs ba'i phyugs kyang nang du rab tu zhib? bsten/ /de skad brjod bar byed ba de'i/ /srid pa zhi slad bcom ldan gyis/ /yang dag bden pa mthong byed pa/ /dge ba'i chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /dbu rgyan mu tig 'od dkar pa'i/ /mgo yis ston pa'i zhabs
117b7(mdo 'grel): dag la/ /phyag 'tshal srid pa'i 'khrul ba la/ /dgod pa bzhin du de rabs so/ /bzhin ras zla bas nam mkha' i gzhi/ /rab gsal byas nas de song tshe/ /dge slong gis dris bcom ldan gyis/ /de yi byung ba'i mdza' bka' stsal/ /sngon dus gzhan la ston ba
118a1(mdo 'grel): ni/ 'od srungs zhes pa'i bstan pa la/ /rab tu byung bar gyur kyang 'di/ /bslab pa'i gnas la gus ma gyur/ /ma gus pa las glang pa yi/ /longs spyod nyid dang dge 'dun ni/ /bsten las bden ba'i lta stobs kyis/ /'jug tu brtan pa 'dzin pa thob/ /skye ba snga mar bsgrubs pa'i las/ /su zhig gi yang mi bzlogs te/ /gus par spyad byas sems ldan la/ /las kyis nye bar bstan nas 'brel/ /'jigs rung gnod pa de la ni/ /dge slong kun gyis bdag btang la/ /de yang kun dga' bos ma yin/ /sngon tshe 'grogs
118a2(mdo 'grel): pa mnyan bar gyis/ /ri bong mtshan ma ltar bsil mtshar/ /gang ba gang ba'i bzhin zhes ba'i/ /dad pa'i rgyal po spun dga' i/ /yid du 'ong bar sngon gyur to/ /nam zhig pa ra NA si na/ /sa yi bdag po tshangs sbyin gyi/ /tshangs pa ldan pa'i rdzing bu ni/ /dga' bar gang ba'i bzhin
118a3(mdo 'grel): gyis phyin/ /g.yo ba'i pad+mas bkrigs pa yi/ /se 'brus yongs su ser ba de/ /dang po dag ni lnga brgya dang/ /mtsho skyes can der rnam par rol/ /sngon gyi bsod nams mthu yis ni/ /khyad 'phags gzugs rab 'bar ba de/ /bya ba dor bskye bo yi/ /g.yo med mig gis
118a4(mdo 'grel): mthong bar gyur/ /de ni der gnas sa bdag gis/ /thos nas de dag blta 'dod pas/ /rgya yis 'tsho ba mkhas pa dag /de bzung slad du btang bar gyur/ /pad+ma can gyi rol pa'i 'dzum/ /dkar ba'i 'od zer de bzung tshe/ /dad pa lnga brgya dag gis ni/ /di btang mgyogs
118a5(mdo 'grel): par rab tu song/ /gcig ni de la gzhungs bzang pas/ /bcings pa med kyang bcings pa bzhin/ /mdza' ba'i zhabs pas dbang byas nas/ /de yi don du gdung zhing gnas/ /de nas rgyal pos dang pa yi/ /rgyal po de yis bzung ba dang/ /gnyis pa mdza' bas bcings
118a6(mdo 'grel): pa yang/ /mthong nas ya mtshan de dag btang/ /dad pa gang ba'i bzhin de dag/ de yi rjes 'brang kun dga' bo/ /des ni dpa' yang bdag btang nas/ /song ba'i dge? slong dang? pa nyid/ /gang gis grags pa pha rol gyis/ /yid kyi glegs bu la bris pa/ /ba ra Na sir sngon dus
118b1(mdo 'grel): na/ /sa bdag a zhes pa byung/ /stong dang g.yul 'gyed lho phyogs pa/ /? gyi dus su sngon 'gro zhing/ /lag pa'i mtshon zhes grags ba ni/ /de yi bslu med grogs por gyur/ /nam zhig 'jigs rung g.yul zhugs tshe/ /blon po lnga brgyad pa gis ni/ /mi bdag de btang 'jigS
118b2(mdo 'grel): nas song/ /lag pa'i mtshon gyis btang ma gyur/ /sa skyong de ni de? nyid de/ /blon po de dag dge slong rnams/ /lag pa'i mchon? de kun dga' bo/ /'di nyid nga ni btang? ma gyur/ /sngon gyi skye ba gzhan la yang/ /bdag ni seng ge khron par ltung/ /wa skyes g.yog gis skad cig las//
118b3(mdo 'grel): spangs pa gang deng dge slong rnams/ /wa skyes cig gi sder mo yis/ /ring du bskos nas bdag thar byas/ /de nyid kun dga' bo 'di ste/ /da lta bdag gi rjes 'brang gyur/ /sngon tshe ri dags khyu yi bdag /rgya yi zhags pas bcings par gyur/ /de yi rjes 'brang ri drags rnams/ /sred
118b4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'ong bas skrag nas bros/ /mig chu ldan pa'i ri dags mo/ /rjes su chags pas ma btang ste/ /mdza' ba'i lcags sgrog gis bcings pas/ /g.yo ba med par gyur pa bzhin/ /de nas sred ldan grongs? gyur cing/ /ri dags gsod par brtson mthong nas/ /de yis smras pa thog
118b5(mdo 'grel): mar ni/ /mnga' yis bdag gis 'tsho bo phro? gis?/ /shes pa de yi gsal ba yi/ /tshig dang mdza' bas mtshar skyes pa/ /rdzom? bya ba ni byams pa yis/ /ri dwags ri dwags mor bcas btang/ /ri dwags khyu yi bdag ded// ri dwags mo de kun dga' bo/ /de ltar mdza' ba'i
118b6(mdo 'grel): 'bral pa 'di/ /sngon gyi spyod pas rjes su zhugs/ /shes pa bde gshegs gsung thos dag slang? na/ /de dag thams cad ngo chos zhum pa bzhin/ /'dod pas brlan pas kun dga' dang bcas dang/ /'os kyis kun dga' kun dga' i bzhin bad bltas/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang
118b7(mdo 'grel): pos byas ba'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri? shing las nor skyod gis rtogs pa brjod ba'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// //gang zhig snying stobs ldan pa'i snying stobs kyis/ /khyad par sems can dag ni bde ba'i rgyu/ /lus ni zhig kyang
119a1(mdo 'grel): khro ba'i me rnams dag/ mchog tu zhi bar 'gyur de rgyal gyur cig/ chos bstan pa la sngon 'dug pa/ /dge slong kauN+DA? n+yi yi/ /gtam gyi zhar la dge? slong gis/ /dris shing bcom ldan gyis bka' stsal/ /ba ra NA sid ga tu ni/ /sa bdag tshangs
119a2(mdo 'grel): pas byin gyi bu?/ /kA? shi? mdzes pa zhes pa dang/ /dus kyis zhes bya ba byung/ /rgyal tshab dbang ni bskur 'os pa/ /gzhon nu kA shi mdzes pa yis/ /rgyal srid chos dang chos min kyi/ /rang bzhin yun ring dpyad nas bsams/ /lang tsho skad cig 'jig pa dang//
119a3(mdo 'grel): srog na chu rlabs g.yo ba'i tshe/ /rgyal srid rmi lam bag ma len/ /rmongs pa'i rtsa 'dir bdag blo med/ /chags pa'i tsho'i?  rab mang zhing/ /yang yang sgyu dang rmongs rang bzhin/ /'khor ba snying po med pa la/ /'phyon ma du bzhin bden pa med/ /de slad khyim nas
119a4(mdo 'grel): khyim med par/ /bdag ni sdig med rab tu 'byung/ /ral gri'i spyod la reg 'gyur ba'i/ /rnam par 'byor la chags pas ni/ /de ltar rnam bsams rgyal po'i bu/ /dri med dben pa'i rnam pa can/ /nags su 'gro bar 'dod pa yis/ /sa skyong la ni mngon phyogs
119a5(mdo 'grel): smras/ /rgyal po bdag la mngon phyogs kyis/ /tshogs ni nye bar 'kho ba med/ /rgyal tshab dbang ni bskur 'os pa'i/ /kun tu brtson pa bzlog par mdzod/ /yab lags gsod 'ching 'jigs dang gdud/ /skyed byed rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs/ /khro bo'i
119a6(mdo 'grel): mi yis rab gdung ba/ /'di dag bdag ni yongs mi 'dod/ /dur khrod che yi rtse mo bzhin/ /shin tu drag po'i spyod pas khyab/ /rab tu 'bar bas bdag dpal/ /su yi chags bral skyed mi byed/ /gdugs kyi snang ba yang dag bsgribs/ /rnga yab? ngag gi rlung gis
119a7(mdo 'grel): bskyod/ /rgyags bas myos pas yi dbang/ /sdig pa dag gi spyod la ltung/ /'jam pa'i longs spyod gos goms pa/ /shin tu gzhon bas bdag gis/ lus la 'jug tu nyon mongs kyis/ /rdo rje mi bzad 'bab par 'gyur/ /rgyun tu bsam pa'i gdung ba
119b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /sred pa drag po'i tshor? can/ /rgyal srid rim bsten 'di rnams kyi/ /rmongs shing rgyal ba mi zlogs so/ /gnas dang gnas su lce gnyis pa/ /'khyogs cing rin chon sgron ma can/ /skyon khung la lha rgyal po yis/ /bya ba gzhan dag gsod ba yin/ /mi bdag brgya
119b2(mdo 'grel): lhag drigs? ldan ma/ /bdag las gzhan du mi 'grong sems/ /gces bzhon sa bdag dag gi dpal/ /do shal rnga yab dag gis rgod/ /'das pa'i sa bdag dran pa las/ /rgyal po'i dpal ni rmongs pas bsgribs/ /rlung yab kyis bsal shugs rings dang/
119b3(mdo 'grel): mu tig mchi ma'i? rgyun ldan bzhin/ /de slad rab tu byung ba yis/ /skye ba'i lugs ni rnam spangs nas/ /chog shes bsil ba'i grib ma can/ /yongs gdung zhi ba'i nags su 'gro/ /rtag tu gnod ba'i lus 'di yang/ /ngal bso med par 'khor ba mi/ /lam gyi mgon pos
119b4(mdo 'grel): bkur dka' nas/ /sa? yi khur lta slar yang ci/ /zhes pa mchog tu mi snyan pa/ /bu? yi tshig thos sa yi bdag/ rab tu 'byung ba'i sgra yis 'jigs/ /mya ngan ldan pas de la smras/ /chen por gyur ba'i rigs 'di dang/ /yang dang rgyal srid 'phel ba'i slad/ /rgan
119b5(mdo 'grel): po bdag gis bu khyod la/ /de? ba mchog tu rnam par bcings/ /mnyes shin bdag? gi brtag pa ni/ /dus min nyams par bya mi dgos/ /nags su khyod kyi lang tsho 'di/ /gsang du mdzes ba'i 'os ma yin/ /dam pa'i sngags ni goms par ldan/ /legs pa'i lta ba la chaD
119b6(mdo 'grel): pa/ /dbang po thul ba'i mi bdag ni? kun tu nags med? dka' thub yin/ /rang gnas yin yang mtsho skyes ni/ /gos pa med par chu la gnas/ /nags nang yin yang mya ngan med/ /bud med rkang pas bsnun? ba mthong/ /rang khyim rnyed bla'i longs spyod kyis// ji srid
119b7(mdo 'grel): mig ni rmus byung ba/ /de srid yul ni 'di dag rnams/ /skad cig yongs su gtang bar nus/ /rang gis skye bo nad gi ni/ /bde ba yongs btang khyim las 'thon/ /nyams myong? longs spyod bral ba yi/ /nyon mongs skye bos mi bzod do/ /khyim du chos ni bde ba yis/
120a1(mdo 'grel): nyan dang dran dang sgrub par byed/ /nags su skam po rnams kyi ni/ /nyan dang dran dang bya ba skam/ /rtswa yis tshogs kyi khab rtse yis/ /rkang pha dmar skyes zag byed ba/ /de las 'jig rten pha rol tu/ /sdug bsngal gzhan bci zhig 'byung/ /skye bo za ba rnams la
120a2(mdo 'grel): blta/ /bags pa rus pa'i lhag mar gyur/ /rtag tu gzhan gyis byin pa za/ /dka' thub can rnams yi dwags bzhin/ /bu kwa'i nags na gnas pa ni/ /rdul gyis gos dang mtshungs pa ste/ /tshangs bar spyod pa skyod pa ni/ /chu srin 'byung gnas skoms pa yin/ /nags bsregS
120a3(mdo 'grel): me yi du ba rab rgyas khro gnyer ldan pa'i bzhin/ /pha? wang gnas dad 'ug pa'i phug ni stug por gyur pa'i khyim/ /seng ges bsad ba'i so gnyis khrag gis dmar por byas gyur ba'i/ /nags su khyim btang nas ni su zhig dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'dod ldan dag
120a4(mdo 'grel): ni dul ba 'dod cing dul ba dang ldan sngo bsangs rtse dga' dran/ /tshim pa shin tu drag bo'i brtul zhugs la dga' bkres par gyur ba zas dag 'dod/ /gcig pu dag ni skye bo'i tshigs 'dod skye bo'i tshigs gyis yid byung nags tshal 'dod/ /de ni mchog tu tshol ba
120a5(mdo 'grel): yongs btang slar yang skye bos smad par 'gyur ba thob/ /bdag ni yongs su bor nas bu/ /nags su 'gro bar mi 'os so/ /khyod ni nags na gnas pa dag /dgra rnams yid la re ba yin/ /mu tig gsal bar rgong byed ba/ /rgyal bo'i phun tshogs nga rgyal can//
120a6(mdo 'grel): btang na slar yang mi 'ong ste/ /ral gri dag gis 'khri shing bzhin/ /pha yis lan mang de brjod kyang/ /de ni des pa las mi g.yos/ /bdag nyid chen po'i brtan ba ni/ /rdo rje ri yis rtse mo mtshungs/ /ma dang blon po rnams dang ni/ /gnyen dang grong pa che rnams kyis/ /gsol
120a7(mdo 'grel): ba btab kyang nyin gsum de/ /zla dang smra ba med par gyur/ /rgyal bor spyod dam dka' thub can/ /'di ni rang gi 'dun bas 'tsho/ /'jig rten 'di ni 'dod rjes 'jug/ ces ba blon pos rgyal la smras/ /mchi me dang? bcas sa skyong gis/ /ji zhig ltar skyes gnang nas de//
120b1(mdo 'grel): mi smra grong khyer ba rnams du/ /thub pa'i dka' thub nags su song/ /chags bral yongs su smin pa yis/ /der ni sems can thams cad la/ /byams pa dag byas brtse ba dag/ /dben pa'i grogs su de yis bsten/ /de yi mthu yis de dag tu/ /sa? na gnas pa thams
120b2(mdo 'grel): cad kyi/ /rang bzhin kho na gyi me spangs nas/ /sems kyi spyod tshul bsil bar gyur/ /ri dwags tshogs la rab chags rngon ba rnams kyis srog chags gsod pa rab btang zhing/ /seng gis glang chen 'joms pa dang brla yan lag kun gyis 'grogs par gyur ba la/ /
120b3(mdo 'grel): der ni mngon pa'i bud med mu tig tshogs rnams spangs pa'i skad skabs rma bya yi/ /gros kyis dbul zhing shugs rings dang ldan chags bral mchu ni rab tu skams par gyur/ /chu gter ska rags can sa bnyad?/ /'byung ba kun la bzod ba ste/ /bzod ba smra ba zhes par ni/ /kA
120b4(mdo 'grel): shi'i mdzes pa de grags gyur/ /skabs dor sa gzhi mgu ba yi/ tshangs pa byin ni mtho ris so/ /'byung po rnams kyi mya ngan bzhin/ /dus kyis nis skyong gyur/ /de nas rab bung ba'i tshigs/ /g.yo ba'i smin 'khyogs bzhin ras log /thub ba'i dul ba la sdang ba'i/ /dpyad
120b5(mdo 'grel): ni yang dag byung bar gyur/ /ri dwags mig can khengs pa dag/ nyams ba'i pho nya tsu ta ni/ /rab tu rgyas ba chags ba yis/ /myos ba'i rgyu yis 'od kyis mdzes/ /mya ngan med pa dmar po la/ /logs gnas 'khri shing gis 'khyud dogs/ /phrag dog can bzhin me tog
120b6(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /mal ya yi rlung gis phrogs/ /khu byug gis rgyas skyed mos tshal/ /lang tsho rgyas pa de yi tshe/ /nags tshal blta ba'i ltad mo la/ /rgyal po btsun mo'i tshogs bcas so/ /kha dog sna tshogs me? tog rnams/ /lhung ba'i tshogs kyis rab spras pa/ /dga' ba'i nags
120b7(mdo 'grel): tshal lta zhing de/ /ngal bus dka' thub nags su phyin/ /nags kyis gzhi mdzes pa der/ /mdzes ma'i grogs dang yun ring du/ /rol cing brtsa dga' ngal bso bas/ /skad cig nyid ni thob bar 'gyur/ /sngon adu me tog 'dzum pa yis/ /snye ma? rab tu thu zhing de ?/ /btsun mo'i
121a1(mdo 'grel): tshogs kyis bud med rnams/ /g.yo ba'i 'khri shing bzhin du song/ /skabs der bzod par smra ba ni/ /dben pa'i gnas na rab dgyes bas/ /zhib rjes su sems byed cing/ /gcig tu g.yo ba med bar gnas/ /mi dman kun dga' la spro zhing/ /
121a2(mdo 'grel): mkhas ba rnams kyis phyag byar bas/ /ring kyang mdzes sdug ma nyams ba/ thog ma'i ri bong can shar bzhin/ /yid 'ong yongs su gyur ba yi/ /ri mo'i dbyibs ni mdzes pa dag /ri mo rnyings ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /gzugs kyi stong bar ma gyur pa'o/ /sems
121a3(mdo 'grel): kyi me long dag byed pa'o/ /de mthong rgyal ba'i btsun mo'i tshogs/ /de dag ri mor bris pa bzhin/ /de nyid du ni g.yo med gnas/ /de nas mi bdag myur sad pas/ /mdun du btsun mo mthong ma gyur/ /nags su bltas pas thub pa la/ /yongs su bskor nas
121a4(mdo 'grel): gnas pa mthong/ /de mthong nyid kyis lag 'gro ni/ /dbugs rbod phrag dog dug gis 'khrugs/ /hal hal bzhin du ni/ /rab drag tshig gi tshul gyis spros/ /thub ba'i mtshan mar bcos ba yi/ /chos kyis mtshar ba khrod 'dra su/ /blun po rnams kyi snying phrog
121a5(mdo 'grel): khyod/ /nges bar bud med rnams la 'dris/ /gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog bsam gtan/ /de yi bgegs bzlog bzlas ba dang/ /drang bo'i yid rton dka' thub ni/ /g.yo rgyu can gyi thabs mchog yin/ /kha mngar sgyu ldan shing kun can/ /khyod kyi pags pa
121a6(mdo 'grel): nags kyi ni/ /dug gi ljon pa bcad pa bzhin/ /kye ma rmongs pa bskyed pa yin/ /thub par rtag pa lta bu'i chas/ /spyos pa slar yang 'di 'dra ba/ /nang gi de nyid tshul 'phos kyis/ /bsgrub pa'ang su zhig dag gi rigs/ /sa bdag khro bas 'di brjod tshe/ /khro med
121a7(mdo 'grel): phan ba'i bsam pa can/ /bzod ba smra bas rnam 'gyur dang/ /bral ba'i yid kyis de la smras/ /bdag ni thub ba bzad bar smras/ /bdag la dogs ba bya mi 'os/ /mdzes ma 'di dag ni rnams dang ni/ /? shing dag la bye brag med/ /ces pa de yis brjod thos nas
121b1(mdo 'grel): da ni khyod kyi bzod pa blta'o/ /zhes pa brjod cing mi bdag gis/ /ral gris de yis lag gnyis bcad/ /bzod pa'i ngang tshul khyad par duAng/ /rnam 'gyur med pa de mthong nas/ /ral gri la yang khro ldan pas/ /de yi rkang pa gnyis kyang bcad/ /lam du dge ma med pa
121b2(mdo 'grel): ster/ /lce yis sun ni 'byin par byed/ /'jug tu lus ni yongs su bcad/ /mi srun pa rnams khyi bzhin no/ /brdegs par gyur kyang bzod par chags/ /phung po bcad kyang smra bcad ldan/ /drag par gdungs kyang bsil par gnas/ /drag po rnams kyang thang shing
121b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /lag pa rkang ba des bcad pa'i/ /gdung ba drag po brnag byas nas/ /khro pas 'khrugs pa'i yid dag ni/ /bzod pas bsrung zhing de yis bsams/ /ji ltar 'di yis las gzhan rnams/ /btad nas bdag gis lus bcad pa/ /de bzhin bdag
121b4(mdo 'grel): gis 'khor ba yi/ /mi bzang nyon mongs gcod gyur cig /mi bdag khro bas rmongs pa yi/ /thub ba sbun zlar ma shes par/ /grong khyer song che rdul gyis/ /mya ngan byed bzhin dri mar gyur/ /de nas de yi bzod ba'i lha/ /de sdug bsngal pas rgyal la khros//
121b5(mdo 'grel): grong khyer du ni mu ge dang/ /yams dang char med nyer 'tshe byas/ /rgyal bos thub la gnod byas las/ /lha rnams khros te bskyed ba'i skyon/ /mtshan ma mkhan las shes nas ni/ /de la dad par byed du song/ /de yi zhabs gnyis la btung nas/ /bzod? ba
121b6(mdo 'grel): mdzod ces brjod nas de/ /phyi nas 'gyod pa'i mya ngan gyis/ /sems dang bral ba bzhin du gyur/ /bzod pa smra bas der smras pa/ /bdag la khro ba chung ngu 'ang med/ /las kyi ri mos yongs bcad bas/ /rgyal bo 'di 'dra myong bya nyid/ /thams cad zad byed
121b7(mdo 'grel): rang dbang du/ /des par myong bya rtsi ba ni/ /brtan min yon tan min don min/ /dka' thub ma yin rjes min/ /skye ba'o? gzhi la rtsa ba'i stobs cha ldan pa rang gi las/ /sar skyes dag gi 'bras bu dus gyis yongs su smin ba ni/ /rnam par bkra zhing tha dad
122a1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa brgyud mar bskyed pa yi/ /sa bon nang na gnas pa skye bo rnams kyis yongs su spyod pa yin/ /de slang sa bdag khyod la bdag /rnam 'gyur ci yang gong ma yin/ /bden pa 'di yis bdag gi khrag/ /'o ma nyid du gyur la ltos/ /yan
122a2(mdo 'grel): lag bcad kyang bdag gi yid/ /gal te sdig med gyur pa na/ /bden pa de yis bdag gi ni/ /yan lag de dag 'byor par shog /ces pa dag pa'i blo ldan de'i/ /mchog tu bden ba brjod pa las/ /'phral? la yan lag de dag nyid/ /'byar nas rnal du
122a3(mdo 'grel): gnas pa thob/ /de nas mi bdag cod pan ni/ /zhabs la thag? pas de la smras/ /thub pa khyod ni mthu chen po/ /de las dka' thub kyis ci bzhed/ /rmongs pas long pa sdig pa yi/ /g.yang la lhung bar gyur pa bdag /snying rje'i gter khyod bsod nams
122a4(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /lag pa'i 'tshel sas gdon par 'os/ /sa dbang gis der gsol btab pa'i/ /thub pas de la lan smras pa/ /bying ba rnams ni legs bsgral dang/ /bcings pa rnams kyang 'grol ba dang/ /'jigs pa rnams ni dbugs dbung dang/ rnam par
122a5(mdo 'grel): rmongs rnams thar bya'i slad/ /rgyal po bla med yang dag par/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bdag don gnyer/ /bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub gang tshe bdag gis thob/ /de tshe ye shes ral gri yis/ /khyod kyi rmongs pa bcad par bya/ /thub pas de brjod
122a6(mdo 'grel): de la ni/ /khams bde byas nas rang gnas song/ /rgyal po'i gnas su mi bdag kyang/ /de nyid yin la sems shing song/ /bzod pa smra ba de nyid ?/ dus sa kauN+Di n+ya 'di/ /da lta yang dag rdzogs byang chub/ /thob nas bdag gis 'di bsgral ? zhes pa
122a7(mdo 'grel): bde gshegs zhal gyi pad+ma las 'khrungs pa/ /yid 'ong sbrang rtsi'i gzugs brnyan rab tu dang ba'i gsung/ /zung ba'i tshogs bzhin dge slong tshogs kyis rab 'thungs nas/ /rab tu dga' ba rgyas pa mi yang byung bar gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i
122b1(mdo 'grel): dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las kA shi mdzes pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu pa'o// //sems can snying po drang zhing legs spyod bsod nams gnas de su yang
122b2(mdo 'grel): phyag byar 'os/ /chos lam bgrod pa'i bgegs dang shin tu dan par spyod de su yang smad par 'os/ /gang gi spyod pa bkra ba rnam dpyad yun ring spu long rgyas pas byugs gyur pa/ /de dag bsngags na skye bo mig chu ldan zhi de mi smra nyid du 'gyur bar mtshungs//
122b3(mdo 'grel): dge slong rnams kyi lhas byin gyi/ /zhar la sngon dris bcom ldan gyis/ /sngon gyis byung ba'i mdza' dag la/ /rten pa'i mdza' ni bka' stsal pa/ /ba ra NA sir mi yi dbang/ /dbang po'i sde chen zhes pa byung/ /gang gi dpal gyis sa yi dbang/ /thams cad
122b4(mdo 'grel): skyengs pa nyid du gyur/ /de yi lha mo grags pa bzhin/ /yid 'ong zla ba'i 'od ces gyur/ /gang gi bden pa'i mthu yis ni/ /rmi lam bden pa nyid du gyur/ /dus der nags su ri dags kyi/ /khyu yi bdag po byung gyur pa/ /gser gyi logs zhes bya ba'i ming//
122b5(mdo 'grel): thob cing gser gyi rang bzhin snang/ /mu tig do shal gsal ba'i khongs/ /rin chen mthing gis spras 'dra'i 'od/ /gang gi mig gi zer ma ni// nags kyi dpal gyi rgyan du mdzes/ /byu ru'i 'khri shing rwa co dang/ /rin chen bkra ba'i pags pa rgyas/ /ngo mtshar bdud
122b6(mdo 'grel): rtsi chu gter gyi/ /dba' rlabs de yi 'od zer mdzes/ /byang chub sems dpar zhugs gyur pa/ /de yi gzugs ni mdzes par gyur/ /gang phyir legs byas ri mo yi/ /dang po'i mtshan nyid gzugs bzang nyid/ /de yi grogs po bya rog ni/ /rgan po'i ring du mthong
122b7(mdo 'grel): bar gyur/ /rngon pa tshol bas 'jigs pa yis/ /de ni mchog tu phyogs rnams blta/ /de dag phan tshun dga' ba yis/ /gtam gyis dben sar rnam par rtse na/ /dud 'gro la yang snga ma yi/ /bsod nams rnams gyi mi skad 'byung/ /nam zhig chu ni tshol byed cing//
123a1(mdo 'grel): byu? yi mgon de rjes 'brang bcas/ /lbu ba'i phreng ldan chu klung gi/ 'jug ngogs dag tu song bar gyur/ /der ni dgra rnams kyis bcings nas/ /chung 'phangs cho nges 'debs pa'i mi/ /shin tu che ba'i chu rgyun gyis/ /khyed nas 'gro ba de yis mthong/ /de
123a2(mdo 'grel): yi cho? nga'i sgra dag ni/ /shin tu che zhing rang ba thos/ /ri dags thams cad mgren pa ni/ /'khyogs po'i? rnam 'phrul ldan pas bros/ /gser gyi logs ni de yi tshe/ /brtse ba'i zhabs pang dbang du byas/ /mda' yas gnang du phug pa bzhin/ /de nyid du ni g.yo? med gnas//
123a3(mdo 'grel): de ni gdon par chas pa dag /bya rog ring du mthong ba yis/ /mthong nas de la smras pa grogs/ /khyod kyi brtson pa 'di mi rigs/ /chud pa'i dus na me tog mtshungs/ /don byas ba ni rdo rje 'dra/ /mi srun rang gi lus kyi grogs/ /'di dag byas pa mi bsam mo/ /de dag bya rog
123a4(mdo 'grel): gis bzlog kyang/ /snying rjes rgyas shing drang bde/ /chu bo la ni myur ba ru/ /zhugs nas de ni thar par byas/ /dogs med de yi ru dag gis/ /de yi bcings pa rnam bkrol nas/ /zhan cing rkang par btugs byas te/ /'gro bar brtson pa de la smras/ /grogs po khyod kyis su la
123a5(mdo 'grel): yang/ /bdag ni 'dir gnas smra mi bya/ /pags pa la chags rngon pa ni/ /gser gyi 'od can bdag don gnyer/ /de yis dul bar de brjod tshe/ /gya gyu can zhes bya ba des/ /de la phyag 'tshal bstong pas bstong/ /de de bzhin zhes brjod nas song/ /skabs der mtshan
123a6(mdo 'grel): mo rmi lam du/ /mi bdag btsun mo zla 'od kyis/ /ri dags dam chos smra byed cing/ /stan la 'khod par mthong gyur/ /de nas bden rmi lha mo de/ /rab sang mi yi bdag la smras/ /lha cig dar? dag gis rmi lam du/ /rmad? byang gser gyi ri dags mthong/ /ridags de
123a7(mdo 'grel): ni mngon sum du/ /gyur ba mthong bar bdag 'tshal lo/ /ring bas mtshan mo'i mtshan ma las/ /sgra gcan dogs las 'thon pa bzhin/ /lha mos gtsugs bas de brjod tshe?/ /mdza' slangs yi bdag po yis/ /nor rnams byin nas rngon bdag/ /ri dags /
123b1(mdo 'grel): bzung ba'i slang du btang/ de nas rngon pa de dag rnams/ nags su btsal nas phyir log ste/ /'dar yang bcas pas mi bdag ni/ /'bras med 'ongs pas khros la smras/ /lha cig ri yi rgyas pa yis/ /'gro ba 'di snyed rnam par btsal/ /ngal bso med par bdag cag 'khyams/ /de
123b2(mdo 'grel): lta'i ri dags rnyed ma gyur/ /mig ni ngo mtshar bkod pa yis/ /'gugs pa rab tu mdzes pa'i mig /gser gyi ri dags rmi lam du/ /yongs rdzogs gzugs 'di gal yod/ /lha cig gal te yid kyi ni/ /dge mtshan de la dgyes ba na/ /bzo bo mkhas pa kha cig dag gser
123b3(mdo 'grel): gyi? ri dags bgyid du stsol/ /ces pa thos nas mi bdag de/ /nor ni rab mang ster byed cing/ /ri dwags tshol ba'i brtags pa la/ /mngon par zhen pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas nor mang ster thos nas/ /rngon pa pas kyang nor len la/ /brka ma chags blo ldan gya gyu can/ /mi bdag la
123b4(mdo 'grel): mngon phyogs nas smras/ /lha gcig bka' drin mdzod cig dang/ /ri dwags bdag gis bstan par bya/ /gser gyi ri dwags ri dwags de/ /nags su bdag gis mthong bar gyur/ /ces pa thos nas sa yi bdag /rab tu dga' ba'i mig rgyas pas/ /bzang po ston cig ga
123b5(mdo 'grel): na de/ /gang na de zhes yang yang smras/ /ri dags lam ni ston byed pa/ /de nyid sngon du 'gro bar byas/ /dpung bcas de ni dri med gdugs/ /zla shar ri bo bzhin du song/ /de nas glang po rta 'gros kyis/ /bslangs pa'i rdul gyis nags /pengs pa/ /shing rtser gnas pa'i bya
123b6(mdo 'grel): rog ni/ /ring du mthong bas mthong bar gyur/ /de yis ri dags khyu yi bdag /gser gyi logs la mngon phyogs smras/ /bdag gis phan ba mngon brjod de/ /khyod kyis mnyan min byas pa min/ /bdag gis bzlog kyang khyod kyis ni/ /gang la srog ni byin pa de/ /skyes bu
123b7(mdo 'grel): 'di ste go bgos shing/ /gzhu bzung rnams dang lhan cig 'ongs/ /da ni 'jigs pa byung tshe kwa'i/ /gang du 'gro bya ci zhig bya// phan pa'i ci zhig spro bar bya/ /mnyam du 'chi bar bya 'am ci/ /byas pa mi bzo ma rungs spyod/ /sdig la chags pa'i ngan pa 'di/ /khyod kyis bdag
124a1(mdo 'grel): nyid nyams bya'i slad/ /dug gi rkang 'thung bsrungs par gyur/ /byas pa mi bzo'i rta gdong me/ /rang gi lus kyi gnas dag kyang/ /yongs su spyad pas mi ngoms te/ /srog chags bcas pa'i rgya mtsho 'thung/ /byas mi bzo la phan pa dang/ /gya gyu'i
124a2(mdo 'grel): bdag la yid bcugs dang/ /ngan ba rnams la gdams ngag ni/ /byed pa'i skyon nyid 'ba' zhig yin/ /zhes pa bya rog gis bshad tshe/ /sa yi bdag po nye bar 'ongs/ /gyu la phan ba 'dris? la ni/ /bya? bas pa khyu yi bdag pos bsams/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi sde 'di yiS//
124a3(mdo 'grel): nags tshal chen po bskor nas ni/ /bdag gi zhang la ri dwags rnams/ /yud tsam nyid kyis med bar byed/ /de slad dbung gi gtso bo dang/ /nye bar rang nyid 'gro bar bya/ /bdag nyid gcig pu gsor gyur la/ /ri dags 'di kun 'tsho gyur cig /de ltar des byas ri dagS
124a4(mdo 'grel): de/ /sa bdag dang ni nye bar song/ /gzhan srog yongs su skyobs ba la/ /bdag nyid che rnams srog ni rtsa/ /mdun du mgyogs bar 'ong ba de/ /mthong nas gya gyu can dga' bas/ /rgyal la mgyogs par de 'di zhes/ /lag pa dag gis ring nas bstan/ /de tshe bya rog
124a5(mdo 'grel): da? mod pa ni/ /rdo rje lhung ba lta bu yis/ /de yi lag pa sdig pa yi/ /rkang 'thung yal 'dab yongs su ltung/ /ri dags kyis bshad de yi spyod/ /mi bdag ya mtshan ldan bas thos na zhes nas byas pa mi bzo ba'i/ /spyod tshul smad ces mu? cor gyur/ /de nas sa
124a6(mdo 'grel): bdag gyes pa yis/ /rjes shin tu che ba dang/ /'byor pa mchog gis ri dags de/ /rang gi grong khyer dag du khyer/ /de nas rgyal po'i pho brang phyin/ /de la rin chen khri stan phul/ /de yi mdun du mi yi ba dag/ /btsun mo blon po'i tshigs bcas 'khor/ /byang
124a7(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' ri dags de'i/ /mchog gi blo yi 'dun sa der/ /chos bstan gang gis skye bo rnams/ /bslab pa'i gnas dang ldan bar gyur/ /da nyid sngon gyi dus na ni/ /ri dwags gser gyi logs der gyur/ /ma rungs gya gyu can gyur gang/ /de yang da lta lhas
124b1(mdo 'grel): byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan srid ba'i 'jigs ba 'byed bar byed pas snying stobs ni/ /rgya che mdzes pa'i sbyong tshul legs spyad la 'os rab zhi'i rang bzhin dag /de skad bshad ba thos nas bsod nams dag ni yongs su smin gyur pa'i/ /dben pas mdzes pa'i dge
124b2(mdo 'grel): slong tshogs de dge ba'i slad du ci yang gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang bos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gser gyi logs kyi rdzogs? pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab/ ste sum cu gcig pa'o// //'jig rten
124b3(mdo 'grel): dag na yongs su mtshon byed mngon sum mtshan nyid kyis/ /skye bo bzang dang ngan pa'i khyad par 'di dag legs par mtshon/ /nyi mas thams cad dri med rab tu gsal ba rnam par bsgrub/ /smag rum mun pas 'gro ba ma lus mun nag ldan bar byed/ /thams cad mkhyen pa
124b4(mdo 'grel): sngon byung mdza' / /ma lus nges par gzigs byed cing/ /gtam 'di nyid la rab brtsams te/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/ /grong khyer pa tra li yi bu/ /zhes par mi bdag sa yin ni/ /'byer 'jig 'byer 'jig ces bya ga/ bsod nams phun tshogs gnaS
124b5(mdo 'grel): su gyur/ /de yi sras pho yon tan gyi/ /tshogs kyis mtho ba dge byed dang/ /gnyis ba yon tan med pa yang/ /mi dge byed ces bya bar gyur/ /dge byed slong ba thams cad kyi/ /snying rje yin ni dpag bsam shing/ /sbyin ba'i tshul gyis yab kyi dbal/ /gdugs kyi lhag mi
124b6(mdo 'grel): nyid du byas/ /de las sa bdag bsod nams sdes/ /yid dga' ma zhes bya ba yi/ /rang gi bu mo spring yig dang/ /tshig gis pho nya btang nas byin/ /de nas len la nye ba'i tshe/ /rgyal la rgyal sras kyis smras pa/ /yab cig bag ma len pa 'di/ /de lta ba dag la thob ?
124b7(mdo 'grel): med/ /mnyes gshin yangs ba nyid kyis na/ /bdag ni sbyin la zhen pa yis/ /dga' bas dpal 'byor dag tu blangs/ /khyod kyi mdzod ni stongs par byas/ /de slad chu gter chen po ni/ /gzings kyis yang dag bsgral nas bdag/ mchog gi rin chen sgrub brtson bas/ / 
125a1(mdo 'grel): rin chen gling du nges par 'gro/ /mchog gi phun tshogs thob nas ni/ /bdag gis chung ma blang bar bgyi/ /nor med dag gi chung ma ni/ /bde ba'i phun tshogs skrag pa bskyed/ /ces brjod de yis yab kyi bka' / /thob nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /
125a2(mdo 'grel): dba' rlabs g.yo bas nam mkha' la/ /'khyud pa chu yi gter du zhugs/ /yon tan med pa yon tan la/ /sdang bas nang du 'bu sems zhes/ /gzhung bzang du ston rjes skyes pa'i/ /spun zla de ni de rjes 'brangs/ /phu bos de la smras pa bu/ /rgya mtshor las kyis rnam bslad
125a3(mdo 'grel): pas/ /gzings? ni zhig par gyur pa na/ khyod kyis 'phrag par bdag blang bya/ /zhes pa spun zlas yid brtan byas/ /de bzhin zhes des de la smras/ /skyon rtsom g.yon can mi srun pa/ /rab dung nyid la yang dag brten/ /de nas gzings la zhon byas te/ /bsod nams bzhin du
125a4(mdo 'grel): rjes mthun par/ /'gro ba'i rlung gis rin chen gling/ /mi yi bdag po'i sras kyi thog /rin chen mchog rnams rab rnyed nas/ /rgyal po'i sras dag dal bu yis/ /slar log tsha na gzings dag ni/ /rlung gi stobs kyis myur du zhig /gzings ni zhig pa de yi tshe/ /sngon gyi
125a5(mdo 'grel): gros kyis spun zla de'i/ /mgrin par lag 'gro lta bu yi/ /rjes skyes g.yon can de yis bzung/ /las kyi rlung gis myur bskyod bas/ /rgyal po'i bu yis dogs phyin nas/ /long ba'i pho nya dang bo nyid/ /'phral la gnyid du song bar 'gyur/ /nyal ba de yi rin
125a6(mdo 'grel): chen ni/ /bcings rnams nu bo? ma rungs des/ /mthong nas gdung ba'i khung bur ni/ /rab tu 'phrog ba'i bya ba brtsams/ /de yis brtan par bcings ba de'i/ /mig gi chu skyes rab byung nas/ /'jigs ba'i mtsho las sgrol byed de'i/ /mig gi 'bras bu med par byas/
125a7(mdo 'grel): rin chen khyer nas de song tshe/ /rgyal po'i bu ni gzi byin nyams/ /glang pos chu skyes dkrugs pa yi/ /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas bzhin du gyur/ /nyi ma zla ba spangs pa yis/ /nag phyogs mtshan mo rtsom pa bzhin/ /mya ngan mun pa drag pos bsgribs/ /de ni snang ba med par
125b1(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /de nas ba lang rdzi bo bdag gnas der yang dag 'ongs pa yis/ /rgyal sras long ba mthong nas ni/ /de yi gdung ba 'phos par gyur/ /de ni de yis rang gnas blangs/ /rim gro mchog gis rab tu bskyangs/ /de yi yon tan legs spyod dang/ /mdza' ba 'bebs par
125b2(mdo 'grel): dbang byas gyur/ /de ni mya ngan nang zhi ci? slad/ /rtag tu sems ni dga' byed pa'i/ /pi bang sngon du goms gyur pa/ /dbyangs la mkhas pa de yis blangs/ /dam pa'i grogs dang rgya chen dben pa'i gtam gyi mngon sbyor dang/ /snyan dag btung ba snying sdug grogs rnams mdza' 
125b3(mdo 'grel): bas rtse ba dang/ /pi bang sgro snyan me tog mdzes pa'i nags kyi sar gnas pa/ /yid ni mya ngan me yis gdungs rnams bdud rtsir zhugs ba yis/ /ba lang rdzi yi bdag po de'i/ /chung ma pi bang glu mkhas mas/ /rgyal po'i bu de mthong nas ni/ /mngon par 'dod ldan nyid
125b4(mdo 'grel): du gyur/ /rtag te gya gyu ldan ma de/ /pi bang gis ni gdams byas bzhin/ /chags pa gsar pas brgyal byed cing/ /'dod dang ldan pas yang dag bsams/ /skal bzang 'di la bdag gi ni/ /mig dang sems kyang shin tu chags/ /gal te mdza' bar ma gyur na//
125b5(mdo 'grel): bdag gi gdung bzlog mi 'gyur/ /yang yang sen mo btab pa yis/ /sgra byed chags ldan pi bang 'di/ /bsod nams kyis ni 'di yi phang/ /'dzeg 'os nyid 'gyur skal ba bzang/ /zhes bsams de yis dal bu yis/ /'dar bcas lag ba'i yal 'dab kyis/ /de
125b6(mdo 'grel): yi lag pad la reg cing/ /rnam 'gyur ldan pas de la smras/ /khyod la song ba'i bdag yid 'di/ /mdza' bo byas pa mi shes bzhin/ /bud med rnams la rnyed sla ba'i/ /legs star ngo tsha mi dran no/ /'dod pas 'phangs pa'i bud med ni/ /ngo tsha bral ba'i ltos pa dag/ rigs
125b7(mdo 'grel): spyod la med khrims la med/ /the tshom la med khengs la med/ /bdag gi brtag pa mdza' ba yis/ /'bras bu ldan par bgyi par 'os/ /bud med rnams ni brten pa na/ /lha bzhin gcugs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /zhes pa dbyangs dang bral gyur cing/ /ma bsdams de yi
126a1(mdo 'grel): tshig thos nas/ /g.yon ma de la rgyal bo'i bu/ /nang gi byed pa skrag pas smras/ /yum cig tshul khrims yongs gtong ba/ /'di ni dam pa'i rims pa min/ /sdig pa'i dug gis reg gyur pa/ /tshul khrims nyams pa'i skye ba smad/ /gang
126a2(mdo 'grel): zhig gzhan gyis bud med la/ /lus kyis yongs 'khyud bdag gir byed/ /'di ni dmyal ba'i me lce la/ /phye ma lab bzhin slang yang 'khyud/ /gzhan la phan ba la chags shing/ /gzhan gyi bud med la gus bral/ /gang yang 'tshe med la chags pa/ /de dag
126a3(mdo 'grel): 'tshol gzhan ni shi/ /de skad de yis brjod thos nas/ /yid kyi shing rta chag par gyur/ /gang phyir bud med mdza' ba ni/ /bkag pa shi ba nyid las lhag /de nas yid la re ba dag /nyams par gyur tshe lag 'gro ma/ /de yis rang bdag la phyogs te/ /khro ba'i
126a4(mdo 'grel): dug skyug bzhin smras pa/ /dge ba drang po khyod kyi ni/ /mchog tu mnyes gshin skyon du 'gyur/ /gang phyir dang tshul mi shes la/ /khyim ni rang dbang su zhig byed/ /gzhan la mchog tu yid brtan gyis/ /reg pa khyod kyis mdzes pa min/ /sbas pa yi ni sems dang nor
126a5(mdo 'grel): skye bo su yis su yis shes/ /khyod kyis khyim bzung long ba de/ /gzhan gyi chung ma'i mig stong pa/ /bkren ba 'ong ba'i grogs po dag /de yi 'bras bu rigs pa lto/ /de yis dben par 'grogs pa la/ /de ring mchog tu bdag don gnyer/ /gal te 'di la mig yod
126a6(mdo 'grel): na/ /bdag ni thar par ji ltar 'gyur/ /de yis de smras ba lang rdzi'i/ /bdag te khro bas mchog tu gdungs/ /de ni ring du bskrad byas nas/ /khyim dang sems kyang drang bar byas/ /gang zhig pa yis bu gtong zhing/ /snying du sdug pas grogs gsong gang/ /gnyen rnams gcod
126a7(mdo 'grel): pa ral gri'i rgyun/ /de dag chung ma'i spyod yul yin/ /gang zhig smin 'khyogs? mig dag ni/ /gang zhig rno zhing yang dag g.yo/ /gang yang nu ma sra gyur pa/ /de kun bud me snying la yod/ /yab ni mtho ris gshegs gyur te/ /don mthun rnams kyi dal bu yis/ /lam
126b1(mdo 'grel): bsgril? spun zla mi bdag tu/ /gyur ces dge ba byed pas thob/ /de yis gyos pos yi bdag/ /bsod nams sde yi grong khyer ni/ /lam rings nyon mongs rab zhi ba'i/ /grogs bo dus kyis thob par gyur/ /gnas skabs de ni de dag tu/ /sa bdag sras mo yid dga' ma/ /gong
126b2(mdo 'grel): la tshig gis sngon byin pa/ /de ni chu gter lhung thos tshe/ /mi yi dbang po rnams bos te/ /rim pa ji bzhin 'khod pa la/ /rin chen bzhon pa zhon nas ni/ /rang nyid khyo 'dam sa ru 'ong/ /dal bus mig ni mdzes ma des/ /sa skyong rnams la bltas ba na/ /der ni 'dod dgar song
126b3(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /rgyal po'i sras de mthong bar gyur/ /de ni long yang 'phral la de'i/ /mig ni snying sdug nyid du gyur/ /sprin gyis long yang gza' nang na/ /ku mud ldan la zla ba sdug /long ba bsdams pas mi bdag rnams/ /'ongs pa 'bras bu med pa las/ /skyongs shing log naS
126b4(mdo 'grel): song ba'i tshe/ /bu mo sa bdag gis phyir bskrad/ /mig yangs ma nges do shal yang/ /de'i mgrin par yongs 'phangs nas/ /de la dal bus snyan pa'i sgra/ /bdag ni khyod kyi dbang zhes smras/ /de yang bud med spyod tshul gyis/ /'jigs te dben par de la smras/ /bu'i
126b5(mdo 'grel): med shes rab kyis dbul ma/ /khyod kyis 'di ni rigs ma byas/ /rgyal po dran pa'i snying sdug grogs/ /pad+ma'i spyan rnams 'khod pa'i tshe/ /skye ba don med long ba'i bdag /khyod kyi ci yi slang du gdams/ /mig ldan rnams kyi'ang chung ma ni/ /gzhan gyi bzhin ras rnam par
126b6(mdo 'grel): lta/ /yod ba'i chud ma nyin mo yang/ /gzhan la mngon bgod smros ci dgos/ /bdag la bya mong bud med kyis/ /de la bdag ni yid ches med/ /bud med thur bgrod gya gyu can/ /rigs dang mjug ngogs ltung bar byed/ /ces pa'i tshig rtsub nges smras pa/ /mi bdag bu mo ngo tsha
126b7(mdo 'grel): g.yos/ /der smras mgon po thams cad bu/ /dogs pa ? bar mi 'os so/ /gal te bud med 'ga' la skyon/ /mthong bas shin tu dogs pa khyod/ /de yis khyab pas skyon med la/ /sun 'byin 'di ni ji ltar byed/ /gal te khyod nyid la dga' shing/ /yid kyi skyabs ni? gzhan
127a1(mdo 'grel): med na/ /bden pa de yis khyod kyi mig /gcig ni dri ma med gyur cig /mig bzang mas 'di brjod tsam la/ /de yi blta byed g.yas ba ni/ /pad+ma rgyas pa lta bu dag/ bden pa'i mthu yis byung bar gyur/ /de nas mig bzang ma de la/ /rab tu
127a2(mdo 'grel): dang nas de yi bzhin/ /chu skyes mdzes sdug yan tan gyis/ /mtshar bskyed rab dga' rgyal bus smras/ /gang la bla ma'i tshig gis sngon/ /khyod ni rab tu byin gyur pa/ /skal pa bzang mo rgyal po'i bu/ /dge byed de na de nyid yin/ /de nyid bdag yin mig phyung la//
127a3(mdo 'grel): gal te nges bar khon med na/ /bden pa de yis bdag gi mig? /gzhan pa rnal du gnas gyur cig/ ces pa'i bden pa brjod pa las/ /'phral la nyid du de yi mig /gnyis pa'ang sems dang lhan cig tu/ /dri med phan dang mi srun ba'i/ /dri ma dag dang bral ba thog
127a4(mdo 'grel): de nas spyod tshul rig pa yi/ /sa la spyod pa bsod nams sdes/ /stong grogs byas te rang gi ni/ /rgyal srid mdzes ma ldan des thob/ /gang zhig dge byed de ni nga/ /nu bo de yang lhas byin de/ /sngon gyi mthu des da lta yang/ /rnam pa dag ni de ltar gyur/ /
127a5(mdo 'grel): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa ni/ /dri med rgya chen phan par mi sras pa'i/ /spyod tshul ngan pa thos nas dge slong rnams/ /de la mtshungs par mtshungs med ya mtshan gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod
127a6(mdo 'grel): ba dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dge byed kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal rang? ba ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //dam pa'i skye bo'i g.yon phyogs g.yon ma rnams/ /phal cher dman la chags dang ldan par gyur/ /mtshams ni dmar ldan mun
127a7(mdo 'grel): pa mngon phyogs pas/ /sa 'dzin dag la nyi ma 'phan par byed/ /skye ba gzhan mang la brten ba/ /lhas byin dag gi spyod pa ni/ /bshad kyang bcom ldan ye shes kyi/ /rgya mtshos slar yang bka' stsal pa/ /ka ling ka yi yul du sngon/ /mi bdag dgra ni
127b1(mdo 'grel): nyams byed ba/ /grangs med rnam gdon grags pa can/ /dbal ldan mya ngan med ces gyur/ /de yi sras ni mtshungs pa bzhi/ /lo ma rab tu lam dang/ /rjes su lo ma khyad par gyi/ /lo mar sa la grags par gyur/ /lang tshos rgyags pa de dag rnams/ /chung mar bcas pa
127b2(mdo 'grel): pha mas bskrad/ /rnam 'gyur gnod pa ldan ba yi/ /bu yis bu la byams pa'ang 'jig/ /de rnams rim gyis lam rgyags zad/ /bzod dka' gnas skabs ngan pa bzhin/ /nags tshal stug por phyin gyur nas/ /bkres pas nyen pas yang dag bsams/ /rgung dus
127b3(mdo 'grel): bud med 'di dag kyang/ /long bu 'chi ba'i lcags sgrog ste/ /bu yis 'bad rnyed lo ma yin/ /zas la'ang skal ba 'dzin zhing 'khod/ /de ltar bsams nas dgag gis/ /bud med bsad par nges pa byas/ /skal ba gnas skabs dan pa yis/ /bsregs la blo ni 'jigs
127b4(mdo 'grel): rung skye/ /sdig pa'i brtag pas 'jigs pa yi/ /khyad par lo ma de nang nas/ /brtse bas chung ma khyed nas ni/ /tha dad dag tu bros te song/ /skyon ldan ma zhes bya ba de/ /mchog tu rnam par 'khrugs gyur cing/ /lam rings brgyugs pa'i ngal dub kyis/ /brgyal nas sa la deS
127b5(mdo 'grel): par 'gyel/ /de nas de ni srog 'jig che/ /bdag pa snying rjes brlan pa yis/ /spyi bo phug pa las phyung pa/ /rang gi khrag ni 'thung du bcug /khrag 'thung 'tsho ba thob 'gyur de/ /snying stobs rgya mtshos rang nyid kyi/ /yan lag nges bar bcad ba yi/ /sha yis srog ni brtan par gyi?
127b6(mdo 'grel): chu med 'jig rung dgon pa dag /rim gyis bsgral nas de dag gos/ shing gi grib mchog sngo bsangs can/ /ri yi klung gi dogs su sleb/ /de dag dar ni dal bso 'cho/ /rkang lag bcad pa'i mi zhig ni/ /chu bo mgyogs bas khyer bzhin du/ /cho de drag pos 'debs shing
127b7(mdo 'grel): byung/ /'o rgyal phongs pa la brten de/ /mthong pa nyid na snying rjes 'khyung/ /khyad par lo ma chur zhugs nas/ /dpung bdag gis thar bar byas/ /de nas chu dang rtsa ba dang/ /'bras bu dag gis srog slar byung/ /nyi ma 'ga' yis bcad pa sos/ /de yis de ni gdung med byas/
128a1(mdo 'grel): sos kyang bgrod pa mtshang pas/ /gang duAng 'gro bar bzod ma gyur/ /de ni der gnas dus su ni/ /de yi chud mas bza' bster/ /rgyal bo'i bu ni chung ma la/ /yang dag 'grogs pa ltung bar gyur/ /phal cher rgyal 'dod pa 'bo ni/ /seng ge bzhin dus
128a2(mdo 'grel): 'khrig? pa nyung/ /dal gyis sman mchog ro dang ni/ /zas kyi lus ni yongs rdzogs pa/ /nyams gyur de dang de yin/ /chung mas 'khrig la chags par byas/ /mdza' ba'i? snum gyis ma byugs shing/ /yon tan srad bus ma bcings la/ /rjes su bla mas ma smad pa/ /bud med
128a3(mdo 'grel): rang 'dod reg pas bde/ /mtshan mo sgra med nu rgyus? ma/ /de ni de dang rol pa na/ /dgos med 'khrig pas mchim bar/ /bdag po bgegs su gyur par bsams/ /des na bdag po g.yem ma des/ /bsang ba'i gros ni byas par gyur/ /sdig pa dag la bslab mkhas pa//
128a4(mdo 'grel): bud med sdig pa can rnams lo/ /rang gi mgo ba mtshungs med ni/ /na bar brjod cing sgra ldan des/ /dpral bar sdig pa gris ba bzhin/ /ras kyi 'dab mas bcing ba byas/ /de yi mgo yi nang kyis ni/ /drag tu gdungs pa'i sa bdag sras/ /snying rjes de skar bcos pa yis/
128a5(mdo 'grel): rigs pa de de sems par gyur/ /mya ngan bsam par bying de la/ /de yis 'khun cing rab smras pa/ /'khyags gdungs bung ba sgra sgrogs pa'i/ /kha bas nyen pa'i yang ldan bzhin/ /rnam pa de lta'i mgo nang sngon/ /bdag ni gzhon nu ma la gyur/ /sman pa rnams kyis rdo
128a6(mdo 'grel): ba ni/ /zhu ba bsdus? nas rnam par bzlog/ /ri bo 'di yi g.yang so 'di/ /rdo ba yi ni zhun gyis khyag /gal te nus mthag pa la/ /bogs la khyod kyis blang bar mdzod/ /bdag gis khyod kyi spyad thag ni/ /lag pa gnyis kyis bzung bar byas/ /chung mas de smras rgyal sras
128a7(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /mdza' las de bzhin no zhes smras/ /de nas de lag gis bzung ba'i/ /thag par dal bus 'tshal byas te/ /ri yi chu klung brag la brdabs/ /sgra sgrogs dogs su de yis babs/ /sman ni len la chags pa na/ /de yis sbyang thag nges par btang/ /g.yang sa chen
128b1(mdo 'grel): po bud med kyis/ /soms ltar g.yo ba'i chur de lhung/ /dge ba'i las kyi lhag ma las/ /de yi lus nyid zhig ma gyur/ /rgyun gyis rab tu khyer byed cing/ /brtan pa yis ni yun ring bsams/ /rang gi phyogs ni bud med kyi/ /sems mtshungs 'khor ma ston byed cing/ /bdag gis
128b2(mdo 'grel): bud med nges pa la/ /'di yis gdams ngag byas min nam/ /rab rgyas blo yis rtogs dka' zhing/ /rmi lam kun rtog dang mtshungs la/ /chags dang sdang ba'i gdung ba mi bzang nyon mongs rnam par 'dod la chags/ /nges par 'dod pa las ni skye bo mdza' dag rmongs par rab
128b3(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa/ /sgyu ma bud med dag ni skad cig yongs su 'dris pa'ang ltung bar byed/ /de ltar nges par sems byed cing/ /shin tu che ba'i chu yi rgyun/ /legs byas lta bus grong khyer ni/ pu skar can du de yis phyin/ /gnas skabs de yi tshe na der/ /mi bdag sras med nongs
128b4(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'i/ /blon po chen po mtshan mkhan gyis/ /mtshan bzang ldan pa de bzung gyur/ /de dag gis de cho ga bzhin/ /bkra shis chu yis der dbang bskur/ /rmad byung bud med spyod mthong bas/ /bag ma len la sdang bar gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' spangs pa yis/ /ri
128b5(mdo 'grel): la sman ni nus pa zhe na/ /dus su skyon ldan ma dag snang?/ /'tsho ba chad pas 'khrugs par gyur/ /grong dang grong khyer lam du des/ /phrag la yan lag nyams pa bkod/ /bdag po'i brtul? zhugs ldan tshig gis/ /skye bo rnams la bsod snyoms bslangs/ /bdag po'i
128b6(mdo 'grel): brtul zhugs la gus pas/ /kun gyis de la mdad? byin/ /log pa'i tshul khrims brjod bas kyang/ /rgud pa la ni 'byor? pa bskyed/ /dag ces kun gyis phyag 'tshal ma// de yis dal bus bskor zhing phyin/ grong khyer pu skar? can du ni/ /mi bdag sgo dang nye bar song
128b7(mdo 'grel): rgyal po bud med spyod la sdang/ /bdag khrims ldan la phyag 'tshal 'gyur/ /zhes bsams de la gus pa yis/ /mdun ni 'don gyis rgyal la smras/ /lha cig yul gzhan ring bo nas/ /bdag po'i khrims ldan su zhig 'ongs/ /gang zhig rkang ba bkod pa yis// 
129a1(mdo 'grel): 'byung po'i yum 'di dag bar byed/ /lha gcig bdag ba phrag bkod ba'i/ /gtsang ma de la gzigs par mdzod/ /bdag khrims ldan la rab btud nas/ /skyes pa rnams kyi tshe 'phel 'gyur/ /de skad mdun na 'don gyis de/ /lta bar zhugs pa'i mi bdag
129a2(mdo 'grel): gis/ /de la smras pa bram ze dag /drang po khyod kyis yong mi shes/ /bud med mdza' zhes 'di rab grags/ /zol med ces pa blo gros 'khrul/ /gtsang zhes mkha' yi me tog thob/ /bud med sdig ces the tshom med/ /'bras bu med cing bcad la skye/ /skye bo 'grogs la
129a3(mdo 'grel): drang por 'gyur/ /'brel pa rtsa med bud med ni/ /be ta sa yi 'khri shing bzhin/ /'byed 'khu gcig pu'i tshul khrims can/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis tshul khrims 'tshel/ /bud med la 'dud bud med 'dud/ /bud med la 'dud 'dud do 'dud/ /bud med spyod tshul skyong mthong ga /de
129a4(mdo 'grel): bsam gdung ba'i bdag nyid can/ /bdag ni rin chen gyis gang ba'i/ /sa gzhi 'di la'ang yong mi srid/ /ri yi ri dwags chung ma ltar rmongs pha rol slu la mchog tu sgrin/ /lus ni rnam par sbyin la chags shing skyes bu rnams kyi srog kyang 'phrog /me tog lhung la 'jigs
129a5(mdo 'grel): par byed cing me yi nang duAng rnam par 'jug /drang zhing gya gyu bud med rnams ni rnam par sbyang ba rgyas ni? shes/ /de lta na yang gal te khyod/ /'bad na bud med de lta bya/ /zhes brjod mi yi dbang po yis/ /yang thog 'dzegs nas de la bltas/ /yan lag bcad pa'i grogs ldan ma/ /
129a6(mdo 'grel): sdig can ma de yongs shes nas/ /blon po rnams las bdag deb/ /de yi spyod mdza' nges par bshad/ /des kyang mi bdag yongs shes nas/ /skad cig gdong dung sdig can ma/ /skye bo rna ba bsgribs rnams kyis/ /myur du bskrad de rab tu song/ /khyad par lo ma zhes pa'i mi dbang
129a7(mdo 'grel): sras/ /de bdag de yi chud ma de ltas byin/ /zhes pa'i byung tshul rgyal bas bshad thos nas/ /dge slong tshogs kyis de yi spyod pa smad/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /khyad par lo
129b1(mdo 'grel): ma'i yal 'dab ste/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //bsod nams rab zhi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin mthu/ /de ni dag pa'i bdag la ci yang yod/ /gang rga mthu yis ma rungs pa rnams kyang/ /'phral la khro ba'i dug ni rab tu gtong/ /de bzhin gshegs ba rgyal byed tshal/ /kun dga' ra bar
129b2(mdo 'grel): sngon zhugs shing/ /de yi bka' yis dge slong tshogs/ /ri dang nags la rgyu ba'i tshe/ /ri rab lhun po'i ngos la ni/ /'dug nas bsam gtan skyong byed ba/ /dge slong nyam chung bzhin ras ni/ /mdzes bral skye bo rnam dag 'ongs/ /de nas bcom ldan zhabs pa dal/ /mngon par phyag 'tshal
129b3(mdo 'grel): de dag gis/ /lus ni nyams rtsal chung ba'i rgyu/ /dge slong rnams kyis dris nas smras/ /mkha' lding gis kyang gzhom dka' ba'i/ /klu ni dga' bo nye dga' dag /lhun po la ni lan gsum du/ /bskor zhing bcings nas rnam bar gnas/ /de dag rtag tu dug gi dbugs/ /mo yis rgyas
129b4(mdo 'grel): pa lan gsum spro/ /reg pa rdo ba rnam dag kyang/ /'bral la nyid du thal bar byed/ /de yi dug gi dbugs kyis ni/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba bdag cag bsregs/ /bzhin mdzes kha dog bral ba dang/ /rid pa 'ba' zhig nyid du gyur/ /ces des bshad tshe dag slong gi /tshogs kyi
129b5(mdo 'grel): mdun zhus ston pa yis/ /klu dga' 'dul ba la 'os par/ /maung+gal gyi bu la bstan/ /sbyor bas mi snang dbyibs can des/ /lcog gis mkha' la 'khyud ba yi/ /ri rab lhun por yang dag phyin/ /klu dbang dag ni nyal bar mthong/ /de yis dal bus bslang ba las/ /gang tshe de dag
129b6(mdo 'grel): ma sad ba/ /de tshe de na klu chen gyi/ /lus su gyur nas yang dag bcings/ /de yis bsdams pas rab sad de/ /'jigs rung dbyibs de mthong gyur nas/ /'jigs pas rnam par 'khrugs gyur te/ /mi yi gzugs kyis rab tu bros/ /de nas phan tshun 'bros byed ba/ /de la maung+gal
129b7(mdo 'grel): gyi bus/ /klu yi gzugs ni yongs btang nas/ /rang gi gzugs su byas te smras/ /klu dag mgyogs par gang du 'gro /'jigs pa 'di ni yang dag thong/ /gang gis khyed cag 'jigs byed pa'i/ /klu de de na mi gnas so/ /de yi 'jigs pas gal te khyed/ /rnam thun? brtan
130a1(mdo 'grel): pa med nyid ma /skyabs su 'os pa sangs rgyas la/ /mngon par phyag 'tshal cis mi byed/ /ces nges brjod thos dul ba yis/ /de dag gis ni de la smras/ /'phags pa bcom ldan bstan pa yis/ /bdag cag la ni bka' drin brjod/ /ces smra klu yi dbang po
130a2(mdo 'grel): dag /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung khyer nas/ /de dag lo rgyus bshad nas de/ de la phyag 'tshal nye bar 'khong/ /de nas klu dbang skyabs song zhing/ /rin chen 'od kyis sa gzhi dag /brgyan bas phyag 'tshal byas pa la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bslab pa'i gnaS
130a3(mdo 'grel): ni yang dag thob/ /'byung po kun la 'jigs med ster/ /skyabs kyi grogs ni thob pa las/ /da ni khyed cag 'jigs pa med/ /ces te yang dag gzigs tsam gyis/ /de dag skyon dang sdad ba dang/ /bral bar bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad/ /de la phyag 'tshal song bar gyur/ /bsam
130a4(mdo 'grel): pa che rnams yang dag mthong nyid na/ /sdang ba'i dug tshan gdung bas gtses pa yang/ /'od kyi zol gyis lus la chags pa yis/ /zhi ba'i bdud rtsis bsil pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de yi sngon gyi byung ba'i mdza' / /mthu yis ya mtshan dge slong gis/ /dris shing rgyal ba bcom ldan
130a5(mdo 'grel): 'das/ /thams cad gzigs pas de la gsungs/ /ba ra NA sir mi yi dbang/ /dpal ldan kri ki zhes pa sngon/ /bcom ldan 'od srungs zhes ba las/ /chos kyi bstan pa thos par gyur/ /de yis blon bo dga' bo dang/ /nye dga' dag la rgyal srid btang/ /byang chub la ni
130a6(mdo 'grel): yang dag chags/ /bden pa mthong la dga' bar gyur/ /de yi blo des rgyal srid ni/ chos dang chos min rang bzhin dang/ /'od srungs la yang gtsug lag khang/ /yo byad kun dang ldan pa byas/ /dus kyis 'di dag dga' bo dang/ /nye dga' kU? yi dbang por skyes/ /gtsug
130a7(mdo 'grel): lag khang phul bsod nams kyis/ /lhun po sa 'dzin de yi gnas/ /de ltar gdengs can mchog gi spyod pa lus gzhan dag /yongs gyur legs spyad yongs 'dris rgyal bas gsungs pa dag /zhi ba'i tshul ldan thub mchog tshogs kyes thos gyur te/ /dug 'dzin?
130b1(mdo 'grel): nges phar zhi ba'i yon tan bstod par gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ dga' bo nyed ga'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ //gang zhig nor gyi cha shas
130b2(mdo 'grel): chung ngu'i lhag /gzhan la phan pang bsgoms pas byin gyur par/ /yon tan brtag pa yongs su mi zad bas/ /bsod nams de ni khyad par gyur pa yin/ /de nas 'ga' zhig 'das dus na/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du ni/ /chos ston pa la dga' bo dang/ /nye dga' nyan du 'ongs
130b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe/ /rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan la/ /blta ba'i slad du nye bar 'ongs/ /de dag gis ni bsnyen bskur dang/ /phyag ma byas pas khros bar gyur/ /rgyal la phyag 'tshal de song nas/ /de dag chad pas bcad par bsams/ /de dag gis kyang ma bar song ste/ /e la mtshen
130b4(mdo 'grel): gyi char pa phab/ /kun mkhyen gyis bskal mgyogs par ni/ /maung+gal gyi bu song nas/ /mi bdag gi ni mtshon char de/ /padmo utpal pheng? bar byas/ /slar yang sa yi bdag po yis/ /bcom ldan 'das kya drung du phyin/ /gdengs can dbang po 'dos pa la/ /de yi bka' yiS
130b5(mdo 'grel): bzod gsol byas/ /de nas sa bdag gis gsol te/ /rgyal po'i khang par bcom ldan 'das/ /dge slang tshogs bcas gus pa yis/ /gtsang ma'i bshos ni gsol du gshegs/ /kha zas 'tsh+d par byed tshe der/ /mtshan mo me ni nyer 'tshe skyes/ /'phral la rgyal pa'i
130b6(mdo 'grel): mthu yis ni/ /rab tu zhi ba nyid du gyur/ /bcom ldan gsol nas gshegs ba'i tshe/ /rang gi grong du sa bdag gis/ /mtshan mo me yi 'bar ba la/ /chad pa'i gros kyis dgag pa smras/ /skabs der khyim bdag legs sbyin gyis/ /bu ni rdzu 'phrul stobs shes pa/ /lang tsho
130b7(mdo 'grel): ldan brdzun? skyon gyis/ /rgyal po yis ni mngon par bsang/ /sngon du bcom ldan ston pa yi/ /bstan pa rjes su bzung bas de/ /ye shes brtan thob pu yi ni/ /sdug bsngal gyis kyang sdug min gyu mkhud? med rang gi nor mang po/ /bkrin pa rnams lo ngos rab byin/ /
131a1(mdo 'grel): shin tu chags pas dal bus dpal/ /len? gcig gi lhag mar byas/ /de nas pa? na'i rnyed pas chos/ /ma lus chung ngu byin nas byas/ /de ni khyim legs ster ces gyur/ /khyim ni shin tu chung ngur brjod/ /nam zhig lta ba la 'ongs shing/ /mdun 'khong
131a2(mdo 'grel): chung ngur sbyin pa yi/ /ming gis ? mtshar gyur de la/ /bcom ldan brtse? ras dga' stsal pa/ /khyim bdag sbyin ba chung ngu'i/ /ngo tsha bgyi bar mi 'os so/ /dad pas byin pa sbyin pa'i thigs/ /gser gyi ri bo mtshungs par gyur/ /sngon tshe gnyis skyes bel mas/ /shin tu mang ba rab tu byin/
131a3(mdo 'grel): dad pa dang bral thun mong bas/ /de bzhin du ni 'phel bar gyur/ /su zhig 'dzam gling gtogs pa yi/ /'gro? kun gus pas gsol byed dang/ /su zhig byang chub ldan gcig la/ /de yi bsod nams de bas lhag /ces pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /bden pa thos nas
131a4(mdo 'grel): mngon dga' zhing/ /de la phyag 'tshal khyim bdag ni/ /rang gi? bad? bar rab tu song/ /mtshan mo mar me btad nas der?/ /bcom ldan rjes bstan klog? pa na/ /me ni rab bsgrubs chad pa'i slad?/ /de ni rgyal po'i skyes bus bzung/ /chad ba'i dngos po med pas na/ /brtson khad
131a5(mdo 'grel): dag tu bzhag te bcings/ /mtshan mo brgya byin tshangs la sogs/ /lha rnams de la lha ru 'ongs/ /de dag gis gsol nor yong zhes /gang tshe de yis ma blangs a/ /de tshe de yi khang par ni/ /chos bstan pa las bsags ba 'phel /de yi mthu yis rgyal pos kyang/ /grong khyer
131a6(mdo 'grel): rab tu 'bar mthong nas/ /bcon? ran pa ni de btang che/ /gang duAng me ni mthong ma gyur/ /nam zhig bde gshegs lta ru ni/ /phyin nas de mdun 'khod pa des/ /mi bdag rgyal la phyag 'tshal slad/ /byin nas 'ongs pa mthong bar gyur/ /de yis sngon du bcom ldan la/ /phyag byas sa
131a7(mdo 'grel): yi bdag la min/ /'gro bas mchod 'os sngon du ni/ /gzhan la mchod par 'os pa yin/ /mi bdag rgya 'phal rab btug cing/ /dang gi grong khyer dbang tu song/ /khyim bdag rang gi grong khyer las/ /gzhan du sbyugs shes bka' yis bsgos/ /de nas legs sbyin dag la lta/ /rab
131b1(mdo 'grel): tu dang bas mi bdag la/ /srog chags phra mo rab spyod de/ /so yi dug gis 'khrugs par byas/ /de dag gis btab mi bdag de/ /blon po bcun mo'i rjes 'brangs bcas/ /phyin nas rgyal ba'i bstan pa las/ /legs sbyin la ni dad par byas/ /de ltar rtag tu nye bar gnas pa des
131b2(mdo 'grel): mchog gi bdud rtsi dag gi tshogs/ /khyim gyi bdag po legs sbyin de yis bcom ldan gyis gsungs zhi ba bsten/ /dri med yid ldan rnams kyi mdza' ru gnas pas dben pa'i gter chen ni/ /rang gi bzhin du bgegs dang nyon mongs ngal dub rnam bar spangs bas 'thob/ /ces pa
131b3(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ khyim bdag legs sbyin gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu rtsa lnga ba'o// //sbyin pa'i grogs su skad cig su gyur ba/ /de dang sbyin bdag 'bras bu
131b4(mdo 'grel): mtshungs ba 'thob/ /gzhan la phan par brtson par zhugs rnams kyis/ /grogs su bsod nams las med mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan rgyal ba mnyan yod kyi/ /rgyal byed tshal ni dga' bar sngon/ /mgon med zas sbyin gtsug lag khang/ /kun dga' ra bar sngon dgyes tshe/ /kau
131b5(mdo 'grel): shAm+bIr? bar sa yi/ /mi bdag 'char byed ces pa byung/ /rig 'dzin bu mo'i skye bo yis/ /da lta'ang gang gi khrags pa sgrogs/ /de'i yul du khyim pa ni/ /las mdza' i 'byung gnas kyis 'tsho ba/ /nor bzang zhes bya nor dag ni/ /sgrub la rnam par mkhas par gyur/ /nam
131b6(mdo 'grel): zhig bya ba ngon gnyer zhing/ /'dun sar 'ongs pa mi bdag gis/ /tshig nyid kyis ni yongs shes nas/ /gus pa bskyed de de la smras/ /khyim bdag gser ni yongs bsags pa/ /khyod kyi dbyangs ni bdag gis shes/ /sog pa shes ba khyod la ni/ /gser gyi gter chen
131b7(mdo 'grel): yangs pa yod/ /rgyal pos 'dzum bcas 'di brjod tshe/ /de la thal sbyar des smras pa/ /rgyal po bdag gi khyim na gser/ /bsags pa bden par yang pa nyid/ /mnyes gshin yangs pa dam pa yi/ /spyod tshul bsam pa la chags lha/ /yab khyod kyis ni bsrungs pa
132a1(mdo 'grel): yi/ /skye po 'di la ci zhig med/ /gal te mi bdag brtse ba med// /zang zing la snom stag ltar gyur/ /nor ldan rnams ni nor med 'gyur/ /nor med rnams ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mi bdag chos kyi nor ldan na/ /dogs pa med
132a2(mdo 'grel): par skye bo rnams/ /nor sgrub bsgrubs pa'ang 'god byed cing/ /bgos pa gsal bar longs spyod byed/ /blo ldan de yis tshig dag ni/ /phun tshogs sa bdag gis thos nas/ /so yi 'od kyi bka' drin ni/ /gsal bar byed bzhin de la smras/ /bdag gi bya ba'i blon por ni/ /blo
132a3(mdo 'grel): gros ldan ba khyod 'gyur 'os/ /blo stobs ldan pa khyod lta bus/ /'dzin byed khur 'di 'dzin par byed/ /de skad rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/ /nor bzad gis ni de la smras/ /bdag ni rgyal po'i g.yog 'khor la/ /'dun sar mdzes pa'i mkhas pa min/ /g.yog ni skyes bu rnams
132a4(mdo 'grel): dag gis/ /rang dbang skyed tshal rnam par gcod/ /bde ba'i gnyid dang bde ba 'tshod?/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bkren 'jigs nyo/ /g.yog po dag ni rkang stegs bzhin/ /rtag tu 'og na gnas pa yi/ /mgo la dbang phyug zhabs bkod na//bya ba byas pa nyid du 'gyur/ /g.yog
132a5(mdo 'grel): gi nyon mongs dal dub kyis/ /phun tshogs thob pa'i longs spyod kyang/ /phra ma can dang 'grogspa yi/ /rje bo smin ma 'khyog bas g.yo/ /bzung dka' i gdon bzhin mi bdag gi /phun tshogs dregs drag gzung dka' ba/ /'di dag rab tu 'bad pa yis/ /bzung yang nges
132a6(mdo 'grel): par mi gnas so/ /'byor pa gsar pa gsang ba ni/ /'du 'bral mdza' gcugs rtsom pa dag /mi zlog smad 'tshod mdzes ma bzhin/ /skad cig dga' bar bya ba yin/ /zhes smras rab tu bkag gyur kyang/ /rgyal pos de ni blon por byas/ /jo bo mchog tu bzhed ba la/ /nges
132a7(mdo 'grel): par su zhig bda' bar byed/ /rgyal pos kun gyi gnyer gtad cing/ /shin tu che ba'i gnas thob de/ /rnam par sdang bas sun 'byin pa'i/ /blon po rnams kyis bzod ma gyur/ /phra ma can gyis bskul ba yi/ /rgyal pos chos ni brtag 'dod nas/ /dam pa'i bya ba min
132b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i las/ /yang yang bsgos kyang nges ma byas/ /de nas mi bdag khro rdzun gyis/ /de ni bsod du bskul bar gyur/ /de lta na yang chos min dang/ /yang dag ldan pa'i bka' ma mnos/ /skye ba gcig nyid bde ba'i slad/ /skye ba brgya mang nyams 'gyur ba/ /smad ba'i las ni
132b2(mdo 'grel): dge ba bdag /mi bgyid do zhes de yis smras/ /chos kyis 'jigs shing chos 'brang gtsang/ /de ni sa bdag gis rab btang/ /slong ba rnams ni ma lus la/ /rgyun chad med pa'i sbyin khang byas/ /grags snyan ldan pa de yi ni/ /sbyin khang kun tu grags pa'i tshe/ /dpag bsam shing
132b3(mdo 'grel): la skyes bu rnams/ /gus bas mchog tu chud bar gyur/ /gnas skabs der ni thub pa'i tshogs/ /'jug dogs don gnyer lho phyogs nas/ /'ongs pa 'brug dgon nya mad ba/ /skye bo med pa'i gnas su zhugs/ /der ni thams cad skom pas gzir/ /brgyal zhing mal
