132b4(mdo 'grel): stan la brten bas/ /sems med la yang rmongs pa las/ /skad cher chu ni rab tu blangs/ /lha dang dri za klu rnams las/ /brtse ba'i chu gter su zhig 'dir/ /gang gnas de yis bdag cag la/ /chu rab rtsol zhes de yi smras/ /de nas rin chen dbud brgyan can/ /gser
132b5(mdo 'grel): gyi dral chung sgra sgrogs shing/ /lag bas gser gyi chu snod gzung/ /shing gi dbus nas byung bar gyur/ /lag pa'i pad+mas btud de las/ /bdud rtsi myong bzhin de dag gis/ /mgrin ba'i bar du chu 'thungs nas/ /'tsho ba thob cing dga' bar gyur/ /ya mtshan ldan pa de dag
132b6(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /chas te slar yang mngon phyogs nas/ /mi mthong shing gi gnas dag las/ /des 'thon khyod ni su zhes dris/ /de yis smras pa mnyan yod na/ /snyan par grags ba dpal gyis gnas/ /mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba/ /kun ster khyim gyi bdag po yod/ /tshom bu ba
132b7(mdo 'grel): bdag de yi ni/ /khyim dang nye bar gnas bas sngon/ /dpung ba bslad nas slong rnams la/ /de yi khyim ni rtag tu bstan/ /bsod /nams de yis lha nyid ni/ thob cing de lta bdag 'dir gnas/ /slong? pa'i rjes mthun dpung pa des/ /bdag gi g.yas pa 'di mdzes so/ /thub
133a1(mdo 'grel): pa de dag de la ni/ /khams bde byas nas bslar spyod? ba/ /nags su bkres pas rkang 'thung mchog /mdzes shing grib bsil ldan pa mthong/ /de bzhin du ni de dag gis/ /de la yang ni bza' ba bslangs/ /ya mtshan byed pa zab mo yis/ /skad kyad rab tu
133a2(mdo 'grel): byung gyur te/ /rdzing bu 'di yi 'jug dogs kyi/ /'gram du bza' ba lha yi zas/ /yongs rdzogs yod kyis der song la/ /gang zhig 'dod pa gsol bar mjod/ /de skad des bstan de dag gis/ /mchog gi bza' ba zos nas ni/ /mchog gi shing la gnas de la/ /khyod
133a3(mdo 'grel): su zhes pa rab tu dris/ /des kyang smras pa mnyan yod na/ /khyim gnas mgon med zas sbyin yod/ /de yi dge 'dun mchod la bdag /bram ze'i rim gro la mkhas pas/ /zho yi bum pa 'grim byed cing/ /de dag gsol ba mthar phyin tshe/ /zas lhag chung ngu za bar 'gyur
133a4(mdo 'grel): dge slong rnams la rgyal po'i zas/ /zhes rgya che ldan pa dang/ /bdag nyid la ni zas ngan dag /mthong nas bdag nyid skyo bar gyur/ /mgon med zas sbyin tshig gis ni/ /zas la gus pa'i bsam pa yis/ /yan lag brgyad ldan gso sbyong gi /brtul zhugs de nas bdag
133a5(mdo 'grel): gis blangs/ /de nas brtul zhugs ma rdzogs bas/ sred pas bdag gi mtshan mo zos?/ /de yis bdag ni 'jig rten du/ /gso sbyong nyams par rnam par grags/ /brtul zhugs nyams pa de yis kyang/ /bdag ni lha yi bu nyid gyur/ /de yi chig de thos gyur
133a6(mdo 'grel): nas/ thub pa de dag ya mtshan gyur/ /de dag 'gro zhing rab bsams pa/ /dka' thub drag pos bdag cag rnams/ /yun ring nyon mongs 'ba' zhig gyur/ /da dung der? la reg pa med/ /da ni gso sbyong brtul zhugs nyid/ /rab tu bsgrub la 'bad par bya/ /gnod pa med
133a7(mdo 'grel): cing bde ba'i thabs/ /rang? la phan la su mi gus/ /de ltar bsams shing de dag ni/ /kau shAm+bIr? gtang bor nas/ /khyim na gnas ba nor bzang gis/ /khyim ni grags dang ldan par phyin/ /des der mgron gyi bab byas/ /de la rmad byung de dag bshad/ /mgon med zas
133b1(mdo 'grel): sbyin blta ba'i slad/ /de dang lhan gcig nyid du song/ /mnyan yod du ni yang dag phyin/ /de rnams de yis gus bcas mchod/ /de la ji ltar mthong ba dang/ /ji ltar thos pa thams cad bshad/ /brtul zhugs don gnyer de kun dang/ /grogs po nor bzang de yang ni/ /chos kyi
133b2(mdo 'grel): grogs nges mdza' ? ba yis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du khrid/ /de yi tshig gis de dag rnams/ /bcom ldan gyis byang rjes su bzung/ /gang gis de dag bden pa mthong/ /yang dag rtogs shing bder bgrong gyur/ /de dag sod che bcom ldan gyis/ /phyogs lhung brlan pa'i
133b3(mdo 'grel): spyan gyis ni/ /nor bzang nyid la rnam gzigs nas/ /yang dag ye shes ldan par mdzad/ /bden pa yang dag mthong ba thob/ /khyad par dge ba rgyas pa de/ /sod nas rgyal ba'i gtsug lag khang/ /kau shAm+bIr byed du bcug/ gang phyir bcom ldan gyis bskos pas/ /der ni
133b4(mdo 'grel): gregs la 'ongs gyur pa /dge slong skul byed de phyin de/ /bskul phyir gtsug lag khang zhes gyur/ /gtsug lag khang skyong 'bangs mo ni/ /mgu byed ces pas phul pa yis/ /gos h+rul de la brtse ba yi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag blangs/ /de
133b5(mdo 'grel): yis 'bangs mor bdag gyur ces/ /dad pa'i smon lam gyis phul de/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos la/ /kha dog gcig pa nyid du gyur/ /nor bzang gyis ni bsod nams tshogs/ /rmad byung rab 'bar mthong gyur nas/ /de yi sngon byung dge slong gis/ /zhus
133b6(mdo 'grel): shing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /ba ra NA sir khyim bdag sngon/ /gzhugs byed ces ni bya bar gyur/ /rgya che gang po gang zhig gis/ /sbyin pa yongs su zad ma gyur/ /lo ni bcu gnyis tshar med kyis/ /nyams pa'i dus su de yi ni/ /sbyin khang mi zlog pa rnams
133b7(mdo 'grel): la/ /zas ni rgyun chad med par gyur/ /de yi khyim du mdzod khang bdag /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas zhes bya bas/ /sbyon pa yi ni grogs dag byas/ /gang phyir grogs dang ldan pas grub/ /de yi rang rgyal tshogs dag gi bras kyi dus ni rigs byed pa/ /lhag pa'i blo ldan
134a1(mdo 'grel): nye bar gnas/ /chos kyi tho nye zhes bar gyur/ /nam zhig de ni las kyis 'brel/ /dus ni yol par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /de dag rnams kyi mdun du ni/ /khyi yis dus kyi brda' dag byas/ /gzugs byed gang re nga? nyid de/ /mdzod pa mgon med zas sbyin no//
134a2(mdo 'grel): chogs kyi chas kyis pho nya gang/ /de nyid mi bdag 'char byed yin/ /gang zhig brda' ni rigs byed pa'i/ /khyi de yang ni nor bzang ngo/ /rgyal po gdangs las shes pas na/ /gdangs can zhes pa ming gzhan gyur/ /de ltar yid ni legs pa rnams kyi spyod pa dag /
134a3(mdo 'grel): rigs bar srid pa 'bigs byed bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa/ /legs byas dri ba zang snying por ldan pa bdud rzi'i ro/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsan pa'i snyim pas 'thungs par grags/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod
134a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /gdangs can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu drug pa'o// //lha yi rdzing bu dag tu 'dam las skyes pa'i chu skyes mdzes/ /yongs gtsang skam sar skyes pa'i pad+ma dag la reg mi byed/ /lhun skyes yongs su
134a5(mdo 'grel): 'dris shing rtag tu nang nas gnas gyur pa/ /dkar po'i yon tan rnams kyi byed po rigs ni min/ /mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal na sngon/ /sems can kun la shis pa yi/ /bsam gtan rjes su skyong byed cing/ /rgyal ba dpag bsam shing bzhugs tshe/ /grong khyer slo ma lta
134a6(mdo 'grel): bur ni/ /ded dpon blo ldan rnams kyi mchog /rin chen bsags pa'i rgya mtsho ni/ /'byor ba zhes ba byung bar gyur/ /de yi chung ma ke ta ki/ zhes pa la ni bu gsum byung/ /'byor lan dang ni 'byor bzang dang/ /'byor pa dga' zhes grags pa'o/ /nam zhig de ni nad
134a7(mdo 'grel): kyis btag /'chi ba 'dod cing nye bar gyur/ /mchog tu rtsub cing chags bral bas/ /chur ma bu rnams dag gis blangs/ /de ni 'bangs mo phred ldan ma/ /zhes pa gcig gis gus pa yis/ /ji srid rnal du gnas gyur pa/ /de srid rim gro mchog tu byas/ /mdza' 
134b1(mdo 'grel): zhing phan pas rab 'dud pa/ /byas shes de ni de dang ldan/ /zla mtshan dus su 'grogs gyur bas/ /de la bu ni bcos par gyur/ /gang tshe de skyes pa yi ni?/ /don kun gang ba nyid du gyur/ /byis pa zla nya ltar mdzes de/ /de tshe gang po zhes par gyur/ /phu bo gsum gyis chud ma
134b2(mdo 'grel): blangs/ /rgya mtshor nor don gnyer du song/ /gang bos phra yi tshong khang du/ /'dug nas nor ni sgrub pa bya/ /de nas de dag nor thob ste/ /rgya mtsho las kyang grong khyer du/ /slar log gser ni 'bum phrag rnams/ /bgrang bar byas te dga' bar gyur/ /de dag rgya mtshor bgrod
134b3(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /nor ni ji snyed byung gyur pa/ /rang gi khyim du gang bo la/ /de las lhag bzod gis byung/ /de mthong de dag rnams kyi pha/ /rgan pos 'jug gi nyi ma la/ /de la phan smras sred bas ni/ /rgud tshe du mnyams ba bskyed/ /ngal dub chen po med pa yis/ /gang pos nor ni nyer
134b4(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs pa/ /rgya mtsho'i rnyed pa dag la ni/ /yongs dal byas pa khyod kyis mthong/ /dge ba'i las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /nor don gnyer ba don yod 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi lag nas 'bros par byed/ /gzhan gyis lhud bar gyur pa thob/ /dam pa'i lam ni yongs ma btang//
134b5(mdo 'grel): rigs dang mi rigs rnam dpyad cing/ /yul dang dus ni yongs shes las/ /dam pa kun tu phun sum tshogs/ /blo bzang skal ldan rang khyim du/ /chos kyi bgo skal ldan par 'gyur/ /gzhan ni rin chen 'byung gnas su/ /song nas srog la the tshom 'thob/ /nor gyi nye
134b6(mdo 'grel): bar gnas pa mchog /dam pas 'bad de rtogs par bya/ /'khu med dag pa'i blo ldan la/ /nor sbyin dpal ni rang dbang 'gyur/ /rtag tu khyed ni 'grogs pa yis/ /dbye ba dag gi bsrung bar bya/ /rigs ni bye bas dge ba dag /zag bar 'gyur te bum chu bzhin/ /ji
134b7(mdo 'grel): ltar bud shing bye ba yis/ /me yi 'od ni mtshungs pa nyams/ /da bzhin rigs rgyud chen po yi/ /gnyen 'dun bye ba'i 'byor pa'o/ /chung mas rtag tu mtshan mo ni/ /sdang ba'i rig byed bslabs pa yi/ /spun zla bye ba'i rgyud dag ni/ /des pa nyid du ji ltar zlog /ji
135a1(mdo 'grel): srid sta de rno lta bu'i/ lung med nang du ma zhugs ba/ /de srid rang rigs smyig ma ni/ /mthon po rnam gnyis mi 'gyur ro/ /nor la rtsod pas spun zla ltar/ /smod cing rtsub pas bla ma dang/ /gcig la 'dod bas grogs po la/ /bud med kyis ni sdang
135a2(mdo 'grel): du 'jug /grogs kyi mdza' gcugs rtsa ba nas/ /'byin pa'i rgyur ni rab 'byung? gang/ /de ni bud med smin mdag /g.yo zhing rgod kyang smra bar byed/ /bu rnams 'byor bar mngon 'dod bas/ /phan pa 'di brjod 'byur pa ni/ /mi rtags pa las mongs? ma grol/ /dus
135a3(mdo 'grel): kyis pha rol song bar gyur/ /nor ni dgos ba min ba'i tshe/ /phu bo rnams ni yul gzhan du/ /nor ni sgrub la chags gyur ring/ gang pos khyim du nong la bsams/ dus kyi khang par 'ongs pa dang/ /gos dang zas la rtsod pa dang/ /rnam par bud med sngags byin pas/ /de
135a4(mdo 'grel): dag rnams ni bye bar gyur/ /de nas nor ni 'god pa na/ /sdang bas dbang byas de dag gis/ /'di ni 'bangs mo'i bu zhes brjod/ /gang po'i skal ba med bar byas/ /de yang nor gyis gang dus su/ /lam du so ga'i tsha ba la'ang/ /grang bas 'phongs shing nyen pa yis/ /shing
135a5(mdo 'grel): ni khur bdag cig mthong/ /de yis de las shing gi naM/ /rin gyis shing gi khung po blangs/ /sreg byed pa yang bsil ster ba/ /lha yi tsan dan ngag tu mthong/ /legs byas chen po nyid kyis bzhin/ /de yis nod chen thob bas de/ /ded dbon rnams kyis bsten bya ste/ /sa yi
135a6(mdo 'grel): bdag pos mchod byar gyur/ /slong ba rnams la kun ster nges?/ /rin chen 'byung gnas lan drug bgrod/ /tshong ba kun gyi gru bcas dang/ /sho gam la sogs rjes bzung byas/ /slab yang mnyan yod gnas ba yi/ /don mthu mtshong bas gsol btab nas/ /rgya mtsho'i
135a7(mdo 'grel): gling du mgyogs bar ni/ /gzings la rab tu zhon nas song/ /de nas gzings ni slar gos? tshe/ /tshigs su bcang ba bstan pa'i ri/ /bde gshegs brten tshong pa rnams/ /glu ru len pa de yis thos/ /'di ni su yi zhes de dres/ /de dag kun gyis legs smras
135b1(mdo 'grel): ba/ /'di dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /blo ldan gyis gsungs chigs su bcang/ /ces ba sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas/ /de yis dga' ba thob par gyur/ /skyes bu rang la bag chags gnas/ /brjod pas gsal ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de dag gis ni rgyas bshad pa'i//
135b2(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam dgra des/ /thos nas de la yid song ste/ /de ni blta bar 'dod par gyur/ /rim gyis khyim du 'ongs nas des/ /yo byad thams cad yongs btang ste/ /grogs po mgon med zas sbyin ni/ /lta ru mnyan du yod par song/ /rab tu 'byung bar mngon
135b3(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa/ /de la dbang po thul bas bshad/ //de dang lhan cig gus pa yis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song/ /gti mug mun pa nyin mor byed/ /kun mkhyen der ni nges mthong nas/ /de yi zhabs mthong nyid na nges/ /bya ba byas pa nyid du bsams/ /de yi rtag pa bcom
135b4(mdo 'grel): ldan gyis/ /rnam par mkhyen nas de la ni/ /phyogs rnams tshems kyi zla 'od kyis/ /dri med dben par mdzad cing gsungs/ /dge slong tshur shog dogs med cing/ /mi mthun phyogs bral nyams pa spangs/ /legs par gsungs ba'i chos 'dul la/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad
135b5(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'o/ /ces pha rab dbang? ba tshul gyis/ /rgyal bas sngon du brjod ba'i tshe/ /de yi lus la 'phral nyid du/ /mtshon pa med par rab byung ltar/ /rab tu zhi las dgra dang ni/ /grogs la mtshungs par bsten pa de/ /ston pa'i bga' ni rab bzung nas/ /de la phyag ni 'tshal te
135b6(mdo 'grel): song/ sro na'i pha rol 'gram zhes yul/ /ma rungs skye bo'i gnas su ni/ /rang nyid bzod pa yongs rtogs shing/ /skye bo dag dang lhan cig song/ /ri dags shor ba la mi shis/ /de ni de nas 'od mthong nas/ /rngon pa rnams kyi gzhu bkad ste/ /khro bas gsod bar yang dag gzas//
135b7(mdo 'grel): rnam 'gyur med cing mya ngan med/ /'jigs pa der ni thal ba de/ /snun cig ces kyang brjod mthong nas/ /de dag zhi ba thob par gyur/ /rngon pa 'phral la zhi gyur pa/ /de la rab tu dang ba nges/ /gang gis de ni rjes 'brang bcas /byang chub rtogs byed chos bstan to/ /der ni bde
136a1(mdo 'grel): gshegs la zos pa'i/ /yo byad thams cad phun tshogs pa'i/ /gtsug lag khang ni nyams dga' ba/ /lnga brgya dag ni de yi byas/ /gang bo'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs/ /skabs gsum pa yis mchong ba thob/ /thub pa rnams kyi dgyes bya ba/ /chags bral
136a2(mdo 'grel): dpal dang ldan bar gyur/ /de nas de yis sngon skyes spun/ /'byor ldan dus kyi nor rnams ni/ /zad pa nyid du rab gyur te/ /nor gyi bsam bas rgya mtshor song/ /de nas de ni gzings la zhen/ /rdzas mthun yang dag g.yo ba yis/ /go sh+rI yi tsan dan gnas/ /nyi ma nyung dus
136a3(mdo 'grel): sleb par gyur/ /sta re thogs pa lnga brgya yis/ /de ni mchog gi tsan dan man? gas/ /lag 'gro'i tshogs kyis rgyas gyur pa/ /de la gcod par zhugs ba'i tshe/ /de nas gnod sbyin sde yi rje/ /dbang phyug chen po zhes grags pa/ /khros te 'jigs ba'i rlung chen ni/ /ka li
136a4(mdo 'grel): ka? zhes bya ba sgros/ /rlung ni chen bor gyur ba nges?/ /srog la the tshom thong gyur pa/ /tshong ba kun gyi dbang phyug dang/ /brgya byin la sogs lha rnams pos/ /mu cor gdung sgrogs de dag la/ /ngon mthun 'dren pa 'byor lin ni/ /rjes su gdung bas 'khrugs pa yis/ /yun
136a5(mdo 'grel): ring bsams nas rab smras pa/ /sbun zla gzhon ba gang po nges/ /phan 'dod bdag la sngon smras pa/ /nyon mongs mang zhing bde ba nyung/ /chu gteng ngur khrod ga la' gro/ /blo ldan bden pa mthong gyur pa/ /de yi tshig ni ma byas pas/ /'jigs rung sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'dir/ /nor
136a6(mdo 'grel): la chags pas bdag lhung ngo/ /de dag thos nas chod pa kun/ /gang po'i mthu ni 'jig rten? bu/ /rnam par grags pa yid la bsgoms/ /de nyid la ni skyabs su song/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs dug gi skyon/ /'phrog cing snying rje rgyal ba yi/ /bdud rtsis yang dag rdzogs ba'i thugs//
136a7(mdo 'grel): gang po khyod la phyag 'tsha lo/ /zhes pa de dag rnams gyi sgra/ /'byangs gcig gis ni mkhar khangs tshe/ /sked cig la byin dre? yi spyang/ /gang po la smras rang gi lhas/ /sro na'i pha rol 'bram gnas pa/ /de yis de dag bslang thos nas/ /ting 'dzin bsgrubs pas nam mkha' 
136b1(mdo 'grel): la dod? skad cig gis ni gzings can phyin/ /der ni de yis skyil krung bcas/ /lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo bas/ /'jig? dus rlung 'tshug lta bu yi/ /rlung gi shugs kyis 'gro ba phrogs/ /gang pos rlung ni bkag pa dag /gnod sbyin tshogs kyi gtso bos shes/ /de la dang bas tsan dan
136b2(mdo 'grel): nags/ /de dag rnams la btang nas song/ /gang ? drin gyis tsan dan shing/ /'byor len dag gis blangs nas ni/ /snga gis grong khyer slob 'drar/ /dga' bas de dang lhan cig song/ /de nas gadpos spun la bgros/ /go shirSha? yi tsan dan gyis/ /bde gshegs la 'os khang bzang
136b3(mdo 'grel): der tsan dan phreng ba zhes tha byas/ /der ni gang pos bsam pa na/ /bcom ldan ma rgyogs bar nam mkha' las/ /rgyal byed tshal nas dpag tshad brgya/ /'das nas yang dag byon par gyur/ /bcom ldan byon pa'i sngon du ni/ /sku yi 'od ze4r rab spros pa/ /gser bzhin da ni 'jig
136b4(mdo 'grel): rten rnams/ /thams cad ser po nyid du gyur/ /de mthong grang gi nye 'khor na/ /gnas pa khyim gyi bud med rnams/ /dang po'i sems ni drag po yi/ /rab zhi nyid la mngon phyogs gyur/ /gang gis de dag srid pa las/ /bzlas nas dge 'thob bcom ldan gyis/ /dge bar 'os pa'i bden
136b5(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /de dag rnams la bstan pa mdzad/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul dag gis der/ /mchod rten grang pa'i bud med brjod/ /de dag gis bskrun da lta yang/ /mchod rten phyag byed phyag 'tshal byed/ /bcom ldan gyis ni thub rnams dang/ /de bzhin thub pa shing shun can/ /rab tu byung
136b6(mdo 'grel): bas rjes bzung nas?/ /dag pa'i chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan rgyal bas ni/ /bang? bzang? tsan dan phred zhes byar/ /dab zhugs 'gro ba'i tshogs kyi khur/ /bzod pa shel gyi rang bzhin mdzad/ /nga nas der ni snying rje'i gter/ /rin chen khri la rab zhugs ta/ /sems
136b7(mdo 'grel): can thams cad gi ? slad/ /rnam bar grol ma bstan? pa mdzad/ /skabs der thub dbang nag po dang/ /go tam rjes 'brang bcas/ /chos nyan pa la mngon phyogs te/ /ston pa'i bstan pa 'ongs par gyur/ /de nas der ni bcom ldan kyis/ /khang bzang rab tu blangs pa mdzad//
137a1(mdo 'grel): dge slong dang 'grogs rgyal byed kyi/ /tshal du slar yang gshegs par brtson/ /gshegs shing mong+gol bu yi ma/ /'jig rten 'od zer can gnas pa/ /tshig gis 'phags pa'i bden pa yis/ /gzhom med chos kyi lam la bkod/ /de nas bcom
137a2(mdo 'grel): ldan rgyal byed kyi/ /tshal gshegs gang po'i bsod nams la/ /ya mtshan ldan ba'i dge slong gis/ /dris shing des kyang bka' stsal ba/ /sngon gyi yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od srungs kyi ni dge 'dun gyi/ /gtsug lag khang skyong nye gnas su/ /skye ba gzhan la gang
137a3(mdo 'grel): por gyur/ /nam zhig de yis gtsug lag khang/ /sa gzhi byi dor ma byas mthong/ /re mos bab pa'i rab byung la/ /khro ba drag pos rab tu smras/ /ded 'dir gtsug lag khang ma phyags/ /dregs dang ldan pa 'bangs mo'ibu/ /su yi des la bab pa zhes/ /brjod cing ngal rab tu
137a4(mdo 'grel): smad/ /tshig rtsub sdig pa de yis ni/ /dmyal ba'i ngan 'gror sdug bsngal spyad/ /skye ba lnga brgyar gang po des/ /'bangs mo yi ni bu ru gyur/ /dge 'dun ? pa nyid ni 'di'i/ /bsod nams chen po'i slad gyur te/ /gang gis srid pa'i nyon mongs rnams/ /ma lus spangs pa'i
137a5(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom bsten/ /de ltar bsod nams bsags pas rab bskun pa/ /gang bo'i mthu ni rmad byung rgyal ba yis/ /mdun sar bshad pa thos nas dge slong tshogs/ /bsod nams bsngags la mngon par dga' bar gyur/ /ces pa dag ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems
137a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gang po'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste/ /sum cu bdun pa'o// //ci yang med pa'i bde slad? chags pa med pas chags bral dpal 'byor ? byed pa/ /thams cad btang nas lus kyi grogs ldan dam pa
137a7(mdo 'grel): rnams ni zhi slad nags su 'gro?/ /der yang tshul 'chos brtul zhugs dag la yo byad rtsom? pa gal te sogs byed na/ /mdzod kyi yo byad nyer mkho de dag rnams kyis khyim du gnod pa ci zhig byas/ /rgyal brgyal? byed gtsug lag khang/ /kun dga' ra bar sngon bzhugs pas
137b1(mdo 'grel): mdun du shAkya'i rgyal pu rnams/ /rab tu byung ba bsten pa yi/ /bkra ba'i gos dbang ma ba'i snod/ /pus 'khyung la sogs bsrags pa dag/ rab tu mang ba gzigs gyur nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag bsams/ /kye ma 'di dag 'dud yang/ /lus la sdug
137b2(mdo 'grel): pa yo byad 'dzin/ /mngon par khengs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /'ching ba'i rgyu ni yod ma zlog/ lus la lus kyi chas rnams te/ /de la nye khar mkho ba'i ri phreng/ /de yi yo byad 'dzin pa ni/ /kye ma 'ching ba'i lcags sgrog yin/ /de ltar bsams nas bcom ldan 'das/ /
137b3(mdo 'grel): dben par gnas pa bsgrugs pa yis/ /nyer 'dzin rnams la snying rje las/ /dge ba'i slad du yang dag brtson/ /dge slong rnams kyis mi slong slad/ /zla ba gsum du bdag la ni/ /sus kyang nye bar gnas mi bya/ /zhes pa'i bgro ba mdzad bar gyur/ /ngas pa de lar bzhugs
137b4(mdo 'grel): tshe/ /dge slong dgan pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /chos gos dman ldan nye ba'i sde/ /zhes pa dgos pa'i slad du 'ongs/ /rab bzlog skal ba ldan pa des/ /bde gshegs mthong ba yang dag thob/ /bya ba byas te ska gcig 'dug/ /de la phyag 'tshal rab tu song/ /dge slong rnams
137b5(mdo 'grel): kyis bgrod de la/ /yongs bskor mngon du phyin te dris/ /'phags pa khyod la bcom ldan gyis/ /kye ma mthong ba ji ltar gnang/ /'di yi bka' la zla gsum du/ /dge 'dun dag gis mthong med ba'i/ /des pa gang de lam min nas/ /bgrod pa khyad kyis ji ltar ba shig?
137b6(mdo 'grel): de dag chog de thos gyur nas/ /ltag par 'dzum zhing nye sde yis/ /de dag la smras bdag gis ni/ /ngas pa yang dag nyams ma byas/ /bdag gis lra ba'i gnas skabs na/ /bcom ldan rang gis bka' stsal la/ /dge slong dgon pa rnams ni/ /lta bdag gis bkag?
137b7(mdo 'grel): ba med/ /yo byad nyar mkho yongs btang zhing/ /'ching ba dag las des grol ba/ /shing drung phyag der khrod bdag/ lta ba dag na zlog pa med/ /lhung bzad chos gos tshogs rnams la/ /'di dang rang 'od gzhan no zhes/ /gang zhig bsags pa la dga' ba/ /de la
138a1(mdo 'grel): 'dir ni mthong ba med/ /gang zhig ra? bzhi'i brtul zhugs yo byad dag la 'bad pas mngon par khengs 'di 'ching/ /de dag tsan dan rkang 'thung dag las yang dag gdung byed me ni nye bar skrun/ /kha bas rab rgyas bsil ba'i chu rnams dag gis de dag
138a2(mdo 'grel): mchog tu skom pas gdung/ /myang 'das bgegs med gter gyi gnas la do dag? bkren zhing phongs pa nyid du gyur/ /nye sdes de skad brjod thos nas/ /shAkya'i sge slong de dag rnams/ /skyongs pas spro ba zad gyur pas/ /'phral la nyid du rnam par bsams/ /'di dag bcom
138a3(mdo 'grel): ldan gyis gsungs pa/ /bang? gcag ched yin gzhan la min/ /gang phyir chos gos bkra ba'i tshogs/ /bdag cag kho nas rab tu gyon/ /'dod bral rnams la ston pa dgyes/ /'dod chen bdag chags la dgyes min/ /de slad 'dod pa yongs gtang na/ /bdag cag de yiS
138a4(mdo 'grel): bzhed par 'gyur/ /zhes bsams de dag thams cad kyis/ /rab tu gyon pa las lhag pa'i/ /mdzes pa'i gos kyi tshogs btang nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song/ /'dod pa bral tshe bcom ldan gyis/ /'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo ni/ /ye shes rdo rjes rnam bcom
138a5(mdo 'grel): gang/ /de dag rjes su bzung ba mdzad/ /rgyun zhugs 'bras bu la rig? pa/ /shAkya'i rgyal sras rnam dag gi /sngon byung dge slong rnams kyis dris/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ /ba ra NA sir sngon byung ba/ /sa yi bdag lo tshangs pas byin/ /gang dpung sa 'dzin
138a6(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa yis/ /lag brnyan phyogs kyi gnyis 'thung bzhin/ /de yi btsun mo mu tig gi/ 'khri shing bzhin du yon tan can/ /skyes bu dam pa'i snyan ba bzhin/ /grags pa tshangs ldan ma zhes gyur/ /dri med bsams pa dang ldan de/ chu la rtse ru song ba'i tshi/ /bdag po'i gzugS
138a7(mdo 'grel): brnyan lta bu'i bu/ /mtshan mchog ldan pa bcos par gyur/ /chu nang du skyes byis pa de/ /chu skyes shes ni? bya bar gyur/ /yab kyi rgyal tshab bzhed ba dang/ /mtshungs pa nyid du che bar skyes/ /de ni skyes ba'i nyin bar la/ /blon po lnga brgyas mtshungs par ni/ /gzugs ni
138b1(mdo 'grel): mtshungs ba'i bu rnams dag/ lnga brgya rab tu thob par gyur/ /rang gi skye ba 'di layang/ /rim gyis sngon byung dran gyur nas/ /bdag nyid la phan legs byas kyis/ /dus la bab par yang dag bsams/ /lo na drig cu tham par sngon/ /bdag gi rgyal tshab byas pa ni/ /mi bzang
138b2(mdo 'grel): dmyal ba yun ring du/ /nyam ? sdug bsngal gdud ba thob/ /slad nas skye ba 'di la yang/ /rgyal mtsho bdag na nye bar gnas/ /rnam pa kun tu gsol btab kyang/ /bdag ni sdig pa mi byed do/ /zhes pa deyis yun rings bsams/ /rgyal srid longs spyod las phyir phyogs
138b3(mdo 'grel): pa ni yid 'byung skyes byed ba'i/ /lags pa 'phye bo bzung bar gyur/ /mtshan nyid thams cad ldan mod kyang/ /rgyal po'i lugs kyi sdod ma gyur/ /gnyen rnams sdug bsngal bskyed byed de/ /lkugs pa 'phye bo zhes par gyur/ /mtshon dang bstan bcos stobs rgyas pa//
138b4(mdo 'grel): blon po'i bu rnams kyis thob tshe/ /rgyal sras rab tu cher gyur kyang/ /ldang ba ma yin smra ba min/ /de nas de yi lus skyon gyis/ /sman ni sa yi dbang pos dris/ /sman pas smras pa rgyal po yi/ /sras lam chod mthong ba med/ /gal te bde ba bstan pa 'di'i/ /skyon ni
138b5(mdo 'grel): goms las skyes gyur pa/ /de lta'ang 'di ni 'jigs pa yi/ /shugs las ldang 'gyur sbra bar 'gyur/ /zhes pa sman pas smras pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin zhes smras sa dbang gis/ /rdzun gyis gsod pa'i sa ru ni/ /'jigs pa bgyi slang bu btang gyur/ /smod byed skyes bu de dag la
138b6(mdo 'grel): shing rta la gnas des smras pa/ /ba ra NA si 'din ni/ /skye bo 'ga' zhig yod dam med/ /ces pa de yis tshig thos nas/ /des de mi bdag drung du khyer/ /der ni yab kyis gsal btab kyang/ /slar yang lkug pa nyid du gyur/ /slar yang gsod sar khrid pa na/ /ro zhig mthong
138b7(mdo 'grel): nas des smras pa/ /ro 'di 'tsho ba yin nas ni/ /bdag nyid kun gyis shi ba yin/ /'thos yab kyi ngos su des/ /bkod tshe slar yang smra bcad byas/ /slar yang gsod 'jigs nyid slad khyed/ /de dag la ni las su smras/ /gang zhog 'bru yi phung po 'di/ /gang phyir de zos
139a1(mdo 'grel): rjes su za/ zhes pa'i tshig 'di brjod kyang rlung/ /pha yi mdun du cang mi smra/ /de nas de las bdag gis/ /bshad pas rab? smad bstan pa'i tshe/ /de yis smras ba mchog gter na/ /bdag ni smra zhing rkang bas 'gro /de nas rgyal po dgyes pa yis/ /de
139a2(mdo 'grel): la mchog ster rjes thos tshe/ /rang gi rkang pas mngon phyogs te/ gsal bar de yi phal smras/ /bdag ni 'phyi min bdag lkugs min/ /bsam pa blun po'ang bdag min te/ /'on kyang skye ba gzhan nyon mongs/ /dran zhing rnam par 'khrug ma bsten/ /lo ni drug cu
139a3(mdo 'grel): bdag gis sngon/ /rgyal tshan bde ba longs spyod nas/ /lo ni stong phrag drug cu dag/ dmyal? ba'i nang du gnas par gyur/ /de slad bdag ni rgyal po yis/ /'jigs nas lkugs 'phye 'di nyid byas/ /rab byung tshangs bar spyad pa dag/ spyod pa 'di ni bdag gi mchog
139a4(mdo 'grel): ces pa de yis brjod thos nas/ /ma lkugs shes pas dga' thob cing/ /chags bral zhes pas sdug bsngal ba'i/ /sa yi bdag pos de la smras/ chos kyi rtsa ba rgyal srid 'di/ /bu kye btang bar mi 'os so/ /mchod sbyin sbyin pa skye dgu skyobs/ /mi bdag dpal
139a5(mdo 'grel): ni bsod nams rdzogs/ /bu gcig pa bdag bu khyod kyis/ /chags pa yongs su btang ba las/ /gnyid kyi dbul ba thob gyur cing/ /mya ngan lam stan dag la brten/ /yongs rdzogs zla ba ltar mdzes shing/ /mu tig gsal bar rgod pa can/ /phun sum tshogs
139a6(mdo 'grel): pa spangs nas khyod/ /rab 'byung ji ltar mngon par 'dod/ /rgyal po la 'os bde ba yi/ /mal stan mchog ni yongs btang nas/ /nags ma'i gnas la zhen pa yis/ /rdul khrod sa gzhi ji ltar bsten/ /rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ma tol pa'i me long nor bu
139a7(mdo 'grel): dang ldan khang pa ni/ /'di dag btang nas nags kyis gzhi 'jigs rung stag ni yang dag rgyu bar byed/ /bstan? ba'i sprul ni rgan po'i dbugs kyi bsreg pa dang gi bar? man gyur ba/ /'khri shing nyung ba de dag rnams kyis mnyes gzhin khyod ni dgyes
139b1(mdo 'grel): bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /zhes pa yab kyi tshig thos nas/ /rgyal po'i bu yis der smras ba/ /mchu mdzes so yi 'od kyi ni/ /chags bral len du 'jug pa bzhin/ /chu ni bsil zhing dri ma med/ /chog shes ri bong ldan pa bsil/ /chags bral skal pa bzang po'i sa/ /nags
139b2(mdo 'grel): tshal ma ni su mi dga' / /gzhan gyi chung ma dag la bzhin/ /bde myung ngan bsam btang ba/ /gang zhig dmyal rkyen gnod bcas kyi/ /dga' ba rnams la bdag mi dga' / /bsam gtan sngags dang yengs shes dang/ /dbang po rnams ni thul ba dang/ /'tshe bas rgyal po'i
139b3(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba 'di/ /'bad pa med par dmyal ba ster/ /nags kyi sa gzhi me tog rab rgyas 'khor ba dag la rgod po 'dra/ /ngo bo nyid kyis mkhas pa rnams la zhi ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba bskyed/ /bsams pa yis ni mchog tu ngal zhing rlung yab rlung gi shugs rings
139b4(mdo 'grel): mang/ /sa bdag rnams kyi 'byor ba 'di ni nges par bde ba'i grogs ma yin/ /yab cig bdag la rjes gnang gsol/ /bdag ni dka' thub nags su 'gro/ mi rtag pa nyid dngos kun gyi/ /rtse mor chags pa mkhyen lags sam/ /zhes pa bu yi tshig thos nas/ /de de
139b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin zhes rnam par bsams/ /sa bdag mkhas pa ngo mtshar ni/ /rgyal bar gyur bas de la smras/ /dri med dben pa'i nags tshal du/ /bu khyod gal te 'gro 'dod ni/ /re zhig bdag gi the tshom gsol/ /phyi nas rigs par phyed 'gyur ro/ /khyod ni gsod sar 'gro ba yis//
139b6(mdo 'grel): 'khyog po dag tu tshig mang po/ /smras pa de dag dgongs pa ni/ /de bzhin nyid du brjod par 'os/ /sa yi bdag pos dris pa dang/ /des smras bdag gis brjod pa de/ /'di ni su zhig bdag gsod las/ /khyod kyis zlag pa mi gnas sam/ /legs byas dag gi ro
139b7(mdo 'grel): yang gson/ /sdig ldan shi ba min yang shi/ /bsod nams snga ma'i rtsa ba spyod/ /nor ldan rnams kyi 'bru phung bzhin/ /zhes ba'i bsams pa bdag gis ni/ /tshig ni gsum po de dag brjod/ /ces pa thos nas sa yi bdag/ de la yongs su khyud gus bcas
140a1(mdo 'grel): pas/ bu gcig dge ba'i slar du ni/ /rigs pa mdzod ces rab tu smras/ /de nas yab ni mig chu dang/ /bcas pas rjes gnang nags tshal du/ /blon po'i bu ni lnga brgya dang/ /lhan cig rab tu song bar gyur/ /der ni drang srong che drung du/ /rjes 'brad bcas pas
140a2(mdo 'grel): rab byung thob/ /dus gyis de dag ril ba dang/ /shing shun bsags pa de yis mthong/ /de nas bsags pa la sdang des/ /de dag mi ltar pas byas nas/ /blo gros chen pos ji tsam dug skye bos dben sar gcig pu bsdad/ /mthong dang smra ba des pa yis/ /bsdams kyang
140a3(mdo 'grel): 'dod dgar 'ongs ba yis/ /rin gsal ni dge ba dag/ legs par 'ongs shes smras nas dris/ /slar yang thub par rigs kyi/ /brtal zhugs de yis mchod mthong nas/ /blon po'i bu rnams thams cad ni/ /skyengs par 'gyur bas yang dag bsams/ /nags su
140a4(mdo 'grel): yongs 'dzin med pa yis/ /ri dwags ri dwags brtul shugs 'di/ /gos dang dbyug ba'i tshogs dag gis/ /phun tshogs sangs po 'di dag mchod/ /de yi don du 'di yis ni/ /bdag cag lta la des pa byas/ /brtul shugs yo byad bsags pa na/ /'di dag gi
140a5(mdo 'grel): yang bzlog gam snyam/ /zhes pa bsams nas de dag gis/ /brtul shugs yo byad bsags pa kun/ /chu yis rlung du rab spangs nas/ /dag pas de dang nye bar phyir/ /'dzin pa'i sa spangs de dag gi /khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de/ /bsam pa bag lat? la
140a6(mdo 'grel): dag dang/ /'os pa'i chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /rgyal po'i bu de pa 'di de/ /blon po'i bu rnams shAkya rnams/ /da lta'ang bdag gis de dag la/ /gtong ba nyer bstan 'di slar byas/ /zhes pa shAkya gzhon nu rnams kyi sngon byung ni/ /rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs pa de dag des
140a7(mdo 'grel): bzung ste/ /sten byed rnams la gnyes gshin ldan par gyur ba de'i/ /thugs rje de ni dge slong tshogs kyis rab tu mchod/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas ba'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /lkugs pa 'bye po'i rtogs
140b1(mdo 'grel): pa brjod pa'i yal 'da' ste sum cu brgyad pa'o// //brtan pa'i khur gyis mi gdud lhag ma bzhin/ /legs byas bzod pa gang gis bzod pa 'dzin/ /rnam 'gyur med ba'i mdzes pa rmad byung bskyed/ /brtan ldan de dag mchog tu rgyal gyur cig/ /sngon gyi bsod nams
140b2(mdo 'grel): phyin ci log pas sngon/ /gnod sbyin 'dir skyes skye dgu rnams kyi dgra/ u dum ba zhes bya ba drag por ni/ /gdud pas 'jigs la dus byas bzhin du gyur/ /'jig rten la brtse mgon med rnams kyi mnyan/ /bcom ldan zhib brjod pas 'phral la ni/ /dus min dus der
140b3(mdo 'grel): bslab pa nyer bstan cing/ /skyabs 'gro rab ldan 'dul ba dag la bkod/ /srid ba'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bde/ /bde gshegs de dus 'dzum skyes rgyu ba la/ /rab tu dga' nas lta ru 'ongs gyur pa/ /mtho ris bdag pos phyag 'tshal 'di skad smras/ /ci slad glo bur 'dzum pa'i
140b4(mdo 'grel): zla ris kyis/ /khyod zhal chu skyes rmad byung slad du mdzes/ /snying stobs bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho rgyu med du/ /'jig rten thun mong bzhin du bzhad ma lags/ /skabs gsum dbang phyug tshig de thos gyur nas/ /bcom ldan thams cad gzigs pas der gsungs pa/ /phyogs 'dir
140b5(mdo 'grel): rang gi sngon dran byung gyur nas/ /dbang po bdag la 'dzum pa 'di skyes so/ /sngon tshe nags tshal 'dir ni gnas gyur ba/ /khro ba'i skyon spangs thub pa bzod la dga' / /chags rdul rang bzhin srid la sdang ba gang/ /pad+ma dag la zla ba bzhin du gyur/ /de nas dpyid ka byang
140b6(mdo 'grel): phyogs 'dag po ni/ /chags ldan btsun mo'i tshogs bcas rtse dga' i slad/ /nags kyi nang rnams blta zhing dge mtshan gyis/ /de yi bsti gnas te ba'i sa gzhir 'ongs/ /chags ldan sa skyong rtsod ldan zhes pa des/ /rtse dga' la ni bud med rnam dag gis/ /rkang pas
140b7(mdo 'grel): bsnun dang ? yi chang gis kyang/ /mya ngan med mdzes pa ku? la dpal thob/ /dar ni phyogs rnams dka' thub pa rnams kyi/ /dka' thub nyams phyer khro chen smin 'khyog gi/ tshogs kyis bzhin dang 'dod me'i du bas bzhin/ /bung ba 'khor bas mun pa dang bcas 'gyur/ /rlung 
141a1(mdo 'grel): gis bskyod pa rtse dags g.yo ba dang/ /me tog phun bus dud pa nu mas rgu/ /yal 'dab dmar po dang dan mchu sgros dmar/ /'khri shing rol rtsed bud med rnams kyis thob/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo dge mtshan rnam 'phrul la/ /nags su rgyu bas
141a2(mdo 'grel): chags las rnam grol zhing/ /g.yo med bsam gtan ting 'dzin la chags pa/ /drang srong de la yongs su bskor nas gnas/ /de nas mi dbang phyogs der mngon phyogs pas/ /bud med rnams kyis yongs bskor de mthong nas/ /phrag dog khro ba'i mi ni blta dka' 
141a3(mdo 'grel): des/ /de yi lag pa rkang ba myur du bcad/ /brtan pa rnam 'gyur med des yan lag tshogs/ /bcad kyang sa yi bdag la des ma khros/ /dri za gnod sbyin lto 'phye lha tshogs kyis/ /de la khro ba drag po dag las bzlog/ de nas mi dag rang gi grong song tshe/ /nags nas
141a4(mdo 'grel): 'ongs pa'i thub pa thams cad kyis/ /der ni yan lag bcad pa de mthong nas/ /bzod ldan dag kyang khro bas 'dar bar 'gyur/ /dmod pa 'debs la mngon phyogs de dag las/ /bzlog nas bzod par bya zhes de yis smras/ /bzod pas yang dag 'khyud pa'i yid ldan
141a5(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /khro ba'i las kyis chags par mi byed do/ /khro bral bdag gi rkang lag bcad gyur kyang/ /gal te rnam 'gyur shugs ldan ma gyur na/ /bden pa de yis nyams med lus ldan par/ /bdag gyur cig ces rab dang des slar smras/ /de nas bden tshig brjod pas
141a6(mdo 'grel): skad cig la/ /lag pa rkang ba 'byar zhing rma dag sos/ /lha yis bzod pa'i yon tan des bstod cing/ /snying stobs dkar ba'i me tog rnams kyis mchod/ /rgyal po'ang de sdig nag po brtsegs lta bus/ /chu bur gyis gtams sbyod tshul rnam par nyams/ /rab drag
141a7(mdo 'grel): rtag gi 'khor mor rnam 'khor zhing/ /'jig byed smin pa'i dmyal bar srong bar gyur/ /bzod dga' drang song chen por gang sngon gyur/ /nga nyid rtsod ldan gang de ltas byin no/ /brgya byin 'das pa'i spyod tshul dran pa la/ /bdag gi 'dzum pa 'di skyes rgyu med min/ /zhes
141b1(mdo 'grel): pa bcom ldan gsungs thos ya mtshan dag dang ldan pa'i yid rab dga' rnam rgyas spro bas gsal ba'i spyan gyi phreng 'dzin cing/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer reg pas padmo'i 'byung gnas rgyas pa bzhin/ /lha rnams bdag po dga' bas skabs gsum gnas su song bar gyur/ /ces pa dge
141b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtags pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /bzod pa la dga' ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / //chen po khyad 'phags mthob rnams ni nyams bar 'gyur ba yis/ skyon gyi rgyu ni skye
141b3(mdo 'grel): bo dran dang 'grogs ba kho na yin/ /'jug dogs shing ni des par 'bras bu skye bas lhan cig nyid/ /chu dang 'grogs pas rtsa ba phyung nas 'phral la 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa sngon/ /chu bo yid 'ongs ldan pa'i dogs/ /khang bzangs mdzes pa dang
141b4(mdo 'grel): ldan pa/ /yangs pa can na rnam par rgyu/ /nya pa'i tshogs kyis de yi chun/ /bsgral bar dka' zhing zab pa la/ /nam zhig rgya ni 'phangs pana/ /'jigs rung chu srin yang dag 'thon/ /mgo bo bco brgyad seng ge dang/ /gnyis 'thung stag dang bor bu'i bzhin/ /lus ni ri yi rnam pa
141b5(mdo 'grel): can/ /mi ni stong phrag dag gis ?/ /der ni de mthong rnam par skrag/ 'dren pa'i thag pa chad gyur cing/ /ngo mtshar g.yo med nya ba rnams/ /skad cig sdod min 'gro ba min/ /'khor ba las kyis rnam bkra bar/ /rnam 'gyur ngo mtshar zab mo ni/ /brgya dang ldan pa'i khyad
141b6(mdo 'grel): par rnams/ /su zhig gis ni rtsi bar byed/ /skabs der de yi chad du ni/ /'byung bar dgongs pa bcom ldan 'das/ /skye bo thams cad skyobs ba la/ dus mdzad rgyal ba yang dag byon/ /rgan po byis pa bud med bcas/ /ltad mo la 'tshogs skye bo dag/ bcom ldan gyis
141b7(mdo 'grel): gzigs 'jug dogs der/ /bstan ni yongs su bzung ba mdzad/ /dge slong tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa der mthong nas/ /chu gter phyir la log pa bzhin/ /skye bo thams cad der phyogs gyur/ /de mthong nyid kyis 'phral la ni/ /nya ba
142a1(mdo 'grel): nam par dud pa yis/ /srog chags 'ching ba yangs pa'i rgyal khor blta ru btang bar gyur/ /de yi gsung gis chul ?/ rgu srin na? la sogs tshogs/ /btang nas de dag kho bral bas/ /sdig pa yi ni dgra bor gyur/ /de dag gis bkod chu srin cha//
142a2(mdo 'grel): mdun du bcom ldan gyis gzigs nas/ /tshoms kyi mdzes pas snying ? yi/ /chu bo spro bzhan de la smras/ /bu kye sre skya khyod kyis ni/ /nyes par byas pa mi dran nam/ /'di yang dag gnyis spyad dag/ smin pa nyams su myong ba yin/ /khyod kyi mi dga' i grogs gyur ba
142a3(mdo 'grel): ma de de ltag na gnas/ /thams cad mkhyen pas de brjod tshe/ /de yis skye ba dran nas smras/ /khyab bdag bdag ni ser skya yin/ /rang gi nyes par byas pa dran/ /dag gnyis sbyang yongs smin pa/ /'di ni nyams su myong bar gyur/ /dmyal ba ston byed bdag gi ma/ /sngon du
142a4(mdo 'grel): dmyal bdag tu skyes/ /shes pa smras nas chu srin der/ /nga ro drag pos rab tu dus/ /mya ngan rgya mtshor byad de la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas son khyod la/ /dus mi mde 'di ci zhig bgyi/ /bag med rnams kyi bsod nams min pa'i
142a5(mdo 'grel): rab tu rtsom pa bzu lums ngag/ rgong cing rangs pas bsgrubs pa dmyal bar yongs su smin la chags gyur tshe/ /nyon mongs 'babs pa dag dang mtshungs pa'i rjes su 'gyod pa ma zhi bas/ /dul skyabs pa rnams la mtshan mo so sor mchog tu gdud bar byed
142a6(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal skad cig gis 'jig slad/ /bdag la sems ni dang bar byos/ /dad pa'i yid kyis dus byas na/ /lha yi gnas su khyod bgrong 'gyur/ /mnyes gshin phan pa 'di yang nyon/ /rnam par dpyod la yid la gyis/ /'du byed thams cad mi rtag cing/ /zhi ba
142a7(mdo 'grel): myang 'das 'jig bu med/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bza' 'di yis/ /de ni ? dang gyur pa'i tshe/ /skye ba'i tshogs dang yun ring du/ /ngo mtsh+r g.yo ba med par gyur/ /de nas skye bos gus par ni/ /gsal btab 'phags pa kun dga' bos/ /bcom ldan 'das pa
142b1(mdo 'grel): ? sbyor nas/ /de yi sngon byung rab tu dris/ /de yis dris pa ye shes spyan/ /dri med de yis rab tu gsungs/ /sdig pa'i dang tshul 'di yi ni/ /'byung ba'i mdza' 'di mnyan par gyis/ /bskal ba bzang po dag la sngon/ /skye bo tsha lo khri phrag zung/ /grub tshe bcom ldan de bzhin
142b2(mdo 'grel): gshegs/ /'od srungs zhes pa byung bar gyur/ /bar NA ser de dus su/ /so skyong kri ki zhes bya ba/ /slob ba'i dpag bsam shing lta bu/ /mang po rab tu ster ba byung/ /nam zhig mkhas pa'i gnas su ni/ /mig stong gzhan la bzhin du gnas/ /der ni gnyis skyes ? byed ldan/ /smra
142b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i seng ge zhes pa 'ongs/ /thogs pa min par phrad pa dang/ /stan dang bsnyen bkur yang dag thob/ /slob ma'i phreng bas bskor ba des/ /de tshe rgyal la shis brjod pa/ /khyab bdag mkhas pa'i bdag po 'dun sar 'dug 'os shis ldan khyod ni shis gyur cig/ khyod kyi legs spyod
142b4(mdo 'grel): bdud rtsi dag la mchog tu sred lhan yang dag lta la chags/ /sa bdag gzhan gyi ming la snang ldan yon tan brjod la mu cor che bar sgrogs/ /yon tan kun gyi rten gnas khyod kyi glo bur nyid du bdag la skyon rnams sbyar/ /gang zhig slang ba rnams kyang bar med pa? chen char phab pas
142b5(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs slang ba'i don mthun yongs su tshim par byed gyur ba/ /de dag thams cad gtong pho dang ldan mtshungs med bsod nams gter/ /khyod kyi spyin pa ba kren med 'byor ba'i rnam par 'phel ba yn/ /rgyal po yon tan cung zad yongs su 'dris pa bdag gis bla ma dam pa dag/
142b6(mdo 'grel): brten las mkhas pa rgyal byed rigs ba'i cha shes ci yang thog/ yid 'ongs mkhas ba'i pad+ma'i chogs dang ldan pa'i 'dun nas 'dir/ /de yi tshig ni phul du byung ba'i yid ches 'ga' zhig? bdag gis bstan/ /skye bo dam pa'i blo ni rang gi yon tan brtsir ngo tsha/ /de lta na yang
142b7(mdo 'grel): smra 'dod drag pos mu cor sgrog tu bcag/ egyal po 'gro 'di dag na bdag gi tshig lan la sred ba'i/ /gal te mkhas pa yod na myur ba nyid du brtag par gyis/ /shes pa de'i gzhung gi tshig/ drag por snyems shing zag pa dag/ thos nas sa yi bdag po ni/ skyengs pas myur
143a1(mdo 'grel): ? yang dag bsam/ /gral te lan nus ma thob par/ /rgyags shing 'byas 'di song gyur na/ /de lta na 'di bdag yul gyis/ /grags pa min pa sgrog pa'i rnga/ /gang nas sa bdag blun por 'gyur/ /yon tan cing rnams dman par byed/ /de ? skye ba rig byed
143a2(mdo 'grel): la/ /yongs su dal ba byed ma yin/ /sa bdag chos kyis kun dga' ra/ /dri med dben pa'i snang ba can/ /'jig rten rig byed la 'dug ste/ /dam pa'i bya ba'i spyod la bzhin/ /de slad 'diyi rgyag pa ni/ /rab tu 'bad pas tshar gcad bya/ /yul ni rig byed kyis dbul ba/ /rigs
143a3(mdo 'grel): kyi bdag po nyid kyi skyon/ /de ltar bsams nas mi bdag gis/ /bram ze dkar pa Tar gnas pa/ /mkhas pa'i bla ma rnam dpyad nas/ /blon po chen pos 'gugs su bcug/ mkhan po rtog to rno ldan pa/ /sa bdag 'dun sa der 'ongs nas/ /smra ba'i seng ge'i dregs pa yi/ /ral
143a4(mdo 'grel): ba dag ni chad par byas/ /myur bar smra ba na lus las/ /rnam rgyal de yis pham pa de'i/ /dbyangs can ngo tshar gyur pa bzhin/ /smra bcad rgya ni yang dag thob/ /skar ma rnams ni 'char ba bzhin/ /mkhas pa gzi byin che rnams kyis/ /yon tan khyad 'phags la gnas pa/ /god
143a5(mdo 'grel): nas gong du mthong ba yin/ /de nas nor mang mi bdag gis/ /byin nas smra ba'i seng ge btang/ /grong khyer lta bu kar ba Ta/ /gnyis skyes rgyal ba dag la byin/ /de nas rgyal las glang po rta/ /dpung rgyan gdu bu mdzes pa thob/ /mkhan po dpal dang lhan cig tu/ /rang
143a6(mdo 'grel): gi khyim du rab tu zhugs/ /rgyal po'i dpyad pas bsgrubs pa dang/ tshong pa'i rgya mtsho nas bsgrubs dang/ /mkhas pa'i yon tan khyad 'phags kyis/ /bsgrubs ba'i dpal ni rnam par mdzes/ /dus kyis dpal dang ldan pa de/ /bu skyes kun tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /bde la'ang
143a7(mdo 'grel): bde ba phun tshogs pa/ /bsod nams las kyi mtshan nyid yin/ /skra ni ser skya gzi byin can/ /ser skya zhes bya byis pa de/ /cher skyes shig tu mkhas pa ni/ /? las mgnon par lhag bar byung ba rigs rgyud chen po dag la mkhas/ /mkhas pa la ni 'byor ba rgyas/ /'byor
143b1(mdo 'grel): ba khyad 'phags? dam pa'i bu/ /legs byas yal ga ldan pa'i 'bras/ /nam zhig nad kyi sbyor ba yis/ /lus ni 'jig la nye ba na/ /skye bo med sar bu bos nas/ ? gnyes gshin des smras pa/ /bdag gi gzhon la yon tan bsgrubs/ /dar la bab tshe nor rdzas bsgrubs/ /bu gcig
143b2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pha rol gyis/ /bad sgrub slar yang byas ba med/ /mtshams ni legs par bgrangs pa'i dus/ /bu lon ba bzhin 'ongs pa'i tshe/ /da ni 'khrugs te bdag gdan/ /rig de gang na nor gang na/ /yon tan me tog bde 'bras ldan/ /nor gyis rtsa bcings skye bo yi/ /nags su dus
143b3(mdo 'grel): min rdo rje bzhin/ /bzod dka' i dus ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /mdza' dag rig dang sgyu rtsal rnams kyis skye ba 'phen byed cing/ /skad cig bde ba'i rgyu ni nor rnams rab tu 'dzin par byed/ /rmongs pa'i slob ma mi rnams phyugs dang bul dga' bar byed/ /lus 'bral yud tsam dag la thams
143b4(mdo 'grel): cad gzhin te de yang gzhan/ /mdza' ba rmongs pas dbang byas bdag/ /khyed la phan pa 'di nrjod do/ /mnyes gshin mang du thos pa las/ /'khor ba'i snying po'i lam rig bya/ /dam par phyag bya rtsub mor smra mi bya/ /rab tu 'bad pas gzhan la phan la bya/ /skyes bu sdig pa'i g.yar
143b5(mdo 'grel): sar ltung rnams kyis/ /bsod nams 'di dag rnams ni rten sa yin/ /'byor ba dag la mchags mdzes pas rgyan/ /sdang med stobs dang rang bde lam rmongs/ /rtsa ba gsum po 'di la dge ba'i shing/ /'bras bu dam pa'i dpal ldanma lus gnas/ /ji srid sa yi dkyil 'khor
143b6(mdo 'grel): dag/ tshe zer gyis gdud de srid pa/ /'di na bu khyod mtshungs ba yi/ /mkhas pa smra ba po yod min/ /khyod kyis nam gyi dus na yod/ /dge slong rnams dang rtsod mi bya/ /sangs rgyas pa yi blo rab rgyas/ /ye shes zab cing rtogs bar dka' / /dge slong la sdon tshig gi don/ /bdag
143b7(mdo 'grel): gis dris che bdag la bshad/ /mkhas pa khyod kyi dri bdag/ bya ba ni shes zhes pa'ang smra/ /de ? dge slong la rtsod na/ /khyod mkhas mchog tu zhum par gyur/ /gang phyir stobs mthu 'dod pa yis/ /ri la spyi bos brdul mi bya/ /bul de smras bram ze na/ /'di gton pha rol sa la
144a1(mdo 'grel): song/ /lus kyi khang par lus can gyi/ /'gron rnams ring por mi gnas so/ /dus kyi smra mkhas por skya ni/ /mkhas pa ma lus nyams byed pa/ /yon tan mang bos rgyal po las/ /nor dang mchod chen rgyas pha thob/ /de nas nam zhig ser skya ni/ /rgol
144a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i rgyal srid thob pa la/ /dben par dal bus rang gi ma / /ka tsar zhes bya bas smras/ /rgol ba'i dreg pa gcod pa'i bu/ /phyogs dang gling las rgyal ba khyod/ /dge sbyod ngan pa dregs pa yis/ /long rnams ci slad yongs su gtong/ /gzhan las khyad 'phags la zhen
144a3(mdo 'grel): cing/ /mi mthun phyogs la bzod dka' ba/ /'dis mi bzod ces skad cig gis/ /gsal bar grags pa nyams par 'gyur/ /zhes pa ma yi tshig thos nas/ /mkhas ba'i mchog des rab smras pa/ /dge slong rnams dang rtsod mi bya/ /zhes te bdag ni pha yis bzlog/ gang
144a4(mdo 'grel): gis yon tan ldan rnams kyi/ /kha la mchod pa sman par byed/ /yi ge 'debs byed smra ba bo/ /bdag cag mtsho thabs 'di yang ngan/ /chen po rnams kyi bde gzhom slad/ /rtag tu gang zhig rab brtson pa/ /bla ma la sdad bzod dga' ba'i/ /mkhas pa gtum po 'di dag smad//
144a5(mdo 'grel): gang zhig g.yo sgyu med de blo/ /gang zhig chags pa bcom ste dpal/ /gang zhig dregs pa med de rig/ gang zhig bzod pa ldan te stobs/ /de lta nyid du gzhan rnams dang/ /sdang bas rtsod par mi bya na/ /'gro bas mchod 'os dge slong ni/ /grags pas mtshon dang slob ci dgos//
144a6(mdo 'grel): tshad mas yongs des de dag las/ /rgyal bar yang ni mi nus te/ /gang zhig bdag med bstan pa rnams/ /mi mthun phyogs kyis yod mi bskyod/ /ces pa bu'i tshig thos nas/ /khros te deyis de la smras/ /khyod kyi pha ni sdig pa can/ /dge slong 'bangs gyur ma yin
144a7(mdo 'grel): nam/ /bram ze'i rigs ni che bar skyes/ /mang du thos pa'i shes rab ldan/ /dge slong phyogs su lhung gyur pa/ /khyod kyang de dang mtshungs sam ci/ /tshad ma'i ral gri chen po yis/ /dge sbyong rnams ni tshar gcod mdzod/ /sprin gyi tshogs rnams ma bcom na/ /tshe zer? byed ba
144b1(mdo 'grel): mi mdzes so/ /zhes pa ma yi tshig gis bskul/ /de la gus pas bsdams pa des/ /dge slong rnams kyi bsti gnas su/ /dal bus 'gro bar yang dag brtsams/ /de ni bgrod pas shes 'dod nas/ /lam du dge slong 'ongs pa la/ /gzhung gi snying po tshad ma yang/ /dus su
144b2(mdo 'grel): 'os pa yang dag dris/ /des dris de yis rab smras pa/ /sgra don nges par sbas gyur pa/ /nges kyi tshang ma 'bum phrag gsum/ /bstan bcos mu stegs dag la dkon/ /mtsho ni gang las ldog 'gyur zhing/ /lam ni gang las ldog par 'gyur/ /gang du 'jig rten sdug bsngal
144b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bde ba yang ni 'gag par 'gyur/ /zhes pa bcom ldan ston pa yis/ /gsung ni sgra don zab mo dag /thams cad mkhyen pa ma bsten pas/ /ji ltar de ltar shes ma yin/ /de dag thos nas ser skya ni/ /tshigs bcad zab mos ya mtshan te/ /bcom ldan 'od srungs
144b4(mdo 'grel): dag gi na/ /dka' thub nags tshal gtsang mar song/ /der ni dge slong tshogs mthong nas/ /de la ma dang rab sgangs? te/ /snying dang bzhin ras rab dir? zhing/ /phrag dog bral bas rab tu bsams/ /gang zhig yang dag mthong nyid na/ /yid ni dri ma med 'thob pa/ /sdang ba'i rnyog la
144b5(mdo 'grel): de dag la/ /gdug pa bya bar su yis 'os/ /de ltar de yis yun rings bsams/ /de dang rtsod las phyir phyogs te/ /lam ring gyis dub rang khyim du/ /phyin nas mal rab smras pa/ /ma ma rtsod pa'i las la nga/ /khyod kyis bskul ba rdzun nyid do/ /don sbas gzhung smra dge slong
144b6(mdo 'grel): las/ /'jig rten du ni rgyal mi nus/ /lam du dge slong gcig gi ni/ /tshigs bcad tsam zhig bdag gis thos/ /don ma shes pas skyengs gyur te/ /shin tu yun ring ? sa la bltas/ /de yi gzhung la goms ma byas/ /su yis de la smra bar spobs/ /de dag rab byung
144b7(mdo 'grel): min pa la/ /rang gis bstan bcos 'chad mi byed/ /ces pa de yis brjod thos nas/ /ma yis de la rab smras pa/ /khyod kyi mngal? gyi khur gyis bdag /dal dub bskyed? ba nyid du zad?/ /'gran pa la ni khro bas stong/ /dman pas kun la rab tu 'dud/ /gnod pa byas la
145a1(mdo 'grel): mi sems pa'i/ /skyes pa de yis ci zhig byed?/ /rin chen mdza' dag 'jig rten na/ /rin ni gzi brjid nyid kyis che/ /gzi brjid 'tshob spangs pa yis/ /skyes bu'i srog gis ci zhig don/ /de gzhung thob slang rdzun gyis ni/ /rab tu byung ba cis mi bzung/ /skra
145a2(mdo 'grel): bcang mgo la ku sha dag/ slar yang skye bar 'gyur ram ci/ /zhes pha ma yis tshig gis de'i/ /yid ni rnyog pa nyid du 'gyur/ /'phral la dus min rlung chub kyi/ /rdul gyis nam mkha' 'gog pa bzhin/ /de nas rab zhi la chags pa'i/ /thog ldan de yis dge slong gi/ nags su phyin
145a3(mdo 'grel): nas rab byung blangs/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan bcos thob/ /dus kyi yon tan la gus pas/ /seng ge'i khri la yang dag 'dzegs/ /mkhas pa chos ni smra ba po/ /de yis chos ni bstan pa byas/ /ma yis bskul bar gyur pa des/ /bstan pa de la rim pa yis/ /dge
145a4(mdo 'grel): slong chos dang 'gal ba'i don/ /smra ba ru ni yang dag brtsams/ /chos la bsnun bas gdungs gyur pa'i/ /dge slong rnams kyi tshig dang tshig/ bzlog kyang de yis de dag la/ /bzhin gyi rnam 'gyur byas nas smras/ /gnas skabs min par mang du smra/ /dregs ldan mu cor
145a5(mdo 'grel): so mchu dag/ khyed kyis shas pa min pa las/ /bdag gi bshad pa rnam par 'gog/ khyed rnams bong bu spre'u rnga mo'i bzhin ldan stag gi kha dang pa lang gdong/ /byi? la bu se Ne phag dang khyi yi bzhin ldan mchog tu blta bar dka' ba'i gdong/ /smra bcang bsten yang
145a6(mdo 'grel): bzod pa min na drag po'i sgra chen sgrogs pa smos ci dgos/ /shes pa smin ma mkhyog cing lan gcig ma yin dge slong tshogs la de yis smras/ /de yi tshig mda' rnon po yis/ /rnam par bcad bzhin dge slong rnams pa lan gyi tshig ni mi brjod par/ /de btang
145a7(mdo 'grel): nas ni gzhan du song/ /de nas dag gis sdig pa des/ /phyi nas 'gyod pas gdungs gyur te/ /gnyis skyes de yis ma nyid btang/ /rab tu byung ba btang ma gyur/ /bdag gi bu ni dge sbyong gis/ /phrogs zhes cho de smra de yang/ /smyon mar gyur cing lus btang nas/ /dmyal
145b1(mdo 'grel): bdag tu gnas pa thob/ /de nas dus kyi sdig pa dag /rang gis byas pa'i ser skya ni/ /las kyi mjug tu chi ba rtsub kyis/ /chu srin 'di nyid dag tu gyur/ /dge slong sman la gang smras pa/ /de dag 'di yi gdong 'di dag/ gang phyir las kyi sa bon las/ /'bras bu mtshungs pa'i
145b2(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin skye/ /zhes gsungs der ni bcom ldan gyis/ /rtag pa'i chos ni bstan mdzad nas/ /tha dad byang chub sgrub byed pa'i/ /skye bo dag la rjes gzung mdzad/ /de nas rgyal ba rang gnas su/ /gshegs tsho de yi rang bzhin yid/ /chu srin kha zas rab spangs nas/ /lus btang lha
145b3(mdo 'grel): yi gnas su song/ /de ni skad cig bde gshegs la/ /sems ni rab tu dang ba las/ /rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams su/ /dpal ldan dri med mdzes par skyes/ /de nas zla ba nya ba'i bzhin/ /phreng ba dang ldan rna rgyan mdzes/ /kun dga' rnam pa dang bcas bzhin/ /de ni bde gshegS
145b4(mdo 'grel): lta ru 'ongs/ /lha yi me tog rab tu gtor/ /cod pan gyis ni sa la reg /'od kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo bkang/ /de yis de la gus phyag 'tshal/ /nye 'khor de la bcom ldan gyis/ /chos ni rab tu bstan ba mdzad/ /gang gis bden mthong rgyun zhugs kyi/ /'bras bu thob nas
145b5(mdo 'grel): de song gyur/ /de ltar bya ba dka' yang de ni rtsa bzhin sdig pa'i 'dam dag las/ /bton zhing skye bo'i tshogs pa de dag kyang ste sdug bsngal bsgrubs pa yis/ /gdung bar nges par lhung ba rnams kyi nyon mongs rtsa ba mtshungs med dag/ ma lus bsod nams dang tshul ?
145b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis bde blag nyid du 'jams par byed/ /ces ba dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ ser skya'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //lus kyi snod son dge
145b7(mdo 'grel): dang mi dge ba/ /mnyam pa nyid du skyes bu longs spyod des/ /lus can rnams kyi rnam mang las skyes 'bras/ /gang phyir ma spyad kun tu zad mo 'gyur/ /bcom ldan bde bar gshegs pa sngon/ /grong khyer rkyal po'i khab kyi ni/ /ka lan dka' i gnas shes pa'i/ /nags
146a1(mdo 'grel): kyi nang na rnam par gnas/ /gzugs can snying po sa yi bdag/ der ni dpal gyis rnam par grags/ /rin chen 'byung gnas gzhan pa bzhin/ /dus der grong khyer sgra sgrogs zhes/ /bya bar mi bdag dpal nang ldan/ /grags pa zla ba'i chu gter che/
146a2(mdo 'grel): u drA yan zhes pa byung/ /de yi btsun mo bla ba'i 'od/ /ces pa zla ba'i bzhin ras can/ /sras ni drag pa'i rtsal dang ldan/ /rgyal tshab gtsug bud can zhes gyur/ /he? ru ka dang b+hi ru ka/ zhes pa de yis blon po gnyis/ /'dul la dkar po phur bu bdag/ bgrang par bya
146a3(mdo 'grel): ba min par gyur/ /sa bdag lha yi 'od zer can/ /de gnyis sprid yig gis mdza' gyur/ /ring du gnas dang nyi ma dang/ /pad+ma yi ni 'byung gnas bzhin/ /de gnyis ma du pho nya yis/ /sngon med rin chen tshogs bdag dang/ /grogs nyid mchog tu yongs rdzogs pas/ /mdza' 
146a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i gter ni thob par 'gyur/ /dam pa'i mdza' ba ring gnas kyang/ /mchog tu mi zad grags pa bzhin/ /mi srun mdza' ba nyer gnas kyang/ /brtan pa ma yin rtsa 'bar bzhin/ /nam zhig gzugs can snying po la/ /mchog gi go cha gser 'od 'bad/ /lha yi rin
146a5(mdo 'grel): chen gyis mtshan pa/ /mi bdag u drA ya nas springs/ /dug mtshon me rnams bsrung 'os pa/ /rnam pa ? rin chen go cha ni/ /grogs kyis springs ba legs blangs nas/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras/ /sa bdag de yis lugs bzang bzhin/ /lhag bar mja'? ba
146a6(mdo 'grel): go byed cing/ /thams cad gzung pr bzod pa yi/ /go cha 'di ni bdag la springs/ /'di la lan du sbyin 'os pa/ /de las lhag pa ngas? ma mthong/ /phan dang gnod pa dag la yang/ /lan ni chung ba zug rdu yin/ /'di las lhag ba cung zad gcig /bskur 'o khyed rnams
146a7(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyis/ /bsam par mdzod ces brjod nas ni/ /mi bdag bsam pa 'khrugs par gyur/ /de nas blo ldan blon ba ches/ /yun rings bsams nas de la smras/ /dbyar gyi rnam ba zhes bram ze/ /rig kun legs par pha rol byin/ /'di las yon tan mang
146b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i skyes/ /rgyal po gcig kyang yod ma yin/ /gal te nus na 'bad pa yis/ /de ni rab tu spring par mdzod/ /gang zhig bcom ldan sangs rgyas 'di/ /khyod kyi yul na nye bar gnas/ /lha rnams dag gi gus gnas kyi/ /thang ka de yi gzugs kyis mtshan/ /ma lus
146b2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten dge ba yi/ /me tag sar pa'i dpag bsam shing/ /ri mo rmi lam kun rtog la'ang/ /de nas bsod nams che bas mthong/ /zhes pa blon po'i tshig thos nas/ /de bzhin zhes brjod sa yi bdag/ song nas bcom ldan la btud de/ /don de nyid ni rab tu
146b3(mdo 'grel): gsol/ /de nas de yi rjes gnang ste/ /ri mo mkhan po mchog rnams la/ /bcom ldan sku gzugs bri ba'i las/ /mi yi bdag pos myur bar bskos/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni lta byed pa/ /de dag gzugs kyis dbang byas nas/ /spobs pa dang ldan tshad dag ni/ /rab tu
146b4(mdo 'grel): bzung bar nus ma gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan sku gzugs ni/ /dri med ras la 'phos pa dag/ gzugs bzang bsgom pa mngon shes des/ /dal bus yang dag rdzogs par byas/ /'gro ba'i mig gi bsod nams rnams/ /gzugs can yang dag bsags pa bzhin
146b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas sku gzugs thang ka de/ /de nas sa gzhi skyong bas springs/ /gzugs can snying po'i lag? rtags can/ /spring yig thang ka'i sngon byung ba/ /mi bdag u drA ya na ni/ /rab tu dga' bas rang gis bklags/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i zhabs bar bkod pI
146b6(mdo 'grel): bsod nams nye gyur pa/ /skabs gsum grong gi khyad par rgya che ma ga d+ha yul nas/ /dge ba byas pa'i gzugs can sa yi bdag po gzugs can snying/ /chos kyi gnyen gyis sa gzhi'i thig le khyod la rab smras pa/ /ri pong mtshan ma'i 'od ldan bcom
146b7(mdo 'grel): ldan sku gzugs chags sdang dug ni nyams par byed/ /sred pa yang dag zhi byed srid ba'i rmongs chen nad kyi sman dang phan pa dang/ /rab dang mngar ba'i bsod nams bcu len khyod kyi mig gi snod du rab blugs pa/ /'di ni khyod la rab springs skal
147a1(mdo 'grel): ldan mgrin pa'i bar du rab tu 'dod pas 'thung ? dam pa'i las pa rab tu sbyor zhing yon tan tshogs rnams 'dzin pa rtag tu slob/ /bya ba ngan las rnam bar zlog cing brtan pa'i bde pa 'thob la mchog tu bskul/ /rgyun chad med pa nyid du bdag
147a2(mdo 'grel): nyid kun gyis zol med phan pa bskyod byed pa/ /dam pa'i dge ba'i grogs kyis yid 'ong phan pa 'di las mchog ni ci zhig bya/ /zhes pa'i sbring yig grogs mdza' ba'i/ /bdud rtsi la 'os don myangs nas/ /glang po la gnas thang sku yi/ /sngon du rgyal po rab tu
147a3(mdo 'grel): song/ /blon bcas mdun na 'don bcas de/ /mngon par dga' nas kun dga' las/ /gser gyi seng ge'i khri stengs su/ /de ni rab tu bkram nas bkod/ /mdzes sdug bsod nams ngag gi gnas/ /bde gshegs sku de mthong gyur nas/ /skye bos sangs rgyas rab rgyas
147a4(mdo 'grel): la/ /phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal zhes pa smras/ /sangs rgyas mngon brjod thos nyid na/ /spu long gis brgyan dbyibs gyur cing/ /lha yi me tog char phab tshe/ /sa yi bdag po ya mtshan gyur/ /der ni bcom ldan spyod pa yi/ /bdud rtsi'i bsod nams thob nas de/ /chu
147a5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin sgra yis mgrin sngon dang/ rab 'dod ldan pa mtshungs par gyur/ /rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis ni/ /rjes mthun bzlog pa dang bcas pa/ /thang ka'i 'og tu mthong gyur nas/ /de yi rmongs pa rnam par grol/ /de nas sa bdag rgyun zhugs kyi/ /'bras
147a6(mdo 'grel): thob bden pa mthong ba yis/ /grogs la dge slong rdzongs shes pa'i/ /'phrin gyi lan ni rab tu springs/ /de nas gzugs can snying po yis/ /bcom ldan 'das la gsol byas nas/ /kA tyA ya na dge slong ma/ /rim zhes pa'ang de la springs/ /de nas mchod pa
147a7(mdo 'grel): sgrub byed pa/ /mi bdag u drA pa? na la/ /'phags pa kA tyA ya na des/ /der ni chos rnams bstan ba mdzad/ /de yi chos ni bstan pa yis/ /skye po rab mang 'dus ba rnams/ /rgyun dang lan cig phyir mi 'ong/ /dgra bcom 'bras bu'i gnas thob gyur/ /grong khyer der
147b1(mdo 'grel): ni rgyal dang ni/ /skar rgyal zhes grags khyim bdag gnyis/ /zhi? sle'ang? mthun par byung nas/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /dus kyi de yis gnyen rnams kyis/ /lus kyi 'jug tu mchod rten bsgrubs/ /de ming gis mtshan ? lta yang/ /mchod rten phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal
147b2(mdo 'grel): byed/ /btsun mo'i 'khor du dge slong ma/ /rim zhes ni bya bas kyang?/ /rim gyis lha mo zla 'od la/ /rtag tu chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /de nas nam zhig sa skyod ni/ /rtse dga' i khang par song gyur pa/ /mtshan ma shes pa de yi ni/ /'tsho ba zhag bdun mtshams su rigs/ /de nas 'khor
147b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i spyod tshul shes/ /nor 'dzin bdag pos re ya ni/ /sngon la rab tu 'byung ba yis/ /dge ba'i gnas thob rjes su gnang/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba/ /mi bdag tshig gis dge slong mas/ /lha mo rab tu phyung pa'i lus/ /nyi ma bdun ba nyid la btang/ /rgyal
147b4(mdo 'grel): chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams su/ /lha yi bu mo nyid du ni/ /'phral nyid rab tu gyur pa de/ /rgyal ba yi ni nags su song/ /der ni zla nya'i bzhin ras can/ /lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan pa nges/ /shAkya thub pa mthong gyur nas/ /dga' bas de yi zhabs la gtugs/ /lha yi me tog
147b5(mdo 'grel): rab mthor ma/ /nga la de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /gang gis bden pa mthong byed pa'i/ /chos ni bstan mdzad de song gyur/ /de yis mkha' la zla ba yi/ /gzugs bzhin bdag po'i grong khyer phyin/ /mtshan mo nyal pa bslang nas ni/ /byang chub rab tu gsal bar byas/ /de ni tho
147b6(mdo 'grel): rangs rang gnas su/ /song ba'i tshe na nor 'dzin bdag/ rang byung mngon par phyogs pas bu/ /gtsug bud can ni dbang bskur te/ /de nas blon po dag la de/ /skye dgu bskyab pa'i phyir gtang nas/ /de ni mi bdag gzugs can snying/ /grogs bo'i grong khyer dag tu song//
147b7(mdo 'grel): gdugs? dang rnga yab dang bral ba/ /de 'ongs gzugs can snying po yis/ /rab btung mi bdag nyer spyad ni/ /mdzes shing gtsang pa rnam kyis mchod/ /ngal bas so khri la 'khor de la/ /de dang phrad pas rab dga' zhing/ /dpal rang bral bas sdug bsngal pa'i/ /ya mtshan
148a1(mdo 'grel): ldan pa de yis smras/ /mdza' yas kun gyi mgo po la/ /rgyal po dga' ni ngal pa so ba/ /brgya byin dag dang mtshungs pa khyod/ /'di bzhin nye bar ji ltar gyur/ /rang bzhin bzhin ras ma bral zhing/ /blo ldan gros ni sbas pa can/ /dpa' po khyod kyi rgyal
148a2(mdo 'grel): srid ni/ /gzhan gyis phrogs pa srid ma yin/ /zhes la grogs kyis dris la nges/ /'dzum bcas de lang ba smras pa/ /rgyal po 'byor ba thams cad du/ /'gro zhing bdag la gzhan mi dga' / /yul nyams myong las phyir phyogs pas/ /sred dang bral ba bdag rang gis
148a3(mdo 'grel): dbang phyug longs spyod snod dag ni/ /lhag ma bzhin du yang dag btang/ /dge pa'i grongs po khyod kyis ni/ /bde gshegs sku gzugs thang ka gang/ phan spang rab tu springs pa de/ /bdag gi chags bral bla mar gyur/ /de ni khyod kyi bka' drin gyis/ /bcom
148a4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyi drung byin nas/ /khyim nas khyim ni med nyid du/ /rab byung thob par bdag 'tshal lo/ /zhes pa grogs kyi tshig? thos nas/ /de de bzhin zhes rnam bsams te/ /de yi dben pa la gus ldan/ /gzugs can snying pos de la smras/ /sa yi bdag po
148a5(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi blo/ /dam pa mang pos bskur pa yang/ /'khor ba las ni phyir phyogs pa/ /skal ldan 'di 'dra ji ltar skyes/ /chog shes 'byor pa thob gyur pas/ /skal pa bzang po mchog tu mdzes/ /yid ni chags bral gyis brgyan pa/ /sems can dag pa'i mtshan
148a6(mdo 'grel): nyid yin/ /dam pa rnams ni 'khor ba nye bar zhi slang rmongs chen myu gu nyams byed pa/ /skye ba gzhan la nyer bsgrubs chags bral gnas ni gal te yid la byed pa na/ /rgyal srid chen po gzi chen rdul bcas kyis ci bsgrubs bka' sgrub? byed rnams kyis
148a7(mdo 'grel): ci/ /longs spyod skad cig spyod rnams kyis ci sdig ster sdug bsngal bde ba rnams kyis ci/ /gang gis nor mchog srog las phangs pa'i nor ldan ma ni bde blag nyid du gtong/ /gang zhig 'jig rten gsum po 'dod kyang 'dod pa'i bde la phyir
148b1(mdo 'grel): phyogs 'doms pa'i bla/ /gang gis kun rmongs sdug bsngal gyis gzing 'gro ba 'di ni rjes su brtse ba'i gnas/ /bsod nams dag gis blo ldan rnams kyi zhi ba ci yang 'khor ba'i g.yon deng 'gyur/ /zhes brjod gzugs can snying pos de/ /'od ma'i tshal gyi gnaS
148b2(mdo 'grel): khring nas/ /rab tu btung byas bcom ldan la/ /de yi byung ba'i mdza' rnams gsol/ /bde gshegs rnam pa mthong gyur nas/ /dga' pas yun rings bsams rgyas te/ /bdag nyid bya ba byed par ni/ /u drA yan yis kyang bsams/ /mgo bo phyag 'tshal gyis
148b3(mdo 'grel): 'brel pa/ /de yi lus la bcom ldan gyi/ /gzigs pa 'khor pa gcod byed ni/ /rab phyung nyid dang lhan cig pas/ /de nas dge slong dngos po thob/ /lag na lhung bzed chos gos ldan/ /grong khyer du ni bsod snyoms bslangs/ /skye bo ya mtshan ldan par byas/ /gtsug
148b4(mdo 'grel): pud can gyis rab dang blos/ /chos kyi skye dgu bskyangs byas nas/ /dus kyis chos min mngon 'dod cing/ /rnyog ba dag dang ldan par gyur/ /gser 'ong gsal ba'i glog dag ni/ /rnam par rol pa'i sprin phreng bzhin/ /phun sum tshogs pas su yi yid/ /dri ma
148b5(mdo 'grel): can du byed ma yin/ /hi ru ka dang sti ru ka/ blon chen dag gi tshos min gyi/ /las la dga' zhing dbang ma gyur/ /khro ldan ? po de btang gyur/ /de nas gnas su rgyal po yis/ /dbyug pa tho ba blon por bcug /sems kyi rjes 'jug mkhas pa yis/ /dman par
148b6(mdo 'grel): chags pa de la smras/ /skye dgu rnams la mdza' bas yang dag chags/ /rgyal po gzhung ngan dag tu smra bar byed/ /g.yon can blon po rnams ni rang nyid kyi/ /grags pa rab tu sgrogs par byed pa yin/ /gang zhig rje po'i don du ni/ /chos la mi rtsi bde la min/ /don
148b7(mdo 'grel): min grags min 'tsho ba min/ /de dag mchog tu gus pa'i g.yog/ nges par til mtshungs skye dgu rnams/ /rgyal po'i don byed ma bcag pas/ /ma yin ma nyams pas kyang min/ /ma gdungs pas min ma gzir mid/ /zhes smras de dag rgyal srid kyi// 
149a1(mdo 'grel): bsam pas ni rgyal pos bskos/ /tshogs? pas spyod tshul ngan pa yis/ /skyabs med skye dgu gzhom par zhugs/ /sa yi bdag po blo gros ngan/ /rnam par mi spyod spyod tshul ban/ /sna chen bden pa nyams pa'i tshe/ /skye dgu rnams ni gang 'tsho//
149a2(mdo 'grel): de nas nam zhig yun rings na/ /lam du u drA ya na yis/ /rang yul nas 'ongs chod pa la/ /mi bdag yul 'khor gtam dag dris/ /de yis smras pa lha khyod kyi/ /sras pos yi bdag po dge/ 'on kyang dam pa'i blo dang bral/ /blon po ngan pa'i dbang du song//
149a3(mdo 'grel): de na jo bo'i bka' yi sgye dgu rnams/ /nye bar gdung ba rab rgyas ci yang gyur/ /gang gis da lta de ni yul ngan skyes/ /grong pa'i 'jig rten nyin dang mtshan mor gdung/ /gang na nyi mas mun pa spro byang gang na zla ba mchar 'babs gung na bdud rtsi las ni rab drag nag po
149a4(mdo 'grel): brtsegs pa rab gsal skye/ /gang na skyob byed mi yi bdag pos skye dgu rnams kyi srog 'tsho 'phrog/ /nyer 'tsho che ba rab rgyas de na cho de dag ni su zhig nyan/ /mi bdag gis gdung sgyol bcags/ /tshong pa'i tshig ni bzod dka' ba/ /gdung ba'i rang bzhin de thos nas//
149a5(mdo 'grel): brtse ba'i gter nges de la smras/ bdag gi tshig gis 'di nas khyod/ /song la skye dgu dbugs dbyang? mdzod/ /de nyid 'ongs nas gtsug pud can/ /chos la rab tu dgod par bya/ /zhes pa nges brjod kun dga' ldan/ /tshong pa rim gyis rang yul du/ /song nas sngon
149a6(mdo 'grel): du skye dgu rnams/ /ngal bus dbugs ni dbyung pa bsgrubs/ /gtam de rab tu grags pa'o tshe/ /blon po dbyug pa tho ba dag/ 'das pa'i mi skyong 'ong ba yis/ /skyag? ste mi yi bdag la smras/ /legs pa rnams kyis smad pa'i gtam/ /rgyal po rgan po rab byung ba//
149a7(mdo 'grel): rgyal srin 'bang bas don gnyer ldan/ /zhes pa lha cig kun tu thos/ /brtul zhugs drag pos yongs su dug /gus pas longs spyod la mngon phyogs/ /rang byung ngo tsha thabs gcig tu/ /btang nas de slar 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po chags bral pa smin pas//
149b1(mdo 'grel): 'phral la nyid du gang btang ba/ /de rnams slar yang de dag la/ /sngon las lhag par dga' bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten lugs dang 'gal ba yi/ /yul rnams la ni khyud par du/ /srog chags yang dag 'dod 'gyur te/ /gnod pa'i zas la nang can bzhin/ /bde ba rab rgyas/
149b2(mdo 'grel): las yongs btang/ /gzhan gyi lag tu nye bar song/ /blun po dag gi a mra bzhin/ /phal cher thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ /de slang gzi byin chen po'i gtor/ /khyod ni khri las rab bskyong nas/ /gnas brtan ri bong can rnams bzhin/ /de ni rgyal srid spyod par 'dod
149b3(mdo 'grel): lus ni chos gos kyis skyo zhing/ /gos mchog mngon par 'dod ldan 'di/ /mgo zlum la ni rin chen gyis/ /mtshan pa'i cod pan 'dod par 'gyur/ /rin chen khang pa gsar pa yi/ /longs? spyod 'byor bar rnams bskrun pa'i/ /rtse dga' btang nas nags kyi gnas//
149b4(mdo 'grel): ngal dub ldan pa su yis bzod/ /ri dags rmig bas rtsub cing tsher mas gtams pa'i thang ka la/ /gang zhig 'jam pa'i mal stan bdar 'ong de dag ji ltar nyal/ /gang gis zla zer ltar bsil chang 'thungs de dag nags skyes kyi/ /glang po'i chang gis dre zhing kha
149b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i chu ni ji ltar 'thung/ /khyod la mi bzod bgrod pa ni/ /da lta nyid du nye bar gnas/ /lugs shes rnams kyi dang po'i gros/ /rgyal sras nges par ltung byed ba'o/ /de slang rgyal po ma 'ongs pa'i/ /sngon du jo bo khyod kyis gsong/ /phye ma leb ni 'bab pa dag /gal te
149b6(mdo 'grel): ma bsregs mar me 'joms/ /shes pa de dag tshig gis ni/ /sa bdag myur du 'khrugs bar gyur/ /mi srun sprin gyis su yi yid/ /dri ma ldan par byed mi 'gyur/ /dogs bcas sog le bzhin du ni/ /rtsub mor gyur nges der smras pa/ /bdag dang khyer gnyis
149b7(mdo 'grel): mdun du ni/ /gnod pa 'di ni thun mong nyid/ /khyed gnyis nyid kyis khyad bar gyi/ /tshul dang thabs la gnas pa'i blos/ /bya ba'i de nyid rnam spyod pa/ /gang rigs de ni bsgrub par mdzod/ /ces te rgyal pos spro bar byas/ /de dag gis mgyogs gsong byed btang//
150a1(mdo 'grel): bsad phyir u drA ya na yis/ /mdun gyi lam ni rab tu bsngams/ /nges kyang skye dgu yongs bskyab slad/ /bu la bsko bar brtson pa yis/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs te/ /bdag 'gro'o zhes zhu ba byas/ /rang gis bam pa spyod mdzod ces//
150a2(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pas rjes gnang nas/ /las kyi zhags pas yang dag drangs/ /de ni sgra sgrogs grong khyer song/ /lam du zon med 'ong pa de/ /blon po gdug pas bskos pa yi/ /gshed ma de dag rnams kyis bsang/ /skye bo ngan bas kun spyod bzhin/ /bsad pa de yi
150a3(mdo 'grel): chos gos dang/ /lhung bzed sogs bzung de dag gis/ /blon po dag la mgu ba'i slang/ /rgyal po'i bya ba byas pa smras/ /sdig bas rab dga' de dag gis/ /mi yi bdag la rab tu bstan/ /pha yi chos gos khrag gis no/ /sbags mthong 'phral la rmongs par gyur//
150a4(mdo 'grel): ngal gyi 'du shes thob pa nges/ /ji ltar bdag nyid dmyal ba ni/ /'jig pa rung gting du ltung pa yis/ /mya ngan de bzhin bla ma'i min/ /nges smras dbang phyug sbrang rtsir chags/ /sdig par ltang ba ma mthong pa/ /bdag gis skye bo mi srun las/ /kye ma 'bras bu yang
150a5(mdo 'grel): dag thob/ /kye ma kyi btung rten sa med/ /'jigs rung dmyal ba'i gting du ni/ /mthon por 'dzegs rnams mi srun dang/ /'grogs pas 'phral la ltung byed gyur/ /gdug pa blon po'i blo gros kyis/ /bdag gis sdig chen 'di dag byas/ /da ni ltung par 'gyur ba
150a6(mdo 'grel): bdag/ gcang byang kyis kyang gtsang mi byed/ /mnyam du pha dang dgra bcom dag/ bsang pa bdag ni su yis sgo la/ /gang du bdag gis snod gcig tu/ /dug ni srog byed ldan par mtshungs/ /dogs med yab ni rgan po dag/ rab byung zhi ba bsten pa la/ /chags
150a7(mdo 'grel): las bdag gis rang gi sems/ /mtshon ni rnon po'i bya ba byas/ /gang zhig bsams pa nyid na 'ang rab skyed byed de ni thos par yong mi bzod/ /gang zhig mthong nas sems med rnams kyang mya ngan ngag la rab tu gcags par byed/ /gang la 'gyod pa drag
150b1(mdo 'grel): po'i me yis ma rungs rnams kyang 'jam po nyid 'gyur ba/ /de la'ang brtse med blo ldan rnams ni ral gri rnon po'i bya ba rab tu spro/ /zhes brjod sdug bsngal dag gis gdungs/ /bzhin ni tsho nges mu car ldan/ /ma rungs blon po de dag ni/ /nang du 'jug pa khro bas bzlog/
150b2(mdo 'grel): yon tan khyad par yongs shes nges/ /hi ru ka dang b+hi ru ka/ yab kyi sngon gyi blon po gnyis/ /rab tu dang bas mgyogs par bos/ /de nas rgyal pos bsams pas rig/ mya ngan gyis ni skya bor gyur/ /ngal gyis blon po gdug pa yis/ /de yi mal mngon phyogs smras
150b3(mdo 'grel): lha mo khyod sras dpal dang ldan/ /rang bzhin gyis ni bsam pa drang/ /nang mi rab gcod rtsub mo yis/ /rgyal srid bsrung ba yong mi shes/ /pha ni rab tu byung ba yang/ /'di yi rgyal srid 'phrog tu 'ongs/ /bdag cag gnyis kyis rab zhi byas/ /de la ci zhig brjod
150b4(mdo 'grel): bar bya/ /gal te lugs ? rgyud ldan pa'i/ /rim 'di dag pa'i rim min na/ /dge slong de yang rgyal srid ni/ /mngon par 'ded de ji ltar rim/ /sa bdag pha bsang khros pa yis/ /bdag cag gnas nas rnam par bskrad/ /rang nyid lta'ang mya ngan gyis/ /log
150b5(mdo 'grel): par ci la yongs ma skyems/ /bdag cag gis ni legs byas byas/ /dza ba'i nyis byas nyid du gyur/ /dngos po kun lag yog po rnams/ /gnod pa nyid dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rgyal po 'das la ci zhig 'gyod/ /gang byas de dag byas ba nyid/ /lha mo bsam pas
150b6(mdo 'grel): ring pa'i bu/ /khyod kyis ci slang btang snyoms byed/ /de dag gis 'di brjod thos nas/ /de dag tshig la gus pas bsgrubs/ /ta ra li ka zhes pa yi/ /rgyal po'i ma nges dal bus smras/ /byed kyi gros la nyer bskrun pa'i/ /rgyal pos sngon gyi byas pa yis//
150b7(mdo 'grel): dmyal bar ltung bar byed pa'i las/ /'di ni mtshams med gnyis su gyur/ /'di yi pha bsang las skyes pa'i/ /mya ngan bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/ /dgra bcom bsad skyes sdug bsngal ni/ /khyed gnyis kyis kyang bzlog par mdzod/ /ces pa ngal gyis
151a1(mdo 'grel): de la bstan/ /sa bdag drung du de song nas/ /mya ngan gyis non zla ba ni/ /yongs zad lta bu de la smras/ /chos dang chas min rang bzhin gyi/ /rgyal po'i rgyal srid nyes pa mang/ /de la sdig dogs mya ngan gyis/ /bu khyod ci la yongs su gdung/ /gal
151a2(mdo 'grel): te nges pa pha bsang las/ /bla ma la byams khyod gdungs?/ /khyod kyi sdug bsngal ma bzang der/ /'di ring khyod la ngo tsha gtong/ /khyod kyi tshes nyid pha de? min/ khyod ni gsad pa gzhan las skyes/ /rang 'dod zas dang bde bas bu/ /bud med rnams la khrel yod min//
151a3(mdo 'grel): zhes pa de chig snyan min yang/ dben? par rgyal pos thos gyur nas/ /pa? bsad sdig pa drag po yi/ /sdug bsngal dag gi gdungs pa btang/ /shar gyi ri bos nub kyi ri la sbyor ba'i bya ba rab tu byed/ /skad cig gis cis dang sa 'dzin 'bral ba'i ngos rtsed
151a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par sgrub/ /'di dag 'phral la me ni chu las rnam sbreng de yang sreg byed las/ /srid gsum dag na bud med rnams kyi bsgrub bya min pa ci yang med/ /de nas dgra bcom bsad pa nyid/ /zug rngu lta bus gzir ba yi/ /mi bdag de yis las de ni/ /phyir bcos
151a5(mdo 'grel): chos shes rnams la dris/ /de nas slon ngan de dag gis/ /rgyal dang skar rgyal mchod rten gyi/ /nang du byi la chung du gnyis/ /sha yi bslab pas chags byas nas/ /bkag par gyur kyang sbyi brtol gyis/ /mi bdag 'dun sar rab zhugs te/ /gdung ba drag pas
151a6(mdo 'grel): yongs gdung ba/ /rab zhi don gnyer de la smras/ /lta cig khyod ni rdzun nyid kyis/ /sems ni mchog tu ba dung bar byed/ /'jig rten 'di na de nyid du/ /thams cad dge ba'i dgra bcom med/ /gal te de dag bden pa na/ /mkha' la ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin/ /de rab
151a7(mdo 'grel): rdzu 'phrul gyis bgrod pas/ /gzhan gyi? gsang pa ji ltar srid/ /de skad dgra bcom yod min na/ /de bsang sdig pa gal yod/ /gang na grong khyed yod min pa/ /de na mtshums kyi rtsod pas ci/ /gang dag khyim bdag rgyal dang ni/ /skar rgyas dgra bcom gnaS
151b1(mdo 'grel): thob ba/ /da dag da lta rang rang gi mchod rden mang? du byi lar skyes/ /de dag gsal bar mngon sum gyis/ /mthong la the tshom su zhig byed/ /gal te yid ches yod min na/ /rang nyid nges par cis mi lta/ /zhes pa brjod nas sa bdag yid/ /khyogs la 'pyad ba bzhin byas nas/ /mi
151b2(mdo 'grel): srun? de dag de dang ni/ /lhan cig mtshad rten lta ru song/ /sngon med ltad mo 'bebs pa yis/ /de ni skye po yang dag 'khrigs/ /rgyal po blon bcas lta brtson tshe/ /gdug pa'i blon po g.yon can gyis/ /sha la goms pas 'brel byas pa/ /rgyal dang skar rgyal zhes brjod pas/
151b3(mdo 'grel): byil chung du gnyis po dag/ dal bu yis ni mthong bar byed/ /rgyal dad skar rgyal de dag gis/ /gal te dgra bcom sgyu nyid na/ /bden pa de yis khyed gnyis kyis/ /mchod rten la ni bskor ba'ang mdzod/ /sha ster tshe na de dag gis/ /da skad skad cher brjod pa yis/ /byi
151b4(mdo 'grel): la de dag mgyogs par ni/ /des par 'thon nas bskor ba byas/ /mi bdag rjes 'brang bcas pa yis/ /mthong nas 'phral la yid ches thog/ khu tshur du ni rlung rdol pad+ma nam mkha' i phyogs la ri mo dang/ /lce rtse la yang spro dang sdud pa'i rol pa rab mang bkod pa
151b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /gzhan yang ci min phyugs dang byis pa'i blo la rmongs sgyu mig 'phrul dag/ skad cig yongs 'dris yid ches gzugs can g.yon can rnams kyis ston par byed/ /de nas bde gshegs bstan pa la/ /rgyal po mchog tu yid ches bral/ /'phags pa kA
151b6(mdo 'grel): tyA ya na yi/ /mdun du dad pas mchod pa bzlog/ de nas rgyal po'i grong khyer bkang/ /phyi rol nyid der gdul bya la/ /brtse bas rjes 'brang bcas te gnas/ /dge slong ma ni rim yang/ /de nas kA tyA ya na ni/ /gad tshe sngon du mi yi bdag/ 'od ba mthong nas skye po
151b7(mdo 'grel): yi/ /tshogs pas smod pas 'jigs nas gshegs/ /blon po snga ma dag gis bskul/ /de ni gshegs pa mthong gyur nas/ /gdug pa'i blon po kho na ring dang/ /ldan pa dag gis rgyal la smras/ /rgyal po bkra shis min pa'i ster/ /dge sbyor mgo reg skra med
152a1(mdo 'grel): 'di/ /lam du di ring bdag cag gis/ /mthong bas ci 'byung yong mi shes/ /'di ni rgyal po sdig can gyi/ /bzhin la bdag mi lta zhes brjod/ /khyod la 'de nas skad cig gcig 'di du song ste de ltar gnas/ /gzhung dan khros pas de thos
152a2(mdo 'grel): nas/ /mi bdag gis ni 'khor rnams la/ phyag dar rdul gyi spar mo yis/ /ring du gnas 'di g.yogs zhes smras/ /gdug pa'i 'bangs ni de dag gis/ /rdul gyi spar mos g.yogs pa can/ /nang du zhugs pas bzlog pa'i smad/ /de yis mchog gi /'dab?
152a3(mdo 'grel): sbras?/ /khra bas 'khrugs pa'i sbrul rnams dang/ /khrag ni 'thungs pa'i stag dag kyang/ /zhi las 'jam pa nyid 'gyur te/ /sa yi bdag po'i 'bangs ma yin/ /de nas mi bdag song ba'i tshe/ /rdul phung brgya yis g.yogs de la/ /he ru ka dang b+hi ru kas/ /sdug
152a4(mdo 'grel): bsngal las mngon phyogs te smras/ /rgyal po ma rungs ngan byed kyis/ /'phags pa khyod kyis 'o brgyal thob/ /gang gis mdun du 'di mthong ba/ /bdag cag gi ni mig rnams smad/ /rmongs pa'i mun pa sdig spyod du/ /skye bo ngan bas mi bdag bsgyur/ /las
152a5(mdo 'grel): 'ong mthong bas bdag cag kyang/ /sdig pa'i skal pa ngag dang ldan/ /sa gzhi sdig mang gis gdungs 'di/ /blo mngar khyod kyis btang bas byos/ /bzod dka' mi srun gnas pa ni/ /btang bar 'os par su mi 'dod/ /zhi gzhi par mi 'gyur bzod pa
152a6(mdo 'grel): nyid ni nye bar zad mi 'gyur/ /khro ba rtsub mo'i skyon nams dag gis blo gros la yang reg mi 'gyur/ /ngan sems zug rdu? dang mtshungs yid la mi gnas dam pa rnams dag la/ /'jig rten na ni skye bo ngan ba rnam par spangs pas bde gzhan med
152a7(mdo 'grel): dbang phyug nyid ni yon tan ldan rnams phag ltang ngal du ba nyon mongs ldan pa ste/ /zab mo nyid ni rab rib 'byung gnas su 'jug srog chags rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed/ /mchog gyur de yang ma rungs gdug pa gya gyu'i sbrul rnams dag
152b1(mdo 'grel): gis nyams byas ?/ /kye ma gang zhig skyon dang bral pa de ni mi srun la mang khron pa bzhin/ /de dag tshig ni thos gyur nas/ kA tyA ya na chen pos smras/ /gnod pa byas kyang bdag ma khros/ /'di 'dra las kyis bgrod pa yin/ /gang zhig sa bdag blun po la/ /mi srun dang 'grogs
152b2(mdo 'grel): skyon dag gis/ /'jigs pa chen po nye bar gnas/ /'di dag kho na bdag sdug bsngal/ /'di yi grong du dang po yi/ /nyin la rlung chen 'bab par 'gyur/ /gnyis pa la ni me tog char/ /de nas gzhan la gos kyi char/ /dngul gyi char ni bzhi phal/ /lnga pa la yang gser gyi
152b3(mdo 'grel): chang/ /de nas rin chen char pa ste/ /rdul gyi char pa bdun pa la/ /de yis sa bdag gnyen dang ni/ /yul 'khor bcas 'di med par 'gyur/ de slad khyed gnyis rin chen nyi/ /mang po blangs nas 'gro bar bya/ /zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas/ /de bzhin zhes te de dag song/ /sngo
152b4(mdo 'grel): bsangs hi ru ka yi bu/ /de yi nye bar gnas pa byas/ /b+hi? ru kas kyang bu mo ni/ /sngo bsangs can ma lag pas khrid/ /dge slong ma ni rim la/ /mngon phyogs gus pas 'di dag smras/ /'phags ma dag gis bu mo ni/ /rkud pa zhi bar mdzad khyod kyis/ /khyim gyi bdag po
152b5(mdo 'grel): gdangs can gyi/ /khyim du yang dag bzhag par bya/ /zhes smra bu tsha gtad nas ni/ /blon po dag ni dang khyim song/ /rim yis kyang bu mo blangs/ /gdangs can gyi ni gnas su song/ /de nas ji ltar dge slong gis/ /brjod de rim pas grong du byung/ /ye shes sgron ldan shes rab
152b6(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /de shing ji lta bzhin du mthong/ /de nas ni ma bdun pa la/ /rin chen char ni bab pa'i tshe/ /blon po de dag rin chen gyi/ /gang ba'i gru bzung mtshor song/ /de dag lto yi phyogs song nas// /grong khyer gnyis byas he ru kas/ /he ru ka zhes de bzhin du/ gzhan gyis b+hi ru
152b7(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma gzhan la rdul gyi char/ /chen po bab bas dmyal ba'i mgon/ /mi bdag gnyen dang yul 'khor dang/ /bcas pa rab tu rnam? par gyur/ /rgyal po dbyug pa tho bar bcas/ /sdig pa'i lhag mar gyur pa'i tshe/ /kA tyA ya nas nam mkha' las/ /blon po'i? 
153a1(mdo 'grel): bu de khyer nas gshegs/ /grong khyer lha mo nam mkha' las/ /dga' bas de yis rjes 'brangs pa/ /de yi bka' yis kar pa Ta'i/ /sha ri? nags su gnas par byas/ /dge slong bsod nams mthu dang ni/ /blon bo'i bu de'i skal ba dang/ /lha mo yi
153a2(mdo 'grel): yang byin brlabs kyis/ /grong de dpal dang ldan par gyur/ /de nas lha mo de yis der/ /kA tyA la ma'i mchog rten byas/ /gang zhig da lta'ang lha ldan la/ /mchod rton phyag byed phyag 'tshal byed/ /de nas chos gos gra zur la/ /'chol pa blon po ri bu khyer nas// 'phyar zhing
153a3(mdo 'grel): kA tyA yan de/ /yul gzhan dag tu mkha' las song/ /skye bo rnams ni ya mtshan las/ /'phyang zhing 'phyang ba su zhes brjod/ /der ni skye bo de dag rnams/ /'phyang ba po zhes grags par gyur/ /skabs der bud med sa yi bdag/ mtho ris dag tu song ba'i tshe/ /de yi bka' 
153a4(mdo 'grel): yis sngo bsangs de/ /mtshan shes rnams kyi rgyal bor byas/ /de nas kA tyA yan yis/ /bog ka na ka zhes pa yis/ /yul du phyin nas ma la der/ /dag pa'i chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /bden mthong gus dang bcas pa des/ /bu yi dbyug pa blangs nas ni/ /chen po rnamS
153a5(mdo 'grel): kyis da lta yang/ /phyag bya dbyig pa'i mchod rten byas/ /de nas ral gyis mnyan yod du/ /bzhed ldan kA tyA ya nas phyin/ /rgyal ba mthong nas dga' ldan pas/ /de yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal byas/ /u drA ya na bu yi gtam/ /der ni de yis rnam bshad pa/ /thos nas
153a6(mdo 'grel): dge slong rnams kyis dris/ /thams cad mkhyen pas de la gsungs/ /rngon pa drag po'i zhags shes pas/ /kar pha Ta nye nags tshal du/ /gal dang bcas ba'i rgya dag sngon/ /ri dwags bcid ba'i slad du bkod/ /'khrul 'khor zhags pa ldan bkod nas/ /de song tshe na rang
153a7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa 'ongs pa yis/ /phyogs der rnam par bsnyen te gnas/ /de yi bsod nams mthu dag gis/ /ri dags 'chid bar chung ma gyur/ /dag ba'i bdag nyid rnams mdun du/ /skye bos mi dge thob ma yin/ /de nas rngon pa 'ongs pas kyang//
153b1(mdo 'grel): zhags pa ri dwags med mthong nas/ /khro bas long bas rang sangs rgyas/ /dug gis dbyugs pa'i mda' yis bsad/ /gzi brjid 'bar byed ltar 'bar ba/ /mnga' yis phug par gyur de yi/ /mthu ni rmad byung mthong gyur nas/ /zhabs gnyis dag la de yis gtugs/ /de nas
