153b2(mdo 'grel): rngon pa bya min gyi/ /rgyu las mya ngan gyis gdungs bas/ /mda' dang rgya ni yang dag btang/ /bdag nyid smod cing mya ngan byas/ /yongs su myang 'das thob gyur pa/ /de yi gdung rus blangs nas ngos/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sogs tshogs kyis/ /rtag tu mchod pa'i mchod rten byas//
153b3(mdo 'grel): bsod nams de yis rngon pa ni/ /mi bdag u drA ya nar gyur/ /rang sangs rgyas ni bsad pa las/ /lan yang bsod pa thob par gyur/ /khyim bdag karpa ka ra gnas pa/ /nor dang 'bru sogs rgyas gyur pa/ /dga' bo zhes la bu mo ni/ /rgyags pa'i ri mo zhes pa byung/ /nam zhig rgyags
153b4(mdo 'grel): pas bran pa des/ /khad pa phyags pa'i rdul rnams kyis/ /rang sangs rgyas ni lam nyid nas/ /byon pa rmongs pas rnam par g.yogs/ /de nyid kho na'i nyi ma la/ /yun rings bsams pas don gnyer ba/ /nu ma'i khung gyis gzing ba yis/ khag mar slong ba'i skyes ba 'ongs/ /rang sangs rgyas
153b5(mdo 'grel): kyis spyi bor ni/ /phyag dang rdul spar gtor ba las/ /bdag ni bag mar gyur pa la/ /nya zhes ming po des smras/ /de nas de yi gtam dag gis/ /bag mar 'gro 'dod gzhon nu ma/ /rgyags pas rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi/ /mgo bo la ni rdul rnams gtor/ /srin bus zos rdzes yi
153b6(mdo 'grel): ge la/ /rab zhugs yid ches kyis rmongs pa/ /rtog dpyod med rnams 'gal ba yi/ /sdig sbyor la zhugs de yi tshe/ /las de khyim bdag mkhas pa dang/ /sad pa zhes pas bzlog pa byas/ /bu mo de nyid gtsug bud can/ /mi bdag sdig ba ldan par 'gyur/ /de yi ming po gtam
153b7(mdo 'grel): sgrogs kyang/ /dge slong kA trA ya na 'di/ /ngan spyod dar ba bzlog pa las/ /khyim bdag de dag skyes pa ni/ /hi ru ka dang b+hi ru ka /grong khyer nye bar gdung las thar/ /zhes pa bcom ldan gsung thos dge slong rnams ni rnam par dbyad nas kyang/ /dge dang mi dge'i las rnams 'bras
154a1(mdo 'grel): bur yongs gyur bkri ba rab shes nas/ /mi srun skye bo'i tshig mtshungs dgra dang rtag dpyad dang mnyam bla ma dang/ /legs bcas dang mtshungs gnyen ni 'jig rten ? ci yang med par sems/ /shes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas ba'i byang chub sems
154a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /u drA ya na'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //? zhig sa skyong 'byor pas rab bskrun rgya cher sbyin ba'i bsod nams las lhag pa/ /dam pa'i 'bras bu'i khur ni dbul po
154a3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi sbyin pa shin tu chung pas thob/ /chos dkar rnam par 'phel ba dang pa phun tshogs dang ldan 'khor ba med pa ni/ /rnam par 'phel byed de ni sems dang nor dag dag ba nyid la rigs pa yin/ /rgyal ba rgyal byed tshal gyi ni/ /kun dga' ra bar bzhug tsho sngon//
154a4(mdo 'grel): ? yong du ni khyim bdag dag /bstan pa zhes bya nor chen byung/ /mkhas pa zhes bya de yi bu/ /legs bya dag la mkhas pa byung/ /nyams pa med pa'i grags pa dag/ bsod nams nor gyi rgyan gyis spros/ /de nas byis pa kho na nas// shA ri'i bu sogs dge slong
154a5(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /rgyal po la 'os gos zas kyis/ /don du gnyer zhing bsnyen bkur byed/ /de nas nam zhig mi bzad pa'i/ /mu ge skye bo zang byed ba/ /bslang bya slong byed mtshungs pa nyid/ /slong pa'i 'tsho ba chang ba byung/ /dge slong rnams ni nyi mar pa/ /mchog tu mi bzang dus
154a6(mdo 'grel): der ni/ /bde bar gshegs pas mkhas pa ni ka bos nas rgyal byed tshal du chas/ /gseng gi phreng bas spras pa yi/ /rta yis bgrod bar byed de la/ /yon tan rab rgyas mi bzang ba'i/ /g.yo can mngon du phyogs nas smras/ /slong ba'i don mthun slong pa yis/ /dpag
154a7(mdo 'grel): bsam shing byed? phyogs su grags/ /bdag cag lnga brgya khyod la ni/ /bsam pa gtang nas yang dag 'ongs/ /rgyan dang gos ni zung de dag/ /bdag cag so sor yang dag 'dod/ /gal te yod ? de lta nyid/ /thogs pa med par gnang bar mthong/ /de yis 'di brjod ?
154b1(mdo 'grel): yi/ /spyod ldan de ni rta las babs/ /de rnams lags par mchod byas nas/ /blo dang ldan pas skad cig bsams/ /gal te bcom ldan ma mthong bar/ /rang gi khyim du phyin pa? na/ /bdud rtsi 'thung la nye ba yi/ /dgags? de bdag gis ji ltar bzod/ /slong rnams 'dod
154b2(mdo 'grel): pa ma byin par/ /gal te khrel med phyin pa na/ /sbyin ba'i brtul zhugs rang nyid kyis/ /nyams pa 'di yang ji ltar bya/ /de ni de ltar sems ba na/ /klu yi rgyal po lhag ma dang/ /sa gzhi brtol nas yang dag mthon/ /slob rnams 'dod pa rab tu byin/ /klu yi rgyal
154b3(mdo 'grel): bos byin ba yi/ /gos rnams dang ni rgyan rnams kyang/ /de dag rnams la byin nas de/ /zug rngu med bzhin mgyogs par song/ /des kyang ngo mtshar de mthong nas/ /bde gshegs sgom pa'i bsod nams ni/ /don kun phun sum tshogs ba dag/ 'grub pa 'o ma nyid
154b4(mdo 'grel): yin par sems/ /de nas sems ni rab dang skyes/ /zhe sdang sdig pa rnam bar nyams/ /de dag de dang lhan cig ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la ltar ru song/ /de nas bcom ldan ma thob gyur nas/ /gzhon nus bzhin ni rab btung de/ /de yi zhabs kyi par rdul gyis/ /
154b5(mdo 'grel): skal ldan dpral bar thig le byas/ /ston pa'i zhabs gnyis mdun du ni/ /do shal zla 'od rab 'bar ba/ /bkod nas mdun du rab btung pa/ /de dag de yis de la gsol// bcom ldan ye shes rdo rje 'dzin/ /de dag rnams la chos bstan pas/ /'jigs tshogs lta
154b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i ri phug nas/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgrubs/ /de nas bden mthong de dag rnams/ /de la phyag 'tshal song ba'i cho/ /gzhon nu mkhas pa dag la ni/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes pas mngon gsungs pa/ /bsod nams dag gis bu khyod ni/ /legs byas dbal
154b7(mdo 'grel): 'byor yongs rdzogs thob/ /mu ge'i bar du dag slong rnams/ zas la lhag par gnas pa mdzod/ /bdag gis dge song brgya phrag ni/ /phyed dang bcu gsum yongs bzung las/ /gzhan yang khyod kyi yongs khyer btsal/ /ro brgyal gzir la bgo bshar bya//
155a1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di thos nas/ /mkhas pa dag tu dga' bas dkrigs/ /ji srid 'tsho bar gus pa yis/ /dge 'dun mgron du gnyer bar byas/ /de nas rang gi khyim song ste/ /dge slong rab bzhed rgyal po la/ /'os pa'i zas kyis rtag tu ni//
155a2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs dge 'dun mchod/ /dbul dang dbul ba min rnams dang/ /bslang bya dang ni slong byed kyang/ /brtse bas 'os pa rnams la des/ /sbyin pas zas kyi brtse ba bsgrubs/ /lhag pa 'jungs pa'i tshogs rnams ni/ /snying rje'i chu gter des btsal
155a3(mdo 'grel): nas/ /de dag rnams la rin chen tshogs/ /dbul ba'i rab rib 'phrog pa byin/ /rin chen tshogs de dag la/ /sol ba'i phung po nyid du 'gyur/ /gang phyir nor bu rdo rang bzhin/ /rin chen mi rnams skal ba'o/ /de dag 'ongs nas de la smras/ /rmi lam nor ni mthong ba
155a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /rin chen ming gi sol phung de/ /khyod kyis bdag cag rnams la byin/ /skye bo nor chen rnyed pa yis/ /'phral la mthon po thob gyur pa/ /skad cig kho nas de bas las/ /yongs su nyams pa mi 'tsho'o/ /zhes pa de dag tshig thos nas/ /mkhas pa snying rje'i gter
155a5(mdo 'grel): dag gis/ /der smras bsod nams dman rnams la/ /rin chen rin chen min nyid gyur/ /khyed kyis sngon ni rmongs pa las/ /legs byas tshogs ni ma byas pa/ /des na rin chen phung po 'di/ /khyed la sol ba'i phung por gyur/ /rin chen rnams ni 'bad nas bzung yang
155a6(mdo 'grel): bsod nams zad pa las/ /ring du 'gro zhing skal ba ldan pa las kyang nye bar 'ongs/ /nor rnams sgrub par gla ni rgya tsho mya ngan mtshan ma nyid/ /nor ni legs byas dag la rab zhugs rigs pa'i sems nyid do/ /de slad khyed kyis dge slong gi /dge 'dun zas lo sta
155a7(mdo 'grel): gon mdzod/ /longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa'i tshogs/ /bdag gis khyed la phun tshogs bgyi/ /zhes brjod de yis nor dang zas/ /phun sum tshogs pa byin pa des/ /sangs rgyas la sogs dge 'dun rnams/ /de dag gis ni nyin cig mchod/ /dge
155b1(mdo 'grel): 'dun ji lta bzhin mchod nas/ /skad cig smon lam de dag gis/ /bdag cag rnam yang dbul por ni/ /mi gyur cig ces bya ba byas/ /de nas mkhas pa'i tshig dag gis/ /de dag song bas mdun du ni/ /sol phung de nyid rin chen gyi/ /phung po nyid du gyur pa mthong/ /de
155b2(mdo 'grel): nas mkhas pa gzhon nu ni/ /mthu dang ldan pa'i khyim nyid du/ /rnam par bzhag pa'i gter dag ni/ /bgegs med brgya dag byung bar gyur/ /chos shes de yi lugs bsrung slad/ /rgyal po gsal rgyal nyid la ni/ /gter gyi drug cha phul de yang/ /de las sol ba
155b3(mdo 'grel): nyid du gyur/ /gzhon nu nyid kyi bsod nams kyis/ /gter gyi tshogs 'di spyad bya yin/ /zhes pa'i tshig ni bar snang las/ /de nas sa yi bdag pos thos/ /gzhon nu nyid kyi tshig gis ni/ /gter rnams dag ni gter nyid du/ /slar gyur ngo mtshar gnas pa yi/ /mi
155b4(mdo 'grel): bdag gis ni de khyim springs/ /de nas nor rnams ma lus pa/ /gzhon nu bsam pa yangs pa yis/ /byin nas phun sum tshogs pa rnams/ /dbul po'i khyim du gnas par byas/ /de nas 'khor ba snying po med/ /rnam par dpyad phyir chags bral ba/ /brtan pa de yis
155b5(mdo 'grel): mi rtag nyid/ /yang dag bsams nas pha la smras/ /yab cig dka' thub nags su bdag /'gro ba re zhig gnang bar mdzod/ /skye pa brgya yi lhag ma yis/ /'byor ba 'di yis bdag nyon mongs/ /'jig rten gsum gyi phun tshogs thob/ /gang du spyod bya nyid 'gyur ba//
155b6(mdo 'grel): 'byung bo kun gya tshe yi ni/ /snod 'di shin tu chung ba nyid/ /gang zhig grang la rgyun tu bdag gis reg bya 'jam pa'i gos kyis g.yog bya zhing/ /gang zhig gdung la bdag gis dpal gyi dum bu bsil ba'i byug pas byug bya ba/ /gang gis don d dug mtshon mo dang lag
155b7(mdo 'grel): 'gro'i tshogs las mchog tu 'jigs pa thob/ /bdag gi lus 'di gnod pa dag las yongs su bsrungs kyang 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur/ /longs spyod las ni chags bral bdag /dga' ba'i rab byung blangs nas ni/ /nags su gnas shing bsam pa yis/ /gdungs pa
156a1(mdo 'grel): sems kyi gzir ba 'phrog/ /ces brjod yab kyis khas blangs ni/ /byas shing yul la chags pa yi/ /'ching ba de yis yongs btang nas/ /sha ri'i bu yi gnas su song/ /der ni de yis rab phyung ste/ /lag na lhung bzed chos gos can/ /de yi
156a2(mdo 'grel): rjes 'brang nyid gyur nas/ /brtul zhugs kyis bsdams rnam par rgyu/ /zhing pa rnams kyis bstan pa yis/ /zhing nas zhing la 'jug pa'i chu// lam nas bgrod ba der mthong nas/ /ya mtshan las ni 'di ltar bsams/ /kye ma sems med chu rnams kyang/ /bsgrubS
156a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i lam nas bgrod pa yis/ /las ni yang dag sgrub mthong ste/ /lus can rnams la ma yin no/ /zhes bsams bgrod pas mdun du ni/ /mda' mkhan dag gis mda' bsros shing/ /drang por byed pa mthong gyur nas/ /blo ldan mchog der rab tu bsams/ /mda'
156a4(mdo 'grel): ni sems med 'di dag rnams/ /gdungs pas drang po nyid 'gyur te/ /lus can 'khyogs po rnam dag ni/ /'khor ba'i gdung bas kyang ma yin/ /zhes sems mdun du shing mkhan gyis// shing rta'i 'khor lo nyid byas pa'i/ /brtan pa'i gzugs rnams mthong
156a5(mdo 'grel): gyur nas/ /slar yang yang dag sems bar gyur/ /kye ma sems med shing rnams ni/ /bzo yi sbyong bas skad cig las/ /las su rung ba nyid 'gyur te/ /lus can rnams kyis sems ma yin/ /'di dag bsams zhing yang dag song/ /chos bzang des
156a6(mdo 'grel): pa la gus pha/ /deyis slob dpon la smras pa/ /mnyes gshin pha la bu yis bzhin/ /'phags pa nyid ni bsod snyoms la/ /di ring bdag gi ched du gshegs/ /khyod kyis bstan pa rang nyid kyi/ /brtul zhugs bdag gis bsam par bgyi/ /zhes te zas
156a7(mdo 'grel): kyi bya ba ni/ /mkhan po la gsol mkhas pa ni/ /de song tshe na des bstan pa'i/ /gtsug lag khang gi khang par zhugs/ /der ni g.yo med skyil krung bcas/ /lus ni drang po nyid du byas/ /dran pa mngon du byas nas ni/ /de yis rang gi chos la bsams/ /de ni ting
156b1(mdo 'grel): 'dzin la zhugs tshe/ /nor 'dzin 'dzin phyed phyed dang bcas/ /ma khus chu gter chu rlabs kyis/ /du gu la yi gos can g.yos/ /nges pa'i bsam gtan de shes nas/ /bgegs med grub slad brgya phyin gyis/ /phyogs su bsrung slad phyags skyong nas/ /zla ba nyi mar
156b2(mdo 'grel): bcas pa bskos/ /de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen gyis/ /de yi dge rtsa sbyin pa las/ /grub pa nye bar gnas pa dag /mkhyen nas skad cig yang dag bsams/ /'di yi dgra bcom nye ba la/ /gal te shla ri'i bu 'ongs nas/ /sgo ni rab tu brdungs pa na/ /bar du bgegs 'di
156b3(mdo 'grel): the tshom med/ /de nas de ni 'od pa yis/ /mngon du bdag rang nyid song ste/ /sna tshogs dri ba la bsten pa'i// gtam gyi ma dus ni dbrog par bya/ /de ltar dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das/ /rang nyid phyogs der byon nas ni/ /dge slong de ni 'ong bdag /gtam gyis thogs pa nyid

156b5(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom 'bras bu thob/ /de nas gtam gyi 'jug tu ni/ /bde gshegs gshegs te rang gnas su/ /shA ri'i bu yi zhugs pa na/ /slob ma nyi ma bzhin du mthong/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba rnams btang zhing/ /'phral la thar pa de mthong nas/ /de yi grub pa dus bzhi brgyas

157a1(mdo 'grel): khyim du zhugs pa na/ /dbul po zhes pa'i dbul po yis/ /shugs rings phyung nas rab bsams pa/ /gang zhig skal ba dman pa yis/ /dge slong gcig kyang 'gron ma gnyer/ /shin tu dbul las dge ba yis/ /bya ba btang ba bdag 'dra dman/ /dag
157a2(mdo 'grel): tshad tshig ni mtshams sbyor rnams la rigs pa yod min zhing/ /bya ba nyams zhing byed pa dang bral de nyid dman gyur pa/ /tha snyad kun las phyi rol gyur cing don dang bral ba yis/ /sgra rnams bzhin du skyes bu rnams ni skye pos dor bya yin/ /'di bsams me yis zil
157a3(mdo 'grel): gnon cing/ /nor gyis dman nyid smod byed pa/ /de la legs byas skul byed pa'i/ /las pas mngon du phyogs te smras/ /nor gyis dman pa khyod kyis kyang/ /skye ba gzhan du dge thob slad/ /ji zhig ltar yang dge slong ni/ /gcig kyang ci slad mgron mi gnyer//

157a6(mdo 'grel): sgrub byed brgya byin gyur/ /mdza' bo brgya byin gzugs bsgribs pas/ /lha yi bza' ba kha dog dang/ /dri dang ro ldan bsgrubs pa'i tshe/ /dbul pos dge slong rnyed ma gyur/ /'byor ldan longs spyod phyug pa yi/ /grong pa rnams kyis sngon du ni/ /dge slong mgron

157b2(mdo 'grel): gnas gshegs shing/ /lha dbang mtho ris song ba'i tshe/ /lha yi rin chen thams cad kyis/ /dbul po'i khyim ni khengs par gyur// de nas brgya byin bka' las ni/ /de yi khang pa skyed tshal mdzes/ /bi shwa karmas rin chen gyis/ /ka bas rnam par brgyan par byas/ /dri
157b3(mdo 'grel): med dbang phyug yang dag thob/ /de yis zhag bdun 'od srungs ni/ /dge slong kun dang bcas pa dag/ 'byor pa longs spyod rnams kyis mchod/ /gang gi khyim ni bud med bkres pa ring cing bu tsha ngu la slong rnams kyis/ /sgo na yongs dor khri stan sre mog phreng ldan g.yo

158a1(mdo 'grel): par gshegs pa yis/ /dge ba rab tu rdzogs rnams la/ /chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad/ /sngon gyi dus ni gzhan dag la/ /skye bo tshe lo brgyad khri'i tshe/ /dpal ldan gser mdog ces bya ba'i/ /sa yi bdag pho byung bar gyur/ /de

159b5(mdo 'grel): chen po thob/ /'jig rten du ni rab grags dkar po bdud rtsi'i spun drung du/ /gtong ba'i yon tan dgra po dang ldan 'byor pa rab tu rgyas gyur pa/ /chung ngu gang zhig yongs bsngo'i gnas la bsod nams chung ngu nyid min gyur/ /de nyid kho na dri med yid kyi dad pa dag pa kun spyod
