160a1(mdo 'grel): kyi rten sar gyur pa yin/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces par/ /sa 'dzin bya rgod phung po yi/ /ngos la sngon che bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par gyur/ /skabs der bu la byams pa yi/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po
160a2(mdo 'grel): nyid/ /de yi bu ni ma skyes dgra /gdug pa byed par gyur pa yis/ /grogs po sdig pa dang ldan pa/ /lhas byin gyi ni gros bzhin du/ /'jigs rung mun can btson khang ni/ /rgyu ba med par rab tu bcug /bkres pas nyen pa de la ni/ /btsun mos zas dag btson khang du//
160a3(mdo 'grel): gsang nas rab tu 'jug par byas/ /de bsad 'dod des shes nas bzlog /sa yi bdag de shin tu rid/ /sngo zhing dri ma ldan bar gyur/ /dus min sprin nag gis gzir ba'i/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi zla ba bzhin/ /phal cher mnyes gshin sems ldan pas/ /mchog tu
160a4(mdo 'grel): rgud pa'i mdza' mo ni/ /gdung bcas sred ldan ma bzhin du// shin tu dam par 'khyud par byed/ /bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i phyogs su ni/ /mya ngan gyis gzir des phyogs te/ /thal mo sbyar te spyis btung nas/ /skad gdangs zhan par rab smras pa/ /dman pa
160a5(mdo 'grel): 'don pa la brtsan pa/ /yang dag rdzogs ba'i byang chub sems/ /rin chen dgra bcom chen po nyid/ /bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba skye tshogs skye ba yis/ /nyon mongs rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu/ /'jigs rung 'khor ba rgya mtsho yi/ /tham stegs khyod
160a6(mdo 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gzi brjid rnam bar dag /snying rje bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho ste/ /sems can kun gyi gnyen gcig po/ /rtag tu sad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes ba bsod nams me tog las/ /'khrungs shing gus pa'i bdud rtsis bran/ /bstod pa'i dag
160a7(mdo 'grel): pa bde gshegs kyis/ /snyan du 'os pa de yis byas/ /de yis nyon mong sdug bsngal gyi/ /rang bzhin skabs mkhyen kun mkhyen gyis/ /'ching ba'i khang ba'i bu ga yi/ /snang ba dag gis tshim par byas/ /de ltar gyur pa ma skyes dgras/ /shes nas dogs
160b1(mdo 'grel): bas 'khrugs gyur pa'i/ /pha yi brtson khang dag gis ni/ /bug pa shin tu chud ba'ang bkag /de nas gdug pa'i btson srung gis/ /de yis bka' las spu gri yis/ /dam du bcings pa de yi ni/ /rkang pa rnam par bcad pa byas/ /drag po'i sdug bsngal nyon mongS
160b2(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /mchog tu gzir pa'i sa bdag des/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes/ /gdud pa'i tshe de ldan pas brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen/ /mdun du mngon sum nyid gshegs te/ /brgya byin gyis bshams gdan la bzhugs/ /thugs
160b3(mdo 'grel): rje nyid kyis der bka' stsal/ /rgyal po ci bya chi bzad pa'i/ /las kyi lugs ni 'di 'dra yin/ /dge dang mi dges rab bskrun 'bras/ /spyad pa min par yod mi 'dzad/ /chags sdang dug gis dkrigs gyur cing/ /sna tshogs gdung ba bzod dka' ba/ /snying po med
160b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'khor ba na/ /sdug bsngal 'di lta snying bo nyid/ /rgud pa nyams pas nyam thag cing/ /kun nas nyon mongs rdzogs dus su/ /'khrug pa med pa'i chags bral lam/ /brtan pa kho na yongs skyob yin/ /'khor ba 'jigs rung nags kyi nang na rab tu rgyas
160b5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /sdug bsngal me yi gdung ba 'phro ba rab rgyas du ba bzhin/ /slar yang reg par gyur pa min pa legs byas ldan rnams kyis/ /mig ni mchi ma'i chu yi thigs kyis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po longs spyod re ba thong/ /sdug bsngal 'di? la
160b6(mdo 'grel): bstan pa brten/ /'khor ba'i spyod tshul thams cad ni/ /yongs su 'gyur ba 'gal ba can/ /lus kyi mjug tu da lta nyid/ /khyod la dge ba nye bar gnas/ /zhes brjod de ni dbugs phyung ste/ /bcom ldan rang gi gnas su gshegs/ /gzugs can snying pa'ang
160b7(mdo 'grel): lus kyi mthar/ /de dus nyid na mtho ris su/ /dpal ldan rnam thos sras kyi bu/ /rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ces par gyur/ /pha ni srog dang bral ba dag/ /ma skyes dgra yis shes gyur nas/ /de yi lus ni rab sbyangs te/ /rang gis nyes par byas pa smad/ /da sems
161a1(mdo 'grel): dwag po'i sdig pas gdungs/ /sbyong tshul ngan bas sun phyung ste/ /phyin nas gdung ba'i me la dor/ /dag pa'i bya ba byed pa bzhin/ /des bsams kye ma kun rmongs las/ /dbang phyug gis rgyags sred ldan blo/ /tshul ngan bdag
161a2(mdo 'grel): ni kha spub tu/ /sdig pa'i g.yang la ltung bar gyur/ /thos pa shes rab kyis dbul zhing/ /rang nyid bde bar rmongs gyur pa/ /mi srun bsngags rjes zhugs pa rnams/ /bsam bas lus ni gdung bar byed/ /rten sa med pa'i sdig ba yi/ /'dam du
161a3(mdo 'grel): lhung zhing nyams gyur ba/ /bdag med bdag la rgyal ba ni/ /yang dag dran pa skyabs su 'gyur/ /de ltar yun rings bsams nas de/ /bde bar gshegs ba'i drung song ste/ /ngan pa byas la rmong byed cing/ /mchog tu yang dag zhum par gyur/ /der ning
161a4(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid mi gtsang bar/ /khas len khrel dang bcas pa des/ /sdig pa reg pas 'jigs pa bzhin/ /ring nas rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal/ /ngan byas lus la yang dag chags/ /gsal bar byed cing 'dar ldan pas// mig ni mchi ma dang bcas
161a5(mdo 'grel): des/ /kun mkhyen la ni yongs skyob zhus/ /yongs gdung sdig pa byas pa bdag /dmyal ba'i me ni bde bar gnas/ /thugs rje'i rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das/ /khyod nyid la ni skyabs su song/ /graS? gnyis dmar ba khyod kyi spyan/ /padmo'i 'od ldan giS gla
161a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /dri ma 'khru bzod dag byed pa/ /'di yis bdag la reg bar mdzod/ /mi srun gros kyis rab zhugs shing/ /bag med spyod tshul ngan pa can/ /sdig can 'byor ba la chags ba/ /bdag gis pha ni rnam par bsad/ /ces pa tshe de ldan de yi/ /
161a7(mdo 'grel): tshig thos de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /de yi sdig rdul dag bya'i slad/ /bsod nams dbyangs can rab tu spros/ /rang las kyis bzhin mi spyan pa/ /rgyal po gnod pa ma bsams pa/ /khyod ni pha bsad la bskul te/ /nyam da'i sdig par lhung par
161b1(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /sdug bsngal de des spyad bya zhing/ /khyod kyis kyang ni sdig pa thob/ /sa skyong de dang khyod kyi 'di/ /myong bar bya ba mtshungs pa nyid/ /rang gi las ni rab bkod pa/ /dpral ba'i ngos la gnas pa dag/ rdo yi dum bu'i ri mo bzhin/ /mi rnams kyi ni g.yo ma yin//
161b2(mdo 'grel): khyod ni mi srun pas bskul nas/ /sdig pa'i las ni byas pa yis/ /dge legs bdud rtsi nye ba ni/ /rang gi lag pas 'phangs par gyur/ /gal te khyod la da lha yang/ /sdig gzhom phun tshogs thob 'dod pa/ /yod na bsod nams blo gros mdzod/ /de yang zhi las
161b3(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid la'o/ /mar me'i spyod tshul bde ba bskyed/ /'tsho byed grags pa rab tu 'bar/ /bdud rtsi'i rab tu byed pa 'di/ /legs pa dang 'grogs dam ba'i spyod do/ /rjes su 'gyod ba'i mas gdung dang/ /dam pa rnams dang 'grogs pa dang/ /yang dag bsgrags dang
161b4(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa yis/ /lus can rnams ni sdig nyams byed?/ /snod ni gtsang byed yon tan sdong bu nges par zad mi byed/ /mdza' ba'i snum ni mi 'phrog dri ma yang ni skyed mi byed/ /skyon mtshon mjug tu rab mdzes g.yo ba nyid ni 'dzin mi byed/ /dam pa dang 'grogs legs
161b5(mdo 'grel): byas khang par mar me ci yang yin/ /yon tan ldan pa'i tshogs la rgud pa 'doms mkhas mtshan mo'i skad cig mtshungs/ /skye o'i 'dren byed rnams kyi bya ba mdza' dag rab tu 'gog par byed/ /shin tu mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la gnas shing snang ba
161b6(mdo 'grel): yongs zad las/ /rmongs pa chen po 'byung ba skyed byed mun pa dang ni mi srun 'grogs/ /rgyal po dal bu dal bu yis/ /dus kyis sdig pa zad gyur nas/ /dben pas snang bar byas ba yis/ /rang sangs rgyas su khyod 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa bcom ldan rgyal ba yis//
161b7(mdo 'grel): brtse bas de ni dbugs dbyung mdzad/ /ltung la lhag par dam pa rnams/ /snying rje byams pa'i spyan dang ldan/ /de nas bde gshegs la btung de/ /mi bdag rang gis gnas su song/ /sdig pa'i khur bo chen po ni/ /yang ba nyid bzhin rnam par rig/ /dge slong rnams
162a1(mdo 'grel): kyis de song tshe/ /de yi las kyi dge mtshan las/ /sa skyong gi ni sngon byung mdza' / /dris shing kun mkhyen gyis bka' stsal/ /ba ra NA sir tshong dpon gyi/ /bu bzhi dag ni byung gyur te/ /dpal ldan bsdams pa dag bral zhing/ /gdung med
162a2(mdo 'grel): rtse dga' la brtson pa'o/ /nam zhig bde bas myos gyur cing/ /phan tshun kyal ka'i gtam gyis gnas/ /lang tshos 'phyar ba de dag gis/ /rang sangs rgyas ni byon pa mthong/ /de mthong rnam par sdang ba skyes/ /zhi dul smod byed phu bo ni/ /sun da ra ka
162a3(mdo 'grel): zhes pa yis/ /'dzum bcas spun zla rnams la smras/ /btung bas myos pas dge slong ni/ /chos gos lhung bzed rtags can 'di/ /srog dang bral ba bsgrub po zhes/ /'di ni bdag gi yid la snyam/ /g.yo ba las des 'di brjod tshe/ /gnyis ba kun
162a4(mdo 'grel): dar zhes pas/ /smras pa bdag ni dge slong 'di/ /chu la 'phangs te bsad par 'dod/ /de nas gsum pa sdig bcan/ /sun da ra ta zhes pas smras/ /dge slong 'di nyid mgyogs par ni/ /kha khyer dag las 'phang bar bya/ /bzhi pa gdug ba'i blo gros
162a5(mdo 'grel): can/ /kun d+ha ra zhes bya bas smras/ /dge slong rkang pa rang gis ni/ /spu gris lag pa med par bya/ /zhes pa smra zhing de dag rnams/ /sdig ba yid la 'dod par gyur/ /gang gis rang 'dod mtshungs ba'i 'bras/ /de dag skye ba gzhan la thob/ /chags pas long
162a6(mdo 'grel): bas nor mthong ste/ /khro bas long bas dgra nyid do/ /'dod pas long bas 'dod ldan ma/ /dregs bas long bas ci yang min/ /nor gyis rab bskyed rnam 'gyur can/ /bdag nyid mi sdom rtog spyod dman/ /rgyags pa rnams kyi kun dga' ni/ /nyon mongS
162a7(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba nyid du 'gyur/ /rgyu med khro bar byed cing rgyu med rab tu 'phar bar byed/ /rgyu med mdza' bar byed cing rgyu med kun tu khas lan byed/ /nges bar rmongs pas bcom pa phan dang mi phan dpyod med cing/ /mchog tu tshim pas mi yi phyugs rnams rgyagS
162b1(mdo 'grel): dang bcas bar gyur/ /sdig las tshong dbon bu thu bo/ /de nyid skye ba gzhan la ni/ /shAkya shA ri rgya zhes pa/ /chang 'thungs nas ni nyams par gyur/ /gnyis pa yang ni shAkya dag /ming chen chu la shi bar gyur/ /gsum pa rgyal po gsal rgyal yang/ /bu yi bskrad
162b2(mdo 'grel): nas bsad par gyur/ /bzhi pa gzugs can snying po 'di/ /bu yis brtson du bcings nas bsad/ /skye dang ldan pa'i nor bzhin du/ /las ni rab ldan spyod par byed/ /de ltar rmongs pas bcom pa'i dam pa dam min rnams kyis 'dir/ /bde ba med pa'i las
162b3(mdo 'grel): ni 'dra la nyid rnam par bsgrubs pa dag /tshul min nye bar gnas pa de ni mchi ma'i chu dag gis/ /mig rdzogs mya ngan mi chung dbang dang bral bas spyod par byed/ /gzugs can snying po'i skye ba snga mar rab zhugs byung ba'i tshul/ /mi bzad dug gi rnam smin
162b4(mdo 'grel): 'di dag bde gshegs kyis gsungs pa/ /'dun sar dge slong rnam mang dag gis gsal bar thos gyur nas/ /gdud ba brgya yis mtshan min sun phyung sems nyid yin par sems/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs
162b5(mdo 'grel): pa brjod pa dbag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /ma skyes dgras pha bsad pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //mi srun mun pas 'phral la long bar byas gyur cing/ /dpal 'byor rnam par gnas dang bral bar rab
162b6(mdo 'grel): bskrun kyang/ /nyam nga'i gnas skabs mtshan mo 'das nas pad+ma bzhin/ /slar yang yon tan ldan pas rang rig phun tshogs 'thob/ /bde gshegs mnyan yod rgyal byed kyi/ /skyed mos chal na bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /lhas byin yongs su sdang ba yi/ /rtsod
162b7(mdo 'grel): bas khyab pas rnam bsams pa/ /shAkya'i rigs las skyes ba'i mi/ /bdag ni spun dang mtshungs shing mnyam/ /bsod nams mthu yis 'gro gsum gyis/ /mchod bya nyid ni rgyal bas thob/ /de slad de yi 'tsho ba ni/ /rab tu gzhom la bdag 'bad bya/ /gang
163a1(mdo 'grel): phyir nyi ma mnub tshe/ /gzhan gyi gzi byin gsal ba med/ /yid ni nga rgyal gyis mtho ba/ /rnam shes dag dang mthu dang ni/ /rigs dang dka' thub dpal dag gis/ /pha rol khyad 'phags bzod ma yin/ /dug ni rang gi sen rtsel/ /gzung
163a2(mdo 'grel): nas de la phyag 'tshal te/ /brtan bar rkang ba la mnan pas/ /nges par phug la gtang bar bya/ /de ltar sdig ba bsams byas nas/ /sdong ba'i dbang gyur mi srun pa/ /de yis skar rgyal la sogs pa'i/ /gnyen rnams la ni 'di skad smras/ /de ring
163a3(mdo 'grel): bde gshegs gzu bo yi/ /zhabs la rab tu ngang ba'i slad/ /gdug pa gnod ba byed pa'o/ /sdig pa ci ldan bdag gtug bo/ /zhes smra gdug pa'i blo can de/ /rjes mthun ster byed de dag rnams/ /kun dang lhan cig rgyal ba ni/ /rgyal byed tshal bzhugs
163a4(mdo 'grel): lta ru song/ /der ni bcom ldan mthong gyur nas/ /ji snyed nye bar nges phyin pa/ /de srid bdag ni bsregs so zhes/ /rkang pa sprug cing sgra cher smras/ /'tshe ba'i rnam rtog sdig pa ni/ /rdo rje lta bus yang dag bcom/ /skad cig de la dmyal ba'i mer/ /lus
163a5(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa lhung par gyur/ /'jigs rung dmyal bar lhung ba de/ /'phral la kun mkhyen gyis gzigs nas/ /de spyod thos bas ya mtshan pa'i/ /phun tshogs dge slong la gsungs ba/ /sdig la dag gi skyon gyis 'di/ /nyon mongs nyam dang lhung
163a6(mdo 'grel): bar gyur/ /gang phyir dri ma ldan pa'i yid/ /kun tu rab rib drag po bskyed/ /grong khyer dge ba'i dbyangs su ni/ /sa yi bdag po yid bzang la/ /byas shes dang ni byas mi shes/ /bu gnyis sngon tshe byung bar gyur/ /byas shes brtse bas slong rnams la//
163a7(mdo 'grel): rtag tu dpag bsam shing bzhin du/ /rang gi rin chen rgyan gyis tshogs/ /rnam par dkrol nas rab tu ster/ /bogs pa min ba pha yi rdzas/ /thams cad ? cag thun mong yin/ /zhes smras byas mi shes kyis kyang/ /de yis byin pa de dag phrogs/ /de nas
163b1(mdo 'grel): mi bdag blo gros dbyangs/ /zhes pas byas shes bsngags 'os la/ /skye bo dga' ma zhes pa yi/ /bu mo'i tshig gis byin par gyur/ /rang nyid kyis bsgrubs byin pa yis/ /yid la re ba de la skyes/ /de nas chu gter chen por ni/ /byas shes gzings la zhon bar
163b2(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /sdar zhing 'gran bas gus 'phel pa/ /ngan pa byas mi shes pa yang/ /rin chen sgrub brtson de nyid kyi/ /rjes su chags las mong bar gyur/ /de nas tshong pa'i don mthun gyis/ /yongs gang gzings ni dal bu yis/ /rjes su mthun pa'i rlung dag gis// 'dod
163b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i gling du phyin par gyur/ /tshong pa rnams kyis kun rtog bzhin/ /rin chen tshogs kyis kun tu khengs/ /de nas de ni slar log nas/ /rang gi phyogs su 'gro brtson tshe/ /sa gzhi ri ba'i rin po che/ /lnga brgya lnga ni byas shes kyis/ /blangs nas gos kyi yal
163b4(mdo 'grel): 'dab la/ /ras ma yis ni mdung pa bcings/ /de nas gzings chen rin chen gyi/ khur gyis yongs su ngal ba de/ /rlung chen dag gis zhig gyur te/ /tshul ngan rnams kyi dbang phyug bzhin/ /de nas shing dum bzung ba yi/ /byas shes kyis ni 'tsho ba thob//
163b5(mdo 'grel): rgyab kyis byas mi shes dag ni/ /bying bar gyur pa yang dag bsgral/ /'jigs rung chu srin 'byung gnas las/ /brtse bas bsgral ba'i spun zla des/ /de yi thu ba dag la ni/ /rin chen yid 'ong bsags pa mthong/ /de yi rin chen la chags dang/ /sdang
163b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i dbang du gyur pa des/ /rgya mtsho'i 'gram du ngal ba yis/ /spun la 'khu ba bsams par gyur/ /de ni gnyid du song ba la/ /mig dag mtshon gyis rab phyung nas/ /rin po che yi tshogs bzung ste/ byas mi gzo de mgyogs par song/ /sgra gcan gyis
163b7(mdo 'grel): ni nyin phyed bzhin/ /gdug pas lod bar byas pa des/ /'jig rten phan pa bral ba las/ /sdug bsngal ldan pa des kyang bsams/ /de ni slong la sbyin don du/ /yid la re ba don med gyur/ /long pa bdag gi 'tsho ba ni// 'bras med dag gis dgos pa
164a1(mdo 'grel): ci/ /gal te dus la ma bab pas/ /srog ni 'jig par mi 'gyur na/ /de la grogs med dka' thub kyi/ /sbyor ba nyon mongs zhi 'jig bzang/ /nor zad skye bo sdad gyur cing/ /khengs pa dang bral 'khrugs pa'i tshe/ /skyes bu rnams kyi na tshod
164a2(mdo 'grel): 'jug /zhi bas zad pa mchod par 'os/ /de ltar bsams shing dal bus des/ /'gro ba don mthun dag gis bsgral/ /sa bdag blo gros dbyangs kyi ni/ /grong khyer dag dang nye bar phyin/ /ba lang skyong ba'i khang pa der/ /cung zad dus ni de yis bsdad/ /rgyal
164a3(mdo 'grel): po'i bu mos skyed mos tshal/ /rnam par lta zhing 'gro ba yis/ /long yang rgyal po'i mtshan rnams kyis/ /gsal bar mtshan ma des mthong nas/ /skye ba snga ba'i mdza' bas bcings/ /de la mngon par dga' bar gyur/ /de las yab kyi bka' las ni//
164a4(mdo 'grel): rang nyid mchog 'dam de yis byas/ /rgyal po rnams kyis nang nas ni/ /mig dang bral ba bos te gdams/ /sa skyong rnams ni yongs btang nas/ /sdig ma khyod kyis long ba gdams/ /zhes brjod pha ni khros pa yis/ /dge ma de ni phyi rol bsgral/ /mdza' 
164a5(mdo 'grel): bcugs nyer bsags gus pa can/ /de yis long ba skyed tshal du/ /bzhag nas 'bad pas kha zas dag /blangs nas ster zhing rtag tu gnas/ /nam zhig zas kyi skabs 'das tshe/ /yun ring lon nas 'ongs de la/ /bkres pas bzhin ni yongs nyams pa'i/ /rgyal
164a6(mdo 'grel): po'i bu yis rab smras pa/ /khyed ni kun tu ma rtags par/ /khyed mas g.yo ba 'ba' zhig las/ /mi bdag yangs pa spyan ldan rnams /yongs btang bdag ni long ba 'dams/ /khyod ni phyi nas 'gyod ba yis/ /bdag la gus pa dman gyur te/ /da ni mdza' bzhan
164a7(mdo 'grel): ba nyid/ /ston par brtson pa ma yin nam/ /long ba lta bas yid phyung ste/ /gzugs bzang lta la mngon par phyogs/ /de ring zas kyi dus 'das te/ /ring mo zhig nas khyod 'ongs so/ /de yis rtsub mo 'di smras te/ /'dar ba dang ldan 'khri shing ni/ /sgra sgrogs phung
164b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i phreng ldan bzhin/ /snyan par smra byed des smras pa/ /mgon po khro bas bdag la ni/ /log pa'i dogs pa bgyir mi 'os/ /mdza' bas mnyes gshin sems kyis ni/ /tshig gi mnga' ltang mi bzod do/ /khyod ni lha nyid du shes la/ /gal te bdag gi yid dag na/ /bden pa
164b2(mdo 'grel): de yis khyod kyi mig /cig ni snang ba ldan gyur cig /ces pas snying stobs ldan ma des/ /brjod tshe myur bar de yis spyan/ /rab rgyas pad+ma'i rnam pa can/ /gcig ni dri med nyid du gyur/ /de yi bden ba'i mthu yis ni/ /ya mtshan chen bo yang dag skyes/ /bdan pa'i yid ches
164b3(mdo 'grel): spro ldan pas/ /byas shes kyis ni de la smras/ /spun zla byas mi shes de yis/ /mig gnyis dag ni phyung gyur pa'i/ /gnod pa de la bdag la ni /kho na nam rnam 'gyur ma skyes na/ /bden pa de yis gnyis pa yis/ /mig kyang rnal du gnas gyur cig/ ces brjod de yis
164b4(mdo 'grel): skad cig la/ /de ni gsal ba'i mig gis mtshan/ /de nas byung ba'i mdza' bshad pa'i/ /byas shes bdag bor 'os pa ni/ /skye bo dge ma rab mgu bas/ /song nas pa la nges par bshad/ /de nas de ni gyos po yis/ /rin chen glang po rta yis mchod/ /dpal dang bzhin du
164b5(mdo 'grel): mdzes ma dang/ /lhan cig yab kyi grong khyer song/ /zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te/ /rab tu mgu ba'i pha yis der/ /skal bzang skye be rjes chags pa/ /rgyal tshab dag gi gnas la bkod/ /ngo tsha med ba byas mi shes/ /de la rab tu dang ba'i g.yos/ /zhabs la
164b6(mdo 'grel): gtugs te de la ni/ /'khu ba'i bsam pas yang dag 'ongs/ /sgyu yis de ni bsad 'dod pa'i/ /gya gyu'i bsam pa ldan pa de/ /kyi hud bdag bsregs bdag bsregs zhes/ /brjod pa kho nas dmyal bar ltung/ /de nyid lhas byin 'di yin te/ /byas shes de yang nga nyid
164b7(mdo 'grel): do/ /skye ba gzhan du rjes 'brel bas/ /'di yiS sdang ba yong mi zlog/ /de ltar kun mkhyen gyis gsungs lhas byin gyi ni sbyong ba de/ /yongs su gdung ba byed pa rab mang dang ldan zhing/ /skye ba gzhan du nye bar bsags pa'i sdig pa rjes 'brel ba/ /dge slong tshogs 
165a1(mdo 'grel): kyis thos nas yid ni byung ba bzhin du gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /byas shes kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug
165a2(mdo 'grel): pa'o// //snying stobs che bsten yid ni sbyin la gcig tu nges rnams kyi/ /spro dang mchod dang yon tan longs spyod 'byor pa skyed byed pa/ /sngon gyi bsod nams bsags pa las byung dge ba mngon brjod pa'i/ /dpag bsam shing ni nges par dus sum tshang
165a3(mdo 'grel): med 'bras skyed/ /bcom ldan rgyal ba mnyan yod na/ /sa bdag ko sa la dbang gi/ skyed tshal mchog na dge slong gi /tshogs dang thabs cig sngon bzhugs tshe/ /thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba/ /srid pa zil gnon mchog gi chos/ /'jig rten gsum po
165a4(mdo 'grel): dge ba la/ /sbyor ba de yis rab tu bstan/ /skabs der klu yi rgyal po'i bu/ /rgya mtsho dag tu gnas pa bzhi/ /stobs dang shin tu stobs dang ni/ /dbugs dang dbugs chen zhes bya ba/ /srid mo mngon dga' zhes pa yis/ /bskul nas de dag mnyam du ni//
165a5(mdo 'grel): bde gshegs kyis gsungs dam pa'i chos/ /mchog gi bdud rtsi nyan du 'ongs/ /sngon gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das/ /blo bzang 'khor ba 'jig dang ni/ /gser thub ces ni bya ba dang/ /de bzhin dgra bcom 'od srung la/ /nyan du srid mos bskul gyur kyang//
165a6(mdo 'grel): dpal gyi bder chags 'ongs ma gyur/ /de dag bsod nams yongs smin nas/ /shAkya thub pa'i mngon du 'ongs/ /de dag mi yi lus bsgrubs te/ /ston pa la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ zhabs la mgo yis gtugs byas te/ /'khor der nye bar 'dug pa'i
165a7(mdo 'grel): tshe/ /gsal rgyal ko sa la yi dbang/ /dpal 'byor rgyags 'dzum mdzes pa yis/ /gdugs dang rnga yab bzlog nas ni/ /dam chos nyan du yang dag 'ongs/ /ston ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal slad/ /tshogs su zhugs pa de la ni/ /mi yi bdag la gus pa
165b1(mdo 'grel): las/ /kun gyi btung cing go skabs phye/ /rigs gnas bla ma mi rnams kyis/ /mngon par dga' bar byas de la/ /klu yi rgyal bo'i bu rnams kyis/ /go skabs bkur stir byas ma gyur/ /de dag dregs pas khangs pa dang/ /rgyal ba la ni gus pas kyang/ /khengs
165b2(mdo 'grel): ldan mi bdag khro pa ni/ /nang du rab tu bsgribs par gyur/ /de yis rang gi 'khor la ni/ /'gro tshe sngon du de dag rnams/ /tshar bcad brda? yis bskos byas nas/ /rnam par med pa bzhin du gyur/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas kyang/ /de yi nges pa mkhyen gyur
165b3(mdo 'grel): nas/ /'jug tu 'dzum mdzad rab gsungs pa/ /yid kyi me long dri ma can/ /sdang ba'i rdul gyis gang ba la/ /chos ni nye bar bstan pa yis// gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa mdzes ma yin/ /mnyam pa nyid dang bral zhing khro dang rmongs pas bcom rnams la/ /nyer bstan gyis
165b4(mdo 'grel): ni dge ba'i cha shas chung nguAng yod mi byed/ /gang phyir blo gros blun po rnams kyi rab mang skyon ldan lus/ /dag pas dman pa dag la sman ni sman nyid mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa bcom ldan rigs pa yis/ /phan pa gsung ba thos gyur kyang/ /klu rnams la ni sdad
165b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i yis/ /sa yi bdag pos btang ma gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan la btung nas/ /mi bdag rang gi gnas song tshe/ /de yi dpung gis lam bkag pas/ /klu rnams mkha' yi lam nas song/ /khyim du de dag gis bsams te/ /sa bdag gzhim pa'i dus byas naS//
165b6(mdo 'grel): 'jigs rung sgra sgrogs sprin gyis chogs/ /sna pa 'joms pas yang dag 'ongS/ /de dag rtsol ba kun mkhyen gyis/ /mkhyen nas sa yi bdag po yis/ /phyogs su lhung zhing bsrung bzod pa/ /mong+gal gyi bu la bskos/ /de nas klu yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /rdo rje'i
165b7(mdo 'grel): char chen rab spros pa/ /de yi mthu yis sa bdag la/ /me tog char ba nyid du gyur/ /de nas de dag gis mtshon dang/ /rdo yi char drag bzod dka' phab/ /mong+gal gyi bu yis bcags pa las/ /rgyal bo la 'os zas nyid gyur/ /de yi mthu las gdengs can/
166a1(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /spro pa nyams nas song ba'i tshe/ /'tshe ba dang bral mi yi bdag/ /sod nas bde gshegs la phyag 'tshal/ /rgyal ba'i bka' las mon+gal bu/ /de yi longs spyod phun tshogs kyis/ /gus pas legs sbyar skal ba bzang/ /rigs ba nyid
166a2(mdo 'grel): du mchod par byas/ /de nas mtho ris la 'os pa'i/ /sa bdag 'byor mthong dge slong gis/ /thal mo sbyar nas kun mkhyen la/ /dge mtshan 'bebs las rab tu zhus/ /bcom ldan bsod nams ci zhig gi /mthu yis rgyal po gsal rgyal ni/ /longs spyod
166a3(mdo 'grel): kun gyis rnam mdzes ba'i/ /rab rgyas rgyal srid chen po thog/ /'di la rtag tu sa li yi/ /sdong po bur shing sdong bur gyur/ /lha yi bza' btung phun sum tshogs/ /de dag las ni gang gi 'bras/ /dge slong gus pas dris pa 'di/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas
166a4(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ /rgyal po'i longs spyod phun tshogs kyis/ /rgyu ni rab tu mnyan par gyis/ /ko sa la yi ljongs 'di ru/ /bur shing zhing pa dum bu zhes/ /bya bas rang sangs rgyas la sngon/ /bur chu dang ni zas dag byin// de yi bsod nams rnams dang ni/ /bur chu
166a5(mdo 'grel): zan dag gsol ba des/ /rlung nad kyis nyan rang sangs rgyas/ /rab dang dri med nyid du gyur/ /bur shing zhing pa bsod nams can/ /de ni rgyal bo gsal rgyal 'di/ /bsod nams de yi mthu yis ni/ /longs spyod skal ldan rnam bar mdzes/ /byas shes rnams
166a6(mdo 'grel): la phan pa dang/ /gdug sems can la gnod pa dang/ /dam pa rnams la legs byas ni/ /chung yang chung ngu nyid min 'gyur/ /sa bdag gyi bsod nams 'di/ /kun mkhyen gyis ni gsungs pa'i tshe/ /legs byas mchog tu gyur pa las/ /dge slong ngo
166a7(mdo 'grel): mtshar g.yo med gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan la gus bas/ /rgyal pos lhag bar gnas byas nas/ /longs spyod phun tshogs lha la las/ /de de rang gis nye bar bkod/ /mchog tu mdzes pa'i rim gro yis/ /mchod de gser gyi khril mi/ /bder bzhugs
166b1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ /mi yi mgon pos rab smras pa/ /bcom ldan khyod la gus pa yis/ /legs byas dpal ni rnam rgyas pa/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags ba yis/ /bdag ni grol gyur srid lags sam/ /bsod nams rdzogs ba'i rgyal ba can/ /sa yi bdag go
166b2(mdo 'grel): gus pas 'di/ /dris la bde bar gshegs pa yis/ /'dzum dkar snang ba spro zhing gsungs/ /rgyal po 'khor ba dag gi las/ /thog mdza' med par 'jug pa 'di/ /nyon mongs kun ? ma thob bar/ /skyes bus bde bar ji ltar 'gong/ /yun rings 'dris 'khor lo
166b3(mdo 'grel): skor bzhin rgyun tu 'ong dang 'gro ba yis/ /rang bzhin gyis zab 'khor ba 'di la bde blag 'god par mi nus te/ /sbyor ba goms ba med nyid las rnams nges par zad pa min par ni/ /rgya che 'bras bu gsal ba'i chos kyang 'di ni 'ching ba nyid du gyur/ /sbyin la goms pa
166b4(mdo 'grel): chen po yis/ /kun las rnam par log gyur pa/ /bdag kyang sa la skye ba bzung/ /chos kyis 'khor ba nyid du gyur/ /nor can zhes bya nor dang ldan/ /bar NA sir sngon byung gyur/ /gdung ba 'phrog cing 'bras bu rgyas/ /slong ba rnams kyi grib shing bzhin/ /mu ges 'jig
166b5(mdo 'grel): rten brlag gyur cing/ /mi bzang nyon mongs kyis 'khrugs tshe/ /rang sangs rgyas ni lnga brgya yis/ /de la 'tsho ba bslangs bar gyur/ /mi chung dpal des bang ba yis/ /khang bdag la bgros te dag la/ /mchog tu longs spyod 'os pa'i zas/ /mu ge dag gi mthar thug sbyar
166b6(mdo 'grel): de yi khyim du gsol ba la/ /brgya phrag lnga ni tshogs gyur te/ /de nas rim gyis rang sangs rgyas/ /stong phrag gnyis ni byung bar gyur// skyes tshe 'bras bu'i dpal thob pa/ /bsod nams btab pa de yis ni/ /mu ge'i syin bas de yi mdzod// zad kyi nyon mongs
166b7(mdo 'grel): ma gyur/ /bde ba rgyud ba bsod nams kyis/ /spyad nas nor can de nyid ni/ /nga yin zhi ba mchog gis 'dir/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub bstan/ /'khor ba' las dang 'bras bu 'jug pa 'di/ /'ching skyed thag pa dkar rang dkar min ni/ /bsod nams sdig pa
167a1(mdo 'grel): dag gis rnam bar bcings/ /de zad pa la thar pa'i gnas zhes brjod/ /de ltar rmongs pa zad pas thar bar ni/ /rgyal bas gsungs pas dbang gis thos nas/ /nyon mongs mdza' bos zhi ba kho nar nges/ /bsod nams mngon pa'i nga rgyal lhod
167a2(mdo 'grel): par byas/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang bos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brdzod? ba dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /sa li sdong bu'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //rang don la 'jug chags ba dang bral zhing/ /gzhan
167a3(mdo 'grel): la phan par rtag tu brtson rnams kyi/ /grub pa nyon mongs rnams la mi 'jigs shing/ /gdung dang bgegs bral gzir byed min par gyur/ /mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal du sngon/ /bzhugs pa bcom ldan rgyal ba yis/ /chos 'chad pa yi zhar la ni/ /dge
167a4(mdo 'grel): slong tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ /sa bdags rnams kun gyi bdag /don grub ces pa legs byas ldan/ /sa skyong kun gyi mgo bo la/ /bka' ni rnam bar rtse bar gyur/ /chu yi gter la gnas gyur pa/ /rgya mtsho zhes pa klu yi bu/ /don kun grub ba sa bdag
167a5(mdo 'grel): ni/ /de yi bu nyid dag tu gyur/ /snying stobs rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od/ /skal bzang byang chub sems dpa' de/ /skyes pa tsam gyis gzhi ni/ /rang gi 'od kyis rgyas par byas/ /de ni che bar skyes gyur pa'i/ /grags pa lha rnams kyis mchod pa/ /srid pa mdza' dag
167a6(mdo 'grel): khyab pa ni/ /chos kyi bzhin du yang dag rgyas/ /skyed tshal mchog tu dar ma de/ /mdun du lha rnams kyis sprul pa'i/ /skyes bu rgan po mthong bar gyur/ /rga bas 'khogs ba de mthong nas/ /chags bral gyi ni bag chags sang/ /'khor ba bzhin du lus dag
167a7(mdo 'grel): ni/ /snying po med par de yis bsams/ /bskyed tshal lta ba'i chags bral te/ /dal gyis log nas 'ong ba de/ /lam du dbul ba nyid kyis ni/ /mdzes bral phongs par gyur pa mthong/ /snying rjes drangs pa'i yid can des/ /bde med nyon mongs de mthong nas//
167b1(mdo 'grel): bsams pa sa la dbul po rnams/ /kye ma sdug bsngal bzod par byed/ /rin chen gyis gang sa gzhi na/ /gzhan las blangs pas nyer 'tsho zhing/ /phongs gyur 'di dag sdug bsngal ni/ /sbyin pa min las skyes par smra/ /skyes bu bkren pa 'di dag rnams//
167b2(mdo 'grel): skyes bu gzhan la slong ba gang/ /'di nyid kho ni mi bslu bar/ /sdig pa'i las rnams dag gis rtags/ /gnas dang gnas su rmad gyur cing/ /'di dag slong bas yid byung la/ /bslangs par gyur kyang bkres pa na/ /kye ma 'di dag nyes byas nyid/ /de ltar yun
167b3(mdo 'grel): rings bsams byas nas/ /kun gyi nyon mongs gzhom brtson pas// 'gro ba dbul min bya ba'i slad/ /rin chen don gnyer rgya mtshor song/ /pha yis ci zhig lhang? bsten nyid/ /rjes gnang nges pa brtan pa de/ /gzings la yang dag zhon byas nas/ /rin chen gling du
167b4(mdo 'grel): phyin par gyur/ /der ni tshong dpon gzings dag la/ /zhon nas lhan cig 'ongs rnams la/ /de yis smras pa khyed cig rnams/ /rin chen 'dod pa bsdu bar mdzad/ /thun mong rin chen 'di dag gis/ /bdag la dgos pa yod ma yin/ /bdag cag mdzod na rin
167b5(mdo 'grel): chen mchog /'dod dang ldan pa mang po yod/ /'on kyang yid bzhin nor thob slang/ /bdag gi rtsom pa chen po 'di/ /de yi sa ni dbul ba nyid/ /nyams pa dag tu bya bar 'dod// rgya mtsho zhes bya klu yi rgyal/ /chu gter che la rab tu gnas/ /bsams pa'i
167b6(mdo 'grel): don star nor bu ni/ /de khyim na yod bdag gis thos/ /mi bzang lam ni bgrod ba ste/ /bdag ni de nyid len du 'gro/ /brtan ba'i gogs ldan 'bad rtsol dang/ /ldan pa rnams la 'grong dka' med/ /bdag gis legs byas rtsom pa 'di/ /gal te 'thob na bden
167b7(mdo 'grel): nyid du/ /bdag dang bral bas khyed cag rnams/ /ci yang gdung par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes brjod de dag la bzlas nas/ /snying stobs ldan pa rgyal po'i bu/ /chen po'i bstan pa la brten nas/ /des pa brtan pas rab tu zhugs/ /de yis chu yi lam dag nas/ /long
168a1(mdo 'grel): bu tsam la nyin bdun phyin/ /pus nub tsam la nyin bdun dang/ /skyes bu tsam la nyin bdun te/ /de nas zhag ni bdun pa bzhi/ /glang mo'i tshed kyi chu dag la/ /phyin nas mdun du so dug can// 'jigs rung mthong ba dug can mthong/ /de nas byams
168a2(mdo 'grel): ldan yid kyis ni/ /de dag dug med byas nas des/ /khro bas 'khrugs ba'i gnod sbyin gyis/ /gang ba'i gnod sbyin gling du phyin/ /der ni byams ldan yid dag gis/ /de dag khro dang bral bar bsgrubs/ /spro ba yangs bos ya mtshon pa/ /de dag gis bshad thos
168a3(mdo 'grel): gyur te/ /gzhon nu'i snying stobs rgyas pa dang/ /brtson 'grus spro ba 'di yis ni/ /klu yi rgyal po'i khang pa ru/ /khyod nyid bzhed pha 'thob? par 'gyur/ /dus kyis khyod ni thams cad mkhyen/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gyur/ /bdag cag rnams kyang
168a4(mdo 'grel): khyod nyid kyi/ /rjes 'brang nyan thos dag tu gyur/ /de dag dang bas 'di brjod de/ /mngon par dga' ba'i mi bdag bu/ /srin po rnams kyis khengs gyur pa/ /nyam pa srin po'i gling du phyin/ /rnam 'gyur gdug bral de dag gis/ /de bzhin nyid du mchod nas de/ /dpung
168a5(mdo 'grel): pas blangs te skad cig gis/ /klu yi dbang po'i khang bar 'phangs/ /lha yi dga' bde la 'os ba'i/ /snang ba 'byor ldan der ni des/ /sdug bsngal chen pos gzir byas pa'i/ /cho de'i sgra na thos bar gyur/ /de yis de hos cah+gs bral can/ /rang bzhin brtse
168a6(mdo 'grel): bas brlan pa'i blos/ /mdun du klu yis bu mo dag /mthong nas 'di dag ci zhes dris/ /yang yang mya ngan la chags pa'i/ /rtsob? gsal byed shugs rings? kyis/ ? bya'i mchu 'dam mdzas pa dag/ dri mar byed des de la smras/ /yon tan ldan pa padmo'i spyan//
168a7(mdo 'grel): klu yi rgyal po dag gi bu/ /thu bo don kun grub ces pa/ /gces pa lnga ba nyid du gyur/ /de yi sdug bsngal dag gis ni/ /kun dga' dang bral bde dag la spangs/ /khad pa 'dir ni tshe de dag /stug po nyid kyis gnas bar byas/ /shes ba de yi tshig thos naS//
168b1(mdo 'grel): rang yul mthong bas dga' ba des/ /nang du yongs 'dris 'dzin byed cing/ /klu yi rgyal po'i drung du phyin/ /rgyal po'i drung phyin dga' ma dang/ /bcas bas de 'os yongs shes nas/ /bu cig tshur shog tshur shog ces/ /brjod cing kun dga' 'khrugs bar gyur/ /mi yi skye
168b2(mdo 'grel): bo'i? gtam dang ni/ /rang nyid 'ong ba'i rgyu dag kyang/ /de yis bshad pa thos gyur nas/ /klu yis yongs 'khyud de la smas/ /bu gcig yid bzhin nor bu 'di/ /bdag gi mgo bo nyid gyis rgyan/ /long zhig khyod kyi brtag pa ni/ /'bras med byed par mi spro'o/ /'gro bo'i
168b3(mdo 'grel): bya ba byas nas 'di/ /khyod kyis bdag la slar sbyin bya/ /zhes brjod gtsug gi rin chen mchog /de yis bkrol nas de la byin/ /yid bzh+n nor bu nyi ma'i 'od/ /yang dag blangs nas gzhon nu ni/ /dga' bas klung bar la btud de/ /gzings dang nye ba dag tu song/ /deyi
168b4(mdo 'grel): gtam thos rgya mtsho yis/ /lha yis der ni de mthong nas/ /dge ba khyod kyis thob pa yis/ /yid bzhin nor bu ci 'dra smros/ /de yis rgyas pa bar 'di brjod tshe/ /zol med bsam pha drang po des/ /lag pa'i par rab gdengs nas/ /yid bzhin gyi ni nor bu bstan/ /rin
168b5(mdo 'grel): chen mchog? de des mthong nas/ /phrag dog dri ma'i bsam pa yis/ /de yis lag la lag pa yis/ /thal mos bsnun nas chu gter dor/ /shin tu dga' bas bsgrubs pa yis/ /rin chen rgya mtshor lhung mthong nas/ /rtsom pa brtan pa 'bras med pa'i/ /mya ngan g.yo
168b6(mdo 'grel): med des smras pa/ /yon tan la 'os rnam pa can/ /mdza' bas 'dzam par smra byed pa/ /kye ma spang bas sdig ? las/ /byas pas khyod mi mdzes ma yin/ /gang zhig pha rol khyad 'phags la/ /'gran dang mya ngan nyon mongs gyur/ /de la phyogs ni 'di dag rnams//
168b7(mdo 'grel): bsil yang 'bar bas dkrigs par gyur/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi spro bas bzhugs?/ /snying stobs chu gter chen po'o/ /grags pa ga pur ltar dkar po/ /'jig rten gsum gyi thig le 'dzin/ /lha dag gi rin chen stsol/ /sdig pa 'di dang bral bar mdzod// 
169a1(mdo 'grel): dam pa rnams kyi las ngag ni/ /smad pa dang ni mtshungs mi 'gyur/ /chags sam bag med sdang ba la/ /gal te rin chen mi stsol can/ /de lta na ni khyed kyi gnas/ /chu gter 'di ni bdag gis bskam /zhes pa la na mang nges smris kyang/ /gang tshe
169a2(mdo 'grel): rin chen des ma bya? na/ /de tshe rang gi mthu yis de/ /chu gter bskam phying rab tu zhugs/ /mig stong ldan pa'i tig gis ni/ /bi shwa karmas sprul pa'i sna'o/ /bsams pa tsam gyis de yi ni/ /lag? tu 'phral la byung bar gyur/ /bskam par brtson nges ri? byi yi/ /
169a3(mdo 'grel): chu gter dag las chu blangs nas/ /bar snang la ni rab tu gtor/ /shan tu rmad byung byed pa des/ /chu gter sum cha lhag byas te/ /lha rnams kyis ni smras pa yis/ /'jigs nas lha yis nor bu byin/ /rin chen rnams bzhin bdag nyid che/ /sngags rnams
169a4(mdo 'grel): dang ni dka' thub kyang/ /zol med gzi byin che rnams kyis/ /mthu yis de nyid su yis rig /rin chen 'byung gnas rab rgyas pha rol med pa de srid chu yis dkrigs gyur cing/ /byed po'i bde blag stobs las dpa' rlabs phreng bas mkha' la 'god pa
169a5(mdo 'grel): nyid du thos/ /dam pa rnams yi mthu ni chen po'i bdag nyid gzhal med ci yang zab pa ste/ /ya mtshan gnas gang bsam pa'i cho? ga dag la blo ni mdza' ru rgyal bar byed/ /de nas yid bzhin nor thob ste/ /rang gi don mthun dang 'grogs nas/ /de ba rdzogs
169a6(mdo 'grel): pa rgyal po'i bu/ rlung gis grong khyer dag tu phyin?/ /rab tu mgu ba'i pha yis der/ /mchod cing bya ba byas pa des/ /rgyal mtshan rtse la rin chen btags/ /skye bo'i mdun sar rab smras pa/ /gal te 'gar yang bdag dbang ba'i/ /gzhan don kho na bdag
169a7(mdo 'grel): don min/ /bden pa de yis 'jig rten 'ang?/ /thams cad dbul med nying gyur cig /dman la brtse ldan snying stobs kyis/ /gter des de skad brjod pa na/ /rin chen cher pa mdza' med ni kas gzhi dag la bab par 'gyur/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rim can
169b1(mdo 'grel): tshogs/ /'od dang ldan pa de yis ni/ /skye po dbul ba'i rang bzhin gyi/ /mun pa lhag med nyid du gyur/ /de ba'i zhabs ldan stobs kyis dpal ldan rnams kyi khar mdun phyi rol dag tu 'jug /sgo bas bsdigs ldan yang yang rnam par g.yo zhing sgo yi khongs
169b2(mdo 'grel): su nyen gyur la/ /shugs rings dang ldan mya ngan dag gis 'gyel zhing lus ni 'di ga par 'dod gyur pa/ /bkren pa rnams la nor bu'i thung po 'od zer drang po'i dpal tshogs ci yang byung la 'jig rten phongs dang bral ba'i nyin dang bral zhing yid bzhin nor bu
169b3(mdo 'grel): yang/ /de yi bka' las lto 'phye'i 'dren pa nyid du gyur pa'i che/ /kun tu sbyin pa la zhen skye bo dag gi sems rnams ni/ /slong ba'i don mthun kun dang bral bas 'khrugs pa nyid du gyur/ /don kun grub pas sa skyod sras por ni/ /gang gyur de nyid nga yin lus
169b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan 'dir/ /zhes ba'i sngon byung rgyal bas gsungs thos nas/ /dge slong de dag de nyid sems par gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtogs ba brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /don kun grub pa'i rtogs pa brjod
169b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //nu ma mngon dga' glang chen myos bum mtho/ /ga pur do shal rab tu rtse dga' dgod/ /dar la bab pa'i na chung 'byor ba yang/ /bsod nams byas pa rnams la dga' ster yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bcom
169b6(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das/ /mnyan yod nags na rgyu ba'i tshe/ /dpal ldan khyim gyi bdag po sngon/ /legs par rab sar ces pa byung/ /shin tu sdug pa de yi bu/ /glang po can zhes bya bar gyur/ /sngon bsgrubs bsod nams dag gi tshogs/ /rnam pa dag dang bcas pa bzhin/ /de
169b7(mdo 'grel): ni skyes ba'i nyin par la/ /rang mchog glang po chen po na/ /gser gyi rang bzhin skyes gyur te/ /ngo mtshar tshogs ni gcig gyur mi zhin/ /glang dbang de dang gzhon nu dang/ /de yi pha yi re ba dang/ /'jig rten ltad mo mdzod rnams kyang/ /mtshungs pa nyid du gang
170a1(mdo 'grel): bar gyur/ /ri bong can bzhin byis pa de/ /dus la sgyu rtsal chags gnas gyur/ /'jig rten kun gyi mig gi gnyen/ /'od zer ldan zhing rab tu mdzes/ /ngal gyis de ni kho lag rdzogs/ /dpung ba'i ka bas rnam par brgyan/ /yid las
170a2(mdo 'grel): byung ba rtsom pa'i gnas/ /lang tsho gsang ba thob bar gyur/ /de nas nam zhig de yis ni/ /sa yi bdag po gsal rgyal gyi/ /bu mo'i lus kyi chos gos kyi/ /rtag dang lhan ces rnam mdzas ma/ /chos gos bu mo zhes bya ba/ /mdzes shing yid 'ong bzhin
170a3(mdo 'grel): ras can/ /mig langs? gzhon nu ma dag ni/ /skyed tshal lta ru 'ong ba mthong/ /nyams pa mang pa'i gzugs ldan zhing/ /mdzes ma mi dman de mthong nas/ /de ni 'phral la ya mtshan dang/ /'dod pa'i dbang du ma mtshan gyur ro/ /de bsams kye ma lus 'di ni//
170a4(mdo 'grel): shin tu rmad byung mdzes pa ste/ /skyon bral dri med ri bong can/ /gang du bzhin gyi zol gyis mdzes/ /gzugs can mchu ni band+hu ka gnyen yid 'ong rang bzhin can/ /'di ni ngo zla med pa'i mdzes sdug rnam par 'dzin byed cing/ /rlan ldan byu ru'i yal 'dab
170a5(mdo 'grel): dag la 'khu bar brtson ba dang/ /bim ba'i 'od kyi rnam 'phrul dag ni 'phral la 'bras med byed/ /ngi? bong 'dzin pa'i rgyags pa bzhin gyis mi bzod mdzes pas bdud rtsi dman byed cing/ /utpa la rab tu rgyas pa'i nags tshal 'od ni mig
170a6(mdo 'grel): gis rab tu nyams par byed/ /yid sgrub 'grogs 'os lus can 'di yi 'jo sgeg 'gran zla dag la 'jigs steng ba/ /dga' mo'i rol rtsed dpa' rlabs ngag ni 'phral la nyid du skems par byad dam snyam/ /kye ma gang gi 'o ma 'jin pa zung
170a7(mdo 'grel): ni rab myas gra? mkhregs dben ba nya mag? /skyon gyi rang bzhin yin yang yon tan ldan ba'i de shal dag gis gnas par byas/ /bzhin 'di la yang bung ba'i phreng rnams chu skyes blo yis nye ba bsten pa dang/ /g.yo ldan mig gi 'dren byed thub
170b1(mdo 'grel): nga'i yid kyang rtsi yang chags shing nyams par byed/ /de ltar sems pa de yi lus/ /me tog mda' can lta bu dang?/ /mthong nas sa bdag bu mo ni/ /ngo mtshar g.yo ba te/ dpang gyur/ /dran pa 'dzum par byed pa yis/ /de yi ngo tsha'i gos phrogs te/ /gsang
170b2(mdo 'grel): du spu long rgyas pa yis/ lus ni gsal bar mthong ma gyur/ /mngon 'dod gsar pas bkag gyur kyang/ /skyengs pa yis ni phyir bzlog ste/ /yid na de nyid la bzhag nas/ /de ni stong bzhin dal gyis song/ /rgyal po'i pho brang phyin gyur nas/ /ngo tsha a mtshan
170b3(mdo 'grel): yang srungs kyis/ /zum pa bzhin dang zhum pa bzhin/ /bcom pa bzhin du de gyur to/ /gzhon nu yang ni rang khyim du/ /yid las byung ba yang dag rgyas/ /mdun du zla bzhin ma de nyid/ /kun tu rtogs pas yang yang bris/ /de yis yid kyi nor mchog de/ /'dod pa'i
170b4(mdo 'grel): rig pa bzhin dran zhing/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i bu mo bzhin/ /rnyed par dka' bar shes nas bsams/ /skye ba gzhan la gang gi lus/ /yun ring dka' thub yongs 'dris pa/ /skal ldan de yi legs byas kyi/ /shing gi 'khri shing de 'thob 'gyur/ /dga' ba rab
170b5(mdo 'grel): sbyin bsod nams kyis/ /de mthong ba ni thob gyur te/ /gang zhig de 'grogs 'bras ldan pa'i/ /bsod nams de dag yod mi shes/ /de yi bzhin ngas bsil ba'i zer ldan dran pas dga' ba dang/ /de yang rnyed dka' nyid kyis 'bral ba'i gdung ba dag gi bdag /brtan pa 'di
170b6(mdo 'grel): ci rmangS 'di ci zhig 'chol ba? da ni ci/ /srog dang lhan cig rnam par 'bral lam ci yin yongs mi shes/ /de gdong chu skyes dag gis 'phral la bcom pas mtshan mo'i yid rod nyams pa bsten/ /de yis smin ma'i rnam 'phrul dag la ngo tsha yid srubs gzhu ni gugs
170b7(mdo 'grel): bar gyur/ /yid 'ong yal ga mdangs 'phrogs de yi mchu sgros dmang ba ngag gis gzir gyur te/ /chags bral nyid thob bim pa dag ni nags kyi sa la yang dag bsten nam snyam/ /de ltar zla nya'i bzhin ras can/ /bzhin la bsam gtan g.yo med kyis/ /gnyid
171a1(mdo 'grel): kyis /phrag dog can gyis bzhin no?/ /btang ba de yis mtshan mo 'das/ /mdzes ma mthong bar gyur pa'i mdza' / /de ni de yis bshad pa ngag pha yis thos nas de yis ni/ /bsam pa 'phos shing yongs 'dris gyur/ /de la de smras bdag cag bu//
171a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i grong khyer gnas pa'ang min/ /'khor los sgyur de bu mo ni/ /khyod la ji ltar steng bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa bkur ba 'dod pa rnams/ /mi nus pa nyid byed ma yin/ /rnyed par dka' ba 'dod ma yin/ /mi bden pa ni smra ma yin/ /'khri shing tsu ta?
171a3(mdo 'grel): tsam pa ka/ rang dbang rnams la mi gus par/ /yongs 'du'i 'khri shing sems pa na/ /rkang drug pa nyid skam par 'gyur/ /gal te khyod dang de gnyis kyang/ /skye ba snga mar 'bral bsgrubs na/ /de yi 'bras bu 'bad med du/ /nges pa kho nar rgyas par
171a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /ro? ba'i zhags bas ma bkug cing/ /rtog dpyod ngag gis ma gzing la/ /'bad pa'i khur gyi sam? ngal bar/ /nges pa dmyong bya 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes pa pha yi tshig thos nas/ /de de bzhin zhes rnam bsams te/ /sems ni mdzes mas gzung
171a5(mdo 'grel): ba dag /slar yang bzlog par des ma nus/ /de song gsar gyi glang po la/ /rgyal la la gsar du phrad pa yis/ /dga' bar 'os phrad skyes su ni/ /gser gyi mche ba zung dag blangs/ /de nas lag ldan bsod nams kyis/ /mdza' bas byin pa'i mche ba zung/ /gser?
171a6(mdo 'grel): gyi rang bzhin khyad nas de/ /sa yi bdag po lta ru song/ /de yis rin chen gyis mdzes pa'i/ /sa yi bdag po'i khang bar phyin/ /nang zhugs rab btung mdza' ba'i slad/ /gser gyis mche ba gnyis po byin/ /rgyal po rab tu dang ba yis/ /yon tan gyis grags
171a7(mdo 'grel): dga' bar byas/ /mchog ni long zhes brjod gyur kyang/ /de yis ci yang blangs ma gyur/ /mdzes ba dman min de la ni/ /rgyal bos lhag par bkur ba byas/ /rigs shing mdzes pa'i dpyod pa can/ /chags ba med la su mi dga' / /rtag tu rgyal la phrag? tshe
171b1(mdo 'grel): des/ /gsar du so ldan la skyes pa/ /gser gyi rang bzhin mche ba rnams/ /dga' ba'i slad du rab tu phyin/ /yid rab dang ba'i pho nya ni/ /bzhin ras mdzes pa 'dzin byed cing/ /bsten ba'i mdza' bcugs kyis bsdams pa'i/ /sa skyong gis na de la smras/ /rab yang gser
171b2(mdo 'grel): tshogs gling pa yis/ /bsten 'di bdag gis yong mi bzod/ /gang phyir grong khyer pa yi tshogs/ /sa bdag rnams kyis rgyas bya nyid/ /skye pos bgos skal phul ba yi/ /gser gyi dga' ba bdag la ci/ /rin chen yon tan khyod kyi ni/ /gzugs 'di nyid la
171b3(mdo 'grel): bdag dga' o/ /gser dang rin chen rngo ba'i tshogs/ /mdzod rnams na gnas rgyal po ni/ /rgyan du 'os pa'i skyes bu ngag /rin chen rnams la chags na mdzes/ /khyod la 'dod pa'i mchog dag ni/ /bdag gis ci sbyin smra bar mdzod/ /ma lus mdzod ni byin gyur
171b4(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /nges par bdag ni 'gyod mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i spyan zur lhung tsam gyis/ /gal te dpal 'byor ma thob na/ /don gnyer don med nyid gyur pas/ /sa bdag bsten pa'i don ni ci/ /de skangs skyong gis smras tshe/ /gzhon nus thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /de la
171b5(mdo 'grel): smras pa sa skyong bdag /steng bar 'os pa gzhan pa su/ /mkhas pa rnams la rin chen ni/ /don du ma gnyar stsol mdzad pa/ /khyod kyi rgya mtsho'i grags pa ni/ /rab rgyas de dag rgya yis btab/ /rab tu sbyin pa chen pos kyang/ /re ba chen pho khengs ma yin/ /chud?
171b6(mdo 'grel): du rnams kyis dbang phyug gang/ /de ni chen po'i dbul bo nyid/ /'on kyang gang gis nor slong ba/ /khyod kyi dpung pas bsrungs gyur cing/ /chos kyi lam gyi 'tsho ba yi/ /skye bo rnams la dbul po med/ /bdag kyang nor don gnyer ba min/ /sten par byed pa po
171b7(mdo 'grel): yang min/ /nor ldan rnams la nor nyid nor/ /khengs ldan rnams la bkur ba nyid/ /dam pa'i dbang phyug bsten pas yon tan dag ni zum gyur pas/ /dam pa'i me tog rnams ni 'phral la rnying ba nyid gyur cing/ /slar yang bkren pa'i tshang ga lam
172a1(mdo 'grel): du dman pas ltung gyur la/ /dam pa'i skye bo rnams ni reg pa tsam yang mi bzed do/ /dman zhing smad pa'i bdag nyid lus 'dzin rnams kyi slong ba nyid pas shi ba mchog /slong ba mchog tu bkur sti 'os pa skye bo kun gyis smad pa dag
172a2(mdo 'grel): gis gnas/ /ji srid don gnyer nyid thob rmongs pa'i mun par dbang med 'jug cing 'bab byed pa/ /de srid yon ldan bum pa khron par 'jug las mchog tu thur du 'gro/ /phun tshogs thun mong nor ni zhing las tshong la rtag tu blo ldan rnams kyis 'thob
172a3(mdo 'grel): gal te chog shes med na gzhan pa ci zhig la gter rnams rgyas pa dang/ /phul byung rab dang gser dang dngul gyi bya ba de dag yod pa nyid/ /dga' dang 'grogs pa'i slad du lus ni g.yog gi rang bzhin du 'tshong su zhig 'dod/ /ces pa blo gros ldan gzhan
172a4(mdo 'grel): des/ /tshig thos nas ni sa yi bdag /gus dang bcas pas gzhan pa ni/ /cung zad blang bar mdzod ces smras/ /rigs shing brjod pa mkhas pa yi/ /rtsub mo la yang mi rnams dga' / /bkren pa rnams kyi ngo stong ni/ /'jam yang rna ba na ba'i rgyu/ /rgya cher yongs su
172a5(mdo 'grel): tshim pa yi/ /rgyal pos mchog tu gsol btab des/ /de la smras pa gal te khyod/ /sim na bu mo bdag la stsol/ /des de brjod tshe mi bdag ni/ /bsam pa the tshom 'phyang mor gyur/ /nad par bdag smra zhes smras nas/ /skad cig sa gzhi dag la bltas/ /de nas
172a6(mdo 'grel): gzhon nu btang nas nges/ /blon po'i gtso bo la smras pa/ /rab dang gzu lums bdag gis ni/ /bya rog bzhin du g.yo ba byas/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i rigs 'khrungs pa'i/ /bu mo bsod nams zod la/ 'os/ /grong pa thun mong pa la ni/ /yon tan tsam gyis ji
172a7(mdo 'grel): ltar sbyin/ /sbyin no zhes ni rab sgrags nas// rjes su 'gyod pas gzir? gyur pa'i/ /bden nor ldan par gyur pa bdag /slong ba 'bras med ji ltar gyur/ /nang par mdun du de 'ongs pa'i/ /bzhin ni bdag gis ji ltar blta/ /bdag pa rnyed dka' res
172b1(mdo 'grel): bslangs nas/ /mdza' yang mdza' min nyid du 'gyur/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis lus can rnams/ /des par yon tan yongs rdzogs kyang/ /ji srid bslang zhes ma brjod pa/ /de srid snying du sdug pa yin/ /zhes bas sa bdag khyogs la ni/ /nges par brten pa'i tshig thos
172b2(mdo 'grel): nas/ /blon po chen pos gnas skabs su/ /'os pa bsams nas de la smras/ /rje bo dag gi blo gros rnams/ /bgros pa min par mthar thug cing/ /gsang du chags ldan gus pa dang/ /rang bzhin gzu lums? ldan pa yin/ /srang ldan mi nus don gnyer bas/ /yon tan
172b3(mdo 'grel): 'byung gnas bzhin du ni/ /rgyal po'i g.yog la rab zhugs des/ /gser gyi glang chen rnam par bcom/ /bu mo slong ba slang 'ongs tshe/ /khyod kyi dal bus 'di brjod bya/ /gser glang zhon te 'ongs ba na/ /bdag gi bu mo thob par 'gyur/ /de yis rang lag gis bsang naS/
172b4(mdo 'grel): de la glang po ga la yod/ /de dang bral ba'i ngo tsha yis/ /slar 'ong par ni mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa blon po'i chog gis ni/ /nyin gzhan gzhon nu 'ongs pa la/ /lugs la brten pa'i mi dag gyis/ /mngon du phyogs te de nyid smras/ /gzhon nu yang ni khyim song nas/ /bag
172b5(mdo 'grel): ma yon 'ongs bkra shis kyis/ /gser gyi so gnyis la zhon te/ /rang gi mi dang lhan cig 'ongs/ /gser gyi glang chen la zhon nas/ /'ong ba de ni sa bdag gis/ /mthong nas ngo mtshar 'byor pa can/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i mchog tu shes/ /de nas rgyal pos dge
172b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan las/ /glang po gser lus can de las/ /spro ba chen pos lhun po la/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhin du zhon/ /sa skyong gis ni zhon pa'i tshe/ /glang po de ni mi g.yo zhing/ /sngon ni gzhon nus brgyan pa'i tshe/ /slar yang rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/ /mi bdag gis de ltar sheS
172b7(mdo 'grel): shing/ /de yi mthu yis ya mtshan pas/ /bdag gi skal bzang zhes brjod cing/ /bu mo 'dod dpal de la ni/ /rin chen bu mos skyes bu pmchog /ma nor mchod nas mi yi bdag /spro dga' yang dag rgyas gyur pa/ /bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho bzhin du mdzes/ /de nas gzhon
173a1(mdo 'grel): nus mdzes ma ni/ /blangs nas rang gi khyim song ste/ /lus med gzhu ni drangs pa yi/ /ngal ba 'bras bu yod par 'gyur/ /lang tsho gsar pa dang 'grogs te/ /'byong pa rgya ches rtag tu de// gsar pa gsar pa dga' bar 'gyur/ /de nas nam
173a2(mdo 'grel): zhig sa skyong ni/ /bya ba byas pa gsal rgyal gyis/ /bsod nams mthu ldan mag pa dag /yid la bcags shing rab bsams pa/ /kye ma lha yi mthu 'di ni/ /gzhon nu dgal rab tu mthong/ /gang phyir thun mong bsod nams rnams/ /de ltar smin par 'gyur ba
173a3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /rigs ni dpal 'byor khang bzang gzugs kyi dba' rlabs zla ba'i dregs pa 'phrog/ /lang tsho longs spyod 'os dang yongs su 'dris pa'i yon tan rgyan gyi tshogs/ /grags pa bsod nams skyed tshal rab 'khrungs me tog rab tu bkram ba'i grogS/
173a4(mdo 'grel): 'byor pa 'di ni yongs smin ci yi 'bras bu yin bar yongs mi shes/ /dge mtshan yang dag skyes pa des/ /de ltar yun ring sa bsams nas ni/ /sangs rgyas lta ba la btags pa'i/ /yid kyi shing rta ngag la 'dzegs/ /mag pa bu mo bos nas ni/ /blon
173a5(mdo 'grel): po dag dang lhan cig tu/ /yid ni sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /bcom ldan 'das la lta ru song/ /rgyal byed tshal ni mig lam du/ /gyur tshe bzhin pa yang dag btang/ /rkang pas nyer btung mi bdag gis/ /bcom ldan 'das la rnam par bltas/ /der btung de yi
173a6(mdo 'grel): zhabs pad kyis/ /gtsug gi nor bus g.yo ba des/ /bu mo mag pa btud pa dag /de la ming gis rnam par bshad/ /thams cad 'khor cing phyag 'tshal te/ /kun nas mgo bo dung ba'i tshe/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pa la/ /thal mo sbyar nas rgyal pos
173a7(mdo 'grel): dris/ /bcom ldan las ni ci zhag gis/ /gzhon nu blo ldan rnams kyi mchog /yon tan tshogs ni rgyas pa 'di/ /gser gyi glang pos 'gro ba lags/ /'di ni beg gsang bdag gi ni/ /bu mo gos kyis mdzes ma 'di/ /bsod nams gang gi rnam smin
173b1(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /srog las lhag par snying du sdug /sa yi bdag pos 'di dris cho/ /kun rig bcom ldan rgyal ba yis/ /der gsungs skyes bu'i 'byor ba rnams/ /sa bdag bsod nams dag las 'byung/ /'jig rten na ni 'dod bya gang/ /mdzes pa gang dang rmad byung
173b2(mdo 'grel): gang/ /de nge bsod nams nyid las 'byung/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs rnam par gzigs/ /dge slong dag dang lhan cig sngon/ /rgyal po gnyen ldan grong khyer du/ /'jig rten la ni rtse bas rgyu/ /gnas skabs der ni khye'u zhig /gzhon nu ma dang 'grogs nas
173b3(mdo 'grel): ni// shing gi rang bzhin glang po byas/ /lam gyi mdun dar rnam par rtse/ /bcom ma dzam+bu na da'i 'od/ /bde 'dab rgyas pa'i rnam pa can/ /yed 'ong snying rje'i spyan ldan pa/ /bcom ldan byon pa de dag gis/ /mthed nas de la gus pa rgyas/ /rjes su chags pas mngon
173b4(mdo 'grel): phyogs te/ /de la rtse cha glang po ni/ /phul nas mdun du btang de gnas/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas kyang/ /de dag bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas/ /brtse bas shing gi glang po la/ /zhabs pad dag gis reg par mdzad/ /de nas de dag bcom ldan gyis/ /yang
173b5(mdo 'grel): dag dad ba'i thugs kyis gzigs/ /phan tshun khye'u bum o dag/ khyo shug tu ni smon lam byas/ /gser gyi glang po'i bzhon pa dag /rigs dang mthu dang 'byor pa yis/ /bdag gis skye ba 'os gyur cig /ces par gzhon nu'i blo gros gyur/ /bu mas bcom ldan
173b6(mdo 'grel): chos gos ni/ /mdzes pa dang ldan mthong gyur nas/ /bdag gi skye bar chos gos dang/ /ldan par gyur cig ces pa bsams/ /de ni smon lam de dag gis/ /glang po can 'di nyid du skys/ /chos gos bu mo 'di yang ni/ /lus ni chos gos kyis mtshan no/ /bde gshegS
173b7(mdo 'grel): kyis gsungs byung tshul de/ /de ltar sa bdag gis thos nas/ /cod pan de yi zhabs pad la/ /reg nas rang gi khang par song/ /rgyal po ya mtshan can song tshe/ /gzhon nu chung mar bcas pa yis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi/ /chos ni dag pa'i
174a1(mdo 'grel): blo yis thos/ /de nas de dag chags bral skyes/ /'khor ba'i bag chags nyams gyur cing/ /rab tu byung bas nyon mongs btul/ /dag pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /rgya che legs byas goms pa'i sbyor bas bsod nams bsten
174a2(mdo 'grel): pa yin /skyes bu rnams ni chos 'dod don yang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /de nas de 'bras mngon 'dod spyad nas gus bcas de dag rnams/ /sprin bral mkha' ltar mdzes pa'i zhi ba 'jug tu sten par byed/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas
174a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dbag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ glang po can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //gang zhig bde blag tu bskrun mthu yi dba' rlabs rmad du byung ba'i phreng ba ste/ /snying
174a4(mdo 'grel): stobs spro ba'i sa dang rang bzhin dri med ye shes gsal ba'i bsam pa can/ /de dag gis kyang sgrub byed rgyal po'i bka' yi spring yig las kyi phreng chags pa/ /bkra ba ngag ni 'gong par mi 'gyur ngogs 'bram gya gyu chu bo'i gter gyis bzhin/
174a5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin mnyan yod du ni 'phyir rnams kyi/ /rab tu bskul bar gyur pa'i bud med dag /ston pa'i grags pa gzhon par brtson gyur pa/ /lus dang bcas pa dmyal bar lhung bar gyur/ /de nas ngag byed rlung gi tshogs/ /yongs su 'phen byed dri med chu/
174a6(mdo 'grel): rdzing bu gdung med ces bya ba/ /rin chen tshogs kyi them skas can/ /gser gyi pad tshogs ge sar gyis/ /rkang drug ser por byed pa yis/ /pad+ma'i khring gnas bcom ldan 'das/ /dge slong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa las kyis rgyud//
174a7(mdo 'grel): 'gom bya min bar ston mdzad cing/ /rang las spyod pa rnam par bkra/ /gsung bar yang dag brtson par gyur/ /las ni chad pa'i gnas skabs der/ /bcom ldan gus la mnyen gshin bas/ /shA ri'i bu ni 'bod pa dag/ mong+gal bu la rab tu bskos/ /bya rgod
174b1(mdo 'grel): phung bo'i ri gnas la/ /kha ba dang skud bas sbyar ma ni/ /bkra shis rdzogs par byed pa yi/ /shA ri'i bu yis de can phyin/ /sor mo rings byas 'grub pa yi/ /las kyi mthu nyid ma yin pa/ /bya ba 'gor bas 'jigs pa yis/ /myur dang bcas par de la smras so/ /tshur shog
174b2(mdo 'grel): tshur shog mgyogs par ro/ bcom ldan kun mkhyen rdzing bu ni/ /gdung ba med par dge slong la/ /las ni nye bar ston par brtson/ /las la chags nas myur min zhing/ /thogs par gal te khyod sgrub na/ /rdzu 'phrul chen pos khyod blang bya/ /bdag gi stobs yangs blta
174b3(mdo 'grel): bar byos/ /zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas/ /shA ri'i bu yis de la smras/ /re zhig bdag gi thub longs/ /de nas khyod stobs bdag gi shes/ /zhes smras bya rgod phung po yi/ /ri yi rtse la de yi btags/ /mong+gal bu yis blangs pa yis/ /tshe na ri ni 'gul bar
174b4(mdo 'grel): gyur// shA ri'i bu yis lhun po la/ /ri ni ltung bar 'jigs nas btags/ /de nas de yi blangs pa'i tshe/ /lha yi gnas kyang rnam par g.yos/ /de nas ston pa'i gdan gser gyi/ /bang rtsa nor bu'i rang bzhin la/ /shA ri'i bu yis de bzhin btags/ /pha rol
174b5(mdo 'grel): nus med nyid du gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul rim pas mong+gal bu/ /shA ri'i bu yis pham byas pa/ /shin tu snga bar nges phyin tshe/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song/ /de dag rdzu 'phrul ches bskyong pas/ /klu ni dga' bo nyer dga' dag /sa 'og nas ni rab 'thon te//
174b6(mdo 'grel): 'jigs nas bcom ldan la phyag 'tshal/ /shA ri'i bu ni rgyal ba'i mthu/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis dris/ /ye shes spyan ldan bcom ldan gyis/ /sngon byung dag ni rab gsungs pa/ /bA ra NA sir sngon byung ba/ /drang srong dung dang bris pa'o/ /de dag char
174b7(mdo 'grel): dang char med ni/ /'gal? brjod phan tshun 'gran par gyur/ /de nas nam zhig dung khros pa'i/ /rkang pas ral pa la reg pa/ /bres bas der smras nyi shar tshe/ /khyod kyi mgo bo 'byed gyur gcig /dung gis smras pa bdag tshig gis/ /nyin phyed 'byar bar ma
175a1(mdo 'grel): gyur cig /des 'di brjod tshe mdzes pa yi/ /'gro ba mun pa dang bcas gyur/ /bris pas de la brtse ba yis/ /sa yi rang bzhin mgo bo byas/ /nyi ma shar tshe 'phral la ni/ /nor 'dzin dum bu brgyar gyur to/ /skye ba gzhan la dung de ni/ /
175a2(mdo 'grel): maung+gal gyi bu nyid gyur/ /bris pa shA ri'i bu 'di ste/ /de las de tshe'ang rgyal bar gyur/ /de dag gi ni sngon byung mdza' / /'di ni kun mkhyen gyis gsungs tshe/ /las kyi rgyud ni bkra ba de/ /slar yang thub pha rnams kyis dris/ /bcom ldan las ni gang dag
175a3(mdo 'grel): gis/ /'bras bu rmad byung 'byung ba 'di/ /ye shes rang bzhin khyod kyi yang/ /lus la gang gis reg par gyur/ /rdo bo'i zer mas khyod zhabs kyi/ /mthe bong snad pa ce yi snad/ /seng ldeng thung mas zhabs phug nas/ /rma dang bcas pa 'di ni ci/ /bsod
175a4(mdo 'grel): snyoms mthob lhung bzed ni/ /stong par deng khyod byon pa ci/ /mdzes ma rab byung de yis ni/ /rdzun gyis khyod la smad ba ci/ /mi bden smad dang bcas gyur bas/ /khyod la slu bar byed pa ci/ /bai ran tya ru khyod kyis sngon/ /ko Ta ra yi nas gsol ci/ /bcom ldan 'daS
175a5(mdo 'grel): kyis lo drug ni/ /dga' ba spyad par gyur pa ci// khyod kyi lus la rab gnon gyi/ /nad kyis ci yi slad du reg/ shAkya'i rigs ni 'jig pa'i tshe/ /khyod kyi dbu ni bsnyung gyur ci/ /ci slad khyod kyis lus mchog la/ /rlung gis sku rgyab bsrung? bar gyur/ /de
175a6(mdo 'grel): dag rnams kyis 'di dris tshe/ /bcom ldan 'dzum bcas der gsungs pa/ /nyon cig rgyun chad med par ni/ /nam par bkra ba yas kyi rgyun/ /lus can las kyis 'ching ba ni/ /chas zhugs g.yog po dam pa bzhin/ /'gro na phyi nas 'gro bar byed/ /sdong na
175a7(mdo 'grel): sngon du sdod par byed/ /nags rnams phyogs su 'jug cing phyogs su rnam par rgyu la chu gter 'gong bar byed/ /ri yi dbang phyug la 'jog brgya byin gnas ni kun tu mnan nas mngon par 'jug /sa 'og snang ba min pa'i yul du rab 'jug laS
175b1(mdo 'grel): rnams dus kyi dba' rlabs bzhin/ /'di dag rtag tu skye bo'i rjes su 'jug pa'i lam ni gang na'ang 'gog pa med/ /las kyi 'khri shing ring po gsang ba nyid la rtag tu 'bras bu rnying bas khyab/ /ngo mtshar dang bcas lus can lhan cig spyod cing de la'ang des par g.yo
175b2(mdo 'grel): ba med/ /gang zhig dge ba rnams kyis bkug dang yongs su dkris dang rnam par gsal ba dang/ /rab bcang gcus dang nges par brdar dang phye mar byas kyang zad pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig zla ba mdzes ba'i lus la skyon ni thig le nag po dang/ /gang zhig ma
175b3(mdo 'grel): rungs rnam pa'i sbrul nag nor bu 'od zer ral can 'dzin/ /sna tshogs kyis bkra'i sbyong pa lus can rnams la ston byed pa/ /'di ni bkra ba'i rim pas yongs smin las kyis sprul pa'i ri mo yin/ /gzhal du med pa'i nor bskyed cing/ /bu med chung ma dang ldan
175b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /khyim bdag kha ba Ta zhes pa/ kar pa Tar ni sngon byung gyur/ /de yis mdza' bas bskyangs pa yis/ /byis pa mug d+ha zhes bya ba/ /nor ma bgos pa'i spun zla ni/ /ma mig cig pa de khyim gnas/ /nam zhig khyim bdag de la ni/ /khyim bsam gtan gyi bar
175b5(mdo 'grel): skabs su/ /chung ma nag mo zhes bya ba/ /gya gyu can gyis ngal bus smras/ /rje yi sras po rmongs pa las/ /bag med drang pos khyod kyis ni/ /khyim du ma? mi gcig pa'i sprun/ /dug gi ljon pa rnam par bskyed/ /'god bral gcig po 'di yis kyang/ /'god
175b6(mdo 'grel): ldan bu mang khyod kyis ni/ /bgos pa min pa'i nor dag las/ /phyed ni tshul gyis len par 'gyur/ /nang bzhin 'phel ba 'di la ni/ /gsang pa kha na smad kyi mchog /gnyen ni gcod pa dag las kyang/ /mi rnams nor gcod bzod par dka' / /zab? mo
175b7(mdo 'grel): 'gong rtsom pa yi/ /'khor bar skye ba 'os gyur ba/ /chen bo rgud bar lhung gyur na/ /gnyis 'thud dbang po 'gyel ba bzhin/ /zhes pa de yi gdug pa'i tshig /thos nas bsam pa rab 'dar zhing/ /mdza' ba'i zhags bas dbang byas nges/ /de lag? cugs
176a1(mdo 'grel): pas rab smras pa/ /re zhig khyod kyis phan pa brjod/ /'on kyang 'di ni shin du sdig phyi rol yan lag nor thob slad/ /lhan skyes yan lag su zhig gcod/ /nor la chags rnams nor don du/ /sdig pa bsam pa rigs ma yin/ /nor rnams
176a2(mdo 'grel): bsrungs par gyur mod kyang/ /skad cig gis ni brlag par 'gyur/ /yang yang las rlabs rtsom pa yis/ /rab bskyed 'khrugs pa'i rnam 'phrul can/ /dpal rnams ri gzar chu bo bzhin/ /bgrod ba dag ni su yis zlog /de smad smin legs bdag gi yid
176a3(mdo 'grel): spun zla gsod la yong mi 'jug /nor rnams bdag ni 'tsho ba yod/ /spyod tshul nyams na 'gro ba gang/ /zhes smra bdag po de yi yid/ /sna tshogs rigs pa nyer bstan nas/ /dal gyi sdig pa ngag la ni/ /de yis mngon bar phyogs par byas/ /mdza' snum mang poS
176a4(mdo 'grel): bskyed ba yi/ /lhan skyes spyi bor skyes pa bzhin/ /bu med spu gri'i so rnon gyis/ /'phral la bcad nas 'dor bar byed/ /rmongs pas bcom pa'i blo dang bud med ni/ /'khyog cing gzhan la rab gdug bya min la/ /'dug pa'i slad du brtan pa mngon sbyor cing/ /sdig
176a5(mdo 'grel): par nges par ltung bar byed pa nyid/ gnyen dang grogs la chags bral zhing/ /sems ni rab ba des myos gyur pa/ /dpal ldan rnams la dud pa bzhin/ /bud med rgyal la blo gros gang/ /de nas de yi spun zla ni/ me tog btu slang kha drangs nas// chi? med nags
176a6(mdo 'grel): su rdo ba yis/ /cho? de thos pa med par bsad/ /de nyid nga yin sdig pa de/ /skye ba snga mar rnam spyad nas/ /mthe bong snang ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /nga lta 'ang lhag ma'i cha shas 'dzin/ /deng dpon don byin zhes bya ba/ /gzings ni gang bar gyur pa sngon/ /rjes su mthun
176a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i rlung ngag gis/ /rin chen gling nas yang dag 'ongs/ /de nas dreng? dpon gnyis pa ni/ /don nyams de la brten gyur ba/ /sdad bas gzings la sbas pa yis/ /bug pa bya bar rab tu brtsams/ /ci ste ngon byin gyis mthong nas/ /yang dang yang du bzlog gyur
176b1(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /sdang bas long de sdig pa yi/ /'bad las skad cig sgom? gyur/ /de nas don mthun bdag khros ns/ /khro ldan rnam par rmongs pa de/ /mi bzad shag ti rab bsnun nas/ /srog dang bral ba nyid du byas/ /de nyid nga yin de bsad las/ /sdig 'bras skye ba gzhan spyad
176b2(mdo 'grel): nas/ /lhag ma'i cha shas da lta yang/ /rkang bar seng ldeng rma 'dzin no/ /lag nas lhung bzed brtse ba yis/ /brlan pa'i blo ldan rang sangs rgyas/ /u pa riSh+Ta zhes pa sngon/ /ka shi'i grong du bslad slad zhugs de yis lhung bzed yongs khengs pa/ /mthong nas sdang bas
176b3(mdo 'grel): sun byung ba/ /dbras med g.yo ldan zhes pa yis/ /lag ba yis ni sa la po/ /dengs zas bcad las 'khrungs ba'i/ /sdig de skye ba mang por ni/ /spyad kyang 'bras bu lhag ma yis/ /lhung bzed stong pa nyid du gyur/ /ha shiSh+Tha zhes bya ba sngon/ /dgra bcom nyid thob sems
176b4(mdo 'grel): rab dang/ /rab zhi'i dga' tshal grong pa yis/ /byas pa'i gtsug lag khang na gnas/ /de yi spun zla rab byung ni/ /b+ha rad+hwa dza skye bo yis/ /bkur ste rtag rgyas de mthong nas/ /sdang pa'i me yis gdungs par gyur/ /yon tan can rnams bkur mthong nas/ /da nyams slad
176b5(mdo 'grel): du skye bo rnams/ /rab tu 'bad byed bdag nyid ni/ /yon tan gzung phyir brtson ma yin/ /chen po la 'os gos zung zhig /skye bo gus pas phul ba ni/ /drang po'i sems can ba shiSh+Tha/ /mdza' bas spun zla de la byin/ /des blangs yon tan la sdang de/ /kho na dang bral ba
176b6(mdo 'grel): nyid ma gyur/ /phan pa rnams dang mdza' bas kyang/ /ngan pa rang gir mi 'gyur ro/ /de yis gtsug lag khang skyong ma/ /dben phar yang dag bos nas ni/ /gos ni zung dag de la byin/ /bkur sti byas nas rab smras pa/ /gos zung 'di ni rked bzang ma/ /khyod kyis gyon
176b7(mdo 'grel): la skye ba dag/ 'di na ba shiSh+Tha yis ni/ /byin zhes dal gyis sma bar bya/ /de skad des brjod de yis kyang/ /khas blangs de yis bstan pa byas/ /gang gi ba shiSh+Tha la ni/ /skye bo slob par dogs par gyur/ /tshul khrims ma tshang brjod pas des/ /de nas grong bsam mchod
177a1(mdo 'grel): de/ /ring du song gyur chen po rnams/ /bkur sti nyams pas 'jigs pa nyid/ /b+ha ra d+hwa dza de bdag ste/ /'phags la smad bas skye gzhan la/ /bsod nams min spyad de lhag las/ /mdzes mas ding yang rdzun gyis smad/ /bdag sngon bram ze'i
177a2(mdo 'grel): phrag dog gis/ /ba ra NA ser thub ba ni/ /blo ldan mngon shas lnga pa yi/ /grags pa phrag dog dag gis bcom/ /me tog gzhu can grags pa yi/ /bdan ltar mdzes smad 'tshong ma/ /bzang mo zhes bya bud med mchog /ba ra NA sir sngon byung gyur/ /g.yo ldan
177a3(mdo 'grel): gya gyu'i bsam pa can/ /bad rtsa zhes pas nam zhig de/ /mthong nas mtshan mo spyad pa'i slad/ /gos dang rgyan dag de la byin/ /de nas g.yo ba'i chags pa can/ /mtshams la 'grogs par mngon phyogs ba'i/ /nyin mor byed pa nam mkha' yi/ /khyams
177a4(mdo 'grel): kyi mthar ni babs pa'i cho/ /bzang mo rang gi khyim song nas/ /me tog gos dang rgyan rnams kyis/ /mdzes pa nyid kyi rgyan la ni/ /slar yang zlos pa'i rgyan dag byas/ /smug rtsi rkang pa'i mthil la rab chags shing/ /do shal mchog gis mgrin par sbyangs
177a5(mdo 'grel): nas kyang/ /bya ba don gnyer me long la phyogs te/ /smad 'tshong spyod pa'i don bzhin de yis byas/ /mgrin pa la gzhan bzhin gzhan mchu la gzhan/ /de bzhin gzugs can ma des snying la gzhan/ /rnam bkra rang gi bya ba gzugs can bzhin/ /skyes bu chags
177a6(mdo 'grel): byed nyid kyi rgyan rnams gzung/ /yid skyed rgyal ba'i grags pa zla ba'i gzugs ni dang po bzhin/ /lan bu shig? le'i ri mo 'jo sgeg ldan bar rab spras shing/ /rab 'phro gdug ba'i du bas rab rib thun mtshams bzhin bkra ba/ /chags pa dar byas yan
177a7(mdo 'grel): lag dang bcas chags pa de rab mdzes/ /de nas g.yog mo chu srin ma/ /zhes pa myur bar rab zhugs te/ /der sgras skad cig 'grogs 'dod pa'i/ /gzhon nu gsar pa phyin sdod/ /ka rA pa Ni brgya phrag lnga/ /rtsa bzhin du ni star bar byed// 'di ni khyod kyi ster
177b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin 'ongs/ /nang zhugs nyid ni phyi rol mthong/ /rab mang nor ldan gtong phod can/ /brel bas yun ring mi sdod pa/ /'dod sgribs 'dod ldan 'bad pa can/ /skal pa bzang mo ga la thog/ /ces pa de yi tshig thos nas/ /yon dang chags pa'i rab tu ni/ /skad cig phyad mo
177b2(mdo 'grel): yug pa bzhin/ /bzang mos 'dzum bcas rab smras pa/ /gzhan las gla ni blangs pa dag/ lam srang dag gi bud med bzhin/ /de dus don gnyer gzhan la ni/ /lag bzod nyid du ji ltar 'gyur/ /skye dgu rnams bzhin thams cad kyi/ /dbang du gyur kyang skad cig ni//
177b3(mdo 'grel): gang gis sngon nyid 'thams ba de/ /smad 'tshong bud med rnams kyi bdag /mtshan mo gcig po 'di nyid ni/ /bod rtsas nyos la ci zhig brjod/ /gzhan gyi snga dro 'ong du chug/ bdag cag rtag tu gsar pa rtsom/ /bzang mos 'di brjod chung du des/ /mchog tu sprang rtsi

177b5(mdo 'grel): zad nyin mtshan du sogs pa/ /smad 'tshong rnams kyi skyes bu yis/ /rnyed pa me tog thu ba bzhin/ /smad 'tshong ma la rtag tu mdza' / /slong pa rnams kyi rig pa bzhin/ /chos kyi slad min 'dod slad min/ /nor nyid slad du rgyas par byed/ /mang dang 'grogs pas

177b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /tshong pa dbul po'i srang bzhin du/ /stong par khyim na gang 'dug pa/ /smad 'tshong rnams la 'di las ni/ /lhag pa skal ngan gzhan pa ci/ /skal ngan gyis ni 'dzin byed med/ /'phyon ma stong bar nyal ba ni/ /snga dro 'dod? ldan rnams kyi skra/ /rdzun gyis 'khrugs?
178a1(mdo 'grel): par sgrub par byed/ /'phrag? la nyo ba yongs btang nas/ /'dzin? gnas la sgrugs pa na/ /thob 'grems pa? ru snang 'tshong ma/ /phreng bar zhin du myur du skam/ /'di ni dge mtshan tsam don gnyer?/ /bya bas brel zhing mang du steng/ /nang zhugs nyid

178a3(mdo 'grel): char/ zhes ba'i phrin ni skyel ba la/ /phang rtsal ni g.yog mo btang/ /'dod ldan mdzes pa zhes bya ba/ /mang po sbyin pas skad cig ni/ /glang pos pad+ma can bzhin da/ /sbyang pas 'khrugs pa nyid gyur to/ /de nas de ni song ba'i tshe/ /mchu ni sos bcad lhag ma dang//

178a5(mdo 'grel): 'di nyid du ni bzang mo dag/ shog ces khro pa spas bar smras/ /de nas phrin thos dri bzang gis/ /rkang drug pa ni 'gu bas mo de/ /phed? rtsas bsten pa'i skyed mos tshal/ /rkang 'thung me tog rgyas bar song/ de ni 'ong ba mthong gyur nas/ /chags sdang dug ni mi bzang

178b1(mdo 'grel): spro/ /skad cig de bsams che bar rab khros ba'i/ /me yis rab bskyed du ba'i rnam 'phrul ni/ /smin ma'i rnam 'gyur dus kyi bzhin ldan de ss/ /skrag pa rgyas pa de la rab smras pa/ /mang dang skad cig la 'grogs smad 'tshong gang/ /de ni dang po gzhan nor ci la 'dzin//

178b4(mdo 'grel): lag 'khri shing skrag nyams ri dags ni/ /g.yo yangs mig can bsad nas mgyogs po yis/ /gtum mo mtshon cha khrag sbags rab tu song/ /gang zhig khro ba'i long bas mig bkag pa/ /de dag rnams la bya min ci zhig yod/ /rtag tu yid ni brtsebs dbul ba
178b5(mdo 'grel): yi/ /sbyong tshul brtse yang 'jigs rung rnams la yang/ /dben par bzang mo sdig can gyis bsad ces/ /de nas der ni dbangs mos sgra bsgrags shing/ /skye po ? 'dus tshe nyi tshe sangs rgyas kyi/ /nags mthar de ni rang dga' dag tu zhugs/ /de mdun khrag gis spags?

178b7(mdo 'grel): rtsa lag 'phral la 'gyod pa skyes/ /sdig pa 'di? ni bdag gis byas zhes smras/ /de nas de yi tshig gis 'di sangs rgyas/ /dbyad nas rgyal pos phyag 'tshal btang ba'i tshe/ /ngan byed la 'os bzong ba dka' ba'i bka' / /nyams myong nyid ni padmo'i rtsa bas
179a1(mdo 'grel): thob/ /de dang drag po'i sdig des skye ba mang/ /'bum gyis dmyal ba'i nang du longs spyod nas/ /de yi las 'bras lhag mang lta yang/ /mu stegs bu mo'i rdzun gyis mngon par sbyar/ /grong khyer gnyen ldan dag na sngon/ /bcom ldan
179a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba rnam par gzigs/ /grong ba'i longs spyod kyis mchod cing/ /dge slong tshogs kyis bskor te gnas/ /bram ze mthar zhes pas/ /mchod dang ldan pa de mthong nas/ /grong ba la smras dge slong ni/ /mgo reg longs spyod 'os pa min/ /ko Ta ra yi nas

179a5(mdo 'grel): bdag nor ldan zhes bya ba/ /gar ba Ta ra ni sngon byung ste/ /dpal ldan zhes bya de yi bu/ /lus ni rnal gnas min par gyur/ /de ni sman pa kha ba'i bzhin/ /zhes pa nor mar re pa yis/ /rnal gnas byas kyang de yi phas/ /de la ci yang byin ma gyur/ /dus
179a6(mdo 'grel): kyis gzing pa nyid gyur te/ /yang yang de yis bos bar byas/ /de yi pha la cung zad kyang/ /khas blangs smras pa thob ma gyur/ /sman pa khro ba'i rims kyis gdungs/ /sred pas g.yo ba'i shugs ring can/ /nad pa yis kyang 'gongs pa des/ /sdug bsngal
179a7(mdo 'grel): las ni rab bsams pa/ /kye ma bsam pa drang po bdag kha? lo dang ldan bdag gi bslus/ /bdag gi la gnas nad pa yi/ /gter 'das de ni ci zhig bya/ /tsha ba'i sman bzhin sman pa ni/ /nad pa rnams kyis sngon du bkur/ /gdung ba sos bar gyur pa'i phyir//
179b1(mdo 'grel): dran? yang la ni rmugs 'byin byed/ /don grub la ni nor ldan dang/ /sgron zin dag la gyu? pa bzhin/ /ma lus nad las grol gyur pa/ /sa la sman pa nye bar mgo?/ /mchod dang zhabs la gtugs byas bas/ /nad pas sman pa rab bsten te/ /phyi nas min ni bsgrags pa
179b2(mdo 'grel): na/ /sos pa rnams gyis thud kyis 'debs/ /snon pa rgyal po sman pa yi/ /'ching las ri dags chom rkun dang/ /nang sos song ba bsod nams kyis/ /phyi nas spyod yul dag tu ltung/ /de ltar rab tu sems byed cing/ /de ni rtag tu yongs su gdungs/ /sman pa
179b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du khro ldan nad/ /slar yang de yis thob par gyur/ /de nas khro bas bsgribs pa yis/ /sman pas 'gal ba'i sbyor ba las/ /rgyu ma 'chad par byed pa'i sman/ /'phral la nyams byed de la byin/ /des byin gnod pa 'thungs pa las/ /de yi rgyu ma dum bur gyur//
179b4(mdo 'grel): sdig pa'i g.yang? la lhur ba yis/ /chags pas long rnams ci mi byed/ /sman pa pa nyid de yi sdig/ skye ba khri phrag brgyar spyad nas/ /las kyi lhag ma da lta yang/ /rab gnon nad kyi cha shas bsten/ /nya yis 'tsho ba rnams kyis sdon/ /nya ni lus chen gnyis dag
179b5(mdo 'grel): bzung/ /lus ni gcod pa mthong gyur nas/ /nya pa'i bu yis dga' bar byas/ /de bdag de la yongs tshim thob/ /sdig pa skye ba gzhan spyad nas/ /shAkya nyams pa de yi tshe/ /skad cig mgo la nad kyi reg/ sngon tshe ljongs kyi gyang gyur te/ /mdza' ba stobs zhes bya ba'i
179b6(mdo 'grel): gyad/ /g.yul gyi zol gyis bshags byas te/ /de yi rgyab ni rnam gnyis byas/ /de da de yi sdig chen ni/ /skye ba mang por sbyar byas nas/ /rlung gi nad kyis da ltar yang/ /rgyab tu skad cig gnad par byas/ /da ltar byang chub rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /des bstan
179b7(mdo 'grel): bdag gi lus la yang/ /nyon mongs thigs pa las 'dam gyi/ /lhag ma'i cha shas nges par ltung/ /skye bar spro dang 'chi ba'i tshe yang skyes bu rnams lus la/ /bkra ba'i las kyi lam ni/ /phreng ba bzhin du rnam btags pa/ /rab tu chags pa 'di ni bde
180a1(mdo 'grel): dang sdug bsngal mtshams dag la/ /spyad cing btang bar gyur kyang lhag ma'i lhag mi rnam par 'dzin/ /de skad bcom ldan gyis bshad pa/ /dge slong kun gyis thos gyur nas/ /las kyi 'ching ba rnam dag ni/ 'da' bar bya min nyid du
180a2(mdo 'grel): nges/ zhes pa dag pa'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /las bcu sbyad pa'i rtogs pa brjed pa'i yal 'dab? ste lnga bcu pa'o// //gdung skyob blo yis brtse bas mnyes gshin
180a3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis srog ni 'gro bar spro ba'i tshe/ /spu long rgyan gyi rol ba bsten cing shin tu rno ba'i mtshon gyis bcad pa ni/ /gang gi lus la g.yo ba'i mig can rna ba'i utpal gyis bsnun mtshungs pa thob/ /de dag spyod pa rgya che brjod byar 'os pa'i tshig ni
180a4(mdo 'grel): gang gis brjod par bya/ /sngan ni gsang ba'i ke brla? ta/ /da ra da btul bcom ldan 'das/ /yul de nas ni mi snang bar/ /dka' thub nags tshal gzhan du gshegs/ /de yi g.yog la 'ongs pa'i lha/ /bde sogs bdag po dag gis der/ /bzhin la
180a5(mdo 'grel): 'dzum pa'i zla ba dag/ shar ba mthong nas rgyu mtshan dris/ /de la bka' stsal nags kyi mdza' / /'dir ni bdag gis sngon byung dran/ /dran pa nyams su myong ba las/ /bdag 'dzun 'di ste rgyu med min/ /zhes ba brjod nas bcom ldan gyis/ /sngon byung
180a6(mdo 'grel): gsung bar rtsol ba mdzad/ /grong khyer utpal ldan par ni/ /grong khyer gtso bo'i bud med dag/ sbyin dang tshul khrims brtse bcas gser ldan ma zhes grags pa byung/ /nam zhig de yis dbul po yi/ /bud med btsas shing ltogs bas gzir/ /smin? mo
180a7(mdo 'grel): bzhin du bu tsha dang/ /za bar 'dod pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /de mthong snying rje rgyas gyur pa/ /de yis skad cig yang dag bsams/ /kye ma rang lus la chags pas/ /blo ni sdig la rab tu 'jug/ 'di yi zas ni len du bdag /gal te rang gi khyim song na/ /bkres
180b1(mdo 'grel): pas yongs su nyen pa 'dis/ bu ni nges par za bar 'gyur/ /yang na bdag gis bu khyer nas/ /gal te khyim du phyin pa na//'di ni bkres pa nyid gyur te/ /'phral la 'tsho ba gtong bar 'gyur/ /de ltar gnyis ka the tshom dang/ /ldan pa de la brtsegs bsams//
180b2(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba bsgral ba'i slang nyid du/ de yis smon lam btab byas te/ /de yis gtad pa'i mtshon rnon gyis/ /g.yo pa med par bcad nas ni/ /de la rang gi nu ma zung/ /'tsho ba yi ni zungs la byin/ /de nas de grags ngo mtshar can/ /'jig rten gsum reg grags pa'i
180b3(mdo 'grel): tshe/ /brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs kyis ni/ /mngon du phyogs te de la dris/ /khyod kyi nu ma byin pa yis/ /yid la rnam 'gyur ma byung dam/ /zhes dris de la dag pa dang/ /bden smra ldan pa des smras pa/ /num byin la rnam 'gyur cha/ /gal te bdag la 'ga' ma gyur//
180b4(mdo 'grel): bden pa de yis re zhig 'phral/ /bud med nyid ni ldog gyur cig/ de brjod tsam la bden ldan ma/ /de yis bud med gzugs btang nas/ /mtshan nyid thams cad phun tshogs pa'i/ /skyes pa nyid du yang dag gyur/ /grong khyer utpal ldan par ni/ /mi bdag utpal
180b5(mdo 'grel): zhas bya ba/ /gnas skabs der ni che rdzags shing/ /nang kyi sbyor bas lhung bar gyur/ /de nas rab mchog rgan dang blon/ /mtshan nyid shes rnams mngon phyogs te/ /'phral la skyes pa nyid thob pa/ gser ldan de ni mngon dbang bskur/ /chos ldan mdzes pa'i dpal de
180b6(mdo 'grel): yis/ /rgyal srid dag ni yun ring byas/ /dus kyis lus ni btang gyur te/ /lus can dag ni brtan pa med/ /de nyid du de tshong dngon? bu/ /snying stobs mchog ces bya bar gyur/ /zol mer bsgrubs pa'i sbyin pa ni/ /skye bar goms la gus bcas pa'o/ /'byung po kun
180b7(mdo 'grel): gzir bsam pa la/ /rtag tu de yis yid bkod de/ /bzod dga' 'dab chags rnams nyid kyi/ /bkres pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag bsems/ /de nas dur khrod nags su do/ /song nas sbu gris lus bkas te/ /gal? rgyal nyal nas sha bra? pa'i/ /'dab chags rnams 
181a1(mdo 'grel): la rab tu byin/ /rim gyis de yi mig g.yas ni/ /mthon por 'gro ba'i mkhar? bgrod kyis/ /mchu yis phyung zhing rab byung nas/ /yang dang yang du bab tu btang/ /brtan bdi? yan lag kun mi g.yo/ /de yis ya mtshan bya mthong nas/ /smras?
181a2(mdo 'grel): pa dogs med nyid du zo/ /nga yis khyod ni yong mi 'dzin/ /ro bral snying po med pa'i lus/ /gnod bcas skad cig 'jig pa 'di/ /gzhan la phan pa'i cha shas kyis/ /'khor ba'i snying po nyid du gyur/ /mi rnams lus ni mi gtsang zag cing so so'i gnas su
181a3(mdo 'grel): smad gyur dri ma can/ /gnod pa'i gnas su gyur cing dbugs dus g.yo la log par chags pa 'di ni ci/ /gang zhig bsod nams rnams kyis 'ga' zhig dag tu 'ga' la 'ga' cha 'ga' mthong nas/ /bdung? bzhi byed skyob la zhugs gyur 'di nyid gcig bu
181a4(mdo 'grel): 'di yi dga' bya nyid/ /ces pa smra ba de yi lus/ /bkres pas nyen pa'i bya rnams kyis/ /za zhing 'phangs pas skad cig la/ /rus pa'i ltag ma nyid du gyur/ /dus kyis de ni bram ze dag /sa la chen po'i bur skyes te/ /bden pa'i brtul zhugs zhes bya ba//
181a5(mdo 'grel): skye po dag gis bkur bar gyur/ /rig pa ma lus thob gyur cing/ /snying rje dag la chags pa'i sems/ /zhi bar dga' ba de yi yid/ /khyim thab las ni phyir phyogs gyur/ /rigs su skyes shing yon tan thob/ /blo gros dben pas rab brgyan cing//
181a6(mdo 'grel): 'byung po kun la brtse zhing byams/ /bsod nams las kyi mtshan nyid yin/ /gzhon nu de nyid chags bral gyis/ /dga' zhing dga' thub nags song ste/ /drang srong gnyis kyis brtul zhugs byin/ /bsti gnas su ni ngal bso bsten/ /de nas dus kyi
181a7(mdo 'grel): ye shes spyan/ /dri zod? shin tu rno ba yis/ /stag mo btsA la nye ba dag /mthong nas de yis yang dag bsams/ /bkres pa yis ni gzir pa 'di/ /zhag bdun dgag btsa'? bar gyur/ /rang gi bu ni zab la/ /sgrom? pa drag po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhes
181b1(mdo 'grel): bsams de yi sdug bsngal ni/ /thub pa dag la bshad nas nges/ /snying rjes de ni phyir bcos pa'i/ /yid la re ba byas par gyur/ /de nas zhag bdun 'das pa'i tshe/ /stag mo mngal gyi khur gyis du ba/ /zas chag mang pos gdungs gyur pa/ /dka' las
181b2(mdo 'grel): chen pos pu tsha bcos/ /rang gi khrag gi dri yis ni/ /sred pa drag po rab bskyed pa/ /de mthong bden pa'i brtul zhugs ni/ /snying rjes brlan? pas yang dag bsams/ /sdug ma ? ni bkres? pa yis/ /sdug bsngal dag las bu bzang brtson/ /kye ma 'di ni rang don
181b3(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /bu la chags pa 'ang brjed par gyur/ /rang sdug bsngal pas thams cad gdung/ /gzhan gyi yongs su gdung bas bsil/ /skye bo 'ga' zhig gzhan gdung la/ /khyad par du ni gdung bskya?/ /bu dang bcas pa'i stag mo 'di/ /lus byin nas ni bdag gis bsrung//
181b4(mdo 'grel): srog la the tshom yongs rdzogs pa/ /'di bdag sdug bsngal yongs mi bzod/ /gzhan srog bskyab la lus ni rtsa bzhin brtags pas gtong ba rnam dag? gi/ rgya che bsod nams rgyas pa'i rang bzhin grags pa'i lus ni brtan par 'gyur/ gnod pa rab chags srog
181b5(mdo 'grel): gi thigs pa 'di ni rab g.yo rlung dag gis/ /g.yo ba'i pad ldan 'dab ma'i khongs gnas g.yo ba'i chu thigs dag gri grogs/ /'di bsams snying rje ri gter de yis/ /'byed pa'i thung? mas mgrin pa la/ /khrag zag ? ni btong byas nas/ /stag mo'i mdun du
181b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /nges par bdag nyid che rnams kyis/ /yid ni snying rje mnyan pha dag/ nya? par bskyab? la chags byas pas/ /gzhan gyis yongs gdung bzong ma yin/ /de nas g.yo med de yi snying kha rab tu rgyas pa la/ /stag mo khrag la mngon par 'dod brnon
181b7(mdo 'grel): bos rab tu mtshongs/ /dga' dang 'dzum skyes so nA? mo'i 'od zer dag gis 'gro pa la/ /'phags pa'i spyod ba'i ngo mtshar rab tu 'bri bar byed ba bzhin/ /byams pas 'khrul bzhin bzod bas nyes byas bzhin dang shes rab kyis ni bsam tshogs bzhin/ /sdug
182a1(mdo 'grel): bsngal bzod dga' i bslad pa bstan pas bzhin dang nyon mongs dka' thub dpal gyis bzhin/ /brtse ba de yis lus ni snying stobs sa gzhi g.yo ba med bde nyid kyis/ /stag gi chung mas btab cing mi bzang drag por mngon 'joms gsal
182a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i khur dag bzod/ /stag gi sder mo phreng ba'i rol bas rnam par bcom gyur pa/ /de yi snying kha'i gzhi ni rnam par nyams pa skad cig mtshon/ /lus ni spu long gis byugs bsil zar can ltar dkar pa yi/ /snying stobs rab gsal 'od zer myu gus
182a3(mdo 'grel): khengs par gyur pa bzhin/ /sha dag za zhing khrag 'thung myos par gyur pa'i stag mo ni/ /dga' dang bcas pa mthong nas 'gro ba de yi rang gi srog/ /'tsho bdag ni ring du 'gro ba'i dus su 'brel gyur pas/ /yud tsam zhig ni mgrin pa nyid la brten te brtan
182a4(mdo 'grel): par byas/ /sred pa'i rjes mthun rtse dga' i 'ong dang 'gro ba dag gis ni/ /ngo tsha'i dbang las bzhin ni mchog tu rnam par sdud ba bzhin/ /khyi thab las ni phyir phyogs gyur kyang de yi lag pa dab/ /de yis bzung nas mdza' zhing gcugs ltar snying ni dga'
