182a5(mdo 'grel): bar byas/ /byams pas dag cing rnam 'gyur med pa rgya che'i snying stobs dang/ /lugs bzang bsod nams chu bo 'jig rten rnams su grags pa dang/ /'byung? por phan pa'i rang bzhin dman la snying rjes brgyan pa'i sems/ /rang dbang nyid du gyur pa legs
182a6(mdo 'grel): ldan bdag nyid rnams kyis yin/ /stag mo'i sder mo'i rtse mos bshig pa de yi snying stobs dag/ mtshungs pa med pa de mthong 'phral la nor 'dzin bu mo ni/ /dba'? rlabs rol pa dang ldan chu gter bzhi yi ska rags can/ /srog ni zhig pa'i dus na 'jig
182a7(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin du ring zhig 'dar/ /bden pa'i brtul zhugs snying rjer rab dga' de ning nyid de/ /da lta 'dir ni rang gi spyod tshul dran nas bzhad gang skye ba/ /rgyal bas 'bungs? pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa 'di ni thos gyur nas/ /ya mtshan nyid ldan brgya byin de ni bzhin ras
182b1(mdo 'grel): g.yo med gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sa mes dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ gseb? ldan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste ? bcu ? gcig pa'o// //gang zhig nags song shing shun ldan gyur kyang
182b2(mdo 'grel): slong rnams rgyan du don byas nyid du byed/ /spyod tshul mdzes ldan de dang tsan dan gyi/ /ngo mtshar dag ni su yis bsam mi bya/ /de bzhin dka' thub nags gzhan na/ /bcom ldan bzhugs shing 'dzum ldan la/ /brgya byin ya mtshan ldan pa yis/ /'dzum ba nyid kyi rgyu
182b3(mdo 'grel): mtshan dris/ /de yis gus pas dris pa'i tshe/ /de la kun mkhyen gyis gsungs pa/ /mig stong ldan pa gnas 'dir ni/ /sngon gyur bdag bdag gis dran/ /ma d+hu da ka zhes pa yi/ /grong khyer lha grong lta bur sngon/ /bsod nams mi dman zhes bya ba'i/ /sa bdag sa
182b4(mdo 'grel): yi rgyan du gyur/ /snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms dang/ /byams pa sems la yang dag chags/ /phrag dog can bzhin gang gi dpal/ /slong ba'i skye bo'i khang bar gnas/ /nam zhig de yi spyod pa ni/ /'gro la grags pa thos gyur nas/ /sa yi bdag po tshangs pas
182b5(mdo 'grel): byin/ rgyal bar 'dod pa de can 'ong/ /de nas glang po'i tshogs gtams pas/ /phyogs mtshams dag ni mun par byas/ /de ni rjes su bcing ba'i slar/ /de yis grong khyer bcing bar byas/ /snying stobs brtse ldan mi yi bdag/ drag ni rlag par mi bzhed do/ /zhes
182b6(mdo 'grel): bsams de yi blon po ni/ /ma brjod g.yul la phyi rol 'thon/ /glang po rta dang shing rta rnams/ /rlag byed g.yul ni rgyas pa der/ /bsod nams mi dman snying rdzo? yis/ /sdug bsngal gyur pas yang dag bsams/ /mi bzang rgyal rigs chos 'di ni/ /chos min brgya phrag
182b7(mdo 'grel): dag dang ldan/ /ma rungs srog chags bsod pa ni/ /gang du chos shes mngon par brjod/ /khrag gis bsgos shing dri ma can/ /rgyal rigs rnams kyi chos 'di smad/ /gang gi ched du rab 'byung? pa'i/ /'tsho ba de yang rtag pa min/ /bde nyung? blo yis bzod bya 'di ni skyes
183a1(mdo 'grel): bu rnams kyi nyon mongs smin/ /gnod pa dang bcas gdung ba'i lam du rtag tu nyams pa nyid gyur cing/ /phyi nas dran bas sdug bsngal shags rings dag gis brtan pa 'joms byed pa/ /longs spyod don du kyi hud kyi hud gzhan srog 'tshe la rab
183a2(mdo 'grel): tu 'bad/ /de slad 'tshe dang sdig pa'i gnas/ /chos min med pa'i rgyal srid 'di/ /yongs su btang la bdag nyid ni/ /dka' thub nags su 'gro bar bya/ /rgyal po mi shes rmongs rnams kyi/ /bsod dang 'ching ba brgyas bsgrubs pa'i/ /sdig pa mi bzang dpal 'byor ni/
183a3(mdo 'grel): dus kyis kham du byed pa nyid/ /'khor bar dus min dag tu bsam yas dus ni stobs dang ldan pa 'dis/ /skyes bu so so dag la skal ba'i mdza' ni so sor ster byed cing/ /shin tu che ba'i rmongs pas blo bcom re ba'i 'ching ba brtan po yis/ /yul gyi bde pa'i tshogs
183a4(mdo 'grel): la sems byed skyes bu rnams kyi rtse dga' 'joms/ /zhes pa bsams nas mi bdag ni/ /'tshe ba'i nyon mongs las phyir phyogs/ /dbyug pa shing shun bzung nas ni/ /mtshan mo dka' thub nags su song/ /de nas blon po g.yul zhugs pas/ /de ni song ba thos gyur
183a5(mdo 'grel): nas/ /'jig rten la bsgribs dgra bo ni/ /sgra sgrogs rgyags pas 'phyar la smras/ /nags su glang chen myos pa dag/ drag po'i sgra ni ma sgrogs shig/ 'dir ni seng ge sbyin gyi sgra/ /bzod pa min pa rnam par gnas/ /zhes smra brtan pa de dag gis/ /rjes yi bya dga' sdug po
183a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /go chas lus ni rab g.yogs te/ /g.yul du g.yul ni rab tu sprad/ /skabs der ko sa la dag tu/ /bram ze ser skya zhes bya ba/ /rgyal po dbyig gi go cha yi/ /nor gyi chad bas gzir bar gyur/ /ma lus nor byin dbul ba la/ /mang po sbyin par mi bzod pa/ /bu
183a7(mdo 'grel): dang gnyen rnams mdza' dag ni/ /brtson khang nang du rnam par bkod/ /gnyen tshan bcings bas sdug bsngal bas/ /bcos pa'i thabs ni rab bsams de/ /grogs po rgya la zin pa yi/ /ri dwags bzhin du g.yo ba med/ /bdag gi pha ma sring mo dang/ /spun zla bu
183b1(mdo 'grel): mo bu dag kyang/ /btson ra dag tu bcings gyur pa/ /nor med na ni grol mi 'gyur/ /sa bdag chos la sdang ba yis/ /gang na chags pa rab tu 'jug/ /nyon mongs dag gis brlan ba? yul de rab tu btang bas 'tsho/ /yar na gnyen gyi 'ching thag gis/ /skye bo
183b2(mdo 'grel): rtag tu bcings rnams kyis/ /sdug par gyur kyang yul dag ni/ /rab tu btang bar ji ltar nus/ /de slad nyon mongs nad 'di la/ /nor ni nye bar bsgrubs pa phan/ /nor ni thar min gdung ba gang/ /de ni 'jig rten dag na med/ /nor ni phun tshogs gya gyu ni/ /smad 'tshod
183b3(mdo 'grel): ma bzhin rnam 'gyur can/ /don du gnyer na 'bros par byed/ /don du ma gnyer rang nyid 'ong/ /ro bral 'khri shing rnying pa bzhin/ /ring skabs rjes su 'ching ldan pa'i/ /'gar ni 'ga' tshe tshegs chen gyis/ /g.yog la 'bras bu med pa nyid/ /slong pa dam pa'i
183b4(mdo 'grel): skye bos spangs/ /do tsha'i rdul gyis yongs su rgyas/ /dman pa brgya yi lhag ma ni/ /'bras bur bcas kyang 'bras med nyid/ /dang po'i dus su nye bar 'ongs pa'i rol sngon du bsnyen bkur cha/ /de nas nor gyis cha bslangs yongs su 'dris las bkur pa rnam
183b5(mdo 'grel): par nyams/ /sred bas blo gros g.yo ldan slong ba'i tshogs rnams nang du rnam bsams shing/ /skad cig las ni re ba'i 'ching ba yangs par byed cing dogs par byed/ /chags pa'i rang bzhin 'jig rten 'dir/ /nor gyis yon tan su zhig 'dzin/ /de slang thabs
183b6(mdo 'grel): kun dman gyur pa/ /bdag ni 'gro ba med pa nyid/ /grib mngon gnyer lam bzang bzhin/ /rten med yid la re ba yis/ /ngal bso thob par ma gyur to/ /skye bo'i nags tshal mchog tu shin tu sdug por gyur pa 'dir/ /gang zhig rgyun tu skye bo slong la 'bras bu kun
183b7(mdo 'grel): ster yang/ /nam yang 'dir bar mi 'gyur dud pa nyid kyang mi gtong ba/ /rgyud la dam pa'i ljon shing de ni gang yang rnyed ma gyur/ /bsod nams mi dman sa yi dbang/ /slong ba kun gyi dpag bsam shing/ /phongs pa'i gdungs mchog tu bsreg/ snying stobs lo
184a1(mdo 'grel): ma'i rgya mtsho thos/ /de ltar yang dag bsams nas des/ /re ba bcas pas brtan pa yi/ /lam nas dga' bas sna drangs te/ /mi bdag lta bar 'dod pas chas/ /de nas de yi dal bu yis/ /grong mdza' i dka' thub nags su phyin//
184a2(mdo 'grel): mi bdag shing los yongs dkris pa/ /lam gyi yongs su dub pas mthong/ /bkres skom dal bas gzir ba de/ /mi bdag gis kyang mthong gyur nas/ /snying rje'i rgya mtshos ring po nas/ /'ong ba yi ni rgyu mtshan dris/ /de la de yis rang gi spyod/ /shugs rings
184a3(mdo 'grel): tshabs gsal byas pa/ /bshad nas gnyen rnams bcings pa yi/ /sdug bsngal gyis gzir slar yang bshad/ /gnyen ni bcings pa dgrol ba'i slad/ /mi bdag slong ba'i lha yi shing/ /bsod nams mi dman lta ba la/ /gser don gnyer ba bdag 'ongs so//
184a4(mdo 'grel): thugs ni snying rjes rdzogs gyur pa/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po de/ /mthong ba nyid kyi 'phral la ni/ /bdag gi brnag ba rdzogs par gyur/ /nyon mongs gdung ba nyams mi byed/ /smad pa yis ni sun mi 'byin/ /dus ni rnyings pa ma yin par/ /skye bo chen po
184a5(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu skye/ /skye dgu rnams kyi dbul ba'i rang rib mi bzad 'phrog byed cing/ /grags pa rab tu gsal ba'i 'byor pas phyogs rnams yongs su 'gengs/ /dri med yid ni mngon par rengs byed dga' ba dag gi gnyen/ /lha yi bdud rtsi'i zer des bdag
184a6(mdo 'grel): gi gdung ba 'phrog par 'gyur/ /zhes pa de yis bshad thos nas/ /sa yi bdag po gzir bar gyur/ /bcos thabs med pa'i gdung ba dag/ 'phos pa yis ni yang dag bsams/ /kye ma bdag gi rgyal srid btang/ /dus min 'dir ni gnyis skyes kyis//
184a7(mdo 'grel): bsams te bkres pas nyen pa yis/ /lam gyi shing ni skam po bzhin/ slong ba rnams la lam ring gi/ dal ba 'bral med gdung ba ste/ /ri dags sred skyes chu lta bu/ /rmongs la skyed byed bdag smad do/ /kha la rdo bsnun mtshungs pa yis/ /brgyal bar
184b1(mdo 'grel): gyur bzhin don gnyer rnams/ /re ba nyams pas lam du ni/ /yongs ngal lci ba nyid du 'gyur/ /rgyal po de ni bdag yin te/ /rgyal srid btang nas nags tshal bsten/ /ces pa thos nas bram ze 'di/ /'phral la srog ni gtong bar 'gyur/ /'di nas rgyal po'i
184b2(mdo 'grel): gnas phyin te/ /bsams pa dag ni ma thob nas/ /yid la re ba nyams pa 'di/ /gdung bas ci zhig byed par 'gyur/ /slong rnams phyir bzlog bzhin log tsha ba'i shugs ring dag gis gdung byed cing/ /kun tu rtog pas lus dman chung ngur byas shing gang las mi 'gro
184b3(mdo 'grel): ba/ /nyon mongs dus su mi rnams sems la 'phral la rab tu gsal ba gang/ /dge ldan yongs su skyob gnyen bsngags 'os gcig pu de nyid 'tsho ba yin/ /rang nyid rab bsrungs gdung ba'i nyams myong shes shing ri byi'i lto ba'i phug du blugs byas te/ /smin byed me
184b4(mdo 'grel): yi rab tu gdung ba'i byed pas khyab cing 'tshed pa'i bya ba yongs su 'dris gyur kyang/ /slong ba'i tshogs kyi sred pa drag pos bskyed pa'i mi bzang gdung ba 'phrog pa min pa gang/ /skye bo 'gron po'i gdung ba shugs rings che bas bskol zhing 'phel bar 'gyur byed rgya
184b5(mdo 'grel): mtsho'i skye ba smad/ /de ltar skad cig bsams byas nas/ /chu dang 'bras bus mgron byas te/ /mi snyan smra bas 'jigs 'jigs bzhin/ /mi yi bdag pos de la smras/ /bsod nams mi dman rgyal po da/ /bram ze dgra bsod sbyor ba'i tshe/ /tshe las chags bral rgyal
184b6(mdo 'grel): srid ni/ /yongs su btang nas dben pa bsnyen/ /sa skyong longs spyod 'tshe ba'i 'bras/ /smin 'khyog lta bur mi brtan par/ /gsar pa'i khrag gis sbags pa ni/ /srin po bzhin du longs spyod byed/ /gnas min 'dug sa ci zhig gyur/ /khyod ni dus min nye bar 'ongs/ /cung
184b7(mdo 'grel): zad bdag gis nus pa gang/ /de ni bsdams pa med par brjod/ /ces pa rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/ /rdo rjes yang dag bcom pa bzhin/ /gnyen thang re ba bral ba las/ /de ni sa la 'gyel bar gyur/ /brgyal zhing la 'gyel ba de/ /mthong nas mig ni mchi 
185a1(mdo 'grel): mar bcas/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis dbugs phyung nas/ /rgyal pos slar yang rab bsams pa/ /kye ma bdag ni bsod nams dman/ /mya ngan lam dang mtshungs pa 'dir/ /slong ba'i re ba'i 'khri shing gis/ /myu gu 'phral la skams par
185a2(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /nor don gnyer ba blun po'i 'dod pas dang por gnas min slong ba 'bras bcas bsams/ /re ba'i myu gus 'dod pa'i bde ba ma lus yal ga stong gi mngon par bris/ /de nas a mra thob par ma gyur ser ldeng sgam pos bzhin du skad cig la//
185a3(mdo 'grel): shin tu che ba'i rtsom pa nyams shing re thag chad pas 'phral la brgyal bar 'gyur/ /bslangs nas rnyed pa chung du zhig /gal te 'di la bdag gis byin/ /bsod snyoms bslangs kyang ltogs gyur pa/ /'di las des kyang ci zhig byed/ /gal te rtswa chag rnying
185a4(mdo 'grel): pa dag gis thog phub khyim ni de nyid du gnas shing/ /gang yang bud med byi la'i phru gu thab tu nyal la rtse ldan de dag gis/ /gal te rkang pa nyid kyis 'gro zhing slar yang de ni bstan bya de lta na/ /da ni nges par sa bdag skad cig mthong dang mgu ba la yang
185a5(mdo 'grel): yon tan ci/ /blo gros rtse ba'i nor 'dzin gyis/ /de ltar bsams nas 'dzin pa dbang/ /de 'dod bsgrub par chas gyur pas/ /rab sad byas te de la smras/ /longs shig bram ze khyod kyi ni/ /'dod pa grub slang mi thogs par/ /'bras bu 'thob pa'i thabs
185a6(mdo 'grel): kyi mchog /bdag gis yang dag rnyed bar gyur/ /re zhig bdag gi mgo bcad nas/ /song ste sa bdag tshangs byin la/ /byin na de ni dga' ba yis/ /khyod la nor dag ster bar 'gyur/ /slong ba'i tsan dan ljon pa de'i/ /tshig de thos nas gnyis skyes ni/ /rna bar
185a7(mdo 'grel): rab zhugs gdung ba yis/ /khab kyis phug bzhin rab smras pa/ /srid gsum snying po skye ba ni/ /'gro ba'i bsod nams kyis thob pa/ /khyod kyi mgrin pa 'di la mtshan/ /brlang po sdig can su zhig bsnun/ /chags pas blo ros nyams pa ru/ /khyod la mi
185b1(mdo 'grel): phan sems par byed/ /sa ha kA ra sol ba yi/ /rgyu du ma rungs su zhig byed/ /ces smra bram ze de la ni/ mi yi bdag pos lan smras pa/ /'tsho yang bdag ni bcings pa yis/ /dgra bo de yi drung du khyer/ /rgyal pos 'bad phas don gnyer bas/ /sa bdag dgra
185b2(mdo 'grel): yi dags pa can/ /tshangs byin dag gis drung du ni/ /de yis de ni bcings nas khyer/ /de yis khyer nas 'ongs pa yi/ /sa dbang de blangs tshangs pas byin/ /'dod pa bas kyang mngon lhag byin/ /bsod nams mi dman mi bdag gis ni snying stobs ngo mtshar
185b3(mdo 'grel): bram zhes bshad thos nas/ /khon gyi rnam 'gyur shin tu bzod dka' ma rungs nyid du mngon brjod dug btang ste/ /rang gnas shin tu mtho bar de ni mgo bzhin bzhag nas tshangs byin rang nyid kyis/ /de yi zhabs kyi chu skyes dag la gtsug gtor phreng bas
185b4(mdo 'grel): skad cig mdza' bar byas/ /de ni dul ba rab thob rang gi grong khyer song ba'i tshe/ /yongs btang rgyal srid yang dag thob nas bsod nams mi dman pas/ /grags pa ltar dkar dbu ba'i phreng ba g.yo ldan chu gter gyis/ /du gu la yis rnam mdzes sa gzhi chos
185b5(mdo 'grel): kyis bskyangs par 'gyur/ /khyab bdag bsod nams mi dman du gyur gang de ba nyid de/ /gang du dus kyis dge 'dun mang po'i zhabs kyis mngon dga' i sa/ /mi rnams dag gi srid pa grol ba'i rgyu ni 'byung 'gyur ba/ /'dir ding de yi spyod tshul srid pa'i
185b6(mdo 'grel): snying po dag gis dran/ /sngon gyi rtogs pa brjod pa gsung mdzad bcom ldan 'das kyi ni/ /spyod tshul sems dpa' rab 'bar thos nas ya mtshan rgyas pa yis/ /dga' bas reg par gyur pa mtho ris bdag po'i lus la ni/ /spu 'ong 'dab ma mdzes pas
185b7(mdo 'grel): spras pa ci yang byung bar gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /mi dman pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //legs bshad mgrin
186a1(mdo 'grel): par rnam gnas bla ma la 'dud mgo dang rna bar thos pa dang/ /zhal ni rtag tu skyon med bden pa dang ldan mkhas pa rnams ni dga' ba'i rgyu ma/ /rin chen yid 'ong rab gsal ngo shal bkod pa dgra ba'i khyad par dang bcas pa/ /chos ldan
186a2(mdo 'grel): bud med chas kyi skye bo lhag ma rnams ni mchog tu tshim pa skye/ /gzhan du bcom ldan 'dzum ldan la/ /brgya byin bsam pa shes pa yis/ /'dzum pa'i rgyu ni dris pa can/ /thams cad mkhyen pas yang gsungs pa/ /pa ratA sir mi yi bdag/ legs
186a3(mdo 'grel): bshad tshol ba zhes pa byung/ /gang gis grags pa dri med rags/ /dpal gyi phreng ba bzhin du mdzes/ /yon tan skud ldan legs spyod zlum/ /dben ldan rnams kyi snying la chags/ /mu tig gi min legs bshad kyi/ /rgyan nyid gang zhig don gnyer
186a4(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /gang gis mdzod dpal slong rnams la/ /rtag tu btang yang g.yo ba med/ /grags pa yon tan la brtags kyang/ /ring las shin tu ring bar 'gro/ /rgyal po'i dang tha snyan dngags mkhan/ /nyams ldan mchog gis rtag bskor te/ /mkhas
186a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i mdun sa bad ldan la/ /longs spyod skal bzang ldan par gyur/ /nye bar bstan la rab zhugs pa/ /de yi legs bshad yon tan can/ /mar me'i rtse mo lta bu yis/ /skye bo rmongs pa'i rab rib phrogs/ /nam zhig mdun sar blo bzang de/ /'dug
186a6(mdo 'grel): pas legs bshad gtam gyi ni/ /mjug tu blo bzang zhes pa yi/ /blon po'i gtso la rab smras pa/ /legs pa'i sgra dang tshig la zhe na/ /yon tan rgyan dang yang dag ldan/ /khyed rnams dag gi legs bshad kyis/ /mdun sa dag gi bkod bzhin mdzes//
186a7(mdo 'grel): legs par smin cing ro dang ldan/ /legs par bshad pa gsar pa kyi/ /me tog lta bu 'ga' zhig ni/ /khyed kyis rnyed par gyur ta ma ci/ /legs bshad rnams dang mthu rnams dang/ /dog pa rnams khan rgyas pa ni/ /gsar ma kho na yang 'phrog ste//
186b1(mdo 'grel): bud med rnams kyi lang tsho bzhin/ /ro dang ldan yang rnam par yangs pa'i me tog don mthun yongs btang nas/ /yongs 'dris yongs su 'dor zhing ring nas ring du rjes su rgyu byed pa/ /gsar pa gsang ba'i sbrang rtsi la chags rkang drug pa ni nags rnams su//
186b2(mdo 'grel): rtag tu nyams su myong gyur rin chen manda las 'khyam par byed/ /mdun sa 'dir ni cung zad gang/ /legs bshad rin chen rnam dpyad de/ /yongs su rtag pas thar pa de/ /kun tu rin thang med par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa nyid ni med na khros pa'i mar me
186b3(mdo 'grel): nyams mi rnam 'tsho ba don yod min/ /mtshungs med rgyas pa'i snyan dngags med na mkhas pa nyid ni ne tso'i klog dang mtshungs/ /snying ldan rnams kyis nang gi de nyid spyod pa med na rab mdzes snyan dngags ni/ /stong pa nyi de dben sa'i khron pa'i mar me
186b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du nang du bsten par gyur/ /de yi slad du gnas skabs 'dir/ /khu byug sgra yis bye zla bzhin/ /legs bshad go skabs grogs po yis/ /gsar ba cung zad brjod par mdzod/ /gal te skad cig de nyid shes pas mchog tu yid rton sgrub byed na/
186b5(mdo 'grel): tshig rnams kyi ni dza ta'i dri bzang ngo mtshar ba dag skyed par byed/ /ji srid skye ba legs bzhin brjod la go skabs med pa ma thob min/ /de lta na yang kra tshig gi tshogs la lhag par bltar byas 'bras bral ba/ /de skad mi mgon gyis brjod pa// 
186b6(mdo 'grel): blo ldan snying la reg pa'i tshig/ /thos nas blon po chen po yis/ /sa yi bdag la lan gsol pa/ /rgyal po khyod kyi tshigs bcad nyid/ /mngon par gsar ba srid gsum na/ /sgrogs nam mkhas ba'i dbang phyug dag/ /legs bshad rgyas pa gzhan gyis
186b7(mdo 'grel): ci// gus ldan gtong phong mchod gyur khyod/ /rig pa dag la 'gyes pa 'dir/ /sa yi mthil 'di thams cad ni/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i grangs khyer gyur/ /khyod ni yon tan ldan pa'i grogs/ /sgyu rtsal padmo ldan pas mdzes/ /shar tshe skye bo mdza' dag ni/ /snang
187a1(mdo 'grel): bcas legs pa'i lam nas 'gro/ /gang dang gang la rgyal po rjes su chags pas skad cig ni/ /gus pa'i cha shes byas pa'i sgyu rtsal dag ni de dang de/ /rtse dga' i chas kyi bye brag de de yon tan de de dang/ /skye bo spyod tshul de de
187a2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten dga' ba nyid du 'gyur/ /sa skyong mkhas na rig pa'i rtse dga' spro la mchog tu reg par 'gyur/ /dpa' na g.yul gyi rol pa dang 'grogs brtul zhugs brtul zhugs 'dzin par 'gyur/ /blun na rmongs shing g.yon rnam par g.yo la
187a3(mdo 'grel): gdug na ma rung spyod/ /gang gangs bdag byed pa de de mdza' dag skye bo byed par 'gyur/ /me tog 'byung gnas legs pa yis/ /me tog rgyas byed nyams dang ldan/ /sa bdag rang nyid mkhas pa dang/ /skye dgu'i bsod nams nyid kyi 'byung/ /skye
187a4(mdo 'grel): bo legs spyod blo ldan blon po dang/ /mi bdag mkhas shing bden bar smra byed pa/ /'di dag rnams ni dge ba dar ba'i dus/ /mngon sum du mtsho ni mtshan nyid bzang po yin/ /gang zhig gnas dang gnas su dgos don nyid la blo ldan blo ni gar byed cing//
187a5(mdo 'grel): gang zhig 'byor tshe legs ldan bdag nyid bdag nyid rnams kyi legs bshad rna ba'i rgyan du gyur/ /gang 'di mi bdag bdag nyid che rgyas rgya yis dbul ba'i dbyangs can dag gi ster/ /'di ni rang nyid dam pa'i cho ga dag la rig pa'i khyim thab
187a6(mdo 'grel): spro dga' yin/ /rgyal po'i bkur ba chen po yis/ /dam pa'i yon tan mdzes pa na/ /nags su rngon pa rnams kyang ni/ /nus pa rnam par bskral chags/ /rngon pa gdug pa can zhes pa/ /nags rgyu mdza' 'khob dag na gnas/ /de las rtag tu legs
187a7(mdo 'grel): bshad kyis/ /rin chen gsar pa gsang pa thog/ dregs ldan gnyis 'thung dgra sder ni/ /bsdu na gral glang po'i mu tig gis/ /snyan dag mkhan gyi don mthun las/ /rtag tu de yis legs bshad blangs/ /shes pa blon po'i tshig thos sa bdag gis/ /mdun sa
187b1(mdo 'grel): pa bkye mdun sa rab btang nas/ /sbas pa'i gzugs kyis pho brang 'khor song ste/ /thun mong skye bo'i rjes su mthun par byas/ /skar tshogs rgyas ba lta bur mngon dga' zhing/ /phan tshun 'od zer rab tu gsal byed pa'i/ /do shal bzung nas legs bshad don gnyer de/
187b2(mdo 'grel): grib ma gnyis pa dang bcas nags mthar song/ /der ni nges par dud pa'i shing rnams kyis/ /me tog rlung bzhon gyis bkram mgron byas bzhin/ /de yis 'bad pas btsal pas sngon pa ni/ /sngon la rab chags ji yi ngos su rnyed/ /glang po rnams kyis bde ba'i mi
187b3(mdo 'grel): mthun phyogs/ /ri dwags rnams la yug pas 'debs byed mkhas/ /'khyogs pa'i rim pa shin tu ma rungs gzhu/ /rang sems lta bu lag pa g.yon pas 'dzin/ /rtag tu nags na gnas pa'i mi mthun phyogs/ /gsod pa gcig bu la mkhas lag g.yas kyis so//
187b4(mdo 'grel): lag ldan sde rnams mdza' dag byang grol la/ /rnam par 'god pa'i mnga' ni rab tu 'dzin/ /rtse mo rlung gis dal gyis bskyong pa yi/ /rma bya'i sgro yis stod g.yogs bsgrubs gyur pa/ /skrag pas g.yo ba ri drags rnams kyi mig/ /bdag po'i 'tsho ba bsrung bar
187b5(mdo 'grel): gsol 'debs bzhin/ /des de tshig gis mngon mchod mchod bya bzhin/ /skye dgu'i bla mas phyag 'tshal bla ma bzhin/ /mtshu mdzes dmar ba phye ba'i so yi 'ong/ /yal 'dab lta bu 'dzin cing rab smras pa/ /khyod ni rtag tu legs pa'i legs bshad rnams/ /bsdu
187b6(mdo 'grel): la rab tu 'bad ba bdag gis thos/ /skye bo'i lam bstan slad du legs bshad kyi/ /rin chen sgron ma gsar pa cung zad stsol/ /rang gzugs rol bas zla ba'i dregs 'joms shing/ /dpal gyi 'jo sgeg 'dzum pa'i rtse dga' bskyed/ /mun pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms
187b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i do shal 'di/ /khyod kyi de yi dod po'i rang bzhin yin/ /zhes brjod do shal 'od kyis phyogs khengs pa/ /a yi 'byer 'jig dag gis de ma bstan/ /rmi lam re ba rnams la rnyed dka' de/ /rngon pas mthong nas dal gyis rab bsams pa/ /klong cing bdag la sbyin
188a1(mdo 'grel): bya byin nas kyang/ /phyi nas 'di ni nges par gdung bar 'gyur// 'di ni 'jig rten pha rol sar 'das na/ /do shal ji ltar bdag rang nyid du 'gyur/ /skad cig 'di bsams de la des smras pa/ /dge ba dam tshig gis ni legs bshad bzhin/ /gal te
188a2(mdo 'grel): ri 'di'i rtse las rang gis lus/ /legs bshad thob pa'i 'phral la mchod na'o/ /gdug pa'i sems ldan rngon pa'i tshig de dag/ thos nas sa yi bdag pos rab bsams pa/ /kye ma nges par 'du byed ldan pa 'di/ /dgag pa'i bya spyod dag la mngon par sbyor//
188a3(mdo 'grel): ring du yon tan bskrun par grags gyur cing/ /mngon du ngan pa'i spyod pa mtshon gyur pa/ /bsam pa gya gyu rnams kyi grags pa gzhan/ /de bzhin spyod tshul gzhan de mtshungs pa min/ ngan pa 'di ci nags mthar gnas ba ci/ /sems can 'tsho ci yon tan mngon sbyor ci//
188a4(mdo 'grel): legs bshad brjod ci brtse ba med nyid kyi/ /kye ma 'di yi spyod tshul rmongs pas bcom/ /rgyun du mdun nas snyan pa'i glu len cing/ /nags kyi brtul zhugs rnams kyis zhi bzhin mdzes/ /srid ldan rngon pa'i yon tan bsdu ba 'di/ /srog ni 'phrog byed ci zhig
188a5(mdo 'grel): brjod pa'am/ /rig pa'i khyad par dag la 'bad byas kyang/ /mi srung nges par brlang po'i rang bzhin nyid/ /gdengs ka'i rin chen mdzes 'dzin sprul rnams ni/ /gdug pa'i mun pa khro bo'i rang bzhin 'dzin/ /bstan bcos man ngag rnams kyis dag byas kyang//
188a6(mdo 'grel): nges par blo ngan rab dang nyid mi 'gyur/ /ga pur tshogs kyis yongs su bsgos gyur kyang/ /mi bzod sgrog pa rang gi dri mi gtod/ /yun ring 'di spyod yon tan don gnyer nges/ /gsar ba'i nyer bstan nyan par mngon 'dod las/ /legs bshad stsol cig sa
188a7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin ngos rtse las/ /phyi nas lus ni dor bar bya zhes smras/ /bden pa'i nor ldan de yi tshig thos nas/ /do shal 'dod kyis gtsug lag khang blangs te/ /bzung bar mdzod ces brjod nas phra mor ni/ /rigs pa min la chags pas brjod par brtsams/ /rang bde'i lam
188b1(mdo 'grel): gyi dag tu gdung byed sdig dang nyon mongs reg mi bya/ /tshul khrims kyis kyang dge ba'i gnas kyi bsod nams tshogs la mchog tu bsten/ /g.yo ba'i yul gyi nyams myong dag la lhag par chags pa'i sems 'di ni/ /chags dang bral zhing mngon 'dod mdza' yas
188b2(mdo 'grel): chog shes dag gis tshim par bya/ /'di ni bde gshegs bstan pa dag dang rab zhi rgyal srid seng ge'i khri/ /mi rnams dag gi gdung ba skyob byed dge ba'i chos ni thun mong nyid/ /yid 'byung rnams par sel byed srid pa'i rnam 'gyur dag ni kun tu 'joms/ /yid kyi me long dag
188b3(mdo 'grel): byed legs byas tshogs ni nye bar bsgrub pa yin/ /legs bshad 'di ni mi bdag da nyid rjes su 'brang pas ri dwags dgra las rnyed/ /legs bshad don ni dri med bdag nyid dag byed de yang snying la rnam bkod nas/ /shin tu mtho ba'i ri yi rtse mor 'dzegs nas lus ni rab
188b4(mdo 'grel): tu btang bar gyur/ /bsod nams yid ldan rnams ni shin tu bden pa 'dod kyi g.yo ba'i lus 'di min// 'gro rnams yang dag bsgral slad smon lam dag ni nad nyid du/ /bzung nas de ni ri yi rtse las ji srid ltung gyur pa/ /de srid ri yi gnas bsnyen rnam pa rgyal
188b5(mdo 'grel): ba zhes bya ba'i/ /gnod sbyin gyis bsrungs lus ni sa la rab tu phyin par gyur/ /de yi brtson 'grus ya mtshan dbang gis bzhin du 'jig rten gsum/ /'dar bar gyur cing bar snang las kyang me tog char bab che/ /gnas skabs gsum pa'i tshogs kyi
188b6(mdo 'grel): spyod tshul yang dag mchod gyur ba'i/ /rgyal po dal gyis rang gi rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu song/ /de nas der ni phan par rab zhugs sa yi dbang po yis/ /nye bar bstan pa'i yul can legs par bshad pa de yis ni/ /rtag tu skye bo ma lus srid pa zil
188b7(mdo 'grel): gyis gnon byed pa/ /chos kyi bde ba rtag pa dam pa'i las la 'god pa bsgrubs/ /gnas skabs 'dir ni tshod dus dag gis lam du rngon pa 'di/ /do shal btsong ba'i blo yis yongs su rgyu bar byed ba na/ /'di ni chos rkun pa zhes mtshungs med pa 'tshol 'dar  
189a1(mdo 'grel): ldan pa/ /sa bdag mdun sar grong khyer srung ba'i skye bos khyer bar 'byung?/ /ring po nyid nas ngo shal 'ong zer rab gsal rnam 'phro chags gyur pa/ /srog ni 'joms pas dam tshig bsgrubs pa de ni rgyal rgyal pos shes gyur nas/ /'di ni bdag gi
189a2(mdo 'grel): slob dpon zhi ba'i yon tan gsal bar legs bshad ston/ /mchod 'ong 'di zhes btung byas mchod pa byas nas de ni btang bar gyur/ /de ltar mi bdag legs bshad ces bya bden pa'i brtul zhugs snying stobs ldan par gyur/ /de nyid dus kyis slar yang rdzogS
189a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub gter thob bdag nyid pa yin no/ /rang gi sbyong tshul bcom ldan gyis bshad de dag thos nas lha rnams bdag po ni/ /dga' bas sbyin gyi nags tshal rnam par rgyas pa padmo'i 'byung gnas dpal bsten gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas ba'i
189a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod ba dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ legs bshad tshol ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// //rgya che grags ba bsten pa'i bsngags 'os ri bong can ltar mdzes/ /gtsug gi nor bu gzhan
189a5(mdo 'grel): gyi don la skyo ba med pa'i dung/ /gang zhig srog ni song bar gyur kyang legs ba'i sgra yi gnas/ /bkra shis gter gyis 'jig rten dag gi dge ba rgyas bar byed/ /me tog can ma zhes pa yis/ /mtshan rgyu brtul nas bcom ldan 'das/ /ri dwags 'phrog byed
189a6(mdo 'grel): brtul zhugs ni/ /dogs med ldan pa'i tshol na bzhugs/ /der ni rjes song brgya byin gyis/ /slar yang 'dzum ldan dag la dris/ /de yi sngon spyod dran gyur nas/ /'dzum ba'i rgyu ni rab tu gsungs/ /lo ni stong phrag bdun cu gnyis/ /skye bo tshe ring gyur tshe sngon//
189a7(mdo 'grel): grong khyer dbang chen ldan zhes pa/ /mtho ris dga' ba thul bar gyur/ /der ni nor gyi blo gros bdag /dbang chen sde zhes bya ba byung/ /gang gi grags pa ga bur gyi/ /sngon bus phyogs ni mun bral byas/ /gang zhig sman ba dam pa bzhin/ /dgra yi dregs pa'i sems
189b1(mdo 'grel): bcom zhing/ /skabs dang bstan ba'i nang phrogs te/ /skye dgu sred bral rnal gnas bsgrubs/ /bsod nams tshogs ni rnam bcas nyid/ /gyur ba bzhin du de yi bu/ /sems can kun la phan brtson ba/ /sems can sman zhes bya bar gyur/ /de ni bskal pa bzang bo pa'i//
189b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i semS dbas brgyan/ /snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms dang/ /byams pa rnams kyi grogs su gyur/ /grong rang grong khyer nags mdza' dang/ /phyogs dang gling rnams thams cad nas/ /nad pa 'ongs rnams rtag tu ni/ /de yis reg bas bsos bar
189b3(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /skye bo'i nags 'dir dam pa de/ /tsan dan bzhin du ci yang spyod/ /gang gis lus kyi gzhan phan ni/ /mi chung rab tu rgyas par byed/ /chen po'i nang kyis gdung pa rnams/ /de yis 'phral la bde bar bsgrubs/ /ngan pa'i nyon mongs gdung ba rnams/ /dam pa dag
189b4(mdo 'grel): dang 'grogs ba bzhin/ /don gnyer rnams kyi lus kyi nang/ /reg pa dang ni sems kyi yang/ /nor gyi phrogs pas phoygs rnams su/ /nad pa med cing slong med gyur/ /de nas dus kyi rtse dga' ni/ /ngo mtshar thams cad 'phrog byed pa/ /skye bo'i bsod nams yongs
189b5(mdo 'grel): zad las/ /dpal ldan de ni mtho ris so/ /bdud rtsi'i zer ni nyin 'ga' mig rnams dag gi myang bya'i bdag nyi 'gyur/ /yon tan dri bzang spro ba'i me tog rnams ni/ skad cig gnas pa'i tshogs/ /dus min dus ni 'dod pas mchog tu dga' ba shin tu gcod la mkhaS//
189b6(mdo 'grel): ci yang 'di ni su yi yid la zug rngu lta bur sgrub ma yin/ /gang zhig yid 'ong bsod nams yangs pa'i thong gi rnyed gyur pa/ /gdung ba kun gyi sman dang 'bad med bde ba skad cig gis/ /nges bar dus kyi cha yis 'joms pa de de mthong gyur nas/ /blun po rnams ni
189b7(mdo 'grel): dben pa'i cha la nam yang mi dge go /de nas dgrags lhag ma'i tshe/ /dang bo de bral las skyes pa'i/ /sdug bsngal btang nas nad rang bzhin/ /skye bo rang gi sdug bsngal bsten/ /de nas gzhon nu dag gis lus/ /mtshan nyid shes pa'i blon bo yis/ /nags kyi mdza' 
190a1(mdo 'grel): ru rab bsrungs te/ /skye bo rnams la phan slang bkod/ /me tog 'khri shing gis rgyas pa/ /rdzing bu dga' ba'i gnas der ni/ /bsod nams bzhin du de yi lus/ /rnyings pa med pa nyid du gnas/ /re bas phyogs mdza' las 'ongs pa/ /nang pa'i
190a2(mdo 'grel): tshogs kun slang yang ni/ /de yis yang dag reg tsam gyis/ /'phral la bsos pa nyid du gyur//de yis theg pa'i rlung gis rnam bskyod pad+ma'i tshogs rnams dang/ /chu la rgyu bas brgyan bas 'tsho skyes can gyi chu la ni/ /khrus byas mdza' dag nad las rnam grol
190a3(mdo 'grel): skyan dang bral gyur cing/ /'phral la nyid du mi rnams bdud rtsi 'thungs bzhin rab tu mdzes/ /gang gi ming ni bsgrags nyid kyis/ /nang rnams zad pa nyid 'gyur ba/ /gang zhig gzhon nu sems can sman/ /der ni de nyid de tshe gyur/ /dran pa'i bdud rtsi bdag gis
190a4(mdo 'grel): gtam/ /'di dag su zhig dran na yang/ /de yi nad gdung rang bzhin gyi/ /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/ /dus kyi snyul 'dir mi yi bdag /gang gi 'jig rten la phan slang/ /mchod rten rab gnas byed 'gyur ba'i/ /mya ngan med ces bya ba byung/ /'chi med
190a5(mdo 'grel): rgyal bo'i blo gcig gis/ /bde gshegs kyis bshad pa'i thos nas/ /dga' ba'i rol pa rnams rgyas pa'i/ /bzhin gyis 'od kyis rnam bar mdzes/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dbag bsam gyi 'khri
190a6(mdo 'grel): shing las sems can sman zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi ba'o// //yid bzhin nor bu nges bar rnam bsams dngos po ster byed cing/ /dpag bsam shing yang yongs su btags pa kho na skyed par byed/ /lus ni
190a7(mdo 'grel): rab sbyin dam tshig dag la rab nyid brtson pa gang/ /de dag bstod la yang dag 'os pa'i tshig ni gang zhig yin/ /g+hA Da a pa g+hADa ka/ smyo byed gsang ba pa btul nas//skra can nags las mi snang bar/ /ston pa nags tshal gzhan du gshegs//de nga sngon
190b1(mdo 'grel): byung dran gyur nas/ /bzhin 'dzum mdzad la 'dzum pa'i rgyu/ /brgya byin gyis ni gus pas dris/ /de yis slar yang rab gsungs ba/ /grong khyer thams cad ldan zhes pa/ /nor bu'i ba gam nam mkha' la/ /reg ba'i 'od zer rgod pa can/ /phun tshogs kun gyi gnaS
190b2(mdo 'grel): su gyur/ /der ni rgyal po'i zla ba dag /dri med 'od ldan kun sder byung/ /gang gi grags bi blo? 'od kyis/ /srid gsum nyin dang mtshan mor mdzes/ /mdzes ldan legs byas snying po'i gnas skabs dag gis khyad par gyis/ /'dul ba'i lam du gnas ba thob cing
190b3(mdo 'grel): gzugs bzang ldan gyur pa/ /gang gi legs smra dul ba'i rgyal ldan sgrogs ba'i rnga nyid du/ /sbyin pa gyur te glang po'i bdag po dag gi bzhin du'o/ /nam zhig sa yi brgya byin de de skye dgu'i bya ba lta byed cing/ /rjes su bzung la mngon phyogs pas/ /phyi rol
190b4(mdo 'grel): khyams gnas sa gzhi bsten/ /der ni mdza' yas rgyal phran gyi/ /mgo bo'i rin chen la snang des/ /lus ni grangs med dag gi bzhin/ /sa yi bya ba thos par gyur/ /de yis rkang stegs zla shel gyi/ /rang bzhin la ni 'phos gyur cing/ /mdun du rab btud
190b5(mdo 'grel): sdong? ba rnams/ /slar yang bsam pa'i gdung ba btir?/ /skabs der phug ron rab skrag cing/ /'dab gshog zad pa bzhin du ni/ /'gro ba med pa'i sa bdag gi /byin pa'i rtsal rab tu bsten/ /rab skrag mig ni 'phrul byed cing/ /yan lag kun tu 'khums ba
190b6(mdo 'grel): nges/ /mthong nas sa yi bdag po ni/ /'phral la brtse ba'i dbang du gyur/ /'di yi 'jigs pa gang las shes/ /rab rgyas pad+ma'i phreng ldan gyi/ /padmo can ltar 'od gsal ba'i/ /spyan gyis myur du phyogs rnams bltas/ /skabs deng smin pa gsod byed ni/
190b7(mdo 'grel): snying stobs brtag par 'dod pa yis/ /sgyu mas rngon pa'i rnam par ni/ 'ongs nas mi bdag la smras pa/ /lta cig yun ring na rnyed pa'i/ /bdag gi bza' ba bya de thod/ /'di ni ma bslangs ma zlog pa'i/ /bdag cag lhan skyes 'tsho ba yan/ /'gro ba'o bdag
191a1(mdo 'grel): bo bdag gi zas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni grub pa 'di/ /med na 'tshol gtong bar 'gyur/ /gong phyir zas ni srog gi gzungs/ /dus 'di mthas? ni chad pa las/ /bdag gi 'tsho ba btang gyur na/ /bdag gi khyim thab bu dad bcas/ /re ba chad
191a2(mdo 'grel): pas rnam nyams 'gyur/ /chos ldan gang gis gcig nyid ni/ /bsrungs pas gang du mang po dag/ chos las nyams par gyur na bkye/ /de la chos ni ci zhig 'dra/ /phug ron la ni byams ba yis/ /bdag la zhe sdang bya mi 'os/ /gang phyir khyod nyid lta bu ni//
191a3(mdo 'grel): sgyu ldan chags pas 'jug pa min/ /ji ltar 'di nyid de bzhin bdag/ /khyod la red gnyis bya brag ci/ /dam pa 'byung po kun la snyoms/ /gcig la brtse ba byed pa min/ /des 'di smras tshe mi bdag gi/ lag pa gang du bu'i sgra ldan bas/ /'jigs par mi bya zheS
191a4(mdo 'grel): smo bzhin//bya ni chags pas rab bsgrims te//de nas sems can gzir ba kun/ /yongs bskyab dus ni byas pa nges/ /char sbrin 'jam pa'i sgra dbyangs ltar/ /zab pa'i tshig gis rab smras ba/ /skad cig tshim pa don gnyer bas/ /mi bzod srog chags
191a5(mdo 'grel): gsong mi byed/ /lus can srog la chags pa yi/ /gdung ba'i rnam 'gyur mtshungs pa nyid/ /gzhan gyi srog ni phrogs pa yis/ /gang zhig yongs su 'tsho byed ba/ /de yi dge legs ldog 'gyur te/ /gang phyir sdig pa'i gdung bster/ /da lta nyid du ma/
191a6(mdo 'grel): chad par/ /rang 'dod yang dag bzhed cing gus/ /bdag gis don du zas gang gang/ /nye bar bsgrubs ba blang bar mdzod/ /ces ba rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/ /yongs su bzhin log shugs rings can/ /longs spyod mchog la yid byung ba'i/ /rdod bas lan ni
191a7(mdo 'grel): rab smras ba/ /bdag cag gi nags na gnas rnams kyis/ /rgyal po'i longs spyod ri mo shes/ /'gru zas nyams su ma myong ba'i/ /di dags la dus dga' ma yin/ /tsher ma'i 'khrid 'di 'dab med mya ngan dag la yongs 'bris mtho ba nas/ /nags tshal
191b1(mdo 'grel): ldang zhing snum pas rnga mo mya ngan dag gis ci yang snyam/ /cu nyi rab smin dug bzhin bya rog gis ni za bar mi byed de/ /rang bzhin dag gis dbye bas 'os pa 'dir ni kun la bde ba ste/ /rgya la la 'os zas ding zos nas/ /nang bar slar yang bdag ci za/ /gang zhig
191b2(mdo 'grel): nyin gzhan rnyed dka' min/ /de dag thos na bde ba bskyed/ /rgya che ro ldan la zas yongs 'bris ro dang bral bar mi byed/ do /'khor gyi rtsom pa mang po ltung rnams gcig pu nyid du gnas mi byed/ /shing rta nyon pa rkang pas 'gro ba'i dus na shin tu mya ngan byed/ /de ni
191b3(mdo 'grel): thob nyams na mi bzad nyon mongs rtsub mos shin tu gdung bar byed/ /lha cig rgyal po la 'os zas/ /khyod kyi sbyin gyis gzigs rnams la/ /rtag tu rnyed dka' min mod kyang/ /skye bar sngon med bdag mi dga' / /rngon bas mngon bar bsang pa'i sha/ bdag cag
191b4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi srog ltar spyod/ /des na rang lus rab chod la/ /bya yi gnyis 'gyur spyin par mdzod/ /mi bdag bsam pa 'khrugs pa yis/ /tshig de thos nas 'phral la ni/ /dga' bas spyan gyi chu skyes dag/ rab tu rgyas bas de la smras/ /bya dang khyod kyi srog
191b5(mdo 'grel): dag ni/ /bsrung slang mtshungs pa'i the tshom la/ /blo bzang khyod kyi thabs 'di ni/ /gsal bar bdag la nye bar bstan/ /gnyis ka'i srog la the tshom gyi/ /khyogs la zhen pas 'khrugs gyur pa/ /bdag gi yid ni grogs kyis bzhin/ /khyod nyid kyis ni
191b6(mdo 'grel): brtan par byas/ /khyod kyis mig zhags kyis bcings pa'i/ /bya 'di rab tu gtang bar mdzod/ /da lta nyid du bdag gi shas/ /re zhig srog gi gzungs thag mdzod/ /rgyal bo dam bca' bden pa yis/ /snying rje las ni 'di brjod tshe/ /dug ldan mnga' yis
191b7(mdo 'grel): phug pa bzhin/ /blon po rnams ni rmongs bar gyur/ /sbyin pa'i skabs su phan mi phan/ /grogs kyis bdag la brjod mi bya/ /zhes ba de yi dam/ tshig gis/ /lus ni gtong bar nges bar gyur/ /de nas mi bdag gis smras pa/ /gang zhig bdag gi lus
192a1(mdo 'grel): las sha/ /bcang nas srang la 'debs byed pa/ /de la nor ni rab tu phyin/ /de nas rgyal po gser gyi char/ /? pas pos pa'i skye po rnams/ /ngan pa'i las kyi blo rmus phyin/ /rna ba bsgribs shing sor bar gyur/ /gdug ba'i blo zhes bya
192a2(mdo 'grel): ba gcig/ ser skya'i mig ni ser po yis/ /gser dag blangs nas gdug pa yi/ /las la chas su zhugs par gyur/ /gdug ba'i las ni sog le bzhin/ /drang po gtsang la mkhas gyur cing/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'khyogs pa yi/ /gdug pa'i bdag nyid ci mi
192a3(mdo 'grel): byed/ /gang zhig mtshon gyis mi nus de dag kyal ka'i tshig gis 'joms par byed/ /gang zhig brjod par mi nus ci yang de dag 'phral la bsgrub par byed/ /gang zhig bya bar mi nus de dag kyang ni yid kyis sems bar byed/ /ma bsngams pa rlang po dag gis
192a4(mdo 'grel): spyod pas ngo mtshar thams cad rgyas par byed/ /de nas de yis phug don ni/ /srang la gzhal nas sa bdag gi/ /byin ba g.yas pa'i sha dag ni/ /rab bcad de dang mtshungs par bkod/ /de nas sa yi bdag po yis khrag thigs dang po reg pa yis/ /'khrugs
192a5(mdo 'grel): po bzhin dus gzhi ni/ /yun ring rnam bar g.yos par gyur/ /de nas phug ron lci ba dang/ /sha ni yang ba nyid gyur tshe/ /sha ni gzhan dag rab chod la/ /byin zhes sa yi bdag bos smras/ /brla dang dpung pa'i sha bcad kyang/ /khyad dang mtshungs pan nyid ma byung//
192a6(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi ni the tshom dang/ /mtshungs pa'i srang der mi bdag zhugs/ /mi bdag? chu rgyas lhag ma'i lus/ /rang nyid srang la 'dzegs pa'i tshe/ /de yi gtong ba gzung dka' bas/ /yid byung grags pa phyogs mtshams song/ /de yi dus nas yi bdag
192a7(mdo 'grel): po dag gi brtan pa ni/ /nyams pa med pas la mtshan gyur pa'i lha mi bu mo rnams/ /gtsug phud phreng? bar 'os pa'i padmos yongs gang lag? pa yis/ /de yis spyong tshul dag la mchod ba'i gus pa ci yang byung/ /rnam 'gyur med byams? yi bdag//
192b1(mdo 'grel): srang la 'dzegs pa mthong gyur nas/ /skyes bu gdug pa byed pa po/ /skrag byas de yis de la dris/ /lus kyi sbyin pa 'di yis ni/ /khyod ni ci bzhin yong mi shes/ /gang phyi lus can rnyed pa kun/ /yang ngag rtsom pa lus kyi don/ /gal te lus ni btang la sems//
192b2(mdo 'grel): nyams pa med dam bden par smros/ /zhes smra de la rgyal po ni/ /bzhin 'dzum ldan pas rab smras pa/ /'jig rten 'di na thob bya ni/ /bdag la ci yang med mod kyis/ /'gro ba kun la phan ba'i slad/ /bla med rdzogs ba'i byang chub 'dod/ /gal te bdag gi sems 'di
192b3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /nyams pa ming na bden pa nges/ /lus ni yongs su ma nyams shing/ /rang bzhin rdzogs pa nyid gyur cig/ ces pa brjod ba tsam nyid kyis/ /sa bdag bden ba'i dang tshul gyi/ /lus kyi rma ni rab bsos te/ /ma nyams zla ba ltar mdzes gyur/ /de nas phug ron
192b4(mdo 'grel): rngon pa dag /song zhings skyong 'od ldan ni/ /shar tshe spro ba chen po dang/ /rab gsal 'byor pa ldan par gyur/ /gang zhig nges phangs yi bdag po thams cad ster gyur ba/ /de nyid nga yin skyes bu ser skya de yang lhas byin no/ /de yi sngon byung yang dag dran nas bdag gi
192b5(mdo 'grel): 'dzum pa spros/ /zhes pa ston pa las thos 'chi med bdag po dga' bar gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las thams cad ster ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste
192b6(mdo 'grel): lnga bcu rtsa lnga ba'o/ /'gang dag mthong bas zhe sdang dug gi ni/ /tsha ba rab tu zhi ba nyid 'gyur zhing/ /bdud rtsi'i ro bsil skye bo dam pa yis/ /zla ba de dag su yi phyag 'os min/ /gnod sbyin kha rnon dag gi gnas/ /de las snang ba min gyur te//
192b7(mdo 'grel): grong khyer nying gu mar dang nar/ /skad cig bris ni bcom ldan byon/ /der ni sang dag tshangs sbyin gyis/ /dul ba yis ni mchod pa byas/ /de yis yang dag thos mthun bar/ /skal ldan rnams la rjes bstan mdzad/ /der ni grong pa rnams 'ongs te/ /thung? ba
193a1(mdo 'grel): kun tu lus can rnams/ /rnam par ltung la skyob mdzad pa'i/ /bcom ldan 'das sa? rab gsol pa/ /grong khyer mdza' na bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo ba yi ni ri zhig yod/ /de na klu ni ba lang skyong/ /drag po bzod pa dka' ba gnas/ /de ni phyugs dang skye
193a2(mdo 'grel): bo dang/ /'bru rnams kun gyi rdo rje che/ /phun sum tshogs rnams dngos med slad/ /ci yis rnam sprul rig ma gyur/ /ma dul 'dul mdzad ma zhi ba/ /zhi mdzad khyod kyi brtse ba ni/ /nye bar 'tshe ba 'di dag la/ /bdag cag skyabs tshol rnams kyi skyabs/ /zhes brjod de dag
193a3(mdo 'grel): song ba'i tshe/ /bcom ldan snying rje'i gter dag ni/ /'dus pa'i dbus las mi snang bar/ /rdo ba'i sa 'dzin dag tu gshegs/ /de ngos shin tu stug po na/ /'jigs rung gdengs can khang pa ni/ /dug gi dbugs rnams dag gi chu/ /sngon por byas bzhin de yis mthong//
193a4(mdo 'grel): ral gri shubs med g.yo ba yi/ /mi bzad dpa' rlabs kyis 'khrugs nags/ /de yi 'gram du bcom ldan gyis/ /skyel krung bcas te nye bar bzhugs/ /gnyes gshin spyan ni bdud rtsi'i gnyen/ /dang? ba'i rab tu gzigs pa yis/ /de yis myur bar dug bzhin du/
193a5(mdo 'grel): dug dang bcas pa dug med theb/ /sku lus gser 'od mthing kha? yi/ /chu la snang bas de rab? mdzes/ /ma ra ka ta ltar mdzes ba'i/ /mkha' la nyi ma 'gro ba bzhin/ /de yi snang bas rnam bcos pas/ /klu yi khang par rab rib rnams/ /'bros par byed pa g.yo ba yi//
193a6(mdo 'grel): sbrul gyi tshogs dang mtshungs par gyur/ /klu yi rgyal pos de mthong nas/ /mig ni khrag ltang dmar ba yis/ /'phral la nam mkhar rab zhugs te/ /'gro ba sbrin kyi rang bzhin byas/ /de yi k h+ro ba'i me yi ni/ /du ba'i tshogs bzhin stug po las/ /rab 'thon glog
193a7(mdo 'grel): gi lce rnams kyis/ /phyogs rnams skrag pa bzhin du 'dar/ /myos pa'i sprin rnams dag gi sgra/ /'jig pa brtson par sgrogs byed pas/ /sa 'dzin rnams kyi snying bzhin du/ /dug? dang khang? pa zhom par gyur/ /de nas rdo chen tshogs dkrigs char/ /ri 'breng mdza' ?
193b1(mdo 'grel): dag nyen mongs shing/ /brten ba lhung byed ljon shing ni/ /bye mar byed pa 'bab par gyur/ /lag 'gro gdug pas rab spros pa'i/ /char de skyobs pas gzigs nyid na/ /me tog char ba nyid du gyur/ /de ni rab gsal dri med nags tshal nye bar bslad pa med/ /bung ba glu dbyangs
193b2(mdo 'grel): len pa'i me tog dang ldan mthong gyur nas/ /dgang ba'i 'dzum dkrigs ngo shal khur las nges par rgyal gyur pa'i/ /nags kyi lha yi gdug pa'i gdengs can dbang po de la smras/ /kye lags dus kyi rnam 'gyur dag ni yongs su thod/ /khyod lta bu rnams 'jig
193b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i rlung gis bcom par gyur pa na/ /gang gi rked skabs phug gi rol par skyabs su 'gro byed pa'i/ /gser gyi ri bo 'di la ci yang g.yo pa med pa nyid/ /de nas 'phral la rgyags pa ni/ /yongs su zad cing rnam 'gyur btang/ /thal mo sbyar nas mngon phyogs te/ /klu yis
193b4(mdo 'grel): ston ba la phyag 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das ni snying rje'i gter/ /bslab pa'i gnas dag rab sbyin pas/ /skyabs su song bar gyur pa de/ /dge ba mchog la rjes bzung mdzad/ /zhabs la mgo yis gtugs pa des/ /gus pa yis ni gsol btab ba/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas
193b5(mdo 'grel): rtag tu ni/ /de la yang dag nye bar mdzad/ /gnas skabs der ni de nyid du/ /gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dag/ /zhar la 'ongs pa zhi ba'i slad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes bzung mdzad/ /de nas 'jig rten gdud ba mi bzad rnams zlog ston pa ni/ /rnam rgyas btong pa'i tshig gis skabs
193b6(mdo 'grel): gsum pa yis mchod gyur pa/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhabs par dag dang mdza' ba las/ /dag ba'i rdo ba'i gzhi ldan nags tshal rgyu zhing bsten par mdzad/ /der de 'dzum dang ldan pa la/ /lha yi rgyal po ltar 'ongs pas/ /'dzum pa'i rgyu dris nge la ni/ /thams cad
193b7(mdo 'grel): mkhyen bas bka' stsal pa/ /dag byed dri ma med pa'i chu yi rgyun dang ldan gyur cing/ /khon med sems can bskal bzang 'khor pa dka' thub dag gi nags/ /chos ni lhag gnas sdom brtson rnams kyi yid ni dag byed pa/ /zhi ba'i gnas 'di dag tung nyid kho nas ril byas min//
194a1(mdo 'grel): seng ge'i nu 'og ri dwags phru gu rgyud dben pa'i nags tshal 'dir// brgya byin dpal ldan 'khor ba 'jigs dang bde gshegs gser thub de dang ni/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri med blo ldan thub pa 'od srungs te/ /mdza' dag 'jig
194a2(mdo 'grel): rten gdung ba'i sman pa rnams kyis 'di nyid du gnas mdzad/ /da nas de skad smras des gzigs nyid kyi/ /bsod nams smin pas nye bar 'ongs pa yi/ /rngon pa dag ni skyabs su song ba la/ /nges gnang dbu skra sen mos mtshan pa byas/ /zhes dge pa'i dbang pos
194a3(mdo 'grel): byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las klu ba lang skyong btul ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// ? //phyogs kyi mdzes ma'i rna rgyan dang/ /mtshungs par yon tan dam pa bkod/ /
194a4(mdo 'grel): gang zhig grags pa'i mchod rten gyis/ /'gro mdzes de dag rgyal gyur cig/ de nas der ni bcom ldan 'das/ /brgya byin gus pas gsol btab pas/ /sangs rgyas snga ma'i mchod rten mdzad/ /rang gi mchod rten byed du bcug/ lha rnams kyis der rin chen gyi//
194a5(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin nyi 'od brgya ldan byas/ /'gro ba'i rmongs pa chen po dang/ /mtshungs pa'i mun pa gshed song/ /deng ni dri za mi'am ci/ /mi dang klu dang lha rnams la/ /'dul ba'i chos kyi man ngag ni/ /yang dag bstan nas rgyal ba gshegs/ /rdo ba'i ril lha rnams
194a6(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /mchod rten bzhi ni bkod pa la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga pa yi/ /mchod rten mchod rten lnga dag bkod/ /de nas bA lok+Sha? zhes pa'i/ /yul du de bzhin gshegs pa byon/ /lus ngan gyis bzhin tshong dbon ni/ /legs par rab sad ces thas mchod//
194a7(mdo 'grel): gang gis de ni rjes 'brad bcas/ /'dul ba'i chos ni de la bstan/ /rmongs pa'i gnyid sad legs pa ni/ /rab sad rab sad nyid thob gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' las des/ /rang gi bsod nams bzhin mtho ba/ /bA lak+Shi la zhes pa yi/ /mchod
194b1(mdo 'grel): rte rin chen 'bar ba byas/ /de las dal gyis de bzhin gshegs/ /Dam par yi grong du byon// gdong sbyin Dam pa ra zhes pa/ /bslab gnas rab tu sbyin pas btul/ /gtum mo'i grong du mngon phyogs te/ /gtum po mal+li ka zhes pa/ /bu bdun dag dang lhan cig
194b2(mdo 'grel): nyid/ /'dul ba yis ni mtho bar mdzad//las kyi lhag mas gtum po'i rigs/ /thub pas sun phyung de dag rnams/ /rgyal ba mthong las padmo yis/ /'byung gnas bzhin du dri med gyur/ /tha shal skyon gyis sun phyung smad pa dag tu 'os gyur cing/ /sdig pa'i
194b3(mdo 'grel): nye bar gdung ba chen pos gdungs shing nyin rnams la/ /rnam rtog ngan pa dang bral snying rjes rab zhugs dam pa rnams/ /dman la dmigs pa'i rjes su chags pas lhag par gyur pa yin/ /de nas bde gshegs rjes 'brad bcas/ /pAD la yi grong khyer
194b4(mdo 'grel): byon/ /dpal ldan khyim bdag gru 'dzin zhes/ /bya la legs pa'i gtam dag mdzad/ /bde bar gshegs pas rjes bzung bas/ /bslab pas gnas thob dri med des/ /de yi dbu skra sen cha yis/ /mtshan pa'i rin chen mchod rten byas/ /der ni ltar 'ongs dbang po
194b5(mdo 'grel): la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rab gsungs pa/ /rgyal po mi len dra zhes pas/ /yul 'dir mchod rten byed par 'gyur/ /de ltar gnas dang gnas su bcom ldan brtse bas brlan pas gzigs pa yis/ /mdza' dag 'jig rten rnams kyi mya ngan rmongs dang 'jigS
194b6(mdo 'grel): pa btang bar gyur/ /mchod rten mngon par gsar byas skyibs na nor bu'i dril chung sgra sgrogs pa/ /dar dir tshogs kyi rtse 'jo dag gis sa gzha'i? da? sred pa lta bur gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag
194b7(mdo 'grel): bsam gyi 'khri shing las mchod rten gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun ba'o// //rgud pa'i gdung bzhi byed gzigs pa rab tu dang ba'i'o dag gis/ /skyes bu rnams ni nang dang bral mdzad srid pas zil mnan la brugs pa'i
195a1(mdo 'grel): sman pa gang/ /nges par dge ba mdza' dag bskyed pa'i nor 'dzin grub pa'i bdud rtsi ni/ /rdzogs pa'i snying rje nang du 'dzin pa de dag mi sman phyag byar 'os/ /grong khyer padmo ldan pa na/ /bcom ldan 'dzum dang bcas pa la/ /lha yi rgyal
195a2(mdo 'grel): pos 'dzum pa'i rgyu/ /dris nas slar yang rab gsungs pa/ /dpal ldan bsod nams stobs zhes pa'i/ /sa yi bdag po sngon byung ste/ /gang zhig grong khyer stong phrag ni/ /brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin par gyur/ /de yi rgyal po'i pho brang ni/ /bsod nams ldan
195a3(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba ste/ /shel gyi rnam par yid 'ong zhing/ /mtshan mo'i bdag po'i 'od bzhin mdzes/ /skyed tshal gsar par 'gro ba'i slad/ /nam zhig shing rta zhon pa des/ /lam du phan pa'i zas bral bas/ /nad kyis gzir cing 'dug pa mthong/ /ring po'i nad kyis
195a4(mdo 'grel): mnar ba yis/ /yongs su nyams pa de mthong nas/ /phyogs mtshams ma lus gnon pa de/ /snying rjes zil mnan gdung par gyur/ /gzhan gyi yongs gdung mthong gyur na/ /'phral la 'phos te dam pa yis/ /me long rnams ni gdung 'gyur te/ /nyi ma me shel
195a5(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin bzhin/ /de yis grong khyer thams cad dang/ /sgo dang srang rnams mdza' dag tu/ /nad pa rnams la zas dang sman/ /gnas dang mal stan la sogs byas/ /de nas de dag rnams kyi slad/ /rim gro bani mkhas pa bskos/ /gang phyir das pa'i rim gro
195a6(mdo 'grel): pa/ /nad gso'i yan lag dang po yin/ /bzod lan snying rjes brlan zhing bzod/ /gso byed 'dod pa dag la gnas/ /mdza' la the tshom mi byed pa'i/ /rim gro pa ni rnyed pa dka' / /de nas rgyal po rim gro pa/ /dul ba rnams ni legs bos nas/ /smras
195a7(mdo 'grel): pa nyin dang mtshan mor ni/ /nad pa rnams kyi rim ko mdzod/ /rgyal po la 'os gnas rnams su/ /mal stan mchog sogs phun tshogs byas/ /rin chen skas ldan padmo can/ /dri med chu ldan nad ba'i phyir/ /sman pa dang ni sman dag kyang/ /phun tshogs shin tu
195b1(mdo 'grel): che ba bsgrubs/ /nga ni de dag bsos gyur pa/ /khyed kyi gnyer zhas bdag gi blo/ /'jig rten 'dir ni rim gro pa dang brtan pa'i sman pa chos kyis gzhan du mi rnams kyi/ /yongs su gdung ba shin tu bsil ba yis kyang grang ba dag ni bde ba'i dro ba yis/ /sred pa bsil
195b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i chu yis dang ni ngal ba yang yang chung ngu phan zas nyer bstabs pas/ /khyod bsos 'gyur zhes bstan pa'i tshig snyan ku re'i rim pas mi dge bas dag zhi bar byed/ /de yi slad du khyed rnams kyi/ /nad kyis gdungs shing 'gyel rnams la/ /yang dang yang du tshig
195b3(mdo 'grel): dag gis/ /dbugs dbyung 'di ni dran par bya/ /sman pa skyon med bde gshegs bka' drin dang/ /chos kyis man dag dam pa'i sman dag kyang/ /'khor ba ring po rim gyis skabs rnams kyi/ /dpung gnyen zhi ba'i bcud len de dag yin/ /mi bdag nor gyi char
195b4(mdo 'grel): 'bebs des/ /de dag rnams la de skad bstan/ /nad pa ma lus bsod bya'i slad/ /sod nas ji skad brjod bzhin byas/ /de nas nad grol de dag rnams/ /dge ba brjod pas de la yid/ /song ba rnams la blta ba'i slad/ /mi bdag rang nyid phyi rol byung/ /brgya byin
195b5(mdo 'grel): gyis kyang de la ni/ /gnyis 'thung dkar po mche ba mi/ /drug ldan gyis drangs shing rta dag /bsod nams rab 'bar rnam par sprul/ /rin chen gser gyi mtsho skyes rnams/ /reg na bde ba'i rlung gis g.yo/ /bung ba'i na chung glu len pa'i/ /lam du mchog gi
195b6(mdo 'grel): pad ldan yang/ /rin chen mtsho skyes de dag la/ /gnas sogs bdud rtsi'i cha rdzogs ba'i/ /lha mo rnams kyis ring po nas/ /mi bdag byon pa bsten par gyur/ /snying stobs bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho de'i/ /snying stobs shes 'dod lha yi bdag /bdag nyid long
195b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i gzugs byas nas/ /de la mngon du phyogs te smras/ /rgyal po mig gis dman pa bdag /skye bar snang ba rnam par spangs/ /sems can thams cad yongs skyob bar/ /zhugs pa khyod can nye bar 'ongs/ /khyod kyi mthu yis nad pa ni/ /'di dag legs
196a1(mdo 'grel): par bsos gyur nas/ /'dod ldan mdzes pas khyod kyi ni/ /grags pa mu cod sgrog cing rgyu/ /sdug bsngal bkron dang long ba'i gnyen/ /lha yi bdag ni bskyab par 'os/ /bdag la mig ni g.yas pa dag /gal te thod na gnang ba
196a2(mdo 'grel): mdzod/ /des 'di brjod tshe mi bdag ni/ /rab dang bzhin ras mdzes pa yis/ /'gro rnams yang dag bsgral ba'i slad/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /smon lam rab tu btab byas te/ /mig ni mtshon gyis rab phyung nas/ /brtan ba'i gter
196a3(mdo 'grel): gyis de la byin/ /lha rnams kyis ni me tog gtong/ /de yi smad byung sbyin pa yis/ /mtsha mtshan nas bzhin sa gzhi ni/ /chu gter g.yo ba'i ska rags can/ /ri dang bcas pa ma lus 'dar/ /mig gcig gis ni snang ba dag/ skyes pa de mthongs yi bdag/
196a4(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa'i rol rab dgyes pas/ /gnyis pa sbyin par brtson par 'gyur/ /de nas lha yi bdag po ni/ /rang gi lus su yang dag gnas/ /de yi mig ni bsos byas te/ /snying stobs mchog nyid rab tu bsngags/ /gang zhig sbyin tshe rang gi yan lag la'ang/ /nam
196a5(mdo 'grel): yang chags pa chung ngu skye min pa/ /nges par snying stobs rgya mtsho rgyas de la/ /nor zhes brjod pa'i rdul la rang blo ci/ /de tshe mi bdag bsod nams stobs gyur te/ /nga nyid sbyin pa'i ro yis byang chub thob/ /de yi ngo mtshar spyod tshul dran pas na/ /de yi rang
196a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin nyid thob 'dzum pa mdzad/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las bsod nams stobs kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //
196a7(mdo 'grel): shin tu rab gsal grags pa'i tshon ris yon tan rin chen rgyan/ /mnyams sbyin pa'i me tog dang ldan bden pa'i byug pa byas/ /gang gi dpal ni tshul khrims gtsang ba'i dus? su las mdzes pa/ /de nyid gcig pu legs byas la 'os? 'khor los
196b1(mdo 'grel): sgyur ba yin/ /grong mchog pA ta li yi bu zhes pa/ /na chung sa gzhi'i thig le ltar gyur pa de// nyi ma'irigs kyi rgyan gyur grags pa'i gter/ /dpal ldan sa bdag mya ngan med pa byung/ /dang por 'dod ldan de 'dod nye tshig dang/ /de nas rnon pa gtam bo'i nyer spyod
196b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /phyi nas chos ni nye bar 'dzin pa yis/ /dben pa smin pa'i na tshod rab grags gyur/ /mya ngan med de rab dang bsod nams kyi/ /nye ba'i nags tshal sa gzhi mdzes pa'i rgyan/ /rgyas par gyur tshe dge ba'i myu gu yis/ /'jig rten mya ngan med nyid nges par
196b3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin/ /de yi bde skyid lha mo padm ldan/ /phro brang 'khor gyi mdzes ma'i gtsug gnas pas/ /kun spro bu ni bsod nams dag gis bskyed/ /gtong pa rjs 'brang dpal gyis legs brjod bzhin/ /gser ltar dag pa mi yi dbang po'i bu/ /pad rjid dpal gyis
196b4(mdo 'grel): pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan/ /gser ri'i dang pa kun la zhes pa yis/ /mig mtshungs de ni kun la zhes gyur/ /rig pa bu mo'i bdag mthong dri ma med/ /rgyu rtsal 'khri shing rnams kyi dga' ba'i spyid/ /grags pa ku mud ldan pa'i zla rgyas pa/ /de ni 'jig rten kun
196b5(mdo 'grel): gyi mngon 'dod gyur/ /rgyu skar bdag po'i nang gi ri dwags bzhin/ /de yi mig yang mtsho skyes zung dag ni/ /g.yo ldan smin ma'i bung bas mngon dga' ba/ /blta bas mi dbang rab tu ngoms ma gyur/ /sna tshogs yon tan rgyan ldan de la ni/ /mdza' dag
196b6(mdo 'grel): phyogs dang gling gi sa yi bdag /skal bzang khengs bas rang gi bu mo dag /'dod pa'i mu tig 'khri shing lta bu byin/ /skye bo rjes chags bskyed pa mchog gi gzugs/ /de yi dga' mar mig yangs zla zhal ma/ /'dod pa'i dga' ma skye ba gzhan thob bzhin
196b7(mdo 'grel): gser gyi phreng ldan ma zhes bya bar gyur/ /de nas nam zhig pha yi drung gnas pa'i/ /gzhon nu de mthong dge 'dun gnas brtan gyis/ /rgyal po'i 'dod pas rang gi grags ma yis/ /dben gnas gcug las khang du dal gyis khrid/ /rgan po mkhan po//
197a1(mdo 'grel): mngon shes drug ldan mchog /snying rje'i sbyor ldan rnal 'byor ldan pa des/ /dus kyis de yi mig dag nyams shes nas/ /ma 'ongs sdug bsngal gdon slang de la smras/ /khyod kyi sems ni 'byor pas zil gnan dang/ /lang tsho me tog
197a2(mdo 'grel): mtshon dang ldan pa'i tshogs/ /rol pas zla ba'i dregs 'joms lus dang ni/ /mtshan ma byung bar gyur 'di bdag gis mthong/ /mig ni rang bzhin gyis g.yo gzhan pa ci/ /'di la bde ba nyer skyes gnas pa med/ /'di yi drangs pas rang gnas rab nyams
197a3(mdo 'grel): te/ /'dong pa zhes brjod khung bur lhung ba nyid/ /nges par mi rnams mig bzang yangs pa ni/ /utpal sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu 'di/ /chags pa ltos 'gro'i bug pa'i tshogs nyid de/ /gang gis myur du dbang po yongs ngal byed/ /tshul khrims mthu las
197a4(mdo 'grel): gang dag rnams kyi mig /mdzes pa'i btung pas khyad par du ngoms shing/ /rnam pa g.yo ba min pa de dag nyid/ /snying stobs bstan pa dang ldan skal ba bzang/ /zhes sogs de yi tshig ni rab zhi ba/ /nye bar rdzogs pa mi bdag bus thos nas/ /de bzhin zhes
197a5(mdo 'grel): te rab dang yid la byas/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni rang gi gnas su song/ /de nas bung ba'i tshogs ni glu len cing/ /kim shu ka dpal li khris rgyas pa 'dra/ /khengs ldan ma yi khengs pa 'joms chas pa/ /ston gyis dris myos glang po dpyid 'ongs gyur//
197a6(mdo 'grel): skyed chal 'khri shing gsar pa'i yal 'dab dang/ /'bral ba'i gdung la rgud pa'i cha shas dag /gsar du chags bas rab bskyed bzod dka' nyid/ /'phral la lhan cig nyid du rgyas par 'gyur/ /tsam pa ka 'dab rlung gis bskyod pa yi/ /spring
197a7(mdo 'grel): yig gis ni byams pa skyed byid cing/ /'dod dang lhan cig dpyid kyi dang po yis/ /mngon sbyor rgyal byed brtan 'joms phyogs su grags/ /me tog rab rgyas de dang de dag las/ /dpyid kyi gnyen la mchog tu phan pa ni/ /grags ba'i? rnam pa bung
197b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'i/ /sa ha kA ra nyid kyis byas par gyur/ /dpyid kyi spro bo'i rnam 'phrul de la yang/ /mi yi dbang po'i bu de dben par ni/ /gnas brtan gyi ni man ngag sems pa dag /sa skyod? btsun mo skar rgyal bspung bas mthong/ /ma nyams zla ba'i 'od ldan yangS
197b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i mig /phrag mtho pus mos lag par slebs de la/ /mdza' bas brlan pa'i blo yis mngon phyogs te/ ? tshun ma de yis rab smras pa/ /gzhon nu me tog mda' can gsar 'jug pa/ /'khor ba'i snying po khyod kyi mig gi dpal/ /khyad par mdzes ba'i chas dang
197b3(mdo 'grel): ldan ba 'ang/ /'jig rten du ni su yi brtan mi 'phrog /ces brjod de yis 'phral la lag gnyis gyis/ /ngor btang nas brtan par de la 'khyud/ /rang gi rgyan gyi khral khrol mu cor gyi/ /'dar zhing rgyun tu zlog par byed pa bzhin/ /gzhan 'di'ang rang gi ma bzhin bdag
197b4(mdo 'grel): la ni/ /rtag tu gnyes gshin nyid dag? skyed par byed/ /ces bsams dogs med blo ldan de yis de'i/ /rkang? par phyag 'tshal zur phud dung bar gyur/ /stug por rmongs dus rgyags pas 'phyar gyur cing/ /chu srin mtshan ma lhung bas rab bskyod ba'i/ /dba' rlabs can bzhin
197b5(mdo 'grel): bud med rnams la ni/ /rang bzhin 'gros la 'gog pa cung zad med/ /ba btsol rtsom pa rnam par ma bsdams pas/ /sdig bar lhung tshe dri mas 'jigs pa bzhin/ /tshul khrims gtsang mas rnam par btang gyur cing/ /'dod pas zil mnan de yis de la smras//
197b6(mdo 'grel): bdag gi mdza' bo gzhon nu lang tsho mtshungs/ /khyod kyi ma yi chun ma bdag ma yin/ /khyod kyi 'khyud pas 'grogs 'os bdag gis lus/ /skal bzang longs spyod 'os 'di brten par mdzod/ /don du gnyer bya bud med rang nyid kyis/ /don gnyer gang 'di ngo
197b7(mdo 'grel): cha med nyid de/ /ci bgyid dka' drin mdzod cig khyod lus dang/ /'grogs pa yun ring bdag gi snying la bcagS/ /nu ngos do shal 'khri shing mngon dga' zhing/ /rkod skabs dkyil 'khor dril chung ldan pa yi/ /bud med sen mo 'debs pha dbul ba ni/ /rab
198a1(mdo 'grel): mdzes skal bzang mngon par khengs mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten dag na bud med rang bzhin gyis/ /sems ni rnam g.yeng dge mtshan ldan pa dang/ /gsar pa 'dod la shin tu mngon phyogs shing/ /mig kyang mdzes pa dag la sred ldan
198a2(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /zhes smras rlung ltar 'dar ba'i lus can des/ /mchu 'deb dpal ni dbugs kyis zil mnan cing/ /rdul chus tshon ris nyams byas rnams 'gyur ni/ /'dod pas nyer bstan rab tu gsal bar bzung/ /rna pa nyams byed gdung ba'i khab bzhin des/ /de
198a3(mdo 'grel): gyis tshig ni 'gal ba de dag thos/ /sdig de dmigs la chags pa 'dod pa bzhin/ /sa la blta zhing gdong ni dud par gyur/ /ri dwags rtags can lta bu de yi bzhin/ /sdig pa'i dri ma rab rgyas de ni bltar/ /gzhon nus ma bzod 'phral la yid 'byung dang//
198a4(mdo 'grel): ngo tshas bzhin gyi pad+ma zum par gyur/ /dag par bgyi slad de yi rna bzung/ /mi chung sdig thos 'dar bas bskyod pa las/ /rin chen rab 'bar rna rgyan las 'khrungs pa'i/ /mthu ldan me ni skad cig zhugs pa bzhin/ /de yi lag pas rna ba zung bsgribS
198a5(mdo 'grel): nas/ /skad cig 'khyud pI skyon ni? zhi bI slad/ /yan lag yan lag 'khyud ba'i gaM gA bzhin/ /so yi 'od zer dkar ldan tshig spros pa/ /ma ma khyod kyis 'di dag smrar mi 'os/ /dam pa'i lam nas song la tshig dag sdoms/ /'phral la yongs gtang
198a6(mdo 'grel): skabs kyi tshul khrims ni/ /nyams shing rnam par g.yo ba dbugs dbyung mdzod/ /dregs dang bag med gzhan nor 'dod pa dang/ /sdig pa rjes 'brel yul la mngon sred pa/ /'di dag srog chags rnam pr lhung dus su/ /bsdams pa med pa'i gnod
198a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i sgo dag yin/ /sbyin las phyir phyogs rnams la nor gyis ci/ /sdang bas dbang byas rnams la thos? pas ci/ /yon tan mchog spangs rnams la gzugs kyis ci/ /tshul khrims btang ba rnams la rigs kyis ci/ /ma ma g.yo ba nyid dag thong
198b1(mdo 'grel): lam nyams grags pa'i zla ba mdzes pa srungs/ /tshul khrims dri med rigs kyi rgyu dag skyongs shig sdig la blo gros yongs mi byed/ /rab 'bar dmyal ba'i me yis 'tshed cing 'khrugs te yi dwags rab tu gdungs pas nyen/ /sdig can 'jig rten pha
198b2(mdo 'grel): rol lam ni nges par nyon mongs dge gis 'khrugs pa'i sa/ /zhes bas bdag sras po'i tshig thos nas/ /mi bzad chags pa'i gdon ni des ma btang/ /rmongs pa'i mun can khron pa'i chu nang du/ /chos kyi nyer bstan nyi ma'i 'od mi 'jug /rab tu 'joms byed
198b3(mdo 'grel): yid bsrub sa bdag gis/ /chom rkun ma bzhin 'phral la gzir gyur te/ /shugs rings ngal zhing 'phrul par brjod byed pas/ /'brel med don gyi cho nge de de smra/ /rnal gnas nyer bstan khyod kyis byed pa 'di/ /'dod pas gzir ba bdag gis 'gal mi thos//
198b4(mdo 'grel): lhag par rab 'bar 'dod pa'i me yi tshogs/ /rgyas pa tshig gis rab tu zhi mi 'gyur/ /yul na bsil ba'i chu rgyun 'brub mod kyang/ /mya ngan thang rnams dag ni gdung bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma shar yang chags pas gzir rnams la/ /phyogs mtshams
198b5(mdo 'grel): rnams ni 'jig rung mun pa yin/ /gdung ba'i bud med bsrungs la chos ci yang/ /gal te brtse ldan khyod la med na ni/ /dam pa rnams kyis gus par bstan pa de/ /med pa la yang chos min ji ltar yod/ /gang blo rnal gnas bsil ba de dag la/ /bde slad
198b6(mdo 'grel): bstan pa chos 'di tshad ma ste/ /zhen pas gzir cing yang dag gdungs rnams la/ /bkag pa'i bya ba la yang spyod pa ci/ /nga nyid kyis ni sdig pa dang por blangs/ /bdag yongs bsrungs pas khyod la chos su 'gyur/ /reg pa ri bong can ltar bsil ba yis//
198b7(mdo 'grel): rgyun tu gdung bas nyen bdag bde bar mdzod/ /gdung ba 'phrog byed zla ba dang ni mi bzad mun pa nyams byed nyi ma dang/ /nyin dang mtshan mor grang ba'i nyon mongs zhi byed me la sdig pa'i 'bras bu ci/ /gdung bas gzir ba bsrung dang mnyam las bzang ba'i chos ni gang
199a1(mdo 'grel): du ci zhig mthong bstan bcos mdza' dag shes pa khyod kyis gang 'di bden par bsal ba nyid du smros/ /yul 'di skye bos spangs shing legs par bsgribs/ /dben pa 'byed pa su yang med pa 'dir/ /rang 'dod du 'jug mtho'i? bas dud?
199a2(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /bud med dar ma skal ldan nyid la 'gyur/ /bud med dga' ma gus yongs su tshim rnams kyi/ /bzhin gyi pad+ma 'gram pa'i 'dab dman zhing/ /mchu nyams lan bu 'khrugs shing rdul gyi ni/ /thigs pas brlan chags skal ldan rnams kyis
199a3(mdo 'grel): mthong/ /bud med ched du chu srin khros pa'i tshogs/ /'jigs rung chu srin 'byung gnas 'jings su 'ga' / /ral gri'i 'khri shing g.yo ba'i rtse ldan pa/ /g.yul ngo dus kyi khar ni gzhan dag 'jug /yun ring nyon mongs khyad par cher gdung bas/ /nor rnams
199a4(mdo 'grel): la ni skyes bu mchog tu 'bad/ /nor 'di yongs 'dzin chos kyi don nyid de/ /chos kyi 'bras bu mchog ni 'dod par brjod/ /rnam pa mang pos de skad smra byed cing/ /'khrugs pa de la gzhon nus rab smras pa/ /ma ma tshogs gsum gtso bo'i 'bras bu ni/ /dge ba'i
199a5(mdo 'grel): lte ba rtsa ba dang bcas chos/ /skye bo med sar sdig pa sbas mi 'gyur/ /'dir ni dbang po snang min mtho ris tshogs/ /grags kyi dngos por gyur pa'i grib mas kyang/ /chung mas bzhin du skye bo thams cad rig/ dben par byas pa'i las 'bras nges par smin//
199a6(mdo 'grel): las rnams 'bras bu rab nyams yong ma yin/ /mun nag dben par dug ni 'thungs pa na/ /srog rnams mi bzad 'phrog pa min nam ci/ /rigs kyi bud med sdig pa'i mtshan mar gyur/ /de la'ang 'jigs rung gzhan gyi bud med 'grogs/ /'thab mo la rmongs ma zheS
199a7(mdo 'grel): mngon sbyar ba'i/ /rang gi chung mar skye gzhan yang mi reg /de ltar don gnyer nyams pas phyir phyogs shing/ /de yis sman pas shin tu gdung gyur te/ khyod kyi mig dregs nges par bdag gis dbros?/ /ces smras sdig can ma de rang gnas song/ /de nas grong khyer rdo
199b1(mdo 'grel): 'jog ces par ni/ /sa bdag glang po'i rna ba zhes bya ba/ /'dul du gzhon nu dpung gi rdul tshub tshogs/ /nyi ma phan byed ldan par rgyal pos btang/ /grong der des phyin glang po'i mun pa yis/ /ma lus phyogs bzung yongs su bskor te gnas/ /glang po dpa' sgra chu gter
199b2(mdo 'grel): bskyod pa ltar/ /zab pas srid pa rnams gnyis byed pa bzhin/ /de nas rdo 'jog rgyal pos rgyal sras la/ /spyi bos phyag 'tshal rab tu dang bar byas/ /glang po rta dang rin chen dag gis mchod/ /blo ldan rang gis rang gi rgyal sar bos/ /der ni de yis dga' ba'i
199b3(mdo 'grel): rim gro yis/ /gus pas nye bar bsten cing rgyal sras de/ /sprin tshogs gzhon nu gsal bar rab rgyas pas/ /dri mar byas pa'i nyin rnams rab tu gnas/ /skabs der bu yi bzhin ras padmo ngag /blta bar yid la rab tu 'dod pa yis/ /sa bdag lto bar rtsa ba
199b4(mdo 'grel): bcings pa'i nad/ /byung bar gyur te bsams pas bcings las bzhin/ /sna tshogs sman bsam bsam gtan sgrub byed cing/ /nad bsos min par rtog pa'i rnal 'byor dang/ /the tshom gyis ni bzhin log mthong gyur pa'i/ /sman pas pho brang khang par rab tu bskor
199b5(mdo 'grel): mya ngan 'jigs pas bzhin du dril chung ste/ /smra bcang du gnas btsun mo'i tshogs rnams ni/ /ri? mor bris pa'i rnam pa ngang mtshungs la/ /rten pa'i g.yo med mig gis lta bar byed/ /dal bu ngal bur rnga yab 'dab ma ni/ /nye 'khor mdzes pa'i lag pas rnam
199b6(mdo 'grel): bskyod pa/ /mya ngan gyis 'khrugs shugs rings bsten pa yis/ /yongs su dkar ba lta bu g.yob pa de/ /chu grang ldan pa'i bum par mig gtad cing/ /ske ba'i btung ba dag la zhen log bskyed/ /gnyid ni dgag pa'i khro ba rab rdzogs shing/ /phan pa'i nyer bstan dag la
199b7(mdo 'grel): chags bral zhugs/ /zhe sdang bcas pa'i skabs thob lus la yang/ /smad 'os rang bzhin chags bral gyis smod cing/ /btsun mo'i nu ma'i bar du mgo bzhag pa'i/ /skad gdangs zhan pas sa bdag gis smras pa/ /rig byed rdzogs pa'i sman pas ding yang ci/ /gdung bskyed
200a1(mdo 'grel): byed bden med spyad kyis ci/ /bden med las kyis yongs su gzir ba rnams/ /gso byed chos kyi nyer bstan la chags yin/ /lus ni gnod pa'i sar song spyad mi 'os/ /longs spyod tshogs kyid zug rngu lta bur spyod/ /long pa'i chung ma mdzes?
200a2(mdo 'grel): sdug ldan pa bzhin/ /spyod spangs dpal ni dmod pa stug po nyid/ /me dag shin tu dman yang rgyun tu ni/ /rab 'bar mya ngan me yis sreg byed cing/ /gdung ba rgyas kyang rengs dang mi 'bral ba'i/ /ring po'i nad ldan ma yin srog song bde/ /sdig pa rab bsgribS
200a3(mdo 'grel): nang du yongs gnas dang/ /dman pa brnyas shing rtsod pa rjes 'brel dang/ /nad kyis bstan par zil mnan smad pa dang/ /rab 'bar me yis gdung ba zhi bar 'gyur/ /las ngan rtse dga' nyon mongs rang bzhin 'di/ /rnam par bkra ba'i gzugs ni bzlog pa
200a4(mdo 'grel): ste/ /nad med bsten gang dbul bas sdug bsngal zhing/ /phun tshogs ldan gang rtag tu nad can no/ /rnam dpyod rgyas pa'i blo dang bral ba'i lus can rnams kyi skye ba 'bras med de/ /gang gis blo gros thos pas rgyan gyi sgrub byed rab 'bar byas pa min pa
200a5(mdo 'grel): smad/ /gang gi dpal gyis dbul ba nyid min ma gyur thos pa rgya che de yis ci/ /shin tu nad med nyid kyis gang zhig spyod med dpal gyi rnam 'phrul rgyas pas ci/ /bdag gis gzhon nu skye dgu dga' ba ni/ /rdo 'jog tu bskos myur du dgug par gyis/ /me long
200a6(mdo 'grel): la bzhin dri med legs spyod zum/ /de la rang gi rgyal srid 'phos pa blta'i/ /nga nyid gus pas dbu rgyan bcings byas shing/ /gdugs dkar mchog ni yang dag gtad pa de/ /grong bas nga nyid bsod nams bcud len gyis/ /gzhon nu nyid thob bzhin du lta gyur
200a7(mdo 'grel): cig/ ces pa mi yi dbang pos smras pa de/ /mtshungs par rab zhugs 'jigs dang mya ngan dang/ /dman dang phrag dog rmongs pas yongs khengs pa'i/ /btsun mo dkar rgyal srung bas thos nas smras/ /sa skyong khyod ni nad med bdag gis bgyi/ /bdag gis rigS
200b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i khyad par blta bar mdzod/ /rang gi slob? don nor? nyams skye bo rnams/ /brlag slad tshe stan sman pa ngan pa song/ /rtag tu brlag? brtson? sman pa rig byed bral/ /phan tshun chags bral thos dregs snyems pa dang/ /de nyid shes smod mi mkhas rjes smra bas/ /nyin zhag
200b2(mdo 'grel): dang ni nad pa 'phen par byed /rang gi bu la'ang rgyal srid mi gtad de/ /rgyal po gzhan la yod kun dga' skyed byed/ /phun sum tshogs pa btang na skad cig gis/ /rgud pa stong phrag me yis gdung bar byed/ /'phral la bu la zur phud bkod gyur cing/ /de dus rje ro'i?
200b3(mdo 'grel): gus pas nyams gyur pa'i/ /rgyal po'i bka' ni dud pa min rnams kyis/ /cha yis gcod cing rtswa dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /zhes pas sa dbang brtan pa bsgrubs nas ni/ /khang nang de nas de ni phyi rol song/ /brdzi de mtshungs nad kyi gzing ba zhig /btsal nas dben
200b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i gnas su bos byas te/ /gdug pa'i bsam pas 'bangs mo gdug pa'i blos/ /de bsad lte ba'i mdzod ni rab bye ste/ /brtse bas dman des de yi rgyu mar ni/ /rnam 'gyur rtsub mo'i srin bu chags pa mthong/ /gyen du rab rgyu mgyogs par thur du yang/ /gir? ba spro
200b5(mdo 'grel): byed de mthong bsang phyir des/ /byi dang ga sbyar shing kun pi pi ling/ /pho ba ris sogs sde tshan de la blugs/ /mi bzang 'gyur byed dug ldan gang dag ste/ /de des srin bu don srog ma gtang/ /sgog skya'i rtsa ba dag ni gtubs pa yis/ /reg pa tsam las rab tu zhig par
200b6(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /thams mchog rnyed nas rab tu dga' ba de/ /de nas mi yi bdag po'i drung song ste/ /sgog skya legs par bcad pa byin pa yis/ /skad cig gis ni de lus bsos par byas/ /gang la dug gi nus pas cang yod min/ /gng la mtshon gyis kyang ni myur mi phugs//
200b7(mdo 'grel): gang la me ni spro nyams le lo can/ /de la yang ni bud med brtan nyams min/ /de nas sa bdag byas shes mdza' ba yi/ /'ching bas blo gros bcings pas de la ni/ /'tsho ba thob ba'i dga' bas mchog dag byin/ /de yis nyin zhag bdun du rgyal bsrid blangs/ /
201a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal srid thob nas sa skyong bya ba ni/ /thams cad rang dbang nyid kyis byed par zhugs/ /rdo 'jog dbang po la ni spring yig dag/ rgya ldan rin chen mdzes pa dang bcas sbrings/ /de nas mi bdag bkas? mtshan spring yig de/ /dul zhing rab tu dud
201a2(mdo 'grel): pas mchod de blangs/ /rdo 'jog bdag po rang gi gsal ba yi/ /yi ges mtshan pa'i don ni rab tu bklags/ /swa sti/ grong khyer pA Ta lI pu tra las mtshungs pa med pa'i g.yul la dpa' ba yang dag par thob pa/ rgya mtsho mdza' dag gi mtshams su rab tu
201a3(mdo 'grel): 'phro zhing mi zhan la dri ma dang bral ba'i grags pa'i tshogs las bsgrubs pa'i du ku la'i ras dkar pos nor 'dzin gyi bu mo la longs spyod par bya ba skal ba bzang po nyid kyi snyems pa byin pa/ dgra bo'i gzi byin nyams par byed cing mi dga' ba rnams kyi
201a4(mdo 'grel): dga' ma'i rtse dga' i do? mod pa bzhin du gyur pa/ dri ma med pa'i nor bu'i rkang stegs mdza' yas pa'i rgyal phran gyis rab tu btud pa'i bzhin gyis pad+ma'i gzugs brnyan gyi snod gcig tu byas pa legs byas dge ba'i pad mo rnam par rgyas par byed pa'i
201a5(mdo 'grel): nyin mo'i dbang phyug rtul pod pa dang brtson 'grus dang spro ba chen po rab tu rgyas pa'i nags tshal gyi gdong lnga pa dpal lha mya ngan med pas rdo 'jog gyi dbang po dpal glang po'i rna ba la yang dag par rtogs par byed pa 'di lta ste/ bdag gi bu'i bzhin dang
201a6(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i sgra/ khrel med cing ngan pa'i spyod pa la byams la yongs su skrag pa'i spyod ba can/ mi gtsang zhing bstan bcos la sdang ba/ mig gi 'dab brgya ba'i chung ma la mngon par sred pa'i dug gi snod du byed pa/ sdig pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs dang lang
201a7(mdo 'grel): tshe dang spro ba dang rtul phod ba dang ldan pa skye bo mi'i lag 'gro 'di'i mig nor bu rab tu byung ste gos dang bral bar bskrad par mdzod cig ces pa bdag gi 'bad pas don du gnyer pa'o/ /spring yig don 'dir bdag rnam dpyad nas/ /brtse ldan brtse bas rnam par 'gems
201b1(mdo 'grel): byed cing/ /gzhon nu la mdza' mi bdag la 'jigs pas/ /mi bdag yod ni khyogs la bteg par gyur/ /mchims 'khrugs shing sa la lte ba de/ /gzhon nu de ? gnas pas mthong gyur nas/ /'di dag ci zhes the tshom gyis gzir gyur/ /spring yig rang gis yang
201b2(mdo 'grel): dag blangs nas bltas/ /rdzun gyis rab bskrun cher khros bla ma'i bka' / /gzung dka' bzod par dka' ba de? mthong bas/ /mi bzad gdung tha rgyas ba de la yang/ /bstan pa'i spyod tshul g.yo med de yis bsam/ /re zhig pha yi bzhed 'di 'gong mi bya/ /de khros
201b3(mdo 'grel): 'jigs las mi bdag 'di yang bsrung/ /rgyal po rdzun gyis gnod pa khros mod kyang/ /dag pa brjod pas rab tu dang mi 'gyur/ /mig ni yongs btang bde slad yab kyi ni/ /khro ba'i? me? gdung rab zhi bdag gis bya/ /sa bdag 'di yang de yi bka' bcag las//
201b4(mdo 'grel): skyes pa'i gdung brgyas par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi brtan mi gtsang rang bzhin lus dag la/ /mig ni chu yi thigs pa'i rnam 'gyur gzugs/ /rtsa? sgron gzugs brnyan skad cig rab gsal ba/ /de la nges par yon tan ci zhig gnas/ /gang zhig blta thob la chags
201b5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten na/ /shin tu rab 'bang mig ni yang dag bsrung/ /de dag gzugs de rab g.yo mig 'phrul dang/ /rmi lam phreng thog rten med ri mo'o/ /yun ring 'di spyad mi dbang sras po yis/ /rgyal po de ni bzhed min phyir phyogs shing/ /skye bo mchi mar bcas pas
201b6(mdo 'grel): bzlog gyur kyang/ /der ni mig dag nyams par byed du bcug/ gdug pa'i skyes bu nor la brkam pa yis/ /gser byin mig ni rab tu phyung ba des/ /mi zlog glang pos chu skyes tshogs bcom pa'i/ /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas rnam par mtshungs pa thob/ /de yi mdza' bos
201b7(mdo 'grel): gser gyi phreng ldan ma/ /rgyal bar sbyor tshe lhan cig der 'ongs pas/ /gnas der mngon phyogs mig ni rnam nyams de/ /mthong ba nyid ni rmongs pas bcom nas 'gyel/ /'du shes thob cing rgya che rab gdung ba/ /mig mdzes rtse dga' la chags de la ni/ /mi rtag
202a1(mdo 'grel): nyid bsams bden pa mthong gyur cing/ /rgyun zhugs 'bras thob brtan pa des smras pa/ /mdzes ma 'khrugs pa nyid las brtan pa bsten/ /rmongs dang dman rgyas skrag par ma byed cig/ srog chags rnams kyis rang las 'bras bu ni//
202a2(mdo 'grel): 'jigs ma nges par spyad par bya ba yin/ /da ni dben par long bang nyid 'gro/ /khyod kyis nyon mongs mi bzad gnyen khab bsten/ /skal bzang longs spyod 'bral ba'i snying po ni/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin mya ngan yong mi bya/ /zhes smra de la 'bral ba'i 'jigs
202a3(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /yongs 'dar lus can btsun mos rab smras pa/ /rang sems sdug bsngal la bcongs nu ma la/ /mig sman gyis sngo mchims 'bri ba bzhin/ /bdag ni rje yi sras khyod yong mi gtong/ /gang zhig rgud tshe rang bdag gzugs gzhan gyur/ /rgyan dang
202a4(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims bzhin du gtong ba 'di/ /bud med rnams kyi rigs 'os brtul zhugs min/ /dag pa'i brtul zhugs mdza' slad nor ldan la/ /smad 'tshong rnams kyang 'bad nas sten par byed/ /bdag po rgud gyur dag rnams lhag par mdza' / /skye bo che rnams
202a5(mdo 'grel): slong bdag la bzhin/ /mig ni long ba'i rab mchog 'khar ba ste/ /rgud pa'i gdung bas ngal la grib gsil yin/ /gnas skabs skyes bu rnams kyi mi bzad la/ /grogs ni chung ma dang mtshungs yod ma yin/ /de ltar 'bad pas don gnyer rgyal po'i
202a6(mdo 'grel): bu/ /stor g.yogs h+rul po tsam lhag brtan pa dang/ /zhabs zung la btags chung ma de dang yang/ /lhan cig nyid du dal gyi song bar gyur/ /rgyud mangs spred? mkhas glu snyan len mkhas des/ /dang por de tshe lam du 'tsho ba thob/ /rgud na bsod nams
202a7(mdo 'grel): 'byor na rtse 'jo yis/ /sgyu rtsal mtshungs pa'i nor ni mi la med/ /bung ba'i phreng ba myos pa'i sgra lta bu/ /rgyud mangs sgra snyan rna ba'i bdud rtse yis/ /bran bzhin bsod snyoms slong ce? chung ma dang/ /lhan cig khyim rnags su zhugs glu blangs pa/ /skye bo bla ma
202b1(mdo 'grel): khros pas rab bskrun sgra gcan gyi ni mthu yis nyi ma rnam par nyams byas shing/ /bden med yongs su smra pa'i rnam par bslad pa nag phyogs nyin gyis spyod pa'i zla ba zad par byas/ /yon tan ldan pa'i tshogs la sun 'byin lhung bas yon tan mchog gi rin
202b2(mdo 'grel): chen 'od kyis dbul bar gyur/ /rab mang nyes byas yongs su smin pa'i rlung gis bsnun pas mig gi sgron ma dag dang bral gyur ba/ /srid pa'i chu 'dzin che la glog bzhin shin tu g.yo ba'i dpal gyi rnam bdag dang bral rnams la/ /bsod nams dag gis slar yang
202b3(mdo 'grel): dam chos dran par gyur pa'i snang ba gsar pa rab tu spro bar byed/ /rgyu rtsal dang ldan mig gi bden pa de/ /glu len slong zhing 'tsho bas dus bzlas nas/ /yab kyi grong khyer pra tra li pu trar/ /'khar ba la bzhin chung mar brten te song/ /ring ba'i sdug bsngal lam
202b4(mdo 'grel): gyis lus dman zhing/ /bzhin pad mdog gis grang dang tshab 'thungs/ /gzhon nu mdzes ma dang 'grogs de mthong nas/ /skye bos yid srubs dmod pas nyams par shes/ /dal gyis rgyal po'i nags tshal phreng nye bar/ /phyin zhing skad cig ngal so don gnyer de//
202b5(mdo 'grel): rtsub mor smra byed skyed tshal skyong rnams kyis/ /bkra mi shis phyir rab tu bkag gyur pa/ /gnas med gnas ni tshol bar byed pa de/ /mi bdag gi ni glang po'i gnas su zhugs/ /rgyud mangs rtsed mo la gus dge mtshan gyis/ /glang po skyong bdag gis go skabs
202b6(mdo 'grel): byin/ /der ni long ba de mthong shes gyur pa'i/ /glang po'i dbang pos gdong ni yongs bskor zhing/ /de la legs 'ongs 'dri bzhin sgra chen bsgrags/ /gtsug ldan rtse ba'i tshogs kyis gar dag phul/ /de ni glang po'i sgra yis mi g.yo zhing/ /'khrul pa med
202b7(mdo 'grel): mthong lag ldan bdag po yis/ /kye ma snying stobs rgya mtsho rab mi 'dar/ /rgyal rigs bzang po 'di ni su zhes smras/ /glang por mngon phyogs gser gyi phreng ldan ma/ /rnal 'byor mngon par khengs pa dran gyur te/ /'phral la mchi ma 'dzag cing shugs ring bas
203a1(mdo 'grel): khyo yi zhabs dag nyed cing rab smras pa/ /glang po'i sgra yis lag ldan bdag po khyod kyi mdun na gang/ /sprin gyi bsam pas g.yo ldan gtsug phud can ni gar rab byed/ /rma bya 'di dag gzhon nu'i rma bya'i rigs las 'khrungs pa ste//
203a2(mdo 'grel): tshogs kyi bdag pos sgra bsgrags tshe yang rnam par 'gyur ba med/ /de nas chags ldan g.yo ba'i thun mtshams ni/ /skyon la mngon phyogs zhe sdang ldan zhing 'ongs/ /mig ldan 'tsho bar gyur ba'i nyi ma bcom/ /skye bo mun pa rnam pa rgyas par bsgrubs//
203a3(mdo 'grel): padmo 'byung gnas chu skyes bzhin zum pa/ /phun tshogs bral zhing dman pa mthong gyur nas/ /bung ba'i phreng ba mya ngan zil gyis gnon/ /nges par myong bya'i rang bzhin glur len bzhin/ /kun gsal nor bu'i sgron ma gcig pu nyid/ /nyi ma 'das tshe mar me
203a4(mdo 'grel): stong 'bum gyis/ /nyin mo'i snang ba'i cha la mtshungs ma gyur/ /gang phyir chen po'i gzi byin kun las lhag/ rgyal khang nor bu gser gyi ba gam can/ /rab gsal de ni mun la rab mdzes te/ /bdag po rgud tshe gus pas phan pa nyid/ /sgrub byed
203a5(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims rgyan ldan dag pa bzhin/ /rab rib rab rgyas gtso bo nyid thob des/ /ma lus 'jig rten snang ba med byas nas/ /zla ba 'char rtsem 'jigs pas zil mnan te/ /dal bu yis ni yib pa bzhin du gyur/ /de nas nag po'i mtshan ma'i ri mo ni//
203a6(mdo 'grel): phrin gyi dang tshul yig preng rab bkod pa/ /ku mud can dga' i legs byas bsil zer can/ /padmo'i 'byung gnas dpal 'phrog spring yig byung/ /bdud rtsi'i zer dkar yid 'ong pad rtsa yi/ /'khri shing myu gu gsar dbyibs 'od ris kyis/ /'o ma'i
203a7(mdo 'grel): 'od ldan mdzes pa'i gos dkar gyis/ /grags pas bzhin du thams cad khyab par byas/ /de nas mtshan mo'i lang tsho nyams gyur cing/ /zla ba mkha' las dal gyi babs pa'i tshe/ /skyo ngas nyams pas rnam par gnyid pa yi/ /gzhon nu la ni
203b1(mdo 'grel): glang po 'dzin pas smras/ /dri za can longs mi 'am ci rnams kyis/ /mdzes ma bzhin 'di pad du rab bkod nas/ /sen mo btab bskyod yid 'ong snyan sgrogs shing/ /glu dang rgyud mngas 'ga' zhig mi len nam/ /zhes smra rgyags shing 'chal? ba de dag gis//
203b2(mdo 'grel): rjes bskul ngan zhing gnyid kyis gzer gyur pa/ /dman pa'i tshig gis rab gdungs yid byung bas/ /rgyud mangs blangs nas yud tsam rab bsams pa/ /kye ma stag gi tshogs ni brtse med dag/ khrag la snom zhing nye bar lhags pa dang/ /rgyal po'i 'bangs ni
203b3(mdo 'grel): myos pa'i tshogs bcas te/ /smod rtsub rjod pas bzung ba 'tsho ma yin/ /nga rgyal nyams ? ngo tsha sgrub par byed/ /bde ba 'joms byed gdung ba rgyas par byed/ /mi bzang sdug bsngal rgud pa skyed byed pa/ /dman pa bsten pa dang mtshungs mya ngan med/ /dman
