203b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshig de yang yang des bsams nas/ /smad pa'i gdung ba tsha ba'i mes reg bas/ /shugs phyung dus ni 'phang bar mngon 'dod pas/ /ngal gyis rgyud mangs dag ni sbreng zhing blangs/ /khengs pa rab 'joms dregs dang nor nyams bde blag tu ni nye bar
203b5(mdo 'grel): rgod/ /tshul lugs min dang du ba'i spyod dang 'byed par byed dang skyon bcas dang/ /gnad du rig pa'i gdung ba mi bzang nyon mongs zug rdu ltar spyod pas/ /kye ma 'khor ba dag ni mi bsrun tshul gyis sbyar ba'i rtse dga' byed/ /rlung gis rnam bskyod 'khri
203b6(mdo 'grel): shing rab tu g.yo ba'i 'dab rtse ltar mi brtan/ /srid pa 'khor bas kye ma skyes bu rnams la rmongs pa rab brtan byed/ /chus gang skye bo'i sprin tshogs yang dag 'dus pas rab brtsams glag gi ni/ /rtse dga' i nyams ldan dpal 'byor 'di dag de
203b7(mdo 'grel): la yang ni lhag par g.yo/ /skyes bu rnams kyi rgud pa mdza' dag bsrung ba'i rin chen tshul khrims ni/ /rab gsal bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin dri med gal te cha yang ma nyams na/ /'byor pa dang bral nyon mongs kyis nyen 'dren byed ma tshang 'phye bo dang//
204a1(mdo 'grel): lkug par bde ba'i mjug tu g.yang sa chen por lhung yang rnam par mdzes/ /chu dang thang yang dbyug pas rig cing mdza' dag reg pa 'am dris dag gis rtogs la/ /blo gros kyis ni bgrod dka' i lam kun rig cing thos nas gzhan
204a2(mdo 'grel): du bdag 'gro ste/ /rmongs pas long zhing tshig pa'i skye bo 'di dag yid brtan dbus su chags gyur pa'i/ /'jigs rung dmyal ba'i nyon mongs mi shes se zhes long bas rab mang co 'dri bzhin/ /de ltar bdag nyid spyod ba'i rjes mthun 'jug/
204a3(mdo 'grel): yid 'ong nyams ldan de yis glu slangs tshe/ /mtshan mo'i 'jug tu sa bdag khang bzang na/ /gzims pa 'phral la sad nas rab tu bsams/ /rtag tu rmi lam ngan pa mthong nyid kyis/ /dogs pa'i chu bos bdag ni rab tu 'khrugs/ /gzhon nu rdo
204a4(mdo 'grel): 'jog na gnas da lta yang/ /bdag la spring yig ci phyir yod mi spring/ /rtag tu mi brjed nye ba'i bzhin ras la/ /mngon phyogs de ni nga nyid brjed dam ci/ /nges par yun ring bral bas skye bo ni/ /mdza' ba'i rjes su 'ching ba lhud par 'gyur/ /gam
204a5(mdo 'grel): bkas bcings glu yi sgra 'di yang/ /rgyud mangs dbyangs snyan gyis mtshan rab gsal ba/ /de yi nyid mtshungs mnyan pa'i rjes mthun pa/ /dri za'i 'jig rten las bzhin bdag gis thos/ /re zhig glu snyan 'di ni de nyid kyi/ /ci slad de yib 'di ci yong mi shes//
204a6(mdo 'grel): skad cig de ltar rnam bsams rgyal po yis/ /nyug rum pa btang bu ni de nas bos/ /ring nas mig dral de ni 'ong ba dag/ mtsho skyes dpal dang bral ba bzhin mthong nas/ /chung mar bcas pa'i bu ni yongs shes te/ /sa yi bdag po rmongs pas bcom nas
204a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyel/ /kha ba'i zer ba'i? thigs 'dra chus reg pas/ /dal gyi 'du shes thob pa'i mi bdag des/ /gzhon nu nye par 'ongs pa phang par ni/ /yang dag bkod nas yun ring mya ngan byas/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten mig spro gyi hud pu/ /sdug bsngal skabs 'di
204b1(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis ci slad bsten/ /lha yi mdzes ma rmongs byed khyod kyi ni/ /mig ni chu skyes zung de gang du song/ /zab mo'i sa gzhi yon tan rin chen mdzod/ /snying stobs phung po dbyangs can grogs khyod las/ /kha bas bcom pa'i chu skyes tshal las bzhin/ /rnam 'phrul
204b2(mdo 'grel): sa gzhi dpal de gang du song/ /gang du gzugs de mi bzad long 'di gar/ /'byor de gang du gang du skabs na 'di/ /bdag snying mi 'gas 'di la su zhig gis/ /rdo rje'i man ngag byin pa yong mi shes/ /khyod 'byor rjes 'brang skye bo de gang du/ /khyod kyi chung ma g.yo
204b3(mdo 'grel): med gcig pu 'di/ /sdug kyang dam pa brtan pa'i spyod tshul bzhin/ /rigs kyi rjes mthun 'khor gyi lhag mar gyur/ /zhes pa mchi ma'i rgyun gyis yi ge nyams/ /tshe de smra ba de yi tshig thos nas/ /de yi phang las myur du sar babs te/ /gzhon nu brtan
204b4(mdo 'grel): pas de la btud nas smras/ /sa yi brgya byin mya ngan rnam par thong/ /mya ngan dag gis zil mnan brtan pa min/ /mtho dang dma' rnams brlag slad nges par ni/ /myong bya'i rang bzhin 'di ni mel tshe byed/ /mi rnams dbang phyug ngo mtshar bde ba yi/ /rna rgyan
204b5(mdo 'grel): can dang dpal mdzes thig le can/ /lus kyang mthar byed rtse ba'i las rnams kyis/ /sbrul pas phyogs pa skad cig nyid kyis 'gro/ /gal te dngos med nyams myong srid pa 'dir/ /dngos tshogs rang bzhin bden par gyur pa na/ /thub pa 'di dag longs
204b6(mdo 'grel): spyod yongs btang nas/ /nges par dben pa dag tu gnas mi byed/ /ces smra de la rgud ba'i rgyu mtshan ni/ /rgyal po mya ngan ldan pas yang yang dris/ /de la dal gyis spring yig dang 'brel pa'i/ /rang gi mig ni rnam par nyams tshul bshad/ /spyod ngan spyod pa
204b7(mdo 'grel): rnams la'ang ma spyad pa'i/ /gtum pa'i spyod tshul mi bzang de thos nas/ /sta re rnon bos rtsa ba yongs bcad pa'i/ /yal 'dab can bzhin 'dzin byed yu ba 'gyel/ /'du shes thob des skar rgyal srung ba yis/ /bkod pa'i sbyor ba gya gyu de bsams nas//? 
205a1(mdo 'grel): de yi chad pha bud med bsod pa yi/ /sdig la'ang chos la gus pas bzhin brtson gyur/ gdug pa'i rnam pa gnod pa rgya che ba/ de la lan sbyor rab tu brtson pa de/ rang las smin pas bzod dka' i sdug bsngal dang/ ldan bar
205a2(mdo 'grel): smra ba'i gzhon nus rab tu bzlog /sa bdag gdung bas gzir zhing mya ngan dang/ gro bas tshig pas de la rab smras pa/ gdug pa la chags 'phags min gtum mo 'di/ khyod ni rmongs las yongs su srung dam ci/ sdang bar sbyor dang mdza' bas bcings
205a3(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /mtshungs pa'i yid can gang de mi'am ci/ gang la gnod la khro ba'i cha med pa/ de la phan la drin yang ji ltar yod/ ces pa rab smra shugs 'byin gzir ba yi/ yab la gzhon nu brtan pas rab smras pa/ rgyal po bdag la sdug bsngal cha 'ga' 
205a4(mdo 'grel): med/ /mi bzad gnod la'ang khro ba'i gdung ba min/ mig dag rang gi lag gis phyung ba bzhin/ gal te mal bdag yid rab dang na/ bden pa de yis re zhig mig gnyis ni/ sngon bzhin 'phral la yang dag 'byung bar shog /ces brjod tsam la de yi dus
205a5(mdo 'grel): nyid na/ mi bdag bu yis spyan ni mtsho skyes zung/ 'jig rten bden pa'i brtul zhugs yid ches byed/ dpal mo rnam par chags byed rab tu byung/ 'dren byed zung gis rnam par mdzes gyur cing/ skya dgu rnams ni bde dang spro byed pa'i/ bu de rgyal tshab las
205a6(mdo 'grel): phyir phyogs shes nas/ mi bdag de yis phun tshogs rnams la bskos/ de nas sa bdag gis ni btsun mo la/ /drag po'i gnod la mtshungs pa'i lan bsgrubs bzhin/ /rdo 'jog dbang po la yang khro ba'i me/ bzod dka' de yi bzod pas rab tu btang/
205a7(mdo 'grel): dge mtshan de las dge slong tshogs kyis dris/ dge 'dun gnas brtan mkhas pa des smras pa/ sa skyong bu 'di skye ba gzhan la ni/ ka shi grong khyer dag tu rngon par gyur /de yis gangs ldan ngos kyi phugs zhugs pa'i/ ri dwags lnga brgya dag ni thob
205b1(mdo 'grel): gyur nas/ mig bdag phyung nas long bar rab bsgrubs te/ ji ltar nye bar mkho ba rim gyis bsad/ de nas skye gzhan la yang tshong dpon bu/ /mug d+ha zhes 'di byis pa rab rmongs las/ mchod rten gyi ni rgyal ba'i sku gzugs kyi/ /bzhin ras pad+ma mtshon gyis mig med byas//
205b2(mdo 'grel): 'du shes skyes des de yi spyan zung dag in+d+ra nI la'i rang bzhin gsar du bsgrubs/ de nas skye ba gzhan la'ang mchod rten ni/ /zhig pa gso dang mchod pa dag kyang byas/ /nags su ri dwags rnams kyi mig phrogs shing/ byis pas mchod rten sku gzugs
205b3(mdo 'grel): spyan phyis pas/ rgyal po'i bu 'dis skye ba gzhan rnams dang/ da lta mig dag rnam par nyams pa thob/ rin chen mig ldan sku gzugs byas pa yis/ rnam par nyams pa'i mig ni slar yang thob/ mchod rten zhig pa rab tu rgyas byas pas/ rab tu dang ldan
205b4(mdo 'grel): mdzes pa'i rang bzhin gyur/ rgyun zhugs 'bras bu rab 'jug dri ma dang bral snang ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni/ chags bral rab 'bar bden pa mthong ba'i sgrub byed dag la gnas pa'i dbang gyur thob/ dus kyis yang dag bsod nams dbang las dal gyis rdzogs
205b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ zhes pa gnas brtan gyis gsungs dge slong tshogs kyis thos nas ya mtshan ldan par gyur/ ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las ku nA la'i rtogs
205b6(mdo 'grel): pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //'dir ni mi rnams lus ngag nyon mongs phung pos rab tu gdud/ 'jig rten pha rol tu yang mi bzad dmyal ba'i me yis sreg/ skyabs 'gro'i bsod nams dang ni bslab pa'i gnas dag thob rnams
205b7(mdo 'grel): kyi/ /lus la nam yang sdug bsngal dag gis sreg pa'i mthu yod min/ /rgya mtsho'i mthar ni nor zhes pa'i/ klu ni gnyen mang ldan pa byung/ gdengs ka'i rin chen rab 'bar gyis/ snang bas sngon med nyin mo byas/ de yi khang par nyin mtshan du/ /bye tshan dag ni
206a1(mdo 'grel): bab gyur te/ /gang gis lag 'gro rnams kyi lus/ /gdung ba drag pos nyen par gyur/ nor bzang zhes bya gces pa'i bu/ rang bzhin nyid kyis rab gzhon pa/ bye mas yongs su gzir gyur bas/ /nam zhig de la rab tu dris//
206a2(mdo 'grel): yab cig bye ma tsha ba 'dis/ bdag cag ci slad gdud par byed/ /sngags dang rtsa ba'i sbyor ba dag/ ci yis nye bar zhi bar gyur/ 'ga' zhig bdag las lhag pa dang/ gzhan ni bdag las dman pa yi/ /klu rnams rgya mtsho 'di na gnas/ /yu nyid sdug bsngal
206a3(mdo 'grel): gyis gzir ci/ zhes pa bu yis dris de la/ blo gros chen po des smras bu /ji ltar gdengs can gzhan gyis chos/ shes pa de ltar yu cag min/ tshos gyi nyer bstan gyis dag pa/ zhi zhing bden par smra rnams la/ nges par nye par gdung gyur pa//
206a4(mdo 'grel): lus la ma yin yid la'ang min/ sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs zhes pa/ skyabs 'os bsod nams dkon mchog ni/ /gsum la skyabs song mkhas pa gang/ de la yongs gdung reg mi byed/ gang gis nyon mongs rab zhi ba'i/ bslab pa'i gnas
206a5(mdo 'grel): rnams thob gyur cing/ bdud rtsis bran pa de dag la/ sdig gdung 'jigs pa gang la yod/ shAkya thub pa 'jig rten gyis/ nyon mongs thams cad rab zhi'i gnyen/ rgyal ba rgyal byed tshal gnas pa/ mnyan yod na ni bcom ldan yod/ snying rje
206a6(mdo 'grel): zla ba'i 'od bskyed de/ sems dpa' ltar dkar man dag gi/ 'od zer tshogs kyis 'gro gsum du/ /bdud rtsi'i char pa mngon par 'bebs/ gang zhig rnam par ma thul bas/ bslab pa'i gnas thob mi srung pa/ /de dag dmyal bar mi bzang pa'i//
206a7(mdo 'grel): gdung ba drag pos brlag par 'gyur/ /zhes pa pha dang ma yi yang/ tshig dag thos nas lag 'gro ni/ me tog mchog dag yongs gzung nas/ /dag pa'i rgyal byed tshal du song/ chog shes sgor ni mngon phyogs des/ bde bar gshegs pa'i
206b1(mdo 'grel): gnas phyin te/ /der ni chos dag nyan pa la/ tshogs pa'i 'khor dag mthong bar 'gyur/ /bzhin ras mdzes shing spyan yangs pa/ /zla ba nya dang bad tshal dag/ 'grogs pa bzhin du bde ster ba'i/ /rgyal ba der ni mthong bar gyur/ /nye bar ston byed mchu yis
206b2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /chags ldan rnams kyi dmar ba nyid/ /rab rgyas dman pa nyid byas shing/ /gsal bar zil gyis gnon pa bzhin/ rgyan dang bral ba'i mdzes sdug gis/ /rna ba'i zhags pa rab brgyan cing/ /sgrib pa dang bral stong pa nyid/ /rab tu rgyas pa ston pa
206b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /dpung pa chos kyis gnyis 'thung lags/ /sbyin pas mdzes pa rnam par 'dzin/ nus mthu'i khang pa dag gi ni/ ka ba gser gyi rang bzhin bzhin/ chos gos rgyan dang ldan pa yis/ /zhabs kyi grib ma spro byed pa/ /sa gzhi rtogs pa thob pa
206b4(mdo 'grel): la/ /padmo grogs rnams kyis bsgrubs bzhin/ /lus kyis mdzes pa rgyas pa ni/ /spyan gyis bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pas/ /dam pa rnams kyi? 'khor ba yi/ mya ngan yongs gdung bzlog pa bzhin/ de mthong nyid na klu yi bu/ yongs su gdung ba gtang
206b5(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid che rnams mthong ba nyid/ gdung ba'i skyon kun zhi bar byed/ snyim pa me tog gis gang ba/ de la gtor nas des phyag 'tshal/ de yi zhabs pad reg pa yis/ /'phral la bsil ba nyid du gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ni/ /bslab
206b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i gnas thob mkhas pa nges/ /thal mo sbyar nas de la ni/ /ji srid 'tsho bar lhag gnas byas/ /de la bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa/ /thams cad rjes su bzung bya la/ /gcig nyid kho na'i lhag gnas ni/ ji srid 'tsho ba ji ltar 'os/ /gus la dgyes
206b7(mdo 'grel): pas de brjod nas/ /de la brtson pas bcom ldan des/ /gdengs can rnam par brtag pa ni/ yongs rdzogs mdzad cing dal gyis chas/ /dge slong tshogs kyi sna drangs nas/ /rim gyis byon pa de la ni/ klu yis mthu la gnas dang gnas/ mtho ris lta bur mdzes pa
207a1(mdo 'grel): bsgrub/ rin chen gser 'od bkra ba yi/ mchog gi skyed tshal mdzes pa dang/ longs spyod 'dzin pas 'brel pa yis/ 'bangs dang 'bangs mo'i tshogs rgyas dang/ ga bur tsan dan rgya che yi/ do shal 'phyang bas brgyan pa yi/
207a2(mdo 'grel): gnas dang gnas su gtsug lag khang/ bcom ldan 'das la de yis byas/ de nas ka lan dka' i gnas/ zhes pa 'od ma'i tshal du phyin/ /de yis longs spyod tshogs kun gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas/ der ni de yis zla gsum
207a3(mdo 'grel): du/ /dge 'dun dang bcas bde gshegs mchod/ do shal rin chen 'od kyis bskor/ ya mtshan kun dga' ldan la gsungs/ gdengs can 'di ni bskal pa brgyad mi g.yo/ bde ba'i longs spyod kun gyi snod du 'gyur/ 'on kyang skye ba gzhan la
207a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyang/ rab tu 'bad pas gsal bar byed bar 'gyur/ zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las klu gzhon nu'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu pa'o// //
207a5(mdo 'grel): blun po'i lag tu gter dag lhung yang rab tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ rnam dag blo ldan khyim du dpal ni rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyur/ skyes bu rnams kyis yid ni shin tu rab tu dang ba dag/ dbul ba'i rab rib mi bzad 'phrog pa'i rgyan gyi nor bu yin//
207a6(mdo 'grel): mnyan yod du sngon bram ze ni/ nor med bkra shis zhes bya ba/ 'tsho ba bral bas 'tsho ba'i thabs/ 'bras bu chung ba'i zhing la brten/ zhing las la chags grang ba dang/ rlung dang tsha bas nyen pa des/ thong ba dang ni rtog rtse'i khur/ khyer zhing 'ong dang 'gro ba
207a7(mdo 'grel): byas/ /nam zhig chung ma dang bcas des/ lam du rgyal ba nyan thos dang/ lhan cig byon pa mthong gyur nas/ 'phral la rab tu dang bar gyur/ sbyin pa'i bsod nams yongs zad las dbul ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ sems zhing de yis chung ma?
207b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /rab dang bzhin ldan la smras la/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di yu cag gis/ /rdog gcig gis kyang ma mchod las/ /bsod nams zod gis 'thob pa'i nor/ /phun tshogs yu lag la 'ong/ /shi ba gson nyid 'jig rten na/ /grags pa nyams pa shi ba nyid//
207b2(mdo 'grel): nar? med skye bo mdzes pa ni/ /gson la ma yin gshin la min/ /nor rigs nor ni rigs ba ste/ /nor chos nor ni grags pa yin/ /nar gyis dman zhing bslangs pa yis/ /'tsho ba'i yon tan rnams kyi ci/ /gzhan gyi nye 'khor gyur pa yis/ /dbul po'i yon
207b3(mdo 'grel): tan dam bas ci/ /khur ba la ni nor bu yis/ /gser rgyan ngal dub don gyis bzhin/ /dbul po sbyin pa dag dang bral bas slar yang dbul por rab tu 'jug/ dbul po nor la chags pas gzhan dbang sdig pa'i bdag nyid dag tu gyur/ /dbul po dbugs dang
207b4(mdo 'grel): bcas kyang shi zhes 'di la khyad par blo gros med/ /dbul po phyogs bcu 'di dag rang gis skye bo dag gis dman pa bzhin/ /de slad dman la mnyes gshin pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa mchod par bya/ /sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas pa'i/ /rmongs la dge ba
207b5(mdo 'grel): ga la yod/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i spyan/ /phongs pa'i gnyen 'dis gang gang du/ /spyan ni 'phangs pa de dang der/ /dpal ni gnas par bdag gis shes/ /de skad bdag po'i tshig thos nas/ /khyim du gus bcas bram ze mos/ /zas ni gtsang mar sbyar ba dag/ bcom
207b6(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyi slad du bsgrubs/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas kyang/ /de dag bsam pa yongs mkhyen nas/ /grus? pa gsol ba 'debs pa de'i/ /mchod pa dag ni blang bar mdzad/ /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rab bsal ba/ /bdag la 'byor pa 'byung gyur
207b7(mdo 'grel): cig /ces ba'i smon lam gnyis skyes kyis/ /rgyal ba mchod pa'i mjug tu byas/ /de nas bram ze rang zhing du/ /song bas 'bru nas myu gu ni/ /thams cad gser du mthong gyur nas/ 'phral la nyid du dbul ba btang/ /sa yi bdag po gsal rgyal gyis/ /de yi
208a1(mdo 'grel): bsod nams las 'khrungs pa'i/ /gser dag mthong nas ya mtshan te/ dga' bas rgyal po 'chi shes btang/ shin tu mang ba'i gser de yis/ dbang phyug gter thob gnyis skyes kyis/ rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs dge 'dun ni//
208a2(mdo 'grel): longs spyod kun gyis rab tu mchod/ ston pas chos ni bstan pa yis/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras thob nas/ /bden mthong de yis dus kyis ni/ rab tu byung ba yang dag blangs/ nyon mongs thams cad rab bcom ste/ de yis dgra bcom nyid thob tshe/
208a3(mdo 'grel): las de dge slong rnams kyis dris/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par gsungs/ /skye ba gzhan la bram ze 'dis/ /bdag nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /'od srungs kyi ni bstan pa la/ tshangs par spyod pa sngon tshe spyad/ nye dbang dbang bcas lhas
208a4(mdo 'grel): mchod pa/ /shin tu che ba'i grub pa 'di/ /bdag gi sngon du skye ba 'dir/ 'di la de yis yang dag bstan/ de skad de yi legs byas rgyal bas gsungs pa thos gyur nas/ /de yi yon tan rang bzhin nang du 'phos bzhin dge slong ni/ /de dag thams
208a5(mdo 'grel): cad ya mtshan blo ldan dga' bas 'khrugs gyur cing/ dge la gus pas bzang po'i spyod pa rab tu bsngags pa mdzad/ ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las zhing pa'i rtogs
208a6(mdo 'grel): pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o// /lug gis gang bar gyur pa'i skye po'i nags tshal gnas dag tu/ lang tshos long zhing bde ba la 'os mdzes pa'i chas ldan tshe/ dben pas chags bral zhi zhing dag pa gang la rab byin
208a7(mdo 'grel): pa/ /skyes bu de nyid gcig pu ya mtshan rang bzhin dag tu skyes/ rgyal ba sngon tshe n+ya gro d+ha'i/ kun dga' ra ba mdzes par bzhugs/ /ba ra NA ser khyim bdag ni/ legs par rab sad cis pa byung/ nor ni rgyas pa gtong ba dang/ longs spyod tshogs kyis
208b1(mdo 'grel): rnam par brgyan/ gang gis dbang phyug lus can gyis/ mdzod na gnas pa'ang zum par byed/ bde ba thams cad phun tshogs te/ bu med bu yi bsam pa yis/ mchog tu yang dag gdung ba thob/ phun tshogs su yi zug rngu min/ de yis bsam pas 'phos
208b2(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /yun ring yid 'khrul gnyen rnams kyis/ /gnyen la gnyen gshin mya ngan gyis/ me yis rab gdud de la smras/ khyim bdag ma ning la 'os pa'i/ bsam pa bya bar mi rigs so/ brtan ldan snying stobs che rnams la/ 'jig rten na ni rnyed
208b3(mdo 'grel): dka' med/ gang 'di phyogs su grags gyur cing/ yul 'dir grong khyer pas mchod pas/ n+ya gro d+ha yi shing de la/ /mchod pas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ de la zhus pas 'ga' zhig ni/ bu med bu dang ldan pa dang/ gzhan ni nor med nor dang ldan/
208b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang nad can nad med mthong/ n+ya gro d+ha yi rkang 'thung 'di/ mchod rten slong ba bden zhes bya/ 'os pas mchod na khyod la ni/ bu zhes brjod pa'i 'bras ster 'gyur/ zhes pa de dag tshig thos nas/ 'dzum bcas de dag la smras pa/ kye ma rmongs
208b5(mdo 'grel): pa 'am mdza' ba las/ khyed rnams rmongs pa nyid du gyur/ rang las gzhan dbang 'jig rten 'dir/ nges par g.yo ba med pa la/ su yis su yi brtan pa dang/ rgyas dang 'phrog dang 'joms par byed/ rang las nye bar nyid thob nas/ blo gros blun po
208b6(mdo 'grel): gzhan la tshim/ rang gi kha chu'i cha myangs nas/ khyi? ni pags pa skam la bzhin/ shing gis bu nor skyes bu la/ ster zhes 'di ni rmongs pa'i gtam/ 'dab ma tsam yang dus min du/ /de nyid rang la sbyin nus med /gal te de ni byin rlob lhas/ /mchod
208b7(mdo 'grel): pa la chags byed pa na/ bdag nyid rang gis mchod pa ni/ yo byad rdzogs pa cis mi spro/ srin bu'i rjes ni yi ge bzhin/ gang yang thob bya thob ba na/ bya rog ta la ltar brjod pas/ skye bo de yis byin par sems/ gang zhig thob bya de ni las rnams 
209a1(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu yongs su gyur tshe 'thob/ /sna tshogs 'bad cing gus pas bsgrubs kyang thob bya min pa 'thob ma yin/ /gang zhig gang gis rang nyid kyis bsags longs spyod skal ldan de la ni/ /'di dag 'di yis byas shes
209a2(mdo 'grel): rmongs pa'i blo can 'bras med de dag sems/ /zhes pa smra de mdza' gcugs dang/ /ldan pa'i gnyen gyis rab 'bad de/ /bskul nas gcig pu gsang ba yis/ /rkang 'thung gi ni drung du song/ /sta re bzung nas de yis ni/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi shing la
209a3(mdo 'grel): smras/ /mchod pa'am rtsa ba gcod pa la/ /da ni chas nas khyod can 'ong/ /bu dag sbyin na khyod la bdag/ gzhan gyis ma byas mchod pa byed/ /rnam pa gzhan du khyod bdag gis/ /bcad bsregs btags la chu bor 'phang/ /zhes pa de yi tshig thos
209a4(mdo 'grel): nas/ /lha ni shing la gnas pa dag/ 'phral la 'jigs pas 'khrugs gyur te/ /'dar bar byed cing rab bsams pa/ /'dod pa'i bu 'am nor dag ni/ /bdag gis su la 'ang byin pa med/ /rang gi las kyis thob pa la/ /skye bo bdag gis byin par
209a5(mdo 'grel): sems/ /gang 'di stobs kyis bu slong zhing/ /las kyis sbyor bas ma thob na/ /lha nyid gcod du 'ongs gyur pa/ /'di ni sngon chad med pa 'ongs/ /'bras don gnyer bas mchod bya ni/ /mchod pa gang 'di lugs tsam te/ /las kyis bcings pa'i 'bras
209a6(mdo 'grel): thob pa/ /su yis byin zhing gang du lha/ /skyes bu rang gis las kyi nad/ /bsod pa grub pa min pa la/ /rtsis mkhan 'dzin pa nyid ma yin/ /sman pa ma yin bsdags pa'ang min/ /bya min byed pa 'di la ni// shing ni bcad par rnam rtag yod/ /tshul
209a7(mdo 'grel): min dag la mngon zhen pa'i/ /bag med rnams la bya min ci// shing ni bcad na gzhan du bdag/ gnas par mi nus bde ba med/ / 'grogs pas goms can dga' ba ni/ /thub pa rnams la 'ang sdug bsngal bskyed/ /de dag bsams nas brgya byin gyi/ /khang par
209b1(mdo 'grel): myur bar de song nas/ /don de de la brjod nas ni/ /yongs su skrag pas slar smras pa/ /rtag tu bdag ni ljon pa der/ /skye bo rnams kyis mchod gyur kyang/ /sna tshogs don slong nyer gnas pas/ /bdag ni shin tu gzir bar gyur/ /'ga' yis legs byas dag laS
209b2(mdo 'grel): thob/ /'ga' zhig kha ni 'og phyogs gyur/ /g.yo rmongs mi srun brtul zhugs gyis/ /gzhan ni de nyid na rab chags/ /song ba'i rjes su 'gro nyid kyis/ /skye bo grags pa la rton rnams/ /gdung ba thams cad gzhom pa'i slang/ /rmongs bas bdag can nyid
209b3(mdo 'grel): du rgyug/ skye bo blo gros mi gzo bas/ /mi bzad gtses par gyur kyang bdag/ bsam pa de yi yon tan la/ /chags pas shing ni gtong mi nus/ /dwi la chags ba'i bung ba 'dam skyes 'chi ba'i nyon mongs ldan par 'jug /pad rtsa'i ro myang ngang pa nyid ni 'dam gyi 'jigs
209b4(mdo 'grel): brtsi mi byed/ /grang bas gzir ba'i skye bo du bas 'khrugs pa'i me ni yod mi 'dor/ /gang la gang zhig nyer mkho de la de yis skyon ni nges par bzod/ /de slad shing bral gdung ba las/ /khyab bdag bdag ni bskyab par 'os/ /gang phyir lus can rnams kyi gnaS
209b5(mdo 'grel): gtong ba lus ni gtong ba'i mtshungs/ /zhes pa de yis 'bad pa yis/ /gsol btab pau lo mA dga' bas/ /khyim bdag gis ni bu 'thob pa'i/ /las kyi dbang ni yang dag bsams/ /skabs der lha min dgra bo yis/ /sa gsum pa yi lha yi bu/ /blo bzang
209b6(mdo 'grel): zhes pa lhung ba yis/ /dus la bab pa mthong gyur te/ /mi srun la btung grags pa nyams pa bzhin du phreng ba dri ma can gyur cing/ /dman gyur slong ba bzhin du mdzes pa mun pa dag dang yongs 'dris byung bar gyur/ /bsod nams yongs su zad las gnod
209b7(mdo 'grel): pas bzhin du rdul gyis kyang ni gnas dag byas/ /zhe sdang skyon bcas blo bzhin de ni lhung ba gsal byed dga' ba min par gyur/ /legs par rab sad yon tan can/ /sa la dpal ldan grags pa yis/ /blo bzang bu nyid du song zhes/ /de la lha
210a1(mdo 'grel): yis bdag pos smras/ /des smras ston pa shAkya thub/ /bla med rgya che chos kyis ni/ /'khor lo rab tu bskor mdzad pa'i/ /mdun du dus der gal te bdag ? rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa la/ /khyod kyis yang dag rtogs byed na/ /sa la legs
210a2(mdo 'grel): par rab sad kyi/ /bu nyid du ni bdag gis 'gro/ lha yi bu yis 'di brjod las/ /brgya byin de bzhin zhes smras tshe/ /rjes gnad de ni de nas 'phos/ /de yi chung ma'i dku ru zhugs/ /lha ni rang gi gnas song ste/ /legs par rab sad la rab smras//
210a3(mdo 'grel): rab tu byung la mngon dga' i bu/ /dge ba khyod la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhes pa thos nas khyim bdag ni/ /rab tu mgu nas khyim song ste/ /pu ni rab tu 'byung ba dag /bdag gis bzlog par bya zhes bsams/ /de nas dus kyis de yi ni/ /chud ma
210a4(mdo 'grel): rol ba ma zhes la/ /yan lag thams cad mtshan nyid ldan/ /byis pa gser 'od can de btsas/ /de skyes nyid na rin chen ni/ /kun gyis rang bzhin gdugs 'khrungs te/ /legs byas dpal ni bla med dang/ /ngo mtshar gzugs dang ldan pa bzhin/ /mchog
210a5(mdo 'grel): tu pha yi grags 'phel bas/ /rigs pa sgyu rtsal 'byor pa rnams/ /tshogs pa'i khang pa lta bu de/ /grags sbyin zhes ni bya bar gyur/ /lha yi tshig ni dran gyur nas/ /de ni rab tu byung dogs te/ /grong dang khang pa grong khyer gyis/ /sgo rnams pha yis srung
210a6(mdo 'grel): ba byas/ /de nas brgya byin mngon phyogs te/ /sngon gyi 'gro ba dran par byas/ /zhi bas dran pa rab byung la/ /mngon par phyogs shing gus par gyur/ /nam zhig rang gis skyed tshal du/ /dal gyis shing rta zhon 'gro des/ /bcom ldan rgyal ba ji zhig ltar/
210a7(mdo 'grel): byon bdag ni mthong bar gyur/ /snying la bde bas yang dag reg/ /rab zhi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa/ /de mthong nyid na 'bral la ni/ /shing rta dag las de yis bcas/ /de la bslong ba gsum byas te/ /de yi zhabs ? dag la/ /dang bas brlan? pa de
210b1(mdo 'grel): yi ni/ /spyan gyis gzigs pa des phyag 'tshal/ /de nas rab dang bcom ldan la/ /rab btud de yi rjes gnang gis/ /de nyid rnam par sems zhing de/ /rang gi skyed mos tshal du song/ /de nas bcom ldan 'dzum ldan pas/ /dge slong rta thul la gsungs pa/ /bdag
210b2(mdo 'grel): gi drung du gzhon nu 'di/ /mtshan mo rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs bde gshegs rang gnas su/ /dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gshegs/ /brgya byin gyis sprul bud med lus/ /gzhon nu yis ni mthong gyur te/ /rnags shing rdul la mi gtsang ba/ /srin bu'i
210b3(mdo 'grel): tshogs kyis 'khrugs shing gnas/ /skyed mos tshal gyi ro mthong nas/ /chags bral ldan pa des bsams pa/ /dar bab gzugs ni mdzes pa dang/ /sdug pa rnam bar 'gyur ba nyid/ /pags pa sha tshogs mi rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin de ni 'di nyid do/ /mig dag
210b4(mdo 'grel): g.yo zhing nu ma zung ni rab rgyas ri bong can kyi 'ong kyi mjod/ /lus de lang tsho gsar? pa dar bab mdzes sdug 'bro bar bgrang pa 'di dag ni/ /rul pa'i brlan gyis nges bran 'khrugs shing dman pa'i srin bu rnams kyis dkrigs/ /ngan cing rab mang bshang bas
210b5(mdo 'grel): bsgos shing mdza' dag rgyu cher 'khrul 'khor med nyid gyur/ /yan lag thams cad 'grogs par spro ba 'di la chags shing rmongs pas mig phrogs shing/ /nu ma'i dkyil 'khor la chags blo gros nyams pas mchog tu bde ba thob gyur pa/ /gang las
210b6(mdo 'grel): wa skyes 'di ni chags bral bza' ba dag las phyir phyogs bzhin 'khyogs cing/ /mi gtsang dri nga dag gis yid byung blo gros smus phyin ring du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// zhes bsams chags bral bag chags ni/ /sbas pa yang dag rgyas gyur te/ /de ni skyed tshal
210b7(mdo 'grel): las phyir phyogs/ /rang gi khad bar dal gyis song/ /skabs der nyin byang 'jig rten gyis/ /spyod tshul ro bral mthong bas bzhin/ /skyo zhing rab zhir mngon phyogs te/ /nyin par dag ni nyams par 'gyur/ /ngal dub ma lus yongs gtong bar/ /'os pa rab
211a1(mdo 'grel): bzhir 'gro 'dod cing/ /thun mtshams mkha' yi gos dmar bsten/ /nyin mo rab tu byung bzhin gyur/ /nyi ma srid pa'i mig dag ni/ /'jig rten pha rol gnas song te/ /'jig rten yongs btang nyin mo yang/ /de yi rjes 'brang nyid du gyur/ /de
211a2(mdo 'grel): nas 'gro bsten gsar pa yis/ /rab rib mya ngan sbyor pa dag/ /sgron ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba yis// /brtse nas bzhin du rab tu bzlog /skabs der ston pa rang nyid ni/ /grags? sbyin dag la brtsi ba yis/ /grong khyer klung 'gral pha rol tu/ /de thob slang du
211a3(mdo 'grel): yang dag gshegs/ /grags sbyin gyis kyang nyin par gyis/ /nyon mongs mtshungs pa yang yang du/ /'khor ba snying po med pa nyid/ /sems shing nyal ba'i khang par zhugs/ /bling bu rgyud ma ? sogs/ /rtse dags ngal zhing gnyid log pa/ /mig thum?
211a4(mdo 'grel): rgyags pas 'khrugs pa yi/ /khud med rnams der de yis mthong/ /kha ni rgyud mangs la bkod cing/ /lag pa'i 'khri shing rdza rnga gtad/ /bde ba skad cig pa nyid kyi/ /sdug bsngal bsam gtan la zhugs bzhin/ /yos ral shi ba bzhin du ni/ /g.yo med de
211a5(mdo 'grel): dag mthong gyur nas/ /lhag par chags bral yang dag skyes/ /yun ring de yis yang dag bsams /kye ma yul ni 'di dag rnams/ /mjug tu mchog tu ro dang bral/ /bud med ces pa 'di lta la/ /rmongs pa rnams ni mchog tu gus/ /mchog min bde ba'i sprin
211a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas la/ /glog gi rtse dga' 'di dag rnams/ /gnyid log shi ba dag la yang/ /rnam 'phrul gang na 'dzum gang na/ /'ga' zhig 'og tu ba bltas nyal zhing de yi rgyab ni gzhan du bzlog ste ltung/ /gzhan yang gan rkyal yan lag kun brgyad yi bug rnam
211a7(mdo 'grel): par bye bar gyur/ /gzhan dag skra ni grol? zhing dral bas phrag pa la chags bya rog babs pa bzhin/ /bdag gi khyim ni mig zum bud med tshogs rnams rnam 'dzin dur khrod lta bur spyod/ /de nyid rab byung don gnyer bdag/ /grong khyer nang nas phyir 'thon te//
211b1(mdo 'grel): rmongs pa bzlog slad bcom ldan 'das/ /nges par lta ru 'gro bar bya/ /zhes bsams ri thang che ba yis/ /rin chen mthil lham bzung nas de/ /grong srung rnams kyis ma shes par/ /brgya byin gyis ni mthu yis song/ /grong khyer sgo las mngon par ni/ /byung ste
211b2(mdo 'grel): chu klung mchog thob nas/ /'khor ba'i mya ngan 'phos pa yi/ /gdung ba gtong bar brtson pa bzhin/ /bcom ldan 'byung po dgongs pa yis/ /de ni 'ong ba gzigs gyur nas/ /dgyes pas de ni bsgral ba la/ /bzhed dang ldan pa bzhin du gyur/ /de yis rjes
211b3(mdo 'grel): mthun gser gyi mdog /phyag ni g.yas pa brkyang mdzad nas/ /sku yi gzi brjid snang ba yis/ /phyogs kyi mun pa yongs phyogs shing/ /tshur shog tshur shog gnod med la/ /nang med gnas ni khyod kyis thob/ /ces pa 'brug dbyangs ltar sdug sgras/ /ring po nas
211b4(mdo 'grel): ni de la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung thos nas/ /bdud rtsi yis ni gang ba bzhin/ /yongs gdung btang nas grags sbyin ni/ /'phral la bsil ba nyid du gyur/ /rin chen rin chen mthil lha ma ni/ /klung gi ngogs su de yis dor/ /rgal zhing de yi
211b5(mdo 'grel): pha rol gyis/ /'gram? du thar pa nyid thob gyur/ /bcom ldan drung du des phyin te/ /gdung ba can gyis tsan dan shing/ /dang bas brlan la zur phud ni/ /zhabs la btugs pas rab tu btung/ /de nas de la ston pa yis/ /gang gis 'di ni chags bral nyid//
211b6(mdo 'grel): 'thob pa mtshungs med mchog gyur ba/ /legs pa'i chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /brtul zhugs bzang de bcom ldan gyis/ /legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul la/ /tshangs par spyad slad rab tu bkod/ /'dod pa rdzogs pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas bu ni
211b7(mdo 'grel): song ba dag /legs par rab sad sad pas thos/ /de bral me yis gdungs pa yis/ /de ni tshol du phyi rol song/ /mdza' dang rmongs pa chen po yis/ /gzir zhing mya ngan ldan pa des/ /rgyu ba'i dogs kyi 'gram du phyin/ /rin chen mthil lham dag kyang
212a1(mdo 'grel): mthong/ /de yis chu bo yang dag brgal/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mthong gyur te/ /da yi mthu yi rab bsgribs pas/ /mdun na gnas pa'i bu ma mthong?/ /de nas slar ? bcom ldan gyi/ /rab tu btung byas de yi yang/ /rmongs pas chos
212a2(mdo 'grel): gtam rigs pa yis/ /'od kyi mun pa bzhin du phrogs/ /de nas rmongs bral de yi bu/ /dri med 'od ldan mthong gyur nas/ /rjes su 'dod cing gus pa yis/ /ston pa lhag par gnas pa byas/ /de yi khyim du bcom ldan gyis/ /mchod pa rab tu
212a3(mdo 'grel): blang mdzad nas/ /de yi chung mar bcas pa la/ /dam pa'i brlab gnas rab 'bar mdzad/ /de nas grags sbyin grogs po ni/ /dpal dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ /dri med gang po lag bzang dang/ /ba yang bdag ces bya ba bzhis/ /bcom ldan mdun na grog
212a4(mdo 'grel): chen ni/ /tshangs spyod brtul zhugs la chags pa'i/ /grags pa phyogs su rab gsal ba/ /thos nas gnas der 'ongs par gyur/ /dge ba sprin pas thob gyur pa/ /de dag rnams la bcom ldan 'das/ /dag pa'i bka' yis slar yang ni/ /'dul ba'i chos
212a5(mdo 'grel): la bsten pa bsgrubs/ /bzhi po de dang grags sbyin dang/ /dge slong gzhan pa lnga dag dang/ /bcu yi bcom ldan drung du ni/ /dgra bcom gnas dag thob par 'gyur/ /grags sbyin spyod tshul thos gyur nas/ /de yi grogs pa skal ldan gzhan/ /lnga bcu
212a6(mdo 'grel): ston pa'i drung du ni/ /phyin nas de mtshungs nyid dag thob/ /tshul des gus pa bskyed gyur pa/ /gzhan ni brgya phrag lnga yis kyang/ /de dang mtshungs bar 'dul ba'i chos/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ? thob/ /de nas ? zhig dge mtshan las/ /dge slong
212a7(mdo 'grel): kun gyis bcom ldan la/ /grags sbyin gyi ni bsod nams dris/ /des? thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ /sngon tshe yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan gtsug tor can/ /grol byed las ni bsod snyoms pa/ /pha rol dogs 'gro
212b1(mdo 'grel): skad cig bzhugs/ /sa yi bdag lo tshangs pas byin/ /lam de nas ni 'gro ba yis/ /rjes 'brang 'od bzang zhes pa yis/ /de ni bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer drag po yis/ /gdung ba rdul dang bcas gyur pa/ /de mthong nas ni de la des/ /gdugS
212b2(mdo 'grel): dag bzung nas grib bsil byas/ /de yi drung du tshangs spyod la/ /de yi bstan pa bzung nas ni/ /sems ni dri ma med nyid las/ /dge ba mchog ldan thob par gyur/ /de nas rab dang blo ldan pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis de la gsungs/ /'byung 'gyur shAkya thub
212b3(mdo 'grel): ba yi/ /drung du khyod ni byang chub 'gyur/ /de yi nges pa de gsungs te/ /blo bzang zhes pa lha yi bur/ /mtho ris su ni yun ring gyur/ /bsod nams ldan pa de nyid dang/ /grags sbyin dge legs gser 'di ste/ /grags pa yis ni grogs rnams kyang/ /dge
212b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i zam stegs nyid dag thob/ /sa bdag kri ki zhes bya ba/ /rgya chen blo yi ston pa ni/ /'od srung sku dag myang 'das la/ /rin chen mchod rten sngon tshe byas/ /sa yi bdag po de yi bu/ /gsum pa grags ldan dga' ba yis/ /nor bu'i mchod rten de la ni//
212b5(mdo 'grel): gus pas rin chen gdugs dag bkod/ /de dang bsod nams snga ma yis/ /skye ba 'di la grags sbyin ni/ /grags chen rin chen 'bar ba yi/ /gdugs kyis brgyan pa dag tu skyes/ /de ltar skye ba gzhan la legs byas rgyas pas rtsa ba bcings//
212b6(mdo 'grel): zla ba ltar dkar grags pa'i 'od zer rgyas pa'i me tog can/ /dge bde yi chos kyi ljon pa rab rgyas 'bras smin 'di/ /de skad thos nas dge slong tshogs des yang mtshan thob par gyur/ /ces ba dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems
212b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las /grags sbyin gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //brgya byin rlung dang chu sogs lha rnams dang/ /thub mchog rnams kyang gang slad rnam 'gyur du/ / 
213a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba'i dran bde rtsa ltar spyod pa'i gnas/ /ya mtshan can de gang su rung ba min/ /mgo rnga grong thang chen du/ /sA la chen po'i rigs 'khrungs pa/ /n+ya gro rda yi rtog ces pa/ /gnyis skyes grags ba'i dpal ldan byung/ /de
213a2(mdo 'grel): yi chung ma gzugs bzang ma/ /zhes pa khang pa'i skyed tshal na/ /rol pa'i ljon shing pi la'i/ /'og tu bu ni nyi 'od bsgrun/ /gser gyi 'od zer rab 'bar ba'i/ /bud de skyes pa tsam nyid la/ /grags pa ltar dkar lha yi gos/ /shing de mas ni rab tu
213a3(mdo 'grel): byung/ /pa spi la skyes zhes bya ba/ /byis pa pad+ma'i mig can de/ /rig dang sgyu rtsal blo sbyangs shing/ /dpal dang lhan cig rnam par rgyas/ /de ni pha yi gsol btab kyang/ /rtag tu khyim thab las phyir phyogs/ /yul la sdang ldan dben pa ni/ /dri med bsaM
213a4(mdo 'grel): pa ldan par gyur/ /pha ni rigs rgyud 'chad pa yis/ /'jigs nas yang yang gsol btab des/ /de la smras pa khyim thab kyi/ /'ching ba la ni bdag mi sred/ /yab cig 'dod pa bdag mi 'dod/ /bdag gi blo gros tshangs spyod la'o/ /rang 'dod
213a5(mdo 'grel): zhi ba dor nas ni/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba su zhig 'dod/ /dang por sbyin sreg du bas mchim rtag tu 'bab pa rab tu 'jug /mtshungs par lag pa gtad pas gdung ba'i lam la bden par 'dud pa byed/ /phreng ba'i thag pas 'khor ba'i bka' yi dam
213a6(mdo 'grel): tshig dag la g.yo ba 'ching/ /khyim thab yid ni rmongs pa gnas pas nyer bcom rnams kyi dga' ba'i rgyu/ /na chung gzhon nu'i 'khri shing gang gyi rlung gis bskyod pa'i rtse dga' rjes 'brang ba'i/ /rgyud mangs gling bu'i sgra ni khyim thab dus su
213a7(mdo 'grel): spro ldan gang gis ma mnyan ba/ /de dag la rten kyi hud bu zhes chung mas tshe? de smra zhing dman gyur pa/ /mchi ma lci bar thigs thigs 'bab pas mngon par sbyar ba'i spra dag thos mi 'gyur/ /zhes pa 'bad pa drag po yis/ /pha dang ma la des
213b1(mdo 'grel): smras nas/ /mdzes pas bran pa dge mtshan gyi/ /myu gur yang dag skyes pa bzhin/ /bzo bo mkhas pas byas pa yis/ /gser gyi bu mo bzung nas ni/ /rigs 'chad bsam pas gzir de la/ /bstan bas slar yang rab smras pa/ /kha dog mdzes sdug
213b2(mdo 'grel): 'di mtshungs pa'i/ /bu mo gal te rnyed gyur na/ /yab cig khyod kyi tshig gis ni/ /bdag gi bu med gzung bar bgyi/ /zhes pa bu yis tshig thos nas/ /de mtshungs bu mo mtho ris su/ /rnyed dpar? shes nas bram ze ni/ /re thag chad cing bzhin sdud gyur//
213b3(mdo 'grel): tsa tstsa? ka ra zhes ba'i grogs/ /bram zes gtam de thos pa yis/ /kun dga' dang bral g.yo med pa/ /mya ngan gyis nyen de la smras/ /rab 'bad tsam gyi bzod don la/ /khyod ni mya ngan byar mi 'os/ /bu mo gser 'od ldan pa ni/ /lha ru nga nyid 'gro
213b4(mdo 'grel): bar bya/ /zhes te mdza' ba'i grogs po ni/ /dang por skyes pas bstan byas nas/ /gser gyi gzugs brnyan bzung nas ni/ /blo ldan phyogs rnams rtag tu song/ /phreng ba gos dang bcas pas brgyan/ /lha yi mtshan ma'i zol gyis ni/ /bzung nas
213b5(mdo 'grel): phyogs su 'khyam byed cing/ /bu mo mchod par bya zhes smras/ /grong khyer grong dang lam rnams su/ /de mchod du 'ongs bu mo rnams/ /rtag tu rnam bar lta ba des/ /de dang mtshungs pa rnyed ma gyur/ /de nas bram ze ser skya yis/ /bu mo gser gyi bu mo
213b6(mdo 'grel): bas/ /'od lhag bzang mo zhes pa ni/ /yangs pa can du nam zhig mthong/ /mdzes ma khyim thab las phyir phyogs/ /char bral dben pa dang ldan zhing/ /gser rin ma de ser skya la/ /rjes 'gro bshad pa de yis bslangs/ /bu mo'i sa? yis des
213b7(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ /'od srungs rigs skyes 'jig rten na/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi rtog pa yi/ /rigs? mchog rigs ni rnam par grags/ /'on kyang mdzes ma 'bad pa yis/ /nor ni rtags nas sbyin par bya/ /dpul? ba'i shugs rings ldan pa nges/ /pha yi
214a1(mdo 'grel): yid ni gdung bar byed/ /chung ma 'thab mo la chags dang/ /bu mo nor med la byin dang/ /bu ni gdung bas nyer bcom rnams/ /sems la khab bsregs lta bu yin/ /chu gter gyi ni skyes bu mchog la dpal mo byin byas te?/ /ci ste de ni stobs
214a2(mdo 'grel): ldan la slong mi'u thung shes nas/ /da lta'ang mya ngan la chags rta gdong me yi rang bzhin gyi/ /gdung ba drag po shugs ring dang bcas nges par gtong mi byed/ /de slad nor ni btsal byas/ /de 'byor mngon mthong shes gyur nas/ /dam pa'i rigs la bu mo sbyin/
214a3(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i yon tan nor gyi dbang/ /zhes pa bu mo'i pha dang de'i/ /bu rnams kyis kyang brjod thos nas/ /de bzhin zhes smras gnyis skyes ni/ /gzhon nu'i pha yi gan du song/ /gser gyi mdzes ma las lhag ba'i/ /bu mo thob ces de'i tshig /n+ya gro b+ha yi
214a4(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa yi/ /thos nas kun dga' rgyas par gyur/ /bu mo tshangs spyod don gnyer ma/ /thos nas phi spa la skyes ni/ /slong mo pa yi chas kyis de'i/ /khyim du rang nyid ngal gyi song/ /mgron dang bkur sti thob gyur pa/ /mkhas pa des der de la dris/ /tshangS
214a5(mdo 'grel): spyod don du gnyer shes nas/ /re ba rdzogs pas rab smras pa/ /dge ba tshangs spyod don gnyer ba'i/ /pi spa la skyes bram ze bdag /gang gi ched du bram ze des/ /khyod ni 'bad pas bslangs pa'o/ /'khyim? thab las ni phyir phyogs bdag/ /pha yis shin
214a6(mdo 'grel): tu don du gnyer/ /bzang mo khyod kyang 'di lta bu/ /mtshungs par dga' bar yang dag 'grogs/ /zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas/ /rab dga' do yi de la smras/ /zhi zhing dul bas khyim thab 'di/ /yu cag la ni 'gal ba med/ /de nas yang dag 'ongs
214a7(mdo 'grel): pa thob/ /rab? dga' spro ba rgyas ba des/ /rang gi khyim du song nas ni/ /pha yi tshig dag kha yis blangs/ /mdza' yas nor ni rgyas pa de/ /rnam par brtags nas ser skyas kyang/ /rin chen mchog gi rgyan pa yis/ /bu mo de la rab tu sbyin/ /'byor pa rin
214b1(mdo 'grel): thang? che ba yis/ /de dag khyim thab spro bar zhugs/ /tshangs par spyod pa ma nyams shing/ /rnam 'gyur med par 'grogs par 'gyur/ /dul ba'i ngang tshul de dag gis/ /gzugs dang lang tsho rgyas pa'i tshe/ /yid las byung ba'i bka' bcag pas/ /'byor pa dman
214b2(mdo 'grel): pa nyid du gyur/ /de gnyis reg pa bsrung ba'i slad/ /res kyi gcig ni gnyid log cing/ /gcig ni langs nas mel tshe byed/ /ces pa nyal ba'i rnam bzhag byas/ /de nas nam zhig mal stan mthar/ /de yi mig ni gnyid kyis rgyas/ /thebs tshe pi spa la skyes
214b3(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /sprul ni nag po mthong bar 'gyur de nas de lag 'khri shing ni/ /logs su 'chang ba brtse ldan des/ /rnga yab mdza' dang gos dag gis/ /bsdus nas 'jigs pa de las gsungs/ /'phral la lag la bskyed pa yis/ /skrag pa'i ri dwags mig can ma/ /nu
214b4(mdo 'grel): ma 'dar zhing do shal ni/ /g.yo ldan ma des khyo la smras/ /rje yi sras po ji ltar na/ /nges par dam tshig brjid gyur cing/ /bden par smra ba khyod kyi thugs/ /gang 'dir rnam par bslad pa skyes/ /khyod kyi rnam 'gyud ngo tsha'i rgyun/ /shin tu che ldan 'di ni ci/ /sa
214b5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin dag kyang bstan pa'i lugs/ /gtong gi dam pa yong ma yin/ /zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas/ /'dzum ldan de yi de la smras/ /rmi lam na yang bdag gi yid/ /bzang mo nges bar bslad par med// 'on kyang 'dir ni sprul nag 'di/ /'jigs su
214b6(mdo 'grel): rung ba yongs su rgyu/ /khyod kyi lag pa la bstan las/ /'chang ba 'jigs nas bdag gis bsrungs/ /khyo yi tshig 'di thos gyur nas/ /dogS btang? dga' ba thob gyur nas/ /dogS btang dga' ba des smras pa/ /bden pI? ngang tshul khyod kyis blo 'dod paS dri mar bya ba med/ /gdug
214b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i sprul ni legs pa des/ /chags pa'i lto 'phyes mchog tu 'jigs/ /sbrul gyi lus gcig 'joms pa ste/ /'dong pas lus ni brgya mthar byed/ /de slad rnam 'gyur 'di dag srungs/ /zhes smras de ni chags dang bral/ /de yi shin tu dul ba yang//
215a1(mdo 'grel): pi spa la skyes dag gis bsngags/ /dus kyi n+ya gro d+ha yi rtog /chung mar bcas pa mtho ris song/ /rab mang khyim gyi tshogs dag gis/ /bsam pa'i khur ni de yis blangs/ /nam zhig til mar btung ba'i slad de/ /khyu mchos? rnams kyi
215a2(mdo 'grel): til 'tshir la/ /bzang mos yongs su bstan pa yis/ /'khor rnams dag ni yongs su bskor/ /til ni 'chi re ba de dag gis/ /til mar bum pa srog chags tshogs/ /ltung ba nyams pa mthos gyur nas/ /snying rje bcas pas phan tshun smras//
215a3(mdo 'grel): srog chags mang po yongs brlag pas/ /kye ma bdag kyang sdig pa can/ /yang na gang gi tshig gis byas/ /sdig pa 'di kun bzang mo la'o/ /bzang mo khyim na 'khod pa yis/ /de thos chags bral nyid du gyur/ /de dus nyid na bdag po ni/ /nang zhugS
215a4(mdo 'grel): dben par de la smras/ /zhing las nyon mongs kyis gzir bas/ /khyu mchog srog chags 'tsho? ba ston/ /bzang mo bdag gi khyim gyi khur/ /rtag tu yongs 'dzin yod mi bzod/ /bde ba'i phun tshogs 'di dag rnams/ /mjug tu ro bral snying po med/ /myangs
215a5(mdo 'grel): na 'dam bu'i 'dab ma bzhin/ /gdung bdag ni skyed par byed/ /khyim pa rnams na sdig pa'i 'dam/ /nyon mongs nya lcibs dra ba can/ /khyim nyid du ni nyams 'gyur te/ /rlubs su grwang ni rgan po bzhin/ /de slad khyim gyi brtsom pa 'di/ /yu cag gis ni btang bar
215a6(mdo 'grel): 'os/ /zhes smras chung mas khas blangs pas/ /zhi ba la ni nges par byas/ /khyim dang yo byad bcas pa yis/ /nor rnams slong la des byin nas/ /re ba'i zhags pa 'ching ba kun/ /rnam par grol te nges par byung/ /de nas 'od srungs rigs nyid phyir/ /'od srungS
215a7(mdo 'grel): chen bo nyid gyur te/ /de dus yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od srungs drung du de song gyur/ /mchod rten bu mang zhes pa yi/ /rtsa bar gnas pa de can phyin/ /'dul ba'i chos ni des byin pas/ dag pa'i byang chub thob par gyur/ /bzang mo yis kyang chags
215b1(mdo 'grel): bral gyi/ /bstan pa'i lam gyi 'dul ba thob/ /sngon gyi bsod nams yongs smin bas/ /dge ba dri ma med pa brten/ /'od srungs chen po lha rnams kyi/ /phyag sos? nying? thob mthong nas ni/ /bsod nams dge slong rnams kyis dris/ /de bzhin gshegs pas der bka' stsal//
215b2(mdo 'grel): zes dang 'bru rnams ma lus rab tu nyung ba'i dus/ /bsod snyoms rnam par log cing shin tu mi bzad tshe/ /nor chung skyes bu yis ni ka shi'i grong khyer du/ /? gang shi ? rang gi zas kyis legs par mchod/ /grong khyer bdag po kra kis byas pa'i mchod rten ni/ /rin chen
215b3(mdo 'grel): gyis spras mchog tu mdzes pa de yis bu/ /bsod nams dang tshul gyis kyang bde ba chen po'i slad/ /nor bu gser gyi rnam par bkra ba'i gdugs dag bkod/ /skye ba gnyis su nye bar bsags pa'i bsod nams cher rgyas bas/ /nye pa'i gnas kyis 'od srungs chen po
215b4(mdo 'grel): nyid ni 'di yis thob/ /gser gyi ta la bzhin du mtho ba'i mthu ni thob gyur nas/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu dgra bcom gnas ni rnam par 'dzin/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/
215b5(mdo 'grel): 'od srungs chen po'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //yal 'dab mngon par gsar pa lta bur gnyen gyur kyang/ /sra zhing brtan pa dag ni rdo rje ltar gyur pa/ /chen po rnams kyi nor bu dri ma dag/ med pa la yang chags pa
215b6(mdo 'grel): dag ni 'pho pa min/ /kun la rjes su brtse ldan yab kyi shAkya yi/ /gnas rnams blta ba nyid la mchog tu gsol btab pa/ /kun dga' bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis zla ba ston pa ni/ /gang dag tshe na rang gi rgyal sar zhugs gyur pa/ /de de'i tshe na ba gam du song ri
215b7(mdo 'grel): drags mig /rna ba'i rgyan gyi mig ni rab tu mdzes byas nas/ /grags 'dzin mas ni mdzes bdag gis phyogs rnams su/ /ya mtshan rab tu 'dri ba'i bdag po de mthong nas/ /de dad 'grogs dang 'khyud pa dag gi? 'bral ba'i/ /dug gi brgyal ba bzhin du
216a1(mdo 'grel): ma lus phyogs 'khor zhing/ /grogs po bzlog par byed pa'i brtan pa ni/ /dor nas khang bzang dag las lus ni rab tu 'phangs/ /dag pa yal 'dab ltar mnyen lus dang ldan pa des/ /gang gang tshe na lus ni rab tu 'phangs gyur pa//
216a2(mdo 'grel): de de tshe na yid srubs kyis ni rmongs ma de/ /brtse bas brlan pa'i spyan ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /de nas nam zhig nags gyis mthar ni bcom ldan la/ /de yi dge mtshan dag las dge slong tshogs kyis dris/ /tshems kyi 'od zer zla ba'i 'od
216a3(mdo 'grel): rnams dag gis ni/ /mchu yi dmar ba 'bebs par mdzad pa bzhin du gsungs/ /bdag dang bral bas rtag tu gzir bar gyur pa yi/ /grags 'dzin ma ni gang zhig gzu lums 'di dag byed/ /brtan pa 'phrog cing rmongs pa rnam par ster ba 'di/ /chagS
216a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i rnam 'phrul ldan pa rnams kyi rang bzhin nyid/ /sngon gyi skye ba gzhan la de dang bral ba yi/ /'dod pas rnam par rmongs par byas te bdag gis kyang/ /rgyun du yongs su gdung ba dag gis rgyur gyur pa/ /rab mang gdung ba'i nyon mongs dag ni nyams
216a5(mdo 'grel): su myong/ /grong mchog ha sti na yi grong/ /'chi med grong khyer thul bar sngon/ /yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i gter/ /rgyal po nor zhes bya ba byung/ /lag pa yi ni sa la 'khyud/ /dbyangs can dag ni mgrin par byas/ /gang gi dpal ni rab tu bster//
216a6(mdo 'grel): grags pa kho na rab tu bskrad/ /de yi btsun mo mdzes ma la/ /bu ni nor bzang zhes bya ba/ /gter brgya dang ni grags pa dang/ /lhan cig skyes pa byung bar gyur/ /rig gnas kun gyi ku mung can/ /rtag tu rnam rgyas byed la chags/ /dri med mdzes pa
216a7(mdo 'grel): sgyu rtsal can/ /gang zhig zla ba lta bur mdzes/ /sa bdag de dang sa gzhi ni// bar med sa bdag byung gyur pa/ /khengs ldan dbang chen snge zhes pa/ /rgya chen rnam par gnon par grags/ /dus min dus su brtag bya zhing/ /kun gyi bdog kun 'phrog byed pa?
216b1(mdo 'grel): bzod dka' i dpya dang ldan pa des/ /gzir ba'i skye dgus mya ngan byas/ /chos min la ni zhugs pa de'i/ /grong ni legs byas sgrob? dag /log cing gdung ba drag po yis/ /gdung bar sprin gyi char ma phab/ /sa skyong rjes su mi mthun pa/ /der ni mu ge'i nyer 'tshe byung/
216b2(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal can rnams kho na la/ /sdug bsngal rgyas par gyur pa yin/ /de nas nyon mongs kyis khyad gzir/ /bdag ngan gyis gdungs yid byung zhing/ /grong na gnas pa thams cad ni/ /gcig tu tshogs nas rnam par bsams/ /rgyal blun mtshan mor byed
216b3(mdo 'grel): pa 'di/ /gsar pa'i dpya zer 'bebs pa yis/ /mchog tu skye bo'i tshogs pa 'di/ /padmo'i spyan bzhin zum par gyur/ /rtag tu ngan par zhen pa 'dis/ /bden med blon po'i gros dag gis/ /bdag cag bcir nas g.yo can dang/ /bran dang glu mkhan rnams
216b4(mdo 'grel): dag gso/ /de la'ang sa bdag sdig pa yi/ /dmod pas char med sdug bsngal ba/ /skye bo yang dag brlag pa'i dbang/ /mu ge skyed par byed pa skyes/ /sa skyong shin tu rno zhing 'khor gyi skye bo rtsub cing mu chor rmongs/ /blon po rnams kyang gdug cing grags pa
216b5(mdo 'grel): g.yo ldan gya gyu dag la mkhas/ /zhabs drung gnas dang yig mkhan mi bzang kha skyon rab tu khros gyur pa/ /dman pa 'joms byed ma rungs tshogs pa 'di dag rnams ni ji ltar bzod/ /dpal ldan sa yi bdag po ni/ /nor gyi yul 'khor rgyas pa
216b6(mdo 'grel): thos/ /bdag cag de grong song ba na/ /mnyes gshin de yi skyong bar 'gyur/ /sa bdag gang gi yul 'khor la/ /bu bzhin rtag tu lta byed pa/ /de yi yul du pha yi ni/ /khyim du bzhin du 'tsho bar bya/ /de ltar des bsgrubs de dag rnams/ /ha sti na yi
216b7(mdo 'grel): grong khyer yong/ /lus kyang gnod bcas gtang bya na/ /yul dang gnas ni smros ci dgos/ /mi bdag dbang chen sde yis kyang/ /rang grong skye bo med shes nas/ /'gyod pa drag po khro ldan pas/ /blon po chen po la smras pa/ /rgyal po nor gyi grongs 
217a1(mdo 'grel): khyer du/ /bdag gi grong nas skye bo rnams/ /rab tu song zhes nyen rna ni/ /gsang gnas rgyu ba dag gis smras/ /gal te bdag gi dgra grong du/ /de dag mu ges nyen 'gro na/ /gnas gyi nyer 'tshe thams cad du/ /re mos kyis ni 'byung
217a2(mdo 'grel): ba nyid/ /yang na rgyal po'i skyon gyis ni/ /bde pa 'dod pas de dag song/ /rgyal po su yi grong khyer kyi/ /skye bo las chad dbya las grol/ /phal cher yongs su 'dris la sdang/ /rtag tu gsar pa gsar pa tshol/ /ring na gnas pa thams
217a3(mdo 'grel): cad ni/ /kun gyi yid du 'ongs pa yin/ /gang gis gzhan gyi skye dgu ni/ /rmongs pa chung ma bzhin du 'phrog /sa bdag de la yon tan ni/ /bdag las lhag pa ci zhig yod/ /re zhig de yi dregs pa ni/ /rab gzhi la thabs dag bsam par mdzod
217a4(mdo 'grel): gang yang phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu/ /de dag gzhom pa sgrub par mdzod/ /ces pa rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/ /blon po chen pos rab smras pa/ /lhan cig gang gis rgyal po 'di/ /nor dang skye bo dar ma nyon/ /sa bdag de yi ngar ba ni/ /gzugs can
217a5(mdo 'grel): bsod nams kyis btags bzhin/ /yul na klu yi rgyal po ni/ /chu mang ci tra zhes pa yod/ /de yi mthu yis dus min du/ /'bru ni phun sum tshogs par gyur/ /sa bdag phun sum tshogs kun gyi/ /rtsa bzhid ni phun tshogs yin//
217a6(mdo 'grel): de slad rig pa'i stobs dag gis/ /klu de gal te 'phrog nus na/ /de tshe de yi skye dgu rnams/ /rang nyid khyod la brten par 'gyur/ /de slad sngags stobs 'bar ba yi/ /sgrub pa po 'ga' btsal nas na/ /klu yi rgyal po 'phrog pa la/ /brtson
217a7(mdo 'grel): pa dag ni myur bar mdzod/ /ces pa blon po'i tshig thos nas/ /sa bdag gis ? bden zhes smras/ /rang nyid yon tan nor nyams pa'i/ /mi srun pha rol skyon la sbyor/ /de nas gser ni mang po dag/ rngan pa rab tu ster ba'i sgra/ /bsgrags
217b1(mdo 'grel): nas gros pa rnams kyis ni/ /klu dga' ching ba'i sngags pa thob/ /gser sbyin dmu bcas de dag gi gsol btab rig 'dzin ces bya ba/ /de ni ci tra blang ba'i smad/ /ha sti na yi grong khyer song/ /der ni nags tshal dag gis mdza' / /snum ljang rkad 'thung ldan pa na/ /gdengs?
217b2(mdo 'grel): can bdag po'i khang pa ni/ /nam mkha' i 'od can de yis mthong/ /bku la yi brang g.yo zhing/ /ti la ka yi dpal rgyas pa/ /nags kyi dpal mo'i rgyan dag gi/ nor bu'i me long nye ba bzhin/ /dri med chu de mthong gyur nas/ /chags pas nyams pa'i yid chan gyi//
217b3(mdo 'grel): sngags kyi bsam gtan chas zhugs te/ /bsgrub slad phyogs ni bcing ba byas/ /brtul zhugs rab drag gzi ldan des/ /phyogs ni bcing ba bsgrubs pa na/ /klu bdag gdengs ka'i nor bu ni/ /gdung zhing mgo bo gzir bar gyur/ /de nas ma mthong yang
217b4(mdo 'grel): dag langs/ /sngags ni sgrub pa de mthong nas/ /bdar? zhing gdengs can bdag po ni/ /bcing bas skrag pa rab bsams pa/ /khro bo sma ra smin ma ser/ /lta byed ser skya glog lta bu/ /dus min dus dang mtshungs pa yi/ /gdug pa 'di ni ga las 'ongs/ /da ni gdug
217b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i bdag nyid 'dis/ /nags kyi phyogs ni bcing bar byas/ /ji srid 'dis bdag ma bcings pa/ /de srid rigs pa'i rim pa bzod/ /drang srong chen po shing shun can/ /'jug dogs nye ba'i mdza' 'dir gnas/ /bdag yongs bskyab pa dam pa ni/ /des kyang
217b6(mdo 'grel): nus pa min par shes/ /gang 'di de yi bsti gnas na/ /rtag tu rim gro yongs bsgrub pa/ /rngon pa pad+ma can zhes pa/ /de yi bdag ni bsrung bar bzod/ /ces pa yid kyi nges byas nas/ /rngon pa gal ba der song/ /rang gi sbyod/ tshul bshad nas ni/ /de
217b7(mdo 'grel): la 'ching bsrung bar zhus/ /klu yi rgyal bos sgrub pa po/ /bsad pa'i slad du gos la btab tshe/ /gzhu dang ldan pas gnas der phyin/ /sngags pa dpa' bo mthong bar gyur/ /gnas skabs der ni sgrub pa po/ /sngags pa yis kyang sbyin sreg
218a1(mdo 'grel): mes ? bcing bar 'dod pa klu yi ni/ /rgyal po rab tu dgug par bya ba/ /gdengs can bdag po sngags kyi ni/ /drangs tshe de yi gnas kyi chu ba chu yi chu bur rab dkrigs pas/ /myong na byed par brtson pa bzhin/ /lag 'gro'i chung
218a2(mdo 'grel): ma kun tu skrag pas 'khrugs pa'i mya ngan gyi/ /shugs rings shugs kyis rab bsgrubs rab 'bar dbu ba'i phreng ba can/ /rab tu 'dar zhing g.yo ba'i chu ni dpal rlabs lag pa yis/ /thal mo sbyar byas bsrung ba don du gnyer bar byed pa
218a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /mkha' lding gzi brjid ldan pa des/ /rig pa'i stobs kyi klu bzung ste/ /'khums shing gya gyu ldan pa'i lus/ /chu yi snod du btsal ba na/ /rngon pa yis ni gzhu bkang ste/ /dug gis byugs pa'i mda' dag gis/ /
218a4(mdo 'grel): skrag pas mig ni nyams gyur cing/ /gser la chags pa de la bsnun/ /'jig pas lag 'gro btab gyur cing/ /mnga' zung de la mngon phyogs te/ /de yis 'jigs rung ral gri yis/ /mgo bo? dag dang bral bar byas/ /rmongs
218a5(mdo 'grel): pa de yi rig pa ni/ /g.yem ma chags las gzhan dag dang/ /nye bar sbyor de grub mos kyang/ /rang nyid brlag don 'ba' zhig gyur/ /blun po'i rig pa 'byor pa stobs/ /pha rol nye bar gdung ba'i slang/ /sbyor ba rnams ni 'phral la
218a6(mdo 'grel): nyid/ /srog dang lhan cig nyams par gyur/ /de nas rab dga' yongs rdzogs pa/ /byas shes gdengs can 'dren pa yis/ /rang gi khang par rdon la de/ /mdzes gcugs blo dang ldan pas bos/ /nor bu'i khang pa gzhal yas
218a7(mdo 'grel): khang/ /rin chen 'khri shing skyed tshal der/ /ci tra yi ni mchod byed cing/ /de yi dus ni 'ga' zhig gnas/ /de nas ya mtshan ldan pa des/ /nam zhig glag phreng lta bu yi/ /zhags pa don yod cis bya ba/ /klu yi mchod par byed pa mthong/ /de mthong
218b1(mdo 'grel): de yis nus mthu dag/ klu yi bshad pa thos gyur nas/ /rdon? pa chaD pa'i yid ldan pas/ /de ni 'bad pas rab tu blangs/ /g.yul gyi sbyor ba mi pham zhing/ /lha rnams kyang ni 'ching byed pa/ /srog las lhag pa de de la/ /gdengs can dbang po dga' bas
218b2(mdo 'grel): byin/ /de nas zhags ba de blangs nas/ /ci tra la zhus rngon pa ni/ /klu yi khang pa las thon te/ /don thob rang gi gnas su song/ /klu yi mthu yis thob pa yi/ /phun tshogs yun ring de spyan nas/ /utpal can zhes bya ba yi/ /bu? la zhags pa byin nas 'das
218b3(mdo 'grel): rdon pa gzhon nu de yis kyang/ /pha yi spyod pa skyong byed cing/ /rigs kyi lugs kyi thub pa de'i/ /rim gro byed pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas nam zhig thub pa ni/ /bzhugs pa'i mdun na gnas pa des/ /shin tu phra zhing snyan pa'i gla/ /rna ba'i bcud len rgyas
218b4(mdo 'grel): pa thob/ /thub pa ri mo bkong pa bzhin/ /mthong nas ya mtshan des dris pa/ /padmo'i khongs su byung ba ni/ /yang dag bsdams pa'i sgra mtshungs shing/ /khu byug dbyangs ltar snyan pa yi/ /dgra 'di dag ni gang las thos/ /zhes brdon? pa'i bu yis dris/ /de
218b5(mdo 'grel): la thub pas rab smras pa/ /mi 'am chi yi bu mo rnams/ /snyan par brjod pa 'di dag len ? mi'am ci bdag ljon pa yin/ bu mo yid 'phrog ma 'di ni/ /bu mo lnga brgyas yongs bskor nas/ /klu yi khang bdag na rtse/ /de thos dge mtshan gyis non nas/ /de yi
218b6(mdo 'grel): slar yang thob la smras/ /mi 'am ci yi bu mo dag/ skyes bus 'thob par nus snyam? ci thub pa des smras gang gi ni/ /bag rtser? don yod ces bya ba'i/ /zhags pa song des 'dod ldan ma/ /mi 'o? ma ci mo blang bar nas/ /de nas de thos spro ldan pa'i//
218b7(mdo 'grel): rngon pa de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /zhigs? pa 'grub? ste gdengs can gyi/ /dbang po'i khang? pa dag tu song/ /deng des mi 'am ci mo'i tshogs/ /rtse dga' rol bas mtshan pa ni/ /gser gyi 'phro? shing nags kyi dpal/ /rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin? pa mthong
219a1(mdo 'grel): de dag dbus su yid 'phrog ma/ /khrus byas langs pa mthong gyur te/ /dran pa'i mig gsum me dag ni/ /zhi byed chu yi lha mo bzhin/ /lus med rnam 'phrul rtsom pa yi/ /dpa' rlabs tshogs ldan lang tsho ni/ /gzhon nu ma nyid
219a2(mdo 'grel): 'bying pa yi/ /rten sa dag ni byed pa yin/ /yid 'ong lha yi gos bgos shing/ /ske rags dag ni legs par bcings/ /chu de rol pas dbu ba yi/ /phreng ba rab gsal chags pa bzhin/ /mdzes sdug rab tu dkrigs gyur pa/ /do shal gsal pa'i rgyun
219a3(mdo 'grel): dag ni/ /shin tu che ba mtshan mo'i dpal/ /zla ba'i dkar ba phrogs pa bzhin/ /rna rgyan rin chen 'od zer gyi/ /tshogs kyi 'grom pa dag la ni/ /rol pa'i pa tra 'khri shing slar/ /chu yi dag pa 'bri ba bzhin/ /dpral ba'i rgyan du grogs mo yis/ /gla
219a4(mdo 'grel): rtsi'i ri mo 'bri byed pa/ /bsil zer dri ma ldan pa yi/ /skyengs pa zhi bar byed pa bzhin/ /de mthong ya mtshan 'bebs pa yi/ /zhags pas yid ni drangs gyur pa/ /rngon pas 'phral la zhags pa ni/ /don yod ces pa legs pa bstar/ /de nas lag
219a5(mdo 'grel): na zhags pa de/ /mthong nas 'phral la rab skrag cing/ /g.yo ba'i ri dwags mig can ma/ /mi 'am ci rnams mtho ris song/ /de yi myur bar lag pa yis/ /zhags pa 'phangs pas yid 'phrog ma/ /skrag pa'i mig dang ldan pa bzung/ /ri dwags mo ni
219a6(mdo 'grel): rngon pas bzhin/ /de yi dbang med zhags pas drangs/ /skad cig brgyal bas mig zum zhing/ /sdug bsngal gnas skabs brten pa der/ /'di ci zhes pa shes ma gyur/ /khyu nyams ri dwags mo bzhin du/ /rang gi skye bo blta bsam pas/ /phyogs su rnam par
219a7(mdo 'grel): lta byed cing/ /kun rmongs ma des de la smras/ /thob zhig thong zhig brtan par bcings/ /bdag la mi reg yongs su bsrungs/ /nges par mya ngan gyis gzir la/ /gdug pa rnams kyang rtse ldan yin/ /chags las lha yi bu mo ni/ /mchog min gnas la sbyar ba
219b1(mdo 'grel): na/ /'phral la sgrub ba po nyid sreg /rab tu 'bar ba'i rig pa bzhin/ /blo ldan glo yis rnam dpyad nas/ /'os pa dag pa bdag stsal na/ /khyod la nges par chos dang ni/ /nor gyi tshogs chen 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhags pas bsdams pa'i gdung ba 'di/ /bdag gi mi
219b2(mdo 'grel): bzod bcings pa thong/ /gang du khyod 'gro mngon 'dod pa/ /der ni bdag rang nyid kyis 'gro/ bcings pa btang bar gyur kyang bdag /mkha' la 'phung nas yod mi 'gro/ gang gi dbang gis mkha' la bdag 'gro ba'i gtsug gi rin chen bzung/ /zhes des mchim
219b3(mdo 'grel): dang bcas smras/ /snying rjes brlan pa nyid gyur te/ /gtsug gi nor bu yang dag blangs/ /zhags pa bkrol nas de la smras/ /dge ma dbugs ni dbyung bar mdzod/ /mya ngan bya bar yod mi 'os/ /des par 'os pa min la khyod/ /rang gi 'dod pas stsol mi bgyi/ /gang
219b4(mdo 'grel): gi grags pa bdud rtsi yi/ /dpa' rlabs kyis ni phyogs kun khengs/ /yon tan rin chen chu gter che/ /dpal ldan rgyal po'i sras po yod/ /de ni rig pa zhal la chags/ /sgyu rtsal rtsed 'jos rnam par brgyan/ /rang gi rigs kyi khyad par can/ /legs spyod
219b5(mdo 'grel): nor bzang zhes pa'o/ /bde dga' dag gi dpal bzhin du/ /gtong dang longs spyod skal ba bzang/ /rnam 'phrul sa yi rgyan gyur te/ /smin legs khyod la yang dag 'os/ /gang zhig sa yi mtshan mo'i bdag/ lha dang dri tha? mi 'am ci/ /rig 'dzin rnam par rtsen
219b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi/ /khengs pa dag ni thung ngur byed/ /ces pas de yi dbugs phyung zhing/ /gnyen tshogs bral ba'i yid 'phrog mas/ /ku ra ri bzhin shin tu ni/ /snying rje rje skad tsho de bton/ /skabs der 'bigs byed ros la ni/ /sngon gyi rtsed mo'i dge mchan la/ /'phong mkhaS
219b7(mdo 'grel): nor bzang so 'gyur ba/ /rim gyi gnas dag 'ongs par gyur/ /de yi shing rta'i mu khyud sgras/ /rma bya'i tshogs kyis gar byas nas/ /du gu la nyid g.yo zhing sngo/ /nags kyi dpal mos skad cig thog/ de ni rdul gyi chu thigs dag/ 'gram par chags pas?
220a1(mdo 'grel): mdzes pa/ /rna rgyan mdza' na bab? mdzes pa'i/ /mu tig 'bras bu 'phos pa bzhin/ /mdun du so yi 'od zer gyis/ shing rta'i rta rmig gis bslang pa'i/ /rdul gyi tshogs rnams 'phrog pa bzhin/ /kha lo pa la nges smras pa/ /kye ma yid kyi shing
220a2(mdo 'grel): rta bzhin/ /shing rta rlung ltar mgyogs pa yis/ /rang sde ring du btang nas ni/ /ji snyed sa gzhi 'das par gyur/ /byang chub shing gi yal 'dab ni/ /rlung bzhon gyis bskyong g.yo ldan pa/ /sa 'dis rgyan ni ljang khu yi/ /ljang ba'i mdzes pa nyid dag 'phrog/ /'khri?
220a3(mdo 'grel): shing gsar pa byu du'i mchu/ /me tog phun bu'i nu ma rgyas/ /snye ma rlung gi dkrugs 'di dag/ sred ldan bzhin du rmal? bar byed/ /mar ka ta ltar ljang ba'i/ /? sngon tshogs kyi stong kor can/ /me tog dngul gyis sbras pa yi/ /nags phreng 'di dag rab tu mdzes/
220a4(mdo 'grel): skrag nas bros ba'i ri dwags mo/ /'di dag mgrin pa 'khyog po yis/ /g.yo zhing lta bas utpal ni/ /sngon po'i nags tshal spro ba bzhin/ /so ni mtshan mo byed ba'i myu gu ltar mdzes shing/ /bum pa ri khrod ma bdag mdza' mo'i nu ma dag dang mtshungs/ /rtsibs gyi
220a5(mdo 'grel): sgras bcom rnam par g.yo ba'i rna grags so ldan gyi/ /phru gu 'di dag kun nas bdag gi shing rta dag la blta/ /? ba ri yi rked skabs las 'phro rma bya'i 'dab phreng rol bas bskyod pa yi/ /brtsed 'jo'i rnam 'phrul cha yi 'ching ba rnams la chas bar gyur
220a6(mdo 'grel): pa 'big byed rlung/ /dri med chu rlung nar ma dA dogs 'khri shing g.yo zhing rnam par rgyas pa yi/ /me tog sbrang rtsi'i dga' ston rgyas pas rab bsgos 'di dag myos pa bzhin du 'khyam/ /zhes pa smra ba'i mi bdag bu/ nags kyi dpal la spyod pa yi/ /skye bo
220a7(mdo 'grel): med par mi 'am ci'i/ /snying rje'i sgra yi gang ba thos/ /thos nas dge mtshan gyis drangs te/ /de dang nye bar brtse ba'i gter? pa yon tan dam pa'i me long de/ /song bas ri dags mig de mthong/ /mig chung bcas pas rngon pa la?/ /yongs su skyob pa
220b1(mdo 'grel): zhu byed cing/ /nags rgyu zad pa'i sdug bsngal dang/ /ldan pa'i nags tshal lha mo bzhin/ /ri dags mtshan ma'i dpal mo ni/ /rab brtags ri dwags rngon pa yi/ /drangs pa tshol du 'ongs gyur pa/ /nags su 'khyam zhing skyob bzhin/ /de mthong phul du byung ba'i
220b2(mdo 'grel): gzugs/ /ngo mtshar bcas pa ya mtshan de/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i ras la ni/ /myur du ri mo bkod bzhin gyur/ /de bsams kye ma 'di yi bzhin/ /legs bar 'bril mdzes pa ni/ /rnam par sprul byed goms byas pa'i/ /byed po ri mo yongs su smin/ /gdengs
220b3(mdo 'grel): can gnas rda rnyed pa dka' / /mi yi yul na gtam nyid ni/ /mdzes sdug rgya 'di mtho ris suAng/ /gser? du mngon par 'khrungs sam snyam/ /gzhon nu ma nyid dar la babs pas lus med dang bcas sgeg ldan zhing/ /lus phra gnyen lcug gsar du ltar byas
220b4(mdo 'grel): yan lag kun 'grogs grogs can gang gis ni/ /'bad med pha rol gnon pa shin tu rgya cher rtsom pa'i mngon spyod dang bral bar/ /'gro ba'i rgyal srid che la rtse dga' i mtshon dang ldan pa'i lha ni rnam par rgyal/ /de ltar ya mtshan snying po can/ /mngon par
220b5(mdo 'grel): 'dod ldan mig gis ni/ /de 'thung mtshungs la mngon phyogs te/ /phyag 'tshal rdon pas rab smras pa/ /mi 'am ci rgyal rigs kyi ni/ /dpag bsam ljon pa ljon pa yi/ /bu mo yid du 'ong ma 'di/ /lha cig bdag gis zhags pas drangs/ /khyod slang blangs
220b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i gzhon nu ma/ /mchog 'di rab tu bzung bar mdzod/ /yon tan rgya che khyod nyid ni/ /sa gzhi 'di yi bdag tu 'os/ /'di yi gtsug gi nor pa 'di/ /rang 'dod 'gro ster bdag gi ni/ /bzung ste de dang bral bas 'di/ /nam mkha' dag la 'gro ba med/ /nor bu
220b7(mdo 'grel): 'di ni bsrung bya ste/ /'di byin 'di dang phrad pa med/ /bu mo rin chen rin chen yang/ /de brjod de la rngon pas byin/ /sa yi ri dwags mtshan ma de/ /rgyal po'i bu yi blangs pa na/ bdud rtsis bran bzhin rang yul dang/ /bral ba'i me ni btang bar gyur/ /'dod ldan 
221a1(mdo 'grel): mig gi g.yo ba yi/ /ri dwags gzhon nu ma 'dra ste/ /rngon pas btang nas yid kyis ni/ /chags pa'i rgya yis bcings par gyur/ /mi 'am ci mo shing rtar bkod/ /rngon pa rin chen rnams kyis bkang/ /dga' ba rgyas pa'i sa bdag sras/ /rang gi
221a2(mdo 'grel): grong khyer dag tu song/ /ha sti na yi grong phyin des/ /rang gi gtam ni pha la bshad/ /dga' bas ya mtshan gyur pa des/ /bag ma yi ni dga' ston bsgrubs/ /gzugs can ri bong can gyi dpal/ /dge bas spyad byar gyur pa bzhin/ /mi 'am ci yi bu mo ni//
221a3(mdo 'grel): pho brang 'khor du gnas par byas/ /mchu yi sbrang rtsir chags ldan pa/ /sbrang rtsi 'thung pas bzhin du des/ /reg pa sra bzhin gyi chu skyes ni/ /dud cing padmo can de 'dab/ smra ba bcad kyang sred pa 'chad/ /g.yo ba med kyang yang yang 'dar/ /skyengs par gyur kyang
221a4(mdo 'grel): dpal mdangs gsal/ /de yi dga' ba de yi bsgrubs/ /dal gyi mchu yi ro myangs shing/ /so yi 'jigs pa byin nas ni/ /chu skyes rgyas pa'i mig can nges/ /smra bcad rgya ni de yi phral/ gos mdud 'gro la dang dgag pa la/ /khyo shugs lag pa'i padmo dag/ rab
221a5(mdo 'grel): tu 'dar ldan gdu? bu'i sgra/ /rtsod par byed par gyur pa bzhin/ /rtse dga' 'dzum gyi me tog rgyas/ /mdzes pa'i nu mas 'bras bus mtshan/ /chags byas yal 'dab ldan pa de'i/ /longs spyod rkang 'thung spyad byar gyur/ /gnas skabs der ni lho phyogs pa/
221a6(mdo 'grel): bram ze ser skya pu sgar gnyis/ /rgyal po nor gyi mdun sang ni/ /'tsho ba 'dod pas 'ongs par gyur/ /rig pa phul byung sngags 'os pa/ /de dag mdun na 'don nyid thob/ /ser skya dag ni sa skyong gi/ rgyal po'i bu yi gzhan pa'o/ /de dag rig pas
221a7(mdo 'grel): bcings pa yis/ /brtag tu rnam par rtsod byed cing/ /rdzas gcig mngon par 'dod pa yis/ /rnam par sdang bas yang dag skyes/ /gleng po la 'os snun byed pa/ /de dag gdong gi rig pa ni/ /chad gi ri mo lta bu dag/ zhe sdang skyon gyis nyams par bsgrubs/ /gang
221b1(mdo 'grel): gi rig pa mar me'i rtse mo dngos po rnams phyed yon tan dag gi grogs/ /'jig rten rab tu gsal la mngon phyogs mdun du zhes sdang mun pa mi bzad byed/ /rmongs pas nyer bcom rtog dpyod 'bral gzhung bza' ? chung ma'i dgra bo de dag rnams/ /tsandan zla ba chu shel
221b2(mdo 'grel): bdam? zhib las 'khrungs me yis sreg par byed/ /thos dang dran pa rtsod rnams la/ /gnas dang gnas su pus skad gyis/ /nges par tshar bcad ser skya yis/ /khro pa'i gdud bas yongs su bsams/ /rno zhing brtan par goms gyur pa/ /mi bzang rgyags shing
221b3(mdo 'grel): 'byar ba 'dis/ /rtag tu goms bzhin pa dag/ mdun sa dag tu skyengs par byed/ /shes rab bslu byed tshul dang ni/ /thos pa dregs pa'i rims dag dang/ /nong ni chos dag 'gog pa'i slad/ /ma rabs sems ldan rnams la 'gyur/ /dregs ldan 'di yis
221b4(mdo 'grel): rgyal sbas la/ /brten nas bdag gis yongs su 'joms/ /de slad 'di yi rten nyid kyis dpal gyi rtsub bdag gis gzhom/ /rig pa'i thabs ni 'ga' zhig gis/ /rgyal po'i sras ni dgrum? pa la/ /bdag ni 'bad pa bya bar 'os/ /khengs pa nyams pa
221b5(mdo 'grel): ji ltar bzod/ /de ltar drag po'i sdig brtag pa/ /de la sdang bas yang dag sbyar/ /phrad dog gis gang mi byed pa'i/ /sdig de 'jig rten na yod min/ /gang gis mi bzang khro ba yi/ /dug gi mig sman sman du btag /rtag tu bsams pa 'khrugs pa des/ /legs
221b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i lam ni ji ltar mthong/ /'dod chags mchog tu sdig cing de las kyang ni lhag par dregs pa sdig/ khro las sdig gzhan 'gro ? med bzod bka' sdigs 'chags pa'o/ /gdung ba dang ldan 'gro na sdig pa'i tshogs ni ji snyed bgrangs gyur pa/ /des kyang
221b7(mdo 'grel): rnam par sdang bas bskrun pa'i sdig pa'i cha la mtshungs dag min/ /de na nam zhig smrin zhes pa'i/ /gdug cing kar pa Ta ra gnas pa/ /gnod par byed pa'i rgyal phran gyis/ /dpung rnams springs pa'o sad pa dag /thos nas mi bdag thos pa yis?/ /thabs ni bzhi
222a1(mdo 'grel): par nges byas te/ /blon po rnams kyi 'dod pa yis/ /gzhon nu la ni 'di dag smras/ /gzhon nu stobs kyi dgra dag ni/ /myur du gcod du 'gro bar gyis/ /khyod kyi rim 'ongs rgyal srid che/ /'di ni zug rngu med par 'gyur/ /g.yul gyi
222a2(mdo 'grel): brtsom pa khyod kyis ni/ /dpung pa mthu yis brgyan pa ni/ /'gro bar rgyal ba'i glang po dag/ 'dogs pa'i ka gnyid du 'gyur/ /sa 'dzin rigs ni gnod pa'i sprin/ /sdug cing lhag par rgyas pa dag/ btsom? na khyod kyi gzi byin ni/ /phyogs su sgribs pa'i
222a3(mdo 'grel): bgegs med 'gyur/ /stobs med mdza' na gnas pa yis/ /rgyal phran gzhan ni bsad? pas ci/ /dregs ldan de nyid bzhom par bya/ /de bsad nas ni thams cad 'thub/ /gar zhig cha yis rang zas nyid du rnam par bsgrub pa yi/ /glang chen tshogs
222a4(mdo 'grel): ni 'phrog byed kyis bcom dge mtshan ci zhig yong/ /gal te sder mo'i gang rgyangs ldan pa'i gdod lnga mngon bcom na/ /de ni de yi skyes bu rtul? yod gtam gyi sam du 'gyur/ /zhes pa pha yis bstan pa ni/ /g.yul gyi dga' ston 'dod pa dang/ /mi
222a5(mdo 'grel): 'am ci 'bang g.yo bas des/ /skad cig khyod la 'phyang bzhin gyur/ /yun ring 'gro ba min brjod pas/ /'bad pas chung ma dbugs phyung nas/ /de yis ma la mngon phyogs te/ /phyag byas dal gyis rab smras pa/ /mi 'am ci dbang brgya byin du/ /brtag bya'i
222a6(mdo 'grel): bu mo khengs ldan ma/ /khyod kyis bdag la byams pa'i blos/ /'bral ba'i mya ngan gyis gzing skyongs/ /'di yi gtsug gi nor bu ni/ /rang 'dod 'gro ba ster ? ni dag/ srog la the tshom ma gtogs pa/ /ma ming kun tu sbyin mi bya/ /zhes brjod ma yi lag tu ni//
222a7(mdo 'grel): mdzes ma mdzes ma'i gtsug gi nor/ /gtad nas dpung gis phyogs kyi sgo/ /sgrib cing de ni myur du song/ /de yis rta tshogs kyis bslad pa/ /rdul tshul sprin ltar rgyas pa yis/ /dang pa'i rgyal po skrag pa dang/ /nyon mongs rgyu nyid dag tu 'gyur/ /khyod
222b1(mdo 'grel): mi rang du song ba na/ 'bral ba yis mi ying 'phrog ma/ /yang? ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma yis/ /mal stan la ni brten par gyur/ /sred ldan nyin par bgrang ba'i brtson pa dag la mngon sbyor zhing/ /grangs kyi ri mo'i lam ni sa la 'dar zhing g.yo bas 'bri byed pa/ /de yi
222b2(mdo 'grel): lag pa phra ba nyid kyis sgra ldan gang du bu ltung ba la/ /mchi ma'i rgyun gyi mu tig gdub bskor dag ni myur du gnas par bya/ /me tog 'dab can la sngar bde la phyir phyogs lus la 'ang chags pa nyid ma yin/ /bdag po'i bsam gtan skyong zhing nyin mtshan
222b3(mdo 'grel): du ni de yi ming gi gsang sngags zlos/ /mal stan sa gzhir byas te de lta na yang gzugs bzang gdung ba nyams ma gyur/ /'dod chags g.yo med chags pa'i yid rnams brtul zhugs drag pos grol ba min nam ni/ /shel gyis khri stan la 'dug cing
222b4(mdo 'grel): ? di tsan dan gyis skya ba/ /gzugs can ma de zla 'od kyis/ /dbus son zla ris bzhin du mdzes/ /de nas nam zhig sa skyong ni/ /rmi lam mthong nas dogs gyur pas/ /mdun na 'don ni ser skya dag/ yang dag pos nas dper par dris/ /grong khyer dgra rnams kyis
222b5(mdo 'grel): bkag cing/ /bdag gi lto brtol rgyu ma ni/ /drangs nas yongs su dkris pa yis/ /rmi lam de ring bdag gis mthong/ /blo gros chen po rmi lam 'di'i/ /rnam smin 'bras bur 'os pa gsungs/ /dge bar yongs bsgyur 'os pa yis/ /phyir bcos dag krang bsam
222b6(mdo 'grel): bar mdzod/ /ces pa la ya dbang pos dris/ /mdun ni 'don gyis skad cig ni/ /gus pa'i tshul mchod bsam gnyan ?/ /nang du mngon par 'dod pa bsams/ /pu ska ra yis rten? ba cang slad/ /rgyal po'i bu ni nyams pa la/ /shin tu yun ring bsams
222b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i thabs/ /'di ni bdag gi dga' bas thob/ /de yi chung ma mi 'am ci/ /yid 'phrog ma mchog 'tsho bas zhing/ /de dngos med na nges par ni/ /sdug cing bskal pas de mi 'tsho/ /zhes pa bsams nas de la bu yi/ /rdzun gyi smyo? dang chags thal can/ /mdun na/
223a1(mdo 'grel): 'don ni mi phan pa/ /tshol bas nor 'dzin dbang la smras/ /lha cig khyod ni rmi lam dan/ /mchog tu snying rje 'dar byed 'di/ /mthong ste 'di yi 'bras bu ni/ /bzod dka' gsal bar ji ltar brjod/ /rje la gus pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/ /gnas
223a2(mdo 'grel): shing skyon bsgrub bdag nyid min/ /phan pa tshol rnams rna par ni/ /mi snyan brjod pa dgag pa med/ /rmi lam 'di bslab gsal bar ni/ /rgyal srid dam ni lus la nyams/ /'di la dogs dang bral ba yin/ /'byor pa'i slad du phyir bcom bya/ /mchod sbyin zhing
223a3(mdo 'grel): du rdzing bu ni/ /phyugs kyi khrag gis yongs gang bar/ /khyod bkrus bram zes dag byas shing/ /gser dang rin chen rab mang byin/ /mi 'am ci mo'i tshil gyis mer/ /sbyin sreg byas las khyod dge thob/ /khyod kyi mna' ma pho brang na/ /yong pas mi'am ci mi
223a4(mdo 'grel): dkon/ /zhes pa de tshig ma rungs pa/ /thos nas sdig pas rmus phyin cing/ /gtum po'i spyod pas skrag gyur pa/ /sa yi bdag po de la smras/ /rang gi srog ni bsrung ba'i slad/ /bud med gsod la ji ltar spro/ /mi 'am ci mo dang bral na/ /des par bdag gis
223a5(mdo 'grel): bu mi 'tsho/ /zhes te sa la spyod pas de'i/ /'dod pa phyir la bzlog pa na/ /mdun na 'don ni sdig pa la/ /mngon par zhen pas yang deng smras/ /kye ma rgyal po blo gros dang/ /ldan yang skye bo'i lugs mi shes/ /sde gsum bsgrub byed rgyal srid dung/ /srog kyang?
223a6(mdo 'grel): btang bar bya ba min/ /nor bzhin nang mi grogs po chung ma bu rnams ni/ /nyams pa skyes bu gnas na slar yang 'byung ba 'gyur/ /dbugs tsam bral zhing srog ni song bar gyur pa la/ /de dus nye bar gnas kyang thams cad mi dus? nyid/ /'tsho ba'i don du rang
223a7(mdo 'grel): yul dang/ /gces pa'i bu yang gtong bar byed/ /rgyal po 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten na/ /srog las gzhan ni gces pa med/ /de ltar de yis sna tshogs kyis/ /dpe yis dal gyis brid pa na/ /rgyal po srog la chags pa yis/ /sdig la rigs par? kha
223b1(mdo 'grel): yis blangs/ /de nas phun tshogs brtsom pa yis/ /mchod sbyin las la 'jug byed cing/ /phyugs kyi khrag gis gang ba yi/ /rdzing bu yang ni byas pa'i tshe/ /dben par rang gi btsun mo la/ /rgyal pos rang gi spyod tshul bshad/ /bu ni byes bgrod mya ngan gyis/ /gzing
223b2(mdo 'grel): cing sdig bas skrag par bsams/ /kye ma mna' ma bsod pa yi/ /sgrub byed sdig pa rgya che 'dir/ /mdun na 'don ni gti mug gis/ /long bas rgyal po rab rmongs bskul/ /mchi ba'i mtshams ni nges bcad pa/ /'bad pas yongs 'phrog mi nus kyang/ /gzhan
223b3(mdo 'grel): gyi srog ni phrog pa yis/ /blun po rnams ni 'tsho bar 'dod/ /gal te srog la chags pa yis/ /bu mo bzhin bzang bdud rtse 'dra/ /mna' ma yin yang rgyal po yis/ /bsang na bdag ni ci zhig smra/ /ma gcig khyod kyis mnyes gshin las/ /bdag gi yid
223b4(mdo 'grel): 'phrog ma 'di skyongs/ /zhes brjod bu ni nor bzang dag/ bdag la chung ma gtang nas song/ /de slad bdag las gtsug gi nor/ /thob na de ni mkha' la 'gro/ /de ni 'tshon bdag po dang/ /slar yang 'phrad pa nyid du 'gyur/ /zhes bsams mna' mo ga la bar/ /mig
223b5(mdo 'grel): chur bcas pa de song nas/ /rgyal po'i tshul ni de la bshad/ /rab 'dar ldan pas slar smras pa/ /mnyes gshin gtsug gi nor bu chings/ /nam mkha' dag la mgyogs par song/ mi bdag 'di ni sdig dang ldan/ /dam pa'i spyod la mi lta'o/ /khyod ni mchog sbyi
223b6(mdo 'grel): sar song nas/ /nam mkha' i lam nas 'gro bar bya/ /gzhan du khyod ni 'ba' zhig tu/ /bdag gi sbas bkod 'di yis rig/ ces pa'i tshig thos yid 'phrog ma/ /khyod dang bral bas gdungs gyur pas/ /'bad pas de dang phrad pa'i slad/ /rab tu bcas par
223b7(mdo 'grel): lus srung zhing/ /gtsug gi nor bu sgyur mo yis/ /byin pa blangs nas spyi bor bcings/ /mna' ma bros pa mchod sbyin gyis/ /zhing du song nas mkha' la 'gro/ rgyal po bu ni gces kyang mna' ma bsad par bya ba gang 'di ni/ /khyod kyi 'os par ma yin
224a1(mdo 'grel): khyod ni shis gyur bdag ni rang gnas song/ /bdag bral bstan pa rab tu nyams pa'i gzhon nu 'di yang srung bar gyis/ /der de brjod nas rab phra glog gi rnam 'phrul dag gis de song gyur/ /de song tshe na mi bdag ni/ /mchod sbyin
224a2(mdo 'grel): bgegs kyi dogs par gyur/ /mdun na 'don gyis de la smras/ /sa bdag the tshom yang ma byed/ /gdug pa zhes bya tshangs pa yis/ /srin po dag gis sngags kyi drangs/ /mi 'am ci mo de des bsad/ /khyod kyis mchod sbyin bgegs med grub/ /ces
224a3(mdo 'grel): pa de yi rdzun gyi tshig/ rgyal po yi ni bden par bsams/ /'khrul 'khor gzugs brnyan brtse dga' yis/ /rmongs rnams byung rgyus gar byed do/ /pha yi khang par mngon phyogs te/ /dga' ba ster byed yid 'phrog mas/ /snying la khyod ni bzung byas te//
224a4(mdo 'grel): rang gi spyod pa'i mdza' rnams bshad/ /yab kyi bka' yi mi dang ni/ /'grogs pa'i dri ma zhi ba'i slad/ /gser gyi bum pa lnga brgya yis/ /nyi ma so sor khrus dag byas/ /bkrus pas mi yi dri ma ni/ /rab tu chung ba nyid du gyur/ /nor bzang la ni mdza' gnags?
224a5(mdo 'grel): ldan/ /ri dwags mig gi chags pa min/ /lha yi skyed tshal longs spyod la/ /de ni dga' bar yongs ma gyur/ /gzhan la chags par gyur pa yis/ /lus can gzhan lan dga' ba med/ /nam zhig mkha' la 'gro ma de/ /sdug pa dang? bral nyon mongs shing//
224a6(mdo 'grel): klu yi khang pa'i nye 'khor de/ /nags mdza' i nor 'dzin dag tu song/ /drang song chen po bsti gnas te/ /gnas pa shing shun can de la/ /rab tu bdud cing phyag 'tshal te/ /'dud cing mngon du phyogs bas smras/ /bdag ni 'ching brnon pa la/ /nye bar bstan pa
224a7(mdo 'grel): khyod kyis ni/ /gal te rigs pa 'di byas na/ /bcom ldan khyod nyid bdag gi gsungs/ /shes pa de yi tshig thos nas/ /cung zad ngo tshos bzhin btud de/ /thub pas der smras bzhin bzang ma/ /'di ni khyod kyis myong ba nyid/ /de la zhags pa don yod
224b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /yod ces bdag gis ma shes bshad/ /g.yod can rdon pas de yis gtam/ /shes nas khyod ni bcings par gyur/ /bden par smra ba'i mu cor can/ /rang bzhin drang ba bdag cag gis/ /ma rungs bdag nyid gdug pa yi/ /sems gyi gya gyu yongs mi shes/ /shes
224b2(mdo 'grel): pa thub pas brjod de la/ /gzugs can ma yis gus par smras/ /phu mo'i tshig 'di g.yo ba 'di/ /bcom ldan gyis ni bzod par mdzod/ /khyod kyi mdun du bdag gis ni/ /gang 'di cung zad brjod gyur pa/ /dam pa'i spyod las 'gal ba 'di/ /bud med rnams
224b3(mdo 'grel): kyi skal ba bzang/ /sdug bsngal 'don la chas gyur cing/ /yongs su gdung la brtse ldan rnams/ /'os pa min pa rnams kyi yang/ /phal cher bya ba sgrub mdzad yin/ /tshe ? dag dang ldan pa dag /rngon? pa'i zhags pas bcings las grol/ /'phrog byad mdza' ba'i
224b4(mdo 'grel): zhags pa yis/ /rgyal po'i bu yis nges par bcings/ /nor bzang zhes pa skal pa bzang/ /bdag bral me yis gdungs pa de/ /gal te lam ni 'di nyid nas/ /khyod can nye bar 'ongs gyur na/ /snying rje las ni khyod nyid kyis/ /bdag gis phrin 'di smra bar byos//
224b5(mdo 'grel): khyod bral gdung pas bde med cing/ /bdag ni yab kyi khyim na 'khod/ /mdun dang rjes su rtse ba'am/ /byas shes lhan cig skyes pa 'am/ /rjes mthun mdun du bdar byas te/ /'di nas myur du 'byon par mdzod/ /mi 'am ci yi grong khyer lam/ /bgrod dga' nyon
224b6(mdo 'grel): mongs brgya yis rten/ /brtson 'grus stobs gzi chud pa yi/ /mi rnams kyis ni sa min nyid/ /dka' thub nags mdza' 'dir 'bar ba/ /bdud rtsi zhes pa'i sman chen ni/ /mthong ste zhun mar la gtsos pa/ /khyod rang nyid kyis btung bar bya/ /de mthus snying stobs
224b7(mdo 'grel): grogs ldan khyod/ /nyon mongs rab tu sgrol 'gyur te/ /lam ni kai? lA sa rgod ltar/ /dkar bas bdag phreng byin par 'gyur/ /bdag gi rtags mtshan sor gdub ni/ /'di yang de la sbyin par bya/ /zhes brjod de yi mi zad pa'i/ /lam ni rim pas bshad byas te/ /ngo mtshar 
225a1(mdo 'grel): rigs pa dag gis ni/ /bgegs rnams phyir bcos thabs bstan nas/ /de ba'i 'ching bas srog bzung ba /song gdub byin nas song bar gyur/ /lam ring sgrol byed rmad byung dag/ de yis bshad pa thos gyur te/ /sor gdub dag ni blangs byas nas//
225a2(mdo 'grel): thub pa de dag nyid la sems/ /skabs der sa yis bdag po sprin/ pham par byas shing mdzod blangs nas/ /chung ma blta bar 'dod pa yis/ /rgyal po'i bu ni 'ongs par gyur/ /rgyal phran gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /mkha' ni chu gter lbu ba'i 'dzum/ /rgyas
225a3(mdo 'grel): pa dag dang mtshungs byed cing/ /de ni rang gi grong khyer zhugs/ /de nas mna' ma'i nye gyod gyis/ /lo rgyus 'chang la nyon mongs shing/ /'dar ba'i bro brang 'khor song ste/ /de yis yab la rab tu btung/ /'og tu bzhin phyogs skye bo kun/ /mya ngan zug rdus
225a4(mdo 'grel): dga' ston bcom/ /yab kyi pho brang 'khor mthong nas/ /de ni dga' dang bral bar dogs/ /'bral bas gzir? ba'i yid 'phrog ma/ /gzugs bzang ma de 'tsho lam? ci/ /zhes smras de la su yis kyang/ /gang tshe mi snyan ma brjod pa/ /de tshe ? yis rab smras pa//
225a5(mdo 'grel): bu gcig khyod kyi dga' ma 'tsho/ /'on kyang srog la the tshom tshe/ /gtsug gi nor bu thob nas song/ /zhes pa thos pa nyid na de/ /'phral las yi gzhi la 'gyel/ /do shal 'khri shing bkram pas sa/ /mchi ma'i rgyud ldan byed pa bzhin/ /kha ba'i thig pa ltar
225a6(mdo 'grel): dkar ba'i/ /ha ri tsan dan chu dag gis/ /dal gyis 'du shes rnyed pa des/ /mchims 'bral ? rnam par smras/ /mkha' min ri bong can gyi dpal/ /bsrubs min bdud rtsi'i rgyud dang ldan/ /'bad med me tog gzhu can gyis/ /rin chen gnas de gang na yod//
225a7(mdo 'grel): bla ma'i bka' bcings ring du 'gro byed pa/ /bdag gis ri dwags mig can mchi ma yis/ /mig ni 'gags pa'i dga' ba ma bsgrubs pa/ /des na dran pa'i dmod 'di bdag la lhung/ /yid 'phrog ma ni gang du song/ /smin legs tshig gis lan dag byin//
225b1(mdo 'grel): bag med blun po bdag gis ni/ /ri dwags mig can khyod ma bsrungs/ /khyod dang 'grogs pa'i skal bzang ldan/ /lha yi mdun sar bsngags par 'os/ /khyod dang bral bas mi yi ni/ /'jig rten bdag bzhin ci zhig mdzes/ /zhes pa smra zhing dal bu yi/ /mdzes ma'i
