225b2(mdo 'grel): longs spyod dbang gyur pa/ /skyed mos tshal du dga' ma mchog/ tshol du rang nyid song bar gyur/ /'khor gyi skye bo bring byas te/ /mtshan mo dag ni mtshor bar/ /nags mthar song nas mnyam pa dang/ /mi mnyam rnams su rnam par 'khyams/ /'dod chags drag
225b3(mdo 'grel): po'i sha za ni/ /chen pos rnam par rmongs pa des/ /smyon pa bzhin du sems ldan dang/ /sems med la yang rnam par dris/ /grogs po ne tso'i phru gu grogs kyi grogs mo ni/ /srog mtshungs zla rdzogs bzhin ldan de ni smra bar byas/ /de yi so yi sgrib byed dmang ba dag
225b4(mdo 'grel): gi cha/ /bim pa'i 'bras bu rtag tu khyod kyis longs spyod yin/ /kye lags dang pa lus dkar dang 'grogs padmo can rol rna rgyan ltar mdzes pa/ /mu tig tshogs ni rnam par g.yo ba gang gi 'o ma 'dzin pa rgyas pa'i rtser/ /ba spu'i khri shing ngang pa la ni nya lcibs
225b5(mdo 'grel): 'khri shing lhung bzhin rnam mdzes pa/ /dri bzang khang pa pad+ma'i bzhin ldan mdzes pa'i dpa' rlabs can de mthong dam ci/ /de ltar sdug bsngal drag pos bcings pa la/ /rab smre mnyam pa la yang 'greng de la/ /brtse bas lam ni rab gsal ster ba bzhin//
225b6(mdo 'grel): dal gyi bsil zer can ni nam mkhar 'dzes/ /mtshan mo'i bdag po yid srubs gnyen gyi ni/ /gzugs mdzes mkha' la sbyar ba de mthod nas/ /'dzum ldan zla zhal ma yis nam mkha' yi/ /gzhal yas khang pa'i steng nas bzhin bstan sam/ /mi smra dri
225b7(mdo 'grel): mas mtshan nyid skyon dag thob/ /rnam 'phrul med cing dgod dang rtse 'jos dman/ /zla ba'i bzhin du ring zhig lon nas des/ /mi yi mgon po'i bus ni 'gro zhing dris/ /grogs po khyod kyi mkha' la mdzes sdug grogs/ /gang gi bzhin gyi nyer 'jal 'brel
226a1(mdo 'grel): thob bas/ /'gro la khyod kyi grags par rab rgyas pa/ /mtshan ma ri dwags mig mtshungs mthong dam ci/ /mdzes ma'i gtam na don gnyer dngos gyur pa/ /bdag la cung zad ji ltar 'di mi smra/ /gzhan don sgrub la ni bsil gyur
226a2(mdo 'grel): ba/ /sgyu rtsal cha ldan su yi do dag byed/ /gang gi skra sogs phreng bas rnam bkra ste/ /khyod kyi mjug ma'i tshogs kyi grogs gyur ba/ /yid 'ong glog gi rab gsal sprin ldan gzhi?/ /'gar yang rma bya khyod kyi mthong dam ci/ /gtsug ni rin chen mchog ldan
226a3(mdo 'grel): lag 'gro ma/ /gal te lag 'gro khyod kyis 'gar mthong dam/ /ltos shig gang gi dug gis zer spros pas/ /bzod dka' i 'bral pa 'dir ni bdag srog go/ ri dwags khyod kyis yid srub sa? dag gi/ /do ? rtse 'bro med mthong dam ci/ /gang gis zur mig
226a4(mdo 'grel): utpal cha dag gis/ /ri dwags rnams ni nags na mdzes sam snyam/ /rnam 'phrul skyes sa yal 'dab mdzes pa'i mchu/ /rol par rnam par g.yo ba'i bud med dag/ phung bu can de la ? shing bzhin du ni/ /nags mthar nags bdag khyod kyi mthong dam
226a5(mdo 'grel): ci/ /de ni sprin dang mtshungs pa nags tshal gyi/ /glang po 'di yi zla ba'i cha bzhin du/ /gser gyi chu shing yongs 'khyud la chags nas/ /blangs nas khyer ram bsgribs pa ma yin nam/ /de ltar nags tshal skyibs rnams su/ /bla bcol rab brjod de
226a6(mdo 'grel): yi ni/ /mya ngan gyis bzhin mtshan mo ni/ /zla ba'i bzhin ras mdog bral song/ /de yi klu yi gnas dang nye/ /dogs 'gram dka' thub nags tshal du/ /dal gyis zhugs te drang srong che/ /zhing shun can la rab tu bris/ /'dir ni 'bral bas sems
226a7(mdo 'grel): ngan shugs rings kyis spar ba/ /'dod pa'i me yi du bas sngo chags lhas ma gcig pa can/ /ri bong can gyi mdzes sdug ? rgyas zhi byed ri dwags mig/ migs? ci mo su zhig thub pa mchog gis gzigs sa? pa'i/ /zhes pa mdzes ma dang bral
226b1(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /smyon pa'i skabs ni thob gyur pa/ /de yi tshig thos thub pa yis/ /yongs su shes nas de la smras/ /khyod ni ngal so dbugs byung la/ /yongs su gdung ba 'di gtang mdzod/ /khyod kyi dge ma yid kyi ni/ /zla ba'i 'od de bdag gi mthong/ /byu? nyams ri dwags
226b2(mdo 'grel): mo bzhin du/ /'tsho ba la yang bltos ba med/ /glang mo zhags pas drangs pa bzhin/ /de ni khyod kyi bsam pas 'tsho/ /lag pa dag la bzhin gyi pad+ma nyal zhing yal 'dab mal stan la/ /gdung bas nyen cing g.yo ba'i tshig ldan ri mo kun tu nyal ? lus//
226b3(mdo 'grel): re ba bcas la bstan pa blo gros khyod bral 'khrugs gyur pa/ /de yi yid ni 'gar yang ci yang ngal bsos nyid du 'gyur ma yin/ /ljon pa mi'am ci yi bdag/ yab kyi khyim na bdag gnas so/ /khyod ni myur du shog cig ces/ /de yi khyod la yang dag bsnyan/ /brtson
226b4(mdo 'grel): 'grus snying stobs stobs dang thabs/ /bstan dang sro ldan rnams kyis kyang/ /bsgrod min mi'am ci yin ni/ /grong khyim lam yang rim pas bshad/ /gang gi 'od 'jam reg pa yis/ /phyogs rnams ser po nyid 'gyur ba/ /rin chen sor ? 'di yod ni/ /de yis
226b5(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi ched du byin/ /zhes brjod kun dga' i bdud rtsi yis/ /bran zhing bstan pa dag gi rten/ /sor gdub dag ni de la byin/ /lam yang thub pas rab tu bshad/ /de yis bstan pa'i lam dbu ni/ /thabs dang ? mi bdag bu/ /bstan pas ? 'dzin gnas pa
226b6(mdo 'grel): yis/ /phyogs su 'gro bar rab tu brtsams/ /sman chen bdud rtsi legs grub pa/ /mar gyis srin pa 'thungs nas ni/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi bdag nyid thob/ /mtshon cha dang bcas dal gyis song/ /? 'phrul gyis ni lam du de'i/ nyer ? thams cad nyer gnas gyur
226b7(mdo 'grel): snying stobs grogs dang ldan rnams kyi/ /grub pa phun tshogs rang dbang gi/ de nas rig 'dzin bu mo ni/ /rtse dga' rgod pa ltar mdzes pa/ /gdas can rgal nas de yis ni/ /ku kU lA yi? sleb/ /'bras bu'i skyes kyis khas blang kyis/ /der ni sbre'u ?
227a1(mdo 'grel): khyu yi bdag/ rlung shugs shes pa la zhon nas/ /ri bo de ni de yi dgongs/ /de nas lug gi lam shes pa'i/ /snga 'dzin dag ni rab tu rgal/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sbrul chen ni/ /bgegs kyi cho gas bzhin mda' yis
227a2(mdo 'grel): bsnun/ /'dod pa'i gzugs can srin mo ni/ /rgyud mangs sgra yis dbang byas nas/ /'dod pa'i gzugs kyi ri bo bzlas/ /mi 'am ci mo'i bdag po song/ /de nas rgyun cig ri bo la/ /yang yang mtshon gyi rtse mo yis/ /bsnun zhing brkos bdag
227a3(mdo 'grel): gis ni/ /stobs ldan shin tu brtul bas 'dzegs/ /de nas rdo rje can zhes ba'i/ /ri bo rab drag de yis 'dzegs/ /srin mo sha ni chol byed pa/ /bya rkod gzugs can yang dag mthong/ /sha ldan de dwags bags pa ni/ /yong su bsgyur bas kun tu
227a4(mdo 'grel): g.yogs/ /ri bo de yi zhabs kyi rtsem/ /de yi lus ni g.yo med 'khod/ /mtshan rgyu bya rgod gzugs can ni/ /sha la chags pas de blangs nas/ /'jigs rung gzugs kyis bza' ba'i phyir/ /ri rtser steng du rnam par bkod/ /brtson 'grus
227a5(mdo 'grel): can des ri dwags kyi/ /pags pa btang nas de bsad de/ /seng ldeng stug pa'i khengs ba yi/ /sang ldeng sa 'dzin dag tu phyin/ /de yi phug zhugs rngo bsal bas/ /glang dang tsha dang mun pa sbrul/ /srin po la sogs 'jigs pa dag/ 'phrog ba'i
227a6(mdo 'grel): sman ni chen po thob/ /'khrul 'khor ri gnyis rab bsdegs bas/ /srog ni de yis 'phrog par de yis sleb/ /'khrul 'khor phur pa mda' rtse yis/ /bcad nas g.yo ba med par byas/ /'khrul 'khor phung ba bcad rnams kyis/ /'khrul
227a7(mdo 'grel): 'khor sgo ni des btsom zhing/ /'khrul 'khor longs spyod bcad de bzhin/ /ltags kyi 'khrul 'khor sbyar ba'o/ /grag tu smun? byed skyes bu gnyis/ /bzod dka' lug gi 'khrul 'khor gnyis/ /de bzhin tshul srin srin po'i so'i/ /'khrul
227b1(mdo 'grel): 'khor drag pos 'joms pa gnyis/ /'jigs rung mun pa zab pa'i phug/ khron pa gnyis kyang rnam par 'gongs/ /chu bo chen po yang dag rgal/ /de dogs srin po rnams bsad nas/ /mche ba'i dug ldan gnas pa'i chu/ /pa tig zhes thur bgrod dang/ /gang
227b2(mdo 'grel): 'gram mi 'am ci dag gi/ 'bangs rnams du ba'i sgra dag gis/ /de 'gro'i sems la bgegs byed pa/ /klung ni di ba can dag dang/ /de bzhin dgod pa can zhes pa/ /dgod pas sems la gnod byed dang/ /mi 'am ci mo rnams dag gi/ gang gi 'gram du gdud
227b3(mdo 'grel): steg ba/ /thur dgrong gzhan yang bzlas byas te/ /de 'og sba ldan rlung can phyin/ /de nas de las thar 'dod na/ /'gram gyi sba yi 'khri shing gzung/ /rlung gi bskul pa pha rol gyi/ /sba yi 'khri shing de yis thog re ba bzhin du rab ring ba/ /de yi pha rol 'gram
227b4(mdo 'grel): du? phyin/ /mi 'am ci li grong khyer na/ /rab gsal shel gyi khang ba mthong/ /de yi dal bus nang du zhugs/ /gser gyi yang ldan mdzes par phyin/ /de yi dogs gyi shing la 'dzegs/ /rin chen 'khri shing gis sgribs gnas/ /deng des chu skyes rdul tshogs
227b5(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /dri bzang ser por gyur ba'i chu/ /mi 'am ci mo rnams dag gis/ /len pa dag ni mthong bar gyur/ /der ni bum 'degs dal pa yis/ /gzir ba gcig can des mngon phyogs/ /lag bas brten nas grogs byas te/ /dal bu yis ni de la dris/ /ma
227b6(mdo 'grel): ma? su yi ched du ni/ /chu 'di 'bad nas len par byed/ /gangs gus pa khyed rnams ni/ /yongs su ral 'di rtsi mi byed/ /de ltar chig snyan gyis des bris/ /mchos? sdug snyan sgra ldan pa yi/ /phyogs su skad cig gis lhung ma/ /de yis de la rab smras? ba/ mi yi drib
227b7(mdo 'grel): dug bya'i slang/ rtag tu dri bzang chu rnams kyis/ /mi'am ci rgyal yab kyi bkas/ /yid 'phrog ma ni khrus byed do/ /zhes pa de yis brjod thos nas/ /skad cig bdud rtsis bran pa bzhin/ /de yi rtags mtshan sor gdub? ni/ /gser gyi bum par de yi 'phangs/ /de nas
228a1(mdo 'grel): song gdub mngon par 'phrog byed de ni bum pa las/ /khrus byed yid 'phrog ma yi nu ma'i bum pa zung la lhung/ /gang gi gzugs brnyan zer ldan rin chen 'od zer ri mo yi/ /myur du sen mo 'debs pa'i rtse dga' dag dang
228a2(mdo 'grel): mtshungs pa thob/ /de rjes rin chen sor gdub lus med gtim dag nang song ba/ /rang gi rjes su chags pa gzugs can bzhin du brtags byas nas/ /bdag po 'ongs par ris te 'di ni khyod kyi gang las thob/ /ces pa de yis 'bangs mo
228a3(mdo 'grel): la ni 'das pa bzhin du spras/ /de nas 'bangs mos de la smras/ /lha mo rdzing bu'i dogs dag na/ /yid srubs mngon du gyur pa bzhin/ /dang bab mdzes pa 'ga' zhig mchis/ /gang mthu snying po can gyi chu/ /gur gum mdzes ba nyid bsten pa/
228a4(mdo 'grel): sor gdub 'di ni de nyid kyis/ /gser gyi bum pa de ru 'phangs/ /zhes pa de yi tshig snyan thos/ /gzugs bzang ldan pa yid 'phrog mas/ /khyod ni 'ongs par nges byas nas/ /de nyid de ni 'gugs su btang/ /de yi rab sbas skyed tshal gyi/ /khang
228a5(mdo 'grel): par bkod pa'i mdzes ba ni/ ku mud cad gyi zla ba bzhin/ /yid 'phrog ma ni song bas mthong /phan tshun lta bar byed ba'i rnam 'phrul dang/ /'bral ba yongs gdung rnam par 'chad pa dang/ /de dag rab dga' nyams su myong gyur pas/ /lus
228a6(mdo 'grel): med yan lag kun ldan mdzes ba thob/ /bral ba'i dus su gang gang cung zad bsam pas nang du goms byas dang/ /gang gang rab dga' rab rgyas yid srubs grogs kyi nye bar bstan pa dang/ /gang gang mdza' bar mtshungs dang gang gang srod
228a7(mdo 'grel): ldan phung por 'os gyur pa/ /de de thams cad mdza' gcugs bskal bzang khyo shug de gnyis dag gis byas/ /de rjes spyod tshul bsgribs ba ni/ /de tshe ldan pa'i yid 'phrog mas/ /bshad nas pha ma dag la ni/ /bdag po sa yi yid
228b1(mdo 'grel): 'byung bstan/ /de nas mi'am ci yi rgya la/ /de la khros bsam chu bskyod cing/ /bu mo'i bdag ni mthong ba'i lam/ /yongs su gtang nas rab smras pa/ /kye ma mi 'os skye bo la/ /tsha yis bag med lhung gyur pa/ /spyod tshul ngan pa bkrus kyang ni/ /chags pa nyid ni khyod mi
228b2(mdo 'grel): gtang/ /khyod kyi mdzes sdug lang tshol/ /lha rnams kyis ni reg bya 'di/ /kye ma mi dang mdza' ba yis/ /mya ngan bya 'os nyid du gyur/ /mthon po'i rigs las skyes gyur cing/ /stug po'i lang tsho rab rgyas pa/ /thur 'gro 'khrugs pas rnam nyams pa/ /khyod na
228b3(mdo 'grel): shin tu 'og tu 'gro/ mkhas pa chags bral skyed byed cing/ /rigs ni skyengs par byed pa me/ /mi san rig bzhin dri ma can/ /khyod ni su yang mi 'dod do/ /gzugs tsam gyis ni khyod tshim nas/ /gal te mi yi dbang gyur na/ /gser las sprul ba'i skyes bu yas
228b4(mdo 'grel): gzugs dang rtse dga' cis mi byed/ /mthu dang yon tan gyis dman pa/ /skyes bu rab mdzes dbyibs can gyi/ /mdzes sdug ri mor bris pa yis/ /skyes bu yi bzhin rtsig pa mjos?/ /'brel dman ngo chos sdig can ma/ /khyod khyo bdag gis gsang bar bya/ /khyod slong
228b5(mdo 'grel): la 'ongs lha rnams kyi/ /bzhin ni bdag gi lta mi phod/ /bden par sgro ba dang ldan zhing/ /mthon por gyur ba'i yi dag ni/ /bu mos 'khums par byed pa ste/ /dus ni ngas par dga' bas bzhin/ /de skad pa yi smad gyur des/ /mchi ma'i thig pa nu ma la/ /ngo shel skud med
228b6(mdo 'grel): sbrig byed cing/ /bzhin btung de la rab smras pa/ /yab lags khro bas ni 'ongs pa/ /'di dag bdag la gsung 'os min/ /mthu yi mi'am ci dag la/ /lhag pa'i mis ma thos sam ci/ /mkha' ldid gis kyang bgrod dka' ba/ /sa 'di gang gis bgrod ?
228b7(mdo 'grel): nas/ /'ongs pa mthu yis bzhi ste/ /mi ? nyid yin pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /yus can rnams kyi lus dag ni/ /yon tan yang dag brjod byed cing/ /bsil zer can gyi 'od zer ni/ /kun dga' skyed par byed pa yin/ /yab cig rigs kyi ci zhig bya/ /yon tan dang 
229a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin rjes su 'brang/ /zla rgyas bdud rtsi zags pa ni/ /nag po brtsegs pa'i yun zla nyid/ /kha cig nang na yon tan ldan/ /de bzhin gzhan ni skyon bsgribs pas/ /nor bu rnams kyi ri dag ni/ /ma brtags 'grong bar yod mi bya/ /de thos mi 'am
229a2(mdo 'grel): ci yi bdag /de de bzhin zhes sems byed cing/ /mag pa yang dag pos nas ni/ /yon tan shes par 'dod pas smras/ /mi 'am ci yi bu 'di dag/ re zhig khyod kyi mdzes pas btul/ /mthu ni yang dag bstan pa na/ /mchog gi 'brel pa dag tu 'os/ /shin tu
229a3(mdo 'grel): yangs ba sha ri'i nags/ /shar phyung byas skad cig gis/ /til bre gang ? mi nyung bar/ /rab tu sdus la slar yang byin/ /bstan dang 'ben la sogs pa yi/ /gzhu yi rig byed mkhas pa ston/ /de nas grags pa'i ba dan ni/ /yid 'phrog ma 'di khyod
229a4(mdo 'grel): dbang 'gyur/ /zhes te de yi gya gyu las/ /'os pa min pa'i las la bskul/ /gzhon nu mdzes ma la chags pas/ /thams cad bya bas rab tu brtsams?/ /don med la ni nyon mongs 'bras/ /sha ra 'byin la rab zhugs ba/ /de shes mig stong ldan pa ni/
229a5(mdo 'grel): phyogs su lhung bas yang dag bsams/ /ci slad bskal ba bzang po pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal sras 'di/ /'bral med nyon mongs las la ni/ /mi 'am ci yi dbang gis bskos/ /'di yi dal dub dus 'di la/ /bdag gi stong grogs rab tu bya//
229a6(mdo 'grel): de ltar bsams nas brgya byin gyis/ /de yi mas ni rdzogs byas te/ /mchod sbyin brgya pas bstan pa yi/ /gnod sbyin phag gi gzugs can gyi/ /sha ri'i nags ni rab byung ba/ /mnyam par til ni the gang btab/ brgya byin gyis spros grog spur
229a7(mdo 'grel): gyi sad?/ yang dag bsdus nas cig tu byas/ /mi 'am ci yi dbang po la/ /ya mtshan slad du gzhon nus phul/ /stobs rgyas de yi gser gyi ni/ /ka ba bdun dang nyal bdun// phag ba'i? 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ /? ldan shin tu rno bas phug/ gang gi re
229b1(mdo 'grel): yi nod pan la/ /lha yi me tog char 'thob pa/ /bstan bcos mtshon dang rtsal dang ni/ /sgyu rtsal bzo dang stobs rnams bstan/ mi 'am ci yi rgyal po ni/ /de mthus ya mtshan gyur mod kyang/ /de nyid bslu ba'i slad du slang?/ /rig pa de de sems par byed/ /mngon par zhen
229b2(mdo 'grel): pa shin tu bstan ldan gzhan gyi gnod bas chu bzhin 'khrug/ yon tan brgya phrag gis? kyang mi mgu shin tu gal che ba yi blo can rnams/ /rgya che mtshang la smra bcad 'dzin cing dam pa bstod la/ rgod par byed/ /grangs pa mchog la bzhin dag log cing 'gal
229b3(mdo 'grel): ba brjod pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de la des smras byod kyi ni/ /lha yi mthu 'di gsal bar byas/ /da ni shes rab khyad 'phags dag khyod kyi yang dag bstan par 'os/ /gzugs dang kha dog dbyer med cing/ /rgyan dang na tshod mtshungs gyur pa/ /mi 'am ci mo 'khod pa yi/ /
229b4(mdo 'grel): dbus na rang gi dga' ma zung/ /zhes pa brjod nas de yis slar?/ /mi 'am ci mo lnga brgya dag/ rdzogs pa kha dog lang tsho dang/ /chas mtshungs mdun du de yi mthong/ /de dag dbus nas yid 'phrog ma/ /de yi yongs su shes nas bzung/ /'khri shing nags kyi sgribs
229b5(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /tsU ta'i 'khri shing bung bas bzhin/ /de nas mi 'am ci dbang gis/ /'di ni lha zhes nges byas nas/ /tshim pas de la yid 'phog ma/ /lha yi rin chen dang bcas byin/ /mchog gi longs spyod 'byor pa yis/ /gus dang bcas par de yis mchod/ /de la zhus
229b6(mdo 'grel): nas chung mar bcas/ /gzhon nu rang gi grong khyer song/ /yid 'phrog ma sngon 'gro ba'i bu/ /'ong ba mthong nas sa yi bdag/ bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshos glang po'i dbang/ /mthong nas 'phur bzhin rnam par mdzes/ /de nas rgyal srid sbyod tshul zla ba'i gdug dkar ldan
229b7(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /skye ba'i gdung pa 'phrog pa'i bu ni mngon par dbang bskur nas/ /chos shes bsil ldan dben pa'i bdud rtsis mngon par dga' ba yi/ /rab tu zhi ba ljon pa 'grib bsil mi yi bdag pos bsten/ /nor bzang dbang skur thob pa'i snga dro nyid/ /gzi
230a1(mdo 'grel): chen rgya che de la rin chen bdun/ /gtso bo nyid 'gyur gsar pa'i mthu 'jigs nas/ /g.yog la gnas ba'i don bzhin nye bar 'ongs/ /nor bzang byang chub sems der nyid do/ /yi 'phrog mar gyur de yang grags 'dzin ma/ /de dang bral
230a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i sdug bsngal mes gdungs ba/ /'di nyid 'dod pas bcings las bdag gis thob/ /de las 'dod pa padmo'i bzhin gyi mig gi mdza' la gnas gyur cing/ /rab rgyas me tog las skyes rdul tshogs hA la hA la'i rtse mo can/ /rmongs byed mya ngan gdung
230a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i mda' yi gang gi 'jig rten 'bigs byed pa/ /rngon ba'i rtse dags zhi ba'i ri dwags 'ching byed dam pa rnams kyis spangs/ /de nas rgyal ba rang gis rang gi gtam/ /bshad pa de la dge slong tshogs kyis thos 'dod pa ro ldan kho na srid pa ni/ /bdag
230a4(mdo 'grel): brgya'i rtsa ba sbom po nyid du nges/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las nor bzab gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //longs spyod rtse
230a5(mdo 'grel): dga' dag gi dri yi tshogs kyi dbang po thams cad yongs su drangs gyur pa/ /chags ldan sbrang rtsi 'thung rnams shin tu dam pa 'di nyid du ni gang gi 'ching byed pa/ /skye ba sngar goms zhen cing shin tu chags bcas las byung bag chags rtsa ba'i
230a6(mdo 'grel): lhag ma las/ /dogs pa med kyang skye bo'i yid 'dir padmo'i rdzas su mthun pa'i 'dod chags 'byung bar gyur/ /shAkya'i grong khyer dag tu sngon/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi kun rang gnas/ /rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das la slar/ /dge slong yang dag tshogs pas
230a7(mdo 'grel): zhus/ /zhi bar zhugs shing chas ni yongs su sgyur/ /'khor ba'i rnam 'gyur spyod lam log pa khyod/ /mi yi bd+dag po'i pho brang 'khor 'jugs/ grags 'dzin mas mthong ? par rmongs pa bzhin/ /khyod mthong nyid na kun tu brgyan byas shing/
230b1(mdo 'grel): 'dar zhing g.yo ba'i lus ldan rnam par gnas/ /lag na la du'i gnod bzung khyod nyid ni/ /zas kyi lhag gnas dag la chags par byed/ /de yi yid kyi rnam 'gyur rnam mang ldan/ /da lta yang ni nye bar zhi mi 'gyur/ /khyod zhal zla 'od bral na shin tu de/ /nyams
230b2(mdo 'grel): te nyin bar ku mud ldan pa bzhin/ /de skad mtshan las dge slong tshogs kyis dris/ /cung zad 'dzum pas mchu yi yal 'dab la/ /mu tig 'bras ? rab spras byu ru'i 'od/ /mdzes ba 'god cing bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa/ /mngon 'dod rtse dga' rnam 'gyur
230b3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa 'di/ /grags 'dzin ma ni deng nyid 'dzin pa min/ /skye gzhan la yang 'dod pa'i rnam 'phrul gyis/ /de yi la dus bdag la chags par byas/ /ka shi'i grang du mi dbang ka sh+ya sngon/ /zla ba'i 'od ltar dkar ba'i grags pa can/ /dgra myos gnyis 'thung lcags
230b4(mdo 'grel): kyu yin mod kyang/ /spyod tshul mi rno rang bzhin drang por gyur/ /dka' thub 'bad pas bu don gnyer de la/ /bu mo pad+ma ldan nyid cig pu byung/ /skye dgu skyong la g.yel ba dang bcas pa'i/ /sa bdag phal cher rigs rgyud nyung bar gyur/ /pho brang 'khor du de ni yongs
230b5(mdo 'grel): bskyed cing/ /sems la'ang bsam pa'o mi bdag gis spyad nas/ /mkhas pa la sogs blon po byos nas ni/ /gnyid bral dga' ba nyams par rab smras ba/ /lo 'dab rgyas shing rtsa ba brtan par zug /skye bo kun gyi nyer 'tshe shin tu mtho/ /mtshungs par skye bas
230b6(mdo 'grel): dman pa'i rgyal srid? ni/ /srin bus zos pa'i shing bzhin bdag gi rig/ lang 'tsho rab tu sbyin 'os bsten pa yi/ /bu mo bde ldan gcig pu bdag la yod/ /de ni 'bad pas mag? pa la byin? tsho?/ /bu tsha nyid dang de la byams pa'ang rig lag par sgron me'i sdong bu
230b7(mdo 'grel): rab 'bar bzhin/ /skye bos rab gi bu mo gzung mi nus/ /gtams pa'i nor bzhin gzhan la gtad bya ba/ /rigs kyi bu mo bsam ba'i 'bras bu nyid de/ /g.yog la byin min grong ba la 'os min/ /mi dbang bu mo ring po nyid la 'os/ /de ltar kun dpyad ring po me shes
231a1(mdo 'grel): pas/ /shi dang song bdag la bye brag ci/ /da slad gang zhig bu dngos bdag nyid can/ /rang yul rang spangs bdag gi yul 'dzin pa/ /bdag gi mag pa'i dngos gyur 'ga' zhig de/ yon tan ldan pa 'bad pas stsal bar? bya/ /bdag
231a2(mdo 'grel): gis thos pa gaM gA dag gi rgyu na/ /bsod nams dag ba'i dogs dang nye ba na/ /snyim par bcas zhes dka' thubs nags mthar ni/ /rgyal po'i drang srong/ /sh+ya ba gnas so/ de yi sa bon cibs? lhud gyur pa/ /lha yis bskyed ba rdo stengs dma' bar chags
231a3(mdo 'grel): chu 'dod kyis gzer ri dags yo yi 'thungs/ gser gyi mdog can gzhon nu bcas bar gyur/ /de yi pas gzung nags su ri dags de/ /rnam par bskyed cing brtul zhugs dag kyang bsgrubs/ /sor tshad rwa? yis yang dag mtshan gyur bas/ /byis pa rwa
231a4(mdo 'grel): cig pa zhes ming du grags/ /dar bab bsam gtan bzhi po skyong byed cing/ /tshangs spyod dang bcas dri med rang bzhin can/ /yul ni mngon par mi shes grogs med gnas/ /der ni drag po'i nyi 'od lta bur mdzel/ /de ni gal te bad ldan khyod nyid
231a5(mdo 'grel): du/ /gyur nas rgyud 'di rab tu zhi mi 'gyur/ /gzi brjid gter de rab tu 'gugs pa yin/ /gnod med rig pa ci yang bsam par mdzod/ /ces pa mi bdag tshig thos yun ring du/ /dpyad nas blon po kun gyis de la smras/ /da ni de yi bsti gnas nye
231a6(mdo 'grel): ba yi/ /nags su rgyal po'i bu mo rtse ru thong/ /de tshig rjes su 'dod byas rgyal po yis/ /'dod pa'i don kun rnam par bshad nas ni/ /padmo can bsrings rab tu spobs pa bzhin/ /thab ba'i gzhon nu dbrog phyir rtse du song/ /mdzes mas nags kyi mthar
231a7(mdo 'grel): ni dbal gyi phyir/ gzugs? bzang rtsed 'jos mngon bar dga' bas rol /mdzes pa'i mig can de ni rlung gzhon gyis/ /bskyod pa'i 'khri shing bzhin du yang dag rgyu/ /de ni rol cing me tog thub yis/ /ri dags ? rab g.yo zhing rnam bskyod ba/ nags
231b1(mdo 'grel): mthong rang gi dka' thub nags tshal nas/ /dge mtshan ldan pa'i gzhon nus yang dag 'ongs/ /mi yi grogs med padmo ltar yangs mig/ ya mtshan mig na 'jum dang bral ba nges/ /lang tsho'i rnam 'phrul gyis g.yo lus dud cing/ /utpal rgyas ba'i mig can de
231b2(mdo 'grel): mthong gyur/ /mdzes ma ri dags mig can de mthong nas/ /dga' ma mngon shes med kyang thub pa dga' / /bag chags goms pas nang du zhen pa yi/ /yul la mngon thos skye bos gtong ma yin/ /ri dwags bu yi rab mdzes yid 'ong mig/ de yi bzhin gyi pad+mar
231b3(mdo 'grel): rnam bkod nas/ /rig 'dzin rnams ni thub pa'i bu dag tu/ /shes nas mdza' ba'i dbang gis der phyag 'tshal/ /sdom brtson gyis btud bzhin ras dud gyur ba/ /de yi mtshun byu ru'i 'od ldan gyi/ /'od zer tshogs kyis kun bsgribs do shal dag/ dri med rang bzhin
231b4(mdo 'grel): gyis kyang chags bzung/ /dril chud sgra snyan dag gis grogs kyi bzhin/ /'dod ba'i nye bar spyod ba gdams byas pa/ /rdung thags theg la dag gi mthar mdzes shing/ /rab 'dad lus nan de la gzhon nus smras/ /grwa ye thub pa'i sras khyed legs 'ongs sam
231b5(mdo 'grel): dka' thub nags mthar ri dwags dge 'am ci/ /rtag tu khyod la lta zhing g.yo med pa/ /gang dag rnams ni thang la dman par rgyu/ /brtul zhugs mchog ldan khyod gzugs bdud rtsi'i char/ /kha na ma tho med pa 'di mthong ding/ /ral pa shing shun ldan pa thub
231b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi/ /lus ni shing skabs bzhin du bdag rtog go/ 'khri shing me tog rnams kyi spras byas pa/ /khyod kyi ral pa'i tshogs ni mdzes pa 'di/ /sprin gsar tshogs la rnam par gdengs ka yi/ /rma bya'i mjug ma'i mdzes sdug rnam par 'dzin/ /khyod kyi
231b7(mdo 'grel): brang 'di dpal 'bras zung gis spras/ /bgrang phreng dkar po dag gi rnam par bcings/ /ri dwags gzhon nu'i mig ltar bkra ba yis/ /yid la dga' ba bskyed cing rnam par mdzes/ /sbyin sreg me yi ne stag gsal chags ba'i/ /ske rags 'dzin cing lus 'phra ba'i?
232a1(mdo 'grel): shing gzhon/ /yal 'dab gsar pas mtshan 'dra khyod kyi lus/ /'di ni su yi dge mtshan rgyas mi byed/ /thang 'ga' gang du g.yo ldan 'dam skyes ni/ /khyod zhabs bkod pas rnam par gsal byas ba/ /'od kyi rtag tu rnam par mdzes pa yi//
232a2(mdo 'grel): dka' thub nags mdza' gang yin dang bas smros/ /ri dwags rang bzhin thub ba'i gzhon nu ni/ /bud med mi shes de rig bu mo yis/ /ngo tsha rab gtang rnam par gos med pa/ /ma? bsdams rtse dga' dag gi rgyan bzhin gyur/ /de nas kun dga' ris brlan sems ldan
232a3(mdo 'grel): der/ /'jam par smra byed de yis dal bar smras/ /bdag gi bsti gnas 'bras zhim me tog can/ /dka' thub nags tshal 'di dang nye bar gnas/ /zhes brjod ka ra'i 'dzum dang ga pur gyi/ /nang tshangs ldan zhing yid 'ong ya mtshan 'os/ /lo du mkhas pa'i
232a4(mdo 'grel): legs bshad mtshungs pa yi/ /de yis de ni rnam par chags par byas/ /de yi smyo byed ro 'dzin rjes mthun pa/ /sems dga' mdza' ba'i rang bzhin rtse dga' dang/ /bsdags pa bdud rtsi gus brjod 'ching ba yis/ /'phags pa'i ri dwags de ni rgyas
232a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin bcings/ /che 'os dka' thub nags tshal bdag la ston/ /zhes brjod mig zum de la rgyal po yi/ /bu mos lag pa'i khri shing dag gis ni/ /dam du yongs 'khyud tshur shog ces pa smras/ /chas shing cung zad rkang gis song de la/ /slar yang
232a6(mdo 'grel): de brjod slad du bstar byas pa'i/ /shing rta la zhon lag pa rkyang nas des/ /zhon pa nyid ni tshig gi rab tu bskor/ shing rta 'dren pa'i rta dag des mthong nas/ /bye brag ma rtogs ri dwags yin par shes/ /ri dwags bu bdag ri dwags steng du ni/ /rkang pas mi
232a7(mdo 'grel): reg ces pa de la smras/ /de nas yid kyis thub dbang bu 'dzin cing/ /shing rta yid lhar mgyogs par song nas ni/ /mi bdag bu mos rang gi grong khyer phyin/ /de yi spyod pa mi yi bdag la bshad/ /stobs kyi rab spyad dgugs pa'i mngon sbyor ba/ /?
232b1(mdo 'grel): drang srong chen pos 'jigs gyur pa/ /rgyal po blon dang bcas pas de 'ong la/ /rab tu 'bad pas thabs ni mngon par bsams/ /de nas slar yang gzhon nu 'gugs pa la/ gru yi tshogs bltams bcings shing dal byas pas/ /gi gA'i dogs kyi dka' ? thub?
232b2(mdo 'grel): nags kyi mthar/ /rtse dga' i 'khri shing de ni rgyal pos btang/ /skabs der bu ni bya ba mdza' dag btang/ /mi bdag bu mo'i bsam gtan smra bcang bcings/ /mngon 'dod gsar ba'i brtul zhugs ldan rtogs nas/ /thub pa dag ni ya mtshan g.yo med gyur/ /de nas
232b3(mdo 'grel): pas bris de la thub sras kyis/ /shugs rings rgyub ma dag gis bsti gnas dang/ /nyer gnas snye ma'i yal 'dab yang yang du/ /sgeg cing rol pa bskyed cing rab smras pa/ /yab cig dka' thub nags su ding bdag gis/ /zla ba'i gzugs brnyan rab tu phyis
232b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i zhal/ /drang srong che sras 'dren byed 'od dag gis/ /ri dwags bu mo'i dreg pa 'phrog pa mthong/ /de yi snying ga rked lag mgrin pa la/ /gtags pa'i rkud pa rnam par bkra gyur ba/ /dbang po'i mtshon spangs dag dang mtshungs pa yod/ /yab yig? bdag
232b5(mdo 'grel): kyang ci slad de lta min/ /bdag gi tshig gi brgya cha mtshungs ba yang/ /nam yang tsa ta'i nags su bdag gis ni/ /thos pa khu byug gi min bung ba'i min/ /de ni nga lta'ang bdag nad sbrogs pa bzhin/ /dal bab lag bkrus dbu ba chags pa yi/ /'od dang mtshungs pa
232b6(mdo 'grel): shing shun gsar ba yis/ /shin tu phra ba de yi lus dag mdzes/ /bdag gi lus ni lag bas yun rings bsdams/ /gdong gi pad+mar bzhin ras rnam par bkod/ /bslabs? pas mchu bskyod 'di yis dga' ba yi/ /bdud rtsi reg pa'i khyad par bslab pa
232b7(mdo 'grel): byas/ /mdzes pa rnam par mtshon pa de med na/ /bdag gis bzod pa nags 'dir skad cig min/ /gang gi brtul zhugs brtan pas bdag nyid la/ /rmongs pa'i grogs po gnyid ni gnas mi byed/ /bdag gi mig ni de la lta bar 'dod/ /de tshig med na thos pa 
233a1(mdo 'grel): yong mi gnas/ /lus la gnod byed blo ni nad dag tu/ /mi gsal de yi bsam pas mchog tu gzir/ /ces pa mdzes mas yid 'phrog bu yi ni/ /gdung ba'i bsam po ga byed chig thos nas/ /dka' thub bar chad gyur pas 'jigs
233a2(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /drang srong chen pos shin tu yun rings bsams/ /kye ma dran pa'i rngon pa mi bzad pas/ /dka' thub can rmongs ri dags bu 'di ni/ /bud med mchog tu gyur pa'i rgya dag gis/ /zur mig?  gal du lhung ba 'phral la bcings//skad cig de bsamS
233a3(mdo 'grel): thub pa mkhas pa yis/ /bu yi yid kyi rnam 'gyur sgrog pa'i slad/ /'dod pa'i lag 'gros dug btang yul la ni/ /mngon 'dod 'dzin pa de la rab smras pa/ /bu de drang srong che sras legs pa min/ /de ni bu med yid kyi lag 'gro yis/ /der lhung rmongs
233a4(mdo 'grel): pa shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /rjes? chags thub pa'i gdung ba rnam par 'dzin/ /mig sman nag po btsegs chags na chung gi /zur mig rnon pos phug pa'i skye bo dag /skyon bcas bud med lag pa'i zhags pas bsdams/ /'khor ba'i bcon? ra dag tu
233a5(mdo 'grel): mya ngan byed/ /kun rmongs dri mar ldan pa'i srid bdag /sprin gyi dbus su gya gyur gsal byed pa/ /skad cig mdza' can mdzes ma'i glo dag gis/ /bral tshe skyes bu mchog tu mun bar byed/ /bud med rnams ni mya ngan rgyas pa'i gnyen/ /sbyo? zhing brgyal
233a6(mdo 'grel): byed dug gi 'khri shing ste/ /rmongs pa'i sha za chen mo 'di dag gis/ /kun tu reg pa'i 'jig rten dge ldan min/ /dun med mig zur gdub byed zug rngu ni/ /rnon po gang gi sems la ma zug pa/ /chog shes kyis mdzes dka' thub nags tsha lbu/ /?
233a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i dam pa 'di de rnal du gnas/ /zhes pa'i dben pa'i tshig ni de dang des/ /pha yis 'bad pas rab tu rtogs par byas/ /'dod pa dang ldan mdzes sdug btung ba yis/ /rnam par 'grul pa des ni rtogs ma gyur/ /de nas nyin gzhan sna ? bya byas
233b1(mdo 'grel): thub pa 'bras bu yam shing len du song/ /mi dbang bu mo 'od? sgeg ldan pa ni/ /gzhon nu chags par byed du slar yang 'ongs/ /'bangs mo'i tshogs rnams rjes 'brang 'khri? shing ni/ /me tog 'dzum ldan dag gi dpal bsten cing/ /lus can lus med gsar
233b2(mdo 'grel): mtshungs rwa gcig can/ /'byor pas mtho pa'i lus can brtan pas phyin/ /bdag gi bsti gnas dpag bsam shing rtse ? 'byang ba'i 'khri shing gis dga' lha la 'os/ /lta bar khyod kyis 'os zhes brjod nas des/ /de ni gaM gA dag gi dogs su khrid//
233b3(mdo 'grel): nges der rin chen rab 'bar 'dab ma bkra/ /gser gyi ' khri shing me tog 'bras bu dga' / /gru yis gzung ba'i bcos ma rnams brtags nas/ /dga' ba la bzhin bde ba'i gnas la 'dzegs/ /'khor ba dang mtshungs zol gyi bsti gnas der/ /chu
233b4(mdo 'grel): bo'i rgyun la de ni rab tu khyer/ /de nyid shes pa min yang chags tshul gyis/ /mdza' bo can bzhin ba ra NA sir phyin/ /de yis yi dbang chen ka sh+ya yi/ /rin chen rin thang che ldan rgyal sar phyin/ /thub pa rnams kyi gtam dang bshad pa yi/ /mtho ris gnas ni mgri lam
233b5(mdo 'grel): gyur par sems/ /de nas rab dga' rgyas pas yi dbang/ /sbrub shes chogs de la ri dwags mig /g.yas skor bskor bas do shal g.yo ldan ma/ /bu mo re ba rdzogs pa'i dpal gyi byin/ /mi dbang bu mo'i lag par lag bkod cing/ /bag ma'i bsreg
233b6(mdo 'grel): rdzas me la rnam par bkod/ /des ni gzhon nu blo gros gzhon ba med/ /sbyin bsreg rnam pa gzhan dag yin par sems/ /dga' ston che dang spro ba'i nyams rgyas pa/ /rgyal pos gus pas rab tu mchod pa des/ /brtul zhugs dus ldan nyid du der 'dug nas
233b7(mdo 'grel): chung ma dang 'grogs rang gi nags mthar song/ /chung ma'i grogs byas dben par bgrod pa de/ /ma ma ri dwags mos mthong rab dga' ste/ /thub pa'i drin las mi yi tshig thos pas/ /gang nas khyod kyi bud med 'di zhes smras/ /de la rab btud de yis gus
234a1(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ /ma ma bdag gis mdzes ldan grogs mo 'di/ /rab 'bar me yi dbang can grogs nyid kyis/ /'dod par bya ba'i gzugs can 'bad pas thob ces smra bag ma la sogs gtam mi shes/ /rmongs pa de rig ri dags mo re yis/ /
234a2(mdo 'grel): ? yi brtul zhugs dka' thub can rnams kyi/ /dka' thub nags tshal dag tu dal gyis khrid/ /chos rjes 'gro 'di khyod kyis lhan cig spyod/ /'di yi bdag po khyod ces ma lus pa/ /bag ma'i spyod tshul dag gi bshad pa de'i/ thos nas chung ma dga' 
234a3(mdo 'grel): ma nyid du rig /yab ni 'od srungs kyis kyang dga' ba yis/ /bag ma'i chos ni nye bar bstan pa bsgrubs/ /der btud de yi tshig gi chung mar bcas/ /gyos po rgyal po grong khyer dag tu song/ /snying stobs rab 'bar zhig ba'i lam bsten pa/ /rgan po de
234a4(mdo 'grel): yi rang gnas la dbang bskur/ /rgyal phran cod phran ngal bso'i gnas de yis/ /ma lus sa gzhi dag ni rab tu bskyangs/ /dbang phyug rmongs pas blo gros za'i mkhan? na/ /dben pa chos kyi rang bzhin las 'khrungs shing/ /rgan po bu dang tsha bo mang ldan dam//
234a5(mdo 'grel): rab tu byung bas zhi ba 'dod par 'gyur/ /thub gzhon rwa cig ldan pa gang gyur te/ /nga nyid par? ldan de yang grags 'dzin ma/ /da yang skye ba gzhan gyi bag chags las/ /bdag la chags pa'i slad du mngon par sbyor/ /rang gi skye ba gzhan gyi gtam/ /
234a6(mdo 'grel): rgyal bar nye bar bsngags pa 'di/ /thos nas dge slong de dag rnams/ /thams cad ya mtshan ldan par gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las drag cig pa'i rtogs
234a7(mdo 'grel): pa brjod ba'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //'jig rten du ni skyes bu'i las lam grib ma bzhin/ /lus la lhan cig spyod 'di nges par mi mtshon te/ /lus 'di yongs sgyur brgya yis mdza' mar mi byin cing/ /mgyogs pas bros pa
234b1(mdo 'grel): dag la rnam par 'chad mi 'gyur/ /lhas byin gyis ni rdo 'phangs te/ /zhabs mtheb snang nas khrag byung ba'i/ /rgyu mtshan dge slong rnams kyis dris/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis der bka' stsal/ /mi zlog kho na ni drin pa las/ /skyes pa'i las kyi rnam smin dag /gang
234b2(mdo 'grel): gis bdag gi rkang pa yi/ /mthe bong yongs su snan pa nyon/ /lnga len dag tu grong khyer na/ /kA bi lyar sngon sa gzhi skyong/ /bden dang chos la yang dag brten/ /bden bar dga' zhes bya ba byung/ /skye dgu yang dag bsrung 'os ba/ /de yi btsun mo mtshan nyid bzang
234b3(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid can zhes bya ba ni/ /mchod sbyin dag gi yon bzhin gyur/ /bya las de la bu med tshe/ /de yi gsol btab sa yi bdag /bu don gnyer bas lus 'phags ma/ /chos bzang zhes pa khab tu blangs/ /khyo yi bag ma blangs pa'i tshe/ /mtshan nyid can la bu btsas
234b4(mdo 'grel): te/ /don med tshun ma thob pa yis/ /rjes su 'gyod pa dag kyang bzung/ /de ni mdud pa zhes bya/ /gzhon nu pa ni rab tu dgyes/ /rig gnas dul ba phun tshogs shing/ /rgyu rtsal bstan bcos mtshon mthar phyin/ /de nas chos bzang mngal dag dang/ /ldan pa'i tshe na
234b5(mdo 'grel): rgyal po 'das/ /brtsom pa kun la lus can gyi/ /bsam pa bstan gyi lus mi bstan/ /de nas de mthar blon rnams kyis/ /rgyal bran blon pa'i lcags kyu ni/ /gser pa bzhin du gang gyur ba/ mtshan nyid can gyi bu dbang bskur/ /gang lugs pa lang rwa co ltar
234b6(mdo 'grel): gya gyu gzhan gyi mi shes pa/ /blon po chen po ba lang rwa/ /zhes pa de yi mdza' bor gyur/ /dus kyi chos bzang btsa' ba yi/ /mtshams dang nye bar gyur pa na/ /mtshan mkhan mdun na 'don dag gis/ /mngal gyi mi bdag mthar byed smras/ /de nas blon pa'i tshig
234b7(mdo 'grel): gis ni/ /byis pa skyes tshe gsod pa la/ /de yi pho brang srung 'os pa/ /mtshon gyi sbyor ldan rgyal pos bskos/ /de dag shes nas chos bzang yang/ /blon po chen po ba lang rma/ /rang 'dod bzhin du byed pa las/ /shin tu skra gnas skyabs su song/ /de yis rjes mos
235a1(mdo 'grel): chung ma zhes/ bstan te bu yi 'jigs pa las/ /bu ni yang dag skyes pa ngag/ nya pa rnams kyi khang par bzhag /de nyid nas ni nu? mo dag /de yis blangs nas rab bstan pa/ /shes nas sa yi bdag po yis/ /mtshan mkhan tshig ni
235a2(mdo 'grel): bdan? min bzung/ /nya pa'i khyim dbyis pa des/ /rig pa gzo gnas sgyu rtsal dag /de de thob pa gang des na/ /blo dman gzhon nu san dag mkhar/ /byis pa rnams dang ltan cig der/ /lam du rtsed mo'i grong khyer byas/ /rgyal po'i rtsed mo yongs 'dris
235a3(mdo 'grel): la/ /dpung chen de ni rnam par rtse?/ der ni mtshan mkhan mdun na 'dom?/ /'dod dga' ba gtu 'ongs pa yis/ /de mthong mi bar gi la phyogs te/ /gus par mngon par 'dod pas smras/ /lha cig nya pa'i khang pad ni/ /gang gis khyod kyi rgyal srid dang//
235a4(mdo 'grel): srog dga' 'phrog par sngar brjod pa'i/ /gzhon nu bdag gis mthong bar gyur/ /'di thos mi bdag khros pa yis/ /gzhan pa'i mal rab sma dang/ /blon po chen po pa lang rwa/ /yang dag pos nas rab smas pa/ /kye ma bdag gi tha chom la/ /rnab 'dzin
235a5(mdo 'grel): pa rab g.yel pa/ /khyod kyi rgyal srid chu gter la/ /gru bzhin dpal la? btang snyoms byas/ /khyod kyi blo la sems bkod pa/ /bdag gi bde bar gnyid 'gyur te/ /de ding srog la the tshom gyi/ /rim gyi dbang gi gnas dag bsten/ /bdag gis mthar
235a6(mdo 'grel): byed sbas pa'i mas? la /nye bar gru la yongs gtang nas/ /rab tu dga' ba'i gzhan pa'i ba/ /nges par nyi ma bgrang bar byed/ /da? dung de ni zad pa'i thabs/ /rig pa khyod kyi sgrub par mdzod/ /ser mos chod pa dus kyis ni/ /sta ren yis kyang nus mi 'gyur//
235a7(mdo 'grel): rje bo yul 'khor nor dang rdzong/ /grogs dang dpung rgyas srung byed ba/ /de'i smed? du rang bzhin las/ /blon po'i rang bzhin shin tu brling/ /blon po gdung ba zhi byed bsam gtan la chags rtag tu phan pa zlos/ /nyan na ngul ba'i tshul ldan gus pa'i
235b1(mdo 'grel): brtul zhugs dag ni nges par 'dzin/ /mngon 'dod 'bras bu thab bas grub pa ngag ni 'phral la rab tu ston/ /yongs 'di dag cing rgya ches bdag rnams kyi bsod nams ngag gis thob/ /myur du rab lci rtse? ? pa yi/ /byis pa 'di ni rnam par chom/ /dus dang bral ba'i dbang?
235b2(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /rjes su gdung byed 'ba' zhig yin/ zhes pa rgyal pos yang dag bstan/ /sngon gyi btang soms? sres? pa'i blos/ /blon po glang po rta dang mi/ /shing rta'i tshogs dang lhan cig song/ /chos gis kyang gnas skabs der/ /bu ni gsang nas bos byas te/ /groS
235b3(mdo 'grel): de de la rnam par bshad/ /'gro bar mdzod ces de la smras/ /ma yis gtsug gi nor byin nas/ btang ba de ni rings par 'khrugs/ /rin chen gyis brgyan 'gro bdag glon po yis ni ring nas mthong/ /rgyal po'i bu ni gsang nas ni/ /khros pa 'di nyid ma yin
235b4(mdo 'grel): nam/ /zhes brjod de yi sid? bsang slad/ /dbung? gi sngon 'gro drag bo bskul/ /mgyogs pas de dag las 'bros shing/ /ri dags ltar mgyogs ring 'gro de/ /tsam pa ka zhes bya ba yi/ /sA yi gnas kyi chu la bying/ /de nas mthod nyams de yi che/ /blon po
235b5(mdo 'grel): chen po 'bad ldan pas/ /rjes su de ni bar la? ba'i slad/ /pa ta ka zhes nyan na btang/ de nas gtsug? gi nor bu yi/ /mthu yi chu ni rebs byas shing/ /klu yi gzhon nu dbugs phyung nas/ /'dug cig ces pa rab tu smras// rgyal sras la los rkang pa yis/ /rgya
235b6(mdo 'grel): ldan sa gzhi mthong gyur nas/ /g.yi gnas na gnas pa ngag/ /bdag yid la brjod/ /de nas klu yi dbang po'i gnas/ /kun nas yongs su bskor nas mi /blon po chen pos 'dud? bdag bka' / /gdengs can dbang la rab tu bsgrags/ /gro khyod yid?
235b7(mdo 'grel): pa 'di/ /bdag gis rdul gyi kha nges bar byas/ /chu ni jo bo khros pa yis/ /thang dang gcod rong rab? tu byed/ /rang nyid lag 'gro'i longs spyod dbang/ /gal te 'chang bar mis phan/ rgyal po'i rgyal po mi phan pa/ /rgyal po'i bu ni yongs su ngor/ /de skad de
236a1(mdo 'grel): yi bsdigs pa la/ /mtshan ma'i dus su klu yis ni/ /myur bar rgyal po'i bu btang ste// srog chags rnams ni 'jigs dbang 'gyur/ de nas rgyal sras rab bsgribs te/ /'khrung mkhan?  dag gi khang par gnas// rkang pa bkod pa
236a2(mdo 'grel): rgya drag gis/ /pa? ta ka yi nye par mtshon/ /de nas blon chen 'ongs pa'i tshe/ /nges 'jigs 'khrungs pa ngag gis kyang/ /gos kyi khur gyi nang bcu gnas/ /'jug rogs mdza' ru yongs su gtang/ /de nas kyang ni gsang ste song/ /de ni rdza mkhan khang pa
236a3(mdo 'grel): na/ /g.yul sprad nus kyang mi bdag bu/ /dus la sdong cing rab tu gnas/ /der yang ba lang ra dag ni/ /rkang pa'i rgya yi rjes 'brang ba/ /dbung? gi 'khor lo chen po yi/ /las ni yang dag bgags pa'i tshe/ /sa bdag bu ni gos ngag gis/ /g.yogs zhing
236a4(mdo 'grel): me tog 'phreng bas mtshan/ /cho de dang bcas rdza mkhan gyis/ ro yi? zol gyis dben sar dor/ /dben sar mgyogs par 'gro byed pa/ /de yi rjes kyi phreng ba dag /song ba'i rjes su song gyur pas/ blon po chen po mgyogs par 'ongs/ /kun tu
236a5(mdo 'grel): yongs su mi gtong zhing/ /las bzhin du ni rjes 'brang ga/ tshel ba'i ral dub kyis gzir ba'i/ /blon po gdug pas de mthong gyur/ /mgyogs las g.yang sa ma brtsis te/ /g.yang? sa chen por lhur gyur nas/ /'khri shing shing skams tshogs
236a6(mdo 'grel): ngag la/ /gtsug gi nor bu'i chag par gyur/ /mi bzang g.yangs gtso bdag tu/ /ltung ba de mthong blon po yis/ /gtsug gi nor bu yang dag blangs/ /song nas rgyal po ngag la bshad/ /gnod sbyin a dza la zhes pa/ /g.yang sar gnas pas gzhon
236a7(mdo 'grel): nu? yang/ /bsrungs te 'dab chags bzhin du ni/ /sa la phyin cing shi ma gyur/ /bu ni lhung thos chos bzang das rang nyid 'chi ba tshol ba ni// lha mo rnams kyi khyod kyi ku/ 'tsho zhes brjod nas rab tu bsrungs/ /gzhon nuAng stag rmig? rnon po yis//
236b1(mdo 'grel): rngo ba'i gnyi? ni nyams byas shing/ /glang po'i khrag gis myos pa yi/ /mi bzad stag ldan nags su zhugs/ /de ni rngon pa mi ser can/ /zhes pa yis ni bab bshad de/ /lam ni thob pa'i skyes bu dag /lus kun bcang pa mthor bar gyur/ /de mthong snying rje
236b2(mdo 'grel): skyes pa yi/ /mi bdag bu yi rab tu dris/ /khyod kyi sdug bsngal gnas skabs 'di/ /mi med nags su ci yi thob/ /de smras ring po min 'di na/ /gtum po gtum po'i spong tshul can/ /bzed dka' su tA sa zhes pa/ /skyes bu rnams kyi mthar byed gnas//
236b3(mdo 'grel): de la dung gi kha zhes pa/ /khyi ni 'jigs su rung ba yod/ /de yi sbong tshul lhung gyur pa/ /yud tsam 'tshe ba'i lhag ma can/ /bdag gi gnad bsnun zug rngu 'di/ /yon lag btang las yang dag skyes/ /gtum po nyin gung gdung ba'i tshe/ /gdug pa dung
236b4(mdo 'grel): gi kha dag gis/ /mgrin pa rab bcang ngon mthun gyi/ /khrag ni rtag tu 'thung bar byed/ /ces pa de yi tshig thos nas/ /rtse bas yid ni phug gyur cing/ /mtshon dang bral ba rgyal po'i bus/ /ci zhig bya zhes rab tu bsams/ /drag po gzhu yi
236b5(mdo 'grel): dkyil 'khor can/ /de nas gtum po 'ongs gyur te/ /phyogs su gi phag gi ni/ /khrag gi zer ma 'phen pa bzhin/ /de yi ngos su khyi yang mthong/ /sog le ltar rtsub so dang ldan/ /gsar pa'i khrag gi sgos pa yi/ /sor mo'i rtse mos sa la
236b6(mdo 'grel): 'brad/ /di drags rnams kyi yan lag 'joms/ /g.yag rnams ngag gi byis pa'i gdon/ /lce spyang rnams kyi rigs kyi nad/ /phag rnams nyams? par byed pa'i rims/ /gtam po'i phyogs su lhung ba yi/ /byed pos nags kyi lam du ni/ /'tshe ba
236b7(mdo 'grel): bdag gi ngal dub bzhin/ /dregs ldan gdug pa can de sprul/ /'gron po'i chung ma gsar du ni/ /yugs sa'i gdung ba sgrub byed de'i/ /hUM zhes g+har g+har sgra dag gis/ /bse ru drus ma rnam pa de 'gros/ /shin tu gtum po 'bod pho yis/ /brda?
237a1(mdo 'grel): yis mngon du 'ong ba de/ /mthong nas sa skyong bu yis ni/ /skyu ru ra yi shing la 'dzegs/ /shing la 'dzegs pa de mthong nas/ /rna ba'i bar du mda' drangs shing/ /gtum pos gdub pa dung gi kha// de ni gsod la mngon phyogs byas/ /'byar
237a2(mdo 'grel): smra gdug pa'i mig de yis/ /mda' dang khye yi mche ba ltar/ /rno ba'i tshig gis phug pa yis/ /rgyal po'i bu yi rab bsam bas/ /kye ma rgyal po'i rgyal po yis/ /g.yul du spro ba dang ldan pa/ /mtshan med bdag lus 'jig pa 'di/ /byed po dang/?
237a3(mdo 'grel): gi rnam par sprul/ /skye bo ngan pa rgyu med kyi/ /dgra ni thub par 'gyur ba ni/ /mdza' bas ma yin sbyin pas min/ /mchod min yon tan gyis kyang min/ /nges par dmyal ba'i gnas dag ni/ /'di yi mdun na bltar byas par/ /mi yi keng rus phreng ba can
237a4(mdo 'grel): nags kyi sa gzhi rab tu smra/ /gang du rgyal rigs gtsug gi nor/ /rgyal po zla ba'i rigs su skyes/ /khyi 'am gtum po'i bu dag gis/ /mtshen? med bdag ni gsod par byed/ /rnam kun nges par mi g.yo zhing/ /skye ba'i mthar thug gnas gyur pa/ /skyes
237a5(mdo 'grel): bu'i don dang 'gal gyur ba/ /sngon gyi las la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dman pa'i dra ba dag la skyon bug rtsi min yon tan skud rgyas min/ /'jig rten rab mang skyon gyi gnas kyis gang? skyon shin tu chung ba dag/ ring nas shin tu gsal bar mthong nas
237a6(mdo 'grel): mdzub mo dag gi ston byed pa/ /kun las mtho ba'i rang rigs zla ba de yi skye bar ma gyur cig /de ltar sems dpa' de yi ni/ /mi zad sogs gi the tshom la/ /bdud nyid nyams pas lus dman?/ /'jigs pas 'jigs par yongs ma gyur/ /skabs
237a7(mdo 'grel): der thub pa rig pa 'dzin/ /mthar yi lha mig gis/ /de yi gnas skabs mi bzad pa/ /nyon mongs can shes brtse ba yis/ /mkha' lar la gri 'grogs pa yi/ /yon tan gcig nyid ston byed cing/ /lag na shubs med ral gri can/ /mkha' yi lam
237b1(mdo 'grel): nas yang dag 'ongs/ /'khros shing shin tu gdug pa'i mig /'jigs rung lus can de 'ongs te/ /gtum po'i bu dang dung gi ni/ /kha yi mgo dag rab tu bcad/ /de nas rang gi gnas su khrid// mi bdag sras de dbugs phyung nas/ /rdzu 'phrul che dang lhan cig des//
237b2(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma'i rig pa de la byin/ de nas thub pa de la zhus/ /khengs ldan rgyal sras rgyal srid ni/ /bzhed cing dgra las rgyal 'dod pas/ /kA bi? lyar ni dal gyis song/ /de yi der ni gar mkhan ma/ /yid 'phrog dga' ma'i gzugs byas nas/ /yid 'ongs gar stabs de
237b3(mdo 'grel): dang des/ /grong pa'i 'jig rten tshim par byas/ /de yi gar dang zlos gar dag /mkhas pa mi bdag gis thos nas/ /blon po dang bcas rang nyid ni/ /zlos gar khang pa lta ru song/ /de yi der ni sgra can gyi/ /rtse dga' yid 'ong de dag mthong/ /mdzes ma'i gzugs su
237b4(mdo 'grel): g.yo med ni/ /bdud rtsi len du 'ongs ba bzhin/ /de yi gar stabs mdzes sdug la/ /rnam par dpyad nas 'dzin ma 'dzin/ /'jo sgeg myangs shing myos gyur pas blon po'i gtso la rab smras pa/ /kye ma mdzes sdug kun rdzogs shing/ /bsngags 'os lus mchog
237b5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i lus/ /ngo mtshar gang stabs ldan pa 'di/ /bdag cag rnams kyi yid 'phrog byed/ /mtho ris ngo ra'i rtsed 'jo mkhan/ /men ka de 'di min nam/ /gzhan du gsar pa'i tshon ris dang dbyibs mdzes 'di na gal 'od?/ /'gyur bag shin tu legs pa'i
237b6(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin gyis spras rnam bkra mdzas pa'i rim pa yi/ /tshogs rnams nyid kyi nyams su myong bya nyams rnams des par rdzogs pa la brtson zhing/ /rdzogs pa'i dbugs su klu yi 'gyur gyi yang yang rab tu dang ba sgrub bye ga/ /rdza? lnga yang dag bsgrags pas nye bar
237b7(mdo 'grel): spras pa'i zlos gar kye ma yid dga' 'gugs/ /skad ni brjod pa yongs su 'dzin tshe yid 'ong? rgyud mangs sgra yis dga' ldan pa/ /snying stobs gsal bar byed pas 'dar zhing g.yo ldan 'og pag mdzes sdug ri mo'i grogs/ /gsang por brjod la mngon
238a1(mdo 'grel): phyogs mi 'phrogs yid 'ong stabs dang ldan par sgeg par spas/ /gzugs bzang smin ma zung ni sgeg cing rol pa'i bslab pas spras pa kun tu bsten/ /res te de gdong chu skyes la/ /mig bkod sa gzhi bdag po yi/ /bzhin gyi
238a2(mdo 'grel): rdul gyi bran pa yi/ /'dod pa'i rkang 'thung yang dab skyes de la tshim med nyin mo'i mthar/ /rin chen yongs rdzogs byin nas ni/ /pho brang 'khor gyi nang song ste/ /mi yi bdag pos de nyid bsams/ /'khor ba'i rgyus bzhin bden med gzugs/ /
238a3(mdo 'grel): bcos ma'i 'dod ldan ma yis ni/ /sa bdag de yi nang dag tu/ /rnam par gnas shing rmongs par byas/ /'dod pas gzir ba de yis des/ /dal bu yis ni khyim du bos/ /yongs su gyur pa'i 'gal ba la/ /'chi bar 'dod rnams chags? par
238a4(mdo 'grel): byed/ /grags pa'i me tog rnam bkra shing/ /sde tshan gsum gyi 'bras bu can/ /mi bdag ljon pa rnams dag gi /dbang po ma bsdams sta re yin/ /glang po rjes su chags pa drag po'i dbang du gyur pa la/ /gal te glang mo de yi rmongs pa'i bslab ba ma
238a5(mdo 'grel): byin na/ /yongs rdzogs sbyin pas bud ba'i don mthun yongs su dgyes byas ba/ /byu yi mgon po lhung ba'i g.yang la nges par lhung ba min/ /de nas dal gyis rgyal khab tu/ /bran khol blun po 'dun pa yi/ /rjes su 'jug pas brlag pa'i slad
238a6(mdo 'grel): bcos ma'i bud med rab tu bcug /dben par brtan pa btang byas shing/ /gsang ba mngon par 'dod de la/ /dus ni mdzes ma'i gzugs dag gis/ /mgul nas 'dzin la mngon phyogs gyur/ /de nas gnyid ni ring po'i? slad/ /gus bas mal
238a7(mdo 'grel): stan 'dzegs de la/ /gzhon nus gar mkhan ma yi gzugs/ /spangs nas 'phral la rab smras pa/ /khyod kyi longs spyod la chags shing/ /spun zla'i mdza' la bltos med pa/ /lhan cig spyad ?  rgyal srid 'di// gcig tu yis ni ji ltar spyod
238b1(mdo 'grel): ni bzang nyon mongs chu gter du// skyon med de ni khyod kyis 'phangs/ /de yi le lan sems byed bdag /rang gi las kyi sbyor bas thar/ /ces brjod de yi mi bdag bcings/ /rgyal srid rab tu rgyas pa thob/ /skye bo'i tshogs ni dbugs phyung ste/ /sred ldan rab tu zhi
238b2(mdo 'grel): bar byas/ /gnas thob de yis rang nyid kyi/ /gnod pa drag po sems byed cing/ /snga dro brtse med khro ba yis/ /mi yi bdag la rdo ba 'phangs/ /spun zla bsad pas chags pa yi/ /khrag dang spags bzhin dpal 'byor te/ /spyad nas gzhon nu snyan ngag mkhan
238b3(mdo 'grel): las kyi mjug tu dmyal bar song/ /de nyid nga yin stong phrag lor/ /las kyi sdig pa de spyad nas/ /sdig pa zad mod nga lta yang/ /rkang pa'i mthe bong yongs su gnad/ /skye ba'i 'khor mor rims kyis yongs 'dris rgyud dag gis ni smin byas shing/ /phyi nas
238b4(mdo 'grel): skam dang chu dang shing rdo'i snying po'i dbus skyes kyang/ /sna tshogs ro yis yo byad lus kyi snod ni de dang de spyad de/ /skyes bu'i las kyi lhag ma bskal pa gnod pa yis kyang gtong mi 'gyur/ /de skad skye ba gzhan gyi spyod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
238b5(mdo 'grel): gsungs thos nas/ /dge slong kun gyis las kyis rgyu/ /bgom par bya ba min par nges/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gzhon nu snyan dag mkhan gyi rtogs pa brjod
238b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// //'khor ba yangs pa'i mya ngan las chen rab mang nyon mongs drag gos gdung byed pa/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod
238b7(mdo 'grel): nams gter gyur dam chos rtogs shing ye shes mchog dang ldan/ /bla mas nyer bstan rab tu rgyas pa'i mthu thob bdag nyid chen po gang dag gis/ /khyim gyi 'khyam su rtse ba lta bus yang dag rgal byed de dag sngags gar 'ongs? mnyan yod dag tu
239a1(mdo 'grel): sngon byung ba/ /khyim gyi bdag pos sangs rgyas su/ /gang gi khyim gyi dpal stug ni/ /slong ba'i tshogs kyi nyer 'khor gyur/ /gang zhig yid spyod rab dang ga /dge ba'i slad du bslab pa'i gnas/ /rab tu dang ba'i dge slong ni// shA ri'i bu yis dag par
239a2(mdo 'grel): byas/ /de sras dam pa'i kun spyod can/ /rig gnas mdun la rnam par mkhas/ /yon tan mtshan nyid yang dag rdzogs/ /dge 'dun sung zhes bya bar gyur/ /nam zhig khyim du shA ri'i bu/ /'ongs tshe pha yis de la smras/ /bu khyod mngal na gnas pa na/ /'di
239a3(mdo 'grel): yi nye gnas su dam bcas/ /de slad de ni bdag gi tshig /de ni bden par bya bar 'os/ /phal bu lon med byed pa'i/ /bu bzang bsod nams dbang gi 'gyur/ de skad pha yi yang dag bstan/ /dge 'dun srung 'di rab dga' ste/ /shA ri'i bu yi rjes 'brang zhing//
239a4(mdo 'grel): rim gro yongs su skyong bar gyur/ /de nas de yi rab phyung ste/ /chos kyi lung ni bzhi po dag /ma lus de yi kha thon sbyangs/ /de nas nam zhig tshang pa ni/ /mtshungs par skyes pa'i grogs po dag /brgya phrag lnga yis chu gter las/ /lhan cig 'gro bar gsol btab
239a5(mdo 'grel): ste/ /de dag dge ba sams byed pas/ /'jigs pa dag la brtan bskyed pa/ /bla ma'i bka' ni bzung byas te/ /gzings la rab tu zhon par gyur/ /de nas gzings te chu gter gyi/ /dbus su yang dag 'gags gyur cig /chod pa'i don mthun cho de dag /sgrogs
239a6(mdo 'grel): che chu las tshig drag pa/ /gal te gzings 'di khyed cag rnams// grel bar 'dod pa de lta na/ /dge 'dun srung 'di chu la ni/ /myur ba nyid du 'phang bar mdzod/ /de thos srog la the tshom tshe/ /de dag rnams la blo 'di byung/ /shi bar gyur pa mchog yin gyi//
239a7(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i grogs po gsod pa min/ /de dag mi bzad the tshom la/ /brtse ba yis ni bsrung brtson pas/ /chu gtor 'khrug par dge 'dun srung/ /rang gi bdag nyid rab tu 'phangs/ /de nas klu yi gnas su phyin/ /der ni klu tshim? gsol btab des//rdzogs sangs rgyas
239b1(mdo 'grel): kyi mchod rten la/ /mngon par phyag 'tshal sngon bsgrubs nas/ /bsam pas phra nges mthong dbugs dang/ /so reg dug ldan de dag la/ /legs pa'i spyod tshul mngon 'dod pa'i/ /chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad/ /chags bral drag po'i yid 'byung gis/ /rang yul 'gro
239b2(mdo 'grel): bar 'dod pa de/ /klu rnams kyi ni chod pa yi// gzings la skad cig nyid kyis bkod/ /'jig rten gzhan las 'dos pa bzhin/ /de dag dga' ba yang dag thob/ /gzings 'di phyir la log gyur nas/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i dogs su phyin/ /rang gi 'dod pas
239b3(mdo 'grel): de dag rnams/ /shin tu rings par bgrod pa yis/ /dge 'dun srung ni bye ma yi/ /ngos su gnyid du song ba brjed/ /de nas don mthun song tshe sang/ /snga dro mi med phyogs rnams su/ /lta zhing grogs dang bral ba yis/ /chags bral blo can dpe? bsams pa/ /kye ma
239b4(mdo 'grel): mthong dang nyams pa can/ /dri za'i grang khyer lta bu yi/ /snying sdug gnyen dang 'grogs pa dag /bral na rnam par rmongs bar byed/ /sa 'phang nya gzhon 'phar ba lta bur rab tu g.yo ba'i mdzes sdug grogs/ /mi rnams dag la rdzun gyi yid brtan brtan par gnaS
239b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'ching ba sgrubs/ /rang gi skye bo dang bral ma la du nyal zhing de bzhin nges par 'chi/ /kun tu chags pa dge dang mi dge'i las dang lhan cig srog chags rgyu/ /bstan pa'i blo yi 'di bsams te/ /yul gyi lam na 'gro ba des/ /ngal gyi skye bo'i
239b6(mdo 'grel): bsam pa bzhin/ /mdza' med sa la'i nags tshal sleb/ /de nas der ni khang bzang dang/ /khang pa rin chen las 'khrungs ba/ /gtsug lag khang chen mngon gyur te/ /dge mtshan gzugs dang ldan pa bzhin/ /khri dang mal stan logs bshams pa/ /der
239b7(mdo 'grel): ni dge slong dge 'dun gyi/ /chos gos mdzes pa zhi ba yi/ /mtshan nyid nyams pa med pa mthong/ /de nas de dag gis mgron sgrub/ /der ni de yis stan dag brgyan/ /zas dang bkur sti rnyed gyur nas// skad cig ngal bsos thob par gyur/ /de nas dge slong
240a1(mdo 'grel): rnams dag gi /zas kyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ /mdun du lhung bzed bstar byas pa/ /thob pa chen po nyid du gyur/ /gtsug lag khang de mi snang bar/ /de dag tho chen mtshon cha yis/ /phan tshun mgo bo rnams bcom nas/ /sa gzhi khrag gis blan? par byas//
240a2(mdo 'grel): zas kyi dus ni 'das pa na/ /gtsug lag khang yang mngon byung zhing/ /de bzhin dge slong de dag rnams/ /rab zhi ldan bar rnal du gnas/ /ngo mtshar de mthong ya mtshan can/ /de yi de dag rnams la dris/ /zas kyi dus su rtsod pa 'di/ /khyed cag rnams la ci slad 'byung/ /de
240a3(mdo 'grel): la des smras bdag cag gis/ /skye ba snga mar zas dus su/ /gtsug lag khang du rtsod pa byas/ /las de 'bras bu 'di dag go /de dag thso nas de nas de/ /song bas gzhan du de lta yi/ /gtsug lag khang gzhan dga' ba ni/ /rab tu 'phrungs par gyur pa mthong/ /de naS
240a4(mdo 'grel): der yang zas kyi tshe/ /dge slong rnams kyi mdun du zas/ /lcags kyi khu ba nyid gyur pa/ /mthong nas de dag la nges dris/ /de la des smras rmongs pa las/ /dge slong shos? pa'i zas kyi bgegs/ /dge slong ngan ba'i bdag nyid can/ /bdag cag rnams kyi sngon tshe byas?
240a5(mdo 'grel): de thos de nas song gyur pa/ /de yi gsar? zhing mdzes pa'i gnas/ /gtsug lag khang ni gsum pa ngag /dge slong gis gang mdun du sed// dge slong rnams kyi zas kyi tshe/ /de yang tshig cing slang yang byung/ /de mthong ya mtshan gyur pa yis/ /'tshig pa'i rgyu la
240a6(mdo 'grel): tshogs la dris/ /de la des smras dge slong la/ /phrag dog las sngon gtsug lag khang/ /sngon gyi skye ba gdug pa la/ /dga' ba bdag cag rnams kyi bsregs/ /de thos de nas song gdes?/ /gzhan du g.yo med ka ba dang/ /rtsig pa 'bras bu'i rnam pa can/ /phyagS
240a7(mdo 'grel): mthag par mtshungs pa dang/ /khri sogs gtun ni grags pa dang/ /snal ma'i lhag dang rnam gnyis gyur/ /nyal zhing sems ldan bde med ba'i/ /sems can snying stobs mchog gis mthang/ /de mthong 'gro ba de nyid kyis/ /dka' thub dag ldan thub par?
240b1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /brgya phrag lnga yi bsten pa yis/ /bsod nams dka' thub nags tshal thob/ /de dag gis de ring po nas/ /mthong nas phan tshun nges par byas/ /bdag cag rnams kyi 'di la gnas/ /mi sbyin snyan par sgra mi bya/ /shAkya'i slob ma rang bzhin gyis/ /mang brjod?
240b2(mdo 'grel): phebs? par smra bya min/ /zhes pa'i gros ni rab sgrubs te/ /thub pa de dag rab tu gnas/ /de dag gis der gnas ma byid/ /de yi nyin mo thad tshe 'khyams/ /'dam skyes mdzod ni bsdams pa yis/ /rkang drug re ba nyams pa bzhin/ /thub pa gcig gi de la ni/
240b3(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo byed ni mi smra bar/ /gnas par bya zhes rab brjod nas/ /zhag sang bsti gnas stod pa byin/ /da ngag gis der mgron ma byas/ /mtshan mo 'phen byed nyal gyur pa/ /de la bsti gnas lha mo ni/ /mngon du phyogs de ngal gyis smras/ /dam pa legs pa'i
240b4(mdo 'grel): tshul gyis bzhengs/ /chos ni rab tu bstan bar mdzod/ /'jig rten dam chos smra rnams kyi/ /dang por khyod ni bdag gis bkur/ /zhes des gsol btab thub ba des/ /bcom skyungs de la rab smras pa/ /ma ma khyod dang kho bo ni/ /nges par 'byin pa ci slad thub
240b5(mdo 'grel): gnas 'dir bdag la thub pa yis/ /mi smra ba yi dam tshig byas/ /de las 'das par gyur na bdag /des par 'di yi 'byin par 'gyur/ /zhes smras de la gus pa yis/ /de yi mang du gsol btab ste/ /bram ze rjes su gnang ba yi/ /chos ni smra bar
240b6(mdo 'grel): yang dag brtsams/ /rgyun du lus ni gdung bar byed pa'i nges par brtul zhugs min/ /skye bo med pa'i dka' thub nags tshal dag par byed pa min/ /gzung dka' ril pa pags pa yongs 'dzin skyes bu rnam dag gi /chags pas yongs 'bris sems ni
240b7(mdo 'grel): yongs su gdung bar byed pa yin/ /nags su 'bras bu za ba'i spre'u 'di dag rnams dang ni/ /ljon pa 'dab ma shing shun dang bcas ngal tshogs ldan pa dang/ /'jug dogs chu nang du chags nya? ming rnams kyang grol ba min/ /rab zhi spangs pa rnams kyi
241a1(mdo 'grel): dka' thub yo byad rdzun pa nyid/ /thal bas dkar ba'i glang po dang ni rlung dag 'thung ba'i sbrul rnams dang/ /nags na zhen pa'i ri dags rnams dang thang la nyal ba'i gzungs mo dang/ /'bras bu za ba'i ne tso dang ni gos med rngon pa rnams
241a2(mdo 'grel): gyis kyang/ /yul la chags pa ma btang rab tu zhi ba 'ga' yang rtogs mi 'gyur/ /zhes pa de yi tshig thos te/ /ya mtshan bcas pa'i thub rnams kyang/ /de la gus pas mngon phyogs te/ /kun gyis yongs su bskor nas gnas/ /de yi bsams la
241a3(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba yi/ /yongs su 'khor bar tshogs pa 'di/ /des par rdzun gyi brtul zhugs kyis/ /rgyun du nyon mongs gdung ba spyod/ /mi rnams ma rig 'du byed dang/ /rnam shes ming dang gzugs dang ni/ /skye mched drug dang reg pa dang/ /tshor bsred ba dang bcas
241a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /len pa srid pa skye ba dang/ /rga shi yis ni ngan par 'gro/ /sdug bsngal rang bzhin phung po 'di/ /shin tu che bar yongs su 'phel/ /rab zhi mkhas pa rnams kyi ni/ /ma rig la sogs rim pa yis/ /re re 'gags bar gyur ba na/ /gzhan yang
241a5(mdo 'grel): gzhan ni 'gags par 'gyur/ /de ltar yid kyis des byas des/ /de dag mdun du de lta yi/ /dam pa'i chos ni bstan byas nas/ /slar yang de dag la 'di smras/ /gang dag yid ni byams pa gtsang gyur cing/ /'tsho ba dag kyang dam pa'i chos kyis dag/
241a6(mdo 'grel): rab zhi 'os pas mtho ba de dag gi/ skye ba mya ngan mi bya dga' bar bya/ /sa gzhi 'di dang nam mkha' dang ni gdengs can dag gi gnas na yang/ /sems can gang 'khod de la gus ba'i tshig gis legs byas bdag don gnyer/ /snying ni byams pa'i snod
241a7(mdo 'grel): du mdzod cig blo gros dag gis chos drag bsten/ /lus can rnams la mi bzang mun par chos las gzhan ba'i sgron ma med/ /ces brjod ldon pa'i 'og tu ni/ /de yi skyil k rung bcing ba byas/ /drang bo rab tu gsal ba yi/ /dgra bcom nyid de mngon du
241b1(mdo 'grel): byas/ de la des smras bdag cag rnams/ /shAkya thub pa'i gnas su khrid/ /legs bsrungs chos kyi 'dul ba la/ /rab 'byung bdag cag don gnyer ro/ /de nas de ltar de dag gis/ /gsol btab chos gos snal 'phangs/ /de dag khyed nas dge 'dun bsrung/ /rdzu
241b2(mdo 'grel): 'phrul che de mkha' la song/ /de yi ston pa'i gnas su phyin/ /de yi zhabs pad gnyis la ni/ /kun dga' ldan pa'i spyi bo yis/ /mngon btung de la thams cad bshad/ /de yi tshig gis thub rnams la/ /bcom ldan brtse ldan dgyes pa yis/ /yid ni rab dang bskyed ba
241b3(mdo 'grel): yis/ /dam pa'i chos ni bstan par mdzad/ /dri med rab zhi rgyas pa ni/ /de yi drin las skyes de dag/ nyon mongs thams cad gtong 'os ba'i/ /mchod 'os dgra bcom nyid du gyur/ /de dag song tshe ston pa la/ /dge 'dun srung gis rab dris pa/ /bcom ldan ka brtsig
241b4(mdo 'grel): sogs gzung/ /me tog 'bras bu mtshungs pa dang/ /thag mtshungs snal ma'i lhag ma yang/ /sems can bdag gi lam du mthong/ /rmongs pas bcings pa de dag ni/ /de dag las ni ci yi 'bras/ /zhes pa de yi gus pas dris/ /de la kun mkhyen gyis gsungs pa/
241b5(mdo 'grel): de dag sngon tshe stan pa ni/ /'od srungs zhes pa'i nyan thos gyur/ /dge 'dun khang pa'i ka ba dang/ /rtsig pa la des dar bsnabs 'phangs/ /gzhan gyis dge 'dun ljon pa la/ /me tog dang ni 'bras bu blangs/ /dge 'dun zas dang btung ba la/ /gzhan
241b6(mdo 'grel): gyi sdang bas bgegs dag byas/ /gzhan gyi dge 'dun rnyed pa yi/ /dge slong dag la yongs bsgyur byas/ /de dag las kyi rnam smin des/ /rnam pa de de nyid du gyur/ /bcom ldan kyis bshad de thos nas/ /de ni ya mtshan ldan par gyur/ /dgra bcom gnas
241b7(mdo 'grel): thob dge 'dun srung/ /dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas ni/ /las de rgyal ba dag la dris/ /dris pa des kyang de la gsungs/ /ston pa 'od srungs zhes pa yi/ /bstan pa la ni rab tu 'di/ /dge 'dun gtsug lag khang du sngon/ /zhal te byed pa ting du gyur/ /
242a1(mdo 'grel): gtsug lag khang na gnas pa ni/ /lnga brgya de yi grogs por gyur/ /lus kyi mjug tu smon lam ni/ /dge ba'i slad du de yi byas/ /skye ba 'di la dge 'dun srungs/ /de yi dgra bcom nyid thob cing/ de dag ? lnga brgya po/ /'di dag de
242a2(mdo 'grel): dag yang dag 'grogs/ /lus can rnams ni dmar dang dkar dang gnag dang khra ba'i las skud gyis/ /rnam par bkra ba'i skye bo'i gos kyi ? mang dag tu g.yogs bar gyur/ /lag 'gro rgan po lkogs dman ? ba'i ? pa dag gis de btang nas/
242a3(mdo 'grel): grangs med ? ba med pa'i 'ba' zhig gang der dge ba ldan pa 'jug/ ces pa de bzhin gshegs pa des gsungs pa/ /thos nas dge slong de dag gus bcas bas/ /dam pa'i sems ldan de yi spyod pa dag/ ? ni gzhan dang bral las rab tu bsdags
242a4(mdo 'grel): zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtogS pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ dge 'dun srung gi rtogs pa brjod ba'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //phan dang mi ? las rnams sngon du bsgrubs
242a5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /longs spyod dus kyis shin tu 'das shing nyams par gyur ba dag/ rab rgyas me tog mtshungs bas til rnams dag la bsgo ba bzhin/ /srog chags rnams la rang gi bag chags bzhag nas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i gdan la sangs rgyas
242a6(mdo 'grel): bdud rtsi'i zer/ rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin bcings las bzhengs pa'i tshe/ /rab 'bar ye shes rgyas pa lo drug gis/ /thob pa de la dge slong tshogs kyis zhus/ /khyod bral? me yis gdungs gyur ba/ /grags 'dzin ma yi dgu nang du/ /mngal ni chags par
242a7(mdo 'grel): gyur pa dag /bcom ldan lo drug dag nas bcas/ /khyod mtshungs byis pa sgra gcan 'dzin/ /ces pa de ni skyes pa na/ /rgyal po zas? gtsang khros pa yis/ /'di ni gal skye zhes smrag? bdag bka' yis de nyid ni/ /gsod pa'i sar ni khrid gyur ba/ /
242b1(mdo 'grel): sgring? yig gos bzhin khyod kyis? mthus/ /dge ba de ni rab tu bsrungs/ /de nas khyod byin rngo nang du/ /de yis byis pa nges par bkod/ /de yi bden pa brjod pa yis/ /rngo ba de ni chul ldangs/ /mi g.yem dag ba'i bcu la zhugs can/ /de la gyos po khro ba skyes/ /sdug
242b2(mdo 'grel): bsngal smad cing gdung ba de/ /las ni ci yi rnam smin lags/ /zhes ba dge slong tshig thos nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsungs pa/ /las ni gcigs grags 'dzin ma/ /sdug bsngal thob pa rab tu nyon/ /grong khyer kAmI la dag tu/ /sa iu brgya byin dpa' 
242b3(mdo 'grel): dang ldan/ /'dod ldan ma yi me tog mtshon/ /rgyal po tshangs byin sngon byung gyur ro/ /g.yul du ral gri'i rgyun 'dzin ba'i/ /dpung pa yis ni rab bskyed la/ /gang gis gzi byin me dag ni/ /dgral mun pa rab ster 'bar/ /nam zhig nags su gzhu 'dzin des/ /sngon
242b4(mdo 'grel): gyi rtse dga' i dge mtshan la/ /shin tu mgyogs 'gro rta yis ni/ /gcig pur byas te ring du zhugs/ /de yi 'gram par rdul gyi thigs/ /nyi ma'i bar? gyis rab? bsked bas/ /rna rgyan mu tig rnams kyis ni/ /gzugs rnyan la dang mtshungs bar byas/ /lam nas
242b5(mdo 'grel): 'ong ba'i ri dags phru gu dge mtshan g.yo med kyis/ /yang dang yang du de la dga' bar kun tu lta byed cing/ /do shal rtse yi rin chen dum bur gzugs brnyan snang byed bas/ /skad cig bdud rtsi'i zer gyi gzugs kyi gnas dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /rjes
242b6(mdo 'grel): su chags ldan ri dwags mo dang glang mo la chags pa'i/ /mig zum ri dwags gnyis 'thung rnams kyi rab tu brten bya ba/ /ri khrod ma yi skra tshogs me tog la reg dri ? can/ /myos pa'i nags mdza' i rlung gi de yi ? ba'i chu dag phrogs/ /skabs der
242b7(mdo 'grel): thub pa chen po ni/ /shITi lya yi gzhon nu ma/ /gci ba 'thungs pas mngal gyi sgo/ /thob pa ri dwags pho mo ni/ /mdzes sdug bdud rtsa'i rgyun ldan zhing/ /chu ni len du 'ong bdag/ mig rab g.yo ldan bsti gnas kyis/ /chu kyung? dogs su de yi mthong/ /dpal
243a1(mdo 'grel): mo pad+ma'i dga' tshal la/ /dka' bas bzhin du padmo'i tshil/ /rkang bkod pas skyes padmo ? dkyil 'khor dag gis spro byed cing/ /sdon med dge mtshan ldan pa de/ /mthod nas ? ? skad mig gig ni 'dzum bral
243a2(mdo 'grel): bas/ /lha nyid thob pa bzhin du gyur/ /des bsams kyi ma mdzes ma 'di/ /thub pa'i bu mo su zhig yin/ /ri dwags mo bzhin rab mdzes shing/ /yid 'od lta bas yid 'phrog byed/ /pad+ma can ni ? pa nyed pa'i g.yog gi mtshams la nges par bskos
243a3(mdo 'grel): gyur cing/ /zla ba nya ba'i bzhin gyi mtshan ma 'bri ba'i 'bangs nyid rab tu thob par byas/ /smin legs smin ma'i rnam 'phrul rang nyid kun las rgyal bar rab tu brtsam pa na/ /des par 'dod ba'i gzhu yi 'khri shing dri med yon tan med pa nyid la
243a4(mdo 'grel): brten/ /'di yi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yid 'ong bsil zer can dag gis/ /bkod pa ri mo'i rim pas dags ba'i bdud rtsi rgyas par byed/ /mig dag rna ba'i rtsa bar shin tu byams par gyur ba 'di/ /utpal gsar ba rol pa'i rgyan gyi mdzes
243a5(mdo 'grel): pa rab tu 'dzin/ /ces bsams de yis dal gyis ni/ /rta las yang dag babs byas te/ /dge mtshan rta la mngon phyogs ma/ /de la btud de rab smras pa/ /legs byas rgya che mi dman ba'i/ /lha yi mgrin par gzung 'os ma/ /rnam rgyan nor bu'i phreng
243a6(mdo 'grel): ba bzhin/ /utpal mig can khyod ni su/ /khyod kyi mdzes sdug dga' ba yi/ /tshogs ni rgyas par byed ba 'dis/ /su yi yid ni dge mtshan la/ /'gugs pa nyid du byed ma yin/ /su yi ri dwags rgyud mu tig 'khri shing rab tu mtho ba dag/ ston zla
243a7(mdo 'grel): dkar ltar khyod 'khrungs bas/ /rnam par brgyan pa rab tu smros/ /zhes pa de yi gus bas dris/ /de ni thub ba'i bur shes nas/ /'dod pa'i spyod tshul ? shes kyang/ /mngon par 'dod ldan de yi smras/ /rkang pas bad phreng rab bskyed pas/ /bdag ni
243b1(mdo 'grel): pad+ma can zhes bya/ /ri dags mngal skyes thub pa ni/ /shAM? Ti lya yi bu mo yin/ /thub pa'i? sras khyod legs par 'os/ /bdag ni khyod mthong rab tu dga' / /shin tu yid 'phrog bkra pa yi/ /shing shun brtul zhugs 'di ni ci/ /rma bya'i gtsug phud lnga dag gis//
243b2(mdo 'grel): brgyan pa bzhin du khyod kyi ni/ /rab tshogs 'di dag lha las kyang/ /me tog dag gi rgyas par mdzes/ /sgyu ru ra ni rags pa yi/ /'bras bu kha ba rab 'pang? 'dra/ /bgrang phreng phreng ba ring bo yis/ /khyod kyi mgrin la yon tan mang/ /'od ma'i dbyug pa 'khyog
243b3(mdo 'grel): po dang/ /yal 'dab gsar pa'i phreng ba la/ /khyod kyi lag pa ku sha yi/ /dag byed bkra bas kun tu sbras/ /legs pa bdag yid ri dags 'di/ /gang du ? 'di bsos 'gyur ba/ /dga' bar bya ba'i brtul zhugs can/ /khyod gnas ga na yod pa smos/ /zhes pa
243b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin bzang ma yi tshig/ snyan zhing bdud rtsis brlan pa dag/ sa bdag gis myangs lam rgyags kyi/ /la du byin nas de la smras/ /smin legs khyod lus shin tu gzhon/ /shing dang rtswa ni skams gyur cing/ /ku sha'i kha? gyi tshogs gtams pa'i/ /nags tshal 'dir ni 'os
243b5(mdo 'grel): pa min/ /'di nas ha cang mi ring na/ /bdag gnas longs spyor 'os ba'i dpal/ /gang na rnam par 'di lnga yi/ /'bras bu rgyud ma rgyas ba yod/ /der ni rnam par gnas par mdzod/ /yid sred sa dag gi dka' thub mdzod/ /skye bo mchog ni longs spyod kyi/ /rim gro dag la
243b6(mdo 'grel): rnam par sbyor/ /mig gsum rab tu khros tshe me yi lam du phye ma leb nyid gyur ldan pa/ /srog ni rab tu rdzogs par byid pos gsar du sbrul pa 'di nyid yin bsams te/ /khyod kyi lus mdzes nor 'dzin bdud rtsi'i zer gyi cha yi mdzod kyi rjes mthun pa/ /yid la skyes
243b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i mdzes sdug mtshungs med dang po de ni 'di nyid gzhan ma yin/ /zhes pas bdag 'dzangs pa'i tshig/ bzhin bzad ma yi thos nas ni/ /la du zla ba ltar dkar ba/ /myangs nas de la rab smra? ba/ /khyod kyi brtul ? rjes spyod cing/ /khyod kyi gnas su bdag ?
244a1(mdo 'grel): bgyi/ /ji srid song nas bla ma'i bka' don du gnyer la skad cig sdod/ /ces pa'igros ni bsgrubs nas de/ /rang gi bsti gnas dag tu ?/ /mngon ? 'bar bas dbang bral bas/ /shugs ni
244a2(mdo 'grel): 'byin cing thub la smras/ /yang? lags bdag ni thub pa yi/ /gzhon nu su zhig nags su mthong/ /shing shun mdza' ni bkra ba dag/ rab tu dad ba'i chu ltar mdzes/ /gang gi 'bras bu gzhan gyi tshogs/ /sdom par yongs su rtogs byed pa/ /de yi gnas su rab 'khrungs pa'i/ /'bras bu mchog  ni bdag gi myong/ /de yi dka' thub dga' tshal du/ /khyod kyi rjes gnas bdag mchi'o/ /de yi gzhung bzed ? chags pa'i bdag blo gzhan la dga' ba med/ /ces pa de tshig 'dod pa ni/ /gsal byed thos nas ya mtshan zhing/ /lang tsho smon par dogs
244a3(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /thub bas mdzes ma de la smras/ /khyod kyi mthong de lag 'gro ni/ /rin chen gyis brgyan yin nam snyam/ /bu mo thub pa rnams dang ni/ /longs spyod can min lce gnyis min/ /yul bzhin yongs su gyur tshe sdug bsngal rab tu ? bcas
244a4(mdo 'grel): lci ba'i du ni/ /shin tu mdar bdag gis 'ongs pa la ni don med dga' bar yongs mi byed/ /mdzes ma 'dod ba'i 'bras bur ldan nyon mongs dag gi bran pa gang de rnams/ /shin tu nges par dug dang mtshungs ba'i nyams su myong ba bskyed bas
244a5(mdo 'grel): rgyal bar byed/ /tshur shog re zhig thub ba'i sras/ /de su ring nas bdag la ston/ /ces brjod klung gi dogs su ni/ /de nas lhan cig thub tha song/ /de yi rku? klung dogs su ni/ /sa yi bdag bo tshang sbyin mthong/ /yon tan tshogs ni rgya ched//
244a6(mdo 'grel): mag ba dag tu 'os par? bsams/ /mi bdag gis kyang thub pa ni/ /mthong nas skyengs pas bzhin dud cing/ /nyis 'gyur rab tu brgyag? pa yos/ /nges par rab tu ? ba thob/ /thub bas rang la? 'os pa ye/ /chog yis ni rab tu byin/ /de nas rab?
244b1(mdo 'grel): dga' bdud rtsi yi/ /bslabs te mi yi bdag pos blangs/ /nam yang khyod kyis tshig gzhan gyis/ /'di la khro bar mi bya zhing/ /mdzes ma 'di ni bskyang bya zhes/ /brjod nas thub pas rang gnas song/ /de nas dga' zhing rta la zhon/ /chung ma dang 'grogs skad cig giS
244b2(mdo 'grel): rgyal sar yang dag phyin nas ni/ /rgyal pos dga' ston chen po byas/ /pho brang 'khor gyi sde kun gyi/ /gtsug tu sa bdag gis bkod de/ sgyu rtsal mkhas pa'i rtsed 'jo la/ /bdag po'i slob ma nyid du gyur/ /de yi rkang ba bkod pas sa gzhi pad+mas brgyan pa mthong
244b3(mdo 'grel): gyur nas/ /der ni rgyal po'i 'khor gyi lha mo'i sgra dag ji bzhin don can gzung/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i mchog tu khyad 'phags legs byas grogs ni rtogs gyur ba/ /ngo mtshar rgyas pa phul byung rang bzhin mtshan nyid rnams kyi gsal bar byed/ /pho brang
244b4(mdo 'grel): 'khor gyi bud med las/ /phyi rol phyogs pa'i sa bdag dang/ /rtse zhing nu rgyas ldan pa des/ /skal ba bzang zhing mdzes pa thob/ /de nas dus kyis nor 'dzin gyi/ /bdag las de yis mngal bzung zhing/ /pho brang btsun mo'i skye bo yis/ /bsam pas chags pa'i
244b5(mdo 'grel): zug rdu yang/ /de nas khyim du mdzes ma ni/ /btsar nye de la mngon phyogs te/ /gya gyu sdug pa'i phrag dog las/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams kyis smras/ /mi bdag la 'os btsa' ba yi/ /chog rmongs ma khyod mi shes/ /ma yi mig ni gos dag gis/ /bsgribs
244b6(mdo 'grel): la bu ni btsa' bar bya /zhes pa btsun mo gzhan gyi smras/ /mngal rgyas khur gyi gzir ba des/ /khyed kyis bdag la 'os pa ni/ /mdzod ces de dag rnams la smras/ /de nas de dag rnams kyis mig/ nas kyi dmar bcings pas bkag/ bcom gser
244b7(mdo 'grel): gyi 'od ldan pa'i// byis pa zung ni de la bcis/ /gzhon nu de dag sgrom bur bcug/ gos kyis bkris shing rgyas btab nas/ /bud med snying rje med rnams kyis/ /gi gA'i tshul gsang ste 'phangs/ /pad+ma can gdod khreg gis ni/ /bsgos te de dag gis 
245a1(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ khyod la dum bu g.yo med gnyis/ /bcas pa dag ni chul 'phangs/ /dga' snong rgya cher chas bcug cing/ /bru? ni blta bar 'dod pa yi/ /sa yi bdag pos ci skyes zhes/ /pho brang 'khor ba rnams la dris/ /de la de dag gis smras lta/ /sras
245a2(mdo 'grel): ni khyod dang mtshungs pa gnyis/ /yang dag 'khrungs pa lha mos zos/ /sha za mo nyid ci zhig brjod/ /'di thos mi bdag bkrag pa yis/ /pho brang 'khor gyi khang par song/ /lha mo bzhin ras khrag gis ni/ /spags pa mthong nas bden par bsams/ /sa bdag rab tu
245a3(mdo 'grel): khros pa yis/ /de ni bsang slang phyi rol btang/ /chun ma'i skyon du dogs pa yis/ /blon po mchog gis sbas te bzung/ /de nas mkha' paS shAM Ti la'i/ /bsti gnas lnga mo mngon phyogs te/ /mi snang bar ni skye bo yi/ /mdun du 'gro ba bdag la smras/ /khyod dbang bud med
245a4(mdo 'grel): skyon med ni/ /bsad slad gtong ba khyod nyid kyi/ /rnam par ma dpyad bag med kyis/ /grags pa rtsad nas byung ngam snyam/ /nags kyi ri dags bu mo rmongs/ /pad+ma can ni chun ma yis/ /rang nyid bde slad bslu ba 'dis/ /sa bdag khyod kyi yongs mi shes/ /'byor ba'i sha
245a5(mdo 'grel): za drag bo yis/ /rtag tu byin brlabs sems ldan la/ /phal cher rnam pa 'di lta yi/ /blo gros smyon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rje bos longs spyod kyis lod rang bzhin gyis mod dpal gyi rnam 'phrul ldan zhing 'phar/ /na chung bden pa nyams pa'i sa gzhi bsod nams
245a6(mdo 'grel): mngon par 'joms pa'i bya ba can/ /phra ma ldan pa rang mthun rmad byung smra byed mkha' la ri mo'i las sbyor rnams/ /gang du nges par rnam par gnas pa des ni dam pa drang po ji ltar 'tsho/ /lha mo lus mi snang ba yi/ /tshig de thos nas sa bdag ni/ /khros pas de
245a7(mdo 'grel): yi byung tshul dag/ btsun mo'i tshogs la rab tu dris/ /khro bas non pa'i mi bdag gi/ bka' ni drag pos dog gyur ba/ /de dag gis ni byung tshul bzhin/ /bshad pas 'jigs pas 'khrugs bar gyur/ /chun mas bslus pa'i btsun mo ni/ /gsod sar
245b1(mdo 'grel): rab tu btang ba dag/ skyon med shes nas mi yi bdag/ 'gyod pas gzir bas mya ngan byas/ /mtshungs par stobs rgyas chags dang khro/ /brtse bas ngo tsha mya ngan dag /rmongs pa'i grogs kyi yang yang du/ /de ni bskal bar byas bzhin gyur/ /kyi hud dga' ma khyod dang ni//
245b2(mdo 'grel): phyi nas bsod nams dman pa bdag/ gang du 'grogs pa zhes brjod nas/ /mi bdag sa la 'gyel par gyur/ /de nas gi gA'i rgyun thob pa/ /sgrom bu rgyal po'i rtags mtshan can/ /nya ba rgya yi mtsho rnams kyis/ /bzung nas mdun sar yang dag 'ongs/ /de dag gis
245b3(mdo 'grel): de mdun bkod cing/ /'phral la mi bdag gis phye tshe/ /padmo gsar ba'i 'od ldan pa'i/ /byis pa zung zhig mthong bar gyur/ /'od stong pa yi tha skar bzhin/ /gzhon nu 'di dag mi bdag gi /gzugs mtshungs mtshan nyid rgya che bar/ /skyes zhes skye bos rab tu sgrags//
245b4(mdo 'grel): de nas sa bdag mchi ma dang/ /bcas pas sras dag par du blangs/ /dga' ma dang bral mya ngan gyis/ /gzir ba'i gdud ba lhag par gyur/ /de nas blo gros ring zhes pas/ /blon po chen pos de la smras/ /lha cig khyod kyi btsun mo ni/ /chun ma'i tshogs kyis bslus
245b5(mdo 'grel): pa 'tsho/ /de thos 'phral la rgyal po ni/ /'tsho ba thob pa bzhin du langs/ /dga' pas ston zhes brjod nas ni/ /blon po'i khang par rab tu song/ /der ni sdug bsngal ldan pa de/ /khro bas gus pa brjod gyur cing/ /smad pas kun tu yid byung ma/ /mthong nas
245b6(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba'i bdag gis smras/ /gang gis mi bzad lhag ma 'di/ /dga' ma khyod la rnam sprul pa/ /tshur shog de ni de dag rnams/ /bsod pa'i sdug bsngal dka' la ltos/ /gdung ba thod la dang bar mdzod/ /mi smrar mthong du phyogs ma byed/ /ces brjod de yi
245b7(mdo 'grel): rkang pa la/ /sa yi bdag po rnam par 'gyel/ /nu ma rgyas pa mchi ma yi/ /rgyun gyi bran byed des smras pa/ /skye bo mi bzang gnod byed la/ /mi dbang khro ba yod ma mdzad/ /mi bdag bden par dga' dang bral bar byed pa rnams la bdag ni khro yod min/ /des
246a1(mdo 'grel): par bzod pas dgra ni nye bar zhi gyur khon gyi de nyid 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gnod pa sgrub la dgra ni khyab bdag ma yin des bar grogs ni phan la min/ /lus can rnams kyi bde dang sdug bsngal 'di dag thams cad sngon gyi las kyi sprul
246a2(mdo 'grel): gnod pa byed pa la yang gnod pa'i sbyor ba dag/ ma dpyad bar ni blo gros ldan pas mi bya ste/ /khros pas mchog tu khro ba'i dug ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /me nyid bsnan pas me ni zhi? bar mi 'gyur ro/ /re zhig sdug bsngal gyis gdung bdag/ yang kyi dka' 
246a3(mdo 'grel): thub tshal nyid du/ /'gro de de tshig 'dod ldan ma/ /bdag gis sngon tshe yod ma byas/ /bdag ni 'dod 'bras la chags pa/ /de yi rab tu bzlog gyur kyang/ /lang chos myos pa'i skyon gyis na/ /zlog par ma gyur ci zhig bya/ /zhes brjod de ni shugs 'byin cing
246a4(mdo 'grel): rkang pa yis ni sa la 'bri/ /skud cig bzhin ras dud pa yi/ /mi smra ba la brten par gyur/ /mi bdag gis ni phyag byas kyang/ /de ni rab dang nyid ma gyur/ /rdzun gyi skyon ni yongs gzung ba/ /mdza' ba'i zug rdu mtshungs par 'dzin/ /de ni dmar ba'i bzhin bzung
246a5(mdo 'grel): nas/ /yab kyi bsti gnas dag tu song/ /khengs ldan rnams kyi khro ba ni/ /lag 'gro gya gyu de bzod dka' / /bud ba'i sgra yis dge legs brjod pa yi/ /'khri shing grogs mo rnams kyis 'khyud pa bzhin/ /ri dags rnams kyi mdza' bas yongs bskor zhing
246a6(mdo 'grel): pa yi dka' thub nags su de phyin gyur/ /dka' thub khyad par gyis bsgrubs 'jig rten ni/ /dad bar thub ba bsod nams gter song tshe/ /bsti gnas stong mthong 'che ba mi bstan pa'i/ /padmo can ni rmongs pas bcom par gyur/ /rang bzhin rnal gnas
246a7(mdo 'grel): pa yi gnyes gshin dang/ /skye ba'i bar ni nad du gcags pa dran/ /'jig rten gsum bzhin stong bar sems zhing de/ /dug gis gzir bzhin sbrul gyi bcom bzhin gyur? ro/ /thub pas dman pa'i nags tshal de nyid ni/ /de la dga' ba dga' min nyid du
246b1(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /dus kyi snying po ma lus 'thungs gyur pa'i/ /dngos po rnams ni 'bral ba'i rang bzhin yin/ /yid 'phrog yul ni de dag kho na dang/ /me tog 'byung gnas nyin par de dag nyid/ /su zhig cig dang bral ba'i skye bo la/ /thams cad chags bral gnas nyid
246b2(mdo 'grel): dag tu 'gyur/ /de nas sa gzhi dag gi zla ris de/ /rang byung rjes su mthun ba'i chas bzung nas/ /bde bas btang ste phyogs su yongs 'khyams zhing/ /zhib bzhin du ba raNA sir phyin/ /de nas rgyal po kri ki 'dod ldan pas/ /der ni ri dags mig de don gnyer yang
246b3(mdo 'grel): dka' thub me lce 'bar bzhin de yi ni/ /ji zhig ltar yang reg 'os nyid ma gyur/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams kyis rab 'bad nas/ /mngon par mchod cing lha mo bzhin du de/ /legs spyod sems zhing bdag po'i brtul zhugs kyis/ /der ni cung zad dus
246b4(mdo 'grel): shig nye bar gnas/ /'bral ba'i sdug bsngal me yi sreg byed cing/ /de ni de na gnas pa sa yi bdag /tshangs byin gyis kyang nyan rna bsrings las thos/ /bram ze'i chas su bcos nas yang dag 'ongs/ /de nas brtul zhugs mdzes pa'i chos kyi bsgribS
246b5(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims grags ba'i ba dan de mthong nas/ /dang ba'i slad du mi bdag gus par ni/ /mngon du phyogs pas rang gzugs gsal bar bya/ /sa bdag bdag gi gnod pa mi bzad pa/ /zhes smra tshon? de ni yun rings dus/ /khengs ldan rnams kyis spang
246b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i khro ba ni/ /brjod pa na yang gsar pa nyid du gyur/ /stag? po mchi na'i rgyun ni yongs sel zhing/ /'dod ba'i zla ris phyogs su 'bras ldan byed/ /rgyal po ston dus lta bus mdzes ma ni/ /dang bar byas nas rang gi rgyal sar khrid/ /rkang ba'i
246b7(mdo 'grel): padmos bkod pa'i mtsho skyes phred/ khral ba'i dus su rab tu zhi gyur pa/ /dga' dang 'grogs tshe de la rab 'khrungs te/ /chags pa drag pa'i longs spyod dpal 'byor bzhin/ /skye ba gzhan la des pa'i bu mo des/ /rang sangs rgyas la rtse
247a1(mdo 'grel): dga' i pad+ma dag/ phul nas chags pas blangs te de yi ni/ /mdzes pa dbyad nas slar yang rab phul te/ /padmo phul bas 'di yi rkang pa ni/ /bkod pa rnams la mtsho skyes 'khrungs par gyur/ /blangs pa'i skyon las dus su bral? gyur cing/ /slar
247a2(mdo 'grel): yang phul bas slar yang byung bar gyur/ /byin dang len pa de dag las 'khrungs pa/ /rang las smin pa yis de skyon rnams la/ /padmo can ni gsod pa'i gnas btang ste/ /dus kyi da lta grags 'dzin ma yang ngo/ /de skad rgyal bas gsungs pa thos gyur
247a3(mdo 'grel): nas/ /dge slong de dag thams cad ngo mtshar ni/ /yongs su 'dzin pas ri mo bkod bzhin gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtoD pa brjod pa'i dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ pad+ma ldan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab  ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //gang zhig spyod pa'i khyad par mtho ba'i mtshan nyid ldan rnams kyi/ /legs byas dag ni mchod rten ldan pa'i nor 'dzin mas smra zhing/ /ma lus dge ba'i smon lam gnas su gyur ba de dag ni/ /'jig rten 'di dang
247a4(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang dag cing bde ba brtan par 'gyur/ /grong khyer pA tra li pu trar/ /gang zhig yang dag bskyangs bsrungs pas/ /'jig rten mya ngan med byed pa/ /sa bdag mya ngan med pa byung/ /byang chub slad du khrus bsgrubs nas/ /gang zhig gser gyi char 'bebS
247a5(mdo 'grel): shing/ /chos gos gsum ni 'gebs pa yis/ /dge slong dge 'dun mngon par mchod/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas sku yi ni/ /ring bsrel gzi brjid 'bar rnams dang/ /bla med dpal ldan gnas brtan ni/ /grags ba de yi mchod byar gyur/ /rin thang
