247a6(mdo 'grel): med ba'i rin chen rnams/ /gus pas bsdu ba byas nas ni/ /sa gzhi mu tig gdugs mdzes kyi/ /mchod rten dag gis mtshan ma bsgrubs/ /rang nyid klu yi 'jig rten du/ /phyin nas bde gshegs ring bsrel tshogs/ /klu yis byin pa blangs nas de//
247b1(mdo 'grel): rin chen mchod rten phreng ba byas/ /de yi mchod rten chos rgyal gyi/ /lugs dang ldan pa stong phrag ni/ /brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dus gcig la/ /sbrul ba yi ni rnam par mdzes/ /dus gcig rab tu gnas pa/ /de tshe gnas brtan 'khor song nas/ /nyi ma bsgribs te
247b2(mdo 'grel): sa gzhi ni/ /grib ma'i 'du shes dag tu rtags/ /de nas de yi dge 'dun gyis/ /mchod ston rgya che rtag 'jug la/ /rang byung dga' bas 'khogs gyur ba/ /'ga' zhig dal gyi 'ongs par gyur/ /der ni rgyal po la 'os zas/ /sa yi bdag pos rab springs pa/ /za
247b3(mdo 'grel): zhing mchog tu dga' ba ni/ /bdud rtsi bzhin du de yi thob/ /dge slong gzhan gyis de la smras/ /rang la'os pa'i bza' ba 'di/ /khyod las bdag gis byin pa/ /ci yi don slad khyod shes sam/ /shin tu rgan pa khyod nyid las/ /dam chos nyan par 'dod pa
247b4(mdo 'grel): yis/ /sa skyong gis ni bkur sti dag/ shin tu che bas khyod la mchod/ /ces pa bzhin 'jum dge slong gis/ /brjod tshe rmongs pas ngo tsha zhing/ /myur du zug rdus phug pa bzhin/ /dge slong rgan pos rab bsams pa/ /ngo tsha'i slad du sdug bsngal mdza' //
247b5(mdo 'grel): zas ni bdag gis ci slad zos/ /tshigs su bcad pa bzhi cha yang/ /bdag gi mi shes yi ge med/ /dam pa'i dbus su sa bdag gis/ /gal te dris nas bdag ci byed/ /skye bo dga' zhing rgod 'di dag/ lkugs pa bdag la ci brjod 'gyur/ /srin bu
247b6(mdo 'grel): khong stong byed pa rnams kyis dal gyi sdong po'i rgyun ni gzhigs gyur cing/ /nang du me dag nyal zhing du bas dri mar gyur ba g.yangs sa'i shing yang sla/ /mkhas pa bzhin ras mdzes pas bcom pa'i rmongs pa skyengs shing zhum pas gnas gyur pa//
247b7(mdo 'grel): lkugs shing lor ba'i gzugs brnyan bag med du gnas skye bo bdag 'drar ma gyur cig/ de ltar bsam pa yongs 'dris shing/ /tsha ba'i dbugs 'byin bde med pa/ /de la lha mos sangs rgyas la/ /rab dang mngon du phyogs te smras/ /gang tshe khyod la
248a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal po 'dri/ /de tshe khyod kyi 'di brjod bya/ /shin tu rgya che ldan pa'i chos/ /mdor bsdus pa dag mnyan par mdzod/ /nor ni cung zad tsam zhig phan pa byed cing bya ba shin tu nyung ba nyid/ /srog gi gzungs ni shin tu chud zhing ro
248a2(mdo 'grel): dang bral ba'i zas kyis kyang/ /mig dag gnyid kyi rgya ni skad cig gis kyang 'di nyid rgyun du ni/ /nye mkho lhag ma btang nas lus can longs spyod rtsom pa rgya cher 'gyur/ /zhes pa lha mos yang dag bstan/ /rab gsal dbyangs can rgan po yis//
248a3(mdo 'grel): sa bdag nyan du 'ongs ba la/ /chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad/ /snying la 'bab pa de yi ni/ /legs bshad rgyal pos thos gyur nas/ /kye ma mkhas pas brjod gyur ba/ /'di ni bden zhes rab tu bsams/ /blo gros chen pos bdag nyid kyi/ /ched du
248a4(mdo 'grel): phan pa 'di dag gsungs/ /de nyid brjod ba dam pa'i tshig/ nyams myong bsod nams bdag gis 'thob/ /gang zhig mdzod rnams su ni me yi bud shing du mthong nor gyi nags dag bsgrubs/ /gang yang bya bas rgya mtsho bzhi yi gos can sna tshogs
248a5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa khyab par byas/ /zas kyang rnam par bkra la yongs su 'dris shing bdag gi gnyid kyang shin tu chos thams cad rmongs pa'i bde slad 'jug gi dus su gang du ci yang mthong ma yin/ /zhes bsam mi yis bdag po yi/ /de la rab tu
248a6(mdo 'grel): phyag 'tshal te/ /'od ldan mdzes pa'i chos gos ni/ /gser gyis rab tu spras pa phul/ /de nas lam du bgrod byed cing/ /rgyal po'i mchod pas mdzes pa de/ /bsam gtan kha ton sbyor ba'i slad/ /lha mo yi ni yang dag bskul/ /de nas de yi man dag
248a7(mdo 'grel): gis/ /yi bsam gtan bsgrubs pa na/ /nyon mongs ma lus zad pa las/ /dgra bcom nyid ni mngon du bsgrubs/ /de nas nam zhig sa bdag gi/ dge 'dun mchod ston yangs pa la/ /dge slong chos gos la yi ni/ /dri ?grangs ldan pa gsar
248b1(mdo 'grel): du 'ongs/ /sngon med dril chags pa yi/ /bud ba'i phreng bas bskor de la/ /mi dag gis dris khyod kyis dris/ /rgyal 'di re zhig gang las byung/ /des smras lha yi 'jig rten gyi/ /yongs 'du ljon ba'i 'og tu bdag/ dbyar gyi dus su gnas gyur ba/ /de yi me tog
248b2(mdo 'grel): dag gis bsgos/ /de thos mi bdag de yi ni/ /mthu la lhag par gus gyur cing/ /dkon mchog gsum mchod la chags pa/ /bsod nams kun rar dga' bar gyur gal te gus par chos la dga' na de nyid 'tsho ba yin/ /gal te skal bzang bden par spyod na
248b3(mdo 'grel): de nyid smra ba yin/ /gal te mthar thug sems par byed na de nyid blo gros yin/ /gal te sbyin pa'i bya ba byed na de nyid dpal 'byor yin/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas ba'i byung chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ chos kyi
248b4(mdo 'grel): rgyal po rab gnas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //gang gi grags pa'i mtshan nyid khyad bar rnam par bkod pa yis/ /sa bzhi bsod nams mchog gi bsod nams ldan par nyer bskrun cing/ /rgyal ba la ni gus
248b5(mdo 'grel): par rab bsgrubs bag chags skyed byed la/ /de dag rnams kyi mdon 'dod legs byas sbyor ba rgyal gyur cig/ dge slong nyi gud zhes bya ba/ /bla ma dga' bo'i tshig gis ni/ /kha che'i dkyil 'khor dag tu ni/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dzin du song/ /klu
248b6(mdo 'grel): yi byin brlabs de shes nas/ /sa gzhi 'dar byed de yis ni/ /snying stobs brtan ldan ting 'dzin gyis/ /klu rnams kun tu bskyong ba bsgrubs/ /rnam 'gyur 'khro ldan de dag gis/ /mtshon dang me yi char spros pa/ /mthu yi de mi spyi bor ni/ /pad+ma utpal phreng bar
248b7(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /de nas de yi brtson 'grus kyis/ /rab tu ya mtshan klus de la/ /smras pa ji srid skyil krungs cas/ /de srid yul 'dir khyod kyi gnas/ /zhes pa brjod nas de la ni/ /skyil krung yangs par bcings pa yi/ /tshid dang mtshungs pa stong pa yi/ /dkyil 
249a1(mdo 'grel): 'khor dag ni rab tu byin/ /der ni de yi grong khyer dang/ /grong gi khyad bar 'god byed cing/ /dgra bcom lnga brgya dag dang ni/ /lhan cig rab tu gnas par bya/ /der ni mi bzad bcom ldan chos dag rnam par bkod byas nas/ /mdzes
249a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i gtsug lag khang gi rgyan dang ldan pa'i 'dzin byed de/ /spos dang ldang gi ngos las blangs shing snying po thob gyur pa/ /gur gum gsar pa'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi rab tu khyab par byas/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems
249a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ nyi ma'i gung pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu pa'o/ /zhi ba la reg dri med tshul khrims ras dkar rtse dga' yi/ /mdzes pa bsten zhing yul dang chas las phyi rol
249a4(mdo 'grel): phyogs rnams la/ /dar gos dag dang shA na'i gos h+rul dri ma can gyis kyang/ /mngon par khengs pa bskyed min dman pa nyid du sgrub pa min/ /shA na'i gos can dge slong sngon/ /yon tan ldan pa bla ma'i dka' / /rgyal ba'i bstan pa bzung
249a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i slad/ /grong khyer bcom brlag dag tu zhugs/ /de ni lam du 'gro ba ni/ /'phags pa'i rang bzhin gyad gnyis dag/ phan tshun rab tu brjod pa yis/ /zhar byung 'phags pa 'di dag mthos/ /dri med tshul khrims gnas dang thos pa yi//
249a6(mdo 'grel): mig dang lhan par grags shing bzod pa can/ /dge sbyong de dag nyid ni sa gzhi la/ /dge slong shA na'i gos can dag tu brjod/ /de brjod de nas de yis kyang/ /de nyid brjod thos de dag gis/ /der smras shA na'i gos can de/ /khyod nyid yin par the tshom med/ /ci slar
249a7(mdo 'grel): shA na'i gos can zhes/ /blo bzang khyod ni phyogs su grags/ /thub pa dam chos smra ba rnams/ /khyod kyi tshigs su bcang pa sgrogs/ /des smras skye ba gzhan la bdag/ dman pa gso bar byed pa yi/ /rang sangs rgyas ni snying nad kyis/ /gzir ba rab tu bsgo?
249b1(mdo 'grel): par byas/ /de yi shA na'i gos dag ni/ /chung zhing rab tu rnying pa mthong/ /rgyal po la 'os mdzes pa'i gos/ /bdag gis rab tu gus pas phul/ /de yi smras pa grogs po dag/ /mdzes pa'i gos la bdag mi sred/ /shA na'i gos kyi rab zhi ba/ /sngags bar 'os shing
249b2(mdo 'grel): mdzes pa thob/ /ces pa de yi tshig thos nas/ /shA na'i gos rnying 'dod pa bdag/ dam pa'i grogs kyi chags bral thob/ /dam pa'i gos las phyir phyogs gyur/ /dus kyi de yi lus yi mthar/ /mdzes pa'i mchod pa bsgrubs byas te/ /de mtshungs nyid ni thob pa'i
249b3(mdo 'grel): slad/ /bdag gis smon lam blo gros byas/ /smon lam de dang de la ni/ /yang dag mchod pa yis kyang bdag/ shA na'i gos dang ldan par skyes/ /shA na'i gos can zhes su grags/ /zhes brjod bcom brlag grong khyer du/ /phyin ci dal gyi 'gro ba des/ /mgo
249b4(mdo 'grel): chen zhes pa'i ri bo la/ /rtsom pa chen po bdag gis 'dzegs/ /der ni sa gzhi 'dar byed pas/ /skyil krung bcas te nye bar 'khod/ /tshar chen 'bebs pa'i klu dag ni/ /bgegs la chas pa rnam par brtul/ /bcom brlag la gnas tshong dpon bu/ /na Ta b+ha Ta zhes
249b5(mdo 'grel): bya ba/ /grogs kyi slad du bzung nas ni/ /de yis gtsug lag khang par sprul/ /rin chen rab 'bar shel dang gser gyi ba gam dag dang ldan/ /khri dang khri'u mal stan dag gis spras shing mngon par dga' / /mtho ris lta bu skal bzang longs spyod
249b6(mdo 'grel): gter gyi gtsug lag khang/ /bsod nams gnas pa de ni na Ta b+ha Ta zhes par gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /shA na'i gos can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal
249b7(mdo 'grel): 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //skye bo 'dod pa'i rdul gyis mig ni nyams pa kun/ /yul ni gang dag nyid kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i par 'gyur ba/ /de nyid kyis ni bsod nams yongs gtsang dag pa brten rnams kyi/ /yid ni rab tu zhi zhing
250a1(mdo 'grel): chags bral ldan pa dag tu 'gyur/ /bcom brlag dag na gnas ba sngon/ /sbas pa zhes bya spos 'tshong gi/ bu ni dpal dad ldan pa dag/ nyer spas zhes par grags pa byung/ /shA ma'i ma'i gos can dge slong gi /rjes 'brad ngo zhes pha yis
250a2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /tshig gi ma skyes pa nas brtags/ /de ni de la gus ldan gyur/ /lang tsho gsar pa dang ldan de/ /chags bral la ni mngon phyogs tshe/ /bgegs tshogs brtsom ba nyams pa yis/ /yid 'byung gis ni bsam pa thob/ /pha yi tshig gis dus 'ga' zhig/
250a3(mdo 'grel): ha ri tsan dan gla rtsi dang/ /a ga ru dang ga? pur 'tshong?/ /tha snyad rnams ni da yi byas/ /de nas nor lhas byin zhes pas/ /spos ni nyo ru btang ba yis/ /rang gi 'bangs mos de yi gzugs/ /yon tan grags pa bshad thos nas/ /chags pa'i tshogs ni
250a4(mdo 'grel): rab rgyas shing/ /'grogs po don gnyor smad 'tshong mas/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i pho nya mo/ /btang nas de la bsam pa bshad/ /ngal gyi pho nya mos don gnyer/ /'dzum ldan de yis der smras pa/ /de dang phrar pa'i dus 'di ni/ /bdag la mngon par 'dod par
250a5(mdo 'grel): med/ /de nas pho nya mo 'ongs tshe/ /smad 'tshong chags bral ldan par 'gyur/ /rjes su chags pas chags bral ba/ /smad 'tshong ma la nges pa med/ /tshong dpon bu ni lang tsho ldan/ /nam zhig de yi khyim gnas tshe/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i don mthun dag/
250a6(mdo 'grel): byang gi lam nas gsar du 'ongs/ /de yi mtshan mo longs spyad slang/ /gos dang bcas pa'i gser dag springs/ /brkam chags med pa'i smad 'tsho? ma/ /ma dang bcas pa rab bsams pa/ /nor zod? byas pa tshong pa'i bu/ /'di ni re zhig khyim na gnas ?
250a7(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang don gnyar nor chen ldan/ /bdag gi ci bya de ma rig /'dod ldan nor ni skyugs pa dag/ phyin nas lhag par ster mi 'gyur/ /'bras bu med bar yongs rnyings pa/ /gyur pa de yi ci zhig bya /g.yar pa mngon 'dod gsar pa las/ /ma bslangs
250b1(mdo 'grel): bar yang thams cad ster/ /rang bor gus par mi mdza' yang/ /mdza' ba nyams su myong bar byed/ /de slad nang du zug rdu bzhin/ /zhugs ba 'di la ci zhig bya/ /las kyi 'ching zhing rdzas 'brang 'di/ /ma sbyad par ni 'gro ma yin/ /gal te nor ldan 'di btang nas/ /bdag
250b2(mdo 'grel): cag lan tshong khe med/ /chos phyar ma yin 'dod phyir min/ /bdag cag nor gyi phyir du sprul/ /zhes bsams nor ni don gnyer ma/ /de yis ma yi gros kyis ni/ /chad mchog dag ldan blung pa yis/ /tshor ba'i bu ni rab tu bsad/ /de nas srog dang bral pa de/
250b3(mdo 'grel): phyag dar khrod kyi phung por sbas/ /ded? dbon nang du rab bcug nas/ /de yi nor ni rgya che thob/ /smad 'tshong ma yi khang bar ni/ /'jug pa mthong ste phyir 'thon min/ /zhes te gnyen rnams kyis bces pas/ /tshong ba'i bu ni srog bral rnyed/ /de? nas de bsad gdung ba
250b4(mdo 'grel): can/ /de dag gi gsol sa bdag gis/ /sdig drag la 'os chad pa ni/ /mi bzad smad 'tshor ma la bstan/ /skra phrol gos dang bral bde/ /gsongs yi ni sar khrid de/ /lag pa rkang ba rab bcad cing/ /rna ba dang ni sna yang bcang/ /rang gi khrag gi 'dam la ni/ /gdung
250b5(mdo 'grel): bas nyen cing 'gro ldog byed/ /sha za zlog cing 'byon ma ni/ /'bangs mor bcas pa mya ngan byed/ /de nas de yi sdug bsngal ni/ /mi bzang nyer sbas kyis thos nas/ /de lta ba yi dus 'di zhes/ /brjod nas sa gzhi de ru song/ zla 'od can de 'ong ba ni/ /'bangs mos bshad
250b6(mdo 'grel): pa mthong gyur nas/ /sngon gyi mngon 'dod lhag ma yis/ /ngo tsha ldan zhing gya gyur gyur/ /bag chags goms pa dag gi lam/ /'ga' las nang du rab zhugs pa/ /lus can rnams kyi chags ba ni/ /gnas skabs 'gar yang gtong mi 'gyur/ /'bangs mo'i gos kyi
250b7(mdo 'grel): 'dab ma yis/ /'doms ni rab tu bsgribs byas shing?/ /nu mar lag bkod bzhin ras ni/ /rab tud de yis de la smras/ /bdag gis 'bad pa chen po yis/ /don du gnyer yang khyod ma 'ongs/ /de lta skal pa zhan? pa bdag/ /mthong ba yis ni khyod la ci/ gang tshe bdag
251a1(mdo 'grel): gi longs spyod kyi/ /skal bzang rnam 'phrul ci yang ldan/ /de yi tshe na khyod kyis ni/ /blta ba'i dus 'di min zhes smras/ /yan lag bcad cig brag gi dgos nyon mongs rgya mtshor lhung ba bdag/ blta ba yi ni dus 'di dag? /pad+ma'i
251a2(mdo 'grel): mig can khyod kyi ci/ /zhes pa smra zhing mchin yi/ /chu yis gos kyi mdza' dag bslang/ /rjes su gdud ba can de la/ /ngal gyis nyer sbas kyis smras ba/ /mdzos sdug zla ba'i grogs dang lus ni gser gyi chu shing mdzes pa'i rkun po dang/ /bzhin ras
251a3(mdo 'grel): padmo zum byed mig ni utpal dag la dman pa ster byed pa/ /shin tu yid 'phrog de dag rnams la bdag ni mi dga' 'on kyang 'bad pas bdag/ rnam par dpyad nas ro dang bral bo 'dod pa rnams kyi rang bzhin lta ru 'ongs/ /rgyan dang gos kyi rab bsgribs
251a4(mdo 'grel): shing/ /dri bzang mchog gis rang bsgos pa/ /khyod kyi lus ni mdzes pa dag/ slar yang rang bzhin 'di 'drar gyur/ /skra dang rus pas gang ba'i dbyibs can rtag tu me yi ni/ /yan lag ma lus rab 'chod rnag khrag par ldan smad pa'i gnas//
251a5(mdo 'grel): lus kyi ming can dur khrod sdug bsngal tshogs kyi gter dag la/ /gang zhig dga' ba de dag mi hud kyi hud brlag par gyur/ /kye ma rmongs las 'di rnams ni/ /rnam par bag cing dring can/ /rnam 'gyur bug pas gang gyur pa'i/ lus po la yang dga' 
251a6(mdo 'grel): ba bsgom/ /bde gshegs nye bar bsten pa las/ /lus kyi rnam grangs gnod pa can/ /mi bzad sgyu ma dag gi gnas/ /sdug bsngal phung po 'di zad 'gyur/ /rmongs pa'i ? bdag gi nyin byed nyon mongs gnas skabs mdza' dag gcod byed pa/ /ston
251a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i bstan pa'i gnas la gang dag gis ni dge ba'i grogs kyi smon lam btab/ /de dag lus zhes brjod pa'i dmyal ba dman pa'i geng rus dra pas gang gyur cing/ /rgyu ma'i phreng ba rgyas pas dkrigs pa'i rnam 'gyur snong ru slar yang lhung mi
251b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ de dag thos nas smad 'tshong ma/ /sdug bsngal gyis nyen chags bral can/ /zhi slang bsod nams dkon mchog gsum/ /skyabs 'os dag la skyabs su song/ /de nas de yi nyer sbas kyi/ /gtam gyi rgyun zhugs 'bras bu thob/ chos kyi lam la gus
251b2(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /bden? pa mthong nas zhi bar gyur/ /de nas de ni lha yi tshogs/ /'od dang ldan par skyes pa dag/ bcom brlag dag na 'khrod? rnams kyis/ /thos nas de lus sbyang ba byas/ /skabs der? shA na'i gos can ni/ /rab dang blo yi mngon phyogs te/ /nyer sbas rab
251b3(mdo 'grel): tu 'byung ba yi/ /dus la bab par yang dag bsams/ /da na de yi rab phyung des/ /blo med dgra bcom gnas thob nas/ /grong khyer dag na gnas rnams la/ /dam chos ston pa'i rtsom pa mdzad/ /'khor der chos ni bdud rtsi dang/ /bcas pa rab tu ston de la/
251b4(mdo 'grel): bgegs tshogs rnam 'gyur rab mang ba/ /de dang de ni bdud kyis byas/ /nyan pa sems ni g.yeng ba rnams/ /gang gi rnam par 'khrul 'gyur ba/ /mdzes pa gser dang bcas pa yi/ /der ni mu tig char pa phab/ /de yi nya mi 'phrogs gar mkhan ma/ /mdzos sdug
251b5(mdo 'grel): 'jo sgeg gzugs byas nas/ /dri za lha mo'i tshogs rnams dang/ /lhan cig der ni gang dag byas/ /mdzes pa'i gar dang rol rtsed gyis/ /bde blag tu mi sems 'phrogs pa/ /gdul bya rnams kyi yid ni der/ /nges par 'dod pa'i rang bzhin du/ /de nas rnam
251b6(mdo 'grel): par ma du la ba'i/ /bdud ni 'dul ba la brtson pa'i/ /nyer sbas kyis ni rnam 'gyur la/ /'os pa'i phyir bces rab tu bsams/ /bdud la phyogs ta? des smras? pa/ /khyod ni mkhas pa bdag tshim ste kye ma gar dang kye ma glu/ /mchog nyid kho na ci zhig brjod
251b7(mdo 'grel): ces brjod phreng ba'i zol gyis ni/ /ro ni gsum dag da la brtags/ mog la sprul gyi ro dang ni/ /mgrin par mi dang khyi yi ro/ /bdud des ro ni gsum po de/ /rang gi dgrol bar ma nus nas/ /dbang po nye dbang gdod? bzhi dang/ /bcas pa'i lha
252a1(mdo 'grel): la skyabs su song/ /nges kyang dgrol bar ma nus tshe/ /pad+ma skyes kyis rab bskul te/ /de nas dreg pa nyams pa'i bdud/ /de nyid la ni skyabs su song gshin tu dul bas nyer sras kyi/ rkang bdag la des btugs te/ /rgyags pa
252a2(mdo 'grel): btang nas rab dang bas/ /thal sbyar? de la rab smras ba/ /gnod ba byas pa bdag la ni/ /yang dag 'os ba khyod kyis byas/ /da ni khyod la bdag brten pas/ /khro ba thong la bka' drin mdzad/ /bdag gis gnod pa byas mong kyang/ /bde gzhegs bdag?
252a3(mdo 'grel): nyid chen po yis/ khu ni rnam par ma thul ba/ pha? yi bzhin du rab tu bsrungs/ /byang chub snying por rdo rje'i gdan/ /bsten pa de la bdag gi sngon/ /gnod pa yi ni tshogs dag byas/ /de yis bdag la bzod pa nyid ? byang chub ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i gnas
252a4(mdo 'grel): ded skyil krung dag nas bcas nas gnas pa'i tshe/ /rnam 'gyur rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa bdag la rang ring ni 'dzin byed cing/ /khrob bzod pas bkrus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan dag pa nyid kyi bdag nyid can/ /bsam gtan mchog tu skyong bar?
252a5(mdo 'grel): byed pa de yis spyan yang cung zad phye ma yin/ /khyod kyi snying rje btang nas ding/ /bdag ni rab tu smad bar byas/ /gnod byed la yang chen po yi/ /yid ni khro ba'i dri ldan min/ /bdag la ro dge btags pa mthong/ /khyod kyi bka' la bdag gnas so/ /dul
252a6(mdo 'grel): bas de skad smra byed pa/ /de la nyer sbas kyis smras pa/ /gal te slar yang nyer 'tshe khyod/ /dge slong rnams la mi byed na/ /khyod la brtan par bcings pa yi/ /ro 'di dag ni bdag gis dkrol/ /gus ldan bdag la dga' ba ni/ /'di yar byon gyis
252a7(mdo 'grel): rab tu bya/ /'das ba'i bde gshegs rnam pa ni/ /khyod kyis yang dag bstan par 'os/ /kun gyi rjes mthun khyod kyis ni/ /zlos gar nus pa bdag gis mthong/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mthong bdag/ bdag ni mchog tu 'dod par gyur/ /bde
252b1(mdo 'grel): gshegs kyi ni chos kyi sku/ /thos pa'i bdag nyid bdag gis mthong/ /nges par mig gi bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /gzugs kyi sku ni ma yin no/ /zhes brjod de yi no dag ni/ /bkrol ba me tog mtshon can gyis/ /de la smras pa bde gshegs kyi/ /gzugs dang
252b2(mdo 'grel): mtshungs par byed mi nus/ /de lta na yang khyod kyi bka' / /'dul ba la gnas bdag gis bstan/ /khyod kyi bdag ni bde gshegs dbyibs/ /phyag 'os la lang? phyag mi bya/ /zhes brjod bde gshegs rnam pa ni/ /rnam pa kun tu bde ster zhing/ /gser gyi
252b3(mdo 'grel): snang ba rab tu sbro/ /mdzes bdag ni de yis bstan/ /sbyan mi thung dag ring zhing bsam gtan la chags smin ma'i 'khri shing rnam 'gyur bral/ /shangs kyi rgyud mi mdzes par chags shing gser gyi gdugs dang mtshungs pa'i mtshan ma can/ /rgyan med snyan gyi
252b4(mdo 'grel): zhags pa ring zhing mdzes la phyag gi ljon pa kun tu 'phyang/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs dag mthong nas bsam pa med ba rnams kyang dga' bar gyur/ /bcom ldan sku ni mdzes pa de/ /mthong nas nyed sbas mtsham? dang/ /bcas shing sbu lang rgyas pa yis
252b5(mdo 'grel): de yi zhabs la phyag dag byas ? nges bang bdag ni phyag 'os min/ /zhes pa yod srubs sma byed tshe/ /de la nyer sbas kyis smras pa/ /rgyal ba'i rnam pa khyod phyag 'os/ /bcom ldan sku ni bcos ma yi/ /gzugs rnams la yang phyag byas 'os/ /mkhas pa rnams
252b6(mdo 'grel): ni sa shing dang/ /khams la phyag de byed pa min/ /nyer sbas kyis ni 'di brjod pa/ /dab? dang blo ldan bdud kyis thos/ /bde gshegs gzugs ni yongs btang ste/ /rang gi gzugs su rab tu bsdad?/ /de nas dul zhing phan pa tshol/ /de yi yang dag bos ba yi//
252b7(mdo 'grel): grong byed ba rnams dam pa'i chos/ /nyan du nyer sbas drung du 'ongs/ /de yi man dag gtam gyis ni/ /bden pa mthong zhing dga' ba yi/ /grong khyer na gnas 'bum phrag ni/ /bco brgyad dgra bcom nyid dag thob/ /de ltar 'jig rten mdza' dag dge bdag gis 
253a1(mdo 'grel): snang byed cing/ /rab rib 'phrog par byed pas chos kyi lam gyi man ngag bsgrubs/ /rgya che dge ba'i rtsabs bsod nams rgyas pa thob rnams kyi/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po gang de gzhan la phan pa'i don du 'gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i
253a2(mdo 'grel): dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /nyer sbas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //nyams pa med pa'i dka' dang yangs pa'i dpal//
253a3(mdo 'grel): grags pa bsil zer byed pa brgya ltar dkar/ /ngo mtshar spyod bas mdzes pa'i mthu dag ni/ /bde gshegs mchod pa'i 'bras bu'i cha shas yin/ /grong khyer pa Ta li pu trar/ /rgyal po dpal ldan mya ngan med/ /byung ste gang gi sbyin pa don/ /grangs
253a4(mdo 'grel): kyi sgra yis dbul bar gyur/ /nam zhig mdun sar 'khod de la/ /tshod ba gling du 'gro ba po/ /mdog kun nyams pa'i mya ngan gyis/ /gzir cing shugs rings ldan pas zhus/ /dpung pa'i grib pa ring po la/ /srid pa ngal bso lha khyod kyi/ /rgyal srid
253a5(mdo 'grel): dag na 'ga' zhig kyang/ /ra bsam pas gzir ba mthong/ /bskal ba nyams chung 'ba' zhig las/ /rgya mtshor gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis/ /bdag dag? rnams kyi gzings bcag nas/ /rin chen snod rnams bro sas par gyur/ /bdag cag rnams
253a6(mdo 'grel): ni gzhan du 'tsho/ /khyab bdag de la btang snyoms ni/ /rgya mtshor 'gro ba chad pa las/ /khyod kyi mdzod nyid skam par sgrub/ /ces pa de dag tshig thos nas/ /de dag gdung ba 'phos pa yi/ /rgyal pos rgya mtshor song ba'i klu/ /rnam par bsams
253a7(mdo 'grel): nas g.yo ming gyur/ /yid ni khro bas 'khrugs gyur cing/ /bcos thabs med pa de mthong nas/ /drung nas mngon shes drug pa yi/ /dge slong dbang po zhes pas smras/ /rin chen rkun po klu rnams la/ /khyod mthu me ni gos byed pa/ /zangs kyi
253b1(mdo 'grel): glegs bul? bkod pa'i/ /sprid yig sa bdag spring par mdzod/ /ces pa dge slong tshig thos nas/ /rgyal po yi ni spring yig springs/ /chu gter dag tu 'phangs pa de/ /klu rnams kyi ni dogs su 'phangs/ /ma bkur pa des mi bdag ni/ /bzhin gyi chu skyes mdzes bral
253b2(mdo 'grel): cing/ /bsam pas blo nyal dbugs 'byin cing/ /sna la song mo bkod de gnas/ /ma ning la ni bud med bzhin/ /de la gnyid ni phyir phyogs gyur/ /skam chags can gyi sred? pa ni/ /rang zhing mtshan mo thad ma gyur/ /gzhan dod sbyor ldan de la ni/ /nam mkha' i lha
253b3(mdo 'grel): mos mngon phyogs smras/ /sa skyongs thabs ni yod pa la/ /bsam pa bya bar mi 'os so/ /gang zhig phyag 'tshal yongs su bsngo pas cher 'os bsod nams can/ /spyi bo thal mi sbyar bas mtshan pas rgyal ya mchod byed pa/ /rnam par rgyal ldan de dag
253b4(mdo 'grel): bka' yi phreng ba rnam bkra zhing/ /dngos po mchog gis mdzes pa lha rnams kyis kyang spyi bor 'dzin/ /de thos nang bar mi bdag ni/ /khrus bya brtul zhugs gtsang ldan pas/ /dag pa'i yid kyi sangs rgyas ni/ /bsams nas grub slad rab smras pa/ /snying stobs
253b5(mdo 'grel): kyis 'dzum ro ldan snying rje zla ba'i 'od kyi re bskong/ /mdzes shing mdza' dag mun pa zhi slang dkar? po'i phyogs la rnam par gnas/ /rtag tu kun dga' rnam 'gyur med cing mchog gi bdud rtsi rnam par spro ba gdung ba rab zhi'i grogs po sangs rgyas zla nya'i gzugs
253b6(mdo 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig rtag tu yul gyi skyon la phyi rol phyogs gyur cing/ /rab mang pha rol phyin la brten pa'i sems ni dbang gyur ba/ /gzhan bran dag la mchog tu mngon zhen rten cing kun rtog gi/ dpag bsam ljon pa de dag bdag la dge ba
253b7(mdo 'grel): ster gyur cig/ ces pa sa yi bdag po yi/ /smon lam gus pa grub byed kyi/ /dgra bcom stong phrag drug cu ni/ /phyogs rnams dag las myur bar byon? /de nas dge slong dbang po yis/ /cig ni mi bdag mtshungs pa dang?/ /gzhan pa klu yi rgyal po yi/ /rnam pa
254a1(mdo 'grel): gser gyi rang bzhin byas/ /de nas dal bu dal bu yi/ /sa bdag gzugs ni dma' ba dang/ /klu yi dbang po'i gzugs dag ni/ /ya mtshan byed ba mthong bar gyur/ /ji lta ji ltar mi bdag gis/ /rtag tu dkon mchog gsum
254a2(mdo 'grel): mchod byas/ /de lta de ltar klu yi gzugs/ /dma' zhing gzhan pa mthong bar gyur/ /de nas rgyal pos sbring yig slang/ /springs cho klu yi gong zag rnams/ /ma lus chad pa'i rin chen khung/ /phrag la bkod nas 'ongs par gyur/ /ma lus nod de mi bdag gis
254a3(mdo 'grel): tshong ba rnams la rab tu byin/ /klu rnams btang nas rgyal ba yi/ /bstan la gus dang bcas par gyur/ /mi bdag la 'os nyer spyad kyis/ /dgra bcom rnams la mchod pa bsgrubs kun tu rtog pa mi chung pas/ /sangs rgyas lta bar 'dod par gyur//
254a4(mdo 'grel): yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur pas/ /rgyal ba mthong ba rnyed dka' i tshe/ /yon tan gyis ni nyer sbas dang/ /bde gshegs mtshungs par de yis thos/ /gus dang ldan pa'i dbang/ gyur cing/ /mdza' la mnyes gshin 'go tshan/ /gnas pa de ni ?
254a5(mdo 'grel): bdag gis/ /gus bas pho nya dag gis pos/ /dam chos dge ba rgyas pa ni/ /yongs rdzogs de yi mchod pa thob/ /rtag tu dkon mchog gsum po ni/ /rgyal po'i dpung gnyen dag tu gyur/ /de ltar rgyal ba dran bas sa yi bdag po dag/ rang rgyas
254a6(mdo 'grel): bsod nams chi bar? dang ba phun tshogs kyi/ /bka' ni me tog phreng par gyur pa'i rtse dga' dag/ dug 'dzin rnams kyi mgo po la yang thob par gyur/ /ces pha dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam
254a7(mdo 'grel): gyi 'khri shing las/ /klu la spring yig springs pa'i rtogs ba brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //gang zhig sbyin pa brtson pas 'phral la dga' ? glang chen bzhin/ /yan lag rdzogs shing mdzes sdug rgyal ba rgya che dbus
254b1(mdo 'grel): kyi phyogs/ /sa ni dang gi mnyes ba shin? dang bcas rab tu ster byed ba/ /de dag bsod rnams rab smin lam du ji ltar 'gro ma yin/ /de nas sa bdag mya ngan med/ /sbyin la shin tu cher goms pas/ /slong ba phyogs nas 'ongs rnams kyis/ /dpag bsam shing
254b2(mdo 'grel): nyid dag tu gyur/ /rtag tu rgyal po la 'os pa'i/ /zas dang gos dang rgyan rnams kyis/ /khyim du dge slong 'bum phrag gsum/ /gus shing gtsang ba dag gis mchod/ /gser gyi bye ba brgya ster bar/ /gang gi lugs la nges bar gyur/ /dge ba ldan ba'i
254b3(mdo 'grel): snying stobs nyid/ /shin tu zab pa med pa'i mdzod/ /rgyal srid che la 'byor mang des/ /snying stobs blo yis dge 'dun la/ /lo ni sum cu drug gi gser/ /bye ba dgu bcu rtsa drug phul/ /de nas dus kyi mi bdag ni/ /nad kyi the bam? pa nyid du gyur/ /lus can
254b4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi legs byas nyid/ /bstan ba yin gyi lus ni min/ /lus ni mdza' la nye pa nyid/ /de nas sa yi bdag po yis/ /bya ga sa kun rang dge slong la/ /nong ni 'bul ba brtson par gyur/ /de li tsha po phun tshogs san?/ /zhes pas phyag slar mdzod srungs
254b5(mdo 'grel): la/ bskos pas sbyin pa'i bsod nams la/ /zhugs ba de yi bka' dag bzlog/ /tsha bos sbyin ba bkag pa'i tshe/ /dge bdun la ci sa bdag gis/ /rang skal nyid du gyur pa'i slad/ /kyu ru ra'i phye dag phul/ /de nas blon po blo ldan ni/ /mgu byed sbas
254b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i gros dag gis/ /dge 'dun la ni sa bzhi dag/ ma lus sa yi bdag pos phul/ /gang+gA chu yi do shal mdzes ldan rgya mtsho ba zhi yi ni/ /rba rlabs ska rags yangs shing ma la ya yi rtsa rgyan can/ /nor 'dzin ma nyid ma lus byin nas ? pa'i
254b7(mdo 'grel): slabs du ni/ /bsod nams tshad kyi dpag dang bral pa de yi yang dag thob/ /de nas gser gyi bya ba dgu bcu drug phyin rab grags pa/ /mi yi bdag po ma blo ris song ? de yi tsha po yis/ /pa dag ser gyi lhag ma bye ba phrag ni bzhi rnams gyis//
255a1(mdo 'grel): blon po'i tshig gi bsal bar rab tu nyos te blangs bar gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /sa gzhi phul ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab
255a2(mdo 'grel): ste bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //ma rig pa yi rtsa ba can/ /'khor ba'i ljon pa rnams bkra kun/ /shes dang brjod dang bzhin par ni/ /kun mkhyen ma rtogs su yis nus/ /mnyan yon rgyal byed tshal na sngon/ /bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba dge legs
255a3(mdo 'grel): can/ /ma lus gzigs pa bcom ldan gyis/ /dge slong tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ /ye shes snang ba dri med kyi/ /yid can dge legs slad du nyon/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung bdag gis ni/ /khyed la rim bzhin bshad par bya/ /ma rig pa yi bag chags
255a4(mdo 'grel): 'di/ /'khor 'dug gi ljon pa ni /sdug bsngal phung po chen po yi/ /rtsa ba 'ching ba sgrub par byed/ /de yi rkyen gyi 'du byed do/ /lus dag yid kyi bdag nyid can/ /'du byed kyis bskrun rnam shes yid/ /dbang po drug pa'i bdag nyid can/ /de yi rkyen
255a5(mdo 'grel): gyi ming dang gzugs/ /ming dang mthong ba zhes brjod pa'o/ /'di las drug pa yid dag kyang/ /dbang po la gnas skye mchod drug/ skye mched drug gi yang dag sbyor/ /reg pa zhes ni mngon par brjod/ /reg pa drug ni nyams myong gang/ /de ni tshong par rab tu
255a6(mdo 'grel): grags/ /yul ni kun nas nyon mongs las/ /de yi chags sred rab tu skyod/ /de las byung ba'i len pa ni/ /'dod ba sogs la 'jug par 'gyur/ /len pa las byung srid ba 'dod/ /gzugs dang gzugs med rang bzhin no/ /srid pa las byung sna tshogs
255a7(mdo 'grel): kyi/ /skye gnas su 'jug skye ba'o/ /rga shi mya ngan la sogs rgyud/ /skye bal ni brten pa yin?/ /mar gi la sogs 'gog pa yis/ /de dag rim bzhin zhi bar 'gyur/ /ma rig pas drangs lugs med rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gnas 'di ni/ /dben ba'i?
255b1(mdo 'grel): nags su gnas zhing zhi ba khyed rnams ngag gis bsam par bya/ /yang dag yongs su shes na dus kyi nges par phra ba nyid du 'gyur/ /phra ba nyid ni yang dag thob na bde blag nyid du zlog par 'gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa
255b2(mdo 'grel): brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //'dod ldan rab gdung yid can rnams la phrag dog dbang gi khro ba nye bar gnas/ /khro bas long zhing blo gros nyams rnams
255b3(mdo 'grel): mi bzang rab rib g.yang sar rnam par ltung/ /der ni rab drag rnam mar dmyal ba nyon mongs tsha bas rmongs pa rten byed cing ? bskal pa'i bar du sdu gri'i mal stan du rtags yul gyi sa gzhi sa bcom rnams brlab/ bcom ldan rgyal ba mnyan yod kyi/ /chu klung
255b4(mdo 'grel): khyams ldan zhes par ni/ /byon pas sems can rnam 'gyur can/ /skye bo kun tu bskor ba gzigs/ /rma las byung ba'i srin bu yi/ /tshogs kyi lus chen za byed cing/ /gdung ba'i tshogs dmyal ba na/ /gnas pa'i sdug bsngal gsal byed pa/ /de mthong thugs rje skyes
255b5(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /kun mkhyen chu klung dogs su ni/ /grong khyer ba yi skye bo yis/ /yongs su bshams pa'i gdan la bzhugs/ /de yi rang bzhin ting 'dzin gyis/ /'phral la skye ba dran mdzad nas/ /dmus long rnam 'gyur rnam pa can/ /ma he mtshungs la de gsungs pa/ khi?
255b6(mdo 'grel): dur khyod mi bzod pa'i/ /las kyi 'bras bu longs spyod dam/ /tshul ngan skye bar byed pa yi/ /blo de khyod kyi dran nam ci/ /bde gshegs kyis gsungs de thos nas/ /mi yi tshig gis nges smras pa/ /bcom ldan mi bzad sdig pa yi/ /'bras bu rgya che longs spyod do//
255b7(mdo 'grel): zhes pa smra ba de yi ni mchog tu skye ba dran pa las/ skye bo mang pos 'di ci zhes/ /dge slong dge bdun dag la dris/ /de nas dge slong kun dga' pos/ /de yi las kyi dge mtshan las/ /ngo mtshar sngon byung dris de la/ /bcom ldan kun mkhyen gyis gsungs
256a1(mdo 'grel): pa/ /sa bdag bi? du ra zhes pa/ /mya ngan med bzhin mig g.yo mas/ /rkang pas bsnun pa'i dge mtshan can/ /'phags rgyal dag tu sngon gyur? gyur/ /nam zhig sbrang rtsi 'thung ba'i ? na/ /dbyings dus rlung gis g.yo ba yi/ /'khri
256a2(mdo 'grel): shing yid 'ong nags tshal du/ /de ni bud med chogs dang rtse/ /sa skyong bud med de dag deng/ /me tog thu ba brel gyur pa/ /rkang gdung sgra yis 'dab chags ni/ /rnam par bskyod cing rab ? thub? byam/ /deng? mi ni pa la brten bzhin/ /dben par rnam par gnas
256a3(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /rang sangs rgyas ni dgra bcom gyis/ /yongs bskor mdzes ma rnams kyis mthong/ /skyil krung bcas nas gnas gyur cing/ /bsam gtan spyan ni g.yo med pa/ /de mthong 'phral la de dag rnams/ /yid ni rab tu dang bar gyur/ /bsam gtan
256a4(mdo 'grel): mthar ni dag ba'i chos/ /bdud rtsi bzhin du ston de la/ /rkang bar phyag byas de dag gis/ /yongs su bskor nas nye bar gnas/ /mi bdag yul der song pa yis/ /bud med rnams deng mngon phyogs mthong/ /tshul khrims dag ldan de dag gi/ lus ni
256a5(mdo 'grel): bcad pa rab tu bskos/ /sdig pa de yi yangs pa yi/ /dus su dmyal ba nyam dbar/ /rnam 'gyur sems can gyis za zhing/ /ngan pa'i dbyibs can 'di dag smin/ /'og nas rkang par du ma yi/ /rnam 'gyur rma las byung gyur ba'i/ /srin po'i rigs kyi
256a6(mdo 'grel): khengs gyur pa/ /'di yi lus ni rmas la ltos/ /bskal pa'i mthar ni dmyal ba dag/ dpyad nas gtum po nyid gyur te/ /rngon pa'i dang tshul ldan ba 'dis/ /rang sangs rgyas ni gsod bar gyur/ /slar yang dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyis/ /lus chen
256a7(mdo 'grel): rnam par nyams byed cing/ /grangs las 'das pa'i dus kyis ni/ /mi nyid rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /de nas sdig pa zang gyur te/ /nyon mongs me? chen? dag gis ni/ /yid byung ston pa ur tam/ zhes pa'i bstan pa rab 'byung 'gyur/ /de nas kA shi'i
256b1(mdo 'grel): rgyal po yi/ /skyed mos tshal du mdzes mas mchod/ /phrag dog khro bas lus dag ni/ /chad pa drag pos gced par 'gyur/ /de rjes 'di yi sdug bsngal me/ /mi bzad rab tu nyams par 'gyur/ /zhes pa ston pa'i gsung thos nas/ /thams cad chags bral ldan par
256b2(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /de nas der ni ston pa'i gsung gi rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i rgyun rdzogs pas/ /chags bral srid pa'i 'jigs pa'i nyon mongs bsam pas gzir ba de dag rnams/ /dga' pa dad ldan dge pa'i chu yis bsam pa rab tu rdzogs gyur cing/ /rab zhi me tog dga' tshal
256b3(mdo 'grel): bsten pa rnams kyis gdung ba gshed song/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /bi du ra'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o// //mi srung rab tu rgyas
256b4(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /kun gyi yon tan nyams par byed/ /bdag nyid chen po'i mthu yis ni/ /mngon par dar ba nyid du 'gyur/ /A tra mA yA yi nags kyi mthar/ /'byung po'i khang pa'i phug nang na/ /bcom ldan bde bar gshegs pa sngon/ /bsam gtan rab tu skyor zhing gnas/ /der
256b5(mdo 'grel): ni mi bzang lce 'bab pa/ /drag pos khyu mchog zhing pa bcom/ /de ni bsam gtan la chags pas/ /sprin gyi sgra yang gnas ma gyur/ /de nas ngal /phab? dogs su ni/ /bsam gnyan mdza' ru ston pa'i gsung/ /nyan du rgyal po chen po ni/ /bzhi zhes brjod pa mngon
256b6(mdo 'grel): du 'ongs/ /yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po/ /mig mi bzang dang nor bdag po/ /de yi zhabs la de dag gis/ /phyag 'tshal rin chen me tog gtor/ /de dag las ni 'phags pa'i rigs/ /yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po/ /gzhan gnyis gdug
256b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i rigs can te/ /de dag la ni dam chos dag/ bcom ldan 'byung po dgongs pa yis/ /rang la 'os pa'i skad kyis bstan/ /gang gis de dag bstan pa yi/ /chos la rab tu mkhas par gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la rab brten cing/ /bslab pa'i gnas bzung 
257a1(mdo 'grel): de dag rnams/ /bcom ldan zhabs la btud nas ni/ /gzhal med khang nas mtho ris song/ /de dag song tshe bcom ldan la/ /dge slong ya mtshan skyes rnams kyis/ /de dag sngon tshe bsod nams tshigs/ /dris pa thams cad rig
257a2(mdo 'grel): pas gsungs/ /klu ni gdugs chung dbugs chen dag /sngon byung de dag dgra bo ni/ /'dab bzangs gtsug ldan de bzhin du/ /mi Da'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i/ /klu yi ston pa 'od srungs kyis/ /bka' ni yang dag thob gyur nas/ /stobs ldan 'dab bzang drag gi
257a3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /rdzi bar nus pa min par gyur/ /zhe sdang 'gren zhing mngon khengs pas/ /'deb bzangs kyis kyang 'od srungs la/ /bstan pa rin chen bzung nas ni/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song/ /klu de dag ni 'phags pa'i rigs/ /yul 'khor srung ?
257a4(mdo 'grel): 'phags skyes bo/ /gdug ba'i 'dab bzang de dag ni/ /mig mi bzang dang nor bdag 'di/ /zhes pa gsung ba rgyal ba yi/ /bsod nams gsung rab bdud rtsi ni/ /nags tshal de na gnas pa yi/ /thub pas ? ne yams thos// de yi mthu yi mtshan te/ /de
257a5(mdo 'grel): nyid la ni skyabs su song/ /phyir mi 'ong ni thong gyur nas/ /dben pa mthong zhing dga' bar gyur/ /de yi tsha bo shi la yang/ /de bzhin 'dul ba la brten nas/ /bden pa mthong zhing rgya che ba/ /phyir mi 'ong gi 'bras thob gyur/ /de dag 'khor bcas bcom ldan gyi//
257a6(mdo 'grel): bstan pa'i chos la rab dang zhing/ /rab tu byung ba blangs nas ni/ /bsags? par 'os pa'i dgra bcom thob/ /de nas de yi lhag rnams la/ /bde gshegs bka' yi ka pa ni/ /shA ri'i bu dang mong+gal gyi/ /bu yis kyang ni bstan pa mdzad/ /kai ne ya ka shai la
257a7(mdo 'grel): yi/ yid rab dang mthong de dag gi/ sngon gyi bsod nams dge slong gis/ /dris 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /sngon gyi skye ba 'di dag ni/ /ba ya NA sir khyim bdag gnyis/ /yang na a ba na zhes pa/ /grogs po chos la dag bar 'gyur/ /bla ma
257b1(mdo 'grel): 'od srung ? du ni/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyad de dag/ mthar thug smon lam dag gis ni/ /da ltar rab tu zhi nyid thog /de ltar thub mchog bsod nams smon lam las skyes pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dag ni thos gyur nas/ /rab tu zhi ba'i rigs pas srid
257b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i lag? 'gro ni/ /zil gyi mnan slad dge slong dge 'dun rtse gcig gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /kai ne ya ga'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa bdun pa'o//
257b3(mdo 'grel): gang gi skabs gsum la yang rtse ba dang ldan pa'i/ /mig ni zhig? min pa zhi byed la dpa' ltung byed pa/ /chen po de dag rnams kyi mthu ni cher 'os chen po nyid/ /dge mtshan gyis ni rtse mo shin tu mtho ba dag tu mdzes/ /brgya byin 'dun sar 'khod ba sngon/ /mtho ris
257b4(mdo 'grel): nas lhung mtshan nyid kyis/ /reg cing seng ge'i gdan steng du/ /dga' ba rab tu thob ma gyur/ /de yi mgo? la mand+ha ra'i/ /phreng ba gser ldan mdzes pa ni/ /bsod nams min pas bsgribs pa yi/ /lang mtsho'i dpal bzhin nyams par gyur/ /de yi thig le grags
257b5(mdo 'grel): pa ltar/ /dkar la nyams par bya ba'i slang/ /dngul gyi chu thigs gsar pa yis/ /ngan smras bzhin du gnas dag byas/ /de yi sems ni bas pa la/ /chags shing ltung la nye gyur pa/ /de yi brtan pa phrag dog gis/ /khros bzhin rab ? ring bar song/ /mya ngan
257b6(mdo 'grel): yongs 'dris de mthong nas/ /'jigs pa'i bde sogs kyis smras pa/ /ltung ba dag la nye bar 'dir/ /rten ni rab tu bsam par mdzod/ /'jig rten rnams la rgud pa yis/ /bsgom bya min pa med ces nas/ /gang zhig nyon mongs thigs pa 'di/ /'gro ba'i bdag po
257b7(mdo 'grel): khyod la yang/ /nges par rnam kun phyir phyogs pas/ /'bad ba yi ni btsal btsal nas/ /ltung ba yon tan la sred cing/ /chen po rnams dang 'grogs par mdzod/ /khyod? bdag rang nyid 'dzam gling du/ /re zhig bo bas la khyod kyis ni/ /rgung ba srung bar bzod pa
258a1(mdo 'grel): yi/ /dge slong 'ga' zhig btsal bar mdzod/ /gang dag dge bas 'gro byed cing/ /dge ba nyid kyis sbyong byed pa/ /dge slong gzu? ni rgya che zhing/ /khyad par 'phags par grags pa thos/ /zhes pa dga' ma'i tshig thos nas/ /de
258a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin zhes smras lha yi bdab/ sa la mngon phyogs nyon mongs ni/ /'jil ba dge slong rnams la dris/ /brgya byin gyis ni dri tsam gyis/ /mthu yis mngon khengs de dag gis/ /thal mo sbyar byas de nyid la/ /phyag 'tshal bzhin ngas btud par gyur//
258a3(mdo 'grel): gang zhig bdag nyid la 'dud pa/ /de yi ji ltar srung byed gyur/ /ces bsam lha yi bdag po ni/ /re ba nyams pas dang gnas song/ /de nas de yi bde gshegs ni/ /mchog gi bdud rtsi thob shes nas/ /lhung la rab tu nye ba ni/ /yongs su skyob pa dag
258a4(mdo 'grel): tu bsams/ /de nas de ni rjes 'brang bcas/ /dbang po'i phreng ba'i phug nang na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me khams la/ /snyoms gnas zhugs pa lta du song/ /de nas bde sogs bdag po des/ /'phral la phug dang nye bar phyin/ /zur phung lnga ba zhes pa yi/ /dri
258a5(mdo 'grel): ze'i bu la gus pas smras/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das/ /me yi khams la snyoms zhugs pa/ /khyod ni rang gi sgyu rtsal la/ /mkhas pas rtogs par bya bar 'os/ /gang zhig dus min nyer 'grod dang/ /ma brjod par mi nang 'jug dang/ /
258a6(mdo 'grel): bsam pa shes pa min pa de/ /dam pa rnams kyis smad ba'i gnas/ /zhes brjod lha yi rgyal po yis/ /blo gros ldan pa dri ze'i bu/ /baiDUrya'i dbyug pa can/ /rgyud mangs sgra snyan len du bcug /rang bzhin gyis snyan yid du ?/ /bsted ? dbyangs dga' ba  
258a7(mdo 'grel): dang bcas bas/ /de yi rgyal ba sad byas te/ /'phrog byed lta ba'i go grabs phye/ /de nas lha dang bcas pa yi/ /mchod sbyin brgya ba ral zhugs te/ /rab zhi bdud rtsi'i ? bebs pa/ /dga' ba skyed byed bde gshegs lhas/ /phyag 'tshal rab tu ?
258b1(mdo 'grel): pa de/ /mgo yi mand+ha? ? ros/ /ston ba'i zhabs kyi sen mo yi/ /me long dag ni rab tu phyis/ /de nas rab zhugs de la ni/ /gang gis bden pa mthong ba la/ /chos kyi mig ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /bka' drin rgyal ba de yi mdzad/ /yongs ltung de yi 'phral la ni/
258b2(mdo 'grel): rang gi stan nyid thob par gyur/ /bsod nams mthu ni de dag gis/ /ltung ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu ?/ /ji srid 'tsho bar bde bar gshegs/ /skyab 'os de la skyabs su song/ /bdag ni rab thar ces brjod nas/ /de la zhus nas mtho ris song/ /tum bu ru yi bu mo
258b3(mdo 'grel): mdzes?/ /zur phud lnga ma la des byin/ /dam pa rnams ni phan pa'i cha/ /bu lon bzhin du sems par byed/ /dge ba thog pas brgya byin ni/ /gsar du 'khrungs pas ya mtshan pa/ /dge slong gis dris bcom ldan 'das/ /thams cad mkhyen pas dar gsungs
258b4(mdo 'grel): pa/ /grong khyer mdzes ldan dag tu sngon/ /sa yi bdag po bskal bzang gis/ /ston pa log par dad sel gyis/ /sku yi mchod rten rab tu byas/ /de yi bsod nams smon lam rdzogs ldan pas/ /rgyal pos de ni lha yi dbang nyid thob/ /'byor pa chos kyi
258b5(mdo 'grel): bcings zhes gsungs nas ni/ /bcom ldan gsung ni rab tu zhi bar gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs ba brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /brgya byin ltung ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun
258b6(mdo 'grel): cu rtsa brgyad ba'o// //bud med blo yi srin mo rnams kyi blo gros rmongs byas shing/ /bde ba 'dod pa nyid kyis yid ni nor la zhugs gyur pa/ /skyes bu gang zhig rab zhi dang bral zhi bar mi bgrod do/ /de de nges par 'phral pa nyon mongs dag tu
258b7(mdo 'grel): ltung bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig na tshod byed dag ni/ /thos pa brjod cing tshangs spyod spyad/ /bram ze 'tsho ba bde zhes pa/ /mnyan yod du ni/ sngon byung gyur/ /mdza' bas gnyen gyis gsol btab pa'i/ /rgan po smar? khra bo de/ /chos kyi lam gyi do dag tu//
259a1(mdo 'grel): bud med rab tu bzung bar byas/ /longs spyod gsar ba la chags de'i/ /chung ma g.yo ldan ma zhes pa/ /dar la bab cing mig g.yo ma/ /shin tu yid 'od nyid du gyur/ /de ni de la rim bzhin du/ /shin tu sred par min par gyur/ /bud
259a2(mdo 'grel): med mi gus la chags shing/ /yang dag chags la chags bral zhing/ /de bsams kun tu mi 'phrogs ba'i/ /rga bas skra dkar ldan pa'i khyo/ /bdag gi lang tsho'i dregs 'di la/ /bsod nams min bas nye bar gnas/ /rgan po gzhon nu ma spyod pa/ /lus
259a3(mdo 'grel): ni nyams pa go byed dag/ rga bas skra nas bzung byas te/ /gnyen gshin gyis ni zlog pa bzhin/ /rgan bo dal gyi cung zad ni/ /'khums shing dgu bor rab gyur pa/ /sa la lang tsho'i nor bu ni/ /ster ba chol bar byed ba bzhin/ /rgan po blo ldan ma yin pa/ /
259a4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pha rol don shes pas/ /gzhan gyi longs spyod la sbyar gang/ /de nyid bdag gis rab tu bya/ /'di ni khyim nang gnas pa'i tshe/ /rkun po'i 'dod ldan dang mdza' bas/ /rtse med longs spyod ma bsdams pa/ /bde ba bdag gis spyod mi nus/ /zhes
259a5(mdo 'grel): bsams rigs bzang rjes mthun zhing/ /ngo tsha ldan pa bzhin du nges/ /dul ba yis ni mngon phyogs te/ /dal gyis bdag bo la smras pa/ /bya med bde ba tshol byed pa/ /khyed ni khyim du chags pa yis/ /bzod pa dka' ba'i dbul po nyid/ /khyod kyis lag
259a6(mdo 'grel): bas drangs nas blangs/ /gang zhig rtsom ba la sdang zhing/ /drag po'i snyoms las dag la dga' / /rab mang 'god ba'i rgyud ldan ba'i/ /khyim na gnas pa des ci byed/ /gang du khyim bdag snyoms las las/ /khyim gyi dur ni mi gtong ba/ /der ni bu
259a7(mdo 'grel): med rmongs pa rnams/ /nar sgrub slad du 'byung dam ci/ /gang la skyes pa smo ldan pas/ /phyi yi tha snyad la dga' zhing/ /bud med khyim gyi bya bar chags/ /de na don kun phun sum tshogs/ /las dang bral ba rnams kyi khyim ni dga' ston longs spyod
259b1(mdo 'grel): nyams gyur cing/ /rgyan med gos med bud med dag ni zur phug dri ma can na zhe na/ /khri dang mal stan rnam par nyams shing chu snod chags pa'i sgra dang ldan/ /'bangs med yo byad med cing yun rings zho srub sgra ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de yis de brjod bram ze de/ /nor
259b2(mdo 'grel): lab mngon par phyogs te song/ /bud med kyis ni dbang byas rnams/ /yul gyi g.yangs dag tu ltung/ /de yi nor 'dzin rgyal mtsho'i mthar/ /'khyams nas sbyin pa thob gyur te/ /gser dang gos ni rdzogs gyur pas/ /dus kyi rang gi grong khyer song/ /de nas khyim 'dod tshoD
259b3(mdo 'grel): kyis de/ /song ba grong mdza' i nags tshal du/ /chom rkun ba yis bcom gyur nas/ /lus tsam lhag ma nyid du gyur/ /bde ba don gnyer nus pa yis/ /don med nor ni nyer bsgrubs kyang/ /mya ngan chu yi thigs ba bzhin/ /byed po bzhed pa min pas byed/ /des bsams kye ma
259b4(mdo 'grel): 'bad pa yis/ /bdag gi nor ni bsgrubs gyur kyang/ /bdag ni skal dang mi ldan pas/ /rmi lam mthong dang mtshungs par gyur/ /nor ni don gnyer chung ma yi/ /gan du lag stong bdag phyin na/ /smad ba drag po'i dug ldan pa'i/ /tshig rtsub brjod bas bdag mi 'tsho/ /de slad bdag ni
259b5(mdo 'grel): 'di nyid du/ /'phral la zhags pas bcings pa phan/ /dbul ba'i nyer 'tsho drag po yis/ /khyim du bud med mtshon mi bzod/ /ces bsam de yi 'khri shing gi/ zhags pa dag ni mgrin bar bkod/ /nyon mongs drag pos nyon rnams kyis/ /gnyen dang phrad pa 'chi ba yin//
259b6(mdo 'grel): skabs der bcom ldan brtse ba yi/ /rgya mtsho 'byung po la dgongs pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pas de yi ni/ /sdug bsngal shes nas nags su byon/ /de nas de yi gnyis skyes ni/ /brtse bas dbugs dbyung zhags pa btag /de yi sbyin pa'i gter blangs nas/ /de la phyag 'tshal
259b7(mdo 'grel): khyim du song/ /de yi chung ma nar gyis kyang/ /rjes su 'thun ba nyid ma gyur/ /gzhan gyi reg ba la chags pa'i/ /bud med nor gyis tshim mi 'gyur/ /longs spyod rtsom pa che la yang/ /dus kyi yid ni chags bral des/ /bsam pa kye ma 'khor ba na/ /de nyid du na bde ba
260a1(mdo 'grel): med/ /dbul dang mtshungs pa'i sdug bsngal ci zhig yod/ /de bas kyang ni nor sgrub rab? sdug bsngal/ /nor gyi longs spyod bde ba'i chas bsgos pa/ /gnas dang gnas su sdug bsngal brgya phrag bskyed/ /de ltar chags bral rab bsams te//
260a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal byed tshal du song nas des/ /srid ba bcad slad bcom ldan 'das/ /ston pa la ni skyabs su song/ /de yi bsam pa bag la nyal/ /khams dang de bzhin 'gro mkhyen nas/ /chos kyi sman ni bcom ldan 'das/ /srid pa'i nad kyi sman bas byin/ /bden mthong de
260a3(mdo 'grel): yis rab byung ni/ /rab tu dad ba yang dag blangs/ /nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa'i slad/ /dgra bcom nyid ni thob par gyur/ /de yi grub pa rmad byung de/ /mthong nas ya mtshan rgyas pa yis/ /dge slong gis dris bcom ldan gyis/ /de yi sngon byung rab gsungs
260a4(mdo 'grel): pa/ /ba ra NA sir mi yi dbang/ /dbang chen de ni sngon byung ste/ /sems can kun la gang gis ni/ /brtse ba mchog nyid yid 'ed? gyur/ /bdag po ngan pas rab gdungs pa/ /yul gzhan nas 'ongs skye bo yi/ /lam gnas gang zhig grib bsil gyi/ /ljon pa bzhin du
260a5(mdo 'grel): mngon phyogs bsten/ /nam zhig pha rol rgyal phran gyis/ /grong khyer dag ni bkag gyur kyang/ /khro med de yi g.yul dag ni/ /thams cad gsod la blo ma bsgrubs// de ni spro ba med shes nas/ /chags bral blon po thams cad kyis/ /sred phas nor ni dang sems can la/ /ngo tsha rab? btang ngan pa yi/ /blon po
260a6(mdo 'grel): te/ /dgra bo dag la brten par gyur/ /de nas srog chags gsod pa la/ /yid byung rgyal srid rab btang nas/ /sa yi bar ga po bzod pa'i zhing/ /gcig pu ? tshor nags su song/ /rjes la gus dang sems can la/ /ngo tsha rab btang ngan pa yi/ /blon po chagS
260a7(mdo 'grel): bas long rnams kyis/ /pha rol rgyal phran rgyal por byas/ /mi bdag gsar pa'i ngos na ni/ /gsar pa nyid du rnam par 'phel/ /rang gi rje bo btang rnams la/ /'os ba min pa 'ba' zhig ldan/ /de dag sa bdag gsar ba yi/ /sgo srungs rnams kyis yun ring
260b1(mdo 'grel): bkag /skyo bas bdag nyid kha? mtshon te/ /shugs byung ngo tshas glu blangs pa/ /rje bo mnyes gshin rnyed sla ba/ /dbang chen sde ni rab btang nas/ /sdig can bdag cag gzhan sgo na/ /da mod pa'i gdung ba bzod par byed/ /dpal ni skyed byed lha dang lha min mi rnams
260b2(mdo 'grel): rin chen tshogs kyis rgyas par byed/ /chu gter dri med shin tu rgya che de ni kho bas ba stong pa khyod kyis btang/ /da lta bdag ngan sgo la brten cing gyen du phyogs thob rmongs pa'i dud dag kye/ /kha la brlang pos phung byas cho de drug po ci zhig la sgrogs mi smar 'dug/
260b3(mdo 'grel): de ltar rab gdung blon po rnams/ /rgyal srid gsar pa'i tshad gdung la/ /dbang chen sde yi zla ba ni/ /rab tu blta bar 'dod par gyur/ /skabs der rgyal po zhim yi/ /dga' tshal nags na gnas pa dang/ /nye bar bram ze slang ba bo ko shi ka zhes pa 'ongs/ /'bras
260b4(mdo 'grel): bu rtsa bas sa bdag gis/ /mgron byas ngal bsos de la byin/ /de yi 'ong ba'i rgyu mtshan dag/ dul bas dris pas rab smras pa/ / slong ba'i tshogs kyis kun rtogs gi/ 'bras bu tshe ldan dpag bsam shing/ /mi bdag dbang tshan sde la bdag /dbul ba yi ni
260b5(mdo 'grel): slong du 'gro/ de thos mi bdag sdug bsngal dang/ /ldan pas de la rab smras pa/ /bram ze da nyid dbang chen sde/ /dpal dang bral bas bdag smad do/ /slong ba khyod ni phyir phyogs las/ /gang la gdung ba ster du 'ongs/ /sgrub byed phyin ci log las ni/ /phyin ci log
260b6(mdo 'grel): nyid bdag gis thob/ /gang gi re ba nyams pa yi/ /slong ba'i bzhin log mthong gyur ba/ /shing skams lta bu bdag gi lus/ /'bras bu med pa dag gi ci/ /zhes pa rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/ /rdo bas bsnun bzhin gnyis skyes ni/ /ri? thag chad pas
260b7(mdo 'grel): yun ring na/ /'du shes thob nas rab smras pa/ /bdag la skal pa med pa yis/ /sa skyong khyod kyis 'byor pa spangs/ /btong ba khyod ltar rnyed bla ba/ /'jig rten du ni gal rnyed/ /chog shes rgyal ldan khyod mdzes pa/ /rgyal srid dag las shin tu
261a1(mdo 'grel): lhag gang zhig mdza' bo gzhan med pa'i/ /slong rnams bsod nams med pa nyid/ /dpal mo g.yo ba nyid kyis 'phral la nges par btang gyur pa'i/ /rin chen 'byung gnas dag ni byag kyang dman par gyur pa med/ /dpal ni khyi bzhin ma
261a2(mdo 'grel): bsrun la rkam chags khyim na bstan ldan zhing/ /da dung skyes bu dam pa la brten dga' bar yongs ma gyur/ /ces brjod ma bdag la gsol nas/ /bsam bral dug gi gzir ba de/ /'bras bus 'tsho ba'i shing bcad pa'i/ /mya ngan las ni 'chi bar brtson/ /de
261a3(mdo 'grel): yi mgrin par song ba yi/ /zhags pa sa bdag de yi bsal/ /snying rje'i rgya mtsho slong rnams kyi/ /mdza' bcug gnyen gyis de la smras/ /bdag chings sa yi bdag po ni/ /mi mthun phyogs kyi grong khyer khyer/ /khyod la bdag ni gsod 'dod des/ /mngon 'dod
261a4(mdo 'grel): las lhag nor ster 'gyur/ /de slad sa yi bdag pos brjod/ /ngo mtshar gyur bzhin gnyis skyes kyis/ /slong ma'i gnyen de bcings nas ni/ /nor la sred bas rab tu khyer/ /sa bdag de yi khrid pa de/ /pha rol rgyal phran dag gis mngon/ /de yi byung tshul thos
261a5(mdo 'grel): gyur nas/ /ya mtshan gyur pas de la bsngags/ /bram ze la ni nor byin nas/ /rang gi gnas su sa bdag de/ /zhabs la cod pan gyis btugs te/ /dang bar byas nas 'di yi bkod/ /mi yi bdag po dbang chen sde ni de nyid de/ /gang 'dis slong pa kau shi
261a6(mdo 'grel): ka'i nor bdag bsgrubs/ /slar yang de nyid kho na 'tsho ba bde ba'o/ /zhes pa'i spyod pa rgyal bas rang la dper brjod do/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ dbang chen
261a7(mdo 'grel): sde'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun cu rtsa dgu pa'o// / /gdung sar gyur kyang yid 'byung mi 'gyur zhing/ /bslab ba bzung ba yis kyang phan pa brjod/ /gzhan la phan pa dag la cher zhugs pa/ /dam bas mchog tu bdag nyid
261b1(mdo 'grel): gdung ba bzod/ /sngon tshe dpal ldan 'byer? 'jig ni/ /dag la bar 'dod pa dga' ba yi/ /grogs po dri ze'i rgyal po ni/ rab dga' dag gi khang bar phyin/ /de yi der ni mtshed pa dag/ shin tu che zhing mang bas mchod/ /mdza' bcugs mnyes gshin ldan pa'i lha/ /bstan pa
261b2(mdo 'grel): 'khod des de la smras/ /rab dga' tshur shig sa la 'dong/ /sa yi bdag po bsod nams kyi/ /chu gter chen po zas gtsang zhes/ /bya ba'i sras su rab 'khrungs pa/ /de yis rab zhi bdud rtsi thob/ /dge ba'i slad du 'gro ba des/ /de ni yang dag 'god par mdzad/ /yu cag
261b3(mdo 'grel): la yang mdzad par 'gyur/ /da lta bdag gi rgyud mangs la/ /glu dbyangs rgyun ni rab tu sbyar/ /ji ltar bdag 'gro phyi nas ni/ /bdag la bya ba dka' bar 'gyur/ /zhes bde brjod brgya byin ni/ /yid byung rang gis gnas su song/ /sems ni gul la chags rnams
261b4(mdo 'grel): la/ /dge la mngon dag lag la yid/ /skabs der sdom brtson brtul zhugs can/ /rab bzang mi yi 'jig rten gyi/ /ku? sha'i grong khyer mtsho yi 'gram/ /u dum+ba ra'i nags na gnas/ /de yi u dum+ba ra'i shing/ /me tog gsar pas khyab pa mthong//
261b5(mdo 'grel): mig ni ya mtshan gyis rgyas pas/ /shin tu yang dag yun ring bsams/ /u du ma wa ra'i nags tshal 'di/ /rgyal ba 'khrungs na me tog dpal/ /'byung bzhi 'khor los sbyar ba dag /'byung na yang ngo bzhin du min/ /yang na bdag gi bsod nams
261b6(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /rmad byung 'di ni yang dag skyes/ /zhes pa bsams na rab bzang ni/ /kun dga' rab tu rgyas par gyur/ /de nas slar yang lha yi bdag/ slong ras rab dga' dag la skyes/ /dam pa rang gi bya ba bas/ /gzhan gyi bya bar brtson ba lhag /sa gzhi'o
261b7(mdo 'grel): zla ba bde gshegs kyis/ /bstan pa mi 'od ni thams cad ni/ /rab tu gsal ba'i sa gzhi la/ /de bdag 'tshur? shog 'u can 'dod/ /de la rab dags smras pa lha/ /rgyud mangs la ni glu dbyangs rgyun/ /bdag gis rab tu sbyar ba 'di/ /phyi nas
262a1(mdo 'grel): bya ba sla mi 'gyur/ /zhes thos 'chi med bdag po ni/ /yid la re ba nyams par gyur/ /'bad med bdud rtsi nyer gnas pa/ /bsod nams dman rnams 'thung ba min/ /dus kyi u dum+ba ra'i nags/ /me tog rab rgyas dri bzang gis/
262a2(mdo 'grel): phyogs mtshams kun tu khongs par 'gyur/ /rab bzang gis kyang mthong bar gyur/ /de yi bsams pa me tog gi/ tshal ni rnam par rgyal ba 'di/ /ston ba dam chos ston pa dang/ /'khor los sgyur ba rgyal la 'gyur/ /yang na bdag gi bsod nams mthus
262a3(mdo 'grel): ma lus tshal ni me tog rgyas/ /zhes ba sems pa de la ni/ /dregs dang dga' ba rab tu skyes/ /de nas dge spyod dgra bcom thob/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya mngon phyogs te/ /de ni rdzu 'phrul gyis brtul nas/ /rab zhi ring na rgyas par byas/ /de nas dus kyi
262a4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das/ /rgyal bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas/ /yongs su myang 'das la rtog cing/ /tha ma'i gzims mal dag la gnas/ /re zhig gdul bya 'dul ba la/ /rnam par bkod ces rab tu bsams/ /rab bzang dang ni dri za dag/ rab dga' de
262a5(mdo 'grel): yang bdag gis lhag/ rab bzang tshegs ni chung ngu yis/ /'dul ba rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /dri za lang tsho 'byor ba yis/ /myos pa tshogs kyi 'dul bar 'gyur/ /zhes pas sems nas de bzhin gshegs/ /dri za'i grong khyer dag tu byon/ /dri zi'i rgyal mo
262a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan pa ni/ /mdzes pa lhag par mngon par sprul/ /bai DUrya'i dbyug pa can/ /rgyud mangs rgyud stong spreng byed cing/ /'gran pa'i rab dga' i rgyags pa ni/ /nyams par byed la brtson par gyur/ /rim gyi rgyud ni bcad gyur kyang/ /de dag sgra dbyangs kun
262a7(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa/ /ston par byed pa mthu yis ni/ /khyad par med pa dag tu gyur/ /rgyud ni thams cad bcad gyur kyang/ /dri zi'i 'dren pa dag gis ni/ /dbyangs kyi tshogs ni rab tu bstan/ /rab dga' yis ni nus ma gyur/ /de nas khengs dang dregs
262b1(mdo 'grel): btang ba/ /de la bcom ldan rgyal ba yis/ /lus ni mngon phyung dag pa yi/ /dam ba'i chos ni bstan par mdzad/ /'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo ni/ /ye shes rdo rjes rnam bcom te/ /de yi rgyun zhags 'bras bu ni/ /rab tu zhi slang mngon du byas/ /dus kyi u dum+ba ra yi/ /nagS
262b2(mdo 'grel): kyi rab dga' me tog tshogs/ /rgan po dag gi longs spyod bzhin/ /dal bus rab tu nyams par gyur/ /me tog nyams pa de mthong nas/ /rab bzang phya ngan brgya yi thebs/ /nges pa nyid du bdag nyid kyi/ /bsod nams min las skyes par bsams/ /bsam
262b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i me yi gdungs de la/ /u dum+ba ra'i nags kyi dpal/ /lha mos mngon phyogs rab smras pa/ /don med mya ngan yongs ma byed/ /mthu ldan khyod kyi bsod nams kyis/ /tshal 'di me tog rgyal ba min/ /khyod kyi bsod nams ma yin bas/ /nyams min 'di yi rgyu
262b4(mdo 'grel): dag nyon/ /bde gshegs nyid ni 'khrungs pa na/ /me tog 'di dag 'byung 'gyur te/ /bla med ye shes brnyes pa na/ /kun nas rab tu rnam par rgyas/ mya ngan 'das la nye ba na/ /nyams ba dang ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /ku sha'i drung na de bzhin gshegs/ /yongs su mya
262b5(mdo 'grel): ngan 'da' bar bzhed/ /nags kyi dpal mo'i tshig 'di dag/ /rab bzang gis ni thos gyur nas/ /ring zhing dro ba'i shugs btang ste/ /shin tu yun ring yang dag bsams/ /ston pa'i chos ni 'dul ba la/ /bdag ni snod du 'gyur bar shog/ ces pa 'di ni bdag snying
262b6(mdo 'grel): las rtag tu re ba bcings par gyur/ /gang gis ston ba'i zhal gyi par/ /mthong zhing chos kyi gsung rab la/ /dge ba'i dga' ston yongs rdzogs pa/ /nyon mongs bral ba de dag bsngags/ /da ni mya ngan rab zhi'i grogs po mi bzad srid phas gzir ba'i gnyer
262b7(mdo 'grel): su yi bzhin ras ri bong can las rab 'khrungs rab tu rgyas pa'i gsung/ /ye shes snang bas dkrigs shing rab mdzes bsod nams bdud rtsi dag gi rgyun/ /srin pa'i mya phan gdung bar 'jig rten nyan pa'i snod kyi 'thung bar 'gyur/ /gdan bcom ldan
263a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba bzhugs/ /ku sha'i grong du bdag 'gro'o/ /tha mar de mthong bdag gis ni/ /gal te rnyed slar thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bsams spro ldan de yi ni/ /lus mi snang bar skad cig las/ /yid ltar mgyogs pas rgyad kyi
263a2(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /ku sha'i grong khyer dag tu byin/ /me tog dga' tshal sa la zung/ /zhes pa'i tshal na rab gzims pa/ /rgyal ba'i sgor gnas dga' bo la/ /de yi nang du 'jug ba zhus/ /de nas dal gyi kun dga' bos/ /sor mo gdangs zhing g.yo ba yis/ /nang
263a3(mdo 'grel): 'jug bsam pa zlog byed cing/ /chung chung sgra yi de la smras/ /khyod kyi dri der lung ston pa/ /rab bzang da lta gnas skabs med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i slad/ /sku ni yongs su mnyel zhing bzhugs/ /skye bo 'di dag pha rol gyi/ /gdung ba ni shes
263a4(mdo 'grel): rang don gnyer/ /kun tu ji lta de lta yang/ /gnas skabs dag ni mi sems so/ /gang zhig yul dus mi shes par/ /'gral la slong ba nyid gyur pa/ /de dag bzhed don rab btang nas/ /ngo tsha blangs te 'gro ba nyid do/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni zhi ba'i tshe na ljon ba 'di
263a5(mdo 'grel): dag kyang/ /yal 'dab 'khri shing rab tu nyal zhing des par mi g.yo la/ /chu klung dag ni rnam par dud cing mgyogs pa gtang nas bgrod/ /rlung yang de bzhin 'phral la rab tu g.yo zhing bgrod ma yin/ /de ltar kun dga' bo yi ni/ /'bad bas
263a6(mdo 'grel): yang dang yang du bzlog/ /re ba nyams pas rab 'khrugs pa/ /rab bzang gis ni de la smras/ /gzir ba yis ni skabs mi shes/ /slong ba dang zhing brtse bar mdzod/ /rgyal brnyed sla rab tu ston/ /rtsub bo 'di ltar yongs ma mdzad/ /grib bsil
263a7(mdo 'grel): dag la nye bar 'khod cing bsil bas rab dga' i dga' ston thob gyur ba/ /rtag tu gsang ba'i gsar ba'i lam bgron 'dzegs shing 'bras bu 'dzin pas gzir ba'i shing/ /brten pa dag la gnyes gshin slong ba kun gyi gzhin rnying spar?
263b1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa yi/ /lum dag ni bcom dang dkrugs dang rab tu grangs pa'i nyon mongs phreng ba su yi shes/ /de ltar 'bad bas rab bzang gi/ yang dang yang du zhus gyur kyang/ /dgag pa brgya yis kun dga' bos de ni kun dga' med pas bsgrubs/ /bcom ldan
263b2(mdo 'grel): kun mkhyen gzims mal du/ /lha yi gnas las mngon phyogs te/ /rab bzang nang du thod zhig ces/ /kun dga' bo la gsung cher gsungs/ /'jug pa thob ste nor med kyis/ /gter bzhin bde gshegs mthong gyur nas ka rab bzang gdong ni mchi ma dang
263b3(mdo 'grel): bcas pas phyag 'tshal der gsol ba/ /bcom ldan de ring 'jig rten ni/ /skal pas dbul ba nyid 'di ci/ /de ring khyod kyi btang gyur pa/ /snang med dag gi 'gro ba ni/ /bshes gnyen khyad dang bral ba na/ /su yi ye shes snang ba yis/ /'gro ba'i pad+ma rmongs pa yi//
263b4(mdo 'grel): gnyid kyi rgya ldan rgyas byed 'gyur/ /mdza' dag 'gro la rgyu med du/ /phan pa dag ni rab mdzad nas/ /kun la rnyed ba sla ba khyod/ /bdag la rnyed dka' ji ltar gyur/ /ces ba de yi gus bas gsol/ /de la bcom ldan 'dzum ldan zhing/ /bzhin gyi chu skyes gzengs/
263b5(mdo 'grel): bstod dkar ba dang mdzes pas bka' stsal pa/ /gnyen gshin rtag tu mi rtag nyid/ /'di khyod rigs ba min nam ci/ /'du byed thams cad skad cig la/ /lus kyi gdong 'di su zhig 'dzin/ /gang dag rtag tu nyin byed 'khor bas rab bzlas pa'i/ mtshan
263b6(mdo 'grel): mos bkra ba'i nyin par ring du rab 'gro ba/ /mi yi 'tsho ba rnams kyi dge ba 'di dag ni/ /rgya che dus kyi 'khor lo ltung pas gcod pa nyid/ /ri 'di snyil 'gyur chu gter 'jigs ni mchog tu skam/ /rab kyes 'byung bo dang bcas srid pa'i lam rab 'jigS
263b7(mdo 'grel): ri dags skrag mig ltar g.yo snying po med 'khor ba/ /mang du yongs 'dris lus kyi tshogs 'di brtan gnas min/ /zhes pa gsungs nas bcom ldan gyis/ /rab tu zhi slad rab bzang la/ /bden pa'i lam ni gsal ba'i gtam/ /rab dang kun dga' 
264a1(mdo 'grel): ldan par mdzad/ /dbyig pa gsum dang ril pa'i tshogs/ /lam 'gron gyis ni gyang bzhin btang/ /ston ba'i bka' la rab byung ni/ /de nas rab bzang dag gis blangs/ /de nas nyon mongs kun bcom pas/ /dgra bcom gnas ni thob gyur
264a2(mdo 'grel): nas/ /bsams pa kye ma bdag gi ni/ /slob ma nyid 'di 'os pa min/ /bdag gi mdun du bcom ldan 'das/ /mya ngan 'da' ba ji ltar blta/ /de slad sngon du lus btang nas/ /bdag gi rang gi gnas dag brtan/ /ces bsam byin brlabs lnga dag ni/ /bsten pa
264a3(mdo 'grel): de yid la bu yi/ /gdengs can shun pa dor ba ltar/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das ba thob/ /de nas de yi lus sbyong la/ /dge slong rnams dang mu stegs dag /su yi tshangs spyod dang ldan zhes/ /rnam par rtsod pa yang dag skyes/ /de nas mu stegs byed rnams kyis//
264a4(mdo 'grel): de yis sgrub byed cho ga la/ /khyogs khyer ma nus sod ba'i tshe/ /dge slong tshogs kun dag gi bsgrubs/ /de nas de yis gdung tshig gis/ /mchod rten byas nas dge slong gi/ sngon la mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /rgyu mtshan bde bar gshegs la dris/ /de dag la
264a5(mdo 'grel): de gsungs pa sngon/ /bar tA sir bram ze ba ni/ /mya ngan med pa ston pa ni/ /'od srungs srog mtshungs grogs su gyur/ /mdza' yi mal stan la gnas pa/ /de las de yi 'dul ba'i chos/ /lha yis 'thob par bya thob nas/ /bsngags par 'os pa'i dgra
264a6(mdo 'grel): bcom thob/ /gus pa'i ngang tshul de yis lus/ /rang gi bla ma'i mdun du gtang/ /de nas der ni lha yi der/ /mthong nas smon lam rab tu btab/ /ji ltar legs byas ldan pa yi/ /'od srungs sngon du yongs 'das pa/ /de bzhin bdag kyang bla ma'i man ngag
264a7(mdo 'grel): sngon du 'gro ba bor gyur cig/ lha de rab bzang 'di nyid de/ /rnam par dag pa'i smon lam dang/ /dang pa de yis legs byas pa/ kha dag gi mdun du lus dag btang/ /ston pa log par dang sel gyi/ /mdza' yi gzims mal dag la ston/ /lha de rang gi
264b1(mdo 'grel): khrid gyur pa'i/ /thub pa brgya brag lnga dag ni/ /dgra bcom gnas thob gus pa yis/ /sngon du lus gtang mthong gyur nas/ /rnam pa de lta'i smon lam gyis/ /de nyid rab bzang nyid du gyur/ /lus la rang bzhin gyis skyes pa/ /mthar thug nye ba'i gdung ba 'di/ /bzod bar
264b2(mdo 'grel): byed cig bdag gis deng/ /gdung ba med pa'i gnas su bkod/ /de ni mi bdag tshangs byin dang/ /bdag kyang ltar gyur the tshom la/ /bdag ni rgyu ma dral bas kyang/ /de ni dgra yis bcom pa bsgral/ /kA n+ya kub dzA'i nags su sngon/ /da ni ri dags khyu bdag gyur/
264b3(mdo 'grel): rab bzad khyu yi nang nas ni/ /bdag giS rjeS 'brang ri dags gyur/ /nags su sa bdag kA n+ya ni/ /rngon pa 'ongs bas bkag gyur te/ /chu klung dogs su ri dags rnams/ /skrag cing dga' ba med par gyur/ /de nas chu klung nang du ni/ /g.yo med bdag gis rab tu babs//
264b4(mdo 'grel): bdag gis rgyab tu rkang bkod bas/ /ri dags 'jigs pa de dags bsgral/ /de dag rmig pa bkod pas bdag /nyams shing 'tsho bar 'dod gyur tshe/ /ri dags de nyid cig po ni/ /de tshe rgyal zhing 'ongs par gyur/ /skrag pas nyes pa de dag gis/ /gdung bas bzed dka' 
264b5(mdo 'grel): nags byas te/ /myur bar snying rjes yang dag bsgral/ /'jug ngogs der ni shi bar gyur/ /de nyid rab bzang de ring yang/ /gdung ba dang bcas bdag gis bsgral/ /zhes gsungs bcom ldan zhi ba la/ /mngon phyogs mi gsung nyid la brten/ /dge slong rnams kyis
264b6(mdo 'grel): rab dga' yang/ /dge ba thob pa'i rgyu mtshan dris/ /gus pas mnyes gshin kun mkhyen gyis/ /dal bu yis ni rab gsungs pa/ /ston ba 'od srungs dag gi ni/ /dge bsnyen blo bzang zhes bya ba/ /de yi drin gyis bslab gnas ni/ /yongs rdzogs thob cing
264b7(mdo 'grel): blo gnas gyur/ /de yis dri za'i tshogs kyi mchog /glu dbyangs mkhas pa mthong gyur nas/ /dri ze'i bdag po nyid kyis ni/ /ched du smon lam rab tu bsgrubs/ /de ni smon lam de nyid kyis/ /rab dga' nyid du nye bar bsgrubs/ /bslab pa'i gnas ni yongs? bzung
265a1(mdo 'grel): pas/ /'dul ba'i chos ni yang dag thob/ /rab bzangs rab dga' 'di dag ni/ /bdag gis dge ba ldan par byas/ /gzhan gyi mngon 'dod byas pa la/ /kun tu bdag ni gdung ba med/ /grong khyer mchod 'os ces bya ba/ /mtho rigs
265a2(mdo 'grel): dag dang mtshungs par ni/ /mi bdag dpal ldan brgya byin zhing/ /rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya byung/ /bsod nams la nir bzhugs de'i/ /chos lam rjes su 'brangs pa yis/ /grong pa mtho ris bgrod rnams kyis/ /lha yis sa gzi khengs par byug
265a3(mdo 'grel): rgyal po de yis bsod nams mthus/ /mi yi mtho ris kun gang ba/ /mthong nas lha yi dbang po yis/ /snying stobs shes 'dod sbyor ba byas/ /de nas brgya byin gyis sprul pa'i/ /sems can gdung bas sa yi bdag /de ni lus ni bcad pa yi/ /sha
265a4(mdo 'grel): dang khrag dag rab tu bslangs/ /mi bdag bla gros rnam 'gyur med/ /de yi mngon 'dod nus pa'i lhag/ de dag rnams la byin nas ni/ /bsam pa chen pos smon lam btab/ /lus kyi sbyin pa'i bsod nams 'dis/ /lus can rnams ni bsgral ba'i slad//
265a5(mdo 'grel): bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub chen po thob par shog /de nas brgya byin der phyogs smras/ /rgyal po rab gdung khyed kyi ni/ /lus ni rab tu byin pa la/ /rnam 'gyur byung 'am bden par smros/ /ces pa lha'i dbang pos dris/ /slong ba rdzogs
265a6(mdo 'grel): pas rab bskyed pa/ /dga' bas mig ni rgyas pa yi/ /mi yi dbang pos de la smras/ /gal te bdag ni gdung ba na/ /rnam 'gyur med na bden pa des/ /bdag gi lus ni rma ba sos shing/ /mdzes ldan rtul du gnas gyur cig/ ces pa rab tu brjod
265a7(mdo 'grel): tsam gyis/ /de lus rab mdzes rnal gnas gyur/ /sprin dang rnam par bral ba yi/ /rgyu skar bdag po'i gzugs bzhin no/ /mi bdag rnam rgyal de nyid dang/ /gzhan gyi don la gdung ba med/ /ces pa brjod nas bcom ldan 'das/ /bsam gtan la
265b1(mdo 'grel): chags spyan ldan gyur/ /'phral la ri bo bskyod pas bsrubs pa'i nyon mongs zer ma de dang der/ /lha tshogs ched du bdud rtsi'i chu gter bsam pa chen pos bzod par byed/ /dri med yid ldan lus ni gnod pa dang bcas tshe yang rnam 'gyur med/ /gzhan phan sgrub
265b2(mdo 'grel): par chas po rnams la gdung ba bdag kyang ba de bar spyod/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /rab bzang gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad du ba'o// //legs
265b3(mdo 'grel): rmos zhing la rab nyung gang btab dang/ /byas shes dag la phan pa gang byas dang/ /yon tan dag gis mtho la gang byin pa/ /de ni lo mang stong phrag 'phel bar 'gyur/ /legs ldan mnyan yod rgyal byed kyi/ /tshal du bcom ldan rgyal bas sngon/ /gtam gyi
265b4(mdo 'grel): zhar la nyer 'dus pa'i/ /dge slong tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ /gang zhig rang gis spyod 'os pa/ /de dag thams cad 'bras bu bral/ /'jig rten du ni dgra bcom la/ /gang phul de nyid 'bras bur ldan/ /dam pa'i snod la yon nyid kyis/ /yon ni rab tu phul ba
265b5(mdo 'grel): dag /dam pa'i grogs bzhin mi bzad pas/ /yon tan grangs med ldan par 'gyur/ /grong khyer pA Ta li pu tra'i/ /chod pa tsandan don gnyer sngon/ /gzings chen dag la zhon chas ni/ /tsan dan gling du phyin par gyur/ /de nas tsan dan sa mchog tshogs//
265b6(mdo 'grel): blangs nas dga' bas de dag rnams/ /de las phyir ni log gyur te/ /chu gter chen po de dbus su phyin/ /rgya che dus min rlung tshub gyis/ /bskyod pa'i dbang? ? stobs kyis deng/ /dus kyi rtse dga' g.yon gyis/ /gzings ni bsngams pa med par
265b7(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /skyob pa don gnyer tshang pa'i tshogs/ /lha la bstod pa byed pa'i tshe/ /don mthun yid la re bdag/ /lhan cig gzings ni zhig par gyur/ /mi bzang srog la the tshom dang/ /dge mthun 'dren pa bsod nams sde/ /zhes pa 'dar ba dang bcas pa'i//
266a1(mdo 'grel): yongs su bskyab par rab tu bsams/ /bdag gi khyim dang nye ba na/ /dge bsnyen chos kyi byang chub yod/ /de ni nyon mongs dus dag tu bston pa rgyu yi mchog nyid bstod/ /ces pa 'di kyis rab bsams nas/ /de nyid la ni skyabs
266a2(mdo 'grel): song ste/ ded dpon mchi ma dang bcas pa/ /'jigs zhing dal bas ldab ldib smras/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyu yi mchog/ /dge ba nyon mongs dus dag tu ston pa rgyu yi mchog nyid bstod/ /ces pa yid kyis rab bsams na/ /de nyid la ni skyabs
266a3(mdo 'grel): brjod pa'i tshe/ /'phral la rgya mtsho'i lha 'ongs te/ don mthun srog ni slar byung rnams/ /chu gter gyis ni dogs su bsgral/ /'jigs chen de las grol gyur pa/ d/e dag rang gi yul du phyin/ /rgyu mi mchog la la phyag byed la/ /dus kun tu ni chags
266a4(mdo 'grel): par gyur/ /gnas skabs der ni ston pa dang/ /rgyu yi mchog gi skul ni/ /las kyi lhag ma 'ga' yi rims/ /drag pas gdung ba gnas par gyur/ /gang dag gzigs pa srid pa'i 'jigs pa chen po'i sman gyis ni/ /'gro ba thams cad legs
266a5(mdo 'grel): par bsos pa nyid ni sgrub mdzad pa/ /de dag gis kyang rang la 'khri shing khyad par rab chags pa'i/ /lhag ma lhag par gnas shing chags pa dag ni stong mi 'gyur/ /de yi drag por gdung ba ni/ /zhi slang tsan dan sa mchog dag/ rgyal po zla ba snang
266a6(mdo 'grel): zhes pas/ /thams cad du ni btsal bar brtsams/ /sa bdag gis ni 'bum phrag pa zhis/ /ded dpon de la don du gnyis/ /ci nang zhes 'tshags la ni/ /rnyed dka' srang cig bya ni ma gyur/ /ded dpon nyid ni mngon phyogs te/ /dran pa tsam gyis phan
266a7(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa/ /ston pa'i sku la tsan dan gyis/ /gus pa yis ni byug pa byas/ /de shel dad ni kha ba'i tshogs bzla ba'i bsam pa dman byed pa/ /grags pa ltar dkar tsan dan dis/ /rgyal ba rnal du gnas par kyus de yi bsod nams mthu yis ni//
266b1(mdo 'grel): dpal dang ldan pa bsod nams sde/ /zla ba'i 'od dang yan lag kun/ /rma byung dri bzang ldan par gyur/ /de yi tsan dan rin chen sogs/ /rgya mtsho'i chu la gang yang ba/ /de dag thams cad rang khyim dang/ /nye bar khrom pa'i nang nas byang/ /tshong pa rnams pa can
266b2(mdo 'grel): ngan sogs/ /rang rang dag la nges byin nas/ /zas dang rin chen gos rnams kyis/ /khyim du dge slong dge slong dge 'dun mchog/ de nas ded dpon dag gis ni/ /mchog gi mthu yis brgyan pa'i dpal/ /mthong nas mngon du nyer gnas kyis/ /de yi lags byas
266b3(mdo 'grel): rgyal la dris/ /de nas bcom ldan rgyu yi mchog/ /'dzum dang bcas pas de la gsungs/ /ded dpon gyis ni tsan dan gyis/ /dza la phyugs pas dpal 'byor thob/ /bsod nams sde ni legs byas kyi/ /dang tshul dag gi las de byas/ /bdud rtsi nyid ni rab 'thob
266b4(mdo 'grel): bas gang gis 'di dag cha yi thigs dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa na/ /skye ba tha ma dag la 'di/ /rab byung bla med yan dag par/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /bsod nams dag gis tsan dan shing/ /yangs pa yi ni rtsa bar 'di/ /tsan dan dang la zhes grags
266b5(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de skad pa tsam ldan rgyu yi mchog/ ye shes spyan dang ldan pas gsungs/ /zhes pa shAkya thub pa yis/ /gsungs tshe dge slong yi mtshan gyur/ /legs byas can gyi dang pa'i sbyin pa'i cha yi myu gu lo? 'dab brgya
266b6(mdo 'grel): yis 'phel/ /dgra bcom zhing la yan dag btab pa yongs su smin tshe chags bral phun tshogs 'bras/ /gang la skabs gsum bdag po dri med gdugs can dang zhing bsod nams dri yis rgyags/ /rab dga' i grogs po dun tshogs 'di dag me
266b7(mdo 'grel): tog gsar pha nyid du rab tu rgyas/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /rgyu'i mchog gi rtags pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa'o/ /'jig
267a1(mdo 'grel): rten pha rol blo ldan don med bu la chags pa'i ci slang sgrub/ /bsod nams gang rigs de ni rang gi byas te gzhan gyi byas pa spyod ma yin/ /gang gis sdig las ma lus rigs ni rnam par ltung zhing bzhin dman nyams byed
267a2(mdo 'grel): pa/ /de dag mtshungs med gdug pa'i bya ba mkhas bu ni 'ga' yi rnam par bsgrubs/ /mnyan yod du sngon khyim gi bdag/ thos pa'i go cha dag gi ni/ /chung ma rgyal ba'i sde la bu/ /srid pa'i go cha zhes pa byung/ /dal bu dal bus byis pa de/ /khyer shug de
267a3(mdo 'grel): dag gis bskyed de/ /rigs rgyang khyad 'phags khyad par gyi/ /re ba rnam par 'god pa byas/ /dus kyi pha ni dus dbang du/ /song tshe srid pa'i go cha ni/ /mdza' zhing rmongs pas gzir ba yi/ /ma yi bskyed bsrings bskyangs par gyur/ /khyim tshes grogs
267a4(mdo 'grel): bdag dang ni/ /lhan cig rtse zhing ma bsdams pa/ /khan tsho dag la gnas pa de/ /gnyis 'thung lcags kyu med bzhin 'khyam/ /lag 'gro brgya lam nas 'gro de/ /dpa' bo yi ni bud med dag/ mdzes ma zhes pa khang bzang gi/ rtse mo dag na gnas pas
267a5(mdo 'grel): mthong/ /mngon par sred dang ldan pa nges/ /'jo sgeg ldan pa rnam par blangs/ /bzhin 'dzum ma nges de yin/ /spyi bor me tog phreng ba 'phangs/ /khyim ches de yi de dag gi/ /bsam pa rnam 'phrul dang bcas pa/ /mthong nas longs spyod go byed pa'i/ /brda rnams
267a6(mdo 'grel): thams cad rig par gyur/ /grogs la mdza' bas chags gyur cig //gnod pa 'byung bar dogs pa yis/ /'jigs pa de ni don gyur nas/ /srid pa'i go cha'i ma la smras/ /khyod kyi bu dang dpa' bo yi/ /bud med gsal ba'i brda dag byas/ /mtshan mo rnam
267a7(mdo 'grel): par mdul pa/ /dman min rgyu zhing 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mi yi ri dags 'khor ba sdug bsngal nags tshal 'dir ni rgyu byed cing/ /mchog tu longs spyod kyis 'khrugs ma lus bde ba'i tsa la chags gyur rnams/ 'jigs pa'i bya ba dang ldan rngon pa zhags pa
267b1(mdo 'grel): dag tu lhung gyur te/ /'jug tu dug ldan rnon po'i mtshon rnams dag gi brlag pa thob par gyur/ /g.yo ba'i bsam pa dang ldan zhing/ /re zhig nyen par bdag gis srungs/ /mtshan mo khyod kyis bsrung bar bya/ /zhes pa brjod nas grogs po song/ /de nas khyim
267b2(mdo 'grel): rab tu nyal du/ /sgo ru nyal ba'i sa yis ni/ /mtshan mo rab tu sang bzhin du/ /kun bsrung ba la chags gyur/ /chu yi dag byed zol gyis ni/ /phyir 'byung zhu bar byed pa la/ /mdza' bas rmongs pa'i ma yin/ /phyi rol 'thon pa byed ma gyur/ /des bsams kye ma dga' 
267b3(mdo 'grel): ba yis/ /bud med rin chen dang 'grogs la/ /bgegs ni skyed par byed pa yi/ /bdag gi ma 'di rtsi yis sprul/ /re zhig skal bas pha ni bdag / lang tshes ldan bzhin shi bar gyur/ /bsod nams min pas sgrub dag ni/ /'jigs rung ma 'di khyim na gnas
267b4(mdo 'grel): gnyid dang bral ma 'di la ni/ /gal te bdag gis 'gongs byin na/ /'di yi 'thab mo'i sgra brjod kyis/ /skye bo rnams kyang sad par 'gyur/ /mtshan mo phal cher yongs zad cing/ /mdzes ma ring la bdag ci byed/ /skal ba dman pa bdag la ni/ /skal
267b5(mdo 'grel): bzang ma de ji ltar mod/ /khang bzang nang du son cing rnam par blta ba'i ro las bzhin gyi chu skyes dud/ /rna ba'i utpal ltung bar gyur pas mig gi mdzes pa rna ba dag la ster/ /rna rgyan 'od zer bdag gis 'gram pa zung la pa tra'i phreng ba rnam par 'dzin/ /mdzes
267b6(mdo 'grel): ma de ni legs ldan dag gi skal ba rnams kyis spyad bya'i sa ru 'gyur/ /de ltar bsam pas gzir zhing sgo/ /yang dag yang du slong byed pa/ /de la ma yi 'di nyid du/ /gtsang ba mdzod ces rab tu smras/ /de nas ral gris ma yi mgo /bcad nas de ni mgyogs
267b7(mdo 'grel): par song/ /chags pas nyer bstan sdig bdag nyid/ /ngan pa rnams la bya min ci/ /mtshan mo dal du ba brtsis pas/ /mdzes ma'i khang par de song nas/ /mkhas shing longs spyod la chags ma/ /de ni dben par yang dag thob/ /de la rang gi bya ba'i sdig gus
268a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i sAng du de yi bshad/ /gang gis rmad pa nyid 'gyur ba/ /de nyid kyis ni rmongs pa bsngags/ /na bsad sdig pa drag po ni/ /thos nas 'dar bar gyur pa de/ /gtum po la bzhin de la ni/ /reg pa shin tu phyir phyogs gyur/ /de yi gnas nas
268a2(mdo 'grel): khang bzang la/ /'dzeg pa'i zol gyis de song ste/ /sdig pa rnams kyis gus pa yis/ /sred ldan dag kyang chags bral 'gyur/ /sdig pa las ni phyir phyogs ma/ /de yis bgam mthon por 'dzegs/ /'di ni chos rkun chom rkun zhes/ /'jigs pa bzhin du sad cher
268a3(mdo 'grel): bsgrags/ /'khod gyi skye bos rgyugs pa'i tshe/ /'jigs pas nyen pa der rab bros/ /ji srid rang gi khyim du song/ /khyim rnams kyis ni ci co byas/ /bdag gi ma ni chom rkun gyis/ /bsad ces skad cher rab smra zhing/ /snga dro de yis ma yi ni/ /lus la sogs pa
268a4(mdo 'grel): sbyangs pa byas/ /rab bsgribs sdig pa'i gdung ba yi/ /sreg cing shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /dmyal bar ltung ba de bsams te/ /'byung po bzhin du sa la 'khyams/ /sdig pa smra byed de yi ni/ /phyir bcos dris la gnyis skyes kyi/ /smras pa ma bsad drag po yi/ /sdig pa dag
268a5(mdo 'grel): lo bcos thabs med/ /de nas rgyal byang chal song bas/ /der ni dge slong tshogs brjod pa/ /sdig pa thams cad nyams byed pa'i/ /chos kyi kha ton rab tu thos/ /der na blo ldan rab byung ste/ /kha rten dge la mchog tu chags/ /de nas de ni sE gnod gsum/ /brjod
268a6(mdo 'grel): cing chos kyi gtum can gyur/ /de nas kun mkhyen bcom ldan 'das/ /mngon phyogs bsre spong chogs la gsungs/ /sdig can 'di la rab byung ni/ /khyed kyi ci slar yang dag byin/ /ma bsad dgra bor gyur pa yi/ /sdig pa de yis bag med 'di/ /'jug tu mnar
268a7(mdo 'grel): me 'tsha bar ni/ /yun ring gnas la rab tu ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de gsungs tshe/ /de yang mtsha po nyid du gyur/ /dus kyis dus kyi 'jug tu ni/ /'jigs su rung ba'i dmyal ba thob/ /de don mnar red tshogs bsrungs pa mi bzad mi lce brgya zlag gi/ yun
68b1(mdo 'grel): rings 'tshed par byed cing des/ /dmyal ba'i gnas ni skyo bar byas/ /dmyal bsrungs rab tu khros pa yi/ /tho bas bsnun zhing phye mar rtags/ /de yi ring na sdig pa yi/ /me yis yongs smin lus zad thob/ /de nas de ni rab byung gi/ /mthu yi rgyal po chen po dag/ /bzhi
68b2(mdo 'grel): pa yi ni lha rnams su/ /lha yi rgyan gyi brgyan pa skye/ /de nas dri med phreng bcod pa na dpung rgyan do shal las/ /rab 'phros nor bu'i 'od kyi rmad byung dpal ni 'bri byed cing/ /lha yi bsten bya rjes 'brang 'od kyi rab mdze ba zla ba ltar/ /mdzes pa de ni bde bar gshegs pa
68b3(mdo 'grel): phyag 'tshal slad du sod ka/ de yi zhabs kyi podma zung la gus pas phyag 'tshal te/ /kun dga' 'phel zhing mdzes pa'i bzhin gyi podma rnam par rgyas/ /ston pa'i chos kyi man ngag gtam gyi de ni myur nyid du/ /bden pa mthong zhing yid ni rab tu phyis pa bzhin du gyur/ /sdig
68b4(mdo 'grel): sa mtshan mo'i rib rib nye bar zhi ba'i dus su ni/ /yun ring nye bar spyad pas sdug bsngal nyams pa'i skye bo la/ /legs byas snga dro'i dus ni dri ma med cing yangs pa yi/ /dge ba phul byung snang ba de ltar kun tu rgyas par gyur/ /ces pa dpe ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub
68b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dmyal ba sngon ldan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //med la du gnas dang skye dang de nas byis pa dag dang ni/ /dar ba de nas dal gyi rgan po nyid la brten gyur pa/
68b6(mdo 'grel): skye bo mtshangs med dus kyi glang pos phyung ba bdag gi ni/ /las skud 'di ni phad skud tshul gyi 'os par g.yo mi 'gyur/ /zas gtsang gis ni gus pas sngon/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mgron du gnyis/ /dge slong rnams dang bcas pa yis/ /de yi zhi rab bzhes mdzad/ /de
68b7(mdo 'grel): nas gsol rjes rab dang des/ /bzhugs te sa yi bdag po la/ /rjes su bzung bas dag pa yi/ /chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad/ /der ni de dus mthong ba la/ /byis pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyis de/ /dge slong dbus su yongs shes nas yab ni la du dag gis mchod 'di yi 
269a1(mdo 'grel): dus na bcom ldan la/ /byis ba gus pa mthong gyur nas/ /rab tu dge slong thams cad ni/ /dge mtshan dag dang ldan pas dris/ /las kyi rnam smin ci zhig gis/ /khyod kyi gzugs brnyan lus ldan ba/ /byis pa 'di ni lo drug dag/
269a2(mdo 'grel): dku ru nges par bsdams te skyes/ /ci slad lha mo zags 'dzin mas/ /nyin dang mtshan mor mngal gyis khur/ /shin tu che bas yongs mnan cing/ /shin tu yun ring gdung ba bsten/ /dge slong rnams kyis gus pas 'di/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen
269a3(mdo 'grel): la dris/ /skad cig bsams nas de dag la/ /gsungs pa 'dir ni rgyu dag nyon/ /lus 'phags kyis ni mi thi lar/ /sa bdag me tog lha la ni/ /nyi ma kla ba zhes pa yis/ /bsod nams ngang tshul bu gnyis byung/ /yab ni mtho ris song ba'i tshe/ /de dag dka' thub
