269a4(mdo 'grel): nags 'dod ldan/ /rgyal srid chen po'i khur 'dzin la/ /phan tshun zhu ba rab tu byas/ /rnam pa kun tu chags bral bas/ /nyi mas btang ba'i rgyal srid ni/ /phu bo'i bka' yis bsngams pa yis/ /zla bas ji zhig ltar ste bzung/ /rgyal po'i drang srong nyi ma de/ /zhi dge
269a5(mdo 'grel): dga' thub tshal song nas/ /mchog shes rgyal srid bde ba yis/ /shin tu yun rings dka' thub byas/ /nam zhig yongs su ngal gyur cig/ sgom pa drag pos gdungs pa des/ /thu ba yi ni bum pa'i chu/ /rmongs las ma brjod nyid du 'thungs/ /dran pa skyes nas
269a6(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa de/ /ma byin len gyi sdig pa la/ /rtog cing bzhin ni log gyur pas/ /'gyod pa'i las ni rab bsams pa// las gyi zhags pas yang dag drangs/ /dbang med lus can rnams kyis ni/ /mi 'dod bzhin du legs byas sam/ /nyes byas dag ni thob
269a7(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur/ /skye bo legs sbyang de spyod cing dkar pa 'di rang nyes byas dag gi cha/ /'dzin de gang gis bzhin ras dri ma can 'di mchog tu gdung bar byed/ /skad cig srid pa'i bde ba sdug bsngal tshogs la chags pas 'phangs rnams la/ /lo 'dab brgya
269b1(mdo 'grel): ldan phra rgyas nang du zhugs te gdung ba ster bar byed/ /mi bdag sngon du bdag phyin la/ /sdig pa bdag gis brjod par bya/ /rgyal po'i bka' yis dag pa rnams/ /bu lon med pa'i chos kyi tshogs/ /nad kyi gzir rnams sman pas gso/ /chos la zhugs rnams bstan bcos
269b2(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /sdig las can rnams mi bdag ni/ /rigs gnas lugs can bla ma yis/ /zhes bsams yongs su bdud pa yis/ /sa bdag spun zla'i drang du ni/ /phyin nas de yis mur bar ni/ /ma byin blangs pa'i sdig pa smras/ /spun zla mthu bo mngon mchod de/ /de las bdag gis
269b3(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ /skyes gnas dag pa'i dngos gyur ba/ /khyod la sdig pa yod ma yin/ /rigs min shin tu phra ba yang/ /ji zhig ltar stes gang byas pa/ /nang du rjes su gdung ba 'dzin/ /de nyid de la rnam dag nyid/ /ces pa sa bdag chig thos nas/ /nyi mas de la rab smras pa//
269b4(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i chos ni dkar ba yi/ /gos la dri ma'i cha mi bzod/ /rgyal po chod pa bdag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu dpyad nas sgrub par mdzod/ /dag byed kyis bzhin rgyal po yis/ /tshad pas sdig can gtsang bar 'gyur/ /zhes te 'bad pas lan mang du/ /rang gi chad pa
269b5(mdo 'grel): don gnyer ba/ /de la nu bo rgyal pos smras/ /nang bar bdag gi gang bzod bya/ /re zhig khyod ni skyed tshal gyis/ /nags 'di nyid du gnas par mdzod/ /ces brjod grong ba'i bya ba la/ /sa yi bdag po phyi rol song/ /de nas der ni thub pa dag/ nges par g.yo med
269b6(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i che/ /rgyal po de yi bya ba brjed/ /nyi ma drug nas mngon par 'ongs/ /de nas rgyal pos pho bo ni// zas med ring ba'i rnam pa mthong/ /kun rmongs dag gi blo smod cing/ /de la rab tu dang bar byas/ /de ni bram ze dang bcas pas/ /de yi sdig pa dag
269b7(mdo 'grel): byas nas/ /nyin drug nyon mongs byin pa yis/ /nge song che na rab tu gdungs/ /rang nyid rgyal po'i drang srong nyer/ /khyim pa 'di yang rgyal po zla/ /nyin drug thub pa nyan mongs par/ /byas la lo drug dkar skyes/ /bzang mi zhes bya ba rdzi mo/ /rgan mo grong khyer la phyogs te//
270a1(mdo 'grel): bu mo ri dags mo dag dang/ /'grogs nas dar ba 'tshong du song/ /de yi bu mo dar bab mas/ /rang gi bum pa rab lci ba/ /ma rgan dag la byin nas ni/ /de yi bum pa yang ba bzung/ /ma ni rgan zhing nyams chung de/ /bu mos dpag mchad phyed dang gnyis//
270a2(mdo 'grel): btang bas grong khyer nye bar ni/ /shin tu yongs su dal bar 'gyur/ /grags 'dzin ma ni brdzi yis/ /bu mo ma yi nyon mongs las/ /rgyang grags drug mtshungs lo dag ni/ mngal gyi khur gyis gzir bar gyur/ /mtho ris sa dang gdengs can 'jig rten byis dang lang tsho dang//
270a3(mdo 'grel): rgan dang 'chi dus mngal gyi me la stan la brten dag lo yang/ /lus dang ldan pa rnams kyi sngon gyi las ni lhan cig tu/ /'gro ba 'dod pa rnam ba kun tu rlag par yod mi 'gyur/ /de ltar sgra gcan 'dzin ni sngon gyi las ldan pa/ /ngo mtshar gtam ni de bzhin gshegS
270a4(mdo 'grel): bas gsungs pa dag /nges par gzung nas dge slong tshogs dang sa skyod dang/ /skye bo dang bcas ya mtshan rab tu rgyas par gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ sgra gcan 'dzin gyi sngo cu
270a5(mdo 'grel): gyi rtogs pa brjod ba'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa gsum pa'o/ //gang gis legs pa'i yid can rnams kyis yid ni kun dga' mnyen ldan rig par byang/ /gang gis mthu yis gdug rnams kyi yang yongs su 'dris pa'i mun pa zhi bar byed/ /gang gis
270a6(mdo 'grel): bsod nams grangs med brangs kyi tshig gi tshad kyi yul du mi 'gyur ba/ /'gro ba thub pa'i mgon po rab rgyas mthu ldan de nyi gcig pu 'byung ba yin/ /mnyan yod du sngon khyim na gnas/ /dpal ldan shin tu brtan pa yis/ /chung ma mig bzang ma dag la/ /'dod
270a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i bu na bcas par gyur/ /skyes pa tsam na rab 'khrungs ba/ /lha yi rin chen gyis brgyan pa'i/ /khri stan rang gi bsod nams kyis/ /mtshan la gang zhig nyer 'khor mdzes/ /de skyes tshe na cu 'dzin ni/ /snyan bring 'jam pa'i sgra dbyangs can/ /sbrang rtsi 'bebs pa'i
270b1(mdo 'grel): me tog dang/ /bcas pa'i rin chen chang ba phag/ /rdzogs pa'i gzhon nu gus can gyis/ /gter ni brgya yis bskor ba de/ /sbrang rtsi'i char ba bab pa las/ /sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs zhes bya bar gyur/ /rin chen char 'bebs de yis na/ /sa la dbul bar med nyid bsgrubs
270b2(mdo 'grel): gang duAng bya rog dkar po bzhin/ /slong ba po ni mthong ma gyur/ /nam zhig dge slong kun dga' bo/ /rab zhing pags pa'i lam gnas pa/ /khyim du byon pa des mthong nas/ /mdun du ba la rab dris pa/ /yab cig dri med dge ba can/ /'di yi brtul zhugs 'di ni
270b3(mdo 'grel): cigs gang zhig yang dag mthong nyid na/ /'phral la yid ni dang bar byed/ /ces pa bu yi tshig thos nas/ /shin tu brtan pas de la smras/ /bu cig snying stobs rab gsal 'di/ /zhi ba'i brtul zhugs yongs su 'dzin/ /gang zhig 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i mchog las mdza' 
270b4(mdo 'grel): dag 'gro ba'i zam stegs drang po dang/ /khro ba'i nad kyis gso byed dag kyang zhi ba bdud rtsi'i snying pos sreng 'phrog dang/ /skyon gyi chogs kyi yun pa zhi byed nyi ma sangs rgyas 'od zer rab rgyas pa/ /de yi nyan thos zhi ba'i yid can rnams kyi mchog gyur 'di ni kun dga' 
270b5(mdo 'grel): bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi mngon brjod dag/ thos pa nyid na sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs/ /sngar skye dge ba rgyas pa las/ /ba spu rab tu langs par gyur/ /de nas kun dga' dang bcas des/ /gus pas mngon phyogs phyag 'tshal te/ /dge slong tshogs bcas kun dga' ba/ /longS
270b6(mdo 'grel): spyod kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /de nas 'dun pas de nyid dang/ /lhan cig rgyal byed tshal song nas/ /'od zer phung po bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthong gyur te/ /pad+ma 'dab ma rgyas pa'i spyan/ /mchog gi mtshan nyid dag gis mtshan/ /mdzes shing yid
270b7(mdo 'grel): 'ong rnam pa can/ /gser gyi ta la bzhin du mtho/ /bdud rtsis byugs pa lta bu ste/ /mthong nas dga' ba rab rgyas pa/ /de yi spyi bor breng ba bzhin/ /de yi zhabs sen 'od zer blangs/ /'bad pas gsol ba btab pa yis/ /gus pa mnyes gzhin bcom ldan 'das//
271a1(mdo 'grel): dge slong de yi khang bar byon/ /mchod ston rab tu bzhes pa mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mngon mchod nas/ /rgyal byed tshal du gshegs ba'i tshe/ /skye bo'i tshogs ni rin chen gyis/ /sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyis yongs rdzogs byas/ /dbul po rnams
271a2(mdo 'grel): kyis khyim khyim du/ /rang gi bsod nams ma yin pas/ /rin chen phung po de byin pa/ /skad cig nyid kyis sol phung gyur/ /de nas byung tshul de thos nas/ /sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs ni sdug bsngal zhing/ /de dag la smras khyod kyis sngon/ /legs byas dag ni yod ma byas//
271a3(mdo 'grel): brtse bas sbyin pa ma byin zhing/ /dge 'dun mchod pa ma byas la/ /bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma mchod pas/ /'byor ba dag ni thob ma yin/ /de slad khyod kyis bdag gshegs la/ /sogs pa'i dge 'dun mngon par mchod/ /khyed la longs spyod dag gi tshogs/ /thamS
271a4(mdo 'grel): cad bdag gis phun tshogs bgyi/ /zhes pa des bskul de dag gis/ /de yis nyer bsgrubs tshogs rnams kyis/ /bcom ldan dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ /sdig pa zhi ba'i slad du mchod/ /de nas de tshe dge ba byas/ /sdig pa zang pa de dag gis/ /rang khyim rab
271a5(mdo 'grel): 'bar rin chen gyi/ /phung pos kun tu gang ba mthong/ /de nas chags bral sad pa yi/ /blo dang ldan pa sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung song nas/ /rab tu zhi slad rab byung blangs/ /ston pa'i bka' yis dul ba yis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis
271a6(mdo 'grel): mnyan yod btang/ /skye bo'i mdza' yi gtsug lag khang/ /ri brag dag la brten par song/ /der nges bslab pa'i gnas byin pa/ /ri brag pa yi skye bo rnams/ /nyon mongs dug ni rab zhi'i slad/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song/ /gnas skabs der ni
271a7(mdo 'grel): chom rkun pa// nags kyi mdza' na gnas pa rnams/ /dur ga'i ya stags khas blangs ba'i/ /mi ni tshol ba dag la zhugs/ /phra ma can gyis rab bstan pa'i/ /gtsug lag khang der de dag 'ongs/ /sbrang rtsi'i sgra la 'dus pa yi/ /dge slong dge 'dun tshogs
271b1(mdo 'grel): rnams bcings/ /ya stags slad du dge slong ni/ /gcig nyid kho na bdag cag 'dod/ /chom rkun tshogs kyis 'di brjod tshe/ /dge slong rnams kyis rim pas smras/ /ya stags don du bdag zung la/ /dge slong thams cad gtung bar mdzod/ /ces pa rgan rim gyis
271b2(mdo 'grel): brjod tshe/ /sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyis rab smras pa/ /de nyid kho na ya stags don/ /dge 'dun thams cad rnam par bzhin/ /zhes pa thos nas de dgra gis/ /rnam par mchog ldan de bzung song/ /gsod par chos pa de dag gis/ /bcings khyed rnam 'gyur blo med des/ /dur
271b3(mdo 'grel): rga'i gnas ni nags nang du/ /shin tu 'jigs su rung ba mthong/ /de yang dus mdza' i sprin gyis bzhin/ /gtor ma la ni bstar byas pa'i/ /ma he sre bo rags pa yi/ /rtag tu ya stags dag gis gang/ /dpa' bos ban du ji ba yi/ /rang bzhin me tog phred spos
271b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /ru ru'i khrag gi zer ma brgya/ /zhabs kyi rdo la chags pas khyab/ /gshin rjes me tog rgyas pa yis/ /sgol mchod pa byas pa bzhin dril bu'i sngon du 'phyang ba yi/ /dpa' bo mgo yis yongs su bskor/ /ri khrod ma yi rkang bkod pas/ /sen rtsi rab tu chags
271b5(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin/ /mi khrag gsar pas bsgos ba yi/ /skas dag gis ni dmar ba'i 'od/ /ya stags ma thob rngon pa yi/ /bud med rnams kyis gus pa yis/ /rang gi bu bcad snying gi ni/ /pad+mas khyams kyi kha khyer bkang/ /de mthong srog chags rnams kyi tshogs//
271b6(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal ngal dub bzod dka' zhing/ /'khor ba chags bral snying po can/ /sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyis rab tu bsams/ /de nas nyon mongs thams cad ni/ /yongs zad dgra bcom mngon du byas/ /khams gsum pa las chags khral de/ /dga' dang mi dga' mtshungs
271b7(mdo 'grel): par gyur/ /des bsams gang gi drin gyis ni/ /'khor ba med pa bde ba'i sa/ /kye ma bdag gis thob pa 'di/ /ston pa srid pa gcod pa'i mthu/ /rmongs pa'i lcags sgrog bstan pa gcod cing lta ba'i ri bo nyams par byed/ /mi bzang sreg pa'i chu bo sgol
272a1(mdo 'grel): zhing skye ba'i ljon pa rab tu 'byin/ /gang du mya ngan mig la slar yang mchi ma dag ni mi 'dzin pa/ /ston ba'i drin gyis gdung bzhi bar gyur pa'i gnas de rab tu thob/ /ces bsams snying stobs rgya mtsho des/ ri bzhin g.yog med par kun//
272a2(mdo 'grel): khro bas mtshon blang tshom rkun gyis/ /gsong rtags me tog phreng ba bcings/ /de lus gsar gyi gzi ldan las/ /de dag rnams kyis gos dag bshus/ /mos ni gzhan dang gzhan byung ba/ de dag mdun du phung por gyur/ /skabs der lha mo de yis ni/ /rab bskyed
272a3(mdo 'grel): 'byung po lnga brgya yis/ /tshom rkun dag ni lnga brgya po/ /rab tu g.yo pa med par byas/ /de dag mtshon gyi tshogs lhangs? tshe/ /sbyang rtse'i dbyangs kyi spyi bong ni/ /mkha' las me tog dag gi char/ /rin chen rab tu mdzes phab pa/ /de nas mkha' la 'gro ba dang//
272a4(mdo 'grel): chem rkun rnams kyis mthong gyur nas/ /de yi mthu yis reg pa yis/ /de nyid la ni skabs su song/ /de nas babs te bzod pa'i slong/ /rkang bas mgo bkod de dag la/ /nyes byas thong la chos kyis ni/ /dga' bas mdzod ces de yi smras/ /de nas de
272a5(mdo 'grel): dag chags bral skye ma/ /sdig pa btang nas 'khor ba yi/ /'ching ba zhi slar rab byung na/ /blangs nus dgra bcom gnas thob gyur/ /de nas dgra bcom de dag dang/ /rigs na gnas de dag bcas/ /sbrang tsi'i dbyangs ni rgyal byed kyi/ /'tshams bston pa lta ru
272a6(mdo 'grel): song/ /lha yi skye bas 'ongs pa yi/ /longs spyod skabs gsum pas bsgrubs pa/ /bdud rtsi'i ro ldan 'du byed kyis/ /der ni de yis bcom ldan mchod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la/ /thar pa'i lam chog gsal byed cing/ /nges pa'i dang ba
272a7(mdo 'grel): skyed byed ba'i/ /chos ni phan slad bstan pa mdzad/ /khu ni bdud rtsi'i gnod nyid thog/ /shes nas shin tu bstan pas kyang/ /legs byas las 'khrungs gser gyi bde/ /bzung nas rgyal byed tshul du song/ /de yis bde gshegs mngon mchod cing/ /
272b1(mdo 'grel): zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te/ /de yi spyan ni rab dang ba/ /rab tu phyis pa gzhin du gyur/ /de nas nye bar dge ba dar/ /de la bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa/ /rkang pa bkod pas gser gyi ni/ /podmo 'khrungs par khyod 'gyur ro/ /podma'i mchog ces grags pa yi/ /yang dag
272b2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas 'gyur te/ /sems can yang dag bsgral byas nas/ /yongs su mya ngan 'dab bar 'gyur/ /kun mkhyen bden pa gzigs pa yis/ /de skad brjod tshe shin tu bstan/ /'gro ba'i dag legs brtag pa yi/ /yid la reb bzung bar gyur/ /gus pas bsod
272b3(mdo 'grel): nams phyag 'tshal dus su snying pa 'bigs byed bcom ldan ston pa yi/ /zhe? ? ni legs byas ldan pa gang gis mgo la bde legs byas par gzung byas la/ /de dag phyi nas skye bo yi phan du tshim sbyor nu ma'i 'o ma la/ /gan rkyal du nyal so yis stong pa'i
272b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin ni blun po'i 'dzam du byed mi 'gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /sbrang rtsi'i dbyangs kyi rtogS pa brjod pa'i yis 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //gang gis
272b5(mdo 'grel): mig la rjes 'brel chags pa'i nad/ /sdang ba'i zug rngu snying la rab chags dang/ /yan lag kun la khyab pa sdig pa'i mdze/ /'phrog byed sman pa de nga phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gtam mthar de bzhin gshegs/ /dka' thub nags mthar bzhugs pa yi//
272b6(mdo 'grel): dri med thugs la dge slong rnams/ /dgri mtshan dag gis bskul bas dris/ /bcom ldan ci slad 'jig rten ni/ /kun gyis mya ngan sel byed pa/ /srid pa'i nang kyi man? pa khyod/ /? dang rnams la lhag par byams/ /de dag la des gsungs pa bden/ /lhag par dang
272b7(mdo 'grel): ba la bdag mdza' / /skyes bu rnams la lus gzir dang/ /mtshungs pa'i mya ngan tshogs gzhan med/ /skye ba gzhan rnams dag la yang/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dman pa las/ /nad pa rnam/ /rtsal rtag tu bdag/ shin tu phyogs su lhung bar gyur/ /grong khyer shi ba'i 
273a1(mdo 'grel): dbyangs dag tu/ /slong ba rnams kyi gnyen mchog bzhin/ /bsam pa kun la rab zhugs pa/ /mi bdag shi ba zhes pa byung/ /kun tu nad pa thams cad ni/ /kun nas bdag gis gso bar bya/ /zhes pa bden pa'i snying stobs can/ /da yi
273a2(mdo 'grel): nges par rtag tu gyur/ /nam zhig grong pa nad pa ni/ /yun ring nang kyis gzir gyur ba/ /sman la mnyes gshin de la ni/ /mngon du phyogs te gso bar zhus/ /don? ni? gso slangs bdag gis/ /dris che rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /rab rgyas nad kyis gzir ba la//
273a3(mdo 'grel): yun ring dbyad nas rab smras pa/ /shin tu lci ba'i nang 'di yi/ /rgyal po sman ni rnyad pa dka' / /skyes nas bzod ldan skyes bu yi/ /khrag gis 'di ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /de dag thos nas mi yi bdag/ yid ni snying rjes rgyas pa yis/ /yun ring nang pa gso ba'i
273a4(mdo 'grel): smras? /de yis bstan pa yang dag bsam ya/ /byis pa'i tshe yang bdag la ni/ /nam yang gang yang khro ma byung/ bdag ni mngal na gnas tshe yang/ /ma? ni/ ? ba spangs par gyur/ /de slang khro med 'jig rten na/ /bdag lta su yang yod ma yin/ /bdag gi/ brag
273a5(mdo 'grel): gi? rgyun nying kyis/ /'di yi nang ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /de ltar sbyong ba'i blo gros kyis/ /rjes 'breng kun gyis bzlog gyur kyang/ /rgyal pos mgo las phyung pa yi/ /rang khrag rtag tu de la byin/ /de nas zla ba drug gis ni/ /khrag gis nad pa bsos par gyur//  
273a6(mdo 'grel): sa bdag rib ba la zhus nas/ /bsam pa yongs su rdzogs te song/ /bon sa nam zhig sa skyob bu/ /phan pa tshol la ngal dub ni/ /bsten las nyams pa gsal byed pa/ /gzhog skams nang ni byung bar gyur/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam smin las/ /rnam
273a7(mdo 'grel): par log pa'i rang bzhin 'di/ /nad med rnams la kha zas med/ /dpal ldan rnams ni nang dang 'grogs/ /de nas sman pa mchog rnams kyis sman pa stong gis legs bsgrubs pa/ /kun gyi snying po zhes pa'i mar/ /de ni bsos slad nye bar bstan/ /rdzas?
273b1(mdo 'grel): kun gyi ni snying po blangs/ /'dab chags shang shang dag gi ni/ /khrus kyi chu yi thar dang ldan/ /'bad pa chen pos zhun mar ni/ /bcu gnyis lo yis lags par ?/ /gzhon nu 'thung bar brtson pa nang/ /nad gyis gzir ba'i rang sangs rgyas/ /ci ste de la slong du 'ongs//
273b2(mdo 'grel): kun gyis bzlog par gyur mod kyang/ /gzhon nu snying stobs rgya mtsho yis/ /kun gyi snying po phan pa'i mang/ /thams cad de la gus pas byin/ /de nas rang sangs rgyas bsos te/ /rab dang smon lam ldan pa yis/ /gzhon nu dag ni bsos par bsgru ngas/ /dam pa
273b3(mdo 'grel): bsten pa bdud rtsi gis/ /phan pa tshol ba rgyal po'i bu/ /de rku? ni tshe ring nga nyid gyur/ /rang bzhin gyis bdag nang ba yi/ /gdung ba zhi bar byed la dga' / /zhes pa thos nas rgyal ba la/ /dge slong kun gyis sngar dris pa/ /de dag la ni ci zhig gis/ /mtshungs par
273b4(mdo 'grel): nad dang bsos par gyur/ /ces nges bcom ldan 'das la dris/ /thams cad mkhyen pas de re? gsungs pa/ /ba gaNA? si dag tu sngon/ /sa yi bdag po tshangs byin byung/ /de yi bu gnyis dga' po dang/ /nye dga' zhes pa dag tu gyur/ /thu po grags pa'i khyad par
273b5(mdo 'grel): gnyer/ /de bzhin gzhan ni rgyal srid 'dod/ /de nas nye dags dben par ni/ /grogs po kha gsag can zhes pa/ /A thar ba yi mchod sbyin mkhas/ /mdun na 'don gyi bu la smras/ /bdag gi spun? zla thu bo 'di/ /skye bo dga' ba da? dag skyong/ /grags pa gar pas
273b6(mdo 'grel): skye bo las/ /rgyal srid dag ni thob par 'gyur/ /bdag ni skye bo kun gyis spangs/ /nyams shing skal ba mang par 'gyur/ /dben par shi bar sngags bar 'os/ /smad par gyur pas 'tsho ba min/ /khyod kyi spun zla thu bo nyid/ /mdun na 'don du/ rim bas 'gyur/ /yu cag
273b7(mdo 'grel): mtshungs pa'i sdug bsngal can/ /dgon pa dag tu 'gro bar 'os/ /zhes pa mya ngan smra ba bo/ /rgyal po'i bu gi chig thos nas/ /khyod la phan? ba bya'o? zhes/ /mdun na 'don gyi bu yis sgras/ /gang gis pa yi mjug tu ni/ /nu bo de yis rgyal srong 'thob/ /de  
274a1(mdo 'grel): yis rdzas sbyor dag gis de'i/ /thu bo yan lag mtshang bsgrubs/ /dus kyis de yis rgyal srid thob/ /yan lag mtshar sbun zla ni/ /tho bo lag la bar la brten pa/ /mthong nas rjes su 'gyod par gyur/ /de nas mdun na 'don gyi bu/ /mdun
274a2(mdo 'grel): na 'don du bkod pa la/ /sbas pa'i sdig bas 'jig pa des/ /shug rings tsha ba phyung nas smras/ /kye ma rgyal srid la brkas zhing/ /chos mi shes pa bdag gis ni/ /pha mtshungs ? zla thu bo ni/ /gnas skabs ngan pa 'di la bkod/ /skad cig 'jigs ba'i bde
274a3(mdo 'grel): pas drangs/ /kye ma ma brtags byed rnams kyis/ /sdig pa byas nas bdag nyid ni/ /mi bzad sdug bsngal rnams su 'phen/ /zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas/ /mdun na 'don ni 'gyod skyes pas/ /de la smras pa bdag kyang 'dir/ /rgyal po 'gyod pa'i rims dang ldan
274a4(mdo 'grel): slar yang de yis rdzas sbyor gyis/ /mi bdag bu de bsos par byas/ /bsos ba de ? rang gi ni/ /rgyal srid nu bo des kyang byin/ /de nas dus kyis nye dga' dang/ /mdun na 'don gyi bu des kyang/ /rang sangs rgyas la mchod byas nas/ /lus kyi mdza' ni rab tu
274a5(mdo 'grel): thob/ /rgyal ba'i bu nges bdag ni/ /shi ba'i bu nyid thob gyur te/ /mdun na 'don gyi bu de yang/ /rang sangs rgyas nyid rab tu thob/ /de dag sbas pa'i sdig pa des/ mtshungs par nad kyis thebs gyur cing/ /yan lag nyams pa bso byas pas/ /de dag bsos pa
274a6(mdo 'grel): nyid du gyur/ /rgyal pa phongs las gzir ba skyob gnyen gyis/ /rtag tu sems can la chags snying rje'i sbyor//'das pa'i skye bo dang 'brel de thos nas/ /mgu ba'i dge slong de dag bde ba thog/ ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i
274a7(mdo 'grel): rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri? shing las/ phan pa tshol ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa lnga pa'o/ /chos kyi bslab pa rig pa gang gis mchod bya rnams la dul bar rgan rim gyis/ /mchod bya'i tshogs la ?
274b1(mdo 'grel): 'dud 'dul bas phyag byed de dag mtho ba thob par gyur/ /dregs pas 'phyar las blo gros rnam par ma bsdams rmongs las 'og tu 'gro byed cing/ /rgan 'das rnams la 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol de yang rtag tu mya ngan bcas/ /rgan po mchod pa'i zhad la slar//
274b2(mdo 'grel): dge slong rnams kyis dris ba dag/ rgan po'i cho ga ji bzhin slang/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ /ba ra NA si dag tu sngon/ /mi bdag tshangs byin zhes pa byung/ /'gro ba gang gi bsod nams mthus/ /chos kyi kun dga' ra bar gyur/ /de dus grod
274b3(mdo 'grel): mdza' i nags tshal du/ /sngon gyi bsod nams mtshan nyid las/ /mi yi smra brjod la zhugs pa/ /srog chags bzhi ni byung bar gyur/ /ba men dang ni ri bong dang/ /spri'u de bzhin glang po'i mchog/ de dag dam pa'i spyod tshul can/ /phan tshun mdza' bas bcings par
274b4(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /nam zhig bde thob de dag gis/ /gtam gyi mjug tu phan tshun smras/ /yu skol rgan rim med pa la/ /mchod pa dag ni ji ltar bsgrub/ /dam pas ji ltar rgan rim gyis/ /bkur sti dag ni rab? bsgrubs pa/ /nges par dge legs skyed byed cing/ /dge ba
274b5(mdo 'grel): nyid dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rgan po'i zhes sa mchod bya gang/ /yu las ro zhig rgan pa su/ /zhes pa smra ba de dag las/ /glang chen khyu bdag gis smras ba/ /'dab ma che h+rul? n+ya gro d+ha/ /gang 'di rnying par mthong gyur pa/ /'di yi ngal 'dab gsar ba dang/ /ngang?
274b6(mdo 'grel): gi lus 'di mtshungs par dran/ /spre'u yis kyang der smras pa/ /bdag ni nags ni rgyu ba yis/ /n+ya gro d+ha 'di rang lus dang/ /mtshungs pa shin tu chung ba mthong/ /ri bong gis kyang las? pa sngon/ n+ya gro d+ha 'di sor lnga ba/ /'dab? mang gis kyis mchin pa la/ /zil?
274b7(mdo 'grel): thigs kyis brlan bdag gis myangs ? de dag rim bas de brjod tshe/ /phyi nas ba men gyis smras pa/ /bdag gi lci ba'i sa bon las/ /shing chen mgro d+ha 'di skyes/ /de nas rgan rim shes gyur nas/ /de dag phan tshun mdzad ba yis/ /rdzis nags dga' ?
275a1(mdo 'grel): pas mchod pa ni/ /rtag tu zhe sa la 'os byas/ /de dag srog gcod rku ba dang/ /de bzhin bgrod min 'gro ba dang/ /mi bden chang mtshungs 'bras bu ni/ /skur? po za ba dag las kyang/ /chags bral rang gnas kun spyod kyi/ /bslab pas legS  
275a2(mdo 'grel): byas la chags pa'i/ /bsod nams mthu yis nags tshal na/ /gnas rnams spyod tshul mtshungs par byas/ /de nas de dag rnams kyi mthus/ /rtag tu me tog 'bras ldan shing/ /sprin ni dus su char 'bebs shing/ /sa la 'bru rnams rgyas bar gyur/ /sa
275a3(mdo 'grel): yi legs byas mtshan nyid ni/ /ngo mtshar che ba de mthong nas/ /thams cad sa bdag tshangs byin gyis/ /rang gi bsod nams las skyes bsams/ /log par khengs pas tshim de la/ /thub ba mngon shes lnga pas smras/ /me tog 'bras bu rgyas pa 'di/ /mi
275a4(mdo 'grel): bdag khyod kyi drin gyis min/ /nags na spre'u bi bong dang/ /gnyis 'thung ba min lhan cig gnas/ /yon tan rgyas 'di dam chos kyi/ /ngang tshul de dag rnams kyi yin/ /de dag brtul zhugs lnga yis dag/ ji ltar rgan po mchod byed cing/ /ba med tshig
275a5(mdo 'grel): gis thams cad ni/ /dam ches dam tshig dag la brten/ /zhes pa thub pa'i tshig thos nas/ /mchog tu gus skyes rgyal po ni/ /grong pa btsun mo blon bcas pas/ /brtul zhugs lnga po de dag bsten/ /ba men pa nyid ri bong ni/ /shA ri'i bu 'di nyid du
275a6(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /spre'u maung+gal gyi bu/ /glang chen khyu bdag kun dga' bo/ /de dag ji ltar rgan ba'i rim/ /mchod las chos ni dri med thob/ /de slad phyag dang mchod pa la/ /rgan pa'i rim pa rab brtag bya/ /ston pa'i 'dul ba nyer bstan de thos nas/ /rgan po mtshon?
275a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i dka' thub khyad par thos/ /ji ltar rgan bzhin dge slong de dag gis/ /zhe sar bcas pa'i mchod pa 'dun sar byas/ /zhes pa dge pa'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ pa men
275b1(mdo 'grel): gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa drug pa'o// //gang zhig g.yo dang yongs khyab dregs pa mi bzad gang yang gdug pa rnam par bcas/ /gang yang shin tu rab drag nag po brtsegs brtsom pa cher gnas bstan pa dang/ gang dag gzhan yang
275b2(mdo 'grel): bzod dka' i dug rnams gsal bar gcig tu byas pa de dag gis/ /tshig rtsub dug gi rno ba nyid la cha dang dper yang mtshungs par mi 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag yid ces bya ba'i bu/ /yon tan ldan pa mnyan yod du/ /pad+ma'i snying po'i 'od mtshungs ba/ /padmo can zhes bya ba phyung?/
275b3(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims can gyi dul pa dang/ /blo ldan rnams kyi dben pa dang/ /dam pa'i yon tan la gus bzhin/ /de yi khyim du der rab bskyed/ /gzugs ni 'dod pa brgyad ldan zhing/ /lang tshe gsar pa rtsom tshe de/ /longs spyod rtsom la chags bral bas/ /chags bral nyid la
275b4(mdo 'grel): mngon phyogs gyur/ /dge slong bzod pa'i sems ldan pa/ /nye sde zhes ni bya ba yi/ /bstan par bzhi bsngags 'os pa/ /rab byung de yis yang dag blangs/ /'khor ba'i phyogs la chags bral bas/ /chags pa dang bral zla ba bzhin/ /lag na lhung bzed chos gos dang//
275b5(mdo 'grel): yang dag ldan nga mchog tu mdzes/ /de nas nam zhig gcig pu nyid/ /ljongs ni rgyu zhing 'gro ba des/ /gtsug lag khang dang 'ga' tshal gyis/ /mdzes pa'i bcom brlag tu ni phyin/ /der ni bsod snyoms don gnyer der/ /gsar bu nyid phyir ma shos nas/ /sdod?
275b6(mdo 'grel): 'tshong zla ba'i rimo yi/ /khang pa'i khyams kyi nang du zhugs/ /utpal mig can de yis ni/ /de la stan dang bkur sti byas/ /gzugs ni mthong bas ya mtshan zhing/ /gus dang ldan pas de la smras/ /lang tsho gsar pa dang ldan pa/ /khyod kyi gzugs ni yid 'ong
275b7(mdo 'grel): 'di/ /su yi mig la bdud rtsi yi/ /longs spyod ston par byed ma yin/ /na tshod 'di dang gzugs 'di la/ /'dod pa 'gal zla su zhig gis/ /rgan po la 'os chags bral gyi/ /sdug bsngal yang dag nye bar bstan/ /chags ldan bu de med nu ma ni/ /rab rgyas reg
276a1(mdo 'grel): pas bder 'os pa/ /longs spyod snod gyur khyod kyi ni/ lag par lhung bzed mjes ma yin/ /da ni nu ma'i khur gyis non/ /khyed ni lang tshos rnam par g.yo/ /yu cag gnyis ni mdza' bar 'os/ /da ni brtul zhugs bzod par mdzod//
276a2(mdo 'grel): g.yo sgyus zhi dang dul ba goms bas bong? spod bdud rtsi dag la chags med cing/ /mig yangs mchu yis yal 'dab rab myong rab dga' i dga' ston rab tu spangs pa bzhin/ /mdzes ma'i nus gur gum gyis mtshan mdzes pas snying la chags pa
276a3(mdo 'grel): mi 'dzin gang ba skye bo'i nags su nyon mongs sman pa'i 'bras bu za ba'i dul ba de la 'dud/ /gal te mdza la bskam chags can/ /bdag gi tshig 'di mi byed ni/ /khyod kyi bzhin rab pad+ma 'di/ /stobs kyis mnan ta bdag gis btung/ /da thos kun du sbag 
276a4(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin/ /rna ba bsgribs nas de la nges/ /smras pa ma gcig bdag gos ni/ /bstan pa sun 'byin 'os pa min/ /bdag nyid kun gyis legs spyad spyan ldan skyes bu la/ bde gshegs brtul zhugs cod pan nyid du rab gyur cing/ /snying stobs dpal ni gtsang
276a5(mdo 'grel): bas thig la nyid gyur pa/ /tshul khrims mtshungs pa'i rgyan ni cung zad yod ma yin/ /zhes pa brjod nas dul ldan de/ /gnod pa'i zug rdu mi bzod can/ /mchod pa rab btang myur ba dang/ /bcas pas snod stong nyid du song/ /de nas sngags stobs zhes pa
276a6(mdo 'grel): yi/ /smad 'tshong gtum mo 'dod ldan ma/ dbang dgug sogs la 'khrul 'khor dang/ /sngags dang rgyud sogs de sbyor ma dbos? nas de la rang nyid ni/ /tshogs pa'i zil gyis ? bshad/ /nor gyis tshim byas chags pa yis/ /gzir mas
276a7(mdo 'grel): dga' dang 'grogs pa cugs/ /de nas de yis dpral la ni/ /sngags stobs kyis drangs pad+ma can/ /dbang med de la mdzen? phyogs te/ /bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smras/ /de la des smras bsod rnams kyis/ /nyer? gnas mdzes ma zla ba nyin? ma/ /mdza' ?
276b1(mdo 'grel): mo 'di ni rab tu bsten/ /yang na 'bar ba'i me la zhugs/ /padmo can gyis mdun du ni/ /me? 'bang? mthong nas gos bzhag ste/ /snying stobs dkar ba'i gos can gyis/ /mchod? bar chas nas rab smas pa/ /gtsang byad 'bang bar bdag 'jug gi/ mi gcang chags pa'i
276b2(mdo 'grel): mar ma yon/ /chags pas bsregs pa'i skyes bu rnams/ /skye ba brgya yi rjes 'brang sreg/ ces ba de yi tshig thos nas/ /gtam mo re ba nyams gyur cing/ /bya min byas bas yid byung ste/ /rjes su gdung ba dag tu gyur/ /de yis bzod pa'i gnas de la/ /gus pa
276b3(mdo 'grel): yis ni dang bar byas/ /chags bral zhi zhing bsil ba yi/ /blo ldan smad 'tshong ma dag kyang/ /chos kyis kun tu dag pa'i sud/ /de dag la ni chos bstan mdzad/ /gang gis nyon mongs kun zhi nas/ /de dag gis ni dgra bcom thob/ /dge legs ldan pa padmo can/ /rang
276b4(mdo 'grel): nyid slob dpon nyid thob nas/ /mnyan yod grong du bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lta ru song/ /der ni rgyal byed tshal bzhugs pa'i/ /rgyal ba des mthong phyag 'tshal nas/ /bya ba byas pas rang nyid kyi/ /spyod mdza' dge slong mdun du bshad/ /bcom ldan
276b5(mdo 'grel): 'das la dge slong gis/ /de yi bsod nams la mtshan dris/ /smad 'tshong ma dang pad+ma can/ /gtum mo'i sngon byung rgyal bas gsungs/ /sngon tshe ston pa bcom ldan 'das/ /'od srungs zhes pa'i bstan pa la/ /khyim bdag bshes gnyen zhes pa ni/ /rab tu byung ba nyid
276b6(mdo 'grel): du gyur/ /de yi chung ma? dpa' mo dang/ /rab dga' mo yang rab byung ste/ /mthu ni bdag po dang mtshungs pas/ /gtsug lag khang du gnas par byas/ /? ni de dag rtsod pa yi/ /tshig rtsub chen pos dge slong ma'i/ /tshogs ni yid dag byung par byas/ /rang bzhin nges
276b7(mdo 'grel): par btang bar dka' / /gcig gis gtum mo'i tshig dang ni/ /gzhan gyis smad 'tshong mar brjod bas/ /dge slong ma rnams smad pas dag/ byas pa'i sdig pa thob par gyur/ /de nyid gtum mor dag skyon las/ de bzhin pa? zhen smud? 'tshong mas skyes/ /rab tu
277a1(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i mthu yis ni/ /slar yang dge ba dag la brten/ /khyim bdag bshes gnyen de yang ni/ /brtul zhugs gyis bsdams pad ldan 'di/ /tshul khrims gtsang bas rnam rgyan cing/ /dgra bcom gnas ni thob pas mdzes/ /pad can
277a2(mdo 'grel): skye ba gzhan la yang/ /me tog sde zhes me tog pa/ /me tog tshogs kyis slong ba yi/ /skye bo rtag tu khengs byed gyur/ /de yis rang rgyal longs spyod kyis/ /mchod nas gos kyis g.yogs byas te/ /pad+ma utpa la ka da ra/ /me tog rnams kyis yong dag mtsho?
277a3(mdo 'grel): bsod nams de yis padmo can/ /padmo'i snying po'i 'od mtshungs 'di/ /legs byas rgya tsho'i dri bzang can/ bdag gi bstan pa la 'os gyur/ /gzugs ni tshul khrims kyis brgyan grags pa gtsang zhing zla pa lta bur dkar ba'i rigs ? sems ni dben pa yangs smin
277a4(mdo 'grel): shin tu dri med 'khor ba'i g.yon phyogs zhi gyur pa/ /'di dag mkhas pa rnams kyi bsod nams cher dang mtshan nyid lta bar bzod pa yin/ /shin tu smad pos rigs dang yid ni dri ma can yang mi rnams las ngan rtags/ /zhes ba kun mkhyen gyis bshad pa'o//
277a5(mdo 'grel): rmad byung las smin gtam dag gis/ /dge slong rnams ni 'ga' ba yis/ /reg cing ya mtshan rgyas par gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ pad+ma can gyi rtogs pa brjod
277a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //shin tu drag po'i dul ba mthong nas 'phrog cing zhib nges par bzod mi byed/ /myur bar yid dga' kha ba dang mtshungs mjug tu sreg par bzod pa'i las dag byed/ /bya min dag la 'jigs btang
277a7(mdo 'grel): blo gros rab 'jug 'khor ba'i grogs mo bud med kyis/ /rmi lam dag dang mtshums pa'i rnam 'phrul mi bzad 'di dag thams cad nges par 'dzin/ /mi bdag gzugs can snying po yi/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu sngon/ /nag? ? zhes pa glang sde'i
277b1(mdo 'grel): bdag/ glang chen stan gyi bu du gyur/ rgyal po'i 'byor pa dang mtshungs khyim/ /yo byad bcas pa yongs btang nas/ /chags bral la ni mngon phyogs des/ /gzhon nu nyid la rab byung bzung/ /de yi chung ma gzugs mdzes pa/ /'byor pa rgyas pa'i khyim du ni/ /bdag po'i longS
277b2(mdo 'grel): sbyong dang bral bas/ /yun ring bsam pa 'khrugs par gyur/ /de nas dus kyis yongs 'dris la/ /gus pas mdza' ni rgyu byed pa/ /nag pa glang chen stan gyi bu/ /de ni rang gi khyim du song/ /de nas mngon du 'ongs de la/ /rkud ma mdza' gcugs ldan ma nges/ /rjes su
277b3(mdo 'grel): 'brangs nas mchod pa ni/ /sngon du 'gro bas mgron gnyer byas/ lam ring gis dub bde med de/ /mthong nas de yis rab bsams pa/ kye ma 'di yi mdzes sdug ni/ /lang tsho nyid kyis nges par gzung/ /na tshod longs spyod 'os 'di la/ /khyim gyi dpal 'di yongs btang
277b4(mdo 'grel): nas/ /rnam par ma spyad 'di yis ni/ /rdzun gyis bdag nyid ci la gdung/ gang zhig phyogs lhung bcas pa yi/ /mig gis khyim la lta byed pa/ dka' thub can ni mdza' ba'i lha/ da dung zhib min par nges/ /yang na dang por bstan pa nyid/ /yongs brtag bstan
277b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis/ /'di yi chags bral g.yo ba 'am/ /brtan pa bdag gis shes par bya/ /khyim du longs spyod tshogs kyis tshim/ thams cad nags tshal mngon par 'dod/ /dben par bde ba nyams pa'i cha/ bdag nyid rjes su gdung ba med/ ces pa ?
277b6(mdo 'grel): de yis de yi ni/ /mdun du zas kyi gnas skabs su/ /sgra dang bcas par zangs gyi snod/ /ba gam rtse las rang gis dor/ /spa nges kun tu skrag pa bzhin/ /skad cig phyogs su rnam par bltas/ /'di ci zhes pa nag pa ni/ /'khrul bsam don phyogs de
277b7(mdo 'grel): la dris/ /de nas dar bab bzhin 'dzum ldan/ /de yis zangs snod cung zad ni/ /lhung ba de la bshad byas nas/ /dga' bas slar yang rab bsams pa/ /re zhig rnam 'gyur med ? yi/ gnas la gnas pa 'dis na? thob/ /'di yi yid ni lhod pa dag/
278a1(mdo 'grel): rtse dags myur du zhugs par 'gyur/ /gang zhig snod kyi sgra tsam gyis/ /kun tu skrag cing 'khrugs gyur pa/ /rnam dpyod bral ba de la ni/ /yul gyis ci dang ci mi byed/ /dang pa thams cad chu 'dzin dag gi sgra tsam las/ /skrag cing
278a2(mdo 'grel): bstan pa nyams pas bcings nas 'bros par byed/ /gang zhig sprin tshogs lci bar sgrogs la g.yo med pa/ /pad stan dang pa'i rgyal po de ni gcig yin/ /zhes pa yid kyis nges byas nas/ /smin pa'i 'khri shing rol rtsed can/ /'jam par smra byed de
278a3(mdo 'grel): yis ni/ /de la mngon phyogs dal gyis smras/ /bdag ni rtsa bzhin rab spangs nas/ /khyod ni ring du song ba'i tshe/ /bdag gi khyim ni chung mas bzhin/ /rgud pas zil gyis mnan la ltos/ /rtsom chen 'byor pa 'di la yang/ /longs spyod dag ni rab spangs
278a4(mdo 'grel): ba/ /bde med bdag ni grogs kyis bzhin/ /khyod mthong re ba nyid kyis bzung/ /yang dag brjod par mi 'os pa/ /'di ni sdug bsngal bdag gis brjod/ /mi smra 'dod kyang brjod pa 'di/ /lce yang rab tu ngo tshar shes/ /khyim bdag gis ni chung ma yi//
278a5(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims bslad mthong de la ni/ /chags bral skyes pa ma yin nam/ /gzhan du dus min ji ltar 'gyur/ /zhes pa gzhan gyi yon tan ni/ /nyams pa bgrang ba la mkhas pa'i/ /bzhin 'dzum skye bo thams cad ni/ /phan tshun rnam par lta zhing
278a6(mdo 'grel): smras/ /'brel bas gdud ba bdag la ni/ /'jig rten sems so zhes par 'dzin/ /dar ma nyon mongs dag la yang/ /ma nyams gzugs bdag ci zhig bya/ /khyim du g.yog 'khor 'di dag kyang/ /bdag la shin tu ma bsdams gyur/ /bud med
278a7(mdo 'grel): bdag po med rnams kyi/ /mdun du khyi yang rab tu rgod/ /bdag gi lhag ma nyid kyis ni/ /rab tu bsos pa 'bangs phrug 'di/ /bka' bsgos khros pas bdag gis ni/ /skra nas 'dren pas 'dod la ltos/ /zhes pa brjod nas brda byas te/ /bdag po'i  
278b1(mdo 'grel): sems ni rnam 'gyur slad/ /rang gi 'bangs kyis zil gnon pa/ /de yis mngon sum nyid du bstan/ /ma nyams gzugs zhes chags pa dang/ /bde ba med ces 'khrug pa dang/ /rmad par gyur ces phrag dog dang/ /'bangs kyis gzir ces khro ba yang/ /thob nas
278b2(mdo 'grel): de la lta byed cing/ /brtul zhugs kyis bsdams btang ba de/ /mtshungs par 'khod pa'i skyon rnams ni/ /thams cad dag gi dbang du gyur/ /lhung bzed chos gos rab btang zhing/ /'jigs rung ral gri phyung nas ni/ /dga' ma'i gnod pa la khros pas/ /de yis
278b3(mdo 'grel): 'bangs na gsod par zhugs/ /'bangs ni gsod pa'i sdig pa las/ /chung mas 'bad nas bzlog pa des/ /dgra las rgyal 'dod khyim gyi ni/ /bde ba dman pas slar yang bsten/ /de ni longs spyod yongs su bzung bas bud med longs spyod skal bzangs
278b4(mdo 'grel): gzhir gyur pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gnod pa'i gtam gyi rgyu las g.yog 'khor rnams la khro bas 'khrugs/ /'dod pas dul ba nyams byed khro bas skad cig nyid kyis bzod pa rlag pa byed/ /rdzun gyis brtul zhugs dag gis gdung ba'i yid kyis
278b5(mdo 'grel): chags bral nyid ni thob ma yin/ /de nas rgyal pos glang chen gyis/ /sna chen gnas ni slar yang byin/ /'byor pa rgya che thob gyur nas/ /de nas lhag par rgyas par gyur/ /skabs der grong khyer nang dag las/ /dge slong rnams kyis bsod snyoms blangs//
278b6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan rgyal ba nags tshal na/ /gnas pa dag la mngon phyogs te/ /chags bral bzhin gyis de la ni/ /phyag 'tshal glang chen stan gyi bu/ /nag pa dge gi brtul zhugs ni/ /'os pa min pa rnam par bshad/ /de nas bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen
278b7(mdo 'grel): 'dzum dang ldan pas deng gsungs pa/ /de yi dge ba ma smin pas/ brtul bzhugs dag ni blang bar byas/ /gang zhig dben pa smin cing rdzogs pa'i brtag pas yid kyi 'khri shing skams gyur pa/ /de dag phyi nas yul gyi nyams myong rnying par dran
279a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i dbang du gyur pa yin/ /gang zhig don gyis bkag cing khengs pas lhod la rgyun du gus pa rab btang ba/ /de dag 'dod dang zhi ba'i bar mtshams dag la yid ni 'phyang mo yug par byed/ /gang gis g.yang sar lhung ba'i mkhas pa rnamS
279a2(mdo 'grel): kyang dul bdag ni yongs gtong zhing/ /chags pa'i dug rgyas rnal 'byor can rnams mi bzang smags dums la 'jug par byed/ /skye bar goms pas chags shing yul gyi reg pa mchog tu mngon par 'dod gyur pa/ /rnam 'gyur mnga' yi char drag
279a3(mdo 'grel): dkrigs pa'i tshe/ /'dod pa 'di ni su la bzod par byed/ /ces pa brjod nas bcom ldan 'das/ /rgyal ba nag pa'i khyim byon nas/ /sku yi 'od kyis phyi rol gyi/ /rab rib rnam par 'joms shing slar/ /rjes su gzung ba'i snang ba yis/ /de yi yid ni dri med
279a4(mdo 'grel): mdzad/ /phyag dang bsnyen bkur byas pa de/ /rang nyid kyi ni gnas su khrid/ /der ni slar yang gus pa yis/ /brol med rab byung de yis bsten/e /grub slad rgyal bas dag pa yi/ /dam pa' chos ni rab bstan mdzad/ /nyon mongs thams cad rab zad pas// 
279a5(mdo 'grel): de ni dgra bcom gnas thob tshe/ /de yi sngon byung dge slong gis/ /dris nas bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa/ /sngon gyi skye ba gzhan la des/ /rang sangs rgyas ni gus pa yis/ /rtag tu mchod cing de yi ni/ /mjug tu mchod rten chen po bsgrubs/ /de yi bsod namS
279a6(mdo 'grel): smon lam gyis/ /skal ldan nag pa 'di yis ni/ /bdag gi bstan la rab byung dag/ blangs nas dgra bcom gnas la brten/ /'di ni slar yang 'dod pa la/ /rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu dag nyon/ /sngon gyi skye ba dag la yang/ /'di ni chud mas rab tu bslus/ /ba ra NA
279a7(mdo 'grel): si dag tu ni/ /sa yi bdag po tshangs byin gyi/ /yon tan yongs rdzogs mdun na 'don/ /dpal ldan 'phrog byed kyis byin byung/ /de la rig dang 'dul ba dag/ rdzogs pa'i bu gnyis byung gyur te/ /gcig ni 'phrog byed bu zhes dang/ /de bzhin gzhan pa?
279b1(mdo 'grel): 'phrog byed rtse/ /de dag chags bral dben pa thob/ /srid pa'i longs spyod las phyir phyogs/ /dka' thub nags tshal yongs rgyu zhing/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob par gyur/ /rgyal dang skye bos mchod gyur cing/ /rab zhi bsngags par 'os pa yi/ /mkha' la rgyu ba de dag ni//
279b2(mdo 'grel): thub pa rnams kyi 'ang mchod byar gyur/ /nam zhigs bdag khang pa na/ /'phrog byed rtse gnas mi bdag ni/ /phyogs las rgyal bar mngon phyogs bas/ /bu mo mdzes ldan zhes la smras/ /mnyes gshin khyod kyis gus? pa ni/ /shin tu che bas thub pa dag/ mchod
279b3(mdo 'grel): bya 'di la mchod pa byas/ /'di ni bdag gi bkur sti'i 'os/ /zhes pa bu mo la bstan nas/ /sa yi bdag po rab sod tshe/ /rgyal po'i bu mo gus ldan mas/ /thub pa rtag tu mchod par gyur/ /gser bcad 'od ltar yongs su shes pa'i mdzes pa lus la
279b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin byed cing/ /bma? da'i spyan dang ldan pa de mthong de ni mngon par sreng ldan gyur/ /lhan cig 'khod pas nges par mdzes pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i 'dod pa yis/ /'grogs pa'i bsam pa snying la rtsa ba zug pa ci yang byed par 'gyur/ /rung gzhon dag
279b5(mdo 'grel): gis bskyod ba'i 'khri shing bzhin/ /'dod pa'i rnam 'phrul shugs 'byin lus dag ni/ /dud pas de yi lus kyi kun dga' dar bcas par grogs med thub la 'khyung pa byas/ /de yi nu ma gsar pa'i rtser chags lus kyi tshon gyis ni/ /'dod pa rgyal po'i
279b6(mdo 'grel): bka' yig rgya ldan snying la 'dzin byed cing/ /de dus nyid na glo bur du ni dul ba'i gdags thag chad/ /thub pa 'dod pa'i rtse dga' gsar pa dag la 'phyar bar gyur khyu mchog nyams las 'khrig pa'i bya ba la/ /rab tu sbyor zhing sdig bas bzung ba bzhin//
279b7(mdo 'grel): rgyal po seng ga'i khyim du nyi mtshungs de/ /gdung slad bu mo la ni 'gro 'dod gyur/ /'khyud pa'i sgrub byed dag la lag 'gro ma rnams dug ni mi bzad pa/ /yang yang nga rgyal rmongs 'jig byed rang bzhin lus la nges bar zhugs pa dag/ sngags kyis
280a1(mdo 'grel): zhib ma yin 'od kyi rang bzhin bstan bcos nor bus min/ /sbyor min bsam gtan gyis min zhi ba'i khyad par sman gyi ro yis min/ /mdza' ba'i rang bzhin rkun po'i longs spyod tshur/ /ri dags mig can gyis 'phangs de lhung ste/
280a2(mdo 'grel): dben pa med las skyes pa'i yid srubs tshogs/ /mkhas rnams kyis yang bstan pa mthar byed yin/ /'grogs la phyir phyogs snying la chags dang bzlas pa'i gzhim mchu la 'o dang ni/ /bsam gtan dag la dmigs pa'i spyan la mdza' gcugs
280a3(mdo 'grel): mdzes sdug btung ba'i dga' ston dang/ /lhung bzed kyis gtsang lag bar nu ma zung ste me tog mtshon ldan mnyes pa las/ /dul min bslab pa dag gis de yi brtul zhugs thams cad gsar pa nyid du gyur/ /sa bdag bu mo'i lag pa yis/ /dra
280a4(mdo 'grel): bar gnas pa de la ni/ /dka' thub grub 'bar 'phral nyid la/ /phrag dog can bzhin phyir phyogs 'gyur/ /de ni mthul che ba'i tshe/ /pho brang 'khor gyi skye bo yis/ /spyod tshul shes kyang 'jigs gyur nas/ /sus kyang ci yang der ma smras/ /de nas sa bdag
280a5(mdo 'grel): yun ring na/ /phyir log rgyal ba'i dga' ston can/ /'byor pa smad du byung ba'i tshogs/ /rab tu mang ba rgyas par gyur/ /sngon du thub pa 'phrog byed rtse/ /sa bdag gus shing dul ldan da/ /rang gis sa skyong la 'os pa'i/ /longs spyod kun gyis rab tu mchod//
280a6(mdo 'grel): thub pa gsol ba'i mdun du ni/ /sa bdag gus pas 'khod pa'i che/ /mdzes ldan ma yis sngon du ni/ /rim gro dag ni legs par byas/ /de nas gser gyi chu snod kyis/ /lag gnyis 'brel pa de la ni/ /thub pa bstan pa brjod pa yis/ /lag brkyangS
280a7(mdo 'grel): tshur shog ces pa smras/ /de yi 'dod pa'i rnam 'gyur de/ /mthong nas mi bdag rab khros te/ /sdig pa'i phyir bcos sbyor ba la/ /chad pas bcad pa'i blo gros bsgrubs/ /drag pos khros ba pa yi bzhin/ /mthong nas mdzes ldan ma yis kyang/ /thub bI?
280b1(mdo 'grel): mgrin par zas chags zhes/ /brjod nas de la chu dag byin/ /bud med phur bu'i blo gros can/ /skabs su nyer mkho'i tshig dang ni/ /phyir zlog sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sdig pa'i sgrib byed rnam par bkra/ bu mo yi ni tshig de yis/ /'phral la nyid du mi yi bdag/
280b2(mdo 'grel): ka ta ka yi phye ma yis/ /chu yi gnas bzhin dang bar gyur/ /skabs der thub pa rdzu 'phrul bri/ /de yi mkha' la 'gro nyams pa/ /spun zla thu bo nags na gnas/ /lha yi spyan ldan gyis shes nas/ /sdug bsngal rang nyid mngon phyogs te/ /de ni rang gi gnas khrid nas//
280b3(mdo 'grel): slar yang bsam gtan bzhi bskyangs te/ /mngon shes lnga dang ldan par byas/ /thub pa chags pa'i chu gter du lhung mi bzad yul gyi ni/ /nyon mongs 'khor lo dag las phyir phyung rab mad dka' thub kyi/ /gzi yis 'dod pa dran pa'i sdig bsregs shes nas khro
280b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshogs/ /btang nas mi bdag blo ldan nges kyang? rab tu dang bar gyur/ /de yi tshe nad nyid ni/ /'phrog byed bu yi ming can te/ /nag pa dag kyang 'phrog byed rtse/ /chung ma rgyal po'i bu mor gyur/ /de skad dar ni mi bden ma yin rab grags pa'i/ /rang gi gtam 'di de
280b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pas bshad gyur te/ /gang gis srid pa mdza' dag skyon gyi rang bzhin las/ /dge slong tshogs kyi blo gros ci yang zhugs ma gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing/
280b6(mdo 'grel): las/ nag pa glang pI stan gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //'jigs rung stug po'i rlung gis rab bslang dpa' rlabs rnam sprul pas/ /ma lus phyogs kun 'gengs pa drag po'i sgra dang rab tu ldan/ /chu srin
280b7(mdo 'grel): 'byung gnas bzlog dka' chu yi rnam 'gyur can de yang/ /bde gshegs dran pa'i mi rnams dag la mdza' ru gyur ba nyid/ /rgyal ba 'gro kun bde legs la/ /rtag tu sbyor zhing mnyan yod kyi/ /rgyal byed tshal gyi kun dga' ra/ /gtsug lag khang na mngon 
281a1(mdo 'grel): bzhugs tshe/ /yangs pa'i gling du 'gro ba la/ /spro ba yis ni dus byas pa/ /rin chen don gnyer tshong pa yi/ /don mthun chu gter chu 'gram phyin/ /de nas gzings la don mthun ni/ /rab tu zhon tshe lci ba'i khur/ /dpyad nas bying du dogs pa yis/
281a2(mdo 'grel): rna ba 'dzin pas de la smras/ /khyed rnams rab tu sred pa yis/ /brgyud mar gon ba 'di ni ci/ /chu gter dba' rlabs rtse mtho 'di/ /khyim gyi khyams ni yongs ma yin/ /re zhig khyod kyi gzings la ni/ /'chom pa'i khur dag rab tu mdzod/ /rin chen phung po su
281a3(mdo 'grel): mi 'dod/ /'on kyang chu gter 'tsho ba mang/ /chu gter na ni gzhan na dba' rlabs rab 'khrug gzhan na drag bo'i chu srin tshogs dkrigs shugs/ /gzhan na nang gi ri bo bstan ba'i rtse mo sdug por rab bsnun tshogs kyis rgyu ni bkag 'thor// gzhan na rlung
281a4(mdo 'grel): zhi mthar byed dag gi dbugs ltar drag pa langs pas kun tu bsnun cing 'khor/ /gzhan na glo bur nyams byed rta gdong me ni rab brtan mi lce'i dkyil 'khor gtum po yod/ /ces pa rna ba 'dzin pa yis/ /chu gter de bzhin bshad thos nas/ /'ga' 
281a5(mdo 'grel): zhig babs nas song bar gyur/ /bsam ba che ba 'ga' zhig 'khod/ /de nas rin chen gling phyin te/ /don mthun don byas nyid gyur cing/ /dal bu dal bus rjes mthun gyi/ /rlung gis rjes su log pa'i tshe/ /ri bo man d+ha ra bslang bzhin/ /nam mkha' kun tu gang
281a6(mdo 'grel): gyur cing/ /kha gdangs thug ltar gyur pa ni/ /chod pa kun gyis mdun du mthong/ /ru sbal nya dang chu srin bcas/ /rgya mtsho'i chu ni ma lus pa/ /g.yang sar lhung bzhin de la ni/ /mngon phyogs mgyogs par song gyur cing/ /de nas gzir? la ni mthar byed kyi
281a7(mdo 'grel): ? phug dang nye ba'i tshe/ /tshong ba bslad pas 'khrug rnams kyis/ /rna ba 'dzin pa dag la dris/ /sngon ma byung ba byung gyur pa/ /rmad byung 'byung ba 'di ni ci/ /gang gi spyi bor tsha zer can/ /zung shig shar ba lta bur mthong/ /'di la mngon phyogs chu 'di
281b1(mdo 'grel): dag/ ci slad yongs su rgyug par byed/ /gang gi shugs kyis gzings 'di ni/ /'dren bar byed cing rnam par g.yo/ /de ltar glo bur brlag rtsom pa'i/ /'jigs pa'i rnam 'phrul gyis skrag pa'i/ /tshong ba rnams kyis the tshom dris/ /rna ba 'dzin pas rab smras pa/ /nya mid
281b2(mdo 'grel): yid par byed pa'i nya/ /sems can 'joms byed chen po 'di/ /rgya mtsho dag na rnam par gnas/ /'khor ba na ni kun rmongs bzhin/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis 'char rtsom tshe/ /nyi ma zung ni shar ba bzhin/ /dus mdza' 'jigs rung 'di yi ni/ /mig ni zung dag rab tu mthong//
281b3(mdo 'grel): 'di yi kha yi g.yang sa'i mthar/ /sprin dkar dag gis yongs bskor ba'i/ /ri rtse chen po'i phreng ba bzhin/ /so yi phreng ba rab tu mtshon/ /'di yi kha ru lhung ba yi/ /rgyun gyis gzings ni grangs pa dag/ yul la mngon par phyogs pa yi/ /sems bzhin gzung
281b4(mdo 'grel): bar nus ma yin/ /'chi ba las kyis sprul gyur pa/ /'di la phyir bcos yod ma yin/ /skye ba gzhan la dge ster ba'i/ /lha ni cung zad dran par mdzod/ /ces pa rna 'dzin gyis brjod pa/ /tshong pa'i mchog kun gyis thos nas/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyag
281b5(mdo 'grel): 'tshal zhes/ /tsho de'i sgra dang ldan bas smras/ /'jigs pas gzir ba de dag sgra/ /bcom ldan rgyal ba rgyal byed kyi tshal bzhugs 'byung bo la dgongs pas/ /lha yi rna bdag gis thos/ /mun pa zhi byed sangs rgyas kyi/ /mtshan thos nyid na sems can gyi//
281b6(mdo 'grel): nyer 'tshe zhi slad nya ming kha/ /dal bu yis ni zum par gyur/ /dal gyis de ni kha bsgribs tshe/ /mi mthun phyogs 'gro rgyun nyams pas/ /dus kyi kha las grol ba yi/ /gzings ni rang gi ngos su phyin/ /de nas mi bzad 'jigs las thar/ /grags pa'i dpal
281b7(mdo 'grel): ldan rin chen gyi/ /khengs shing dgo ba ldan pa kun/ /mnyan yod du ni rnam par zhugs/ /gus ldan de dag song gyur nas/ /gdung ba skyob par mdzad ba po/ /rgyal ba bcom ldan rgyal byed kyi/ /tshal na bzhugs la phyag dag 'tshal/ /de dag de mthong nyid
282a1(mdo 'grel): na ni/ /'khor ba'i 'ching ba chang gyur cing/ /'phral la rab tu dang ba thob/ /rab tu byung nas dgra bcom gyur/ /'di dag sngon gyi skye ba la/ /ston pa 'od srungs zhes pa yi/ /bstan la zhugs bar gyur to zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das
282a2(mdo 'grel): kyis rab tu gsung/ /rgya mtsho nya mid mid pa yang/ /sems can 'joms las chags bral te/ /bkres pa'i me rnon gyis nyon cing/ /skad cig gis ni srong zad thob/ /dring mi bzod yid 'byung dang/ /bcas pa'i klu ni stobs ldan gyis/ /de yi ro ni mi gtsang
282a3(mdo 'grel): ba/ /chu gter dag gi dogs su 'phangs/ /dus kyi rus pa skam bo yi/ /rang bzhin lus te chus bkrus pa/ /ri bo brtsegs pa kha ba yi/ /phung pos bsgribs pa bzhin du mdzes/ /de nas mnyan yod bram ze ni/ /su man tu yi bu nyid gyur/ /ma la bkres
282a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i sdug bsngal tshor/ /mi bzang mngal gnas de yis byas/ /skyes tshe bkres pa bud med ni/ /brgya yi 'o mas tshim ma gyur/ /dal gyis bskyed bsrings tshe na de/ /zas tshogs shin tu mang bas kyang/ /ma chim mchog tu yid byung ba/ /de ni dge slong
282a5(mdo 'grel): tshogs song nas/ /rab tu byung ba nye bar blangs/ /bsod snyoms dag gis tshim ma gyur/ /de nas cher bkres grags ba de/ /dad pas mgron gnyer dge 'dun gyi/ /rgya che mchod ston de dang des/ /gang du yang ni tshim ma gyur/ /skabs der khyim bdag
282a6(mdo 'grel): dbal dang ldan/ /sbyin ba'i brtul zhugs zhes brjod pa/ /dad pa yis ni dge slong rnams/ /mgron du gnyer slad nye bar 'ongs/ /dge 'dun gzhan du gsol ba la/ /gshegs tshe mang za de nyid ni/ /gcig bu de yis yang dag thog /de la zas ni rab tu
282a7(mdo 'grel): phul/ /skyes bu rab tu mang ba'i zas/ /skad cig gis ni de zos tshe/ /mdza' dag dge 'dun mchod ston ni/ /khyim gyi bdag pos de la byin/ /ya mtshan byed po de yis ni/ /zan gyi phung po chos pa'i tshe/ /khyim gyi bdag pho 'jigs pa yis/ /'byung
282b1(mdo 'grel): por brtags te yang dag bsams/ /kye ma rab gzhon chung ngu yi/ /zas can 'di ni bdag gis thob/ /gang zhig gcig pus dge 'dun gyi/ /mchod ston dag ni ma lus zos/ /ji srid gnod sbyin 'di yis ni/ /zhar la bdag kyang ma zos pa/ /de srid 'di la yon
282b2(mdo 'grel): byin nas/ /bdag ni mgyogs par 'gro bar bya/ /zhes bsams dogs dang bcas pa des/ /de la yon ni rab phul nas/ /phyi nas 'ong ba la skrag pas/ /phyir mig rnam bar blta zhing song/ /phyi nas de yi spyod tshul kun/ /de yis bcom ldan la bshad de/ /'di ni gnod
282b3(mdo 'grel): sbyin srin po 'am/ /ci zhes bde gshegs mngon du dris/ /bcom ldan gyis kyang der gsungs pa/ /gnod sbyin 'di ma ni srin po min/ /dge slong chos sred ces bya ba/ /'di ni dgra bcom nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas ston pa rang nyid kyis/ /chos sred mkha' la khrid nas
282b4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /de la 'jigs su rung ba yi/ /rang gi lus dag rab tu bstan/ /'khor ba shin tu 'jigs rung ba/ /de yi mdza' ni mthong gyur nas/ /chos sred skyo nas rgyal ba la/ /'di ci zhes pa rab tu dris/ /cung zad 'dzum dkar bzhin ras can/ /thams cad mkhyen pas der
282b5(mdo 'grel): gsungs pa/ /'jigs su rung ba'i lus 'di ni/ /skam zhing rags pa rus pa'i gzeg /chos sred rab tu zhi ba bsten/ /dngos por yongs su 'dzin pa thong/ /rgyab kyi tshigs rus lcags sgrogs can/ /rags pa 'di ni khyod kyi'o/ /bde gshegs kyis gsungS
282b6(mdo 'grel): de thos nas/ /rang gi lus la rtog byed cing/ /chos sred srid par 'khyam ba la/ /mchog tu skyo ba nyid du gyur/ /de bsams kye ma rmongs pa yi/ /lam la rab tu bgrod pa'i 'gron/ /mi rnams skad cig bsten pa yi/ /lus la rang gi nyid du chags/ /lus ni rab
282b7(mdo 'grel): nyams srin bu'i tshogs kyis rkang ni bug par byas gyur cing/ /dbyibs bral rus ba'i dkar ba rab gsal so yi phreng ba 'jigs rung 'di/ /'jig ba'i rang bzhin sgyu ma la chags mi rnams dag gi sred 'phel zhing/ /chags bcas yul gyi nyams myong sa
283a1(mdo 'grel): gzhi gnod pa dang bcas de dag go /de ltar rang gi lus mthong nas/ /chags bral yang dag skye ba de/ /rgyal bas blangs nas nam mkha' las/ /slar yang rgyal byed tshal du song/ /der ni de la bcom ldan gyis/ /brtse bas bstan
283a2(mdo 'grel): mdzad gang gis ni/ /rgyun dang lhan cig phyir mi 'ong/ /rim pas dgra bcom nyid thob gyur/ /nyon mongs kun las rnam grol des/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyag 'tshal te/ /sngon gyi skye ba'i tshogs dan nas/ /bzhin dan nas/ /bzhin ni 'dzum pa dang bcas so/ /de nas nam zhig
283a3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das/ /kun mkhyen dgyes pas dge slong gi /tshogs dang nye bar 'ongs pa yi/ /'ching ba bcad pa de la gsungs/ /chos sred nyon mongs lam dag ni/ /yangs ba'i dus na yun ring gi/ shin tu ches kyang yun ring ba// yun ring las kyang yun ring ba/ /
283a4(mdo 'grel): yun ring rgyu bas bsags pa yi/ /pha rol med pa'i kun nyon mongs/ /bar med de yis chos sred khyod/ /mi dam lam ci cung zhig smros/ /thams cad mkhyen pas dam pa yi/ /mdun du chos sred la 'di dris/ /sngon tshe dran pa ster ba yi/ /bcom ldan 'das
283a5(mdo 'grel): la des gsol pa/ /bcom ldan re zhig nyon mongs lam/ /yangs pa'i dus la yun ring gi/ shin tu ches kyang yun ring ba/ /yun ring las kyang yun ring bar// rnam pa sna tshogs rab lci'i bur bu mngal gyi mal stan dri mas mtshan/ /lus kyi ? ma'i
283a6(mdo 'grel): tshogs ni shin tu yun ring bzung nas ngal zhing 'khyams/ /sdug bsngal can rnams gdung la snying rje'i gnyen khyod rab tu thob gyur nas/ /sgrib ba kun dang bral ba'i ngal bsos 'di ni kye ma bdag gis thob/ /de ltar der ni chos sred dang/ /rgyal
283a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i gtam gyis mjug tu ni/ /mtshar nas tshul de dge slong gis/ /dris shing de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /sngon gyi bskal par grong khyer ni/ /dge ba can dus yi bdag/ dge ba zhes la bcom ldan 'das/ /bde gshegs dge mdzad ces
283b1(mdo 'grel): pa byung/ /de yi dus na khyim bdag ni/ /chos kyi dang tshul zhes pa byung/ /rgya mtshor bgrod ba'i rin chen gyis/ /rnam thos sras dang mtshungs pa thob/ /de nas dus kyis de bzhin gshegs/ /gzi brjid dpag tu med pa da/ /'gro ba kun gyi don mdzad nas/ /myang 'das dbyings
283b2(mdo 'grel): su bzhugs pa na/ /de dang bral ba'i mes gdungs pa'i/ /khyim bdag chos kyi dang tshul ni/ /gus pas bcom ldan 'das de yi/ /mchod rten byed pa la brtson gyur/ /bdag nyid chen po de yi ni/ /nor bu gser tshogs mchod rten rtsom/ /rgyal ba'i bstan pa la sngar ba'i//
283b3(mdo 'grel): bram ze yis ni rnam par bzlog/ /bram ze chos kyi bgegs rnams kyi/ spyod tshul de yis rgyal la bshad/ /de yis byin ba'i dpa' bo ni/ /'gog byed zlog bar byed pa thob/ /ming gis stong thub ces bya ba/ /rgyal po'i dba' bo mkhas ba des/ /bram ze rnams la rab bsdigS
283b4(mdo 'grel): nas/ /chang bas skrag pas phyir phyogs byas/ /de nas bgegs bral byin bdag gis/ /gser gyi mchod rten nor bu dpag? mu tig dag gis spras pa dag/ smon lam dag ni rab bsgrubs pa/ /bdag ni dge ba 'di dag gis/ /sems can yang dag sgrol la chags
283b5(mdo 'grel): bla med yang dag rdzogs byang chub/ /bdud rtsi bran pa thob gyur cing/ /res brjod de dag thos gyur nas/ /stong thub gus dang bcas pas bdag /khyod kyi nyan thos nyid gyur cig /ces pa smras te smon lam btab/ /chos kyi dang tshul ye shes kyis/ /spyan ni
283b6(mdo 'grel): thob pas de la smras/ /sdig pa rab tu mang ba khyod/ /tshogs chen dag gis nyan thos gyur/ /bskal pa mang po song ba'i tsha/ /yangs pa'i dus la sdig zad nas/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ni thos pa na/ /khyod kyis dge ba thob bar 'gyur/ /khyim bdag chas? kyi
283b7(mdo 'grel): dang tshul der/ /de yi tshe na da nyid gyur/ /gang zhig stong thub du gyur te/ /yun ring lon nas chos sred 'di/ /gnyis pa'i bskal par grong khyer ni/ /mar me can dus yi bdag/ par mo zhes la bcom ldan 'das/ /ston pa mar me mdzad ces gyur ? nam zhig 
284a1(mdo 'grel): dka' thub nags dgyes de/ /rang gi grong khyer 'jug ba'i slad/ /sa bdag de yis gus pa yis/ /phyin nas rang gis rab tu zhus/ /mi bdag gus pa de la ni/ /mnyes gshin rab tu dang ba yis/ /bde bar gshegs pas byas?
284a2(mdo 'grel): blangs tshe/ /bkod pa'i tshogs ni rab tu bshams/ /ka sha'i grong khyer dag tu ni/ /sa bdag nor lha'i bu zhes ba'i/ /grogs la bcom ldan ltos shig ces/ /rgyal po de yis pho nya springs/ /skabs der rgyal po nor lha'i bus/ /mchod sbyin lo ni
284a3(mdo 'grel): bcu gnyis pa/ /chog bzhin du rdzogs pa na/ yon lnga dag gis brtag pa byas/ /sa bdag de la lhas smras pa/ /khyod cag bram ze gnyis 'ong 'gyur/ /blo gros bzang dang blo gros so/ /de las dang po la sbyin 'os/ /de nas kha ton mthar phyin te//
284a4(mdo 'grel): bla ma'i yon ni don gnyer ba'i/ khram ze de dags bdag gi /mchod sbyin zhing du yang dag 'ongs/ /sa skyong nor lha'i bu yis kyang/ /de yi ming thob gus pa yis/ /blo gros bzang la mchod sbyin gyi/ /mjug tu yon lnga dga' bas phul/ /khri stan rin
284a5(mdo 'grel): chen bzhi rang bzhin/ /gser gyi dbyug pa ril ba dang/ /rin chen gser gyi snod dang ni/ /gser ni brgya phrag lnga dgag /rang gi bu mo rgyan gyis brgyan/ /mi bdag ster bar brtson pa na/ /blo gros bzang gis tshangs spyod ni/ /brjod cing bu mo yod
284a6(mdo 'grel): ma blangs/ /mdzes ma zhes pa bu mo nges/ /gser gyi 'od can de mthong nas/ /mngon 'dod ldan pas ngo tsha ni/ /rab tu btang nas zhu bar byas/ /de nas de yis phyir bzlog tshe/ /bu mo tshangs spyod ldan ma de/ /chags zal gnyen las phyir phyogs te/
284a7(mdo 'grel): ? me can gyi grong khyer song/ /der ni rgyan gyi rin chen rnams/ /rim pa yis ni 'tshong byed cing/ /rin gyis nyos ba'i me tog gis/ /de yis rtag tu lha mchod byas/ /blo gros bzang gis yin thob pa/ /bzhed pa bla ma la phul nas/ /de yi
284b1(mdo 'grel): chung mas bstan pa yi/ /gser gyi lhag ma rang gis bsrung?/ /de nyid kyi ni mtshan mo la/ /de yis rmi lam bcu mthong ste/ /bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'thung ba dang/ /nam mkha' la ni 'gro ba dang/ /nyi zla mthong dang rgyal po dang/ /thub pa'i tshogs dang shing rta dang/ /glang chen
284b2(mdo 'grel): dkar dang dang? pa dang/ /de bzhin seng ge ri la 'dzeg/ de nas de ni rab sad de/ /thub chen mngon shes lnga ldan pa/ /lo ma gsol ba'i tshal du ni/ /rmi lam 'bras bu nyan du song/ /de yis dris la des smras pa/ /khyod kyi rmi lam 'bras bu rgyas/ /mar me can gyi grong
284b3(mdo 'grel): gnas pa/ /bcom ldan rgyal ba nyid kyis mkhyen/ /de thos myur bar blo gros bzang/ /rmi lam lung bstan 'dod pa yis/ /mtshan? ni blo gros dang 'grogs te/ /grong khyer mar me can du song/ /skabs der rgyal po mar me yis/ /bcom ldan nang du byon pa yi/ /dga' 
284b4(mdo 'grel): ston che la grong khyer de/ /rin chen dang ni gos kyis spras/ /de yi mchod pa'i me tog tshogs/ /der ni sa bdag gis bsgrubs che/ /nyo tshong dag gis gnas su ni/ /nges phar me tog mthong ma gyur/ /de nas bu mo mdzes ma des/ /me tog rnyed dka' gyur
284b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i che/ /mchod pa 'chad ba'i sdug bsngal gyis/ /gzir bas phreng ba mkhan la zhus/ /de nas blo bzang bsod nams mthus/ /'dam skyes med ba'i rdzing bu ni/ /'ga' zhig du yang de dus na/ /padmo dag ni 'khrungs par gyur/ /de dag rgyal po'i 'jigs
284b6(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /spas nas sred ldan phreng mkhan gyis/ /de la byin zhing de yis kyang/ /bum chu'i nang bcug mgyogs par song/ /blo gros bzang po rab mchod slang/ /me tog don gnyer yongs 'khyims pas/ /padmo rgyas pa'i bzhin ras can/ /mdzes ma
284b7(mdo 'grel): dag ni lam du mthong/ /de nas de yi bsod nams mthus/ /srog dang bcas pa dag gis bzhin/ /bum pa'i nang na rab bsgribs ba'i?/ /padmo rnams kyis bzhin dag bstan/ /me tog don du gnyer ba des/ /gser gyis de la bslangs pa na/ /sred ldan ma yis
285a1(mdo 'grel): yongs shes nas/ /'dzum bcas de la rab smras pa/ /khyod gyis bdag ni sngon btang nas/ /da lta me tog slong bar byed/ /dam pa tshangs spyod bu mo la/ /phebs par smra ba rigs ma yin/ /khyod la me tog rab phyin pas/ /skye ba gzhan du chung
285a2(mdo 'grel): mar bdag/ gyur cig cas pa'i smon lam gyis/ /'di dag ster gyi gzhan du min/ /de ltar gyur ces? des brjod tshe/ /pad+ma lnga ni de la byin/ /rang yang mchod phyir de yis ni/ /padmo gnyis dag rab tu bzung/ /de nas sa bdag mar me dang/ /sa bdag nor lha'i bu dag
285a3(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /bcom ldan legs bar byon pa can/ /gus pas mngon du 'ongs par gyur/ /de nas mar me de yis gdugs/ /rin chen thur mas mtshan pa bzung/ /nor 'dzin bdag po nor lha'i bus/ /zla ba ltar dkar rda yab bo/ /lha dang grub ba drang srong dang/ /dri zas
285a4(mdo 'grel): mchod de grong khyer du/ /rab tu zhugs tshe sems can kun/ /kun tu bde ba'i dga' ston rgyas/ /skye bo'i tshogs ni stug po la/ /rgyal ba lta bar 'dod pa yi/ /blo gros bzang gi de mthu las/ /ji zhig ltar stes lam thob gyur/ /ston pa'i zhabs la pad+ma dag/ /rab tu
285a5(mdo 'grel): 'phangs nas thal sbyar te/ /kun dga' can des ral pa'i khur/ /sa la bkram nas der phyag 'tshal/ /de yi dus na yangs pa yi// legs byas bzhin du padmo rnams/ /de mdun zhal gyi zla ba'i mthar/ /mchod pa yang dag rgyu ba thob/ /bcom ldan bdun du dang
285a6(mdo 'grel): ba yis// mdzes mas gus par rab gtor ba'i/ /pad+ma rgyas ba ? dag ni/ /snyan gyi rgyan nyid dag tu gyur/ /blo bzang rab tu btung ba yi/ /ral pa'i tshogs ni bde gshegs kyis/ /zhabs kyis mnan pas lhung gyur cing/ /de bzhin gzhan ni rab tu
285a7(mdo 'grel): 'khrungs/ /de ni bya ba byas gyur cing/ /mkha' la 'gro ba thob pa ni/ /'jig rten thams cad nyan pa la/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ /bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub thob nas blo bzang khyod/ /'jig rten du ni de bzhin gshegs//
285b1(mdo 'grel): shAkya thub ces bya bar 'gyur/ /zhes pa rgyal bas rab gsungs shing/ /mkha' la me tog char lhung tshe/ /mchod rten rab tu gnas ba'i slad/ /blon po kun gyis ral pa slangs/ /sa la mched kyi ral pa ni/ /bcom ldan zhabs kyis mnan mthong nas/ /nyan pa nyid
285b2(mdo 'grel): du mngon khongs pas/ /blo gros khro bas 'khrugs par gyur/ /de yi rnam 'gyur rmongs pa las/ /skyes pa blo gros bzang pos bzlog/ /de nyid dang ni lhan cig tu/ /ston pa'i mdun du rab byung blangs/ /de nas dus kyis lus kyi mthar/ /blo gros bzang gis lha yi
285b3(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /dga' ldan zhes pa thob gyur te/ /blo gros dag ni dmyal bar song/ /de lta blo bzang de nyid do/ /blo gros blo gros rnams bslang pas/ /nyams par gyur pa chos sred 'di/ /mdzes ma de ni grags 'dzin ma'o/ /gsum ba'i bskal bar bcom ldan 'das/ /de
285b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes gter/ /'dzam bu'i gling du mngon byung gyur/ /de yi dus na 'phags rgyal du/ /tshong ba tsan dan byin zhes pa/ /nor chen ? tshongs dag gis ni/ /rab tu grags pa byung bar gyur/ /de yi chung ma 'dod pa'i
285b5(mdo 'grel): stobs/ zhes la myos byed ltar mdzes bu/ /rtas byin zhes ni bya ba dag /lus bzhin du ni dga' ba byung// khyim lugs chung ma la bkod nas/ /nor don gnyer de rgyu mtshor song/ /lan tshwa yid bzhin nor can? rnams/ /nor dag gis ni sred pa 'phel/ /de yi chung ma khyo
285b6(mdo 'grel): song tshe/ /lang chos myos shing rmongs pa yi/ /khyim gyi bsam pa yongs btang nas/ /'dod ba'i bsam gtan la chags gyur/ /de yis nor gyi las la ni/ /gzhan nu rtas byin de bkod nas/ /rtag tu khang bzang ba gam du/ /gnas nga rgyal po'i lam la bltas//
285b7(mdo 'grel): g.yog 'khor mang po'i khyim du ni/ /rang dbang gnas skabs bral ba des/ /shugs rings phyung nas ma ma ni/ /rgan ma dag la mngon phyogs smras/ /khyim ni 'byor zhing longs spyod mang/ /skye bo bka' la nyan pa 'dir/ /rang dbang spyod pas dman pa yis//
286a1(mdo 'grel): ma ma bdag la dga' ba med/ /skyes ba'i longs spyod med pa na/ /bud med dga' ba bsten ba ni/ /dbang gis ma yin bkur stis min/ /rgyan gyis ma yin zas gyis min/ /de slad khyim ni yongs btang nas/ /bdag ni 'dun pas rgyu
286a2(mdo 'grel): zhing 'gro gzhon skyes bu ni 'di la yang/ /bdag ni chags ba'i dbang ma gyur/ /rigs kyi 'jug dogs kyis bcings shing/ /gnyen gyi 'ching bas bsdams pa dag/ bud med dga' ba'i dang tshul can/ /g.yo ldan dag gis bzod ma yin/ /zhes smros
286a3(mdo 'grel): de la ma ma ni/ shin tu mdza' bas 'khrugs pas smras/ /mnyes gshin shin tu yangs pa'i dpal/ /btang nas 'gro ba rigs ma yin/ /bya ba mang po'i khyim 'dir ni/ /sbas pa'i spyod ba mi sbyar te/ /gsang ba'i spyod pa skad cig gis/ /rgyal po yin lam
286a4(mdo 'grel): du rgyug/ /lang tsho tsha bas rab gdungs pa/ /khyod kyis spyod pa ji ltar bsrung/ /khyim gyi gter yang rkang pa yis/ /rab spangs khyod kyis ji ltar 'gro/ /'di nas 'dod pa'i dug 'bebs shing/ /'di nas skad cig g.yang la lhung/ /gnyis ka the tshom 'di
286a5(mdo 'grel): la ni/ /khyod kyis ci bya yod ma shes/ /g.yo zhing dge mtshan ldan pa rnams/ /ji srid gos ni ma nor bar/ /de srid srog gi zod gis kyang/ /gzhan gyi bud? med don du gnyer/ /'og lag gos nas drangs ba na/ /mam? ma zhes 'dra? byed cing/ /bdag 'gro thong
286a6(mdo 'grel): zhig thong zhig ces/ /sgra sgrogs de nas su zhig 'dong/ /rnam pa kun tu bya ba byas/ /skye bos gos med mthong nas ni/ /lag pa'i gzer kyis bsdams pa yis/ /ne tso tshul bzhin 'khros par byed/ /mun par dga' ba'i tshom rkun dang/ /skad cig phyed ni bde ba ?
286a7(mdo 'grel): 'grogs/ /phyi nas snang bar ba spangs pa'i/ /'jig rten pha rol dag tu 'grogs/ /bzhin smad ngo tsha'i sdug bsngal can/ /'bras med nyams shing dman pa de/ /tshul khrims rin chen lam ngan du/ /stor bar gyur par tshol ba bzhin/ /dri med tshul khrims
286b1(mdo 'grel): do shal? 'dod ba'i dal dub kyis chang cing/ /mu tig 'bras bu sa gzhi yongs su khengs par byed pa bzhin/ /mi dman chags bral du brtags mchi ma'i thigs pa rags pa yis/ /nyes spyod smrad pa rab tu spros pa de ni bu? bar byed/ /byis ba'i 'dzam bu
286b2(mdo 'grel): bsil zer can ltar mdzes pa la yang rab tu sems byed cing/ /pad+ma'i stan ltar lus ni mchog tu zum zhing 'phral la rab tu nyams gyur te// khyim gyi nang du phan tshun gtam rnams phyir ni rang gi gtam du thos gyur ba// 'phyon ma rnams kyi yid na rtsi yi
286b3(mdo 'grel): 'dab ma bskyod pa la yang dogs par 'gyur/ /gzugs kyi dregs pas gzhon nu ma// khyo yi khyim las phyi rol 'thon/ /yongs rtogs rnams kyis bsod nams kyi/ /gnas la yongs brtags phyi nas 'dor/ /de slad khyim na gnsa pa khyod/ /ji ltar
286b4(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dang 'grogs shing/ /'jig rten dag gis mi shes pa/ /de ltar rig pa dag gis brjod/ /khyod kyi gzhon nu rtas byin 'di/ /cung zad lang tsho dag la ni/ /skye bos dogs bya min pa'i slad/ /mchog tu bde ba longs spyod 'os/ /rnam ba 'di lta'i bzhin
286b5(mdo 'grel): bzang dang/ /mdzes sdug can ni ga las rnyed/ /gal te'i zhig rab bsgrubs na// 'di ni gnod med rnam pa yin/ /zhes pa ma ma'i tshig thos nas/ /de yis kyang ni rigs par bsams/ /chags pa drag po'i rnam pa yis/ /long bas sdig lhung mthong ma
286b6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de nas ma mas dal bu yis/ /bud med longs spyod bde bsdags pas/ /bsgrubs shing bsgrubs nas gzhon nu'i yid/ /yul la mngon par phyogs par byas/ /rtag tu 'dod pa rab spros nas/ /de la de yis rab smras pa/ /bu khyod la 'os 'ga' zhig
286b7(mdo 'grel): ni/ /bdag po yul gzhan song ba yod/ /bang stong sgron ma med par ni/ /mtshan mo mi smra la brten te// shin tu ngo cha ldan ma de/ /khyo dang yang dag 'grogs par 'dod/ /ces pa de yi tshig thos nas/ /mngon par 'dod ldan tshong ba'i bus/ /rtag tu spras ba'i
287a1(mdo 'grel): khyim du ni/ /ma dang dga' mgur 'grogs ba bsten/ /rtag tu rab bsgribs khyim du ni/ /dga' mgur spyad pa sten byed pa/ /de la chags pa'i me dag ni/ /rab tu 'phel zhing zhi bar gyur/ /de yis bsams pa rtag tu ni/ /rab tu bsgribs pa'i
287a2(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal 'di/ /mi bsod gzugs kyi longs spyod la/ /snang ba nyid ni 'tsho ba la/ /phan tshun bzhin gyi chu skyes la/ /rnam par lta ba'i ro bral ba'i/ 'o yis dga' mgur spyod pa la/ /bde ba'i dga' ston dga' yod min/ /de bsgribs pa yi nyon mongs
287a3(mdo 'grel): ni/ rab tu 'bad? pas rtsom byas te/ /'phral la longs spyod gzhon nu ma/ /gsal bar bdag gis bstan par bya/ /zhes pa mtshan mo? rab bsams te/ /rab bsal lus des gso dag ni/ /yongs su rje ba'i rigs pa yis/ /nang bar de ya rab gsal byung//
287a4(mdo 'grel): de yis rang gi ma mthong nas/ /rtsa ba bcad pa'i ljon pa bzhin/ /sdig pa'i dug ni 'bebs pa yis/ /dbang dang bral bur byas te lhung/ /de yis bsil ba'i chus bran te/ /dal gyis 'du shes thob pa des/ /rgya che g.yang sar 'khyams pa la/ /sdug
287a5(mdo 'grel): bsngal gyur bzhin ser? sdags phyung //dmyal bar lhud ba'i pho nya mo/ /'dod pas rmongs ma de yis ni/ /smin ma'i 'khri shing gzengs bstod nas/ /lag pas yongs la khyud de la smras/ /khyod kyi mya ngan bzod dka' 'di/ /gnas ma ni rdzun pa dag la ci//
287a6(mdo 'grel): bud med chos kyis bsdams pa rnams/ /mi bden khyod kyis mi shes sam/ /khyod kyis sdug bsngal yod ma bskyed/ /su yi yang ni nor ma phrags/ /thun mong bde ba'i longs spyod 'dir/ /khyod la sdig pa'i bag cah+gs ci/ /g.yo ldan bsdams ba
287a7(mdo 'grel): med pa yi/ /chu klung bud med thun mong nyid/ /gang la pha yis khrus byas der/ /bu ni khrus byed min ni ma ci/ /lam gang nas ni pha song ba/ /de nyid nas ni bu yang 'gro/ bud med brgya lam dag dang mtshungs/ /thun mong pa yi bgrong bya nyid/ /bud med gcig
287b1(mdo 'grel): gi spyad bya nyid/ /gzhan dang gzhan gyi mi 'os pa/ 'di ni 'ga' zhig phrag dog dang/ /ldan pas dam tshig byas ba tsam/ /dam bya'i don du dga' mgu'i slad/ bgrod par mi bya 'ga' yang med/ pha dang bu yi snod gcig bzhin/ /bud med nye bar langs spyad bya/
287b2(mdo 'grel): zhes nyid yis 'bad pa yis/ /longs spyod la de mngon phyogs byas/ /'dod chags skyes pas rtog par yang/ /phyugs bzhin du ni ma nyid bstan/ /de nas dus kyis dag ni/ /chu gter che las slar 'ong ba/ ma yis bskul 'dir gsang nas/ dug gis srog dang
287b3(mdo 'grel): bral bar byas/ /de nas chags pa 'phel ba yis// ma bsdams bde ba tshol ba des/ /mdza' bas rmongs pa'i gzhon nu la/ /mdza' byas dal gyis rab smras pa/ /ma bsdams bde ba thob pa'i slang/ /snying po'i nor dag blangs byas la/ /tshed ma spangs pa'i/
287b4(mdo 'grel): yul gzhan du/ /yu cag re zhig 'gro bar bya/ /zhes pa de tshig yun ring gi/ dus su 'dod pa thob gyur nas/ /nor gyi snying bo blangs byas te/ /de ni der 'grogs nas song/ /yul gzhan dag tu gnas byas te/ /sdig pas rab bsgribs de dag ni/ /chung ma
287b5(mdo 'grel): khyo bo nyid du grags/ /mchog tu bde/ /thob par gyur/ /de nas nam zhig khyim der ni/ /rang gi yul bar mngon shes pas/ /yongs dris dge slong mngon phyogs te/ /mnyes gshin las ni de la smras/ /khyod kyi ma ni dge 'am ci/ /skyes btang la yang yang du/
287b6(mdo 'grel): bsams pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems/ /'gyod gdung med par gyur tam ci/ /zhes pa dge slong tshig thos nas/ /rngo ba yi ni bsnan pa bzhin/ /'dri shes dag gis 'jigs pa des/ /rigs pa de de rab bsams pa/ /gros byed 'jig pas 'khrugs pa
287b7(mdo 'grel): des/ /ma dang lhan cig ma gros byas nas/ /dge slong de ni mgron gnyer te/ /ma bsdams mtshon gyis khyim du bsang/ /dge slong dgra bcom bsang la yang/ /de yang yis kyang 'dar ma yin/ /gtum bo rnams ni sdig pa yis/ /rdo rje las lhag sla? bar
288a1(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /ngos med g.yang sar chos kyi ri rtse yi/ /steng nas kha ni thur bltas lhung gyur cing/ /'khrul mang bya skyibs brgya yis bsnan pa rnams/ /des par brgyud ma dag tu lhung bar 'gyur/ /bu dang rol par byed mod kyang/ /longs
288a2(mdo 'grel): spyod dag la chags pa des/ /mdzes pa zhes bya tshod pa'i bu/ /mthong nas de la chags ldan gyur/ /dga' mgur spyad pa yongs 'dres goms pas longs spyod dag ni mchog tu 'phel/ /nor ni rab 'phel dar bas chags ba stug po ci yang sten bar
288a3(mdo 'grel): byed/ /lan tshwa'i chu dag 'thungs pas shin tu mi bzad sred pa skye bar 'gyur// chu ni rgya che mi lces myangs pas rtag dong me ni rab tu 'bar/ /'dod ldan gsang pa de dang ni/ /chags ldan ma de gsang 'grogs ba/ /rtas byin gyis mthong khros ba yis/ /ngal
288a4(mdo 'grel): gri dag gis ma nyid bsad/ /mtshams med gsum gyi sdig khur gyis/ /de ni lci ba nyid du gyur/ skye bo lha yis bskul rnams kyis/ /myur du grong khyer dag las phyung/ /'gyod pa drag po skyes pa des/ /song nas dge slong tshogs mngal/ /sdug bsngal
288a5(mdo 'grel): las ni rab byung zhus/ /gang tshe sdig can la ma byin/ /de tshe de yi zhe sdang gis/ /dge slong tshogs nyal mtshan mo bsregs/ /de la brtse bas brlan pa'i blo// dge slong byang chub sems dpa' che// gcig gis de tshe bslab ba'i gnas/ /spangs pa'i
288a6(mdo 'grel): rab tu byung ba byin/ /rab tu 'bad cing nan tan gyis/ /bslab pa'i gnas ni zhu byed pa/ /de la dge slong gis smras khyod/ /bslab gnas 'dzin par yong mi 'os/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes pa 'di nyid rtag tu brjod/ /rgyal ba'i
288a7(mdo 'grel): mtshan ni thos nyid kyis/ /dus kyi mthar ni khyod grol 'gyur/ /de nas rtas byin lus kyi mthar/ /'jigs su rung ba'i dmyal bar zhugs/ gang mdun rab tu nyam nga? ba'i/ /grang pa 'jig pa'i mi ldan pa/ /de nyid chos sred yun ring gi/ yun ring las zhes 
288b1(mdo 'grel): bdag gis dris// zhes pa brjod nas bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bzhugs/ /dba' rlabs ltar g.yo me yi rlung tshub dag la dogs pa med par rab tu 'khyud/ /dar ba thong nas pha ni gzi byin gter de snang ba min pa dag tu bkod //dgra
288b2(mdo 'grel): bcom gnas ni rab tu gsal ba'i 'byor ba mi bzad rim pas bcom/ /du ba shin tu dri ma can gyis mchog tu nyes byas ci dang ci ma byas/ /zhes pa dga' ba'i dbang bos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las chos
288b3(mdo 'grel): sred kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //yid ni dge ba'i sgrub byed can/ /sbyin pa shin tu chung ngu yis/ /snying stobs can la phun tshogs ni/ /brtag pas bgom pa bya mi 'gyur/ /bri dzi'i yangs pa can du sngon/ /spre'u'i
288b4(mdo 'grel): rdzing zhes bya ba'i 'gram/ /khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyim gnas na/ /bcom ldan rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /yon tan mdza' dag ldan pa las/ /skyes bu mchog nyid du gyur pa/ /khyim bdag dpal gyis bskor ba ni/ /nor can zhes pa byung bar
288b5(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /de yi chung ? chos kyi grogs/ /dang tshul can zhes bya bar gyur/ /bu ni gtong pod can zhes dang/ /de bzhin man lam bden ldan ma'o/ /yangs pa can pa'i brem ze rnams/ /tshogs nas der ni nges par byas/ /thams cad tshogs nas bcom ldan 'das
288b6(mdo 'grel): mgron du gnyer bya gzhan du min/ /nor gyi rgyags pas gcig gis ni/ /gal te rgyal ba mgon gnyer byed/ /gzhan gyi chos kyi bgegs byed la/ /de ni kun gyis dbyung bar bya/ /de dag nges pa yang shes nas/ /nor can ma chag gi phun tshogs ldan/ /bsod nams
288b7(mdo 'grel): ldan ? rang nyid kyis/ /song nas rgyal ba mgron gnyer byas/ /bcom ldan rang gi dge 'dun dang/ /lhan cig khyim du gshegs bar na// zhal gyis bzhes tshe gus ldan de/ /dga' bas rang gi khyim du song/ /der ni de yis lha la 'os/ /mchog gi 'byor
289a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshogs rnams kyis//rin chen stan dang yo byad dang/ /zas kyi sa gzhi bstang ba byas/ /skabs der? gnyis skyes thams cad ni/ /'dus nas yo byad tshogs bsgrubs pas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung song nas/ /de nas de la bcom
289a2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das/ /rab dang dri med bsam pas gsungs/ /sngon du dge 'dun dang bcas nga/ /nor can gyis ni mgron du gnyer/ /de dag thos nas bcom ldan 'das/ /mchod pa sngon gyi nyin par la/ /rab tu rtog cing de dag rnams/ /rang gi khyim du song ba'i tshe/ /nor
289a3(mdo 'grel): can khang par bcom ldan 'das/ /dge slong rnams dang bcas byon nas/ /lha yi rmang byung phun sum tshogs/ /mchod ston rab tu bzhes pa mdzad/ de yi chud mas nyin gzhan yang/ /de mtshungs yangs pa'i dpal gyis ni/ /mchog gi longs spyod
289a4(mdo 'grel): tshogs rnams kyis/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas/ /gsum pa'i nyin la de yi bus/ /bzhi par mna' mas rgyal ba ni/ /ngo mtshar 'byor pa'i longs spyod kyi/ /nyer sbyar rnams kyis mgron du gnyer/ /yangs pa can pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/
289a5(mdo 'grel): ston pa mchod pa'i skabs ma thob/ nor can la ni rab khros te/ /gnas nas dbyung ba'i rtsom pa byas/ /de nas bde bar? gshegs pa'i bkas/ /gnyis skyes de dag rnams la ni/ /bdag gis ma shes zhes brjod nas/ /nor can gyis ni dad bar byas
289a6(mdo 'grel): de nas nor can chung mar bcas/ /bu dang bcas shing mna' mar bcas/ /ston pas chos ni bstan pa yis/ /bden pa mthong ba thob par gyur/ /de dag ston byung bsod nams ni/ /'byor pa chen po rgya che bas/ /dge slong gis dris bcom ldan 'das//
289a7(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pas der gsungs pa/ /ba ra NA sir sngon byung ba/ /pad+ma zhes bya phreng rgyud mkhan/ /mu ges nyen pa'i dus su ni/ /mchog tu dbul ba nyid du gyur/ /chung ma yal 'dab can zhes dang/ /bu ni utpal zhes ba dang/ /mna' ma pa ta la zheS
289b1(mdo 'grel): pa/ 'di dag de yi tshogs par gyur/ /nam zhig de dag khyim dang nye/ /me tog dga' tshal rab mdzes shing/ /tshim pa dag tu nyin mo'i mthar/ /rang sangs rgyas ni bzhugs par gyur/ /de dag kun gyis mi bdag gi /gnas su gos gcig ri mos kyis/ /me
289b2(mdo 'grel): tog phul nas 'ongs pa yis/ /'od kyi rang bzhin de mthong gyur/ /gzi brjid gter de mthong gyur nas/ /snga dro de la mchod 'dod pas/ /gshog pa bcad pa'i bya bzhin du/ /de dag nor med gdung ba thob/ /bdag cag gzhi la 'dog pa kun/ /gos ni gcig
289b3(mdo 'grel): nyid kho na yod/ /mchod 'os 'di yi lus kyi mchog/ de nyid kyis ni g.yog par bya/ /de ring gcer bur rgyal po yi/ /'khor du mi 'gro ci 'byung 'gyur/ /zhes pa'i dam tshig de dag gis/ /byas nas gos kyis de la mchod/ /de yi bsod nams smon lam
289b4(mdo 'grel): gyis/ /phreng rgyud mkhan de nor can 'di/ /chung ma bu dang mna' mar ldan/ /lha mthu phun sum tshogs par gyur/ /ces pa tshogs su kun mkhyen gyis/ /bshad pa thos nas dge slong rnams/ /sems ni dri med rtsa ba dag/ sbyin ba'i 'bras bu'i dpal du
289b5(mdo 'grel): sems/ /de nas bram ze de dag rnams/ /kun tshogs gtsang ba'i zas dag gis/ /bcom ldan 'das ni yang dag mchod/ /dge ba rab tu 'bar bar gyur/ /dman byin rin chen nor ni rtswa yi rtse/ /dad pas byin pa'i rtsa lad rin thang med/ /mdzes pa du ma'i
289b6(mdo 'grel): nyams myong nor min te/ /dge ba 'byung ba'i rgyu ni sems nyid do/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /nor can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab? ste? dgu
289b7(mdo 'grel): bcu pa'o// //snang ba med pa'i gnas rnams dag tu sgron ma bzhin/ /legs par bshad pa bden pa'i lam ni gsal bar byed/ /de nyid phyir na rtag tu nye bar 'kho ba las/ /bdag nyid che rnams dben pa spyod la yid du 'ong/ /gang tshe?
290a1(mdo 'grel): gyang? kyi skye ba'i gnas/ /ku sha'i grong du bcom ldan 'das /dge ba tshol bas dge slong tshogs/ /dgra bcom gnas la bkod gyur pa/ /de tshe phan tshun snyan par chos/ /smra byed dge slong rnams dag gi/ /legs bshad bde bar gshegs
290a2(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /dgyes pa dang ldan rang gis gsan/ /de yi legs bshad la bcags pa/ de mthong dge slong rnams kyis ni/ /de la gsol ba kun mkhyen nyid/ /ded kyi tshig la ji ltar dgyes/ /dge slong tshogs kyis de brjod tshe/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ /
290a3(mdo 'grel): bdag ni skye ba gzhan du yang/ /legs bshad ngag la mchog tu dga' / /grong khyer zhi ldan ngag tu sdom mi dbang shi gi? zhes bya ba/ 'byung po kun la brtse ba yi/ /yid 'ong gnyen du gyur pa byung/ /de yis bsod nams dkar gnas pa'i/ /mi yis mtho ris kun gang
290a4(mdo 'grel): ba/ /mthong na sa de yi snying stobs ni/ /rtag tu mchod sbyin brgya ba 'ongs/ /de ni rin chen khang bzang rtsed/ /'jogs pa'i mi bdag can song nas/ /'jigs rung srin po'i gzugs bsgrub ste/ /de yi mdun du mngon phyogs smras/ /'du byed mi rtag shin tu g.yo ba'i glog rab
290a5(mdo 'grel): mdzes pa dag dang mtshungs/ /rab tu skyes shing 'jig ma ba'i yongs su 'gyur ba dag la chags/ /zhes pa'i legs bshad byed brjod nas/ /srin po de ni mi smra gyur// sa yi bdag pos thal sbyar nas/ /phyag 'tshal de la rab smras pa/ /dge ba legs
290a6(mdo 'grel): par bshad pa'i phyed/ /yid bde lhag ma gsung bar mdzod/ /byang chub yan lag gyur skad de/ /slob mar gyur nas bdag nyan no/ /dul bas de smra mi bdag la/ /srin po yis ni rab smras pa/ /rgyal dbang slob ma 'bras bu med/ /khyed kyis bdag la ci zhig bya
290a7(mdo 'grel): skom pas bdag ni yongs nyen cing/ /dgros pas dgu? ni yongs su nyams/ /rgyal po bdag ni bla ma yi/ /zhes 'ba' zhig 'di mi 'dod/ /bkres skom dag gis gzir gyur pa/ /gang zhig cung zad bdag smra'o/ /lhag ma brjod par yong mi nus/ /bdag
290b1(mdo 'grel): la sdug bsngal ma mdzad cig/ snyan pa'i gdangs ldan do ni 'os pa can/ /legs par bshad pa rab tu rgyas gyur pa/ /tshim la bde ba ster byed 'di dag ni/ /nges par bkres dang skom pa za byed min/ /thos dang glu dang snyan pa gsang la bas yongs 'dris dge mtshan
290b2(mdo 'grel): sgrub byed dang/ /nor bu shes dang 'byung po gdon nad dug dang smyo ba zhi byed dnag /sa 'dzin bsten dang chu gter sgrol bar byed dang gser 'gyur dag dna rtsis/ /'di dag ma lus mthar thug 'bras bu mi rnams dag gi bza' ba yin/ /'phral la bcad pa'i sha dang ni/ /khrag?
290b3(mdo 'grel): dag bdag ni tshim byed pa/ /'tsho med sdom pas bcings gyur la/ /khyod las shin tu rnyed pa dka' / /khyod dang nye bar bdag ci byed/ /'ga' zhig la ni slong du 'gro/ /zas dang gnas ni mtshungs pa yi/ /rtsed ma dang ni gtam dag mdzes/ /zhes des brjod tshe mi bdag ni/ /gus dang
290b4(mdo 'grel): bcas pas de la smras/ /rang gi lus ni rab bcad pa'i/ /khrag bcas sha ni khyod la sbyin/ /rgya che blo gros ldan pa khyod/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung dang pa'i sgo?/ /khyod kyi legs bshad myang 'das kyi/ /grong khyer gyi ni las gyi? mchog rgyal po zla bas 'di brjod tshe/ /
