290b5(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo rgyu bas de la smras/ /blo gros bzang po myur du nyon/ /dam bcas pa dag sbyin par mdzod/ 'du byed mi rtag shin tu g.yo ba'i blog rab mdzes bdag dang mtshungs/ /rab tu skyes shing? 'jig? pa'i yongs? su 'gyur bdag la chags/ /des bskyed
290b6(mdo 'grel): 'khor zhing yongs su sgyur bas srog chags dag ni dbang bral zhing/ /ngal dub ldan pa rnams la nye? 'gog pas gal gso ster bar byed/ /de dag thos nas mi bdag ni/ /dga' mgu? mig dag rab rgyas bas/ /rang? gi lus ni bcad ba'i sha/ khrag dang bcas pa
290b7(mdo 'grel): de la byin/ /rang sha bcad ced bcang cing ni// steng bar byed pas bdag gi /snying stobs rnam 'gyur med pa yis/ /mtshan mo rgyu ba ya mtshan gyur/ /de yis lus ni thams cad las/ /sha bdag? la 'byin nas/ /sems can thams cad sprol? ba? la/ /smon lam
291a1(mdo 'grel): mi yi bdag pos byas/ /de nas de la bcugs pa las/ /'der 'jig srin po'i gzugs kyis smras/ /khyod kyis gnad ni bcad pa la/ /gdung bas mi dga' bskyed dam ci/ /skabs gsum rgyal pos dris pa na/ /rgyal po'i
291a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal pos der smras pa/ /lus kyis gzhan la phan pa dag /byas la bdag ni mi dga' med/ /gal te gdung bdag la bdag rnam 'gyur med na bden pa des/ /bdag gi lus 'di sngon gzugs bzhin/ /rma med ba sos ba nyid gyur cig /ces smras sa yi bdag
291a3(mdo 'grel): po yi/ /bden pa'i tshogs ni brjod pa las/ /'phral nyid lus ni sngon gyi gzugs/ /rma dang bral ba nyid du gyur/ /mkha' la rgyu bas me tog char/ /yangs pas de na g.yogs byas shing/ /lha yi dbang pos srin pos gzugs/ /yongs su btang nas
291a4(mdo 'grel): rab tu bsngags/ /brgya byin snying stobs mthong ba yis/ /mi bdag la ni dang byas so/ /de yi legs bshad bdud rtsi yi/ /nyams myong sa yi bdag pos bsams/ /nga nyid sngon gyi skye ba la/ /mi dbang shi pi der gyur te/ /de ltar srog gi zong gis bdag /
291a5(mdo 'grel): legs bshad la ni dga' bar gyur/ /rang gi skye ba gzhan gyi gtam/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dag/ thos nas ya mtshan ldan pa yi/ /dge slong kun gyis rab tu bsngags/ /mthong dang ma mthong bde la lam ni legs bshad kyis gsal
291a6(mdo 'grel): sgron ma lta bur spyod/ /legs bshad bdud rtsi'i ro ni nyams myong ldan pas mchog tu dga' ba'i char dag 'bebs/ /legs bshad don gnyer yul la gnyer bya kun mkhyen dag kyang don gnyer nyid du 'gyur/ /de slad dam pa rnams la legs
291a7(mdo 'grel): bshad dang mtshungs dga' ba ci yang yod ma yin/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ shi ba'i legs bshad kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu
291b1(mdo 'grel): rtsa gcig pa'o// //bla ma rnams kyi mdun dag tu yang shin tu bla ma'i gnas su che/ /'byung po rnams ni 'dzin byed mdza' dag ro? yi snying po rab tu bskrun/ /lus ni mdza' gcugs bzhin du rgyas byed skabs gsum chu bo gtsang ma'i lus/ /ma de nyid
291b2(mdo 'grel): ni rtag tu ma las? pas mchod pa bya yin gyi nor 'dzin min/ /mnyan yod dag gi rgyal byed tshal/ /dga' bar rgyal bas rgya tsho'i chos/ /rab tu bstan nas mdor bsdus pa/ /slar yang dge slong tshogs la gsungs/ /pha ma mchog tu tshangs pa ste/ /g.yo ba'i
291b3(mdo 'grel): bsod nams dag gi grogs/ /gang zhig de mchod chos ldan pa'i/ /rigs de bsngags par 'os pa yin/ /'jig ten gsum na bde mtshungs dka' thub med/ /'tshe med mtshungs pa'i chos ni gang na'ang med/ /bla ma lci ba pha las gzhan yod min/ /lha yi
291b4(mdo 'grel): mchog ni ma las gzhan pa min/ /gang zhig lhag par gus pa rab rgyas pas/ bla ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma zung mi sten/ /de dag mchog tu chur sred 'ba' zhig gis/ /'jug ngogs kun tu song yang 'bras bu med/ /bde bas bsten bya phyi rol mi phyogs rtag tu bzod
291b5(mdo 'grel): pa 'dzin/ /drag po'i brtul zhugs la sogs nges par gdung ba ster mi byed/ /gus pa'i rim gro chung ngu la yang mi chung 'bras bu ster/ /pha dang ma dang mnyam pa'i bla ma gsum pa yod pa min/ /legs byas don ston byed bas slob dpon rtag tu su yis mngon
291b6(mdo 'grel): par dga' mi bya/ /srog rnam skye byed bla ma rnams kyi bla ma pha ni ji ltar mchod mi bya/ /de bas kyang ni mchog tu skad cig mngal gyi khur bzung ma yi ngal dub la/ /bu lon dag pa sgrub byed bsod nams tshogs ni ci yis dag pa thob par 'gyur/ /dben pa
291b7(mdo 'grel): ma smin sdig ba'i tshig gi yang dag thob gyur pa/ /gang gis ma la smod pa'i tsha yang nges par sgrub byed pa/ /sdig ba'i btul zhugs de yi skye bor ral pa'i tshogs dag ni/ /rab 'bar mi yi dra ba'i rtse mo'i tshogs pa dag tu 'gyur/ /skye ba gzhan
292a1(mdo 'grel): du ma la ni/ /smod par byed pa bdag gis kyang/ /sdig dmod rang bzhin mi 'dod pa/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i gdung ba thob/ /ba ra NA si dag tu sngon/ /khyim bdag mdza' bo zhes pa byung/ /de yi chud ma nor 'dzin ma/ /zhes pa shin tu yid 'ong
292a2(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /de yi pu rnams skyas tsam la/ /lnga ba nyid ni thob pa'i tshe/ /na tshod mdza' ru bu dag ni/ /dpal dang ldan pa gcig btsas gyur/ /de yang 'chi bas 'jigs pa yi/ /pha yis bu mo zhes par btags/ /de yis mdza' bo'i bu mo zhes/ /byis pa de ni grags
292a3(mdo 'grel): par gyur/ /de yi pa ni rgya mtsho ru/ /song zhing shi bar gyur ba'i tshe/ /bu gcig ba nyid ma yis ni/ /gter dang mtshungs pa dag tu bsrungs/ /rigs kyi rim pas 'ongs pa yi/ /gling du 'gro ba bzlog nas des/ /de la 'tsho thabs rang yul du/ /'os pa
292a4(mdo 'grel): chung ngu 'tsho ba bstan/ /dang por tshong las skyes pa ni/ /karSha pa Na bzhi dag dang/ /de nas nyi ma gzhan la ni/ /de las nyis 'gyur bzhi 'gyur dang/ /de nas brgyad 'gyur dag kyang rnyed/ /thams cad de yis ma la phul/ /de nas gling bgrod rigs la ni//
292a5(mdo 'grel): 'os par thos nas 'dod ldan gyur/ /rgya mtshor 'gro ba rtsam pa yi/ /tshogs la chags shing gus ldan de/ /ma yis bzlog par gyur mod kyang/ /ldog pa nyid du khas ma blangs/ /de nas ma ni mya ngan gyis/ /'khrugs shing rkang pa la 'gyal bas/ /gdug?
292a6(mdo 'grel): pa de yis dpal bzhin du/ /rkang pas rab tu spangs nas song/ /dang por byis pa 'khrul cing yi ge byed brjod yid 'ong bdud rtsi'i char dag 'bebs/ /de nas ngul bas yod la re ba'i dga' ston rgyas pa brgya yis dga' ba 'dzin/ /phyi nas mi
292a7(mdo 'grel): bzad lang tsho tsha ba drag pos brlad po dag tu smra byed mkhas/ /gsal bar nags bo brtsegs pa ltar rtsub ngan pa'i bu yis sdug bsngal gdung bar byed/ /rin chen sgrub par 'dod pa de/ /ma yi mya ngan yangs bar bzhin/ /rgya mtsho'i drung du
292b1(mdo 'grel): phyin nas ni/ /gzigs la rab tu zhen te song/ /de nas de yi gzings chen ni/ /rab rnon chu srin sen mo yi/ /sogs la drag pos dral bar byas/ /'jug dogs dag tu zhig par gyur/ /blo gros rab 'phyar de yis ni/ /ma yi bsam btsom bur lci bas/ /gzings ni
292b2(mdo 'grel): zhig par gyur pa des/ /dmod pa bzhin du rmongs pa thob/ /de nas shing gi tshal ba thab/ /dal gyis 'du shes theb ba des/ /chu gter gyis ni ngogs byin nas/ /nags tshal chen po'i nang du zhugs/ /gcig pu bstan nyams 'gro ba des/ /skye bo med sar yun
292b3(mdo 'grel): ring na/ /grong khyer rtse dga' can zhes ba/ /dga' ba mchog ni thob par gyur/ /bzhin ras zla zer tshogs rnams kyis/ /zla ba'i 'od ni spro byed pa/ /lha yi bu mo bzhi dag gis/ /gus bcas mgron ni byas pa de/ /gsar gyi rdzing bu dag gi 'gram/ /rin chen 'bri
292b4(mdo 'grel): shing dga' ba'i tshal/ /nor bu'i khang ba khri stan can/ /der ni longs spyod ldan par gyur/ /rgud pa dag ni bde ba'i mdza' / /phun tshogs nyon mongs dag la mdza' / /lus can rnams la re mos kyis/ /nges pa nyid du 'khod ba yin/ /dga' mgur spyod pa la
292b5(mdo 'grel): chags pa'i/ /ri dags mig can de dag rnams/ /de dang rol bas yun ring du/ /skal bzang don byas nyid dag thob/ /khyod kyis grong khyer lho? yi? lan/ /bdag nyid kun gyis sbrang? bya zhes/ /de dag gis brjod tshe nad?/ /lhag par de ni 'gro 'dod gyur/ /
292b6(mdo 'grel): rang dbang mngon par mi 'dod cing/ /nges par bsngams pa'i mi mthun phyogs/ /srog chags rnams na bkag? ba la/ /thal cher gus pa lhag par 'phel/ /de nas dge mtshan gyis drangs te/ /lho yi phyogs kyi lam de nas/ /song bas rtag tu myong
292b7(mdo 'grel): zhes ba/ /lha yi grong khyer gzhan pa thob/ /de rni da bzhin lha mo brgyad/ /spyad bya nying du gyur rnams kyis/ /de la rim gro'i bkod pa dag/ de las lhag ba yun ling byas/ /de dag rnams kyis rim ba nges/ /lha yi yam ni bgag ba na/ /de ni dge mtshan las
293a1(mdo 'grel): song bas/ /grong khyer gsum ba dga' byed thob/ /der ni rim pa de nyid kyis/ /rtse dags rnam par rol de la/ /lha mo bcu drug dga' mgu yi/ /longs spyod spyad bya nyid du gyur/ /de dag gis kyang bkag ba yi/ /lho yi lam nas song gyur
293a2(mdo 'grel): ?/ /gus bcas de yis khang bzang ni/ /tshangs pa'i mchog ces bya bar phyin/ /de nas deng yang lha mo gzhan/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis longs spyod kyis/ /skal bzang gis ni yang dag thog /de bzhin lho yi lam nas song/ /de ni song bas mi srung pa'o/ /grogS
293a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin nyon mongs tshogs kyi gnas/ /lcags kyi rang bzhin rtsub po yi/ /grong khyer ngan 'gro mang ba thob/ /der de nang du?  zhugs pa na/ /rim pas sa la sgo rnams ni/ /su zhig dag gis bsgribs pa bzhin/ /mtshams med bsdams pa nyid du gyur/ /de
293a4(mdo 'grel): yi nang na skyes bu ni/ /lus chen gnas pa de yis mthong/ /mdza' dag nyon mongs skyon rnams kyi/ /snod ni shin tu che ba bzhin/ /bcings shing rgyan tu khrag rgyan 'bab/ /de yi spyi bor 'khor lo ni/ /rnon po 'bang bas dkrigs pa dag /yongs su 'khor
293a5(mdo 'grel): ba mthong bar gyur/ /rang gi mgo las zags pa yi/ /rnag khrag gis ni zas sgrub pa/ /de mthong drag pos yi de byung nas/ /mdza' bo'i bu mos rab smras pa/ /gdung ba drag pos non khyod su/ /'di ni las dag ci yi 'bras/ /zhes nges snying rjes jis
293a6(mdo 'grel): ba na/ /skyes bu de la rab smras ba/ /bdag gi mal gnod byed do/ /'di ni las de nyid kyi 'bras/ /de dag thos nas de yang ni/ /sdig pa dran nas ngogs par gyur/ /nga yis bsams pa bdag la yang/ /ma la gnod byas sdig pa yid/ /sdig pa rab
293a7(mdo 'grel): tu brjod pa'i grogs/ /dran par byed 'di bdag gis mthong/ /khyir ba yis rtswa sngon gyi/ /nags nas ri dags rgyu ba bzhin/ /sdig des bde ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /nga nyid drangs pa ma yin nam/ /zhes ba'i bsam pas de 'khrungs shing/ /sgo?
293b1(mdo 'grel): bsdams sngon nas gnas pa'i tshe/ /snying ni kun tu ? byed pa'i/ /skad ni mkha' las rab grags pa/ /yul rings? bcings pa nges par khrol/ /gsar du 'ongs pa dam du chings/ /gsang ba bcings la bcings pa 'grol/ /'di ni mtshams kyi dus la ba/ /ces
293b2(mdo 'grel): sgra mkha' las grags pa'i tshe/ /skyes bu de grol skad cig las/ /mdza' thob bu mo'i mgo la ni/ /'khor lo rab tu 'bar? ba lhung/ /de dus gnod gcod gdung bas gzing/ /gsar bcings mdza' mo'i bu mo nges/ /bcings pa grol bar gyur ba yi/ /skyes bu de la dab
293b3(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ /lha mo rjes su chags ldan longs spyod yid ni 'phrog pa can/ /grong khyer nor bu'i khang khyim mdzes pa de dag yongs btang nas/ /sdig pa'i las kyi thag pa shin tu rab tu gyur bas drangs/ /khyim rnams la bzhin sa 'di nyid du phyugs bdag 'ongs
293b4(mdo 'grel): bar gyur/ /gang na 'di yi las kyi 'khri shing cha yis yongs bsgrubs pa/ /dus kyis yongs smin spyad bya nyid du gyur pa mdun na gnas/ /des bar spang bya stobs ldan 'di yis mchog tu 'gugs par byed/ /de yis bkug nas kyang ni dbang med mi rnams 'jug
293b5(mdo 'grel): par byed/ /ma la gnod pa byas rnams kyi/ /nyon mongs sbyong mtshams ji snyed dus/ /skye bo kha cig bdag lta bu/ /gsar du 'ong par 'gyur ram ci/ /zhes ba lus can 'khor lo ni/ /rab tu 'bad ba'i rtses bcom zhing/ /gzir ba de yi tshig thos nas/ /skyes bus
293b6(mdo 'grel): de la rab smras pa/ /lon stong phrag drug cu dang/ /lo ni brgya phrag drug cu dang/ /nyon mongs nye bar longs spyod 'di/ /sdig pa'i las can rnams la nges/ /ma la gnod pa byas pa yi/ /sdig can rnams la 'di na gnas/ /'jigs su rung ba bzhan dag ?  /gzhan yang
293b7(mdo 'grel): de lta 'ong bar 'gyur/ /nges brjod shin tu bzod dka' de/ /mdza' ba'i bu mos thos gyur nas/ /rab gdung sdug bsngal myong pa las/ /gzhan dag gzir la brtse bas smras/ /da ni sdig pa byed pa'i mi/ /gang gis rab tu 'od 'gyur ba/ /de dag? don du 'khor? lo 'di/ /
294a1(mdo 'grel): bdag gi mgo la gnas gyur cig /'di lta'i gdung ba drag cing ring/ /de dag rnams kyis ji ltar bzod/ /bdag nyid gcig pu gdung gyur la/ /thams cad gdung med gnas gyur cig /'khor lo rang gi 'bras bcad nas/ /gzhan gyi don
294a2(mdo 'grel): du bdag gis bzung/ /skye bo rang nyid gdung med pas/ /gzhan gyi gdung pa yod mi shes/ /sems can phan tshel snying rje yis/ /gzir bde yis 'di brjod tshe/ /dam pa'i kun rtog mthu yis ni/ /de yi 'khor lo mkha' la song/ /yal 'dab dag ni gdung pa 'phrog cing
294a3(mdo 'grel): me tog grags snyan dkar po rgyas par byed/ /'bral la dri bzang legs ldan longs spyod skal bzang phun sum tshogs pa slar yang 'dzin/ /dam pa'i kun rtog 'khri shing snying rje'i brlan ldan dam pa rnams kyi snying la ni/ /gang tshe yang dag btab pa de tshe ro ldan
294a4(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu ci dang cis ming skyed/ /snying rje'i bsod nams bdag nyid kyis/ /skad cig de la sdig zad de/ /lus ni yongs su btang nas de/ /lha yi gnas su ltar gyur to/ /nga nyid sngon che byams bdag nyid/ /mdza' bo'i bu mo nyid gyur te/ ma ni rkang pa rab 'phangs
294a5(mdo 'grel): pas/ sdug bsngal gnas skabs de dag thob/ /karSha pa Na sa ma la ni/ /mchod pas lha mo'i gnas kyang thob/ /de skad ma yi srid zhu ni/ /chos kyi mchog tu bcom ldan gsung/ /ma ni bkra shis phreng ba yon tan dang ldan pha ni gnyes gshin ced pan te/ /de
294a6(mdo 'grel): dag dgyes slad gang gi spyi bor zhabs kyi padmo rab tu 'gong byed pa/ /phyogs kun yongs su 'gengs par brtson pa'i grags pa phun tshogs rab tu gsal ba rgyas/ /rtag tu dga' ston bsod nams rgyan ldan de dag 'gro ba'i mchod bya nyid du 'gyur/ /
294a7(mdo 'grel): zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las mdza' po'i bu mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dang ste dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //gang gis mchod 'os mchod par sgrub? la
294b1(mdo 'grel): me tog la sogs te/ /sems med rnams kyang 'os ba'i sems dang ldan pa nyid du gyur/ /rgyal ba gus pa'i khyad par bsten pa rnams la bsngags 'os shing/ /dad pa rab rgyas bdud rtsi'i rgyun thigs de dag rgyal gyur cig /mnyan mong rgyal byed tshal du sngon/ /dben par
294b2(mdo 'grel): bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /rgyal ba de la mngon phyogs te/ /mgon med zas sbyin gyis gsol pa/ /bcom ldan khyod kyi gus pa bzhin/ /kun du cher 'os yon tan grags/ /bdag gi bu mo ma ga d+ha/ /bzang mo dar la bab par gyur/ /grong khyer bu ram shing 'phel
294b3(mdo 'grel): gyi/ /dpal ldan don mthun mgon po'i bu/ /khyu mchog byin zhes bya ba ni/ /de yi lag pa 'dzin par 'dod/ /bcom ldan gal te bzod na bdag /bu mo de ni de la ster/ /nor srog khyod kyi dbang gyur bdag/ khyod kyi bka' yi rjes su 'brang/ /deng 'di gsol tshe bcom
294b4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das/ /dri med mnyes gshin bsam ldan pas/ /ci skyon bu mo de la ni/ /sbyin pas mdzod ces bka' stsal to/ /ston pa'i bka' ni rab bzung nas/ /de la gus pas phyag 'tshal te/ /dpal ldan mgon med zas sbyin ni/ /rang gi khang par rab tu song/ /de nas
294b5(mdo 'grel): 'byor ba che dang bcas/ /bu mo ma ga d+ha bzang mo/ /rin chen gos mang rab ster des/ /'os pa de la rab tu byin/ /de nas byin pa'i ma ga d+ha/ /bzang mo thag ring yul bgrod cing/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs dran nas/ /mig ni mchi ma dang bcas gyur/ /grong khyer bu
294b6(mdo 'grel): ram shing 'phel du/ /yun ring zhig na des sleb nas/ /rtag tu khro yi khyim du ni/ /bdag po'i bkur sti la chags gyur/ /de nas nam zhig sgyug mo ni/ /grangs las 'das ba 'god brtson zhing/ /zas kyi tshogs rnams stor byed pa/ /nor can zhes bas de la smras//
294b7(mdo 'grel): ma ga d+ha bzang mchod pa yi/ /yo byad thams cad chas ngag mdzod/ /'gro bas mchod bya yon tan can/ /skye bo mang bar bdag khyim 'ong/ /bla ma skye bo thams cad kyis/ zhes sa'i gnas su mchod bya ba/ /kun rmongs zad sbyor zad byed pa/ /de dag rnams ni 'ong bar
295a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /zhes nges brjod pa de ni der/ /dge slong tshogs la mchod pa des/ /yongs su rtag par shes gyur nas/ /rdzom? pa de la chags par gyur ming nas nyin gzhan khyim du ni/ /skra dang smra ba rab 'dul zhing/ /bka' thub drag pos kun nyon
295a2(mdo 'grel): mongs/ /gcer bu zad byed pa rnams zhugs/ /ma he sran ma rtswa yi zas/ /goms pas rags par gyur pa bzhin/ /gos med ngo tsha med de dag /ma ga da bzang gis mthong nas/ /bla ma'i drung du ngo tsha ste/ /bzhin ni gos kyis rab bsgribs ns/ /skyo? dang chags bral?
295a3(mdo 'grel): gyis dud pas/ /sgyug mo'i skye bo la smras pa/ /gang 'dir phyogs gos rnams kyi yang/ /mdun du bud med skye bo 'khor// kye ma kun tu spyod pa 'di// shin tu yun ring lon nas mthong/ /mi min rwa dang bral gyur pa/ /dul ba 'di dag khyed kyi ni /khyim nas
295a4(mdo 'grel): gsol byed 'di dag la/ /bud med ngo tsha med dam ci/ /gang gis kha zas ma btang ba/ /de yis gos ni ji ltar gtong/ /ma bsdams rim pa 'di ni ci/ /khyed ni gnas min dag la gus/ /skra ni rab tu 'bal ba'i las dag nyid kyi brtse ba med pa drag po bstan
295a5(mdo 'grel): skye bos bcas las mdoms dkris gos dag spangs pas tshul khrims kyi ni gtam nyid ci/ /tshul 'chos rtsom pa dang lan 'jigs byed bzhin la khro ba rang nyid rnam par bsten/ /dul ba dang ldan gcer bu 'di dag phyugs rnams bzhin du zas rnams
295a6(mdo 'grel): chol? bar byed/ /gang na phyugs 'di mchod bya ba/ /de na spang bar bya ba su/ /yang na 'di ni yul gyi skyon/ /song ba'i rjes su 'gro ba'i lugs/ /zhes smos chags bral dang ldan na/ /de la sgyug mos lan smros pa/ /bzang mo khyod kyi yab kyi ni/ /bde par
295a7(mdo 'grel): ji 'dra mchod pa smros/ /nges smras bdag gis? khyim du/ /snying rjes 'gro ba thams cad ni/ /khyad 'phags dge ba la sbyor ba'i/ /bcom ldan rgyal pod? mchod par byed/ /bsam gtan la chags g.yo? ? ldan mdzes sdug rdzogs pa'i rgya mtsho ste?
295b1(mdo 'grel): shangs kyi rgyud ni yangs shing drang po zam stegs dag tu gyur pa 'dzin/ /rab brkyang mdzes ldan rgyan gyis stong pa'i snyan gyi zhags pa mngon dga' de/ /mdzes pa nyid kyis mkhas rnams nang du shi pa ci yang rgyas par byed/ /zla zer ltar mdzes de ni lag gnyis
295b2(mdo 'grel): glang chen lag pa'i rnam pa dang/ /snang pa rab rgyas dbus la lhan skyes rab bskrus rang bzhin nor bu dang/ /lag mthil du son ri mo dung dang rgyal mtshan chu skyes phreng ba ste/ /zhi ba'i rang bzhin rgyal srid chen po la 'os mtshan nyid rnam par 'dzin/ /thab chen
295b3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skyed byed de yi ni/ /rang bzhin mngon par 'dod pa'i rtag pa kun dang bral ba nyid/ /dran pa'i sa zhi bag med gnas ni lhag ma med par byas/ /chags ba rab tu btang ba'i mchu ni shin tu dmar dang bcas/ /grol ba
295b4(mdo 'grel): lhag par 'grogs pa'i mdza' gcugs dang ldan byams pa dag ni yid la nyal// bzod pa de yi rang bzhin byed cing brtse ba snying la dam du mnyam par sbyor/ /yid 'ong mang po la chags kun gyi bsam pa rgyas byed sron med thub pa ni/ /de yi zhi ba
295b5(mdo 'grel): sngon med bdag nyid chags bral snying po can ni legs par mtshon/ /tshul khrims du gu la dang ldan/ /dam pa rnams yid sgrib bral nyid/ /gang gi rab tu byung ? 'dzin/ /de dag bdag cag khyim du mchod/ /thams cad bsrung ba'i nor bu gang/ /dran pa
295b6(mdo 'grel): yis kyang srid pa'i sprul?/ /chags sdang drag po'i mche ldan pas/ /slar yang skye bo la gnod med/ ces pa de chig rna ba yi/ /bcud len thos nas sgyug mo ni/ /'phral la rab dang dri ma med/ /dga' mgu ldan pas nga la smras/ /de ni lnga ba'i thabs 'ga' 
295b7(mdo 'grel): zhig/ mchog gi bzhin ldan yod dam ci/ /khyod kyi bsod nams 'brel pa las/ /nged kyang bdud rtsi'i gnas 'thob pa 'am/ /zhes pa sgyug mos gus ldan blos/ /tshul dang mthun par de la zhus/ /bdag gis khyed la de bstan zhes/ /gus dang bkur pa
296a1(mdo 'grel): ldan mas smras/ /dam bca' chen po'i tshogs kyi ni/ /khur dag khyer bar 'dod pa yis/ /srod la mal stan srad la 'dzegs/ /skad cig bsam gtan bskyangs par gyur/ /de nas khang bzang la 'dzegs te/ /bcom ldan ston pa'i
296a2(mdo 'grel): phyogs su ni/ /phyag 'tshal mchod bya mchod 'os ba'i/ /me tog snyim pa rab tu gtor/ de yi gnas su mngon phyegs nges/ /me tog bdug pa chus mchod nas/ /yangs pa'i mig ni kun dga' yis/ /mchi mas bgags bas rab smras pa/ /bcam ldan
296a3(mdo 'grel): thugs rje 'os pa bdag /dkon mchog gsum po rnams spangs te/ /khyed kyi gnas kyi ri dags bzhin/ /shin tu thag ring yul 'dir phyin/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma zung gi skyabs ni thob pa bdag /ring du gnas par gyur kyang spyan gyis rig mdzod
296a4(mdo 'grel): brtse ba can/ /mnyes gshin mnyen pa'i blo ldan chen po rnams kyi thugs rje ni/ /yul gzhan ring phor phyin pa rnams la chung ba nyid mi 'gyur/ /'bangs kyi bu mo bdag gi dang/ /bcom ldan khyod ni mgron du gnyer/ /nang par byon pas bdag la ni//
296a5(mdo 'grel): khyab bdag khengs pa gnang bar mdzod/ /ces pa brjod nas des 'phangs pa/ /rnam par bkra ba'i me tog phreng/ /gus pa'i pho nya srog bcas bzhin/ /nam mkha' las ni rab tu song/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser? dang sngon po dag gi me tog phreng/ /
296a6(mdo 'grel): bdug pa'i du bas bkra bdal gyis mkha' la 'gro ba de/ /bde sogs bdag po'i gzhu yi 'khri shing yang dag rgyu ba ni/ /chu 'dzin gzhon nu ngag la rab tu chags bzhin yun ring mdzes/ /de nas rgyal byed tshal song nas/ /skad cig gis ni me
296a7(mdo 'grel): tog phreng/ /gus pa dag dang ldan pa de/ /sten pa'i zhabs pad dag la lhung/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas kyang/ /ma ga d+ha ni bzang mo yi/ /'dod pa kun mkhyen thugs rje yis/ /kun dga' ba la mngon du gsungs/ /grong khyer bu ram shing
296b1(mdo 'grel): 'phel du/ /nang par bdag cag 'gro bar bya/ /ma ga d+ha bzang dge 'dun dang/ /bcas pa'i bdag mchod don du gnyer/ /'di nas grong de dpag tshad ni/ /drug cu lhag pa'i brgya phrag ste/ /nyi ma phyed gis 'gro bar bya/ /'di la thogs 'phor rigs pa min/ gang gang rdzu 'phrul
296b2(mdo 'grel): chen po yis/ /mkha' la 'gro nus mthu ldan pa/ /de dang de la khyod kyi ni/ /mgron du gnyer ba'i tshul shing byin/ /ces ba bde gshegs kyis bskul des/ /nyin phyed bgrod pas phyin pa dang/ /tshul shing gis ni mgron gnyer pa/ /dge slong rnams la rab tu bshad/ /rdzu
296b3(mdo 'grel): 'phrul tshe ldan thams cad kyis/ /nges mi tshul shing blangs pa'i tshe/ /gang po bum par sngas bya ba/ /rgan po yis kyang rim par blangs/ /mthu ni thob pa min pa des/ /tshul shing dag la lag brkyang tshe/ /cung zad 'dzum dkar bzhin ras can/ /kun dga' bo yis de la smras/
296b4(mdo 'grel): mgon med zas sbyin khyim du ni/ /rkang pa nyid kyis 'gro bya min/ /dpag tshad drug cu dang bcas brgya/ /nyin phyed kyis ni zla bar bya/ /zhes ba des brjod rgan po ni/ /skyengs pas bzhin ras rnam par dul bsams te rang gi sde bdan du/ /dman pa'i dngos po bzod pa
296b5(mdo 'grel): dka' / /thogs med dus su bsags pa yi/ /nyon mongs skye dang dga' ba sogs/ /'bad pa can gyis gzhom nus na/ /rdzu 'phrul gnas ni 'thob la ci/ /chags bral drag po'i blo gros kyis/ /de ltar sems shing dag pa yi/ /sems ldan de la skad cig ? rdzu
296b6(mdo 'grel): 'phrul chen po rab tu skyes/ /de nas mtshan mo 'das gyur te/ /snga dro dge slong thams cad ni/ /sna tshogs lta yi chas ldan pa'i/ /gzhal yas khang nas mkha' la gshegs/ /skabs der rtsom pa chen po yi/ /tsho bas? kyis su gang gyur pa/ /bdag po'i
296b7(mdo 'grel): khyim na bcom ldan 'das/ /lta? 'dod ma ga d+ha bzang ma/ /me tog bdug pa'i mchod pa yi/ /bkod pa 'dzin la mngon phyogs shing/ /sgyug mo gyos po khyo rnams dang/ /lhan cig kha ra bzangs la 'dzegs 'khod/ /de nas rta yi shing ltar gnas/ /dge slong kun
297a1(mdo 'grel): shes kauN+Da n+yi/ /rnam mang ngo mtshar rdzu 'phrul ni/ /mchog ldan dang por rab tu mthong/ /nyi ma dang mtshungs de mthong nas/ /ya mtshan gyos sogs dga' ba yis/ /ma ga d+ha bzang la smras pa/ /bcom ldan zhes pa 'di 'am ci/ /nges smras 'di
297a2(mdo 'grel): ni bcom ldan min/ /dge slong kun shes kauN+Di? n+ya/ /'od zer dman pa min pa 'di/ /nyi ma dag dang mtshungs par mthong/ /de nas rim gyis shing rta yis/ /byon pa'i tshe na gyos sogs kyis/ /bzang mo bcom ldan 'di lam ci/ 'di 'am ci zhes rab tu smras/
297a3(mdo 'grel): nges smras 'di ni ston pa min/ /'di dag de yi bka' la 'os/ /dge slong rab zhi bsdags par 'os/ /dka' thub rab 'bar 'od zer dri med can/ gser ljon mdzes pas dka' ba ri yi ni/ /rtse mo la zhon sngon la byon pa gang/ /ngo mtshar byed pa mthu ni gzugs
297a4(mdo 'grel): can bzhin/ /dpal ldan dge slong 'di ni 'od srungs che/ /chu ldan char sprin zab mo'i 'brug sgra can/ /gdong lnga'i shing rta dag la gnas pa gang/ /mkha' las mngon du byon pa'i dge slong 'di?/ sa la yon tan gyis bsgrags shA ri'i bu gnyis 'thung so
297a5(mdo 'grel): bzhi kai la sha bzhin du/ /rab dkar la zhon mdza' yas mdzes pa gang/ /byon pa'i dge slong 'di ni 'gro rnams na/ /bsod nams ldan mchog maung+gal bu zhes bya/ /gser par? gi DUrya yi yu ba can/ /rin chen mu gu gser gyis mtshan zhon/ phyogs ni dri bzang
297a6(mdo 'grel): gis 'gengs byon pa gang/ /dge slong de nyid ma 'gags pa zhes grags/ /gang gis mkha' sding la zhon gshog rlung gis/ /chu 'dzin rab tu gter ba'i 'chi? med lam?/ /mgyogs pa rgyas pas rnam par gtsong byed dag dge slong 'di ma byams ma'i
297a7(mdo 'grel): du gang po/ /snying stobs chu gter tshig da mchog gi lam/ /shin tu zhil? mdza' med dag la? gnas/ /'od kyi bdud rtsis phyogs chim rab tu spro/ /mthu ldan ? slong 'di ni rta thul lo/ /gser? gyi sA la yang na? ma'i 'khri 'din?/ /? par g.yo bas
297b1(mdo 'grel): dkris pas mngon dga' zhon/ /bsod nams gsal rdzogs mngon par 'ong ba gang/ /dge slong 'di ni blo ldan nye bar 'khor/ /gser dang rin chen rab 'bar pa Ta ris/ /bai DUrya yi gzhal yas khang rtser zhon/ /'od kyi byugs bzhin byon pa gang 'di ni/ /dge
297b2(mdo 'grel): slong kA tyA ya na zhes bya'o/ /gang zhig gzugs dang ldan pa'i chos la bzhin/ /khyu mchog la zhon mkha' la rnam par lding/ /rab gnas yongs su gnas pa rnams kyi mchog /blo brling dge slong 'di ni kauSh+Thi la/ /yang yang dang pa gzhal yas khang 'od
297b3(mdo 'grel): kyis/ /yud tsam bar snang 'dzum rlabs dga' ldan par/ /byed cing dka' thub gter gang byon pa 'di/ /dge slong bi li lin dbang sA zhes brjod/ /me tog rab rgyas 'khri shing rgyas pa yi/ /nags tshal nang na bzhags shing byon pa gang/ mi dman khyim gyi dpal la
297b4(mdo 'grel): bltos med pa'i/ /dge slong 'di ni rna ba bye bar grags/ /gser gyi 'od kyis phyogs cha rnam par rgyan/ /lhun po'i gzugs gzhan bzhin du legs par mtshon/ /'khor los sgyur gang mkha' la mdzes pa 'di/ /ston pa'i sras po sgra gcan 'dzin zhes brjod/ /de nas
297b5(mdo 'grel): ri dang phyogs mtshams rnams dang ni/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor mkha' ngos khongs las kyang/ /rnam bkra rin chen khri dang bzhon par gnas/ /grangs med rmad byung dge slong chogs 'di byon/ /de ltar de yi rim pas bshad gyur pa'i/ /dge slong dge 'dun byad 'phags
297b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin mthong nas/ /gzhan dag mtshon min de dag mtshungs par ni/ /dga' dang rmad byung gus pa'i dbang nyid gyur/ /de nas rab 'bar gser gyi phye ma'i gos/ /nyi ma brgya lta rags? ? 'gro la byung/ /gdung ba'i? byad bar ma lus zhi byed pas/ bsil
297b7(mdo 'grel): zer greng ba brgya ltar bsil ba yang/ /de nas nor bdag brgya byin tshangs sogs blon po rnams kyis ni/ /rgya chen nam mkha' bgrod pa bsten cing rjes su bgrod pa phul/ /'chi med grong gi bu mos me tog tshogs na gtor ba las/ /rgyal ba'i zla ba bsod
298a1(mdo 'grel): nams ldan pa rnams kyi mig lam gyur/ /grong khyer sgo lam bco brgyad ldan pa der/ /mtshungs pa'i sku ni bcu bdun dang bcas pas/ /rab zhugs ma ga d+ha ni bzang mo'i khyim/ /zla shel rin chen rdo yi rang bzhin byas/ /derni lo byed
298a2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa rnam mang gis/ /mngon par mchod cing kun gyis phyag 'tshal te/ /grang pa'i skye bo dag gis kun nas mchod/ /rtsig par gzugs brnyan snang de phyi nas kyang/ /bcom ldan brtse ldan dge 'dun dang bcas pas/ /brtse bas mchod pa blangs nas
298a3(mdo 'grel): rdzas gzung ni/ /gzigs ba'i cha yis ma ga d+ha bzang mo/ /gnyen dang bcas pa rnams la bka' drin bsgrubs/ /ma ga d+ha bzang gyos sogs sde dang bcas/ /grong pa'i skye bo kun dang bcas pa yang/ /de tshe ston pa'i bstan pa dag gis ni/ /de dus bden mthong
298a4(mdo 'grel): bsam pa dag par gyur/ /dge pas rjes 'brel ma ga d+ha bzang gi/ bsod nams mthu ni yangs pa mthong gyur nas/ /dge slong de dag gis der dge mtshan las/ /de yi sngon byung rgyal bdag la dris/ /ma ga d+ha bzang dge ba'i rgyu dag ni/ /tshogs su de dag
298a5(mdo 'grel): gis dris bcom ldan 'das/ /kun gzigs de yis tshems kyi 'od rnams kyis/ /phyogs sgor snang ba sbyin zhing rab gsungs ba/ /ba ra NA si dag tu sngon/ /sa bdag mdzes pa kra ki yi/ /bu mo gser phreng can zhes pa/ /gser phreng sgra dang ldan pa byung//
298a6(mdo 'grel): ston pa 'od srungs zhes pa la/ /rtag tu gus dang ldan ma des/ grogs mo brgya phrag lnga dang ni/ /lhan cig dag tu rim gro bsgrubs/ /nam zhig sa yi bdag po des/ /rnam 'gyur rmi lam mthong ba las/ /'jigs pa'i the tshom ma kun 'khrul pas/ /'bras
298a7(mdo 'grel): bu mkhas pa dag la dris/ /rgyal po'i bu mo la sngar bas/ /mtshan shes de dag gis der smras/ /shin tu mdza' ba dag gi snying/ /mi la bsregs na zhi ba thob/ /ces pa de dag rnams kyi tshig/ /rab gdugs bzung mi bdag ni/ /bu mo'i tshig gis bcom
298b1(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das/ /'od srungs dag la lta ru song/ /de la phyogs te des gsol pa/ /rmi lam mchog tu rnam 'gyur can/ /bdag gi deng mthong de 'bras kun/ /thams cad mkhyen pas gsung bar 'os/ /glang chen rgyu skar nas 'thon pa/ /rnga ma dag la thogs ba dang/ /de bzhin
298b2(mdo 'grel): skom pa'i phyir rjes nas/ /khron pa rgyug pa bdag gis mthong/ /phye ni bre gang dag la yang/ /mu tig bre gang 'tshor ba mthong/ /ngan pa'i shing dang tsan dan ni/ /mnyam pa dag tu byed pa mthong/ /de bzhin g.yul du glang phrug gis/ /glang po chen po yang dag 'bod/ /mi
298b3(mdo 'grel): gtsang ba yis lus byugs pa'i/ /spre'u 'phar zhing gzhan la 'byug/ /spre'u ngan pa g.yo ba'i gter/ /rgyal srid rgyas la mngon dbang bskur/ /ras yug skyes bu bco brgyad kyis/ /drangs kyang kun tu nyams pa med/ /me tog 'bras bu'i dga' tshal ni/ /dga' ba
298b4(mdo 'grel): tshom rkun dag gis dkrugs/ /zhe sdang bzhad gang rtsod pa la/ /skye bo mang po chags pa ste/ /rmad byung rmi lam 'di dag gi/ 'bras bu shin tu 'jigs rung snyams/ /zhes pas bdag gis dris la/ /bcom ldan 'od srung gis gsungs pa/ /skye bo'i tshe lo brgya pa'i
298b5(mdo 'grel): tshe/ /ston pa zhi ba shAkya thub/ /rgyal pa bdud rtsi'i chu gter 'byung/ /de ni khyod kyi glang por mthong/ /de yi nyin thos tha ma yi/ /dus su rtsod pa la brten pas/ /tshul khrims yon tan kun spyod btang/ /bslad pa dang bcas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dag stobs kyis khyim
298b6(mdo 'grel): na gnas/ /dben pa ma smin chung rnams la/ /rang gis bsten pa la brten cing/ /bstan pa dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /gang phyir zhu bya zhu byed kyi/ /dngos pos bsten pa dag la rgyug /de las skom pa'i phyi nas ni/ /khron pa 'gro ba rnam ba'? mthong/ /chags pas long zhing
298b7(mdo 'grel): kun rmongs kyis/ /bcom pa de dag byang chub kyis/ /yan lag mu tig de dag ni/ /phye breg dag la 'tshong bar 'gyur/ /mu stegs tshig ni shing ngan dang/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs tsan dan dag/ rmongs las khyad par mi shes pa/ /de dag gis ni mtshungs
299a1(mdo 'grel): byed 'gyur/ /dul ba'i dge slong glang po che/ /bzang po thob nas 'ga' zhig tu/ /dge slong khrims 'chal glang phrug gis/ /'gran zhing smod pa dbyed par 'gyur/ /g.yo ba mi gtsang gis byugs lus/ /dge slong sbre'us khyim bzang?
299a2(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /rang gi skyon gyis sgo byed cing/ /bdag nyid mtshungs par byed par 'gyur/ /spre'u bzhin du rigs 'khyal ba/ /mngon par dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yi/ /ras yug drangs? bas nyams mi 'gyur/ /dge 'dun rdzas ni
299a3(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu yi/ /dga' tshal dag kyang rku bar 'gyur/ /phan tshun skyon nas rjod byed cing/ /thab mo'i dang tshul dag tu 'gyur/ /khyod kyi rmi lam rnam smin mthar/ /'bras bu 'di dag sa la 'byung/ /zhes pa ston pa'i tshig thos nas/ /sa yi bdag po ya mtshan gyur
299a4(mdo 'grel): de nas ston des mi bdag ni/ /rjes 'brang bcas la chos bstan pa/ /mdzad nas gser phreng can ma la/ /dge ba 'os pa nyid dag bstan/ /skye ba gzhan du mchod rten la/ /nA rang ga yi phreng bas mchod/ /legs byas de yis de nyid ni/ /gseng phreng dag gis
299a5(mdo 'grel): mtshan par skyes/ /ma ga d+ha ni bzang mo 'di/ /de nyid bsod nams mthu chen gyis/ /yang dag dge ba'i zam stegs nyid/ /de ring skye po'i tshogs kyis thob/ /ces gsungs bcom ldan rgyal pa ni/ /dge slong rnams dang bcas pa dag/ mdzes pas phyogs
299a6(mdo 'grel): rnams yongs 'gongs shing/ /mkha' las rgyal byed tshal du gshegs/ /skyes bu rnams kyi rigs mchog 'phel slad stobs ldan bu la chags bas rdzun pa nyid/ /gal te bu la yon tan med nad tshe rings kun nyams pa min nam ci/ /gang gi
299a7(mdo 'grel): bsod nams mthu yis 'khor ba'i chu glang bdag po che la gru bzhin du/ /rigs zung yang dag sgrol byed yon tan ldan pa'i bu mo de dag nges par 'byung/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa brjod pa dpag
299b1(mdo 'grel): bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ ma ga d+ha bzang mo'i? rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// //skal ba nyams pa gcig rab g.yo dpa' rlabs skyed pa yi/ /zab mo'i chu ldan 'gro ba dag tu gdung ba nyid 'dzin cing/ /bsod nams
299b2(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa kha cig mya ngan drag por yongs gdung la/ /lhan skyes chu yi tshogs kyis mi bzang srad pa gtong par byed/ /mnyan yod du ni khyim gyi bdag/ bsod nams bshes gnyen dag gi bu/ /grags pa'i bshes gnyen ces bya ba/ /grags pa can gyi tshad gyur byung
299b3(mdo 'grel): bdud rtsi'i zer gyis 'od zer can/ /de skyes tshe na bsod nams kyi/ /chu yis char med las skyes pa/ /mi bzang chud? pa zhi bar gyur/ /gzhon nu nyid la dbang gyur cing/ /srid pa'i longs spyod las phyir phyogs/ /dge la brtson pa de song nas/ /rgyal ba rgya la byad tshal
299b4(mdo 'grel): bzhugs bsten/ /ston pas chos ni bston pa yis/ /rab byung dgra bcom gnas la brten/ /de ni gser dang rdo mtshungs shing/ /dga' dang mi dga' btang bar gyur/ /de yi mche ba dag las chu/ /ro ldan dri med shel gyi ni/ /khu bzags pa gang zhig gis/ /de ni rtag
299b5(mdo 'grel): tu srid bral gyur/ /nam zhig dge slong thams cad kyis/ /dge mtshan las ni bcom ldan la/ /de yi srid ba bral ba yi/ /bsod nams rgyu ni rab tu dris/ /des gsungs kA shi'i grong du sngon/ /mdzes pa zhes bya tshong dpon bu/ /ston pa 'od srungs zhes pa yi/ /rab tu byung
299b6(mdo 'grel): ba nyid du gyur/ /nam zhig skom pas gzir gyur cing/ /gdung bas nyen ba'i lus can des/ /so ga'i tsa ta ka bzhin du/ /'gar yang chu ni thob ma gyur/ /de yi bsod nams ma yin bas/ /chu sod stong pa nyid du ni/ /khron pa yang ni chu mong dang/ /'jug dogs
299b7(mdo 'grel): 'phral la skams bar gyur/ /de nas skom pas tsho nga smras/ /lus ni gtong bar brtson de la/ /mkhan pos chu ni byin pa dag/ mthong ba min pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas da yis ston pa ni/ /'di ? bka' yis chu yi snod/ /po? zang pa nyid bzhin gyur pa/ /dge 'dun dag
300a1(mdo 'grel): la yun rings brims/ /de yi chu ni bcom ldan 'das/ /'od srungs dge legs dag gi gter/ /rab tu dang bas thugs rje nas/ /phyag gi padmos rab bzhes mdzod/ /deng ni skye bo'i tshogs 'ongs pas/ /chu ni zad pa med gyur pa/ /mthong
300a2(mdo 'grel): nas pa mtshan dag dang dang bcas/ /bden pa mthong ba thob par gyur/ /de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis/ /grags pa'i bshes gnyen dge rtsa ldan/ /zhi ba bsten 'di mche ba las/ /chu yi tshogs ni 'khrubs par 'gyur/ /de ltar grags pa'i bshes
300a3(mdo 'grel): gnyen gyis/ /skye ba gzhan la byin pa ni/ /rgyal bas gsung thos gus pa yi/ /dge slong rnams ni ya mtshan gyur/ /bde ba dri med chus gang zhib ni/ /kha ba'i rlabs ldan rgyal ba bsten pa dag/ /thob nas 'khor ba mya ngan thang la ni/ /yongs la byas sred pa'i
300a4(mdo 'grel): gdung ba gtong bar byed/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /grags pa'i gshes gnyen gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yul 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //
300a5(mdo 'grel): rgya che sdig pa'i mun bar 'jug pa dag ni rab spangs nas/ /'phral la snying rje'i 'od zer snang pa rab tu rgyas pa yis/ /skyon sel ci yang yongs su gdung ba dag kyang 'phrog byed pa/ /sangs rgyas 'od stong ldan pas dam pa'i lam ni ston bar byed
300a6(mdo 'grel): grong khyer rgyal po'i khab na sngon/ /ka lan dka' i gnas shes pa/ /'od ma'i tshal na bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs ba rnam par bzhugs/ /grong khyer de dpon don byin gyis/ /chung mrno mo zhes bya ba/ /bu nyid dag ni dus gcig tu/ /mtsham nyid du
300a7(mdo 'grel): byung bar gyur/ /phani lnga pa nyid gyur cing/ /nor dang 'khor ni zad pa'i tshe/ /shad ku mtshams byin zhes bya ba/ /de dag ma yis tshogs kyis bskyed/ /ma yi tshig gis chom rkun la/ /rab zhugs byis pa de dag gis/ /byi ma zla dge gi nor chung dang/ /snod
300b1(mdo 'grel): rnams dal gyis brlag par byas/ /ma dang ba yi dul ba yis ni rung ba nyid 'gyur zhing/ /de yi btang snyoms nyid kyis 'dul pa min pa'i g.yang la lhur/ /rang gi skye ba sngon bskyed bag chags dag dang 'brel ba las/ /byis pa rnams ni til bzhin
300b2(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyi rang bzhin ston par byad/ /rim gyis de dag cher skyes te/ /chom rkun dar bab nyid du gyur/ /'dzeg dang mtshams 'bigs la sogs kyis/ /grong khyer pa yi nor rnams blangs/ /de dag bya ba nyan rna yis/ /shes nas rgyal mo ma skyes dgras/ /de dag ma
300b3(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa ni/ /skad cig nyid kyis gsod par springs/ /gzhan gyi nor gyi gang zhig za byed gang zhig 'thung bar byed/ /bde ba'i bsam pas yul gyi lam ni gang zhig nyams myong byed/ /ma dpyad dga' bar bya ba'i bde la gus pa de nyid ni/ /smin par gyur pa
300b4(mdo 'grel): srog ni nyams byed mi bzang zong dag yin/ /yul gyi btung bas rgyags shing 'khrugs pa rnams kyi chags pa gang/ /rku dang sreg dang gsod pas thob pa'i nor gyis rab bskyed pa/ /de ni yongs smin rkang lag bcad dang gsal shing la zhon pas/ /yongs zags
300b5(mdo 'grel): khrag gi rgyun gyis phyi rol dag tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas gsod pa'i phreng bas mtshan/ /sngon dmar gos kyis g.yogs de dag/ lta bu 'ongs pa'i skye bos bskur/ /gsod pa'i gnas su nye bar song/ /brtse ldan kun mkhyen gyis mkhyen nas/ /rang nyid sa der
300b6(mdo 'grel): mngon phyogs te/ /rjes su gzung ba'i bka' drin gyis/ /bcings pa dag dang bral bar mdzad/ /kun mkhyen bka' yis de dag ni/ /rgyal bos btang zhing sdig pa grol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la/ /rab tu byung nas bstan pa thob/ /ye shes 'byor 'bar
300b7(mdo 'grel): de dag ni/ /ma dang bcas pa mthong gyur nas/ /dge slong gis dris dge mtshan las/ /de gtam bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /sngon gyi skye ba dag la yang/ /'di dag bdag gis rab tu bsrungs/ /de tshe 'di dag nyid kyi ma/ /stag mo 'jigs rung gzugs ldan 
301a1(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /de dus byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /brtse bas lus can rnams kyi gnyen/ /snying rje'i rdul zhes bya ba yi/ /sa skyong bur ni de nyid gyur/ /nas bkres pas nyen pa yis/ /phru gu 'di dag za rtsom pa'i/ /stag mo de ni rang gi/
301a2(mdo 'grel): lus/ /byin nas bdag gis rnam par bzlog/ las kyi lhag ma da lta yang/ /'di dag chom rkun nyid du gyur/ /stag mo de ni ma 'di ste/ /'di dag bdag gis rab tu bsrungs/ /zhes gsungs bcom ldan thugs rjes yis/ /rgya mtsho 'byung po la dgongs
301a3(mdo 'grel): pa/ /dge slong tshogs dang bcas pa dang/ /rgyal byed tshal du rab tu gshegs/ /bdud rtsi ro yi char bzhin mi 'dod sel/ /'dod pa dam pa'i gzigs pa gang lhung bas/ /ltung ba rnams byang bsod nams kyis mtho ba'i/ /bsngags par 'os par mdzad
301a4(mdo 'grel): pa rgyal gyur cig /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ stag mo la lus byin pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'da' ste dgu bcu rtsa lnga pa'i// //zla ba kun dgu
301a5(mdo 'grel): nyi ma'i rab gsal dang/ /me yi tsha ba rlung gi mgyogs pa dang/ /snying rje la dga' skye bo che rnams kyi/ /gzhan la phan pa lhan skyes rang bzhin yin/ /'phags rgyal skyer mos tshal du mngon/ /rgyal po dpal ldan bcang? byed ni/ /rtser ga'i ro dang
301a6(mdo 'grel): ldan pa dag/ btsun mor bcas pa rnam par gnas/ /de yi mdzes ma utpal mig/ me tog thul chags pa rnams/ /thub pa brgya phrag lnga rnams ni/ /'dod dga' 'ongs ba dag gis mthong/ /phrag dog khro ba skyong ba nges/ /dga' bar mig
301a7(mdo 'grel): bkod de dag rnams/ /rkang lag bcad pa'i khrag gis ni/ /'dam li nyal ba dag tu byas/ /mi bzang gnod bcud tsho de yis/ /gzir cing cho ri ldan de dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan thugs rje'i gsum pa'i sbyan gyiS rab rgyag ni gaS?/ de yi gzigs ba bdud
301b1(mdo 'grel): rtsi yi/ /char ltar reg pas de dag rnams/ /srog bzung rkang lag legS par ba byar/ /gdung ba dang bral yang dag langs/ /de nas rab rdzogs de dag la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan mdzad/ /gang gis myur du de dag rnams/ /phyir mi 'ong 'bras dar ba thob/ /de mthong
301b2(mdo 'grel): dge slong mtshar bcas pas/ /bis? shing bcom ldan rgyal ba yis/ /gsungs pa sngon yang 'di dag rnams/ /bdag gis brtse ba nyid kyis bzung/ /bar NA sa deg tu sngon/ /rgyal po tshangs byin dag gis ni/ /'byod byed sdig pa byas pa yi/ /blon po lnga brgya des
301b3(mdo 'grel): par bskrang/ /rgyal pos 'jigs pas yang dag gdung/ /mya ngam? lam du bgrod de dab/ /so ? grib mchu med par/ /mi bzang skom pas lhung bar gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bzung che/ /bzang po zhes pas de dag mthong/ /de dag tsho de'i 'das phug naS
301b4(mdo 'grel): snying rjes gdung ba dang bcas gyur/ /chu dang rtsa ba 'brsa ster nges/ /ring po ring po dag nas chu/ /lag pa shin tu che bas blangs/ /de dag skom pa dang bral byas/ /de yi dga' bas rtag tu ni/ /srog gi gzungs dag nges par bstan/ /rgya che ngal ba rab zhib/ /de dag
301b5(mdo 'grel): der ni ngal bsos thob/ /de nas dus kyis so ldan pa/ /lus ni btang ba de nyid kyi/ /lus dag sbyangs nas de dag gis/ /lha la 'os pa'i mchod pa byas/ /dgon par bdag ni glang po yis/ /sdug bsngal de zas blon po ni/ /sngon bsgrul? de dag la lnga? yang
301b6(mdo 'grel): thub pa 'di dag gi mi 'dod las/ /zhes ba gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can kun sgrol brtul zhugs can/ /thub pa'i tshogs kyis mchod byed cing/ /rang gi dka' thub nags su gshegs/ /ston pa'i thugs rje bdud rtsi'i chu bo ni
301b7(mdo 'grel): ma lus bde dang dge ba'i pho nya ste/ /srid pa'i mya ngan gdung bsil grib ma dang/ /ma bzhin skyed par byed pa rgyal gyur cig/ ces ba dge ba'i dbang bos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /glang po'i
302a1(mdo 'grel): rtogs ba brjed pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa drug ba'o// //rnam sngar skyon gyi dug gis yid ni sun phyugs gyur rnams kyi/ /dam ba dag la gnod pa sgrub la 'bad ba rab rno gang/ /da nyid gal te de yi yon tan rab ?
302a2(mdo 'grel): rjes byed bar/ /gyur na srid 'dir mu zhig rgya cher gnod dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rgyal po'i khab dang nye/ 'od ma'i tshil na rgyu ba na/ /lhas byin gyis ni sngar bas sngon/ /rab tu bskul ba'i dka' thub pa/ de yis byin pa'i mtshon cha can/ /smin 'khyog
302a3(mdo 'grel): 'jigs su rung ba'i bzhin/ /khro bas dul ba nyams gyur ba'i/ /rtsom pa chen pos mngon par gces/ /brgya phrag lnga yi dga' thub can/ /de dag gis 'phangs mtshon gyi char/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la ni/ /pad+ma utpal tshogs nyid gyur/ /dam pa rnams
302a4(mdo 'grel): la rnan po yi/ /mngon yang 'jam pa sten byed de/ /sdad pa'i dug gis byugs gyur pa/ /sdig pa can gyi sems ni min/ /ston pa'i sku ni sgrib byed pa/ /nor bu'i rang bzhin khang ba brtsegs/ /nam mkha' i 'ong ni rab 'khrungs te/ /lta ba dag ni bzlog ma gyur/ /de
302a5(mdo 'grel): nas dka' thub can de dag ngal zhing ngo tsha bzhin dud pas/ /bzod pa'i rgya mtshor rab bdag ston pa yi ni zhabs la gtugs/ /bcom ldan gyis kyang bu la bzhin/ /rab tu dang ldan de dag la/ /gnod byed la yang khro med bas/ /chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad//
302a6(mdo 'grel): chen po rnams kyi yid ni 'khrugs pa'i rnam 'phrul med pa yi/ /bde dang zhib la brten bsod nams bzod pa dag gi chu/ /dri med bsil bdag dang ldan pa phan mi 'jug pa ni/ /de thos khro ba'i rdul gyis rog ba dag tu yong mi 'gyur/ /stan pas chos
302a7(mdo 'grel): bstan rab byang gis/ /bsam pa rab phyis de dag gis/ /zag pa kun las rnam grol ba'i/ /dgra bcom nyid ni rab tu thob bo/ /sra bas der 'ongs pa'i dge slong ni/ /gtam de thos shing ngo mtshar dang/ bcas pas snying? mi zhes pa dris/ /rgyal bas de dag la gsungs pa
302b1(mdo 'grel): sngon gyi skye ba dag la yang/ /shin tu gnod? byas 'di dag la/ /rnam 'gyur med pa bdag gis ni// rab tu dang bas nges par bltas/ /rgya mtsho dag tu 'gro ba la/ /gzings ni chag par gyur tshe sngon/ /'di dag kA shi'i yul skyes pa'i/ /chod par srog bar the tshom tho bde la bdag
302b2(mdo 'grel): ni dus sbal gyis/ /rgyab tu bkod nas rab tu bsgral/ /'tsho ba thob cing pha rol tu/ /phyin nas ngal? bsos rnam par bsten/ /rab tu bsgral bas yongs dam te/ /bdag ni skad cig gnyid leg tshe/ /bdag sha za 'dod de dag rnams/ /thams cad ba rags? dpar brtson//
302b3(mdo 'grel): rdo yi char chen dang spros kyang/ /khog pa rab tu bstan ldan zhing/ /gong bu'i dbyibs can bdag gi ni/ /lus ni dag cing nyams ma gyur/ /da nas bkres bas yongs nyen te/ /mthong nas snying rjes bdag 'khrubs pas/ /rang gi de dag dag rnams lus/ /byin nas
302b4(mdo 'grel): bya ba byas nyid gyur/ /sngon gyi tshong pa de dag ding/ /dka' thub can ni 'di dag gyur/ /gnod pa byas kyang snying rje yis/ bdag gis dge ba dag la bkod/ /de dag sngon tshe bdag nyid che/ /ston pa 'od srungs bstan pa la/ /rab byung thob nas de yi bras/ /da lta skal
302b5(mdo 'grel): ldan dag tu skyes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa 'di/ /thos nas dge slong rnams kyis ni de yi bzod pas bzhi bzhin/ /khur dag bzod pa rab tu bsngags/ /gang zhig tshul khrims dri med bsil ba'i chu ldan sems can bsam pa dbu mkha' ? byin byed
302b6(mdo 'grel): khon gyi rdul ni rab tu dag byed bzod pa'i chu bo sems la rtags nas ba/ /de dag bzlog dka' dgra yi gnod pa khro ba'i me 'bar phreng bas rnam bkad? bar/ /sred par rab bskyed rgya cher gdung bas yongs 'dris rnam 'gyur dag tu 'gyur ? yin/ /nyes
302b7(mdo 'grel): pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ rus sbal gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa bdun pa'o/ /rigs kyi ri bo dag gi rtse mo shin tu mtho? ba dang/ /dma'
303a1(mdo 'grel): zhing mig rang tshogs dang phyag dar khrod kyis gang bar yang/ /nyin mo 'dran pa'i snang ba mtshungs par phan byed bdag nyid can/ /'di ni bye brag mang bar 'jug par nges bar 'bab pa nyid/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu sdin/ /'ong ma'i tshal bzhuD
303a2(mdo 'grel): rgyal bal/ /mu ga'i chen bkres pa yis/ yongs nyan gyad rnams skyabs su song/ /snying rje'i dpag bsam rkang 'thung gis/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i zas byin nas/ /gnas skabs ngan bzhi ba'i slad/ /de dag rnams la chos bstan mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi
303a3(mdo 'grel): rdzas gzung gis/ /dge brgyas pa thob ba rnams/ /dgra bcom gnas ni thob gyur/ /'gro bas mchod bya nyid du gyur/ /dman pa shin tu mthor gyur ba/ /de mthong grong khyer gnas pa rnams/ /rtag tu de dag rigs la ni/ /smod cing phrag dog ldan par gyur/ /kye  ma dag pa'i bstan pa la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kla klo'i gyang/ /'os min rnams la dgra bcom gnas/ /nges par bstan zhes de dag smras/ /chung du 'byor pa mi chung la/ /gsar pa'i spro dga' mi bzod ba'i/ /skye bo ngo tsha skyed byed pa'i/ /skye ba mchog tu rab
303a4(mdo 'grel): gsal byed/ /rgyal ba'i bka' yis sgra mi snyan/ /gling du mkha' las 'gro 'ang byas// mthu yis gyang? ni de dag rnams/ /mi bdag skye bor bcas pas mchod/ /de dag grong pas phyag byas te/ /rab dang bkur byas de dag rnams/ /rang yin yon tan mtshed
303a5(mdo 'grel): 'os pas/ /dge slong rnams kyi mchog nyid gyur/ /de nas de mthus ya mtshan pa'i/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan la/ /de yi bsod nams rgyu mtshan dris/ /dal thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ /sngon gyi skye ba dka' sha yi/ /yul mdza' dka' thub tshal
303a6(mdo 'grel): du bdag /mngon shes lnga ldan dka' thub can/ /dge ba 'ding tshul zhes bar gyur/ /der ni rdzo? dag gying 'ang dig?/ sngon che thub par tu gyur/ /bdag gis dag bsten de dag rnams/ /mngon shes lnga ba nyid du gyur/ /skye ba 'di yang bsod nams de'i/ bag chags
303b1(mdo 'grel): goms pa'i dra ? ba yis/ /gyad 'di rnams ni 'khor ba yi/ /nyon mongs dag las bdag gis bsgral/ /'di dag rnams sngon ston pa ni/ /'od srungs? drung du rab byung ste/ /rgyal po'i gnas su gnas par gyur ? da yis da lta gyad nyid gyur/ rtsams gyang rnams dag
303b2(mdo 'grel): gi ni/ /skye bsngar byung bcom ldan 'das/ /thams cad gzigs pham? gsungs pa dag/ thos nas dge slong ya mtshan gyur/ /gza' yi bdag pa'i snang bas rjes gzung bas/ /mun pa'i tshogs kyi rnam par zum gyur pa'i/ /'dam skyes chu dang bcas pa rnams dag
303b3(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /mkhas pa'i cod pan du 'os nyid? du 'gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ dka' thub pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o//
303b4(mdo 'grel): lus can lus dang de bzhin ma yid gyi ni/ /srid ba'i rang bzhin nang chen 'phrog byed pa/ /'jig rten kun gyi 'jig rten pha rol gnyen/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan bdud rtsi'i gtar nyid de/ /mnyan yod du sngon bcom ldan 'das/ /rgya ba'i gzigs ba bdud rtsi
303b5(mdo 'grel): yis/ /skye bo nad kyis gzing rnams dang/ /dge slong tshogs kyang sos par mdzod/ /mnyes gshin gyis ni ya mtshan pa'i/ /dge slong tshogs la de gsung ser/ /sngon gyi skye ba dag la yang/ /bdag gis khyad rnams bcos bar byas/ /bdag sngon bar nA sir
303b6(mdo 'grel): ni/ /mi bdag pad+ma can zhes pa/ /gzir ba thams cad sel la chags/ /skye dgu'i pha dang mtshungs par gyur/ /nam zhig gnam gyi skyon gyis ni/ /yul dang dus ni mi bzang las/ /grong ba rnams la bzod dka' yi/ /nad ni rab tu rgyas bar gyur ? ba sman gyi
303b7(mdo 'grel): tshogs dang ni/ /zhi dang shis pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gis phun tshogs bsgrubs byas pa/ /de dag bsos pa nyid ma gyur/ /de dag nad ni bzlog par/ /chen po'i? nye? zhes ba/ /mtshan nyid shos pa'i sman pas bstan/ /nya bas bka' ? yang thob ma gyur/ /nyid? mche?
304a1(mdo 'grel): bas skye bo rnams/ /srog la the tshom gyur tshe bdag/ de dag cho de mi bzang pas/ /sdug bsngal gyis gzir snying rje las/ /nad pa kun la phan 'os pa/ /ro hi ta yi nyar ni bdag/ gyur ces smon lam brtul zhugs kyis/ /ba gam ngos nas
304a2(mdo 'grel): lus dag 'phangs/ /gzir pa'i smon lam de yis ni/ /chu bo bA ra dag gi chur/ skad cig gis bdag ro hi til nya ni shin tu chen por gyur/ /de yi nya ni nyer sbyar bas/ /grong khyer na gnas de dag kun/ /bdud rtsi yis ni rkang pa bzhin/ /'phral la bsos
304a3(mdo 'grel): pa nyid du gyur/ /de nyid dge slong khyed rnams te/ /de ring bdag gis nad las bsgral/ /sems can rnams kyi nad bskyabs pas/ /rtag tu bdag ni nad dang bral bde gshegs 'khor ba'i nad kyis ni/ /sman pas de skad gsungs bdag/ dge slong bsos
304a4(mdo 'grel): pa de dag gis/ /thos nas dga' mgu rangs pa thob/ /shin tu chung ba'i rtswa dang mtshungs pa yis/ /lus dang byin pa gang la rtse dga' can/ /gzhan phan yid dang bral ba min rnams kyis/ /snying stobs bcas pa ci yang rnam par gsal/ /zhes ba dge ba'i
304a5(mdo 'grel): dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ pad ma can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu rtsa dgu pa'o// //gang gi bsam par bla med byang chub 'dod/ /bdud rtsi'i pho nya dang po zla
304a6(mdo 'grel): chos bzhin/ /bsod nams kyis ni gser du 'jug byed pa/ /snying stobs rgya mtsho su zhig der phyag 'os/ /rgyal byed tshal bzhugs rgyal ba la/ /dpal ldan kos la yi dbang/ /gsal rgyal dge mtshan la chags shing/ /rab tu btud bas sngon
304a7(mdo 'grel): zhus pa/ /khyod kyi yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub bag chags dang po ni/ /sngon gyi skye ba gang la skyes/ /'od zer rgya che bcom ldan gsungs/ /sa bdag gis 'di dris de la/ tshems kyi 'od zer yid kyi rdzing/ /gtsang ma'i dang pa'i phreng ston cing//
304b1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/ /grong khyer 'od ldan dag tu sngon/ /rab gsal sa bdag gter du ni/ /gang tshe bdag gyur de tshe bdag/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub blo gros gyur/ /glang po chags ldan glang po la/ /dga' ? ba'i zhags pas rab tu drangs/ /gnas su
304b2(mdo 'grel): 'khyams nas gang gi tshe/ /de ni nye bar 'ongs gyur pa/ /de tshe glang chen sna chen po/ /kun tu bgrod kyis de la smras/ /sa bdag bdag gi bslab pa yis/ /glang po dag ni rab tu 'ongs/ /'dod chags kyis ni yang dag drangs/ /dul ba brjed pa'i glang pho 'di/ /yon tan dkyil
304b3(mdo 'grel): 'khor yid bstan ba/ /nges drang rnam 'gyur dag tu gyur/ /lus 'dzin 'dod chags dran pas rab bskyed dran 'phrog bstan pa 'joms pa ni/ /me dang nyi ma min pas gdung zhing dmod pa min pas dmyal bar byed/ /long? dang mtshan mo min pa'i rab rib lag 'gro'i
304b4(mdo 'grel): rdzas min mi bzang dug/ chang min myos byed dma' min lhung byed 'byung po min pa'i smyo byed do/ /zhes pa kun bgrod kyis smras tshe/ /de la mi bdag gis smras pa/ /chags bral yul la chags med pa/ /'ga' zhig 'khor ba na yod dam/ /zhes bas yi bdag poS
304b5(mdo 'grel): dris/ /kun tu bgrod kyis de la smras/ /'gro ba 'di na de bzhin gshegs/ /'khor ba med pa 'dod chags bral/ /dam pa'i snod dang yon tan can/ /sems can kun la pham mdzad pa/ /rgyal po sangs rgyas sgron ma yi/ /'od kyis thams cad gsal bar mdzad//
304b6(mdo 'grel): de dag thos nas sa yi bdag/ mchog tu rab dang sems ldan pa'i/ /snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/ /bag chags 'phral la rab tu 'khrungs/ /sngon gyi bsod nams mthu yis ni/ /dge pa rgyas pa yang dag thob/ /de yis yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub thob
304b7(mdo 'grel): slang smon lam byas/ /de ni sngon gyi skye ba la/ /rdza mkhan khyim bdag ces par gyur/ /de yis dbul tshe gus pa yis/ /bu ram zan gyis rgyal ba mchod/ /de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis/ /rab gsal nyid thob de yi mi/ sems la byang chub myu gu bskrun/ /de? 
305a1(mdo 'grel): lta bdag la 'bras 'di grub/ /dang po dag pa'i byang chub sems bskyed ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs ba de ni dang/ /bdud rtsi bzhin du thos pa'i khyong? ba yis/ /kos la dbang des 'thungs rgyal sar song/ /zhes pa dge ba'i
305a2(mdo 'grel): dbang pos byas pa' byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ bsod nams rab gsal gyi rtogs pa brjod ba'i yal 'dab ste brgya pa'o// //gang zhig skyed byed tsha zer ldan pa rgyu ba'i zhabs ni nye bar bsten pa
305a3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin/ /gang gis ma ni tho rangs snang ba mchod 'os rtag par rgyun du rab gsal 'char/ /skye bo thams cad dga' ba'i snga dro de nyid nyin mo dag la bsngags bar 'os/ /de yi rjes 'brang 'jig rten 'di 'am gzhan du 'gang yang mun pas rig mi 'gyur
305a4(mdo 'grel): sa dbang zas gtsang grags pa lhag ma yi/ /gnas skabs gyur chod yi lus la ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dag mchog gsal mdzad pas/ /gus pas mchod mdzad mchod rten dag kyang mdzad/ /dben pa'i spyod tshul 'jig rten thun mong min/ /ji ltar
305a5(mdo 'grel): bzhed par 'jig rten lam 'jug pa/ /de la the tshom ya mtshan gyis gang ba'i/ /dge slong tshogs kyis mngon du phyogs te dris/ /mi nyams bla na med pa'i byang chub gnas/ /chags pa spangs pas 'jig rten spyod btang ba/ /'gro ba'i bla khyod bla/? ba la
305a6(mdo 'grel): gus pas/ /tha snyad spyod la 'jug pa 'di ni ci/ /bcom ldan chos gzigs dag gis der gsungs pa/ /dge ba'i gnas su gyur pa lus dag gi/ rgyur gyur ba ma dag ni mkhas rnams kyi/ /bla ma yis kyang mchod 'os zhe sar 'os/ /dad par mdza' dag
305a7(mdo 'grel): bsod nams la 'jug pa'i/ /pha ma gang gis rtag tu mi mchod pa/ /de dag chos kyang chos min nyid 'gyur zhing/ /ye shes snang ba nag po nyid du 'gyur/ /skye ba gzhan la gus dang zhes yis/ /dka' thub gzhugs pha? ma long? ba? dang/ /khyim la
305b1(mdo 'grel): chags btang bdag gis mchod pa yis/ /lha bzhin rtag pa nyid du mnyes par byas/ /kA shi'i grod du gnyis skyes gnyan bcas kyi/ /chung ma gau ta mi ka zhes la sngon/ /rigs ni dag cing gcod bar byed pa'i bu/ /blo ldan sngo bsangs can zhes bya ba byung?/ /khyod
305b2(mdo 'grel): shugs de dag rgas pas long ba thob?/ /bu la khyim bkod nags mdza' dag tu song/ /mkhas pa rnams ni rga ba 'jug pa na/ /dpan? pa mchog tu dar ba nyid du gyur/ /de dag bu ni kun spyod yon tan gyis/ /rgyal pos bdun na 'don du rab? zhus kyang/ /?
305b3(mdo 'grel): mchod pa la chags par? tsho can/ /bsod nams dka' thub nags der de tshe song/ /mkhas pa de yis 'bad pas rtsa ba dang/ /'bras bu chu dang bcas pas rim gro byas/ /chog shes yid ni rab tu dad pa skyes/ /de yi pha ma dag gis rab dga' thob/ /de nas
305b4(mdo 'grel): nam zhig rngon la rtse ba yis/ /de dag bste gnas dang nye chu klung 'gram/ /ma he gnyis 'thung dbang gis mi dman pa'i/ /sa der mi yi bdag po tshangs byin 'ongs/ /skabs der der ni ri dags pags pas mtshan/ /chus gang bum ba len pa'i sngo bsangs? can
305b5(mdo 'grel): ri dags don gnyer rgyal pos ring po nas/ /rna ba'i bar du drangs pa'i mda' yis bsnan/ /mi srun tshig gis bzhin du mda' rnon ni/ /bde med las kyis nye bar gnas pa de/ /gnad du zug pas drag tu bug pa des/ /rnam par g.yo zhing dal? gyis rab
305b6(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ /kye ma shin tu 'phags pa min ba su/ /snying rje'i bsam pa med pas rgyu med du/ /sdig pa ma spyad bya min la chags nas/ /srog ni 'phrog par byed pa'i mda''di 'phangs/ /nags na pha ma'i lus 'dzin du gnas pa/ /mig rab nyams
305b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i dbyig par gyur pa bdag /kyi hud bsad tshe re med de dag bsang/ /gsum gsod drag po'i 'bad? 'di su zhig gi /zhes pa gdung bas 'khrul smra bram ze de/ sma ra'i ri mo gsar chags mi bdag gis/ /bung ba dang bcas hUM? ta gsar pa ?
306a1(mdo 'grel): shing ma ? ban dag gis bcad bzhin mdun du mdzod/ /bla ma'i nyon mongs khyad par bsam bas gdud/ /'bar ba'i me rtse lta bur spyod pa'i mda'/ /sgris? pa tshan srog gi mi mthun phyogs gyur pa/ /gsang gyi ltod can snying la 'dzin byed
306a2(mdo 'grel): cing/ /chu klung dogs na 'gro ldog byed pa de/ /mthod nas mi dbang brtan pa rab tu nyams/ /gzi byin bral ba rang gi mda' de yis/ /bsnan pa bzhin du rgya che gdud bar gyur/ /de la des smras thub pa ri dags kyi/ /pags pas lus stod g.yogs pa khyod ni
306a3(mdo 'grel): bdag/ rab tu rmongs pas bcom mo dam pa kye/ /bdag nyed gnod pa'i me yis gzhom mi 'os/ /zhes pa rgyal po gzir ba'i tshig thos nas/ /ral ba'i tshogs bkra gzhon nu rang bzhin gyis/ /khro med yid ldan snying stobs gter gyis ni/ /drag por
306a4(mdo 'grel): gdung ba bzod byas de la smras/ /rgyal po dka' thub mod pas 'jigs don med/ /khro bral bdag dang bdag gi pha ma dag/ long ba srog 'phrog gnod pa 'di la yang/ /khyod la dmod pa dag ni 'dir mi 'gyur/ /srid par srog chags rang gis byas
306a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i las/ /'khrul med 'bras bu can rnams dus su ni/ /bde dang sdug bsngal yon tan rgyas pa dang/ /skyon dang dmod pa gsod pa'i slad du 'gyur/ /gang zhig lam nas dal gyis 'gro ba lhung zhing lus ni rab tu nyams pa 'thob/ /gang zhig lam
306a6(mdo 'grel): 'bras g.yang sar yongs su 'khyams shing rgyug pa nyams pa med par 'jug/ gang zhig lan gcig ma yin mkhas pa nyams shing dpal bsten le lo can/ /las kyi ri mo rtsig pa med par bdag nyid kun gyis bkod de rnam par bkra/ bdag gi chu
306a7(mdo 'grel): bu ma phye ma mang pa 'di/ /pha ma skom pas gzir la 'tsho bar mi/ gzhung bzang la brten brtse bas blan pa'i blos/ /myur bar song ste khyod kyis sbyin par bya/ /zhes pa mgrin ba'i bar du srog rgyu zhing/ /dbugs brtsegs dal bas sgrab sgribs chu bur? brjod/ /bzhin
306b1(mdo 'grel): ni phyir la phyogs pa'i mda' dag la/ /thub pa des ni skyengs pa ston bzhin mdzad/ /de nas sa dbang mchog tu rab gdud bas/ /bum pa blangs nas de dag bsti gnas phyin/ /rgan rgon bu cig ldan pa de dag mthong/ /de dag gam du 'gro bar yod ma nus/ /ring nas rdog sgra dag
306b2(mdo 'grel): la rna gtod cing/ /mdza' bas rab tu 'dod ldan bu zhes pa/ /smra ba de dag la ni nyer btud de/ /da med pas nyams pa mi 'dod rgyal pos smras/ /glang chen myos pa'i tshul gyis a mra'i shing/ /'joms bzhin gang gis gzhon nu rab bcom pa/ /skyes mchog 'khri
306b3(mdo 'grel): shing dag gi sta re rtsub/ /sdig pa'i skal ldan bdag ni khyed sras min/ /bdag gi mda' yis lus bcom khyod kyi sras/ /de ni sdug bsngal gyur nas chu 'gram nyal/ /sdig pa'i gdud ba che las tsha grang dang/ /bcas pa'i dmod drag bdag gi spyi bor der?/ /nor
306b4(mdo 'grel): 'jin bdag pos de skad brjod tsam las/ /rdo rjes bcom bzhin brtan pa nyams de dag/ /shin tu bzod dka' mya ngan las 'jigs bzhin/ /rab tu che ba rmongs pa'i phug nad zhugs/ /de nas rgyal pos chu grang gtor de dag/ ji zhig ltar stes 'du shes cha
306b5(mdo 'grel): shas thob/ /sa bdag khyod kyi bdag cag bu drung du/ /khrid ces snying rjes rab smra ba de dag smra/ /de nas de yis chu klung nye bar khrid/ /gling dang sgron med nye bar bying gyur bas/ /lag bas mda' bsnyan? bu la reg byas nas/ /de yi mda' yis phug bzhin de dag
306b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyel/ /bu cig bla ma dag la mnyes gshin yang/ /pha ma rgan long mgo med btang nas ni/ /ci slad glo bur mtho ris khyod 'gro zhes/ de dag gis ni de la dam 'khyud smras/ /bu khyod me yi sbyin srag la dga' zhing/ /bla ma'i lha dang ldan pas bdag
306b7(mdo 'grel): cag ni/ /zol med gus ba'i mchod bas mnyes byas pa'i/ /bden pa des khyod zug rngu med gyur tsig/ ces? pa bla ma dag gi snying stobs rdzogs/ /snying rjes gzir ba'i bden tshig brjod tsam las/ /brgya byin mngon phyogs bdud rtsis bran pa yis/ /gzhon
307a1(mdo 'grel): na rma dang bral zhing bsos par byas/ bdag ni de tshe dar gus brtul zhugs can/ thub pa'i gzhon nu sngo bsangs can der gyur/ shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs mchod bya bdag gi yang/ /'bad nas? mchod bya ba ma de dag go/ de ltar rnam mang chos
307a2(mdo 'grel): kyi rtsa ba ni/ bde gshegs kyis gsungs dge slong gis thos nas/ bla ma bsten pa'i brtul zhugs dang mtshungs pa/ dam pa'i spyod pa gzhan dag med par sems/ zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam
307a3(mdo 'grel): gyi 'khri shing las/ sngo bsangs can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa gcig pa'o// //brtan pa'i sbyin pas skye bo dman pa rnams kyi gdung ba sel/ tshul khrims kyis ni skye bo dam pa'i yid dag tshim bar byed/ shes rab stobs kyis kyang
307a4(mdo 'grel): ni dben pa dang bral gti mug 'phrog/ brtson 'grus kyis ni 'jigs su rung ba'i 'jigs pa bzlog par byed/ chos kyi bka' yis mnyan yod na/ dge ba sems can la stan cing/ rgyal ba rgyal byed tshal bzhugs la/ dge slong rnams kyis sngon dris pa/
307a5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan khyod kyis brgya byin dang/ sa bdag gzugs can snying po dang/ dge slong kun shes koN+Di n+ya/ bden pa mthong ba dag la bkod/ de yi zhar la lha rnams ni/ 'bum phrag gnyis dang de bzhin du/ khri brag bzhi yis bden pa ni/ /mthong ba'i snod
307a6(mdo 'grel): nyid rab tu thob/ /kun gar? phan mdzad khyod kyi 'di/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin nam/ /yon tan bsod nams rjes 'gro ma/ /skye bar goms ba'i rab dang yin/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di brjod gsan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs ba/ bdag
307a7(mdo 'grel): gi blo gros gzhan phan la/ goms pas lhan cig skyes pa nyid/ skye ba 'dir bdag sems? can la /phan? par dga' ba ci zhig mtshar/ rtag tu goms las seng ge dang/ /glang sogs skye bar 'di la 'gyur/ sngon tshe ded dpon lho phyogs ba/ drag
307b1(mdo 'grel): pos 'brangs ba'i bud med dang/ /don mthun 'bum phrag gnyis rjes 'brang/ chu gter dag gi dogs su phyin/ /de dus dus ni gzhan pa bzhin/ 'gro ba za ba la chags pa/ 'jigs rung lus rgyas sbrul chen ni/ pham pa zhes pa byung bar gyur/ skye ba
307b2(mdo 'grel): kun gyi nyon mangs kyi/ skrag pa bzhin du bzod dka' de/ mthong nas brtan pa rnam par nyams/ /de dag dkrugs pa bzhin du gyur/ gdengs can de yi lus kyis ni/ lam dag kun nas bskor ba'i tshe/ bsam bral dus kyi kha sgor gnas/ de dag rnamS
307b3(mdo 'grel): kyis cho de bton/ ma lus lha rnams bstong ba yis/ skyabs ba'i sgra ldan de dag gi /cho de phyogs kun khyab byed pa/ snying rje'i sgra ni rgyas bar gyur/ de nas seng ge'i ri phug gnas/ grags ba'i ral can zhes ba dang/ de yi grogs bo glang po che/ man b+har
307b4(mdo 'grel): yis sgra de thos/ rgyud pa skyob pa la chags shing/ yid ni snying rjes drangs gyur pa/ don mthun skyob la dus byas pa'i/ /bstan pa de dag 'ongs par gyur/ de nas glang chen ri bo yi/ lus can ngag la seng ge zhon/ shugs kyis bsnun nas sbrul
307b5(mdo 'grel): chen ni/ srog dang brel ba dag tu byas /de yi srog ni 'gro dus su/ dbugs kyi rlung ni sreg byed dag/ rab tu 'bar bas seng ge dang/ /glang po dag ni thal bar byas/ de nas de dpon de rnams kyis/ de dag lus la mchod pa'i slad/ /mchod rten
307b6(mdo 'grel): byas nas de dag gi /grags ba dang 'grogs phyogs su song/ /nga nyid de tshe don mthun la/ srog ster seng ge dag tu gyur/ lhas byin dag ni sbrul chen te/ sha ri'i bu ni glang po che/ snying stobs zla ba de yi spyod pa legs byas rab tu gsal/ kun la phan
307b7(mdo 'grel): bar byed mkhas grags shing chen po dag tu 'os/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag thos nas dga' ba thob gyur ba'i/ dge slong de dag rnams kyis tshig gi so sor rab tu bsngags/ zhes ba dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa
308a1(mdo 'grel): brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ /seng ge'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa gnyis pa'o// /do shal rab gsal gos mchog cod pan dang/ /gdugs dang rnga yab dkar pos 'dzum pa'i dpal/ /mchog
308a2(mdo 'grel): gi longs spyod skal bzang dga' ston gyis/ /bdag nyid chen po'i legs byas gsal bar byed/ /chos kyi 'byor pa rab rgyas pa'i/ /mthu ni rgyas par mthong ba las/ /ya mtshan dge slong tshogs la ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gsungs pa/ /skye pa gzhan la
308a3(mdo 'grel): bla med kyi/ /ye shes gzi byin ma thob kyang/ /bdag la ngo mtshar bcas pa'i dpal/ /legs byas gsal bar byed pa byung/ /byang gi phyogs kyi grong khyer dag/ rdo rje can zhes bya bar na/ /rgyal po phyag na rdo rje bzhin/ /rdo rje gtum bo? zhes par gyur/ /grong khyer gang
308a4(mdo 'grel): gi bdag tu ni/ /sa bdag lhun po btul nas de'i/ /bu mo snar ma zhes bya ba/ /de thob bdud rtsi'i zer gyis bzhin/ /de yis de la bu dag ni/ /nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs pa bskyed/ /gang la nor bu'i gdugs dag ni/ /bkra ba lhan cig skyes pas mdzes/ /de yi bsod
308a5(mdo 'grel): nams mthu yis ni/ rtag tu bsams pas nyer gnas pa/ /lha yi rgyan dang longs spyod dag /grong khyer ba yis nyams myong gyur/ /longs spyod dga' ba'i gong bu des/ /gang phyir grong khyer yongs btang ba/ /de phyir sa bdag sras de ni/ /dga' ba'i gong bu
308a6(mdo 'grel): zhes par gyur/ /pha yi mjug tu rgyal srid thob/ /grags pa rgyas de phyogs rnams su/ /'byung po kun la rang 'dod kyi/ /longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa bstan/ /blon po blo dan blo dan zhes/ /bya ba de la chags bral gyur/ /yon tan can la sdad ba ni//
308a7(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid dan pa'i rang bzhin yin/ /de yi ma mes sa bdag ni/ /lhun po springs yig rnams kyis des/ /sngon gyi gnod pa dran pa yis/ /g.yul la mngon par phyogs par byas/ /khrab mchog tu rab 'bar ba/ /'phral la rgyas shing gsang brtson de//
308b1(mdo 'grel): stobs rab rgyas pas bo nya springs/ /bu mo'i bu la rab? bstan pa/ /bu ma'i bu khyod dgra yi bu/ /bdag nyid ngan pa khyod kyi pas/ /dkyil 'khor nyams pa khyod byas nas/ /grags ba bzhin du bu mo phrogs/ /ma nyams sa/ 'di rang 'dod kyis/ /stsol? cig gal te
308b2(mdo 'grel): ma yin na/ /rang nyid 'ongs khyad mdza' 'khob tu/ /skyabs pa'i mgron du bdag gis bya/ /ma mes kyis ni rab bstan pa/ /de dag thos nas sa yi dag/ skye ba rlag la snying rje bas/ /de la dad par byed du so pa? dmag dpung ring zhing g.yul gyi ni?/ /sdums la
308b3(mdo 'grel): chas des gru dgag /gi gA'i dgram na gnas ba yi/ /ma mes grong khyer dag tu phyin/ /blon po g.yog sde dang bcas pa/ /de yi kun rtog rtse dga' yis/ /lha yi zas ni rab 'khrungs pa/ /sa bdag lhun bos mthong gyur nas/ /'di ni lha zhes ngas byas
308b4(mdo 'grel): te/ /rang nyid de yi drung song nas/ /mchi ma zag cing mgrin par bzung/ /rin chen kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /de yis gus bas mchod pa des/ /rang gi grong khyer phyin nas ni/ /'dzam gling skye bo lha yi ni/ /longs spyod ltar bcas lhag par bsgrubs
308b5(mdo 'grel): de spyod phun tshogs la mtshon te/ /dge slong gis dris rgyal ba ni/ /kun mkhyen gyis kyang de dag la/ /de yi phun tshogs rgyu mtshan gsungs/ /ba ra Na sir skye gzhan de/ /bram ze rtsa ba can zhes gyur/ /de yis nad kyis gzir ba yis/ /rang sangs
308b6(mdo 'grel): rgyas la sman dag ni/ bsas ba'i mtshams la thug par byas/ /gdung ba gang la gdungs kyang bzung/ /bsod nams des rgyal gdugs can de/ /lha yi longs spyod snod du gyur/ /nga nyid dga' ba'i gong bu de/ /blo ngan de yang lhas byin no/ /zhes pa bcoM
308b7(mdo 'grel): ldan gyis gsungs pa/ /thos nas dge slong ya mtshan gyur/ /kye ma gang zhig yon tan 'dzin dang 'byor pa'i mthu dang ni/ /lha yi nye bar longs spyod skal bzang srid ba'i bdag po dang/ /ring du gnas shing sdug bar gyur ba'i gdung bar lhung ba dag/ /skyob
309a1(mdo 'grel): cing yongs su 'don pa de dag bsod nams rnam 'phrul yin/ /zhes pa dge ba'i de dang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi khri shing las dga' ba'i gong bu'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa
309a2(mdo 'grel): gsum pa'o// //legs pa'i lam la yid la re ba rab rgyas grub gyur cing/ /dam pa'i legs byas dri med 'jug dogs gtsang ma bsngags par 'os/ /'jigs rung 'khor ba'i chu srin 'byung gnas dag gi zam stegs gyur/ /dam pa'i grogs nyid dge ba
309a3(mdo 'grel): spro ba'i rang bzhin pho? yin/ /mnyan du yod pa dag tu sngon/ /khyim bdag pad ma zhes pa'i bu/ /dad pa zhes bya bcom ldan gyi/ 'bad pas dgra bcom gnas la ni/ /rab dang dri med snying rje yi/ /gzigs pa bdud rtsis bzung mthong nas/ /rjes 'dzin brtson pas 'brel
309a4(mdo 'grel): de la/ /de slong rnams kyis rab gsol ba/ /bcom ldan rigs kyi bu 'di ni/ /bag chags lhag ma dag gi yul/ /dran pa ma zhi rab byung yang/ /khyim la mngon par phyogs par gyur/ /de ni rab 'bad bcom ldan gyis/ /'dul ba dag la rnam par sbyar/ /kye ma rdze
309a5(mdo 'grel): bzung chen po yis/ /kun rmongs dag dang bral bar mdzod/ de skad dge slong ya mtshan zhing/ /dga' ba'i bdud rtsi bran pas zhus/ /gus la mnyes gshin bcom ldan 'das/ /thams cad mkhyen pas der gsungs pa/ /sngon yang bdag gis deg pa la/ /'di
309a6(mdo 'grel): ni 'bad nas rnam par bkod/ /sngon ni dka' thub nags su 'di/ /thub pa brtul zhugs bzang zhes gyur/ /de dus de yi gnas pa bdag/ /ri bong gsal bar smra byed ba/ /de yi gtam la yid bcu gas skyes/ /mdza' ba dang ldan rtag gnas gyur/ /de nas char med
309a7(mdo 'grel): kyis bcom ste/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu chu na mtshe/ /nags su yid byung gus pa de/ /grong mthar 'gro bar 'dod par gyur/ /bdag gis gum bde la smras/ /dam pa khyod ni rnam par mkhas/ /dka' thub nor? can? dka' thub kyi/ /nags ni yongs btang ji ltar rigs
309b1(mdo 'grel): rnam mang 'bral ba'i mya ngan du/ /byed ba'i skye bos gang ba'i khyim/ /rmongs pa'i gdon gyi nyon mongs kyis/ bzung bar gyur pa grong gis/ /bud med lcags sgrog mu cod bzod dka' bu yi zhags pa dang/ gsog? 'khor gyis dkrigs brtan pa'i gnyen gyi dra ba dang
309b2(mdo 'grel): mi srun chogs pa'i nad dang blo ngan gyis bcings mun chen can/ btang ba'i khyim la blo ldan su zhig slar mang reg par byed/ sna tshogs 'bral ba'i mya ngan stug po yang yang rmongs pa skyed par byed/ nor ni lan tshwa'i? zas rnams dag gis sred pa mchog tu yongs
309b3(mdo 'grel): su spal/ /mi bzang yul la chags pa goms pas sems ni blun par byas gyur pa/ nyon mongs zhing gi khyim na gnas pa rnams kyi skye ba zad par 'gyur/ skye bo med pa'i nags su zhi ba'i khyad par dag gis chim ba rnams/ yul gyis longs spyod la chags
309b4(mdo 'grel): chad gis blo gros myos shing g.yo mi 'gyur/ mdza' bo dang bral du brgyas pas mig ni mchi mas 'khrug mi 'gyur/ gzir dang 'thab mo khro dang gdung ba'i tshogs rnams dag gis sreg mi 'gyur/ nags las yid byung grong la chags/ grong las yid byung nags
309b5(mdo 'grel): tshal dran/ skyes bu rnams ni rab zhi las/ phyir phyogs zhar la 'byung ba yin/ gong gi dul ba'i g.yon la khyod/ dus min blo gros yod ma byed/ grong dang 'grogs pas yul la ni/ chags rnams thog ma nyid du 'ching/ /dus kyis 'di nyid du ni khyod/ /'bras bu
309b6(mdo 'grel): thob pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ bdag gi sha ni dge pa yis/ da ni srog gi gzungs dag mdzod/ ces pa brjod nas bdag gis ni/ nye ba'i me la rang nyid mchobs/ /des kyang myur du rab blangs nas/ yongs su 'khyud de bdag la smras/ gzu lums? po'i 'gal ba
309b7(mdo 'grel): 'don khyod ni ci yi slar du byong?/ nags 'di las ni bdag mi 'gro/ khyod mtshungs mdza' bo ga la rnyed/ de yis gus pa de brjod cing/ /bdag gis mkha' la bltas pa'i tshe/ 'phral le char ni rab 'bab pa/ gang gis sa gzhi 'bras bcas gyur/ /de nas
310a1(mdo 'grel): gus bcas thub pa des/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas/ /bdag la smras pa dag pa yi/ /snying stobs 'di yis khyod ci bzhed/ /ces pa de yis gus pas dris/ /de nas bdag gis de la smras/ /bdag ni spyod pa 'di dag gis/ /yang dag
310a2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/ /skye ba gzhan la 'gro ba rnams/ /bsgral slang rgyal par bdag gyur cig/ ces brjod de yis bdag la smras/ /khyod ni de bzhin gshegs par gyur/ /gang tshe yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /thams cad mkhyen par khyed gyur ba/ /de?
310a3(mdo 'grel): tshe bdag gis lus gzhan ni/ /khyod kyi rjes su gzung bar bya/ /dam pa de yi tshig 'di ni/ /mdza' bas bdag gis kha yis blangs/ /ri 'ong de nga skye ba 'dir/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni yang dag thob/ /khyim bdag bu ni ngang pa 'di/ /thub pa brtul zhugs bzang zhes
310a4(mdo 'grel): pa /de yin sngon gyi rab 'bad ni/ /dran pas bdag gis dge la bkod/ /de ltar gus la mnyes gshin pa/ thams cad gzigs pa rgyal ba yis/ /rang gi sngon byung gsungs bdag/ thos nas de dag ya mtshan gyur/ rdza mkhan bzhin du ma tshang med pa'i 'bras//
310a5(mdo 'grel): skyed byed dge ba'i spyod pas 'di la gnas/ /nyin mo'i bdag dang yongs 'dris btang gyur pa/ /bsil zer mdzes pa'i dpal ni mtshungs med bzhin/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtoD pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing
310a6(mdo 'grel): las ri bong gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa bzhi pa'o// //lce gnyis gang zhig bros pas kun spyod gtsang ma rnams la ni/ /rdzun gyi skyod brjod mi bzad dug ni rab tu spro byed pa/ /sdig smod yongs su gdung ba brgyud mas gzir ba de dag ni//
310a7(mdo 'grel): mi bzad 'dod bya min pa'i rab rib? khung du 'jug bar 'gyur/ /kha tsher? ri? yi gnas su ni/ /re btas? zhes pa sngon/ /'byung bo kun la brtse ba'i gnas/ /dge slong bcu la? zhugs bcang ba byung/ /nam zhig de yi bum nang du/ shing shun dur smrig dag gis ni//
310b1(mdo 'grel): nags tshal dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /chos gos kha ni bsgyur ba byas/ /skabs der drus ma'i be'u nyams/ /bram ze phra ma can zhes pa/ /skye bo ba lang za bar ni/ dog pa dang ldan tshol du 'ongs/ de yis ril ring po nas/ /chos gos chos khu mchod pa yi/ /me las skyes pa'i dub
310b2(mdo 'grel): dag/ /mthong nas be'u bcos par bsams/ /de nas mtshon cha lag rnams dang/ /lhan cig gnyis skyes ril 'dzegs/ /dge slong rai ba ta la ni/ /mngon phyogs dul bas rab dris pa/ 'phags pa 'di dag ci zhig mdzad/ ces pa de yi gus pas dris/ bzang po 'di ni gos
310b3(mdo 'grel): 'tshed ces/ rai ba ta yis de la smras/ /gnas skabs der ni sngon med kyi/ de yi las kyi rnam smin gyi/ /'tshed pa de ni pa lang gi/ sha khrag chu dang bcas par gyur/ /sgrub byed 'khrug par gyur pa na/ bde ba sdug bsngal nyid 'gyur zhing/ dkar po dag kyang nag por 'gyur
310b4(mdo 'grel): chos kyang chos min nyid du 'gyur/ rdzun gyis sdig pa gsal byed dang/ skye bo khro dang bcas nas lhung/ 'di dag bsod nams ma yin pa/ /yongs smin mtshan nyid mngon sum yin/ skyes bu rnams kyis nyes byas mngon sgrubs smin pa'i dus su ni/ skyon rnams rab tu
310b5(mdo 'grel): rgyas shing yon tan dag ni nyams par gyur/ bya ba phyin ci log 'gyur blo gros rnam par bslang bar 'gyur/ mngon par 'joms pa chen pos nges par su mi ltung/ 'gal ba'i sha yi dri dang ni/ /khrag gis kyang ni dags pa yi/ bram ze de yi bum par ni/ chos gos
310b6(mdo 'grel): sha nyid gyur ba bltas/ skyon ni mngon sum mthong gyur nas/ khro ba'i rnam 'gyur dbyibs ldan zhing/ /mi bzang sdig pas 'dar ba des/ /smod cing de la rab smras pa/ kye ma dam pa'i kun spyod ldan/ mi med nags su gnas pa 'di/ gang gi las ni 'di 'dra ba/ 'dir ni?
310b7(mdo 'grel): su yang mthong ba med/ /rab tu byung bar lus sgyur cing/ /bya ba kla klo'i skye bor 'os/ /sdig pas bsgribs pa'i rdzun gyis ni/ /brtul zhugs zhi? nyid su yis shes/ zhes des rmod bcas brjod pa'i tshe/ rai? ba ta yis rab bsams pa/ /skyon ni mngon sum mtshon 'di
311a1(mdo 'grel): la/ /lan med bdag ni ci zhig smra/ /bdag gi 'di ni ltas bcom zhes/ /brjod kyang sa zhig bden par 'dzin/ /mngon sum gsang ba'i skye ba ni/ bzhad gang dag gi gnas su 'gyur/ /mi smra 'ba' zhig la brten? te/ nye bar gnas pa kun bzo?
311a2(mdo 'grel): bya/ /bdag la bcos su med pa 'di/ /chu las me? ni? rab tu 'khrungs/ /skyon la yon tan phul byung myur du yon tan dag la skyon/ /bdud rtsi'i gnas la dug dang dug la yang ni bdud rtsi ste/ /nges par myong bya? dus ni mig 'phrul byed pa'i bud med 'di/ /rtag tu rmad
311a3(mdo 'grel): byang rang bzhin nyid ni rab tu ston par byed/ /ces sems de ni mi smra bas/ /gnyis skyes lhag par khris gyur te/ /sdig pa bzhin du sbom pa yi/ /dbyug ba mgo la yang dag bsnan/ /khrag gis bgos de gnyis skyes des/ /bcings nas sa bdag mdun sang khrid/ /de
311a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin sha dang bcas par bstan/ /btson khang dag gi mgron du byas/ /skyon med dag ni nyon mongs spyod/ /sdig pa sbas pa dar gyur ba/ /dbang med mtshar ba'i rnam pa la/ /su yi dag pa su yis shes/ /btson khang dag tu bcing ba de/ /dus kyis brjod par gyur pa na//
311a5(mdo 'grel): be'u thob nas gnyis skyes ni/ /tshul ngan ngo chas? cang mi smra/ /de nas lo ni bcu gnyis na/ /nam mkha' i skad kyis rtogs bya shing/ /de slob kyis spran mi bdag gi /dge slong bcings pa dag las bkrol/ /btson ra? dag las keng rus bzhin/ /red ba'i rnam pa
311a6(mdo 'grel): mdog mi sdug/ gos med skra ni gyen du langs/ /de ni yi dags bzhin du 'thon/ /kye ma rdo steng ri mo bzhin/ /las kyi rgyun ni g.yo ba med/ /gang phyir mngon shes thob pas kyang/ /drag pa'i nyon mongs sdug bsngal thob/ /de mthong sa bdag dga' bo ni/ /drag
311a7(mdo 'grel): bor 'gyod bas rab gdungs pas/ /bdag med las byung bdag nyid kyis/ /bsod nams dman pa nyid la smad/ /de yis dge slong zhabs la gtugs/ /dang byas gos kyis g.yogs nas smras/ /mi shes las skyes bdag gi skyon/ /'phags pa khyod
311b1(mdo 'grel): kyis bzod par 'os/ /gnyis skyes de yis de tshe nyid/ /be'u dag ni thams cad thob/ /sdig can bdag ni gti mug gis/ /khyod nyid bcings pa brjed par gyur/ /mdun sar khyod ni su yis kyang/ /skal? ba zhan pas yod ma shes/ /sa bdag lhung bar thob ba na/ /dag pa rnams
311b2(mdo 'grel): la chad pa lhung/ sa yi mgon pos 'di brjod tshe/ /bzod pas bsam ba rab bkrus pa/ /re ba ta yis de la smras/ /rgyal po bdag la khro ba med/ ci yang khyod kyis gnod ma byas/ /nyon mongs rgya che lhung gyur ba/ /bdag la rang las mtshungs pa'i 'bras/ /smin pa
311b3(mdo 'grel): de ni nye bar gnas/ /gang zhig 'dod ldan nyid kyis rgud pa kun gyis mgrin nas 'dzin par byed pa dang/ /gang zhig phun tshogs yan lag thams cad lhag pa'i longs spyod skal bzang nyams byed dang/ /gang zhig rang 'dod bde ba'i gnas su rnam par rtse dang
311b4(mdo 'grel): gang zhig ring du 'ching byed pa/ /de dag skyes bu rnams kyi rang las 'khar ba'i 'khri shing smin pa'i 'bras bu bkra/ /zhes smra de la mi bdag gis/ /dge mtshan dag las rab smras pa/ /blo bzang khyod kyi 'di yang ni/ /las ngan ci yi 'bras bu yin/ /des smras ba ra
311b5(mdo 'grel): NA sir sngon/ /ku tha zhes pa gdug spyod can/ /ba lang rku zhing de yi shas/ /zas ni sgrub bdag tu gyur/ /nam zhig ba lang bsad pa yi/ /sha bzung 'jigs nas bros pa bdag/ ba lang bsrung ba 'khor bcas rnams/ /khros pa yis ni mngon par gces/ /de nas
311b6(mdo 'grel): bdag gis nye bar ni/ /gsar pa'i sha dag rab bkod nas/ /rang sangs rgyas ni tsham rkun no/ /zhes pa de dag rnams la bstan/ /ba lang gsod sdig drag pos khros/ /de dag gis de sha mthong nas/ /'bad nas 'di ni gsad bya zhes/ /tshogs pa rnams kyis bcings
311b7(mdo 'grel): te bzung/ /de nas 'gyod pas bdag gis ni/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis na song ste/ /bdag gis sdig byas zhes brjod nas/ /de ni btson ra dag nas btang/ /sdig pa de smin bdag gis ni/ /dmyal bar yun ring nyams myong nas/ /skye ba 'dir yang nyon mongs ni/ /lo
312a1(mdo 'grel): ni bcu gnyis rab tu thob/ /zhes brjod mi bdag la gsol nas/ /lha dang lha min rab 'dud thob/ /rdzu 'phrul bstan na re? ba ta/ /dge slong rnams dang lhan gcig song/ /bden med skyon gyi bye brag rigs ba ni/ /mngon sum du mtshon ma
312a2(mdo 'grel): nyams mtshan nyid kyis/ /brlang pos zil mnan skye bo dam pa ni/ /yul gzhan dag tu btsongs bzhin ci zhig brjod/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las rai ba ta yi rtogs pa
312a3(mdo 'grel): brdzad pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa lnga pa'o// //rgyal bar 'dod rnams bzhin du stobs kyis ni/ /bzod dka' 'khor ba'i dgra yi stobs bcom nas/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid chen po ni/ /rgyas pa bstan pa rnams kyis thob par 'gyur/ /gang
312a4(mdo 'grel): tshe grong khyer lta bu'i mdo/ /bcom ldan gyis gsungs de yi tshe/ /dge slong rnams kyi dge mtshan las/ /dris pa de yi rab gsungs ba/ /grong khyer gser can zhes pa ni/ /skye bo mtho ris 'od ldan byung/ /der ni mi bdag 'do dang ldan/ /gser zhes bya ba byung
312a5(mdo 'grel): bar gyur/ /de yi dga' ba mchog tu ni/ /rab tu rgyas pa dag gi gnas/ /bu ni gser gyi go cha dang/ /bu mo gser 'od dag tu gyur/ /dus kyis lang tsho la mdzes shing/ /nu ma'i me tog phun bus mdzes/ /mdzes pa de mdzes dpyid kye ni/ /yid 'ong dbyibs can
312a6(mdo 'grel): 'khri shing bzhin/ /gzhon la mdza' bas yongs 'dris ba/ /blon po'i bu gzhon 'dod ldan na ni/ /'dod ba'i snying po zhes pa yis/ /de la dal gyis 'dod pa bsten/ /me tog dus su rab zhugs shing/ /lang tsho can gyi brtan 'phrog tshe/ /snyem dang 'grogs
