312a7(mdo 'grel): bud ba ni/ /yang dag rgyu ba su yis zlogs/ /bu mo spyod tshul nyams pa dag/ shes nas? sa bdag khengs ldan ni/ /mi bzad mya ngan khro ba yi/ /me gnyis dag la mtshungs par zhugs/ /de? dag pa bsten pa rnams la bsod nams kyis ? mchod 'os rigs ni
312b1(mdo 'grel): bu mos dman par 'gyur/ bslang bya min pa'i slong ba'i gdong bzhin du/ /skad cig gis ni bu mos rigs nyams byed/ de nas sa yi bdag po'i bkas/ /bu mo blon po'i bu de yod/ /bka' ni byed pa rnams dag gis/ /blangs nas gsang pa'i gnas su khyer/ de nas skyabs ni
312b2(mdo 'grel): zhu byed pa/ /de dag snying rje rgyas pa yi/ /rgyal sras kyis ni rang grol las/ /grong khyer gzhan pa dag tu khrid/ /de nas sa bdag brtsa med cing/ /bros pas dgra ni dgra po bzhin/ /bu ni nges par rab bskad de/ mdza' 'khob nags kyis gron du byas/ /snying stobs chu gtor phas
312b3(mdo 'grel): bskrad des/ /'jug dogs nags tshal sar 'khyams nas/ /dga' ba'i skyed tshal padmo can/ /mi med grong khyer mdzes pa thob/ /deng ni srid mo gser gyi 'od/ /skye bo dang bral skyo ba ni/ /grang khyer dag gi lha mo bzhin/ /gcig pu nyid na mthong bar gyur/ de yis gtong ba'i
312b4(mdo 'grel): rgyud dag dris/ /de yis ming por yongs shes nas/ /mdza' bas mchi ma'i char 'bebs shing/ /de la lan ni rab smras pa/ /ming po n+ya gro d+ha brten pa'i/ /gnod sbyin stobs chen snun byed pa/ /drug cu'i grangs kyis grong khyer 'di/ /skye bo med pa dag tu byas/ 'di brlag lhag
312b5(mdo 'grel): ma da lta ni/ bdag dang blon po'i bu de ste/ /da ni khyod kyi dbung pa yi/ /stobs mthus bdag cag skyabs pa nyid/ /ces pa srid mo'i tshig thos nas/ /rgyal po'i bu yis mda' rnams kyis/ /gnod sbyin phreng ba 'ongs ba dag gnod sbyin gcig gis lhag ma byas/ gnad sbyin ?
312b6(mdo 'grel): Tar zhes pa/ de nyid la ni skyabs song zhing/ 'bangs kyi dngos po thob pa des/ /de yi rgyal ba bsgrags pa byas/ /slar yang grong de grong khyer pas/ khengs shing 'tshe ba med pa na/ /srid mo'i bdag po blon po'i bu/ /rgyal sras kyis ni rgyal por byas/ /ngo? mtshar dang bcas
312b7(mdo 'grel): bu yi mthu/ /nyan rna dag gis bshad thos nas/ sa yi bdag po gser gyis ni/ /sprid yig dag gi 'bad pas bos/ /yab kyis cod pan bcings gyur cing/ rgyal tshab gzi brjod ldan gyur ba/ /dbang po dbang gyur de yis/ /gling bzhi ldan pa dbang? du byas/ 'khor 
313a1(mdo 'grel): ba bzhin du dgra yi sde/ /gang gis kun tu brlag byas pa/ /dpal ldan rgyal po'i gzhon nu der/ /nga nyid de yi dus na gyur/ snying stobs mdzes ldan dam chos seng ge'i khri la spros pa yis ni nyer zhugs shing/ /tshul khrims gtsug
313a2(mdo 'grel): tor dang ldan dben pa'i chu yis mngon par dbang bskur dpal thob bas/ /mi zang rgya che srid pa'i nyon mongs phreng ba rgyud mar gyur pa'i dgra bcom nas/ /rab zhi thob cing kun las rgyal ba dag gis myang 'das sa de spyod par byed/ /gnod sbyin dang mtshungS
313a3(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs brlag byas nas/ /shin tu dri med grong khyer lta bu yi/ /mya ngan 'da' ba 'ga' zhig dag gis thob/ /ces pa gsungs nas bcom ldan rnam par gnas/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas ba'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag
313a4(mdo 'grel): bsam gyi 'khri shing las gser gyi go cha'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa drug pa'o// //bsod nams rab 'bar bsam pa dri med rnams/ /yon tan la chags nam yang nor la min/ /rnal 'byor la sbyor longs spyod dag la min//
313a5(mdo 'grel): rdul gyi chags bral la dga' 'dod la min/ /bsod nams ri bo bcoM ldan 'das?/ /de bzhin gshegS pas bsod ni mthu/ /de yi bsod nams la gus pas/ /ya mtshan dge slong gis dris gsung/ /ba ra NA sir rgyal po ni/ /tshangs byin dag gis sa srungs tshe/ /khyim
313a6(mdo 'grel): bdag zas ni gtsang ma dag /nor sbyin dang ni mtshungs pa byung/ /rgya mtshor 'gro bas rab bsgrub sla ba/ /nor bu mu tig tshogs rnams kyis/ /slong bdag gi dpag bsam shing/ /de yi khyim ni yongs gang gyur/ /nam zhig rin chen gling gzhan nas/ /skyes bu mu
313a7(mdo 'grel): tig do shal dag /khyer nas lta ru song bar gyur/ sa bdag sngon du langs byas nas/ /gus pas mchod pa de yi ni/ /dpal gyi rtse dga' dgod pa bzhin/ /gsal ba'i do shal de la phul/ /'od ldan skud par yang dag chags/ /rgyu skar gyi ni tshogs lta bu/ /yon
313b1(mdo 'grel): tan ldan pa'i do shal gyis/ /sa bdag snying ni gzung bar byas/ /gnas skabs 'dir ni rgyal po yis/ /bu mo gzhon nu dbyangs can ma/ /ba gam can gyi nang song bas/ /legs ldan tshig gis legs bshad blangs/ /rna ba'i bdud rtsi 'dod pa yis/ legs bshad khyim bdag gis
313b2(mdo 'grel): thos nas/ /spu long myu gu'i rnam pa can/ /da yi rang bzhin rang khyim song/ /de nas zas dang rtse dga' btang/ /legs bshad kyis ni bsam pa phrogs/ /gnyid kyis dbul ba de yis ni/ /rang gi khyim du yun ring bsams/ /kye ma rgyal po'i bu mo des/ /legs pa'i legs
313b3(mdo 'grel): bshad glur blangs pa/ /gang des yongs su ma spyad kyang/ bdud rtsi dag ni byin pa bzhin/ /bdag gis lo ni bcu gnyis kyis/ rin chen tshogs ni yangs pa dag /thob de legs bshad rin chen ni /'ga' zhig las kyang nyer ma bsgrubs/ /'bad pa brgya yis bsags
313b4(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ rdo lci rin chen rnams kyi lci/ dam pa'i lam ni gsal byed pa'i/ /legs bshad de ltar rin chen yin/ /zhes pas bsams nas mi bdag ni/ /khang par skyes bu rab btang ste/ /legs bshad rgyal po'i bu mo las/ /slong ba po min de yis blangs/ 'dzum
313b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i bzhin ldan des smras pa/ legs bshad rim gyis thob par 'gyur/ de yi rin dang mtshungs pa'i nor/ gal te nus na sbyin par mdzod/ /ji srid lo ni bcu gnyis su/ bden pa'i ngang tshul de yis ni/ /rin chen dam pa'i tshogs bsgrubs pa/ /rin du 'os pa de
313b6(mdo 'grel): sbyin mdzod/ sa skyong bu mo dag gi 'phrin/ 'di dag pho nyes bshad ba ni/ thos nas khyim bdag gus bcas pas/ rin chen thams cad blangs byas nas/ rang nyid rgyal po'i khyim song ste/ /de la rtswa yi rtse dgas byin /de tshe legs bshad rin chen thob/ dga' bas
313b7(mdo 'grel): yang dang yang du brjod/ gang gang phyi 'am nad gi bde ba dpe med cung zad dag dang ni/ gang gang snying stobs kyis bkrun ya mtshan rgyas pa sgrub ba'i sbyor ba dang/ gang gang sred par bzhi dri med rgyun du dga' ba thob pa dag/ de des bsod nams dpag bsam shing gi
314a1(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu smin cing rgyas pa'i khur/ /rgya cher gyur ba'i gter de yis/ /rin chen kun gyis lags bshad ni/ /blangs pa thob nas mi yi bdag ya mtshan bcas pa de 'dri/ /ci slad? rin chen rab btang ?/ /legs ? shar ces ni khyod la bzang/ /bu
314a2(mdo 'grel): mo de yi tshig dag la/ drang bo khyod ni yid ches ldan/ /legs bshad kyis mis gzhi gang/ /nor ni tshogs chen dag gis 'thob/ /zas dang bral ni sa? zhig gis/ /legs bshad dag ni za bar nas/ /zhes pas sa bdag mja' ba yis/ /brjod ba khyim bdag gis thos nas//
314a3(mdo 'grel): legs bshad rnyed ba chen po yis/ /tshim pas de la rab smras pa/ /gang zhig sbrul bzhin skyes bu la/ /chags sdang dug ni skyed byed pa/ /rgyal bo 'bad srungs nyams ba yi/ /rin chen dag gis ci zhig bya/ /legs bshad nor bur legs ldan rnams kyi snying khar brten
314a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i yon tan gyis brtags shing/ /dam pa'i lam ni dri ma dang mtshungs dri mig rgyas pa'i ? spro byed pa/ /'tshed ba las thar gser bzang mdzes pa'i gnas la rang sbyar gnas pa thob pa yi/ /rin ni nor gyi blo gros rgya mtsho'i skar gas dang ldan rkang pa'i
314a5(mdo 'grel): tshal 'ang chung/ /zhes te dpal ldan khyim bdag ni/ /dge ba brtson ldan khyim song nas/ /gser gyi glegs bu la bris te/ /legs bshad phyogs rnams dge tu spang/ /de yi tshe nang nyid ni/ /khyim bdag zas gtsang der gyur te/ /legs bshad bsod nams nyer
314a6(mdo 'grel): ston pa'i/ /don la bdog kun btang pas gus/ /dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di yang/ /sa bdag bu mo der gyur to/ /zhes pa de bzhin gshegs par 'os?/ /'gro? kun dge ba'i slad du gsungs/ /dge ba'i padmo can ni rtsa ba btsugs nas rab bskyed dang po'i rgyu/ /sna tshogS
314a7(mdo 'grel): phun tshogs gsar pa gsar ba'i khri shing rab bskyed skyed tshal sa /sred pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi byed kha ba'i 'jum ldan gi gA'i rgyun dam tu? ba'i lam mchog gsal bar byed mkhas snang bdag ni bsod nams nyid/ /ces pa dge ba yi dbang/ ? byas
314b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi la dri shing las/ /zas gtsang gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dob ste brgya rtsi bdun pa'o// //rgyal ba'i dbang bos bsgrubs pa gtsug lag khang chen dag gi tshogs/ /mchod rten khyims su gser gyi
314b2(mdo 'grel): ri bor? phug gi khang par ni/ /sangs rgyas rtogs brjod rnam mang rmad byung bdag bsam 'khri shing 'di/ /mig gi bdud rtsi yi ge'i rang bzhin dag tu 'khrungs/ /legs byas kyis gang bkra ba'i gtsug lag khang du dam ba rnams ni dge ba'i slad/ /khyad par gyis ni bkra
314b3(mdo 'grel): bar ? cang dga' ba'i rtogs brjod phreng ba gzugs brlan dag/ stong phrag rnam gsal bsod nams rab sbyar 'bar pa de nyid dge ba'i dbang po yis/ /bskal pa'i bar du 'gro ba de bral 'khrugs par ma gyur cig ces gsal bar bkod/ /de yis byang chub sems
314b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' i spyod/ /brgya rtsa bdun po 'di dag byas/ bkra shis grangs ni rdzogs pa la/ /gcig ni rab tu 'bad pas byas/ /de nas zla dbang zhes pa de yi bu/ /ming gzhan nA kA zhes brjod snyan dang gas mkhan/ /rgyal ba'i gtam rgyud rgya che sbyar ba 'dir/ /rtogs pa brjod pa
314b5(mdo 'grel): lhag ma sgong byed 'gyur/ /mtshams sbyor ke ra la yi bu mo'i sgra tshogs rnam pa mchog tu yang dag 'brel/ /ci yang rab tu dang ba rgyas pa ke ri'i mdzes ma'i 'gram pa shin tu mnyan/ /ro yi gter gyur gang gi 'khyog tshig g.yo ldan karta Ta ma'i mig gzer//
314b6(mdo 'grel): yongs 'dris rna ba'i bar du 'grogs ldan legs bshad chu gter de ni phyag byang 'os/ /gang gis oM yig dag las gya gyu kho na mchog tu bslabs kyis gzhan ma yin/ /gang gi kha nas sra sti'i tshig ni gsal ba nam yang nges par mi 'byung zhing/ /khro ba 'bang? bas
314b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin ni mdog bral mi srung rigs byed gter gyur de dag gis/ /drag po'i gnod pa bzhin du rgya che gtam gyi snyan dngags dag ni ji ltar bzod/ /dge dbang zhes ba'i snyan dngags mkhan gyi rtog pa brjod ba dpag ? 'khri shing 'di byas na/ /de ni dam ? kyi smon
315a1(mdo 'grel): lam 'di dag blo gros nor ldan blo yis 'dzin/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan sgrogs byed bsdebs las bdag gis bsod nams gang zhig nyer bsgrubs pa/ /de yi skye bo 'di ni sems can mdza' dag dge la rtag tu brtson gyur cig /'khor bas che
315a2(mdo 'grel): bar yongs su dal zhing 'dod ba'i chad gis myos pa nyid 'dzin la/ /gti mug rgyas ba'i mun pa dag gis mig zum nyal zhing dran pa yis/ /'gro ba rab tu rtogs par sgrub la chas shing skyon rnams ma lus 'joms byed pa/ /'od dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan
315a3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas rab tu sad pa nyid la rtag tu bstod/ /kun dga' i gnyen gyur lan cig min par rgya che yid can la/ /legs bshad 'od kyis bde ba kun gyi nye bar bstan pa sgrub/ /dri med dang rigs chu gter dag gi dga' ba'i dbang/ /grags pa gsal ba
315a4(mdo 'grel): skyod byed yab la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa dag byed tshig ni smin pa'i gter/ /sgrul? byed bsod nams brtag pa dge ba'i mngon par sbyor ba nyid/ /bla ma legs byas ldan pa bka' ni rab tu sbyin mdzad bas/ /yongs su rdzogs
315a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i slad du bdag la skal ba'i cha shas mdzad/ /gang zhig phug tu rgyal ba'i rtogs brjod dang/ /gser gyi gzugs brnyan rab tu rgyas bar gyur mig ni bdud rtsi bkra ba'i ri mo chags/ /de ni gtsug lag khang gi dus kyi mnga' o/ /dbyangs can pir gyis rnam par
315a6(mdo 'grel): bkra ba yi/ /rtogs pa brjod pa'i yi ge'i rim pas phris/ /gang 'di bsod nams rang bzhin gtsug lag khang/ /don chen dam pa dga' byed yab kyis bsgrubs/ /phyogs su po ti'i phreng ba rab bkod pa'i/ /gzugs brnyan tshogs ni brtan par rab chags ba/ /de ni chu dang
315a7(mdo 'grel): mes bskyed nyer 'tshe yi/ /dus bzhi 'jig kyang nyams pa yod ma yin/ /de la rtogs brjod gcig gi gzugs brnyan 'di/ /mi zad bsod nams la chags bdag kyang 'god/ /bdag nyid chen po der nas rdzas 'brang pa/ /nyan tu chur yang 'bad ?
315b1(mdo 'grel): por 'gyur/ /thos pa'i skyogs kyis btung bya'i bdud rtsi snyan pa dag gi rgyun/ /dri bzang khang pa bzhin gyi padmo'i gnas su sgrogs byed pa/ /bung ba'i na chung dang mtshungs yab kyi skad la btud nas ni/ /snyan dngags rgya tsho'i khyad par lhag ma bdag gis rdzogs
315b2(mdo 'grel): par byas/ /mdzes ma gsar du sgrogs pa'i dga' ston can dang lha yi mthu ldan dpal dang ni/ /dar bab rgyan gyi ? /? longs spyod dpa' rlabs rtswa yi rtse dga' btang byas nas/ /gus bcas gang dag brtse bas gzhan gyi srog ni bskyab par bsgrub la rang gi lus//
315b3(mdo 'grel): brol med sbyin la g.yo ba med pa de la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan rig pa 'dzin ba'i dbang/ /sprin gyi rtog ni sprin bzhin du/ /slong ba'i gdung ba 'khrod pa dag /grong khyer gser du byung bar gyur/ /gang gi dpag bsam shing las 'khrungs/ /rtag tu
315b4(mdo 'grel): gsar pa gsar pa'i dpal/ /grags ba'i me tog bsod nams kyi/ /dri bzang rgyas pa rnam par mdzes/ /chu gter las ni zla ba bzhin/ /sprin gyi bzhi na bde yi sras/ /shin tu lhag pa'i bsod nams rnams/ /gsar du tshogs ba bzhin du gyur/ /dam pa'i skye bo
315b5(mdo 'grel): legs byas dang/ /yon tan ldan ba dul ba dang/ /'byor ba ldan ba gtong bar? bzhin/ de ni sras po de yis mdzes/ /de yis bu la dpag bsam shing/ /rgyal srid che dang bcas gtong nas/ /dka' thub slad du zhi ba'i gnas/ /pa la yar ni dben bas song/ /ya? ba ni
315b6(mdo 'grel): btsun mo dang 'grogs te dpal btang dka' thub nags song tshe/ /sprin gyi bzhin ba 'byor pa dag /thob pa yis ni rab bsams pa/ /bla ma bsten pa dang bral ba/ /bdag la dpal 'di bde med gyur/ /mig gis dman pa dag la ni/ /ri mo'i gnas dag 'bral
315b7(mdo 'grel): mid? bzhin/ /yab kyi zhabs la gtugs chos na mo'i 'od kyi phreng ba yis/ /rnam bar mdzes pa'i cod pan dang ldan de yis bka' nyan pa'i/ /rna rgyan gyis brgyan dpal ni ji ltar bdag la sngon gyur pa/ /blta 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'byor ba dag la da lta mar?
316a1(mdo 'grel): ces bsams de yis 'jig rten ni/ /kun la phan slad rang nyid kyi/ /dpag bsam rkad 'thud? gser gyi char/ /'bebs ba dag tu bstar byas nas/ /rgyal srid chen po rab btang ste/ /yab kyi bsti gnas dag tu song /'jig rten gsum gyi snying bo yi//
316a2(mdo 'grel): dbang phyug sems yangs rnams la rtswa/ /rgyal srid chen po btang nas de/ /ma la ya yi rir song tshe/ /dpag bsam ljon pas sa bzhi ni/ /gser gyis yongs bkang mkha' la song/ /sprin gyi bzhin pas ri bo ni/ /dpal gyi dum bus brgyan par phyin/ /pha ma'i
316a3(mdo 'grel): zhabs pad bsten pa yis/ /'bral ba'i gdung ba rab tu btang/ /skabs der tsan dan 'khri shing rlung bzhon gyis/ /bskyod cing shugs rings glal ba bsten rnams la/ /'dod ba'i grogs bor gyur ba dpyid kyis ni/ /mngon bar 'dod pa'i spyod tshul rab tu bstan//
316a4(mdo 'grel): khyo bral 'dod ldan ma yi mi mthun phyogs/ /lho phyogs rlung ni yang yang rab tu ldang/ /'gro las rgyal slad nya yi rgyal mtshan gyis/ /rlung gi mtshon ni 'phral la rab sbyor bzhin/ /rkang drug dkyil 'khor dag gis ma spras pa/ /stug bor rgyas bas lce pe
316a5(mdo 'grel): nyid gyur ba'i/ /cu ta'i shing gis mo phyir phyag rgya bcings lang tsho can la mngon 'dod bslab pa byas/ dpyad kyi dpal mo dag gi rna ba'i rgyan/ /ri bo'i ngos la mya ngan med ba mdzes/ /grong khyer ma yi rkang pas rab bsnan pas/ /yal 'dab gsar pa dag la
316a6(mdo 'grel): tshon 'phos bzhin/ /mdzes ma'i kha yi chad gis dga' ldan ba/ /'dod pa'i thabs 'di skal ldan bdag nyid la/ /zhes steng ku la shing me tog gi/ thol gyis dga' zhing 'dzum ba'i dpal skyes bzhin/ /khengs ldan ma rnams khengs pa rab btung zhing/ /mi
316a7(mdo 'grel): smra spangs nas rkang par rab btud de/ /mdza' bo dag la dang bar byed mthong nas/ sindu bA ra me tog gis rgong bzhin/ /ge sar rgyas pa'i khur bstan pA la shig/ /phreng ba mdzes ba dpyid kyi med ?/ /khengs ldan ma yi khangs ? glang ??
316b1(mdo 'grel): khrag bsgos sngar mo'i phreng ba bzhin/ /rna bar snyan sgrogs khu byug bu mo yis/ /reg la shi ri Shas mig kar+Ni ka ra/ /sma la ge sar rdul tshogs rgyas pa yis/ /me tog 'gyur gnas dpal gyis dga' char phab/ /bung ba'i na chung rnam 'phrul longs spyod ldan//
316b2(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsis myos shing rnam par 'khyam dus der/ /me tog rab rgyas 'khri shing tshal gyi gzhir/ /rig 'dzin rgyal po'i sras ni rnam par rgyu/ /des der gser las bsgrub ba'i khang bar ni/ /grub pas rab tu gnas byas rin chen gzugs/ /go ? mchod nas rgyud mangs glu
316b3(mdo 'grel): len pa'i/ /zla ba gsar blta bu bu mo mthong/ /yid srubs 'tsho slad go ri mnyes ba yi/ /sgrub byed la ni rab tu gnas byas pa/ /'dod ba'i chung ma gzhan bzhi ni de mthong nas/ /sprin gyi bzhon pa ya mtshan rgya tshor gyur/ /de nas ri dags mig yangs ngo tsha yis//
316b4(mdo 'grel): dung bas glu mthar rgyud mangs bad ba nas/ /dal gyis phab pas rig 'dzin rgyal po'i bu/ /mda' bzhag 'dod pa dag dang mtshungs ba mthong mig zer mdzes pa'i rgyan ldan mngon 'dod des/ /phan tshun lta bar byed pa'i rnam 'phrul gyis/ /yid ni nyes par
316b5(mdo 'grel): mtshams sbyor pha nya bzhin/ /de dag par du 'gro dang 'ong bar byas/ /gsar mthong la yang phyogs su ltung? zhabs pa/ /'dong ba bad 'tsho'i dang bo'i rgyal mo des/ /skye ba gzhan du goms pa'i ra las bzhin/ /da yi srid mtsho che zhing dang bar zhugs/ /rin chen zla
316b6(mdo 'grel): bar dri med ri po dang/ /bu mo ? tshogs kyi 'ben la dran ba'i mda'/ /rab rgyas pad+ma dag tu bung ba bzhin/ /chags ldan de yis sems la 'phel? zhugs gyur/ /grogs mo ba mo'i gnyis ?'dod ? gis bskyed ngo tshas? ? byed cing//
316b7(mdo 'grel): brtan yang rmad byung gzugs kyis drangs gyur pa/ /rigs 'dzin zla bas dben bar mngon phyogs smras/ /smin legs ci slad sngon du 'ongs pa la/ /phebs smras bkur ba'i cha ni khyad mi byed/ /dam pa'i kun spyod yon tan gyis mdzes? gzugs so?/ /legs 
317a1(mdo 'grel): ldan rigs kyi rjes mthun rnam par 'dzin/ /kha na ma tho med lus khyod lus mchog /dran ba'i rgyan ni gsar ba zla ba ltar/ /mdzes pa mu tig nor bu nyid 'di ni/ /rab tu mtho ba'i rigs min gang las thog /yang na mdzes ma khyod mi mthong gyur
317a2(mdo 'grel): ba/ bdud rtsis brlan pa deng la rim gro byas/ /mdzes sdug dga' steng ri bong gis mtshan pa'i/ /ri mo su la phebs par smra bar byed/ /'on kyang dga' bas ded kyi dge mtshan tsam/ /gsal ba'i slad du khyod kyis 'di smros shig /dam pa'i phyogs lhung mngon phyogs
317a3(mdo 'grel): byed pa yis/ /su yi rigs ni khyod kyis rgyas par byas/ /zhes pa rig 'dzin cod ban dag gis tshig /'dod dgongs snying po can de thos gyur nas/ /ngo chos de ni mi smra ldan gyur gang/ /de tshe grogs mo ma ta li kas smras/ /gzhon nu rigs 'dzin rgyal rigs bdud rtsi
317a4(mdo 'grel): yin? chu gter gyi ni zla ba khyod 'dir grags/ /ded kyi grong na grub pa'i rtse dga' mas/ /lus med lus ldan khyod ni glu chen byed/ /dpag bsam shing sbyin rtse dags rib? grags ba/ / khyod kyi grags pa yon tan mthu yi rgyan/ /zla ltar dkar ba 'di yi rna rgyan du/ /ming
317a5(mdo 'grel): po nor gyi bshes gnyen dag gis byas/ /sems dpa' chen po de khyod grogs mos gtams/ /dar ma'i nyes spyod bya bas ji ltar 'os/ /khyad par che rnams bdun du bu mo na/ /ngo chos rnam par rul? ba'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ /bu mo 'di ni grub rigs chu gter gyi/ /zla
317a6(mdo 'grel): ba grub bdag sna tshogs nor gyi ste/ /gang gis mdzes pa skyed tshal du rtse tshe/ /rtag ba nyid du ku mur rgyas par byed/ /ma la yar skyes 'khri shing gsar bzhin phra/ /dang por 'khrungs gyur ? 'dab ltar dmar mchu/ /bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin ma la ya can ni// rtag tu
317a7(mdo 'grel): lha dang lha min mngon 'dod pas/ /zhes des smas par gyur ba na/ /nyung du ma rgan po mngon phyogs te/ /myung bar 'ongs ba'i shugs bcas pas/ /grub bdag bu mo la smras pa/ /dag? ma nor gyi bshes gnyen dar/ /lhen cig ngo brang 'khor na 'khor/ /khyod kyi
317b1(mdo 'grel): bag ma'i gtam la chags/ yab ni khyod la lta bar 'tshal/ /zhes pa de yis brjod pa'i 'phral/ /grogs mo dang bcas mig bzang ma/ /yid ni sprin gyi bzhon pa la/ /rnam par bkod nas ngal gyis sor/ /grogs mo phyi nas 'khod la de/ /gtam gyi thol gyis yang dang
317b2(mdo 'grel): yang/ /mdzes ma rnam par lta byed cing/ /le lo'i goms pas 'gro ba'i tshe/ /mngon 'dod gsar pa la brten zhing/ /phrag dog gis bzhon brtan pas btang/ /lam der mig ni gtad pa yi/ /gzhon nu yis ni rab bsams pa/ /kye ma ri dags phru gu'i mig /pha yi drung du
317b3(mdo 'grel): 'gro byed ma/ /de yis 'jigs bzhin chags bcas kyi/ /yid ni bdag la gtams par byas/ /dbugs kyi ngal dub 'bad pas 'gog la chags shing sgra med dag tu rnam par gnas/ /mthong ba'i 'jigs las shin tu dogs pas 'khrugs shing dben pa rung yang
317b4(mdo 'grel): rab 'dar bas/ /yid srubs dag gi mnga' yis rab tu bsnun tshe skyengs pa yis ni chags shing gnas/ /lus phra chom rkun ma de bdag yid la zhugs lam gang nas ni yongs mi shes/ /zhes pa yun ring bsam nas rdo la 'khong/ /yid srubs bka' yi yul du
317b5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa des/ /kun rtog par? gyis mdun du ri dags mig /yang yang mngon bris mig ni g.yo med gyur/ /de nas me tog rdul dang rdul gyis gang/ /nags tshal dben bar rkang ba'i mtsho skyes rgya/ /'khor lo rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan rjes 'brang nas/ /de yi drung du rtsed
317b6(mdo 'grel): grogs gnyen bzang 'ongs/ /mngon 'dod gsang ba'i khyad par bsam pa yis/ /sems ni rab tu bkag de des mthong nas/ /dran pa'i bka' ? yis brtan pa btsongs pa la/ /ngo mtshar bcas pa'i rnam 'gyur rgyu dag dris/ /grogs po brtan pa'i gter gyur khyod la
317b7(mdo 'grel): yang/ /shin tu gdung ba'i gnas 'di nyer bstan cing/ /bsam pa la brten mig ni g.yo med pa/ /brten med rnam pa ci zhig nyams su myong/ /zhes ba yid gzugs gnas ni ? dag/ /rab tu 'bad rtsi'i gus pas dris pa ni/ /shugs rings mthun phyogs rlung
318a1(mdo 'grel): gis rjes dpag bya/ /dran pa'i mda' lhung gzhon nus de la smras/ /grogs po sngon spros sde la skyo ldan pa'i/ /byed bo yis ni gzugs gsar ri mo dag/ grub rigs rgya mtsho'i zla ba ri mo bzhin/ /mdzes ba'i rang bzhin bu mo bdag gis
318a2(mdo 'grel): mthong/ /de yi bzhin gyi padmo mdzes sdug rgyas pas gzi byin nyams ba'i zla ba dang/ /de yi mig dag mdzes pas mig gi dpal ni rab tu nyams pa'i ri dags dag /grags pa zhi zhing sdug bsngal mtshungs pas mtshan mo so sor skyengs te zhum pa yi/ /bdag
318a3(mdo 'grel): nyid dag ni bsam pa g.yo med 'grogs ba 'di nyid mthong bar bdag rtog go /mthong ba'i rnam 'phrul gsar pa yin mod kyang/ /mig gi mdzes ba rna ba'i rgyan byas nges/ /mngon 'dod gsar pa nyams su myong byed pa'i/ /rang gi ngo bo bdag la gsal bar byas
318a4(mdo 'grel): der ni glo bur 'dar zhi dag g.yo ldan sgra dag sgrogs par byed ba'i 'og pag la/ /'jigs pas rab tu zhi bar byed bzhin yang yang gos dag sbyin nas lkug par byas/ /ngo tshas mi smra dang ldan bzhin du de yis rna a'i utpal lhung ba la/ /'khor zhing rgya ba'i bung
318a5(mdo 'grel): ba rnams kyi sgra yis bdag la legs bar 'ongs sam byas/ /bzhin la zla ba brgya phrag dang ni mig gnyis ngag la utpal sngon po'i nags/ /lag pa dag la pad rtsa gzhon nu rkang bar pad+ma'i 'byung gnas rab rgyas pa/ /lus mchog sprul ba phra rab rdul dag gal
318a6(mdo 'grel): te 'dod pas rab tu bkod ba na/ /me yi rang bzhin bzhin du de yis bdag yid mdza' bas phug ba ci slad sreg/ 'dod pa'i ku mung tshal gyi zla ba'i ri mo su zhig de/ /mig gi padmo rnam par rgyas ba'i rgyur ni bdag gis mthong/ /gang gi mdzes pa'i rnam
318a7(mdo 'grel): 'phrul bdud rtsi'i chu bo 'thung ba yis/ /tsha ba'i dug tu gsal byed rmongs pa rtag tu rgyas bar gyur/ /ma la ya can zhes pa'i bu mo ri dags mig can de/ /rtse dga' i bla ma me tog gi mtshon gyi rol rtsod skyed byed ma/ /dri med grub rig
318b1(mdo 'grel): bdud rtsi'i chu gter dag gi rgyu skar bdag/ /sna tshogs nor dag gi ni bu mo yin zhes bdag gis thos/ zhes pa rigs 'dzin rgyal bo dag gi bu/ yid 'byung gsar pa rgyas pa'i tshig thos nas/ /dri za'i gzhon nu yid gcugs dag gis/ /gus ldan gnyen bzang gis ni de la
318b2(mdo 'grel): smras/ /grogs lo dga' bas khyod kyi mngon 'dod 'di/ yon tan mthu dag mtshungs pa'i gnas la spros/ /legs byas ldan pa rnams kyi re ba ni/ nges par dam pa'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur /lha yi bu mo bltas pas mi g.yo ba/ /khyod kyi brtan pa gang gis   g.yo bzhin byed/ dga' ma'i bdag po dag gi ru mtshon de /skal ldan 'jig rten gsum gyi mtshon bya nyid/ /'gro la nya yi mtshan mo rgyal ba dang ldan gcig bu mchog tu mdzes/ /sngo bsangs sde la mchog gi 'byor ba 'dzin pa de nyid skal ba bzang/ gang dang
318b3(mdo 'grel): bral bas mchan bo'i so sor bdud rtsi'i zer ni gzi byin nyams/ ngal gyis sen mo'i kha ris gsar pa phra ba nyid 'dzin lus dang ldan/ brtan pa sten cig khyod kyi 'dod ba gang/ de ni 'bad med lag pa'i rtsen gnas/ grub bdag sna tshogs nor las bu mo de/ /khyod kyi
318b4(mdo 'grel): yab kyi byod? kyi don du bslangs/ 'od ldan zla bas mtshan mo la bzhin gang gi bu mo la/ 'gro gsum dga' bas yong dag sbyor ba bdag gi skal ba bzang/ zhes pa brjod nas grub ba'i bdag po gus dang dga' bas gang/ bu mo yin bag ma'i dga' ston de nyid skyong
318b5(mdo 'grel): bar gyur /grogs po nang bar khyod kyi rtse dga' i dga' ston yangs pa dag/ mdzes ma dang 'grogs bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ldan bde? 'byung ste/ gang la yon tan mtshungs pa 'grogs pa dag ni mthong bas na/ /skye bo shin tu yun ring byed po bsngags pa byed par 'gyur/
318b6(mdo 'grel): zhes pa grogs po'i tshig de thos gyur nas/ /dga' ba'i rang bzhin yangs ba 'phral rgyas de/ /nyin mo'i lhag ma du ma'i dus mtshungs par/ /blo yis rtog cing rang gi gnas su song/ /de nas thun mtshams bu mo dang/ 'grogs bas gur gum 'gros pa bzhin
319a1(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' yi ni skyed tshal du/ /nyi ma chags rtag ldan par 'gyur/ /padmo can dga' nyin mo'i mthar/ /nub ri'i ngos la 'khod ba na/ /de yi mjug tu thun mtshams ni/ /rkang pa bsten pa la chags mdzes/ /de nas nub phyogs chu
319a2(mdo 'grel): gter du/ /nyin mo'i dbang phyug rab lhung tshe/ /de las 'thor ba'i thigs ba bzhin/ /skar ma rnams kyis nam mkha' gang/ /dal gyis mun pa chung ngu gnag/ mtshan mos srid ba'i gnod dag las/ /thun mtshams dmar ba'i chang 'thungs nas/ /myos pa
319a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du skad cig 'khyams/ /de nas bde sogs mdzes pa yi/ /rtse dga' gnas pa shar gyi phyogs/ /zla 'char snang ba nye ba ni/ /tsan dan dag gis mtshan bzhin mdzes/ /de nas bdud rtsi skyed pa ni/ /longs spyod can gyi longs spyod kyi/ /skal bzang rtse dga' 
319a4(mdo 'grel): khyad par can/ /sngo bsangs gdong gi khyad can shar/ /zla ba'i rtse dgar mngon phyogs ba'i/ /ku mud ldan ba mthong gyur nas/ /khro bas zhum bzhin pad+ma can/ /gzi byin nyams shing zum par gyur/ /zla ba'i thig legs ra ba dang/ /skar ma'i tshogs gyi do shal
319a5(mdo 'grel): can/ /sdo bsangs med? thub ba ni/ /dul ba'i mi mthun phyogs nyid gyur/ /de nas mtshan de khang bzang du/ /sred ldan ma la ya can ma/ /gnyid med sprin gyi bzhon pa yi/ /bsam gtan ldan pas rab bsams pa/ /bdag ni bag mar nye ba yi/ /bar na gnas ba'i
319a6(mdo 'grel): mi mthun phyogs/ /mtshan mo 'di ni thun brgya dang/ /ldan ba bzhin du yod mi mdzad/ /kye ma nam mkha' i skyed mos tshal/ /rgyu skar me tog 'dzum ldan pa/ /ri bong can 'grogs dga' ba yi/ /mtshan mo yis ni gtong mi byed/ /shin tu dga' ? mtshan mo 'di//
319a7(mdo 'grel): bdag gi dga' ba'i bgegs su gyur/ /rang nyid bde ba'i rong chags pa/ /su yis gzhan gyi gdung ba shes/ /zhes pa de yi bsam pa ni/ /gdung byed rjes su 'brel pa yi/ /nor bzhin du ni mtshan mo de/ /dal gyis mthong ba min par gyur/ /de nas skya?
319b1(mdo 'grel): reng gos dang ldan/ brel bas zla ba'i me long zags/ dga' ston nye bal chas bzhin/ snang ba ldan pa tho rang mdzes/ padmo can gyi dga' ba shar /mtshan mo'i mun ba zhib na/ 'gyur? bo thams cad bde ba'i smad/ mig gi dga' ston dag tu gyur /de nas pad+ma ldan
319b2(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /nyin byed zer 'dzin la zhugs tshe/ bung ba'i na chung 'grogs ba yis/ bkra shis glu dag rab tu bskrun/ /de nas grub pa'i bdag po ni/ phun tshogs mang ba'i khyim dag tu/ bu mo'i bag ma'i dga' ston dag /rtsom ba'i chas ni rab tu bstar/ /ci ste grub pha'i
319b3(mdo 'grel): na chung kyis /lha yi gos dang rgyan rnams kyis /bu mo brgyan ba mthong gyur nas/ /lha mo rnams kyis phan tshun smras/ 'di yi nu ma rab mdzes pa/ do shal khur gyis rab tu bsgribs/ /mdzes sdug sgrib par byed pa yi shin tu mang ba'i rgyan gyis ci/ grogs mo lus
319b4(mdo 'grel): ? nu ma'i ngos la rin chen phreng ba'i khur gyis ci zhig byed /khyed ni bkra bar rgyan la mkhas te mig bzang dag la mig sman 'dis kyang ci/ /bzhin ras zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la khyod kyis 'bad nas dga' bar bsgrubs ba'i tshon/ gla rtsi dag gi dog pa rnams ni dri ma
319b5(mdo 'grel): chags bar byed pa 'di la ltos/ /de ltar kun rteg brjod pa yis /grogs mos rgyan ni rnam 'phrul ni/ /bkra shis slad du rtags gyur pa/ /shin tu chung ba dag kyang mdzes/ de nas nam mkha' i gzhal yas khang/ nor bu phreng ba'i zer phreng can/ do shal ba gam can lta
319b6(mdo 'grel): bus/ /sprin gyi bzhon pa rab tu 'ongs/ /yon tan la gus 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod/ /grub ba'i mgon bos mchod par gyur pa de/ /rigs 'dzin phreng ba brgya phag rjes 'brang zhing/ /bstar byas bkra shis sa gzhi dag tu phyin/ de nas rin chen gzhal yas
319b7(mdo 'grel): khang gnas pa/ /yid skyes rtse dga' i 'khri shing bu mo ni/ /bag ma la dga' mdzes ba'i cha dag gis/ /phyogs la rgyan dag ster ba bzhin du 'ongs/ /grogs mo'i lag pas bskyod pa'i rnga la'i rtses/ /rna ba'i utpal yal 'dab lhung gyur pa/ /'gram par reg bas skad
320a1(mdo 'grel): cig de rab mdzes/ /rtags yon zla bas brgyan ba'i mtshan mo bzhin/ /de nas bag ma'i dga' ston chen po la/ /cho ga bzhin zhugs grub bdag bu mo yi/ /lag bzung reg pa gsang ba'i bdud rtsi yis/ /rigs 'dzin rgyal po'i bu ni dga' 
320a2(mdo 'grel): bar gyur/ /khyo shug de dag lus ni bag ma'i tshe/ /do shal cher 'os rin chen la 'phos mdzes/ /mdza' bas snying la go skabs thob gyur nas/ /phan tshun rab tu dang bas zhugs pa bzhin/ /bag ma'i cho ga rab tu sbyar byas pa/ /mchod yon bsten pa de dag rgyal bo'i
320a3(mdo 'grel): khyams/ /glu dang gar ldan mtho ris ltar mdzes pa/ /rin chen stan bkod dga' ston 'os bar song/ /de nas dga' ston spro ba'i khyad par gyi/ /gar gyis ngal bzhin 'dab brgya'i sbrang rtsi 'thungs/ /tsha zer lan po'i zer phreng nub ri yi/ /dos la 'khod bas dal
320a4(mdo 'grel): gyis ngal bsos bsten/ /de nas 'od chags nyin mo'i dpal dang ni/ /chags ldan thun mtshams dag kyang khrid byas nas/ /'od zer phreng ba skyed tshal la chags bzhin/ /lhun po'i pha rol des kyi sa gzhir song/ /rgyu skar g.yo ldan mtshan mo ri dags mig/ nyin
320a5(mdo 'grel): mo'i 'dzug tu gos sngon ldan ma mthong/ /'jigs shing 'khrul bas yang yang phyogs rnams su/ /rnam par blta zhing mngon par 'gro ba bzhin/ /de nas shar gyi ri rtser ri bong can/ /'od zer 'phreng pa shal gyi dra bas bstan/ /pa gam cher mdzes dga' ston chen
320a6(mdo 'grel): po la/ /grub ba'i bu mo'i gar la blta ba bzhin/ /rgyu skar rgyu dang 'bras yos me tog gtor/ /mtshan mo zla bas bag mar blangs ba der/ /sbrang rtsi'i brtul zhugs sbrang rtsis myos pa can/ /ku mung 'byung gnas ci yang rab dag 'gyur/ /de nas nyams dga' dga' 
320a7(mdo 'grel): ston chen po der/ /phreng ba do shal rab 'bar dbu ba g.yo/ /grub pa'i na chung 'jig rten rnam par mdzes/ /zla shar bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshos phyur ba bzhin/ /de nas snga dro mchod ston chen po ni/ /yongs su rgyas tshe grogs dang phrad pa yis/ /nyi 'od gzhon nus li khri'i?
320b1(mdo 'grel): tshogs kyis bzhin/ /grub pa'i grong du grong pa'i rtse dga' byung/ /dga' ston chen po rmad byung dga' ba'i sa/ /nyi ma drug ni dal gyis rab 'das te/ /nyi ma bdun ba'i dang bo ni ngos la/ /rig 'dzin rgyal bo'i bu ni rnam par rgyu/ /der ni gdengs ka'i nor bu'i 'od zer
320b2(mdo 'grel): dag /rab gsal dra? bas snang ba rgyas byed pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs bzhin ras can/ /klu gzhon ma dang bcas pa mdun du mthong/ /mchi ma stug por rab 'bab thigs pa yis/ /phreng bas nu ma'i dkyil 'khor dkrigs gyur cing kar ba drag mya ngan
320b3(mdo 'grel): kyis bcom 'dar ba der/ /snying rje'i cho de rab tu bsangs pa thos/ /kyi hud mnyes gshin sa 'og nor bu'i sgron/ /ji ltar khyod ni brlag la nye ba thob/ khyod gdong chu skyes kun dga' i tshogs bzhin mdzes/ /'di ni bdag gis phyi nas gang du mthong/ /kyi hud dga' 
320b4(mdo 'grel): ma'i dga' ba'i dpyid/ /yid srubs mtshams sbyor pho nya lang tsho 'dir/ /jig gnyen gyi srog gyur khyod za gyur/ /dus kyi gnyis 'thung gis bcom tsu ta bzhin/ /zhes pa de yi snying rje'i sgra thos nas/ /mya ngan zug rngu nad du rab zug pa/ /rigs 'dzin rgyal bo'i
320b5(mdo 'grel): bu yis mngon phyogs te/ /de la bzod dka' i sdug bsngal rgyu dag dris/ /ma ma khyod kyi tsho de drag po 'di/ /sdug bsngal drag po gsal byed ci las skyes/ /dge ba'i gzugs can dam pa 'di la khyod/ /drag por kun tu 'dar byed ci zhig dogs/ /des bar dge ba
320b6(mdo 'grel): dag la 'os ba'i lus/ /skye bo bzang bo dang 'grogs bde ba ster/ /rnam ba 'di lta bu ni rab 'joms ba'i/ /rgud pa'i gnas nyid dag tu mi 'gyur 'o/ /zhes pa de yi sdug bsngal dug 'phos 'khrugs/ /brtse ba'i rang bzhin de yis dris la nges/ /'bral
320b7(mdo 'grel): bas 'jigs nas bu yi bzhin la mig /phur pa btsugs bzhin de la rab smras ba/ /bcos thabs med par gyur pa deng kyi ni/ /sdug bsngal me dag thos pas khyod la ci/ /las ngan smin pas nyer gnas bzod dka' yi/ /rnam pa 'di ni bdag la dus 
321a1(mdo 'grel): min lhung/ /rgya che grags 'bar dung skyong rigs nyid kyi/ /myu gu bdag gis bu gzhon 'di la ni/ /byed po gdug bas rtsa ba 'joms pa yi/ /sta gri rnon po 'di ni chas su byas/ /rtag tu za bar ston byed mkha' lding la/ /thams cad
321a2(mdo 'grel): brlag pa bsrung slad re mos kyis/ /gdengs can 'dren pa dag gis klu re ni/ /gos dmar rtags kyis mtshan pa spring bar byed/ /gang 'di kha ba'i ri ni bkod pa yi/ /phung po pha rol mthong min mthong gyur pa/ /'di ni gdengs can lus zos dor ba yi/ /keng rus phreng
321a3(mdo 'grel): bas bsgrubs pa'i rus phung yin/ /mthar byed so yi drung du song gyur cing/ /gos dmar bka' ni rab tu bzung byas pa/ /bdag gi bu 'dis de ring rim gyis ni/ /de rigs rtsa ba 'joms pa'i res 'di thob/ ces pa 'jigs pas myur du smra byed cing/ /bu de yis
321a4(mdo 'grel): ni dbugs dag 'byin byed ma/ /de yis de ni gos 'dab kyis bsgribs nas/ /snying rje'i? bor gsang par tsho de bton/ /kyi hud dung gi gtsug phud 'gro ba'i rgyan/ /gsod bar 'gro la 'di ltar khyod ring ci/ /zhes brjod bu yi mgrin bzung de yi ni?/ /phrag bar bzhin
321a5(mdo 'grel): bkod ma de rmongs bar gyur/ dal gyis 'du shes thob cing skrag ma de/ /be'u gcig ldan ba bzhin gzhon nus mthong/ /de yi sdug bsngal nags me bzlog pa'i thabs/ /brtsebs brlan pa'i blo yis rab bsams ba/ /snying rjes dman pa gang gis rtag tu
321a6(mdo 'grel): ni/ /gzhan dag bcom nas lus ngan gso byed pa/ /kye ma 'dab chags dbang gis 'bad pa ni/ /gdug pas rjes su 'brel 'di rab tu dman/ /bu dang bral bar gyur bas bu med kyi/ /ma 'di nges pa nyid du 'tsho ma yin/ /gzhon nu shin tuu gzhon pa'i lus
321a7(mdo 'grel): can 'di/ /rang gi lus byin bdag gis bsrung bar bya/ /skad cig 'dis bsams de yis der smras pa/ /ma gcig khyod ni bu bcas rang sar song/ /klu dag gsod pa'i gnas su bdag mchis yis/ /gos dmar mtshan ma 'di ni bdag la stsol/ /zhes pa//
321b1(mdo 'grel): rtse ldan de yis brjod tsam la/ yan lag 'khri shing 'dar des de la smras/ 'gal ba 'di ni khyod kyis brjod mi bya/ khyod ni dud gtsug las lhag bdag gi bu/ bu de med las kyi nyer gnas gting med mtsho/ rmongs ba'i dpa' rlabs ldan bar bdag 'jug /
321b2(mdo 'grel): go /nyes pa byed pa rnams la sdug bsngal ni/ /dus min skyogs kyi rdo ba bzod dka' lhung/ dam pa'i snying stobs chu gter khyod kyi lus/ /'gro ba'i mig dang srog gyur bskal ba ni/ 'jig kyang mi 'jig mngon sum bsten byed kyi/ bdud rtsi nye 'di dag legs
321b3(mdo 'grel): ldan gyur cig/ ces ba de yis brjod cing 'bad pas des /rjes su bcings byas rang lus sbyin pa la/ gang tshe sems spyod g.yo ba med gyur ba /de tsho dung gtsug gis kyang de la smras/ mkha' lding zas su bdag spros dang bor grub/ /'di la byed pa la ni ci zhig
321b4(mdo 'grel): bya/ rgyu med mnyes gshin dag las gnas smin 'dir/ khyod ni log ba'i bsam pa byar mi 'os/ /khyod kyi lus ni yon tan rgyan dang ldan/ /tshul bzang yongs su rdzogs pa bdud rtsi'i gter/ srid gsum 'tsho ba yis kyang bsrung bya 'di/ rtswa? mtshungs
321b5(mdo 'grel): bdag don ji ltar btang bar 'os/ srid pa'i nags tshal 'dir ni bdag lta bu/ ka shi'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs rtag tu 'byung/ bdud rtsi'i sdun zlar gyur pa yongs 'du'i shing/ /khyed lta bu ni byi nas 'khrungs ma yin/ skye gzhan bsod nams zang gis tshul
321b6(mdo 'grel): bzang khyod /bdud rtsi bdud rtsi'i zer mthong dang par mdzod/ /bdag gi thugs khral dag gis yid gdung 'di/ /bdag nyid kun gyis khyod ni yong ma mdzad/ /rgya mtsho'i dung du lus bkod go kar+Na/ /sha sbar myur du phyin nas phyag 'tshal te/ /ma ni sa 'og
321b7(mdo 'grel): khang par rnam springs nas/ /mkha' lding rdo der skyo med bdag mchi'o/ /zhes brjod mgo yis sprin gyi bzhin pa la/ /rab tu btung nas glu 'di ma dang bcas/ /dpa' rlabs chen po'i lag pas dbu ba'i phreng/ /rab bkod go kar+Na'i nges su song/ /rig 'dzin
322a1(mdo 'grel): bdag po dag gi bu yang der/ /de yi srog ni rab bsrung des pa yis/ /'gro bas mdun du nyung rum pa dag ni/ /lag na dgos dmar thog nam? rong ba mthong/ /de nas nyung rum? pa des phyag 'tshal nis?/ /bkra shis gos zung de ni de la phul
322a2(mdo 'grel): dga' ston zhag bdun dag gi khrus kyi slad/ /cho ga bstar bas byon par mdzod ces smras/ /bzang po sngon la khyod song rjes nas ni/ /thogs 'gor med par bdag 'od shes par mdzod/ /ces brjod myur du de btang dga' ba yis/ /gzhon nus snying stobs blo
322a3(mdo 'grel): yis rab bsams pa/ /klu dag gsod ba'i rtags gyur gos dmar zung/ /'ded pa 'di ni 'bad pa dang bral bar/ /a la bdag gis thob pas myur nyid du/ /lag 'gro dgra yi rdo can 'gro bar bya/ /zhes bsams gtsug gi nor bu'i 'di zer ni/ /rab
322a4(mdo 'grel): 'bar tshogs mtshungs gis ni spyi bor bkod/ /gzhan ni bla gos dag tu chags byas te/ /mkha' lding babs rtags ldan pa'i rdo can song/ /brlan chags sprul gyi zhag gis bran gyur cing/ /des ni khrag gis dmar ba der phyin nas/ /'dzegs te mkha' 
322a5(mdo 'grel): lding 'od ba mngon 'dod pas/ /de ni lus kyi stong bsgribs rnam par gnas/ /de nas gser gyi khu ba'i dpa' rlabs ltar/ /mdzes pa'i glog drag tshogs kyi sprin dag ni/ /rab tu gsal par gyur bzhin gang gis mkha' / /rta gdong me 'bar rgya mtsho'i chu
322a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin gyur/ de nas gshog pa bskyong pas rab bskyed rgyas par rab dkrigs rlung gi chu gter 'khrug byed cing/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis mnan gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs 'dab chags dbang po ring nas mthong/ /gang gis dman? pa'i 'gros dag gis
322a7(mdo 'grel): ni lton? pa mdza' dag grubs bar gyur cing sa 'dzin gyi/ /rtse mo'i cha dag ltung ba'i sgra drag gnod pas 'jigs pa bzhin dus gzhi 'khrugs par gyur/ /de nas kri? la 'jigs dud rdo rje bzhin/ /brtan pa'i lus can de yi rgyab tu ni/ /rdo rje ltar dag sder
322b1(mdo 'grel): mo lcags kyu'i rtse/ /drag por snun byed klu dbang sgra dag lhung/ /'phral la mkha' lding dag gis bsnun zhing lus ni gtubs par gyur mod kyang/ /gzhan srog bsrung la rab mang spu long gis rgyan lus can gzhon nu dag/ brtan pa yangs pas rtag tu bdag gi lus
322b2(mdo 'grel): 'di sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i/ /gdung ba ldan pa'i tshogs rnams bsrung ba'i nye 'khor gyur cig ces pa bsams/ /de nas thug chom 'jigs rung sgra ldan kha yis ngon bcom zhing/ nges par gtubs kyang deni g.yo med snying stobs brtan ldan che/ /lag
322b3(mdo 'grel): 'gro 'di ni su zhes der ni 'dab chags rgyal po dag/ ya mtshan la chags rnam par nges slad g.yo ba med par myur/ /de nas 'dab chags bdag po rab drag nyi ma'i phreng ba bzhin/ /gzi brjid ser skya rgya ? tshogs gyis phyogs ni ser byed pas/ /slar yang mngon
322b4(mdo 'grel): btab? myur du de yi mgo yi dum bu dag/ nor bu 'od dmar rab 'bar khrag rgyun lta bur rab gsal blangs/ gnas skabs der ni gzhon nu yi/ ha ri tsan dan nags tshal du/ /sprin gyi tog ni bcun mo dang/ lhan cig mna' ma dang ldan gnas/ /chu gter zla ba 'dod
322b5(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin/ /bu ni lta bar 'dod gyur cing/ /snying la dogs pa gnas pa yis/ /bsams pas non pa bzhin smras pa/ kye ma ci zhig da dung yang/ bu ni sprin gyi yon na pa dag/ ri mchog mdza' la blta ba yi/ dge mtshan can de ma mthong ngo/ ri 'di li? ngos la
322b6(mdo 'grel): mkha' lding gi/ dus 'di 'bar ba rab tu zhugs/ gang gis nam mkha' mi bzad pa'i/ /phyogs srog 'bar ba lta bur gtogs/ /'jigs pas pus nyams lag 'gro dag za 'dod gdengs can dgra yi ni/ /kun tu 'bigs byed snun pa'i sgra/ /'jigs su
322b7(mdo 'grel): rung bas dus 'dir 'jug/ de ltar the tshom rab rgyas shing/ /'jigs bcas dogs pa la gnas tshe/ gtsug gi nor bu khrag gis bsgos/ /mkha' las de ni mdun du lhung/ /mi bzang pa yi lhas ngan bzhin/ /mdun du sha dang skra dang ni/ /khrag bcas
323a1(mdo 'grel): kyis gang de mthong nas/ /'phral la de ni brgyal bar gyur/ /bdag po'i gtsug gi nor bu dag/ lhung mthong ma la ya can yang/ /rmongs pas mngon bcom sgyug mo dang/ /lhan cig sa gzhi dag la lhung/ /dal gyis 'du shes thob gyur
323a2(mdo 'grel): nas/ /btsun mo mna' ma dbugs phyung ste/ /blo ldan rig 'dzin bdag po yis/ /the tshom bsams nas rab smras pa/ /bu ni sprin gyi bzhon pa dag/ rang nyid sor ste bdag gis blta/ /mkha' lding dus ni 'jigs rung 'di/ /lus la the tshom ster
323a3(mdo 'grel): byed yin?/ /gtsug gi nor bu 'di lhung yang/ /nges pa nyid du mi rtag ste/ /'di ni gdengs can mkha' lding gis/ /za ba dag gi yin yang srid/ /'jig pa'i rlung gis bsnun pa yi/ /rgyu skar rab tu g.yo ba bzhin/ /gdengs can rnams kyi nor bu ni/ /rtag
323a4(mdo 'grel): tu 'di ltar nges par lhung/ /zhes pa brjod nas rig 'dzin dbang/ /de gnyis dang 'grogs rjes 'brang bcas/ /gdengs can gsod pa'i rdo ba can/ /sa 'dzin dag gi ngos su song/ /gnas skabs der ni dung gi gtsug/ gsod pa'i gos dam
323a5(mdo 'grel): dag dang ldan/ /chu gter dogs su gau kar+Nar/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni myur du 'ongs/ /sprin gyi bzhon pa mkha' lding gis/ /bsnun zhing gtubs pa mthong gyur nas/ /kyi hud bcom mo bslus so zhes/ /rnam par smra zhing sa la 'gyel/ /yang yang ri
323a6(mdo 'grel): phug sgra bsnyan gyis/ /tsho de dag dang ldan byed cing/ /mchi ma rab zags de yis ni/ /ldab ldib sgra yi tsho de byas/ /kyi hung? rgyu med gnyen gyur gdung ba can gyi snying rje bsod nams dag gi mtshams/ /gzhan gyi gdung bzhi byed srog rab sbyin la
323a7(mdo 'grel): mngon phyogs mnyes gshin 'di ni ci/ /kyi hud tshul bzang gter dag khyod dang bral bas 'gro ba dag ni mun par gyur/ /bdud rtsi'i zer ni sgra gcan gyis zos nam mkha' i mdzes? pa lta bu dag la brten/ /gzhan la rtse bas srog ni bskyab par bsgrub
323b1(mdo 'grel): la kye ma srog ni gtong byed pa/ /khyod kyi lus ni bskal pa'i bar nas grags pa'i rang bzhin dag tu yang dag skyes/ /khyod kyis sdig can dung gi gtsug ni sdig pa'i 'dam rdzab dog cing nyam ngag/ /rtag tu 'chi dang brlag pa'i gnas gyur 'jigs rung smad pa'i khongs su
323b2(mdo 'grel): ci slad 'phangs/ zhes pa mu cor rab smra zhing/ mkha' lding drung du 'gro ba yi/ gdengs can gyis ni sprin gyi tog/ rjes 'brang bcas pa 'ong ba mthong/ de la byung ba'i mdza' bshad nas/ /klu ni mya ngan gyis 'khrugs bas/ /dpung pa bslangs nas 'dab chags kyi/ /gang
323b3(mdo 'grel): zag la ni smad bcas smras/ /gdengs can la 'os rtags ni cung zad nyid kyang ma brtags par/ rig 'dzin 'di ni ci slar bcom zhing nges bsad nam mkha' lding/ khyod kyis dang por ma dpyad steng du yongs rdzogs sdig pa yi/ gdung ba'i lam bsten thub tshong 'di yis
323b4(mdo 'grel): mtshar byas mtshar ba byas/ /'di thos sprin gyi bzhon pa ni/ /mdun du lus nyams mthong gyur nas/ /sprin gyi tog ni btsun mo dang/ /bcas pa rab tu brgyal bar gyur/ /de nas ma la ya can gyis/ /mdun du mkha' lding dag gis khyo/ /drag bsnun gtugs pa'i dbyibs
323b5(mdo 'grel): can dag /mthong nas 'tsho ba phyed thob gyur/ /brtan yang ri shong lhung ba bzhin/ /ma bcom na yang de bcom bzhin/ /'cho ba ldan yang 'tsho med bzhin/ /rab tu la byam yang g.yo med gyur/ brtan pa'i grogs bzhin rgyal ba yis/ /yan lag kun la 'khyud
323b6(mdo 'grel): cing bsdams/ /rmongs pas dbang dang bral ba des/ yud tsam ci yang rig ma gyur/ dal gyis 'du shes thob gyur cing/ /thams cad gdung ba smra ba na/ mkha' lding chags bral skyengs pa yis/ mya ngan ldan pa dag tu gyur/ de dus 'tsho ba gtong bar ni/ nges byas
323b7(mdo 'grel): brtan pa bzung ba yi/ /ba ma dag gis sprin gyi ni /bzhon pa lus zos la smras pa/ bya min 'di la rab zhugs bu/ /deng kyi srog ni 'phrog byed pa/ /gzhan la snying rje'i ngang tshul can/ /khyod kyi rtsub po 'di? ni ci/ /'gro ba'i tshogs ni rgud pa dag/ bsrung ba'i
324a1(mdo 'grel): rin chen lus 'di ni/ /nges par ma bsrung bu khyod kyis/ /legs byas dag ni ci zhig bya/ /zhes pa smra ba'i pha ma la/ /spyi bo 'dar bas phyag 'tshal nas/ /bzod dka' srog ni rab g.yo zhing/ /yi ge 'thor bar rab smras pa/ /yab cig khyed kyi
324a2(mdo 'grel): bka' med par/ /rang gi 'di byas bdag gi ni/ /phyi ma med pa'i phyag 'di yis/ /khyod la rab tu dang ba mtshon/ /skad cig 'jig pa'i lus 'di ni/ /yongs su 'gyur ba mi mtshon tshe/ /lus can rnams kyi skye ba yi/ /bgrod pa gzhan phan snying po nyid/ /lus can rnamS
324a3(mdo 'grel): kyi tshe 'di mgyogs pa'i rlung gi rtse dga' yis /bskyod pa'i 'khri shing 'dab ma la gnas chu thigs rnam par g.yo/ /rgyun tu gzir ba la phan bsod nams gnas la yo byad ni/ /bsgrubs byas brtan pa'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /pha ma mchim can la 'di/ /
324a4(mdo 'grel): brjod nas mdun du 'dab chags dbang/ /'gyod ba chen pos rang gis ni/ /nyes byas smod cing gnas pa dag/ de yis/ snying stobs 'bad pa ni/ /chags bral bla mas dag byas nas/ /klu ni za ba las ldog la/ /kun tu rtogs pa brtan po byas/ /de nas mi bzad mdza' 
324a5(mdo 'grel): yi dbugs/ /yi ge rab tu 'khrul za can/ /mig ni rab tu zum pa de/ /snying stobs gsal ba'i lhag mar gyur/ /de nas sreg khang rab spras pa/ /'os shing me tog kos kyis spras/ /me yi mdun du mngon phyogs te/ /'jug 'dod de yi dga' mas smras/ /
324a6(mdo 'grel): bdag gi gus pas mnyes byas? pa/ /'byung ba'i dga' ma bcom ldan mas/ /rigs 'dzin kun gyi kha lo sgyur/ /mchog ni bdag la rab tu 'byin/ /gang zhig zhag bdun nyid kyis bdag/ bu mo yugs sa'i skal ldan gyur/ /dag pa'i tshig 'di bdag la
324a7(mdo 'grel): ni/ /ci slad bden ba min par gyur/ /bdag gi skye ba gzhan du yang/ /'os pa 'di nyid bdag gyur cig/ ces brjod de yis man d+ha ra'i/ /me tog snyim pa me la gtor/ /de nas bdud rtsi'i bum pa yis/ /lag pa'i mtsho skyes brel ba yi/ /ri skyes rang
324b1(mdo 'grel): nyid mngon phyogs te/ /dga' bas bu mo khyod kyi bdag /de ni 'tsho zhes brjod byed cing/ bzhin gyi 'od kyis phyogs bkang ste/ bdud rtsi'i char rgyun dag gis ni/ sprin gyi bzhon pa rab tu bsos/ ri sras mi snang gyur ba na/ /sprin gyi bzhon pa ras bsos nas/ /bsang
324b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i klu rnams bsos pa ni/ mkha' lding dag la slar yang zhus/ /de nas de yi bdud rtsi'i char/ /spros pas gdengs can thams cad ni/ /gdengs ka nor bu'i 'od rgyas pa'i/ snang ba dang ldan rab tu langs/ /de nas dga' dang rmad byung yid srubs rnams/ /mtshungS
324b3(mdo 'grel): bar mngon par sbyor bas 'dar byed cing/ dpag bsam 'khri shing yang dag rgyu ba bzhin/ /grub pa'i bu mo bdag bo'i drung du song/ de nas lhun po gshog pa ldan pa bzhin/ /'dab chags dbang pos gzhon nu mngon mchod song/ /sprin gyi bzhon pa dag
324b4(mdo 'grel): la mngon phyogs pa'i/ /dung gi gtsug ni lta bas ngoms ma gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' i spyi bor lha yi bdag po yis/ /mdzes ba'i padmos rab gtor me tog rgyas ba'i char/ bung ba'i tshogs kyis sgra yis yon tan gtod byas sgra dbyangs bzhin//
324b5(mdo 'grel): 'chi med dga' ba'i tshogs kyis phyogs ni yongs su gang ba babs/ /pha ma dag la phyag 'tshal de dag zhabs kyi pad+mar gtsug gi nor bu chags/ /de dag dga' ba'i mchi ma zags pas dga' bas dbang skur dga' ston legs par bsgrubs/ /snying stobs
324b6(mdo 'grel): chu gter bsod nams tshogs ni yongs rdzogs sprin gyi bzhon pas skad cig las/ /gsal bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal gyi mtshan ma rin chen rnams ni yang dag thob/ /de nas lha yi bdag pos gus pa dang ldan pa/ /dga' bas mngon phyogs
324b7(mdo 'grel): rang gi bstan la mngon dbang bskur/ /skabs gsum tshogs kyis phyag byar 'os pa'i grags pa can/ /'khor los sgyur ba de yis yun ring dpal dag bsten/ /de ltar rang gi skye ba gzhan gyi tshul 'di dag/ bsod nams nyer bstan dag la 
325a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal bas gsungs pa ni/ /bdag gis bsdebs las dge ba'i mchog ni gang thob des/ /sems can thams cad mngon par 'byung ba nyid gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing dge ba'i dbang bos
325a2(mdo 'grel): mdzad ba las de nyid kyi sras zla ba'i dbang pos mdzad ba sprin gyi bzhon pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgya rtsa brgyad pa'o// //dpal ldan rgyal po'i cod pan blon/ /blo bzang mi dbang zhes rigs la/ /gdengs can dbang bzhin
325a3(mdo 'grel): longs spyod can/ /longs spyod ldan pa'i dbang po byung/ /snying stobs gter gyur de yi bu/ /yon tan rin chen tshogs kyi gnas/ /dpal ldan tshig ni bdud rtsi bskyed/ /rgya mtsho dang mtshungs rgya mtsho byung/ /de yi bu ni rab gsal dbang/ /sbyin pa'i bsod

327b7(mdo 'grel): mkhan chen po lak+Sh+rI? ka ra dang bod kyi 'o tshtsa ba dge slong shong ston gyis mang yul 'phags pa'i drung dge 'dun bzhi de'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du rgya dpe dang gtugs zhu dag tshar bar byas so/ //'di ni sngon gyi bsod nams kyi tshoD
328a1(mdo 'grel): dpag tu med pa la brten nas/ grub thob chen po'i rigs rgyud khyad par can du sku 'khrungs shing/ dad pa dang gus pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che dang/ bstan pa 'dzin pa'i gang zag dang/ brtse?
328a2(mdo 'grel): gcug gi nor bu ltar mchod cing/ bsod nams kyi mthu stobs dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dpa' brtul gyis nag po'i phyogs rnaMs zil gyis gnon la/ khrims gnyis kyis khyab la mkhas pa'i sgo nas/ rgyal po chen po'i khrims lugs leD par skyong zhing
328a3(mdo 'grel): khrims dang 'gal bar byed pa rnams sun 'byin pa'i nus pa can/ byams pa dang snying rje chen pos chab srid zhi ba dang /nges pa'i sgo nas skyong bar mdzad pa'i /ta'i si tu chen po byang chub rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi brtan? pa rin po phyogs thams cad du ?
328a4(mdo 'grel): rgyas spel ba dang/ gong ma rgyal po yon mchod sku khams bzang zhing/ sku tshe brtan par bya ba'i phyir dang/ seMs ni thaMs cad la phan bde dpag tu med pa 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ mdo dang rgyud kyi dgongs ? ye shes ? gnas rnams
328a5(mdo 'grel): gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'i bstan bcos/ sa bcu'i dbang phyug dang mkhas grub chen po rnams kyis brtsams pa/ rgya gar dang kha che dang bal yul dang li? dang/ rgya'i yul nas khong ? ces chen po rnams ?
328a6(mdo 'grel): dam du bzhengs pa la/ /byang chub sems dpa' i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing snyan dngags? mkhan dge ba'i dbang pos mdzad pa zhes bya ba/ ta'i si tu chen po byang chub rgyal mtshan rang gi yid dam ? bgyis shing/ gzhan
328a7(mdo 'grel): la yang phan par byed pa'i chos so// //dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu ldan la brten nas sangs rgyas bstan pa dar bar shog/ sems can bde shing skyid par shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos la spyod par shog/ rang gzhan don gnyis lhun gyis grub par shog mang+gA laM
